1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shri tsa tur pI tha ma hA yo gi ni gu h+ya sarba tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod
1b2(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya
1b3(rgyud 'bum): bdapal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid
2a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang / / drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang // rnal
2a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde/ / gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad
2a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas/
2a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang // bdag nyid de nyid ji
2b1(rgyud 'bum): ltar lha/ / chu dang me ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar rab mdzes nam mkha' dang // ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba//
2b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dbang la mnyan par 'tshal// 'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag/ nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
2b3(rgyud 'bum): dang por dbang gi mtshan nyid dang // gnyis par yi ge gcig dang ni// gsum par sa bon brgyad pa dang // bzhi par rtsa
2b4(rgyud 'bum): yi lha nyid do/ / bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me// blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya// lto ba me yi thab khung du// de yi
2b5(rgyud 'bum): me la sprin sreg bya/ / steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni// rnam shes rtsa ni bsdam par bya// thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru//
3a1(rgyud 'bum): me yi rtswa yi lha ni rnam par bsgom// lto ba'i me ni 'bar ba la// khyad par kha dog sgom pa ni// lte ba'am
3a2(rgyud 'bum): ni dkar po'o/ / g.yon pa'i ma ni de bzhin ser// lhon sngon po'i ming can te// lhag ma 'di ni dmar por bya// de dbus kha dog sngo bas
3a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / me yi ngu bar rab tu grags// me yi dbus su pad+ma nyid// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// de yi dbus su ye shes lha//
3a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad// phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni// rdo rje dril bus rnam par brgyan// g.yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang /
3a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can// bzhad dang khro bas hUM sgrogs shing // 'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha// de yi dbus su rab tu glags//
3a6(rgyud 'bum): shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang // byang du de bzhin gos dkar mo// nub tu lha mo mA ma kI// sangs rgyas yum ni lho ru'o// gzugs ni mthe bo'i
3b1(rgyud 'bum): tshad tsam du/ / bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do// lce la chu ni sbyar bar bya// nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o// mig la sa 'di rnam par shes// de bzhin tshangs par 'bar ba'i me// mgrin pa
3b2(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang / / g.yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid// thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni// phyug gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni// 'di nyid lha ni shes
3b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rnam shes rtsa nas drangs pa yi// de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi dgu// steng gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa// kun tu tshwa bzhin zhu ltar babs// ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming // lce yi steng du
3b4(rgyud 'bum): bsten pa yi/ / nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yi// 'khor lo phra rab rdul bzhin no// steng gi nam mkha' nam mkha' ni// sreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni thim// g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid//
3b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o// 'og drang steng ni 'di yi rtsa// 'og na sngon du rab grag pa// dbugs dang dri ni mnyam drangs nas// rgyas pa yi ni lnga'i steng du// rnam shes gnyis kyi
3b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa nas drang / / bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim// ye shes dbang phyug de steng du// de la bdud rtsi sa bkru bar bya// de ltar kun tu bzhin brngubs nas// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom
3b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / lag mthil zla ba nyi ma bsgom// ye shes yi ge de dbus so// ri dgas mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis// khams lnga'i bdag nyid bsregs pa'o// sngon du sa bon hUM byas nas// gnyis par
4a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gsum pa ni/ / gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o// de bzhin rlung ni bani pa dang // lnga par dang ba'i sa bon gyis// mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin sreg bya
4a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi de nyid me la ni/ / bdag nyid sbyor bas bsreg pa nyid// ji ltar ye shes me de ni// sreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags// sbyin sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzogs
4a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / / stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis// skyes pa'i dran pa rnam 'jig pa// 'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa// bcom ldan 'das la mnyam par 'tshal// stong pa'i
4a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rang bzhin gyis/ / nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang // sa ni nam mkha' kun tu bsam// rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni// yid 'ong bad+ma
4a5(rgyud 'bum): / 'byung bar ldan// stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas// me yi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di// de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo// mA ma kI ni nub phyogs
4a6(rgyud 'bum): su lhor ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ / chu ni sgrol mar kun tu thim// me ni gos dkar mo la thim// mA ma kI ni nub nAs sa// rlung ni sangs rgyas spyan la thim// chu shing me tog pad+ma
4a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gangan// de'i ye shes rgyal dbang mo// sgong skyes 'og tu byed pa can// gzugs med srid pa'i dbyibs can ni// ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim// de ltar
4b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid stong pa 'di/ / de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la// lus kyi dri ma rab tu
4b2(rgyud 'bum): bkru/ / phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom// dmar po 'dab ma brgyad dang ni// ge sar lte bar bcas pa yi// dbus su pad+mas rnam par brgyan// 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi//
4b3(rgyud 'bum): sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// shar du si ka zhes bya dang // byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin// nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs// lho ru hUM gi dbang phyug go// dbang ldan du ni dbang
4b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i dbyangs/ / me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so// bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang // rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o// dbus su ye shes rgyal po 'di// sgong skyes ye shes dbang phyug
4b5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa/ / bdud rtsi sa bon 'bar ba'o// kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni// go 'phang mchog gis bsgom par bya// dbugs mi g.yo ba'i sems dpa' yis/
4b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos po dngos po bsgom byas nas// phyi ni rtsa yi lha nyid gdan// mig las sa yi sa bon dang // nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o// lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'di// snying khar hUM zhes bya ba'i
4b7(rgyud 'bum): ming / / yan lag drug 'dzam sa bon gyis// rnal 'byor lus ni rnam par srung // ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas// ci yi phyir na skye bo'i ming // gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang /
5a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jog med cing mtshan ngas/ gnas med panas kyi'i byigyis can dang / mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid// stong pa nyid kyimi rtsezhes bya ba ste gnyis pa
5a2(rgyud 'bum): / bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid// bcom ldan 'das las mnyan par 'tshal// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // gnyis dang gnyis med la brten nas// bskal
5a3(rgyud 'bum): pa bzang po brgya yi sngon/ / dag pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas// ri rab lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// mA ma kI nI lho phyogs gnas// lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling // de bzhin byang du gos dkar
5a4(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / shar du lha mo snyan ma 'di// lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas// de ltar snying khar ri rab dang // de bzhin mgo bo mA ma kI// sgrol ma lha yi gnas dang ni// g.yon pa de bzhin gos
5a5(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo/ / snyan pa mo 'di bdag gi gnas// lha mo lnga yis byin gyis brlabs// pad+ma'i dbus su rdo rje dang // rdo rje'i dbus su pad+ma can// rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pas// lus pa
5a6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas bkres pa'o/ / yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du// bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim// lha yi gnas ni nam mkha' nyid// rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes// bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni//
5a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rtsa nas rab tu grags// de yi yul gyi khrag dang ni// lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas// khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor bas// blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag/ ji ltar bdag gi
5b1(rgyud 'bum): sa bon lnga/ / de lngar pad+ma yi yang bsgom// ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni// nam mkha' rdo rje 'jib byed do// rkang pas rkang pa dkri bya zhing // mchu yis mchu ni btsir byas la// gnyis/
5b2(rgyud 'bum): ka'i lag pa phyag rgya ni// rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje brtag/ rang bzhin gyi ni so sra dang // snying kha'i rnam shes bsgoms pa yis// ye shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di// skyes bus khros
5b3(rgyud 'bum): pas hUM byas nas/ / de ltar rdo rje pad+ma 'di// rnal 'byor bsdus pas bskyod par bya// gnyis ka dga' zhing tshim pa yis// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// khrag dang khwa
5b4(rgyud 'bum): ba las 'byung ba'i/ / sa bon myu gus 'gro ba dang // lha rnams lus ni yang dag 'byung // 'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te// longs spyod phyir yang gnas mi bya// sems can
5b5(rgyud 'bum): don phyir 'dong ba'i phyir/ / yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'ong sku// gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas pas// gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya// sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so//
5b6(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid// yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar ba// lnga yi bdag nyid du rtogs bya// lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi// lnga
5b7(rgyud 'bum): yi lus ni yongs su srung / / yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar// ji ltar sbyang zhing sgom pa dang // ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste// ji ltar thar pa la gnas nyi/
6a1(rgyud 'bum): rlom rna sal mnyan par chag/ gas pa gsung ba zhes byag/ rgyal po'i bzhin na/ zlog par stong pa de'on// stong bar chun pa ma
6a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ khwa dog bdun gyi pad+ma ni// gsar dang bcas yid 'ong ga/ stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyis// pad+ma'i gzugs ni snying por bcas// pad+ma rgya cher rab mdzes par/ ri
6a3(rgyud 'bum): chen bdun gyis mngon pa sdus/ dril zung ba'i 'phreng ba dang // dang ngangan paza' mngon par 'byung // seng ge'i gad ma ni mngon par gsal// de ste nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// @
6a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di/ / 'od zer zhim bya ba yi// sangs rgyas lnga yis bon gyis/ rdo rnam par bsam// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dgyes// shar du de bzhin maM p
6a5(rgyud 'bum): a/ rin chenas bon lho da // de bzhin nu bu da pag meng+gA/ byung phyogs suni rin mong phyug/ sna bom ldanarnam par bsgos// pad byang chub yan lag brgyad// dza~M d+ha'aM
6a6(rgyud 'bum): sa la rab tu brtag/ dbus su snying po skongs// rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim// pad+ma brgyad de'i rtse mor ni// menga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad// shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'dra/
6a7(rgyud 'bum): byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo// de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI/ 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por// 'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya// rdo rje las mi lha ma
6b1(rgyud 'bum): lus/ / bcugs pa ru ni rnam par byasam// spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o// kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes// rdo rje yi ni cod pan can// dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'byud// rgod cing khro dang /
6b2(rgyud 'bum): sgeg pa dang // sems dra ba'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// steng du ral gri 'chang ba dang // gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu// gsum par rdo rje gdengs pa gsor// g.yon pa'i steng du kha T+wAM dang /
6b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas lha mo'i nu ma 'chir// gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrog cing // rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// rgyan kun phun sum tshogs pa dang //
6b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'phreng bas rab tu brgyan// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni// phyag gcig gis ni 'khyud pa dang // gcig gi phyag na thod pa ni// bdud rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan// mA ma kI yang de
6b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / gcig gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud// gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na// khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o// spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam// 'phreng bas phyag ni brgyan pa dang /
6b6(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma sbyang ba'i phyag gnyis pa// mdun du snod la rnam par blta// de ltar bdag nyid lnga yi lus// lus la kun nas yang dag gnas// shar du lha mo me tog ma// lho ru spos dang yang dag
6b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / nub tum me'i lag pa sa/ khyong du rje'i lha mo'o// dbang ldan du ni smig mo zhing // de bzhin ma phyogs 'greng ba ma// bden thal phyogs su dbyangs ma dang // rlung du gar ma brgyan
7a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi/ 'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog/ sangs rgyas spyan ltar 'phro ba ni// sems can sgrol la mchog tu brtson// bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan na//
7a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no// bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgom par bya// phyis ni de yi mdun nyid du// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid
7a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+mar bsam pa dang / / de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam// sngon du gsungs pa'i gdan la ni// der ni nyi mas mngon par gau yogs// sna tshogs rin chen mchod pa dang // sna tshogs dar
7a4(rgyud 'bum): ni mngon par sbyangs/ / lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas// pad+ma'i tshul du kha phye la// oM ka ma la ud b+ha be shrI swA hA// pad+ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rang gi dbugs lus byung nas ni//
7a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mdun du rnam par bsgom// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// sdigs mdzub g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung dakli// lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o// oM badz+ra a~M ku sha dzaHoM badz+ra A kAR+Sha
7a6(rgyud 'bum): ya dzaHrdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ / lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas// sdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa// zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o// oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ zhags pa'i
7a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ / ji ltar bdag nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin// de ltar mdun du'ang rab bsam bya// lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa// khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi par ro// shar du gshin rje mthar
7b1(rgyud 'bum): byed dngos/ / lho ru de bzhin bgegs mthar byed// nub tu pad+ma mthar byed pa// byang du khro bo skyong ba'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings// rgyu ba dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM//
7b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs// mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra g+har+b+he ho// rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa
7b3(rgyud 'bum): / lcags sgrog phyag rgya las// sor mo dbus ma brkyang byas la// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM re ro tsa na sa mA d+hi/ bai shwa ye g+hu ye g+hA ya dze b+hi She swA hA/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho so ho ho ho/ hri hri hr-i hri swA hA/
7b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM tA re tut+tA re sa ta k+Shi ta hUM swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so// oM hi li hi li pa li swA hA/ gos dkar mo'i sngags so// oM ta ra sarba ta na
7b5(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ mA ma kI'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha ya hUM/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags so// sdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mo ni// dbus dang dbus su sbyar bar bya// mthe bong ngos su sbyar ba ni// lha mo
7b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi phyag rgya'o/ / ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni// me tog ma la sogs pa dang // sgeg mo yi ni sngags nyid yin// g.yas brkyang rkang pa yang dag gnas// sdigs mdzub snying khar sbyin byas
7b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / dpung pa mdun nas brkyang byas la// se gol hUM gi rnam pa dang // lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas pa// 'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// oM A yuHpA la pra ti rak+Sha duk+Sha ban+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ shar phyog
8a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo bani ba'in/ / oM A kArA ya sa tad+ha tun kro swAhA/ byang du rgyas pa'i'o// oM mo ha ya mo has/ sarbas twAn shrI swAts+tsha/ nub tu dbang gi'o// oM shwa k+Shasar+b+badraH
8a2(rgyud 'bum): / g+hA ta ya hri phaT/ lho ru mngon par spyod pa'i'o// oM su gan+d+ha hUM haM swAhA/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dri'i phyag rgya'o// oM su so bid puSh+pe b+h+yaHswA hA/ sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong sbyar ba ni me tog gi
8a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ / oM d+hU pa ma la ku le swA hA/ sor mo dbus ma bsgreng ba ni bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM tIk+Sha dI pi pra ti grih+Na swA hA/ khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong bsgreng ba ni mar me'i sngags
8a4(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya'o/ / oM ku ru ku ru bi dza ye swAhA/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas dbus su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ji ltar sngon du sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// hU~M gi
8a5(rgyud 'bum): glu yi rnam pa yis/ / sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas// rked pa'i phyogs su bzung byas la// pi wang tshul gyis sbreng ba dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa
8a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // brdab pa'i tshul gyis rdeb pa dang // gar gyis tshul gyis skyod pa dang // rlung g.ya ba tshul gyis g.yab pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis sgreng ba
8a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang // cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'gying ba dang // 'khar rnga'i tshul gyis rdung ba dang // bzhad
8b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang / / khro bo'i stang stabs yan lag bskyod// de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pas// glu yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid// rgyu d+hU hUM/ bdag med rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis//
8b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byin pa'i sa bon bzung byas pa// spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o// dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che// thar pa chen po gnas chen po// gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi// gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po//
8b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las// lha dang lha ni mngon par sprul// bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba// sbyor ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod
8b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / ji ltar las la mngon bde bar// rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis// 'phreng ba la ni bzlas par bya// ji ltar nus pas mchod byas la// slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o// dbugs
8b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste/ / lhan cig thim par bsam par bya// ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid// de ltar rnam par snang mdzad bdag/ ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha// de bzhin rgyab kyi
8b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa nyid do/ / ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las// de bzhin ye shes skye ba 'di// chu ni sgrol ma zhes su bshad// me la gos dkar yang dag ldan// rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di// de bzhin rab mdzes
8b7(rgyud 'bum): mA ma kI/ / dkar po chu yi rtsa dang ni// dud pa yang ni me yi gnas// dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi'o// de bzhin du ni pad+ma dang // ye shes 'byin pa yi na rtsi// lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni// gdan bzhi nyan
9a1(rgyud 'bum): par mi nus pa/ gnu chung ba ni bstan pa yin// gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// rdorje'i nA nr-i dza~M wAr lags// bdu
9a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i chu ni ji ltar skye/ / gang gi dbye ba ji ltar myang // gang gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// 'di yi rab tu dgos pa'ang ci// ngo mtshar lha la mnyan par 'tshal// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // gnyis dang
9a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis meng spangs pa yi/ / gsang zhing gsang bar rab sbas pa'i// 'gro ba'i 'bras bu de de nyid// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba// sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba'o//
9a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid// ji ltar me yis mnyam par sreg pa'i spyod pa dang // nyi ma ji ltar mnyam par blta bar ston pa dang // ji ltar rlung ni mnyam pa nyid du len pa ltar// rnam rtog rmongs pa'i
9a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho bsrings pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ / pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog/ dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu snang mdzad dang // ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje phyag/ lha gsum dag gi cho ga shes par bya// ha zhes pa yis
9a6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog 'phrog/ ho zhes pa yis dri med cing // dpa' bo hri yis bcom pa yis// de dag rim bzhin shes par bya// pad+ma'i gdan ni rtag tu mnyam pa nyid du bsgom// mthe bong rdo rje srin lag gnyis su
9a7(rgyud 'bum): kun ldan pas/ / sngags gsum yi ge gsum gyis cho ga bsrung bar bya// gang zhes ro 'di myang ba blo ldan rnal 'byor ma'o// rdo rje chu yi khyad par ni// nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'dzag pa yin/
9b1(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi chu// bdag nyid lnga yis byin gyis brlabs// dro ba'i rang bzhin me ru mthong // zhi ba chu ru rab tu brtag/ rlung dang rlung ni du ba'o// sa ni gzugs su snang ba'o// gang zhig de nyid kyis myangs na/
9b2(rgyud 'bum): dri ma can lus dri med 'gyur// rin chen bzang dga' rnal 'byor pa// sbyangs pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// gtsang dang mi gtsang de bzhin rdzas// dang por rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do// nyon mongs de
9b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mun pa de/ / rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o// ye shes rdo rje bcom nas ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de la snang // bdud rtsi bsten 'dod lus can gyis// gnyis med kha sbyar sbyar bar bya// rnal
9b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa po/ / sngon du A li kA li bsam// A li zhes bya bung bar gsungs// kA la de bzhin gshegs ma nyid// sbyor ba'i ye shes sgra yis ni// gnyis kas 'khyud par bsnam
9b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi// yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te// rdo rje ra ba tsam zhig gis// 'od dpag med ni dkri bar bya// lha mo gsum pa nyid kyi ni// dbyug pa tsam zhag rdo rje 'dzin//
9b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su dam tshig zhags pa yis// kun da mgo la mchog tu brtson// de ltar sngags zlos rnal 'byor pa// pad+ma rdo rje can gyis bskyod// rang bzhin gyis ni si sgra dang // bdud rtsi chu dang 'dres pa yi//
9b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid 'di yis myang byas pa// rnal 'byor chos la rab tu shis// bden pa'i chos ni mchog tu bden// rnal 'byor chos mi rab tu bstod// de nyid dman pa'i rnam rtog yid// sbyor ba ji ltar 'grub
10a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bye ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud 'di nyid// mkhas pa yis ni rnam bltas la// sbyor ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma// sbyor ba'i chos
10a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi gtor ma sbyin/ / bdud rtsi lnga mdor bsdus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / 'byung ba'i dbugs kyi the tsom ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'di// 'chi lngas ji
10a3(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'tshal bgyi zhing / / gang gis shes nas rab tu sbyar// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba lus can sems can don// 'chi bdag kun nas slu ba ni// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje bdag
10a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ / 'chi bdag lus ni gnas pa nyid// dang por snga dro'i dus nyid la// dbugs ni rnam par dgod bshad pa// lus can zla drug nas 'chi bar// ngas gsungs pa
10a5(rgyud 'bum): la the tsom med/ / gal te dus la bab gyur na// dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur// de bzhin 'jig pa chung mthong nas// 'gram pa'i tshig ni yo bar 'gyur// lus kyi mtshan ma shes byas la//
10a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis zhi bar bya// rna ba'i ud rnam chad na// chu tshong lnga las mi thub bo// mig gi aM ba ra yi tsa// two ta de bzhin nyi ma lnga// sA yi ma si ka chad na// nyi ma bdun gyis gdon mi za// steng
10a7(rgyud 'bum): 'og so na 'thams gyur na/ / nyi ma gsum gyis the tsom med// 'di yi lce la thig nag na// zhag gnyis kyis 'chi lus can rnams// mgrin pa'i glo yi phyi la rtsa// zla phyed las ni mi thub bo//
10b1(rgyud 'bum): brang gi lde'u zhom gyur nA// zla phyed sman pas gso dpyad yod// sen mo khrag ni med pa na// chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo// pho nya brgyad kyi 'chi ltas ni// mche ba'i mtshegs rnam par spangs// rna//
10b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i u da'i bdag nyid ni// rnal 'byor dbye bas bstan par bya// mig gi am bar chad na// mkhas pas dkar ba'i sa bon bzla// sna yi ma si ka la ni// dbugs bsdams me yi dud pa'o//
10b3(rgyud 'bum): so dang so 'thams rtsa la ni// dung gi sa bon bzlas pas 'phrog/ lce yi thig nag 'di la ni// bdag nyid sbyor bas mnan par bya// mgrin pa glo yi phyi rol rtsa// pad+ma'i sa bon gyis rtse bya//
10b4(rgyud 'bum): brang gi lce'u zhom pa la// sgong skyes ye shes sgom pa'o// sen mo khrag ni med pa la// lag pa bsdus la bzlas par bya// bug pa dgu yi sgo ru ni// sa bon dgu yis rtse bar bya// rtsa dgu la
10b5(rgyud 'bum): mi sa bon dgu/ / sgo dgu sa bon dgu yis bsdam// de ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni// rnam par shes pa mi 'gro bo// ma bsregs snod ni gnyis bzung ste// gur kum dang ni gi'u wang gis// bcu
10b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis tshad ni yang dag bri/ / sa bon dbyangs yig bskor bar bya// lha mo brgyad kyi sa bon 'di// mtshams su ma ning sa bon dang // dbus su ye shes sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni bskor bar bya//
10b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin ming ni dbus su bri// hUM gi dbus su gnas pa nyid// gnyis ka yaM dang sbyar byas nas// skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya// mA ma kI ni 'dab mar bsam// steng du de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag/
11a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yis// nus pa yis ni mngon par mchod// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rtse dang rtse ni sprad par bya// rnam shes ye shes sa bon ni// brgyad
11a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis/ / rnam shes bsdams pa'i dngos po dang // rnal 'byor srung ba'i khyad par gyis// yi dgas srin mo 'byung po dang // dus ma yin par 'chi ba nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis bsrungs
11a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis/ / grol bar 'di la the tsom med// tshe zad pa yi lus can ni// zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yongs su brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
11a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor bstan bcos cho ga'i rim// de nas ye shes dbang gis gsungs// 'khrig pa'i dngos po bstan pa las// khrag dang khu ba 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes ngo bos 'byung ba yi// 'byin
11a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rtsa ni mngon par sems/ / bdun par khu bar gyur pa yi// dkar po'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed// khrag gis mtshan mo brgyad na ni// du ba'i rtsa ni mngon du gso// mtshan mo phyed dang bzhir bsnyen pas//
11a6(rgyud 'bum): dung gis rtsa ni byin gyis brlab// gong du mtshan mo bcu gnyis kyis// pad+ma'i rtsa ni rab tu sbyar// nyi ma drug cu'i grangs 'di yis// mkhas pas gi'u wang gi ni rtsa// mkhrang 'gyur dgu zhes
11a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa ni/ / dri med gsum gyi rtsa ni bskyed/ mtshan mo bcu dang drug gi ro// 'byed pa'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed// sa gdugs ye shes rnam shes ni// yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus can no// sa
11b1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs bcu dang brgyad nyid kyis/ / mkhas pas zla dgur kun tu gnas// skye ba sra s+pha la sogs ldan// sen mo khog pa rus pa dang // zhag dang srin bu gci ba dang // bshang dang bad kan mchim
11b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / brgyad na mngal na nga rgyal ba// rtsa yi bskyed pa zhes byas la// lhag par lha dgu gnas pa nyid// bdag nyid lha dang pha rol mchog/ bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no// dkar po lha mo sgrol ma
11b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / dung pa la ni gos dkar gnas// lha mo sangs rgyas du nyid la// mA ma kI ni pad+mar gnas// lha mo snyan ma gi'u wang la// rdo rje sgeg mo dri med la// 'byed pa rin chen yid 'ong ba// sa yi gdus
11b4(rgyud 'bum): la pad+ma'i rtsa/ / 'di ltar smos pa'i ye shes rtsa// thams cad 'byin cing sdud pa yi// ji ltar rgyal po rnam snang mdzad// de ltar rgyab tu rab tu grags// mnyam pa'i chu ru de byas pas// mnyam
11b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzugs ni 'od dang bcas/ / stong phrag dgu yi grangs nyid ni// re re las ni gyes pa'o// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do// dgu pa yis ni 'byin cing sdud// dgu yi/
11b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ni rtag pa'i sa// dgu dang lnga yis dga' bar bcas// lnga po'i lha 'di 'gro ba'o// gcig gis 'byin cing sdud pa dang // gcig gi lha ni ye shes can// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te//
11b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi lus dang lus can dang // gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang // mi stong pa dang stong pa nyid// ring min thung min gzhan ma yin// dngos med dngos po tsam ma yin// kha dog med la
12a1(rgyud 'bum): tshon kun dngos/ / ye shes lus can rnal 'byor pas// lam gnyis pa ni srid pa'i sgron// lam gcig pa yi rnal 'byor pas// rnam par rtog pa kun spangs la/
12a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi lam nyid shes par bya// shel ltar dag pa'i lus kyi ni// dag pa'i lam du yang dag bgrod// rtswa bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// sbyor ba'i mdo ru bsdus pa
12a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal// phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ sbyor ba'i bsngar bcos sgrub pa pos// gdan bzhi pa las btus pa yi// stong phrag bcu gnyis yang dag ldan// de
12a4(rgyud 'bum): yi don ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ / gzhung mangs pa yis 'jigs pa yis// de nyid mdor bsdus pa yi tshig/ sbyor ba'i rnam pa nye bar gsung // rnal 'byor pa la rab dgod pa'i// de nas zhi ba yang
12a5(rgyud 'bum): dgra bshad/ / thog mar bya ba stong pa nyid// stong pa'i dbus su pad+ma ni// pad+mas bon myu gu can// kha dog bdun pa phyag chen po// sde tshan bzhi pa'i tshig la ni// steng du ma ning thig ler bcas/
12a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi sa bon mnyam bsgoms nas// de bzhin khro gnyer can ma bskyed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas la ni// gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs// dag pa'i sku dang spyan gsum pa// phyag bani
12a7(rgyud 'bum): yis ni rnam par sbas/ / mchog sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang // bgrang 'phreng ril ba spyi blugs bsnams// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs// bzlas dang bsgo
12b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / mkhas pa mchog gi yi ge gcig/ khro gnyer mchog gi yi ge ni// 'bum phrag gcig zlos sngags pa yis// rnal 'byor pa yis brtsams tsam gyis// tshe ni 'phel bar rab tu
12b2(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis// de nas rgyas pa'i las 'di nyon// ti sa gangs kyi rtse mo dang // gser gyi ri bo'i ngos dang ni// rin chen bdun rang bzhin gnas su// gzhal yas khang
12b3(rgyud 'bum): pa nyer mdzes pa'i/ / seng ge'i gdan la gnas pa ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa// gdugs dkar po dang bla re dang // dril bu dra bas mngon par mdzes// bdun pa yi ni mtha'
12b4(rgyud 'bum): gzung ste/ / gsum pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// sde tshan mtha' yi steng du'o// ye shes can gyi sa bon gcig/ dbugs mi g.yo zhing 'od zer bcas// gser po'i mdog tu rnam par bsgom//
12b5(rgyud 'bum): byis ni nor rgyun zhes bya ba'i// lha mo'i gzugs su rnam par bsam// phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // rgyun kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// kha dog 'bar bar bsgom par bya// rin chen shing dang
12b6(rgyud 'bum): za ma tog/ gnyis pa na ni rab tu 'phel// gsum pas mchod sbyin lag pa dang // steng du shes rab phyag dang ni// gnyis pa la ni bgrang 'phreng dang // gsum pa ril ba spyi blugs so// bsgom
12b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bzla ba'i sbyor ba yis/ / dbugs ni 'dren pa'i khams nyid do// rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dmar po'i las kyi khyad
13a1(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// stong pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs nas ni// stong par pad+ma yang dag bshad// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten cing // gdugs
13a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po yis mngon par brgyan/ / dbyangs yig dang po yi ge gcig/ steng du sde tshan tha ma dang // mnyam par gzhag pas sa bon dmar// 'od zer dmar po sa bon dmar// 'od zer dmar
13a3(rgyud 'bum): po 'bar ba 'di/ / sems can 'gug par byed pa'i dngos// lha mo'i gzugs brnyan 'di bsams la// bcom gser gyi mdog lta bur// mA ma kI ba sam yang dag 'byung // phyag gnyis
13a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes/ / gcig gis lcags kyu yang dag 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu mngon sgrog pa// thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// sgom zhing
13a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ / sems can dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// de nas nag po'i las 'di ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing // rlung gi dbus su rlung gi ni// rlung gi sa bon bsam par bya// du ba
13a6(rgyud 'bum): dub rab 'bar ba/ / sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan// nag po drag po yi ni gdan// yi dgas gdan la kun gnas pa// bsam pa ral gcig ma yi gzugs// kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i
13a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od/ / dbu skra gyen brdzes lha mo che// drag par rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad// spyan gsum zhal ni gtsigs pa la// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par sbas// gcig gi phyag na ral gri dang // gnyis
13b1(rgyud 'bum): pab na ni rdo rje gsor/ / g.yas na mdung ni 'dzin mdzad cing // gnyis par de bzhin sdigs mdzub bo// 'phen pa'i rol pas rnam par bzhugs// me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od// zhags pa 'phen pas
13b2(rgyud 'bum): 'ching mdzad cing / / hUM sgra'i rnam pas 'jigs par byed// sa bon dbus su ming dang ni// phaT kyi rnam pa de bzhin mthar// dkar mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // rnal 'byor bstan pa 'jig byed pa/
13b3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo ral ba gcig ma 'dis// nus pas rlag par byed par gsungs// sngags dang rgyud ni mnyam bzungs la// lha mo 'od zer can sa bon// dug dang khrag tu bsres pa yis// rdo rje phag mo kun nas
13b4(rgyud 'bum): bris/ / de yi mchu la ming dang yang // mgo la yi ge sa bon dang // steng du me yi yi ge dang // kha la rlung gnyis de bzhin no// 'dis ni skrod par byed par gsungs// las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba
13b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// ye shes dbang gis de nas gsungs// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'khor ba'i lam nas grol ba yi// mtha' yas sbyor
13b6(rgyud 'bum): ba mngon phyogs pas/ / mtha' yas sgo zhes bya ba'i ming // stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid lus// ji ltar stong pa de nyid 'dis// phyi dang nang du bcas pa ni// de bzhin nam mkha'i khams su ni// rgya
13b7(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'i chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ / de yi dbus su rab gang ba'i// kun nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin du// gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam// seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
14a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan cing / / sna tshogs dang ni rnam par 'phyang // yi ge gcig gis bon ni// 'od zer 'bar ba tshon gyi dngos// dang po'i dbyangs yig kun bzung la// steng du bdud rtsi thib le
14a2(rgyud 'bum): can/ / lha mo bdag nyid lhan cig dang // phyis nas gzugs ni mnyam par bsam// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i sku//
14a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// gcig gi phyag gis rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu mngon par sgrog/ yi ge brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid// spyod bcas mi spyod gsang ba dang // chu dang me dang de bzhin rlung //
14a4(rgyud 'bum): sa ni mig gi yi ge'o// sgo bzhi dang ni phung po bzhi// sgong skyes rdzi ril gnas pa nyid// bzhi pa nyon mongs me dang ni// yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du// rmongs pas sa dang nyon mongs dang // sngon du phyugs ni
14a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa dang / / chu shing me tog pad+ma ni// 'di yi sgong skyes bstan nyid do// ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni// bdud rtsi brgyad kyis rnam par dbye// shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi// snying po yi ni snying po'i
14a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang // nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o// sa ni mig la sbyar byas te// tshangs par ma ni de bzhin 'bar// rmongs pa'i sa ni mgrin par ro// g.yon pa snying la gnas pa dang //
14a7(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs sems can brang dang ni// phyubs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad la dgod pa yis// 'di yis lha nyid yang dang shes// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags 'di ni// phyag rgya brgyad du rab
14b1(rgyud 'bum): tu grags/ / dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// gnag cing 'bar ba'i las 'di ni// las rnam bzhi yi lha mo ni// mkhas pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas// yang shes las byung snying po
14b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba dang // phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun// las dang las kyi khyad par nyid// thams cad chu yi dbyibs dang ni// mnyam par 'jigs byed me dang yang // ji ltar
14b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa rlung dag dang / / dang po'i don dang sa dbang po// lhag ma brtsegs pa las byung ba// bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o// 'gro ba'i don phyir yi ge brgyad// lha brgyad du ni yongs su grags// mnyam
14b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag bzlas shing bsgoms pa yis/ / 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis// sngon du reg cing reg pa nyid// 'jig rten 'dir ni bde ba dang // rtag tu mchod pa rnyed
14b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / 'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni// gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas// bdag gi de nyid dman pa yis// ji ltar sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis// sbyor
14b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya/ / dri zhin rab grags me tog kun nas gnas pa dang // nag po'i a ka ru dang gu gul mar me dang // gnyis med gtor ma gcig gis yid ni yang dag ldan pa yis// lha
14b7(rgyud 'bum): mos ma mo gzhan rnams kun nas rab tu mchod/ / steng du rnam par snang mdzad bsam// tshu la phyag na rdo rje'o// yid kyi nam mkha'i snying po ni// rna ba gnyis la rab tu sbar// lce la 'jig rten mgon/
15a1(rgyud 'bum): blo dang / mgrin par 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis spras// zung du rnams pa yang dgasbyar// khar kum tu babang po banas// lte bar khro bo'i rgyal po no// gshin rjem b
15a2(rgyud 'bum): yed rab tu grags/ / de nyid rnam pa'i bye brag nyid// lha mo'i gdan nyid du ni bsgom// snying khar sems dang ye shes ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya// 'od zer bye ba rnam mang po// sangs
15a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sprin ni rab tu 'phro/ / mnyam par gzhag cing bsgoms pa yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// mtha' yas pa'i sgro'i lha mo'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs so//
15a4(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// srin mo dang ni ro langs mo// mi med gnas su sgrub pa pos// oM b+hi tsa pa ta hU~M phaT swAH
15a5(rgyud 'bum): bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ / sdigs mdzub snying khar sbyin byas la// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur byas// rkeng pa'i phyogs su bzung byas pa// 'di ni tshim rngam mchog gi rgya// ra nag po yi pags pa la/
15a6(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod ras kyi skud pa yis// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid// kha dog sngon po spyan gsum pa// dmar po'i sgra yis rnam par 'dzings// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa nyid// rgod cing mche ba
15a7(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs pa dang / / 'bar ba'i me yis rnam par brgyan// dang por mdung gi lag pa dang // gnyis par de bzhin mi mgo'o// gsum pa la ni rdo rje gsor// g.yon pa steng du sdigs mdzub dang /
15b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i lag mthod pa'o// gsum par dril bu'i sgra sgrog cing // sham thabs sdug gi pags pa dang // glang chen lpags pa rab tu mar bas// rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa ni// yi dgra/
15b2(rgyud 'bum): gdan la rab tu bzhugs// 'bar ba dmar po'i rang bzhir lus// gdugs dkar po ni rnam par 'phyang // ral pa gcig pa'i srin mo ni// rdo rje pho nya mngon par bri// ser mos khrag ni mngon par blang /
15b3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i lte ba bya bar gsum// de yi sha yis sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin dur khrod kyis ni bskor// mgo bor oM/ mig tu hUM/ sna la ha/ rna bar hri/ lce la hra/ snying khar hri/ rdo rje khu tshur mnyam byas
15b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ dbus ma gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // yan lag drug gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// snying khar sdigs mdzub sbyin byas la// dpung pa g.yas pa rab tu brkyang // hUM gi rnam pa se gol dang // lhan
15b5(rgyud 'bum): cig nyid du sbyar byas la/ / g.yas brkyang ba yi rkang pas maran// oM ma thA ma tha duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ 'di ni lha mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// sha dang 'o mar bsres pa yis// dur khrod gnas
15b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha mo la/ / brgyad brgya ru mi dbul bya zhing // sna tshogs mchod pas tshim byas la// phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya// sA lu'i 'bras la gzugs par ra bya// ming mi dbus su bzhag byas
15b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ riseng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pas// lhan cig dngos pos brdung bar bya// rdo rje'ang de ru bzhag byas na// gcin ni mchog tu sdom par 'gyur// ba lci las ri gzugs brnyan bya// khyi yi spu yis
16a1(rgyud 'bum): la/ man+t+ra dz+nyA rnam pa sgyur// rgyud pa na bAHsa bya dag// de bas brda rgyas pa// gdug pa'i btsun ba gyu// rlu bral
16a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ ming gis don bzhug byas nas// gang zhig bsam pa'i drud med rnams// de bzhin nges par dbang ma gyur/ rdo rjesems dpa' dide bzhin ga shegs// rdo rje 'dzin pas smrar ya sa
16a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyinadus pams kyi / klog chags kyis bgos sa lasan// blod dang ldan pas gzugs partan b+ha// lham mas rnamigs pad/ la
16a4(rgyud 'bum): pas / nga du sa da ra ba/ ky-i gas sa pag byes na// kyi nga pa gyu/ sprum pa'o
16a5(rgyud 'bum): / bya // nga cug mayin na/ ma ga ya
16a6(rgyud 'bum): ngal rnangs ngas su su mI/ sa 'dzin par byed pa da / gas slong ma// shin nu sapa sems can rnams la
16a7(rgyud 'bum): m gyis zung nan gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ / lha mo la pa rje chab/ slong baphreng ba'i rin du gsungs/ las 'di yin byed par nyid// na cis rgyal po rdo rje 'chang/
16b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang mnyam ldan pas// yid mi gzung bas rtogs bya'i phyir// mdor bsdus sbyor ba byed pa'o// slob mas shes pas don dam smra ba'i seng ge yis// rnal 'byor tshogs nyon mongs g.yos pa gcad
16b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / nyon mongs sred pa'i nyes pa skye ba 'joms mdzad pa// rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ sbyor ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa rdzogs so// // dpal ldan shes
16b3(rgyud 'bum): rab dbang po sbas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rter khams su snang bar mdzad/ / dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa// rtag tu kun nas brngubs pa'i nga rgyal mi mthun
16b4(rgyud 'bum): dgra yi dus dang dus su g.yul 'gyed pa'i/ / chags med ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad// 'khor bar thim par gsungs pa yi// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la
16b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal/ / gsang ba'i ngo bo mnyam shes phyir// gsang ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// hUM gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos// hUM gi rnam pa mchog gi lha// hUM gi rnam pa stong gyur pa// yi ge hUM la phyag
16b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bstod/ / sdor du rtsa ni kun sbyar la// phyis ni sa bon rnam par 'phrul// lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni// phyugs kyis grol zhing shin tu grol// shar gyi phyogs su gzhu rgyal ni// pad+ma yi
16b7(rgyud 'bum): ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ / gsher ba yang ni nub kyi phyogs// rnam par shes pa'ang lhan cig 'byin// nam mkha'i dbus su bdag nyid byas// bdag nyid dbus su nam mkha' 'o// gnyis ka'i
17a1(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma shes byas la/ / grol ba nyid du the tsom med// stong pa'i dbus su bdag gi ni// bdag nyid rtags ni mtshon pa'o// rtags kyis bdag nyid 'byin pa ni// bsgom
17a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa yi 'byir pa'o/ / gzhu las rgyal bzhin gsher ba nyid// skam po pad+ma 'byin pa las// bdun cu rtsa gnyis mnyam 'byin pa// rtswa dgu yi ni ming 'di nyid// rtsa dgu'i sa ni rtag gyur pa//
17a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum po 'byin cing yang dag sdud// gsher dang skam po zhes bya ba// rtsa ba gzhu las rgyal ba nyid// dngos po yi ni mtshan nyid pa'i// 'di yis 'byin cing yang dag sdud// pad+ma dgu ra ni mnyam bshad/
17a4(rgyud 'bum): pa// rnam par shes pas lhan cig gnas// steng 'og phyogs kyang stong pa nyid// dbu ma stong pa nyid du ni// rtag tu stong pa gsum sgom pa// gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o// g.yon
17a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi glo ru ser skya dang / / g.yas par nag po chen po gnas// rtsa lnga las ni mnyam 'byin pa// lnga nyid du ni sbyar bar bya// chu dang me dang nam mkha' dang // sa nyid pa ni ste mnyam pa'i gdan//
17a6(rgyud 'bum): chu shing me tog lta bu ni// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// rtag tu kha ni rab zum pa// mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya// 'dab ma brgyud pa rtag tu gyur// gsung ba'i ge sar dang ldan pa//
17a7(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su bshad pa ni// rnam shes lhan cig sgom pa ni// phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar// rnam par shes pa mtshon par bya// skra yi rtse mo brgya yi char// 'od zer g.yo ba med pa gnas//
17b1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas sbyor ba gsum pas dkri// dkri ba'i mtshan nyid 'khor lo 'dra// rdza mkham 'khor lo lta bur 'khor// gnas su bzlog pa ye shes so// rang bzhin brgyad pa'i dbye ba yis// skyes bu dbus su//
17b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba'i don// dbus mas 'byin cing yang dag sdud// thams cad lta ba 'joms par byed// rtsa brgyad mngon par kun nas ldan// dkar po dud pa pad+ma dung // gi'u wang dri med 'byed pa dang // sa
17b3(rgyud 'bum): gdugs brgyad pa'i dbye ba'o/ / bdag med chos dang yang dag sbyor// bdag med pas ni rnam par dkris// khams gsum skyes pa zad byed nas// ye shes nus pa yis ni 'joms// dang por dkar
17b4(rgyud 'bum): por yang dag bsgom/ / gnyis par ser por bsgom pa dang // gsum par kun nas dmar por bsgom// bzhi pa la ni nag po nyid// le'u dang po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
17b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor sa bor sgom pa ni// sa bon nges par de bzhin gshegs// dbyangs kyi yi ge'i mtshan nyid do// rnam rtog rmongs pa rin po ste// 'khor ba'i rgya
17b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshe pha rol 'gro/ / dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo yis// ye shes lus ni dag pa'i dngos// dag cing dag pa de bzhin dngos// dang po'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do// de bzhin nyon mongs mun pa ni//
17b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o// ye shes rdo rje bcom nas ni// snang ba la sogs thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i lus dang sems kyis ni// blo ldan dkyil 'khor mtshon par bya// slob dpon dang
18a1(rgyud 'bum): @bral 'di yis ni/ / rtag tus stengs dngos grub med// slob dpom yon tan gzung bya zhing / sgron ni rnams kyang ma yin no// dkyil 'khor choga'i mtsham cing ni// de bzhin
18a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par brtags la bya/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// de dbus pad+ma mnyam par bri// dbus su mchog gi yi ge ni// yi ge'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ni//
18a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya// shar du dkar po kun nas bsam// nub tu pa yi sa bor bzhin// lhor ni dung gi sa bon dang // byang du pad+ma'i sa bon no// dbang ldan mtsham su ro tsa na/ me ru dri med
18a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'byung ba'o/ / bden bral du ni 'byed pa shes// thams cad las la rlung nyid do// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mnyam shes bya// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// dkyil 'khor bsams pa tsam
18a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / sdig pa spangs shing rnam par grol// rnal 'byor sbyor ba tsam gyis ni// bza' ba'i rnal 'byor rtag par bya// dbang po lnga ni tshim byas pas// mi 'chi mdzes par 'gyur ba'o// dang po
18a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid sbyang ba dang / / gnyis par rtag tu dkyil 'khor nyid// gsum par bdag gi gdan dang ni// bzhi pa la ni sbyor ba'i gdan// rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//
18a7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// yi ge'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba// yig don dbyangs las yang dag 'byung // yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya// mgrin pa mchu dang rkan dang ni//
18b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge lce yis yongs bsgyur ba'o// ka tshan dud pa las byung nyid// tsa tshan dkar po yang dag mtshungs// Ta tshan dung las yang dag 'byung // pad+ma nyid las ta yi tshogs// dbyangs bzhi yi ni 'du shes su//
18b2(rgyud 'bum): so sor dbyangs ni 'chang ba'o// yi ge gnyis las kun 'byung ba// dbyangs kyis yi ge dman pa nyid// kha dog med cing kha dog 'byung // gzugs med gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid// ring ba ma yin thung
18b3(rgyud 'bum): ba min/ / rig pa dang ni rig min nyid// stong min stong pa'i yang dag dngos// gang gi ye shes mkhas pa'o// gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus// blo dang ldan pas gzung bar bya// srog gi yi ger
18b4(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig pas/ / ji ltar gzugs don mdzes pa dang // yid 'ong 'od zer yi ge ni// dus las 'das pa phyag 'tshal 'dud// stong pa dang ni pad+ma rgyal// pad+ma dkar po'i yi ge ni// de bzhin gang
18b5(rgyud 'bum): shes rnal 'byor pa/ / sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming nyid yin// stong pas lus ni sbyar byas la// stong pa nyid du lhan cig bskrun// sa bon bskrun pa tsam gyis ni// yi ge'i mtshan nyid lhan cig go// rab
18b6(rgyud 'bum): tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so/ / / brdzun gyi tshig ni mi smra ste// brdzun du smra bar rab sgoms pas// bslab pa thams cad rnam par mnan// nyes pa thams
18b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kun gyi gnas/ / chags pa'i theg pa'i rang bzhin gyis// 'khor ba'i phur pa las rab btags// mi gtsang bum pa'i mar lta bu// thams cad du ni rtag tu spang // lus kyi rnam pa gsum nyid
19a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi rnam pa gsum nyid ni// mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bsdam// ngag gi mchod pa mngon rdzogs pa'o// de nyid dman pa'i sgrub pa
19a2(rgyud 'bum): pos/ / bsgrub bya 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// de phyir de nyid la mnyam brten// bla ma bsnyen bkur bstan la rig/ ci 'byor pa yi rdzas nyid dang // yang na ra
19a3(rgyud 'bum): dang rig par brje/ / bzhi pa nye bar rnyed mi 'gyur// bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'bad pas gtor ma sbyin par bya//
19a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi sde tshan tsa mur+t+ti// khro gnyer can ma nyi shu lnga// sde tshan brgyad pa mA ma kI// sgrol ma sde tshan lnga par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma yang lnga par bshad// 'byung ba sdud pa drug pa'o// ri khrod
19a5(rgyud 'bum): ma ni dgu par bshad/ / sangs rgyas spyan ma bco brgyad de// rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad cu nyid// phyi yi mchod pas mtshungs pa'o// dbus su bde ba chen por bshad// rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis
19a6(rgyud 'bum): bskor/ / ha yi rnam pa kha dog 'phrog/ ho yi rnam pa dri ma med// dpa' bo hri yi 'joms pa ni// rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya// kha cig dri yi rang bzhin dang // kha cig me tog gi rang bzhin//
19a7(rgyud 'bum): kha cig spos kyi rang bzhin dang // kha cig gtor ma'i rang bzhin du// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' brgyad// phyi yi mchod par gnas pa nyid// le'u ba ni pa rdzogs so//
19b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// yi ge las kyi mtshan nyid ni// rang bzhin mnyam par bshad pa nyid// khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya// oM na lte bar mngon par dgang // oM ni rang bzhin med pa nyid// oM
19b2(rgyud 'bum): ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba/ / oM ni stong pa nyid du bshad// a naM yi ge brgyad cu'o// ka ni 'gugs pa'o// kha ni za ba'o// ga ni dri ba'o// g+ha ni 'joms pa'o// nga ni skyong ba'o// tsa ni g.yo ba'o//
19b3(rgyud 'bum): tsha ni tshig dor ro// dza ni 'gugs pa'o// dz+ha ni 'dar ba'o// nya ni she ba'o// Ta ni dkar po'o// Sha ni 'bar ba'o// Da ni dbul ba'o// D+ha ni rnam par g.yeng ba'o// Na ni skrag pa'o// ta ni 'bar ba'o//
19b4(rgyud 'bum): tha ni zhi ba'o// da ni bskrun pa'o// d+ha ni rgyas pa'o// na ni skrag pa'o// pa ni tshong pa'o// pha ni spyan no// ba ni 'bar ba'o// b+ha ni 'jig pa yang dag par byed pa'o// ma ni za ba'o// ya ni
19b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor 'jig pa'o/ / wa ni rtsod pa'o// ra ni skyes pa'o// la ni dbang du byed pa'o// sa ni dgra 'joms pa'o// Sha ni gnod pa'o// sha ni ltung ba'o// ha ni drag pa'o// k+Sha ni bskyod pa'o//
19b6(rgyud 'bum): i ni dbang phyug go// sA hA ni rnam pa rgyas pa'o// phaT kyis rnam par 'joms pa dang // ma Ta'i rnam pas 'joms par byed// ga ha yis ni dbang du byed// bo sha hri yis rgyas par byed// reT
19b7(rgyud 'bum): yis ni zhi bo'o/ / b+ha ta yis ni gcod pa'o// sngags la sngags kyis rnam par sbyar// don bzhi las dang lhan cig tu// de yi ming ni rab tu sbyar// las ni 'di ltar bshad pa yi// sngags kyi le'u/
20a1(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi// dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi// dge 'dun la yang skyabs
20a2(rgyud 'bum): song bas/ / de ni ngan 'gror ma yin no// bsod nams yi rang sdig pa bshags// tshul khrims tshad med yan lag dang // de bzhin brtul zhugs yan lag nyid// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes rig pas//
20a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar bu ni rtag tu spang // de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du// byang chub snying por byas nas ni// snying rje mchog dang ldan pa yis// 'gro drug 'khor lo nye bar bshad// srid pa'i nyes pa las zhen pa'i//
20a4(rgyud 'bum): / de lta'i sems ni rnam par spang // nga yis sdig pa zhi ba dang // bsod nams rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur// oM ma hA de bi/ ma hA su khe/ ma hA te dza/ ma hA bo ta/ ma hA ba le/ ma hA ya dz+nye/ oM sa ta b+hi dza gri h+Na na
20a5(rgyud 'bum): / oM sa ti b+ha dza ya d+hA ra yA mi/ oM d+hu mi bi dza dza/ oM d+hA ma birdza b+h+yo bta ta na/ de ring bdag la dgongs su gsol// gsod dang rku dang 'dod chags dang // de bzhin brdzun dang 'phreng ba dang // byug pa gar
20a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa dang / / lhag pa'i bza' ba bsdam par bya// longs spyod la dga' chos mi rnyed// swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA shud+d+hohaM/ badz+ra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ ye ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA yo ga
20a7(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+hohaM/ de ring bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ni rnal 'byor mchog rab ste// bdag gis rnam shes rgyal po bskyed// bdag gis rnam shes 'phro ba shes// de ring slob mngon de nyid// rgyal po
20b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis dbang bskur gsol/ / bkra shis mngon par 'dod phyir na// dmyal ba las byung rtag bstan pas// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad las ni rnam par ldog pa yi// rnal 'byor don dam rgyal
20b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu grub gyur cig/ bslab pa'i le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// mdor na lcags kyu rnam pa gsum// sbyin pa sbyin par mi bya'o// 'khrig pa'i
20b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po bstan pa las/ / khrag dang khu ba yang dag 'byung // sngon gyi sa la ma rig pas// rtags su gzugs kyis dkris pa'o// zhag bdun pa na khu ba yis// rnam shes lngar ni yang dag byung // bcu
20b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis zhag na shes bya ba/ / brgyad par rtag tu mkhrang 'gyur nyid// ro ni nyin zhag bcu drug na// ar bu dar ni zhag lngar ro// phyogs gsum la rtag gzugs brnyan nyid// de yi grong rkang lag dang /
20b5(rgyud 'bum): ba spu sor ni 'gyur ba'o// zla gsum rkang pa rna ba'o// zla drug gzugs phyed bcas par 'dri// rnam shes lnga dang sems dpa'o// gnas skabs bcu ni rnam bshad pa// mngal nas skyes pa'i skye ba po//
20b6(rgyud 'bum): / rnal 'byor rig pa'i sbyor ba yis// mngal gyi gnas skabs rnam par bshad// skra dang spu dang sen mo so// rdul dang de bzhin dri ma sha// rus pa mgo bo lto ba dang // gnye ma bshang dang gcib dang / mchil
20b7(rgyud 'bum): ma snabs dang skyugs pa dang / / rab 'dzag mi gtsang rnam pa gang // 'du byed tshogs skye ba'o// rnal 'byor pa yis kum shes nas// sngon gyi las kyis 'byin pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/
21a1(rgyud 'bum): 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa
21a2(rgyud 'bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
21a3(rgyud 'bum): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig las skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngal na gnas pa'i rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/
21a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// yon tan las ni yon tan skye// rnam shes gzugs kyi ngo bo ni// kha dog bdun pa'i 'od zer ni// dbang po lnga
21a5(rgyud 'bum): yi 'od zer nyid/ / mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// rtsa dgus las ni rnam par 'byung // gzugs dang dbang po lhan cig tshogs// 'od zer 'byin cing sdud pa'o// de la dbugs kyang sbyar bar bya// mthe
21a6(rgyud 'bum): bong lhan cig tsam gyis ni/ / gzugs ni dbus su rnam par 'gro// klu dgus rtag tu pad+ma la// nyin zhag gcig la brgyad du ni// gzugs dang kha dog yon tan du// de yi gzugs ni rtag tu 'gro//
21a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'i dbus su ni// zhi ba lhan cig btsam par bya// drug cu rtsa bzhir skye ba ni// sbyor ba rtse mor 'dzin pa'o// brgyad pa dbang la mnyam gnas pa// sbyor ba dbu mar mtshungs pa'o// /
21b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad la nag por kun nas sbyor// sbyor ba sngon du gzung bar bya// rtsa dgu yi ni gdan nyid la// klu yi gdengs ka kun nas mnan// rtsa yis g.yogs shing rab tu bskor// thams cad 'byin cing
21b2(rgyud 'bum): nges par rgyal/ / byang du dkar po zhes bya ba// dud pa de bzhin de yi lhor// dbugs ni mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// g.yon pa'i dbugs ni dri med gsum// nyin dang mtshan gyi dngos po yis//
21b3(rgyud 'bum): 'pho ba brgyad du bshad pa'o// de yi sbyor bas 'pho ba ni// 'pho ba'i sbyor bas gzung bar bya// 'byin pa pad+ma'i rnam par mnyam// rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par gnas// gang zhig gal te yang
21b4(rgyud 'bum): dag mis/ / shi bar gyur kyang mi gtong ngo // 'di ltar rlung gi rgyun tshogs ni// du bar kun tu yang dag gnas// pad+ma'i rnam pa ltar mnyam pa// rtswa yi 'khor lo rnam par gnas// dkar po
21b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po lngar bshad pa/ / de bzhin du ni rus pa'o// 'bu dang srin bu pad+ma'o// rus pa'i mtshams su gnas pa ni// du ba ru ni gyur pa'o// ro tsa na ni rlung du mtshungs// dri med gsum ni la
21b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtha'/ / dbye ba rkan dang mgrin pa'o// sa gdugs rkeng brgyab la ni// rang bzhin med pa'i 'byin byed pa'o// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis// 'chi ba'i dus su gnas pa
21b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / gal te dus la bab tsam gyis// dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad par 'gyur// de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong na// 'gram pa'i mtshams ni g.yo bar 'gyur// bcu gnyis zhag la
22a1(rgyud 'bum): khri phrag gcig/ chu tshong dbugs ni chang pa'o// gang zhig mtshan mo'i mtshan nyid ni// lho phyogs bgrod par yang dag bshad// byang du 'grod par bshad pa ni// ji ltar nyin mo'i rnam/
22a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od// sor mo drug pa tsam nyid du// nang gi rnam shes 'pho ba'o// gsang zhing gsang ba gsang chen po// sbyor ba gsang bar mtshungs pa'o// rnal 'byor shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de phyir gsang ba
22a3(rgyud 'bum): la mnyam brten/ / nang gi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni// pad+ma'i gzugs nyid gzung ba nyid//
22a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang rdo rje mchog mnyam pa'i// pad+ma mnyam par byas nas ni// 'khrig pa bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba'o// thig le yi ni rang bzhin nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi thig le gsang // ku sha'i rtse mo bdun
22a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi chas/ / rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad la dbul// bdud rtsi srub pa blang byas la// glo ru thig le bzhin du dbul// nyon mongs rtag tu skad cig gis// a rtsa ka yi dog pa bzhin// rnal 'byor bstan bcos
22a6(rgyud 'bum): bltas nas ni/ / 'dul ba 'di ni rtag zlos pa'i// sems can 'jig rten 'das pa thob// ngan par spyad pa'i dri ma 'dus// blo ldan gang zhig gis bkrus nas// dge ba 'di yis dri ma 'di// gang
22a7(rgyud 'bum): gi lam nas 'gro ba yi/ / nges byas bde gshegs nyid du 'gyur// rtsa yi 'khor lo zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa rdzogs so// / stong nyid dngos po'i gzugs kyis ni// dbus su
22b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan cig bsgom par bya/ / stong pa'i de nyid kyis bkrus la// stong pa stong pa'i sa bon bzhin// phyogs stong chur mi bshad pa nyid// der ni pad+ma gzugs bcas pa'o// pad+ma'i dbus su pad+ma de/
22b2(rgyud 'bum): yid 'ong ldan cig 'byung ba'o// rnam shes gdan du re pha'o// de nyid re ba dang lhan cig/ de bzhi steng du thig le bshad// dbus su rnam shes lhan cig bzhin// sa ni 'od zer gzugs can du//
22b3(rgyud 'bum): khru phyed du ni bsgom par bya// rnam shes dkar por bsgom bya ba// gang zhig sbyor ba shes la nang // snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang
22b4(rgyud 'bum): rab bshad pa/ / gzhan gyis ye shes mchog 'gro ba// dkar po mdun du rab tu bshad// dud pa phyi rol nub tu'o// de yi g.yon pa bzung byas la// dbus su rnam shes lhan cig tu// rnam
22b5(rgyud 'bum): par shes pa ser por bsgom/ / de yi ming can ro hi ti// ming ni stong par de bzhin bshad// dung gi phyi rol rnam bskor bas// de yi sems kyang bsgom par bya// blo ldan pha rol sems
22b6(rgyud 'bum): shes pas/ / gzhan sems rtag tu yi ge ru// mnyam par gzhag cing bsgoms tsam gyis// gzhan sems shes par 'gyur ba'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs
22b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rngub par lhan cig mtshungs pa yis// rtsa rnams dgu ni bsdam par bya// brngubs shing bkang ba'i bdag nyid kyis// rang nyid spyo
23a1(rgyud 'bum): bas yang dag bkru/ / dbugs kyis 'byin byed g.yo ba nyid// blo ldan sgo ni sdom pa pos// g.yo ba'i yi ge sbyar bar bya// dbugs kyi mthar ni sbyar ba yis// 'byung ba slar
23a2(rgyud 'bum): ni mi bzlog go/ / dbugs kyi mthar ni 'byung ba yi// blo dang ldan pas gang zhig stong // gang ba la ni lha nyid kyis// rtsa nyid dgu yi yi ge'o// blo ldan lhan cig rngub pa yis// sdud pa'i gzugs ni gcig/
23a3(rgyud 'bum): gis so// rngub dang 'byir dang bkang ba yis// 'pho bar sbyor ba lhan cig gnas// rig pas dus la bab pa'i tshe// 'pho bar lhan cig sbyor ba brtsam// sbyang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa
23a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / // de ras gzhan yang rab bshad pa// tshigs dgu las ni 'byin pa'o// de bzhin tshigs dgu gong du bshad// lhan cig 'pho ba bsten par bya// dung pa'i sa
23a5(rgyud 'bum): bon gyis g.yo zhing / / de bzhin thams cad mkhyen par 'gro// nag pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa yis// tshangs pa'i bu ga las rnam par 'byung // rnam shes yang dag sbyor zhes bya// gdan du rlung gi dkyil
23a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / / rlung gi sa bon mnyam par bshad// de yi cod pan bzhin du 'pho// de bzhin tshigs dgu las ni steng // tshangs pa'i bug pa dang mtshungs pa'o// tshangs pa'i bug pa las 'byung ba ni//
23a7(rgyud 'bum): mod la 'pho ba'i 'byung nyid yin// mod la 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// de nyid mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// de nyid
23b1(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig bsgoms pa yis/ / gdan ni dkar po yang dag gyur// stong pa'i ming zhes bya bar bshad// zhi ba'i dus su kun sbyar bar// zhi bar lhan cig brtsam par bya// zhi ba'i le'u ste bcu
23b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// bdag nyid rtag ni sbyang ba bzhin// sbyang zhing bdag nyid chen por sbyang // stong nyid lhan cig sbyang bar bya//
23b3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// me yi dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus spu ni//
23b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o// de dbus de nyid gsungs pa ni// lhan cig myu gu'i mtshan nyid do// gsang zhing gsang ba'i gsang chen po// snying po snying po chen po yis// de nyid mi shes
23b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis/ / rnam shes lhan cig sbyang bar bya// bdun gyi bdun pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkar po'i sa bon brkyang pa mthong/
23b6(rgyud 'bum): dgu mtha' du ba'i sa bon bzhin// dung gi sa bon yan lag drug/ dang po sgra yig pad sa bon// mgo yang de bzhin dbyangs yig mtha'// dang po'i cha la dri med gsum// dbye ba sde tshan tha
23b7(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / mtha' yis sgra yi sa yi gdugs// yi ge'i sa bon gar shes bya// sdug pa las ni mya ngan dang // sdug pa las ni 'jigs pa skye// sdug pa dang ni rnam bral bas// mya ngan med
24a1(rgyud 'bum): cing 'jigs pa med/ / 'dod pa las ni mya ngan dang // gnod pa las ni 'jigs par 'gyur// 'dod pa dang ni rnam bral bas// mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med//
24a2(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan byas te// de nyid lhan cig gdan la ni// de yi bdag nyid cher ldan pa'i// de nyid 'od zer bdun pa'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
24a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba'o/ / pad+ma nyid dang gzhal yas khang // rnam par shes pa lhan cig bskyed// mdun du re pha ser po yang // sde tshan lhan cig sems bzhin no// sa yi mtshams su bsgom bya ba//
24a4(rgyud 'bum): rang lus sa bon lhan cig bcas// sems dpa'i skyil krung ming dang ni// glor ni gsang ba ri rab gnyis// mig ni sna rtser blta bya zhing // dbugs kyis lte ba'i drung bar ro// mnyam gzhag
24a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i ngo bo yis/ / gsang ba'i gdan la mnyam par zhon// zhon pas sdig las grol bar byed// gdan la kun tu zhon tsam gyis// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ba'o// yang na sngags kyi
24a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa yis/ / 'di ni dbang gi brtsam par bya// yang na sman dang ldan pa yi// sngags ni gzhan gyi gdan nyid do// le'u dang po'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//
24a7(rgyud 'bum): tshigs dgu las ni 'byin pa po// 'byin pa stong pa mnyam par bshad// tshigs nyid rked pa nyid dang ni// tshigs dang lte ba dkar po'o// dkar pos khog pa dkris pa'o// snying gi stong pa ru ba nyid//
24b1(rgyud 'bum): shi yang du bar 'gyur ba'o// snying la dung nyid yang dang ni// dung gi tshigs la gnas pa nyid// snying gi steng du pad+ma nyid// brang la pad+ma rnam par bshad// de bzhin mgrin par gi'u wang dang // dbang
24b2(rgyud 'bum): po lnga la gi'u wang ba shad/ / dri med gsum ni so yis mtshams// sa yi gdugs ni pho nya'i rtsa ra// 'byed pa nag dang g.yon pa la// sa gdugs pho nya'i rtsa ba la// 'byin pa tshangs pa'i bu ga
24b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / 'di yis sgo rnams bsdams na ni// rnam par shes pa gang zhes rjod// le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga 'dis ni brtsam pa dang //
24b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge 'dis ni sbyar ba dang // 'dis ni bsgoms pa tsam nyid kyis// tshad mar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gang // de bzhin yi ge'i mtshan ma gang // lhan nyid ldan pa'i tshad ma gang // 'gro ba rtsom pa'i tshad ma gang // lan cig bsgom
24b5(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis ni/ / dgra yi mthar la 'gro ba'o// de bzhin dgra yi ming bshad pa// nag po lhan cig sbyar bar bya// le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//
24b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba mchog gi tshig bya ba// lha nyid lhan cig ngo bo yis// dud pa'i sa bon gyis spyan drangs// oM du ma bi dza yak+Sha ra d+hu ma b+h+yo man+ta pA la yaM swA hA/ mtha' yi yi ge ldan pa yi// mchog gi yi ge/
24b7(rgyud 'bum): dgyes par bya// dam tshig ser po bsgoms pa yis// oM sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya A~M kaR+Sha ya d+hA ma bi dza sAhA/ le'u bzhi pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// skye ba bani
25a1(rgyud 'bum): mi chud pa nyid/ dra na dang bstacan// de bzhin dri glang po nanu// prAd+ha nA nu nI pad+ma ga/ khyA pher rgyu pa'i 'grogs 'gro// gA tu ldan par gyu
25a2(rgyud 'bum): rlu dang 'bring gi nus pa'o/ / 'am ga thams cad smad pa dang // pad+ma'i 'dabs 'dra ba'i tshig/ dzi sa dI sku ni de bzhin 'khyil// bzhin dang so ni pra ba dang // sor mo phra ning yam lag dmam
25a3(rgyud 'bum): so so ma ni rlung ba nyid/ / ni pa'i gzugs cam bu ma bshad// bad+hAcan gyis dpal 'gru cing / ni ba'i lings spyod la ga gyu// le ba'o//
25a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang ba shang byab// glang can ma ni rang dri dang // dman dang 'bring gi rtsi la dang bcas// mchu 'byung byin pa sgom pa dang // glang rte ni myos pa'i 'gros su 'gro// gzugs ring samam
25a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ / num 'byung cing nub pa'o// 'dod pa chung zhing byin pa thom// de bzhin dpung pa 'tho ba'o// tshig nga sen mo za ba dang // b+hang rtsi la dag stan par smra/ bzhin ni rab tu tshong ba dang
25a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyas spyan 'dod sa myed pa cid/ / gsang ba'i kha byer rgyas pa dang // sa la rkang mthil mnyam par shAn k+Sha/ rtakA la dga' ba dang // don 'do sa dang kyang pa sa/ rgyam pa'ims la smra
25a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ le'u drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// ru canas ni rung gi mngon// ni ba ma'i gdong can byin pa ring // bya rog sgang dang bya rog dri// sor sdom sor mo nga
25b1(rgyud 'bum): bcan/ / skra rtsub yan lag 'jam pa dang // bong chen ri dgas mgyogs 'gros 'gro// mgrin pa ring ning so sgo can// sna mtho mchan khung spu dang ni// gdugs kyi rnam pa mchu 'dra ba'i/
25b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// blo dang ldan pas lhan cig spang // dbang la sbyar ba'i bud med do// le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// ri mo can la rim
25b3(rgyud 'bum): dga'/ / ri mo'i gzugs dang kha dog bzhin// nu ma chung zhing sor mo phra// sgra chung yan lag chung ba dang // byang chung sgra yang chung ba dang // bya rog rang bzhir bya rog skar// sha la dga' zhing
25b4(rgyud 'bum): drag tu smra/ / 'di ni mtha' yi mtshan nyid de// bud med nag mo'i las la sbyar// mig yon ma dang 'og mig ma// mchu yi gdong pa mu ta'i lus// rtag tu sgra dang so sto ba// 'dod pa drag cing
25b5(rgyud 'bum): drag par 'bab/ / mdog skya skur zhing thung ba dang // nu ma mtho zhing dpung pa mtho// 'di yi smir ma rje ngar tsam// 'di yis bran kun za 'joms shing // yang na bdag po gsod byed pas// 'di
25b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'i bud med rnam par spang / / pad+ma can ni lha yi rigs// glang po can ma gnod sbyin rigs/ dung can ma ri mi yi rigs// ri mo can ni ri dgas cha// le'u brgyad pa'o// /
25b7(rgyud 'bum): mir skyes pa ni kun sbyor bas// sngon du rigs kyi cha nyid ni// 'ba' do ba ni glang por bshad// ri dgas can ma rtsa yi rigs// 'ba' do ba ni lha yi rigs// gdugs ltar dpung pa mgrin pa
26a1(rgyud 'bum): ring / / so snyom chu ni sdum pa dang // pad+ma 'am ni dmar po'i rigs// dpral ba smin ma rgya che zhing // sgra ni 'jam zhing ser skya'o// gzugs ni 'tsham zhing rje ngar ring // snamatho
26a2(rgyud 'bum): sna ni ring ba dang / / yan lag 'jam zhing dpung pa ring // ngang pa'i 'gros dang ngang ba'i skad// dri dang me tog la dga' zhing // 'o ma la dga' sbyin pa gtong // bsod nams chang dang sgeg par bcas//
26a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dpal ni rab ster zhing // sems can kha zas nyung ngus 'tsho// le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// glang po can ma lus bong che// byin
26a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ring nang ngo gdong che/ / mig phra rna ba 'phyang ba dang // skra rtsub pa dang bum pa can// mchu 'phyangs yan lag rgyas pa nyid// zas ni drag tu za ba dang // zhib ma'i gdong can rna ba 'phyang // 'dod
26a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chung zhing 'du las dga'/ / dpung mgo ras 'chang yan lag phra// skra ring so ni sto ba dang // sen mo chung zhing rkang pa 'jam// sna dang lto ba ring ba dang // phub ma'i skad dang lus po rtsub//
26a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod la dga' zhing gti mug dngos// phyug cing thams cad bdag po'i// le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// ri dgas can ma ri dgas
26a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang / / mig dkyus ring zhing lus bong che// skra phra so ni chung ba dang // mchu spung lus ni mdzes pa dang // til gyi bzhin dang pags pa srag/ mang la dga' zhing mang du smra// bya rog
26b1(rgyud 'bum): skad dang rkang pa 'gyur/ / rtag tu dbul zhing mi brtan pa// bdag sems ldan pa'i bdag nyid can// sdig byed tshig 'dor smra ba'i sa// dud 'gro 'am yang na yi dgas rigs// le'u gsum pa
26b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// mkhas shing brtson 'grus brtan pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs brtan pa nyid// snying stobs brtan zhing stong pa nyid//
26b3(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang // lus po 'tsham zhing yan lag pra// pags pa srab cing sen mo dmar// snyan par smra zhing snying rje'o// sbyin pa'i bdag nyid la rtag dga'// me tog dri la dga' ba nyid// sbyor dang ye shes la
26b4(rgyud 'bum): dka'ag/ snying rjer mngon dga'i bdag nyid sems// bud med las ni khyad par 'phags// le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o// // chang la mngon du dga' ba dang // rtag sred la ni dga'
26b5(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / rtag tu sa steng sbyor ba dman// 'di lta bu ni spang bar bya// le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// thab khung thab khung mnyam shes
26b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ ku ru me ni kun tu brtag/ rtsa ba'i 'khor lo pad+ma mnyam// dub mer ni rab tu brtag/ dkar ba'i sa bon gyi sna shing // dung gi sa bon me tog bzhin// gtor ma spos kyi pad+mar bshad//
26b7(rgyud 'bum): khams lnga nye bar longs spyod bya// gi'u wang dri ma gsum byed pa// sa gdugs 'byin byed sa bon bzhi// srin lag mthe bong gung mo ni// lhan cig phyag rgyar sbyar byas la// bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i jo ba
27a1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / bdag nyid mchod sbyin sreg par byed// sreg rdzas 'o ma btung ba'o// bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la// khyad par du yang tshes brgyad la// mnyam par sbyor bas cha spangs
27a2(rgyud 'bum): la/ / bdag bzhin bla ma sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin lha 'joms ji lta bar// yang na gsang ba 'jig byed pa// yang na bla ma brnyas par yang // de bzhin bla ma blangs pa dang // cho ga rdzogs par blang
27a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / bdag nyid me la lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par// 'gyur bar 'di la the tsom med// le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang
27a4(rgyud 'bum): rab bshad pa/ / phyag rgya yi ni cho ga mchog/ g.yas brkyang rkang pas mnan nas ni// sdigs mdzub snying khar rnam par sbyin// se gol hUM gi rnam par dang // lhan cig tu ni sgra byas pas// klu
27a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams skrag par byed pa dang / / log 'dren 'bar bar byed pa dang // sgo 'phar 'byed pa dang // 'byung po gsod pa dang // sha za 'dul ba dang // yi dgas skrod pa dang // 'di ni tsham rngam
27a6(rgyud 'bum): gong gi cho ga'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ / gzhan yang rdo rje tsham rngam gyi sngags dang phyag rgya mi rlag par byed pa dang / steng du 'phen pa dang / 'byung po 'joms pa la du ba'i sa bon gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//
27a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje lcags kyus spyan drang bar bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan dbul/ 'jig rten pa yi gnas tsam ni// dud pa'i lcags kyus spyan drang la// rdo rje zhags pas
27b1(rgyud 'bum): bcing bar bya/ / rdo rje lcags sgrog gis dgyes bya// rdo rje dril bus mchod par bya// me tog gi sor mo dang / dri'i sor mo dang / spos kyi sor mo dang / mar me'i sor mo dang / gtor ma'i sor mo rnams
27b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchod pa lnga mnyam par byas te mchod par bya'o/ / ra ba'i phyag rgya dang / dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / phur pa'i phyag rgya dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang / shag ta'i phyag rgya dang / pad+ma'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o//
27b3(rgyud 'bum): chu'i sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya dang / me la pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gr-i gug gis gcod pa dang / log pa'i gri gug gis gsod pa dang / phag mo'i phyag rgyas skrod pa dang / snying khar bsdam zhing gshegs su gsol
27b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / phyag rgya'i le'u zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// // kye ma'o 'du byed rnams mi rtag/ skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin// des na de bzhin 'dod pa yin// 'dod pa rnams
27b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dug ltar nyes mtha' yas/ dmyal bar lhung zhing yi dgas gnas su skye// skad cig dbang du mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dod pa ni// yon tan med cing smig rgyu lta bu dang // snying po med cing chu bur lbu bar
27b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / thog ma lang tsho mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa// sdug cing yid du 'ong ba 'di ni byis pa'i dus// gzugs mchog mdzes pa'i gzugs ni mi sdug gzugs su 'gyur// mdza' ba med/
27b7(rgyud 'bum): cing 'chi ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i// 'gro ba 'di ni nor gyis dbul zhing slong mo pa'o// de phyir 'bad pas rnal 'byor pas// thams cad du ni lus pa sdam zhing // bza' ba bca'
28a1(rgyud 'bum): pa bsdam par bya'o/ / spyod pa'i dus la 'di yis bsdam// bstan bcos bzhi pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // sor brgyad las ni lhag pa ru/
28a2(rgyud 'bum): ji srid khru stong bar du ni// brgyad par dgra ni 'joms pa dang // bcu pa rtag tu rgyas pa'o// bcu gnyis dbang du yang dag ldan// bcu bzhi de bzhir zhi ba nyid// bcu drug tu ni kun tu brko//
28a3(rgyud 'bum): kha khyer gsum par mngon par spyod// zhi ba la ni gru bzhi pa// yongs su dgang ba dbang du ldan// yang na rgyas pa la yang yin// dang por sa ni sbyang bar bya// badz+ra s+pho Ta ma te dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i phur bu
28a4(rgyud 'bum): la hri ha ha zhes so/ / rdo rje'i rab laM ni ha zhes dang // rdo rje'i go cha la ni he he'o// lce sbyang ba la misa'o// lag pa sbyang ba la ni AHhUM ngo // rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kyis ri dgod pa'o// me yaM dbus su
28a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma nyid/ / de yi dbus su me yi lha// du ba'i lcags kyus gzhug byas la// rdo rje nags pas bcing bar bya// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid// spyan gsum de bzhin lto ba dang // ral pa dmar
28a6(rgyud 'bum): ser yang dag ldan/ / bu ram mdog can gsus pa 'phyang // skyabs sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni rtse gsum nyid// oM sa swA hA/ me'i snying po'o// oM hu ta huM ta ba te sa swA hA/
28a7(rgyud 'bum): nor gyi phyag rgyas mchod par bya// dbang po lnga yis de bzhin sreg/ ji ltar 'byor pa gsum gyis mchod// gang phyir de ni gshegs su gsol// de bzhin pad+mar bsgyur ba lngas// oM ka
28b1(rgyud 'bum): ma la ut+pal lo hU~M/ lha nyid rtsa dang lhan cig bzhin// sgra yis lha ni dbyung bya ba// zhi bar dkar por yang dag ldan// rgyas par ser por rnam par sgrom// dbang la dmar por yang drug ldan/
28b2(rgyud 'bum): / nag po nyid ni drag po yi// lha yi gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rnal 'byor dang // hUM hUM sa yam shing sbyang ba'o// hUM 'bru sbyang ba'o// oM 'o ma sbyang ba'o// hri dri'i'o//
28b3(rgyud 'bum): oM shu su pa'i ta puSh+pa b+h+yo swA hA/ oM d+hU pa mA la ku le swA hA/ oM tIk+ti dI pe swA hA/ oM ru ru bi dza ya swA hA/ lhan TIg lha dang dbus su ni// bzlas pa gcig gis bsdu bar bya// dpa' bo 'bar
28b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdag nyid che/ / phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni// de yi zhal du sreg blugs ni// kun nas lha nyid tshim par bya// dngos po brgyad kyi mchod pa yis// hUM gi glu yi rnam pa yis//
28b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas// dku yi phyogs su gzung bar bya// me tog tshul gyis gtor ba dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang /
28b6(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod// 'bud pa'i tshul gyis 'bud ba dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis sgreng ba dang // bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang // ba ngan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // rlung
28b7(rgyud 'bum): yab tshul gyis g.yab pa dang / / lha nyid la mchod phyir ni mchog tu 'dud// zhi phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud pas zhi bar byed// spro phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bdag med rnal
29a1(rgyud 'bum): @'byor grub phyir hUM 'byin sa bon 'jig par mdzad/ / bdag med par sbyor rnam par snang mdzad dngos la phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyad par glu dang mchod pas me la mchod par byaste/
29a2(rgyud 'bum): sgras 'jug par bya'o// de bzhin du phyis sreg blugs phyed dang bzhis me lha mchod par bya'o// le'u dang po zhes bya'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// slar yang
29a3(rgyud 'bum): me yi brtag pa ni/ / mtho bar 'bar bas zhi ba'o// dma' bar 'bar bas rgyas pa nyid// 'khor bar 'bar bas dbang dang ldan// ngu bar 'bar bas bdag nyid 'joms// de bzhin me yi de
29a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya// dbang ldan du ni zhi ba nyid// shar du dpal dang mngon par 'grogs// me yi phyogs su rgyas pa nyid// lho phyogs su ni nor rlag go// bden
29a5(rgyud 'bum): bral 'chi ba'i pho nya nyid/ / nub tu dbang ni brtsam par bya// rlung du nor ni nyams pa dang // byang du rigs ni rnam par 'phel// le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas
29a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / yam shing mtshan nyid brtag pa ni// yam shing gi ni bye brag nyid// zhi ba la ni sor mo bcu// rgyas pa la ni skyes bu nyid// dbang la bcu gnyis pa nyid dang //
29a7(rgyud 'bum): mngon spyod la ni brgyad pa'o// dbye ba de bzhin 'o ma'i shing // de bzhin pad+ma pri yang ku// khyad par du ni zhi ba la// yam shing 'di ni cho ga'i mchog/ thang shing de bzhin shing dang ni/
29b1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dzag pa'i shing ji bzhin// yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog/ rgyas pa la ni sbyar bar bya// b+ha la ta ka sgur po'i shing // bya rog tshang gi shing ji bzhin// yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog/ shing
29b2(rgyud 'bum): gis nag po'i las la sbyar/ / 'o mar ldan pa'i btung ba dang // de bzhin 'bras dang 'bru mnyam pas// zhi ba la ni sbyar bar bshad// sbyin sreg gi ni cho ga mchog/ gi'u wang dang ni gur kun
29b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / thams cad 'bru dang mnyam ldan pas// de bzhin rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg go// yang na gser gyi lha dang ni// baid+hi rA ga gur kum nyid// pr-I yang ku dang mu gu nyid// a ru ra yi me tog brgya//
29b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang la sbyar ba yang dag mtshungs// 'ba' la ta ke lung tang dang // dug dang de bzhin khrag nyid dang // tsha ba'i mar khu de bzhin sgra// nag po'i phyogs la sbyar ba nyid// le'u gsum pa zhes
29b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// 'byung po gnod sbyin de bzhin klu// lha dang nam mkha' lding dang ni// smyo dang 'khor byed gnod sbyin dang // lha mo ma mo'i bdag
29b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi/ / dkyil 'khor dgu ni mngon byas nas// re mig dgu dang cha dgu dang // dbus su bdag gi lha nyid dang // dbang ldan du ni lha yi ris// shar du klu yi cha dang ni// me yi phyogs su gnod sbyir
29b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / lho phyogs su mi 'byung po'o// de bzhin spro byed bden bral du'o// nub tu nam mkha' lding nying dang // rlung gi phyogs su gtor ma mtshungs// byang du 'khor byed gnod sbyin no// bdag cing /
30a1(rgyud 'bum): cha yis mchod par bya// le'u bani pa zhes bya ba'o// dkar po'i 'od mchog mi bzang mngon par rol pa gsang ba la mkhas lce'i// steng gi mcheb
30a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid la chu 'byin ro ni 'o ma'i chu zhes pa/ / 'phyar ba'i rnam pa'i chu yi kha dog dang mtshungs mche ba gnyis ni rtswa bzhin no// lce yi gdung ba sel ba'i chu ni bdud rtsi dkar po'i bdud rtsi lnga// rgyas pa lnga la
30a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i ro bzhin sbyor ba mkhas pas mi shes so/ / lce la de bzhin dkar po'i sa bon de ni dud pa'i lcags kyus drangs// sna la ro yi dgod pa'i bdud rtsi rlung gi lcags kyus 'dren// rig
30a4(rgyud 'bum): pas rig pa mthong ba de ltar de yi bdud rtsi rnam par thim pa'o/ / ji srid ring du 'tsho zhing chos spyod pa// de srid dge ba'i rgyun ni rab tu 'phel// rlung gis 'byin cing yid ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal
30a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / rlung gi sa bon gyis ni rtag tu sbyor bar byed// ka ba gcig dang tshigs dgu dang // sgo lnga bug pa gsum pa nyid// rtsa yi 'khor lo phra ba 'di// g.yo dang mi g.yo gsang
30a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bcas/ / gzugs gcig la ni sdud pa nyid// rtsa yi rang bzhin gyis mi rtag/ dang po'i gdan la bshad pa yi// sngon du bdag nyid bshad par bya// chu shing me tog lta bu ni//
30a7(rgyud 'bum): lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// de dbus de bzhin gsungs pa ni// ye shes rnam shes sems dpa' 'o// bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// // de nas
30b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rab 'chang byed/ / de la lci ba'i skye ba thob// 'khor ba de la 'khor lo che// 'khor lo'i 'khor lo ldan gyur pa// dmangs rigs phyugs bzhin 'gro ba yi// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
30b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do// bzhi brgya dang ni lnga bcu yang // khrag dang rus pa ma lus pa'o// chu ni bre phyed dang bcas pa// de bzhin srin bu khri nyid dang // khri phrag gsum dang stong phrag gcig/
