30b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa yini ba spu nyid// sha khrag drug cu tham pa ni// skyes bu bar mar 'gyur ba'o// sum brgya de bzhin drug cu yi// chu tshod dbugs dang rtsa gzhan no// mnyam po cha ru 'phel ba yi//
30b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i gzugs dang mnyam pa'i 'od// rtsa ni 'khor lo bzhin du bsgyur// 'khor lo brgyad pa brgyad pa bzhin// srog dang rtsol ba lnga zad dang // bdag nyid yang dag gnyen par mdzad//
30b5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su me yi phung po nyid// 'byin pa'i sa bon de dbus su// dri med rtag tu mnyam zhing dma'// phyi rol tu ni bcu gnyis 'gyur// 'khor zhing sa bon mnyam pa dang // dbugs ni mnyam par
30b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'o/ / me dang rlung gi bdun don la// du ba'i sa bon bsgom par bya'o// sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan// char gyi rgyun zhes bshad pa yin// 'khor lo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o//
30b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// oM ni re ba'i thig le rdzogs// bla ma'i thig le kun tu brtag/ nyin mo dbugs ni mnyam par chad// de bzhin lho yi yi ge'o// mtshan
31a1(rgyud 'bum): mo chen po lnga chang na/ / chu shing dus ni mnyam pa bzhir// zla ba drug ni mtshan mo nyid// zla drug nyin mor rnam par brtag/ chu tshod dang ni zla byed dang // nyin zhag bcu
31a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bdag nyid ni/ / drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha nyid la// dkar po yi ni bla ra med// de ni dkar po'i sa rang bzhin// mgo dang rkang gi steng dang ni// de bzhin mig dang sna dang ni// lce dang rna bar bcas pa
31a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dpral ba tshangs pa'i bu ga dang // thig le dkar po'i sa can pa'o// dgun gyi phyogs ni snga ma dang // ma ga ga yi ni rang don dang // khyu mchog bum pa karka Ta// mig dang chu srin srang gis
31a4(rgyud 'bum): khyab/ / de ni dud pa sa yi dngos// dgun gyi dbus su snga ma byin// lag mthil sen mo'i tshogs dang ni// nges par de bzhin mchan khung dang // mgrin pa mchu dang brang gi tshogs// phur bur mnyam
31a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'phro ba'o/ / 'jig rten sprul dang dga' ba'i rigs// de bzhir 'jig rten phyed bcas sbyin// lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo bskor// de ni dus kyi sa gzhi'o// sos ka dang po'i dbus nyid dang // lag
31a6(rgyud 'bum): mthil ser mo'i tshogs dang ni/ / de bzhin mchan khung sa dang ni// mgrin pa mchu dang brang gi mtshams// de bzhin blo ldan 'gro ba'o// le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas
31a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / tshigs kyi dbus dang nu ma'i steng // snying dang snying ni shin tu mchog/ de ni pad+ma'i gnas rang bzhin// rnam par shes pa'i cha brgyad nyid// sos ka dang po'i dbus nyid dang //
31b1(rgyud 'bum): dgun gyi zla ba brgyad pa bzhin// gi'u wang phra zhing yang ba nyid// chu yi mdog dang sbyangs de bzhin// b+hI d+hi ba la mnyam pa'i sa// gza' ni bum pas bsgyur ba dang // gzhung tshigs ngos dang nu ma'i steng /
31b2(rgyud 'bum): snying dang snying ni shin tu mchog/ de ni gi'u wa nga gnas rang bzhin// rim bzhin zla ba phyed dang ni// ru sbal ru sbal mnyam ru sbal// mtshams dang mtshams ni mnyam pa dang // pad+ma pad+ma pad+ma ra mnyam//
31b3(rgyud 'bum): dri med gsum gyi sar gnas pa'o// srin bu skye ba mnyam par bza'// skra dang rus pa'i mtshams su ni// rked par pad+ma pad+ma yang // mnyam pa'i cha yis gnas pa nyid// de ni dri med gsum gyi
31b4(rgyud 'bum): sa rnam shes lhan cig gnas pa'o/ / le'u brgyad pa zhes bya ba'o// / re ba zlum po re bar mnyam// mngal gyi steng dang 'og tu yang // lA dang lha mo'i ye shes bzhin// bar
31b5(rgyud 'bum): dang pus mo mnyam pa'i brla/ / steng dang 'og tu rig nyid ni// sor mo mtshams dang logs su yang // 'byed pa'i rtsa ni rnam par gnas// de ni dbye ba'i gnas rang bzhin// blo dang ldan pas shes par
31b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ re pa re pha zlum por mnyam// bcu yi steng dang 'og tu yang // brla dang pus mo'i steng du mnyam// steng dang 'og tu rigs nyid du// sor mo'i tshogs dang logs su yang // sa gdugs rtsa ni gnas pa
31b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / de rnams sa gdugs gnas rang bzhin// gnas par blo dang ldan pas shes// le'u dgu pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// steng du chu tshod dbugs/
32a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni// ye shes gal te 'byung gyur na// sum brgya de bzhin sum cu dang // ji srid bdun du 'dres gyur na// gnyis gcig bcu phyed bcas pa yi// chu tshong dbugs ni chang pa
32a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / ye shes 'gyur ba rnam shes bya// blo ldan spyi yi bstan bcos bzhin// sbyor ba'i dus la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bcos las ni bshad pa'o// drug cu rtsa ba ni dbugs mnyam pas// rtag/
32a3(rgyud 'bum): tu sa ni bsrung bar bya// le'u bcu pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yid ni sngon du 'gro ba'i chos// yid dag cing ni yid 'gro bas// de phyir yid sngon
32a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / blo dang ldan pas yid bsgrim bya// sa bon gyi ni khyad par nyid// sngags kyis pha rol mnan bya med// phyag rgya mngon par ldan pa yi// rgod cing mngon par rtse ba med// de la
32a5(rgyud 'bum): khrus kyi cho ga min/ / spyang ba mchog tu bzod pa med// mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing // glegs bam gyi ni tshig med pa'o// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing zhing // sngags kyi yi ge maM bzla'o// skad
32a6(rgyud 'bum): cig rnal 'byor blta bya zhing / / rnal 'byor sbyor bas 'gro ba brtsam// shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi// dag pa yi ni sbyor ba mchog/ ye shes rnam shes ldan pa'o// ye shes kyis ni gnas brtsam
32a7(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi// dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gangs dang kha ba'i chu lta bur//
32b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par shes pa'i kha dog bzhin// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'o// mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang ni// sngags brgyad kyi ni sa bon bzhin// bdud rtsi dkar po'i
32b2(rgyud 'bum): zas dang ni/ / dag pa'i chu ni brtsam par bya// pad+ma'i gdan dang gdan la ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis maran pa'o// gi'u wang bla mar bshad pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes lha// dkar po
32b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni mi bskyod pa'o/ / don yod grub pa du bar bshad// snang ba mtha' yas dung nyid dang // pad+ma nyid ni rin chen no// gi'u wang lha mo mA ma kI// dri med gsum ni sgrol ma'o// gos dkar mo ni
32b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byed par 'gyur/ / sa yi gdugs ni sangs rgyas spyan// le'u brgyad pa zhes bya ba'o// // thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// khams pani rnam par mnyam pa nyid/
32b5(rgyud 'bum): khams bzhi ru ni rnam par 'gro// me dang chu ni 'di bshad pa// nam mkha' yang ni stong pa nyid// sra ba nyid ni sa yin no// dro ba'i dngos po me dang ni// oM ni rnam par snang mdzad dngos// spyi bor
32b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po yi sa bon/ / shar du mi bskyod pa nyid ni// a yi rnam pas de nyid lha// hUM gis don yod rnam par gyur// lho yi phyogs su brtsam par bya// traM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lnga// de nyid snang
32b7(rgyud 'bum): ba mtha' yas lha/ / cod pan nub kyi phyogs su'o// de nyid mchod pa mnyam pa dang // traM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// byang du ren chen 'byung ba'o// spyi gtsug la sogs lha lnga ni// blo dang
33a1(rgyud 'bum): shes pas rnam par dgod/ / traM ga~M rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// dpral ba khro bo'i phyag car re// ka yi rnam pas ye shes lnga// maM g.yos yi mgon po bzhin/
33a2(rgyud 'bum): hri yi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// de bzhin zla ba mig gnyis su'o// le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdzas kyi rnam pas bdag po'i
33a3(rgyud 'bum): lha/ / rna bar byams pa nyid yin no// k+ShaM gi rnam pas bdag po'i lha// mkhur tshes yi dgas skyong ba'o// sa yi rnam pa swa bdag po'i lha// lce la yang ni mA ma kI// hUM gi rnam pas/
33a4(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bdag lha// mgrin par rta mgrir khro bo bzhir// shro gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// ye shes lha ni mchog tu gtso// snying po yin ye shes mchog/ sor mo lnga dang mnyam pa'i lha//
33a5(rgyud 'bum): lha ni sangs rgyas nyid yin no// a yi bdud rtsi lha mo ni// lag mthil rdo rje sgeg mo bzhin// shr-i gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// lte bar rnam par sel ba nyid// bruM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag
33a6(rgyud 'bum): lha/ de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka/ laM gyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// de bzhin brla gnyis sa snying po// yuM gyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha// pus mo ya dgas lha mo'o// traM gi rnam pas yi dgas lha//
33a7(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu 'byung po'i gtso bo'o// le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// oM hri he ha haha phaT/ 'di ri nye ba'i cho ga'i sngags so// sku mdog sngon
33b1(rgyud 'bum): / po khro gnyer zhal dang ni// spyan gsum zhal dang rked pa spyi bo cod pan can/ sbyor ba'i bdun bdun mngon pa'i phyag brgyad dang // dar gyis mngon par gang ba'i gdengs ka'i rna cha dang // mchod phyir/
33b2(rgyud 'bum): thogs ni sbrul gyis lhag par yang dag ldan// dmar po'i gos dang sbrul gyi pags pa bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag na snod ni rab tu gang bas mdzes// gnyis par dbyug pa gsum par dgra sta
33b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gyen du ba dan dang ni dril bu g.yas pa'o// rdo rje gsor dang lcags kyu dril bu'i phyag/ pad+ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i phyag car me yi dkyil 'khor la// he ru ka dpal mgon po shin tu 'jigs
33b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / shar gyi char ri mA ma kI// thod pa phyag na bsnams pa'o// lho yi char ni sangs rgyas spyan// phyag gis 'khyud pa'i tshul bzhin no// rub tu sgrol ma drir bshad pa// de bzhin phyag
33b5(rgyud 'bum): na me tog 'phreng / / gos dkar gtor mar yang dag ldan// byang gi phyogs su dgod par bya// dbang ldan rdo rje sgeg mo dang // me ru pi wang lag pa ma// bder bral du ni glu ma dang // rlung du gar
33b6(rgyud 'bum): mas skyong ba bzhin/ / le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// suM shrI swA hA/ shar gyi'o// sa nU hUM hUM swA hA/ lho'i'o// sa k+ShuM swA hA/ nub
33b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi'o/ / sa k+ShuM k+ShuM k+ShuM swA hA/ byang du'o// hU~M dbang ldan gyi'o// he me'i 'o// he bder bral gyi'o// hri rlung gi'o// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM s+pho Ta baM/ oM g+har+b+ha ho// oM pad+ma
34a1(rgyud 'bum): kud b+hA ba ya swAhA/ gArar gyi'o// oM pun+d+ha b+h+yo sa/ oM d+hU pe b+h+yo sha/ oM dzI bau b+h+yo tra~M/ gats+tsha te swAH/ b+hA be na su rA A gA ma nA yA swaH/ le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o//
34a2(rgyud 'bum): / pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ri gser gyi mdog can ying 'ong dang // dri chu'i dngos po shin tu snang mdzad dang // ra ni bdud rtsi chu yi ngo bo nyid// mtheb mdzub kyis ni sa yi
34a3(rgyud 'bum): steng du dor/ / dbus ma'i ri rab kyis ni bdud rtsi bsrub byas la// ji bzhin gnas brgyad du ri rtag tu 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya// ha yi rnam pas kha dog 'phrog/ so zhes bya bas dri
34a4(rgyud 'bum): med byed/ / dpa' bo hri yis rnam par 'joms// rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya'o// lha rnams kun nas lcags kyu yis// bdud rtsi'i yi ge tshim par bya// lcags kyu kur
34a5(rgyud 'bum): nas skyod byed cing / / rnal 'byor bdag nyid mtshan nyid yin// dpal lngar rje rje 'dzin byed cing // dud pa'i sa bor gyis ni sbyang // gtor ma sbyang ba byas pa yin// de yi sa bon gyis
34a6(rgyud 'bum): de sbyang / / logs su kha khyer gsum pa la// pho nyarnal 'byer mas spyan drang // ka Da ka Da ban d+ha ban d+ha na hra kha kha kha sha truM dzaHdzaH/ sha trUM mA ra Na b+ha li b+ha ta li de ba ti she zhes so//
34a7(rgyud 'bum): le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o// // de ras gzhar yang rab bshad pa// 'ji ba las ni gzugs brnyan bya// zhal gsum spyan gsum rkang pa gsum// phyag gsum rab tu
34b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhad pa dang / / glang po'i mig can ro langs ma// rtag tu ral gri zhags pa dang // gos dmar pags pa dmar po bsnams// zhabs gnyis kyis ni skad cig sa la maran pa dang //
34b2(rgyud 'bum): ro langs phyag rgya snying khar mngon par bsdig/ hUM gi sgra yis de bzhin sa bon bzlas pa yis// bstan pa srung zhing skem pa yi// mngon du pho nya chen po 'ong // kAr+ya kAr+ya ban d+ha ban d+ha/ nA da
34b3(rgyud 'bum): nA da hUM hUM phaT phaT/ 'di ni pho nya mchog gi sngags// dbang dang mngag la de bzhin meng // dug dang lhan cig sbyar byas pa'i// khrag gis mngon par bri bar bya// rkang pas mngon du maran byas
34b4(rgyud 'bum): la/ blo dang ldan pas rim bzhin bzlas// lan cig bzlas shing lan cig ming // lan cig phyag rgya bsnun par bya// ming ni brgya phrag brgya phrag gsum// nag po ser skya tsan dan dang /
34b5(rgyud 'bum): dmar po'i me tog sa bon gyis// dkyil 'khor gsum ni bya bar bya// gu gul rag po'i bdug pa dri// de yi gtor ma ldan dbul bzhin// ser skya'i pho nya'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug
34b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mi shes mur pa nyid dang 'bu dang srin bu'i 'khor los khyab// mi rnams sdig pa'i khyad par nyin re bzhin du spyod pa ni//
34b7(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i lam nas mi ni dbu ma'i skye bar skye// thos na mngon par dga' zhing spro zhong lta ba yi// mi yi ye shes mchog dang mchog tu 'gyur// rgyal po'i thar pa don dam mchog tu rnam par
35a1(rgyud 'bum): shes/ / phra zhing shin tu phra ba de nyid rab tu phra// dngos po med cing dngos po bral// sbyor ba'i dngos po bde bar brtags// shes pas bsgoms pa dag pa yis/
35a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par dag pa dbu ma'o// rtag tu bdag med rnam par dag/ 'dod pas rnam par mi gos pa'o// le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o// // sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos
35a3(rgyud 'bum): po yis/ / rtag tu spyi bor brgyan pa'o// gnyis med phyag rgya'i gnas su ni// de la rgya mtsho chu nyid bsgom// spyi gtsug rnam shes tshim par bya// g.yon gyi phyogs su mi bskyor ba'o//
35a4(rgyud 'bum): don yod grub pa g.yas su bzhugs// rin cher gyis kyang mngon par brgyan// rgyab tu snang ba mtha' yas dgong // sangs rgyas lnga ni gzung bar bya// gzhan du nam yang mi bshad
35a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / sangs rgyas bstar bcos nyid du gsungs// snga dro phyi dron phyir dus// dus gsum du ni tshig tu gzung // sa bon 'ang yis bkrus pa yis// 'thor 'thung rnam par sbyang ba'o// lnga
35a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag sbyar bas dbul/ / tshe ling ga ya thig le sbyang // gong bu bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// rnam shes lhan cig dkar po'o// le'u brgyad pa zhes bya ba'o// /
35a7(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o las ni mchog tu gtso// e ma'o rnal 'byor rmad du byung // e ma'o chos ni mchog thob pas// drang srong lhan cig ngo mtshar skyes// ye shes mchog gi chos 'di ri// byang chub
35b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' 'dus nas gsungs/ / ye shes yid kyi chos can ni// tshig gis khyod la bshad pa yin// ye shes phyag rgya mchog nyid ni// ye shes rtsa ba yang dag 'byung // shel
35b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ni dag pa yi/ / dag pa gnyis su med pa'i rtags// lha yi yan lag mchod pa pos// gnyis med dgod par yang dag ldan// gnyis med rnam shes ngo bo yis// blo ldan
35b3(rgyud 'bum): s a nga sabyam nas 'byu ma ma sa ma rgya yang byag
35b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'amazhon pas/ / 'khrig pa bdud rtsi sbyor ba'o// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam pa'i dngos// skyes dus hUM ga~M sgra byas nas// rang bzhin gyis ni sgra 'byin cing // gnyis ka'i ye shes dkar po
35b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / de yi rang bzhin gyis ni rdul// du ba'i sa bon gyis sbyar la// dbang po ru rnga b.li bar mnyam// kha ra sbrang rtsi pa la sha// bdud rtsi chu dang yang dag ldan// rgyu skar zla ba lha
35b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid la/ / byin nas don chen dbang du byed// le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// stong nyid ngo bo'i tshul gyis ni// phyi dang nang du bcas par
35b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ye shes chos kyi sbyor ba las// ye shes kyi ni sbyor ba mchog/ thams cad lus la garas pa ni// rmongs pas kun tu mi shes pas// de phyir rmongs pa yongs spangs la//
36a1(rgyud 'bum): shes kyis ni gnas brtsam bya// 'du 'dzi lngas ni rmongs pa'i tshul// de phyir 'du 'dzi yongs su spang // gcig pa sbyor bas grub pa yi// gcig pas 'gro ba
36a2(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya/ / byis pa'i skye bos mthong ba yi// de phyir de nyid gcig pu ni// gnas med gnas ni shes byas la// dngos meng sa yi ngo bo la// gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyis// /
36a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi shis pa rnam par spang // de nyid rig pa mchog tu phra// sbyor ba'ang mchog tu phra ba nyid// mgrin pa rgan gyi steng du bzla// smin ma'i dbus dang mig gi rtsar// sgror ni thig le
36a4(rgyud 'bum): phrar gyur pa/ / 'khor lo phra rab rdul lta bur// dngos po mchog dang yang dag ldan// bla mas bstan las shes par bya// rdul phran ye shes de kho na// de phyir blo lngar gyis shes bya//
36a5(rgyud 'bum): le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyor dang yon tan dngos po spang // kha ga'i sgo r-i ji bzhin bsdam// bug pa dgu dang kha ga
36a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / bug pa dgu la dud pa 'byung // skyes bu gong gi sgo la ni// der ni pad+ma dkar po bzhin// lus kun la ni dgod bya zhing // lha nyid so sor bsgom par bya// lha yi sa bon de nyid kyis
36a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i phyag rgya dgod pa bzhin/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// ye shes rnam shes mchog tu drang // dngos dang dngos po phra ba'i de kho na// dngos dang
36b1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu 'brel bar mtshungs pa'o/ / snying khar gnas pa'i snying po mchog gi ming du brjod// sems kyis rtsa nas de bzhin hi ka/ steng dang 'og dang de bzhin te// de yi yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis
36b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyang / / bzlog par bya ba'i sa bon gyis// lhan cig blo dang ldan par bya// le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thams cad lus la gnas
36b3(rgyud 'bum): po yi/ / ye shes kyi ni ye shes mchog/ sa dang ri rang de bzhin shing // bong ba chu dang de bzhin srin// 'bu srin rnam par spangs nas ni// ye shes lus la sems med pa'o// 'bu dang srin
36b4(rgyud 'bum): pu ye shes thun/ / khyad par nyid du yang bya'o// rnam gsum lha dang gnod sbyin dang // lha min yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma// gzugs dang ye shes de bzhin khro// zhi zhing zhi ba'i ye shes
36b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / lus la thams cad gnas pa ni// blo dang ldan pas khyad par shes// le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// drang srong ngo mtshar
36b6(rgyud 'bum): skye ba ni/ / ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu dang // bu ga gsum dang ye shes lnga// rnam shes ye shes lus la ni// chos kyi dbyings ni ji ltar grags// thar pa thob pa'i dus su ni// mi shes
36b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lus can ni/ / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings nyid dang // ye shes dang ri gzugs kyi cha// ye shes ji ltar mthong ba dang // ji ltar na ni ye shes gzugs// de nyid gzugs la sems med/
37a1(rgyud 'bum): pa// bdud rtsi'i yi ger rnam par brtag/ ye shes lha dang mnyam pa'i dngos// sngon gyi mtshan nyid lta bu'o// le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o// /
37a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngags dang rgyud kyi dbye ba nyid// ta khi ta la yi ni mtha'// stong pa dgra dang yang dag ldan// steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le sbyin// mchog gi yi ge
37a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag shes/ / stong phrag gcig dang sum brgya brgyad// de yi mtshams nyid bzlas pa'o// bdag nyid lus la dgod pa ni// de bzhin lha ni bskyed cing bskrun// las brgyad dang
37a4(rgyud 'bum): ni mnyam pa yi/ / re mig brgyad kyi dbye ba'o// las bzhi yi ni blo can gyis// de bzhin sa bon sngon du bsnyen// oM A gats+tsha tu de ba sa ma ye A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ lha spyan drang ba'i sngags
37a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ye shes can gyis spyan drang ba// oM a ko na ti ma hA nA ga tak+Sha ga wa sa wa da na hUM hUM ga swA hA/
37a6(rgyud 'bum): klu'o// oM da na pa~M A dz+nyA na yak+Sha na sa ma ya ud b+h+r-i kr-i kruM hri swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi sngags so// oM b+hu ta kro d+ha na b+he A gats+tsha sa ma ud ma phe phu phu dza/ 'byung po'i sngags so// oM g+hu ru g+hu ru/
37a7(rgyud 'bum): A kaR+Sha ya hUM hri dzaH/ 'byung po dgug pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so// le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang gis mchog gi chos
37b1(rgyud 'bum): shes shing / / gang gis rnam par mi rtog shes// gang zhig lha nyid rnam shes pa// gang shes de ni rnal 'byor pa'o// gang zhig gsang ba mi shes pa// mchog gi chos ni mchog phra/
37b2(rgyud 'bum): ba/ thams cad lus la gnas pa'i mchog/ rang lus mchod pas pha rol mchod// gzhan du byas na lha nyid brlag/ mchod pa'i bdag nyid de nyid mchod// thams cad lus las//
37b3(rgyud 'bum): shes 'gyur bas// thams cad lha nyid tshim pa'o// de nyid ye shes lhar gyur pas// bdag nyid las ni thams cad pa'i// rtag tu nyon mongs rnam spangs nas// ye she
37b4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi sku ru gyur/ / de yi ming ni de bzhin dag/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i blo ldan pas// tshe rabs gzhan du byas pa'i sdig/ bklags pa tsam gyis thag bsring ba'o// bde bar
37b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas gsungs pa rab tu byed pa bco brgyad las rtsa yi 'khor lo zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi rnam par dbye ba rdzogs so/ / / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag
37b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid// de bzhin sbyor ba'i bstan bcos dang // drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang // gnas gtsang gnas na bzhugs nas su// thams
37b7(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ / rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam bshad pa// stong pa nyid la mchog tu brtson// ye shes dbang phyug yang dag ldan// gnyis med gnyis med la brten pa// khams
38a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi ni ngo bo dang / / rtsa dgu yi ni dbye ba dang // de bzhir lha dgu lhag pa nyid// sngags dang las ni gsum nyid kyis// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ba'o// yul 'khor/
38a2(rgyud 'bum): skye mched lus rgyal nyid// sgo lnga nas ni drang bar bya// chu dang me dang nam mkha' rlung // 'di ni lus la gnas pa nyid// chu ni dbang phyug rgyal chen po// de bzhin bdud rtsi dkar po rtsa//
38a3(rgyud 'bum): mau ni du bar 'bar bzhin drag/ de bzhin mya ngan 'bar ba'o// dbang chen dung gi rang banin rtsa// mi rtag pas ni yang dag gnas// nam mkha' nam mkha'i rtsa nyid ni// pad+ma de bzhin brtan
38a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing rtag/ gi'u wang rnam par rmongs pa'i rtswa// lus po bskyed cing sdug bsngal gnas// dri med gsum ni g.yo ba'i rtsa// sgra ni sgrub par dkar ba'o// 'byed pa nyon mongs nyid kyi rtsa//
38a5(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i rtsa dang sdig pa'i gnas// mi shes pa dang phyugs nyid yin// sa gdugs rtsa ni dbang phyug mchog/ dkar po myu gu rab dbye dang // de bzhin dud pas mi zad phyir//
38a6(rgyud 'bum): sa ni dung du gnas gsungs pa'o// nam mkha' g.yo zhing 'gro ba'o// rmongs pas srid cing 'jig pa'i dngos// de bzhin nyon mongs sdig pa'i gnas// g.yo zhing g.yo ba'i blo
38a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / mi shes phyugs kyi rtsa nyid pa// dgu yi lha ni ci zhes brjod// dbye bas rnam pa bco brgyad ni// de bzhin 'phags pa ye shes dbang // 'gro ba'i bsod nams sdig gi
38b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhi/ / de bzhin sems can sdig pa'i las// de bzhin nyon mongs dmyal bar bshad// srid pa pa dang ma yi dngos// gzhan du du ma'i shes pa nyid// rgyal po zhes pa ci zhes brjod// /
38b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i yul ni rgyal po'o// phan tshun bsten cing bstan pa las// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor rnam par skye// nyon mongs pa spu la sogs lus// lus po yi ri gzhi nyid do// 'khor
38b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'gyur ba'i zhags pa yis/ / glang chen gnang du brgyab pa bzhir// tshe rabs snga ma'i stobs chung ba'i// rnal 'byor pa 'i steng la dga'// rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'o// /
38b4(rgyud 'bum): / de ras gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rtsa yi lha na de bzhin rim// bcu gnyis pa ni mngon du bri// dkar po 'byung ba'i dbyibs kyis ni// cha bzhi lhag pa'i rig pa
38b5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / spyi bor dkar po'i garas rang bzhin// rgyas pa lnga yi steng du ni// 'bar ba'i rtsa ni steng du'o// smin dbus de bzhin thig le dang // mig ni bcing ba nyid dang yang // rna ba nyan
38b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yi ri rtswa/ / g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid// de bzhin skyes bu g.yas pa nyid// dud pa sngon gyi dbugs dang ni// lce dang ro yi rtsa nyid do// bdud rtsi rnam pa dgur bshad pa// dkar
38b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i rtsar ni yongs su grags/ / sngon du ngu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// dud pa 'bar ba'i rtsa chen po// dpung pa'i ngos su yang dag gnas// brang dang ru sbal mtshams su ni// rtsa ni mtshams kyi dbus
39a1(rgyud 'bum): su'o/ / lag pa'i sor mo'i dbyibs lta bu// sen mo dang ni ser mo'i rgyab// dud pa lhag pa'i rtsa nyid ni// brang nyid du ni yongs su grags// logs dang de bzhin
39a2(rgyud 'bum): pab yi/ / de bzhin ji ltar tshogs dang tshigs// lud pa'i dri nga mtshan khung mnyam// ro stod lag pa'i rtsa ba dang // rked pa'i rgyab kyi rtsa nyid ni// dung nyid du ni yongs su grags// ngang pa'i
39a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams dang rked pa nyid/ / brla dang brla ni nye bar mtshon// 'gro ba yi ni lto ba'i rtsa// rkang pa dus kyi me dang ni// pad+ma rkang pa mnga' bdag nyid// rtsar ni blo dang ldan pas shes// gi'u wang 'dod
39a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas kyis gnas/ / rtag tu lci bar mtshon par gsungs// bla ma'i pha rol 'gro ba'i rtsa// de bzhin srin bu 'byung ba'o// gi'u wang dku yi gnas su ni// gtso bo'i dbyings su grags
39a5(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid/ / ri med rkang pa g.yon par gnas// rkeng pa'i gnang dang sna yi rtse// pus mo'i rjes su skyong ba'o// yi dgas brtul zhugs mer bshad pa'o// rtsa nyid yongs su grags pa nyid//
39a6(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo 'byed pa g.yon pa'i rtsa// mchan khung dang ni mchan khung ming // drag po'i tshogs kyi ji bzhin rtsa// dra bas gnas pa'ang de bzhin no// nu ma'i khung gi grangs kyi ni//
39a7(rgyud 'bum): stong gi cha ru de bzhir bshad// de rnams 'byed pa'i rang bzhin rtsa// lus su yongs su grags pa nyid// sa gdugs dpung pa g.yon pa dang // de bzhin brang du yang dag gnas// mtshan
39b1(rgyud 'bum): dang tshigs kyi rtsa yi mtha'/ / de bzhin 'gro ba'i lag pa dang // skye mched drug gi dbye ba yis// rang bzhin gyis ni gru bzhi dang // rang bzhin gyis ni 'bab pa'i gnas// rang dang skyes bu/
39b2(rgyud 'bum): la yang ste// ngor ngam nyid du dngos med cing // 'jig rter la phan snying brtse bas// kur tu 'byung ba skyon med pa'o// 'gro ba'i gnas kyi ye shes cho ga mchog/ dngos med dag pa don dam dbu
39b3(rgyud 'bum): ma pa/ / dang po ma rig nas btsams bcu gnyis sa dbang phyug/ pra Sha bya sogs re pha na// bdud rtsi sbyor ba mi skye'o// dbus su yang dag sbyor ba gnas// srid pa'i nyes pa rnam par spangs//
39b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis sbyor ba'i garas su ri// rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas pas shes// rtsa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// kun nas
39b5(rgyud 'bum): skye ba'i dbye ba'i cha/ / skyes bu so sor gnas pa dang / rtsa dang dbugs ni so so yi// gzhan gyi rkang pa chang pa na// rnam pa yang du bdag po'i rlung // 'byung ba'i rlung ni chad par 'gyur// brang
39b6(rgyud 'bum): go 'og dang rkeng pa'i gong / / rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba// dngos med dngos po yang dag gnas// kha dog med pa'i mtshon kun dngos// gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang //
39b7(rgyud 'bum): sdong dang stong mir ngor gyi gnas// ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rten cing // rnam shes las ni byed pa nyid// bcu gnyis dngos por bsgyur ba'i bdag/ sum brgya/
40a1(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin drug cu ste// chu tshong dbugs ni rtsa bzhin no// swA rbo dkar por rgyu ba nas// rimang mtshan du shes par bya// 'gro ba bcu gnyis bdag thaMd ni// sbyin mtsham
40a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / bcu gnyis sa la chad pa yis// byang du bgrod pa'i mtshan mo'o// lho phyogs su yang sngon bzhin du// nyin mo'i rlung ni chad pa'o// bi shu'i bar du zas sbyar ba// rim bzhin rab
40a3(rgyud 'bum): tu grags pa nyid/ / dbugs kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di// ye shes can gyis las la sbyar// mtha' ma'i yul dang yul 'khor gyis// rim bzhin 'khor lo sgyur ba'o// ro hi ta dang mo hi ta/
40a4(rgyud 'bum): khyu mchog kun nas gnas pa'o// g+hu ru ku rA ma ka ran ta dang // de bzhin rmi lam 'gug pa dang // kun tu rmongs dang 'jig dang 'dod pa yi// bcu gnyis sa ni srid pa'i nyes skyon no// ro hi ta mi
40a5(rgyud 'bum): dus la lha mchod bya/ / mo hI ta la nor rnyed cing // bzang po la ni mdzes par za// mang du khro ba pra Sha b+ha// kur ma mchog tu sems khral can// ma ka ra la gtam gyi gzhi// bla ma sgrub pa'i dngos
40a6(rgyud 'bum): bopo ni/ / ran+da d+ha la ni sdig pa'i blo// byA ku li dang nyid dang ni// sa pa na la rmi lam tshul// rmongs pa sems khral mchog dang ni// glu dang rig pa klog lnga mkhas// 'dod pa la ni 'khrig par bshad//
40a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis srid pa'i nyes skyon no// shel lta bur ni gcig gis gtso// rgyas par tshon rtsi bdun gyis so// de yi rnam shes srid pa'i dngos// yul ni dngos po med par gnas// ye shes kyi le'u/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sku gsum ji ltar stong pa ni// 'di ni dmigs pas bcas pas gzung // rang bzhin dang bral ma yin//
40b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dngos po nam mkhar brtag par bya// dngos po'i nyes pa zad pa yis// gzugs su mi gnas zad pa'o// lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzugs su mi gnas zad par byed//
40b3(rgyud 'bum): phyi stong 'og kyang stong pa nyid// skyon med dbus ni stong pa'o// thams cad stong pa nyid dang ni// 'gro ba'ang stong pa lnga pa'o// yul lnga yang ni stong pa nyid// de bzhin dbang po la sogs pa'ang // stong
40b4(rgyud 'bum): par mi brtag yang dag gnas/ / de phyir rdul med stong pa'i tshul// ji ltar zhing pas zhing ni thams cad thabs kyis yang sbyar nas// thod bas rmo zhing thod pas kun tu rab bsgyur bas// zhing la gnod pa'i
40b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ljon shing rgya cher sel/ / de nas rnam dag gtsang sbra can zhes brjod// de bas mchog tu sbyor ba'i bdag/ gnyis pa yang ni sbyar bar bya// de ltar de bzhin nyid bkru dang // de phyir mkhas
40b6(rgyud 'bum): pas stong pa nyid/ / gsum gyi tshul gyis dag par bya// de bzhin gzugs dang stong pa bzhin// dbus su rnam shes sa bon no// sa bon sa bon myu gu dang // gzugs dang dbang po rtsa yi ga ni/
40b7(rgyud 'bum): rang bani ni tshul gyis cha shas mtshan nyid ni// skyon med rdo rje'i rang bzhin yang dag gnas// dbang po drug dang cho ga drug ni yang dag 'byung // lha mi gnas ni bcu gnyis sa mi sarba dang // sngags kyi/
41a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge mchog nyid ni// yid kyi 'phrul pas bsgrub par bya// e ma'o sems can nyon re mongs// sngags ni u gu u gu dang // nyams pa'i gzugs brnyan mnyam sgom pa/
41a2(rgyud 'bum): snying po nyid kyis rnam par spangs// sngags kyi yi ge dam pa ni// de phyir yid kyi rjes su 'brang // sems can thams cad bskyed cing g.yo zhing bskyed pa yi// sngags ni blo dang ldan pas nges par shes
41a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de nyid med pa'i sngags kyis 'gro ba rmongs par mthong // log par smra ba'i gzugs brnyan sems dang ni// sngags kyi bdag nyid don dam mchog gi yi ge yis// las bzhi cho gar yongs su
41a4(rgyud 'bum): grags pa'o/ / stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// skyon dang yon tan spangs gyur pa'o// dbu ma'i gnas ni skyon med pa'o//
41a5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dag pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus// bdag med rnal 'byor gcig gi yid kyis sbyor bar bya// ji ltar ma bsregs snod kyi chu bzhin du// khyod kyis nang gi rnal 'byor mang du 'jig pa'o//
41a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rdza mkhan gyis ni me ni kun tu gang bas 'gengs// du mar dbus su zad par byas pas rang gi gzugs bzhin no// nang gi ye shes dbang phyug ma ni 'bar ba yis// de yis gzhig pas 'di
41a7(rgyud 'bum): ni grol ba bzhin/ / rang bzhin dag pas dag pa'i chos// dag pa'i dbyangs kyi lam chen po// ma dag rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho ni// rnam rtog bcom pas rnam par spang // dag pa'i chos ni mchog tu zhi//
41b1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos ni skyon med pa'o// dag pas byang chub thob pa'i phyir// dag pa'i chos ni rab tu bstan// dang por gzhu las rgyal ba nyid// gsher ba nub tu mchog tu brtson// sku gsum ma ni lhan cig
41b2(rgyud 'bum): garas/ / blo dang ldan pas lhan cig bskrun// de yi gnas su srog gsungs pa// snga dro skyes bu gnas pa nyid// dbugs ni yang dag 'pho ba'i tshe// rim bzhin bcu gnyis sbyar bar bya//
41b3(rgyud 'bum): lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni// de yi sa bor phyugs su gsungs// chu shing me tog lte bar gnas// snying khar 'greng bar gnas pa nyid// kha ni 'og tu zlum pa nyid// mkhas pa yis ni
41b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par bya/ / bdud rtsi yi ge sgra yis ni// yid 'ong lhan cig dgram par bya// ye shes dbang phyug ye shes rgyal// sgong skes bcu gsum dbang phyug go/ kha dog bdun par rnam mang por//
41b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'od zer nyi ma brgya// ye shes kyis ni ba shes bya ba rtag/ shes byas 'gro ba brtag pa'o// ji ltar dar gyis mig gi bar// blo med tha dad 'gyur ba'o// ji ltar rmongs pa'i
41b6(rgyud 'bum): mi shes pa/ / ye shes kyi ni nyon mongs gcod// de dag mar me'i rgya mtsho yis// ye shes can gyis rang 'dod lam// de nas sems can kun rang bzhin// yan lag rlung gis gzir ba
41b7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ rang dbang nyid dang rlung dang ni// de bzhin ba spu'i bu ga 'di// rlung dang mnyam pa'i lus med cing // rlung gi sems la'ang med pa'o// lus kyi dbyibs nyid la yang ni// stong pa yan
42a1(rgyud 'bum): lag kun la gnas/ / thams cad chu yi rang bzhin nyid// lus po yang ni sems kyis ni// thams cad sha ni chu rang bzhin// chu yis thams cad khyab pa'o//
42a2(rgyud 'bum): sa dang chu yang mtshungs par ni// phyi rol khyab par rtag pa'o// de bzhin lus po yi ni chu// thams cad khyab par yang dag gnas// lus la me ni drod bcas pas// dbyibs la
42a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun nas 'bar/ / sa yis thams cad kun tu ni// gzugs la yor tan dbang pos brgyan// de phyir 'byung ba bzhi yi lus// khams dang rtsa yis khyab pa'o// rtsa ni mnyam pa
42a4(rgyud 'bum): cha yi dngos/ / mnyam pa'i dbyibs su rnal 'byor pas// sgom pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lha rnams lnga ni gang du gnas//
42a5(rgyud 'bum): bug pa gsum dang sgo dgu yi// de bzhin bdag nyid lha yi gnas// rlung bsdam sku yi mer bcas pa'i// snying kha'i sgong skyes kyi ni gnas// phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar// de bzhin sgo nas
42a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshon pa'o/ / sgo dgu yi ni dbyibs nyid dang // 'dab ma brgyad par yang dag grags// phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa bzhi// de ltar lha ni phra zhing phra// lnga pa lnga yi mnga' bdag lha// rang bzhin gyis
42a7(rgyud 'bum): khyab rnam par yang / / so ti ka ni gcig nyid dang // de bzhin chu dang chu min gnyis// de bzhin ji ltar bug pa nyid// tshigs dgu dang ni sgo dgu dang // rtsa dgur yang dag grags pa nyid// dang
42b1(rgyud 'bum): bor stong pa nyid kyi dngos/ / steng dang dbus dang mnyam pa'i gnas// gzugs dang tshor ba mnyam pa yang // dngos med stong pa'i ngo bo'o// rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni// de dbus ge sar bcas
42b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dgu ru chu ni sbyar bar bya// de bzhin pad+ma chu shing gi/ de yi ye shes dbang phyug lha// sgong skyes khyim la mnyam par brten// 'dab ma brgyad la sa bon ni// rim pa ji bzhin rtsa yi
42b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga/ / de yi rgyab kyi rtsa la yang // bdag nyid sgo ni phra ba bzhin// phyi nas bdag nyid rgyan pa ni// kun nas lha yis lhag par brgyan// de yi bdag nyid lhur sbyangs pa// sbyor ba'i lus
42b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni dbyibs/ / sbyor med gal te sbyor byas pas// sngon bzhin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i lus la ni// lhag par lha dang lU yis brgyan// ji ltar gdel pa'i khang pa mer
42b5(rgyud 'bum): bsregs na/ / lha la sogs pa'i gnas su rab byed pa// dge dang rig can mkhas pa mnyam par bsten// de bzhin rmongs pa rgya mtsho lha yi gzhi// sgong skyes kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// /
42b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nges par rnal 'byor pas rngub pa// ji ltar rngub pa'i bdag nyid ni// sgo ni sa bon gyis bsdam bya// sa bon dgu yis bsdams pa
42b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rnal 'byor dgu yi bdag nyid do// ji ltar tshangs pa'i sgo bsdam zhing // mchod rten gyi yang sgo dgu yang // dbugs mi g.yo ba'i dngos po yis// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsdam par bya// bsdus
43a1(rgyud 'bum): nas gnas pa'i mtha' ru ni/ / rang bzhin gyis ni g.yo ba nyid// gzhan yang drag po'i mi gnyis ni// dud pa'i sa bon gyis ni rtse// de ltar rngub pa'i mnyam pa nyid// yi ge
43a2(rgyud 'bum): byed dang gnyis sbyang bya/ / hUM gi rnam pa g.yo ba'i dbyibs// mnyam par rngub pa'i 'bar ba nyid// 'tshe med rnam par rtse ba yi// 'khor ba 'jigs pa bstan par bya// bcu gnyis sa kyi
43a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ma/ / de bzhin dbugs ni brngubs pa yis// tshe rabs sngon gyi sdig pa dang // yul dang dbang po nyes gnas pa// bde sbyor rngub pa'i rgya mtsho yis// ye shes can gyis
43a4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa gcod/ / ji bzhin sngon du mnyam drangs nas// mtha' yi gcig ni bzung byas la// sa bon yi ge gcig bzungs pas// de yis sgo brgyad mnyam pa'o// bcu gnyis spa
43a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgom pa yis/ / sgo brgyad rnam par rtse ba'o// ji ltar rgyal po sbyang bas kun nas rab bsgyur ba// drod dang ba lang rang bzhin lus kyi las// phyis ni rang 'dod rdza rlangs rgya chen po /
43a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin lus ni rang 'dod chen gyis btso// sbyang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'byin byed tshogs ni dgu pa nyid// smra ba'i rna
43a7(rgyud 'bum): par bshad pa nyid/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// bcu gnyis dgu yi rim pa ni// dgu yi sbyor ba la rab rten// 'di yi dgu yi rlung ji bzhin// rnam shes rlung gi dkyil 'khor
43b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ / rlung gi dbus su me yi dbyibs// me yi du ba'i yig de bzhin// u ni re phar yang dag ldan// sgra ni rgya mtshor bshad pa'o// de bzhin thig le ye shes gnas// sgra dang sgra ya sgom
43b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / bshang ba'i sgo nas de bzhin du// srid pa'i nye las yang dga' pho// sna dang rna ba mig las min// mi rnams kyi ri rgyal por 'gyur// lte bar thig le de bzhin te// gong gi gnas ni
43b3(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / sems kyis rtsa dang 'dra ba yi// snying khur de bzhin sbyang ba'o// 'phyar bar rlung gi sa bon ni// mnyam pa'i gnas su shes par bya// de ltar nga yis mtshan nyid bshad//
43b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du bla ma ston pa'o// steng du tshangs pa'i sgo 'di ni// mod la 'pho ba'i ming du bshad// ji ltar bung ba me tog bu gar ni// rgyags pas myos nas sems ni zhu ba ltar// de bzhin ye
43b5(rgyud 'bum): shes dbang phyug sgor gnas pa/ / ud tra na Ta'i mnan pas thams cad 'jig pa'o// e ma'o chos ni mchog gi lam// e ma'o 'khor ba gcod byed pa// e ma'o grol ba'i go 'phang gnas/
43b6(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o ye shes ngo mtshar che// 'pho ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid ldan// dang por
43b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni sbyang bar bya/ / bdag nyid mdun du yang dag gnas// bdag nyid lha dang de bzhin gzhan// shes pa gzhan la rmongs pa rnams// ming gi yi ge mnyam por drang // 'di yi ye shes/
44a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug lha// sgong skyes kyi ni dbus su thim// ye shes lus la bsgoms byas pas// blo ldan lus ni rnam par 'bo// sngon du rngub cing 'byin pa yis// sngon
44a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin lhan cig 'pho ba'o/ / sdig bral spyod pa med pa nyid// sdig spangs spyod pas yang dag gnas// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i sdig pa sbyang // sdig spong de bzhin rmongs pa dang // 'byor pa yis ni
44a3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa spyod / / spyod med sdig pa sbyong ba'o// rtag tu sdig pa spong la gnas// sbyor ba'i lus ni skyor med pa'o// dbugs kyi mtha' ni gnas pa yi// 'di yis steng du grol bar gnas//
44a4(rgyud 'bum): dbugs ni lte bar gtong ba yis// sems ni gzugs med srid par ro// sdig pa kun nas mi gnas pa'o// nyes pa kun gyis gos pa ni// 'pho bas sbyor ba sbyar bar grol// pha dang ma
44a5(rgyud 'bum): rigasang bya zhing / / rgyal po dang ni gtsang sbra gnyis// yul dang bcas pa bcom byas nas// mi de dag pa zhes su brjod// dus la babar 'pho bya ste// dus mir lnga rnams gsod par 'gyur//
44a6(rgyud 'bum): ji srid yur rings 'tshe zhing chos spyod pa// de srid dge ba'i rgyur ni 'phel ba'o// ji ltar bum pa mkhar ri mkhas pa yis// lo dang zla bas gnas ni sdod ni du mas 'geng // mig dang dbyibs
44a7(rgyud 'bum): med 'khor lo 'dzi ba'ang med/ / rnam shes ye shes rnam pa kun tu brtag/ lus la yang dag par 'pho ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya /
44b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i bstan bcos sgrub pa pos// rngub pa'i bdag nyid dbye ba ni// sor bzhi las ni nam mkha' 'o// nam mkha' las ni skar ma dang // gong bu me yi phung po nyid// me yi dbus
44b2(rgyud 'bum): su yi ge a/ / nam mkha' dang ni zla ba dang // dbus su bdud rtsi'i theg pa'o// 'khor lo nyi ma'i dra ba can// bdud rtsi'i thig pa rnam par 'byin// sa bon 'bar zhing 'bar ba yis/
44b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge 'o// dbus su a yig sngon po'o// 'od zer lA ni de bzhin gshegs// ri rab dbus su 'bar ba ni// thig le'i sgo ru snang ba'o// a yig rnam pa'i bdud rtsi'i
44b4(rgyud 'bum): chu/ / kha dog gnyis pa'i lha nyid do// ji ltar bug pa stong pa nyid// rtag tu stong pa'i lha nyid do// sna bug ji ltar bzod pa yis// lce yi yang ni bdud rtsi'o// yi ge gsum ni sbyar bar bya//
44b5(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa mgrin pa dbyangs yig sbyar// u ni rnam pa rim bzhin mchog/ kun nas nyon mongs lhag par sems// hUM gi yi ge dbang phyug mchog/ sngon du pad+ma mnyam pa nyid// sgong skyes sngon du
44b6(rgyud 'bum): bzod pa'o/ / de yi lha ni lhag par rdzogs// 'od zer bye ba rnam mang po// de yi ye shes dbang phyug rgya la// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// stobs 'jig pa yi dbyug pa can//
44b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM gi rnam pa mnga' bdag dbang // lte bar ji ltar gtso bo nyid// e yi rnam pa brda yi lus// kun nas dgod pa rnam par bshad// bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni// bdag nyid lha ni mtsho
45a1(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / bdag nyid gdan du grags pa yis// bdag nyid la ni mchod par bya// bdag gi gdan zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas
45a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / 'od zer gyi ni mtshan nyid dag/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas sa sbyang bar bya'o// hUM gi rnam pas pad+ma bsgyur ba'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhi la ni// cod
45a3(rgyud 'bum): pan rab tu dgod par bya/ / gal te bdag nyid myur 'dod pas// dbugs las lha ni dbyung bar bya// gzugs rdzogs yid du 'ong ba nyid// mchog gi go 'phang bsgom par bya//
45a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas brgyad so so'i lha la ni// phyag rgya brgyad ni bstan par bya// las dang las kyi khyad par la// sngags pas 'di yi sa bor bzla// sa yi rnam pas zhi ba nyid// de bzhin k+Sha yi rnam pas
45a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyus/ / dbang la a yi yi ge shis// ha yi rnam pas mngon par spyod// mchod pa cho ga kun rdzogs pa// gzhan du bltas nas shes par bya// phyis ni las la rab tu 'jug/ rang
45a6(rgyud 'bum): gi lus la thim par bya/ / gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis nyid// lus kyi rtsar
45a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu nges/ / stong phrag dgu yi grangs las ni// bye ba brgya sogs dga' bar gnas// stong pa'i dbyibs ni sngon 'gro bas// blo dang ldan pas sa bon bskrun// zag pa'i lus ni bcom
45b1(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / de yi snying khar pad+ma nyid// sgong skyes stong pa yi ni gzhi// de ltar gnas la mnyam sbyor bas// de yi gnas su shes par bya// nyi ma 'char ba'i 'od zer gyis// phra rab
45b2(rgyud 'bum): rdul bzhin gnas pa nyid/ / pad+ma'i rtsa ni so sor bsdam// de bzhin 'od zer 'bar ba dang // kun tu rdzogs pa'i lus po 'byung // kun tu rdzogs pa lha yi sku// rnal 'byor pa yis kun
45b3(rgyud 'bum): tsalha/ / 'dod khams sring pa'i gzugs can sogs// rgyun du rnal 'byor la brten pas// rten gyi ye shes des mthong ngo // rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// me yi dkyil la
45b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba'o/ / me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o// de dbus
45b5(rgyud 'bum): ji skad gsungs pa yi/ / sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i ming // dngos po mi g.yo bar bsgoms pas// nyon mongs srid pa'i rgya mtsho zad// ye shes nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pas/
45b6(rgyud 'bum): de yi ye shes de dbang phyug/ ji ltar byis pa pa dang ma yi gnas su rje ba ni// tshig nyid dang ni lus ni 'bar zhing g.yo ba yis// phyi nas 'di yi ye shes de ni shin tu sgrim pa'o//
45b7(rgyud 'bum): ltar rnal 'byor bla mas bstan pa yang // sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas gnan yang bshad bya ba// sbyor ba mchog ni mnyam pa
46a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / rang bzhin med pa bya ba'i tshig/ lhag pa'i gnas su lus bral ba// phra ba'i dngos po gsangs pa med// rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsdam par bya// de bzhin mchod
46a2(rgyud 'bum): rten dbang phyug go/ / chu min nas ni gyen du dbug/ de bzhin lto ba rlung gis gang // ye shes thig le gnas nas gnas// rnam par shes pa nges pas thim// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med
46a3(rgyud 'bum): par/ / mnyam par gzhag pa'i ngo bos sgom// rlung gi dkyil 'khor brngubs pa yi// dbus su ye shes skyon med pa'o// bla ma'i bshad pa'i lam gyis ni// rtag tu nges par blta ba'o//
46a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu gtam gyis rmongs nas su// gnyis ka 'thag pa phrad nas gtam gyis spras pa dang // lam ni ji ltar bstan kyang gzung bar mi nus pa// de ltar rnal 'byor pa ni lam
46a5(rgyud 'bum): ngan bstan pa bzhin/ / gsang ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya// ma
46a6(rgyud 'bum): grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ / de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir// bdag gi sbyor ba'i bsam gtan bya// lus kyi rnam pa gsum nyid dang // ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi
46a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gsum nyid ni/ / lus kyis srung zhing rab tu bsdam// gnyis kyis gnas ni mngon par spyad// ye shes can gyis thar pa bsten// skad cig longs spyod de bzhin sdug/ gnyis med
46b1(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig bstan par bya/ / tshe'ang nyid la sems can rnams// skad cig phun tshogs skad cig rgud// de bzhin rmongs pa'i longs spyod ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bltos mi bya// de phyir
46b2(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa yi ni gnas/ / 'gro ba'i nyes pa srid pa'i dngos// longs spyod lhag pa'i gnas gcig gis// 'bras bu 'dod pa go zlog pa'o// sems can sprin la sred pa yi// longs spyod kyi ni gnas
46b3(rgyud 'bum): su brjod/ / de phyir gnyis pa'i lam spangs la// rnal 'byor pa yis de bzhim dbus// sbyor ba'i chos ni mnyam dmigs pas// sbyor ba'i chos ni skyon med pa'o// bdag med lus ni yang dag
46b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / bdag med la ni mnyam par brten// rtogs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// snying khar zla ba bzhag byas la//
46b5(rgyud 'bum): de dbus bdud rtsi yi ge ni// rnam pa kun tu bdud rtsi sngags// 'od zer 'bar bas bsgom par bya// zhi ba'i gnas su sbyar ba yis// rnal 'byor par ni yongs su grags// ji ltar de yi
46b6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyid/ / tse tsa yi ges rnam par brgyar// gser gyi mdog ltar yid 'ong gzugs// 'od zer sna tshogs bsgoms pa yis// don 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas// de ltar rgyas par sbyor ba'o// /
46b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM gaM rnam pa dbang gi dngos// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa// 'od zer du ma'i cho ga nyid// dbang nyid du ni yongs su grags// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rlung gi dkyil 'tsho
47a1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i gzhi/ / ji bzhin 'od zer sngon po 'bar// mngon par spyod par rab tu grags// las kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bco lnga pa'o//
47a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyor ba'i zas stan+da zhes bya yod// 'dab mu 'o ma 'dzag pa dang // de bzhin me tog yo rdeg/ dri na gri nom rnam par byed// mdog ni ljang dang ster
47a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / rtsa ba gcig dang dbang nyid da // ji ltar me bzhin 'tsher ba'o// bdud rtsi'i yi ge sgom pa yis// mchod dang bzlas pa'i cho gar sbyar// mar dang sbrang rdzi mnyam pa'i char// srang no re re
47a4(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba nyid/ / brgya dang de bzhin brgyad cu nyid// mkhas pa yis ni bza' bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis lo brgya ru// dben pa'i ri la gnas na ni// ye shes can gyis ye shes lus//
47a5(rgyud 'bum): nges par yongs su rgyas par 'gyur// dbang po rnams kyis sred pa dang // bkres pa la sogs med par 'gyur// gnas ni nges pa nyid kyi mchog/ rtsa ba rnal 'byor sbyor ba bcas//
47a6(rgyud 'bum): de ltar thos pa'i bdag nyid che// sbyor ba'i bstan bcos skyon med pa'o// tha mal 'gro bar nges pa ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang 'dzin// de ni yang so sa rnal 'byor pa//
47a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes can gyis ye shes rtogs// lnga pa'i lnga pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs so// / mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan shes rab
47b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po sbas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad/ / dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa// rtag tu kun ras rngub pa'i
47b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mi mthur dgra ni dus dang dus su g.yul 'gyer pa'o/ / chags med ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad// hUM gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos// hUM gi rnam
47b3(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog gi lha/ / hUM gi rnam pa stong gyur pa// yi ge hUM la phyag 'tshal bstod// yi ge brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid// spyod bcas mi spyod gsang ba dang // chu dang me dang de bzhin rlung // sa ni mag
47b4(rgyud 'bum): gi yi ge'o/ / sgo bzhi dang ni phung po bzhi// sgong skyes dza lar gnas pa nyid// bzhi po nyon mongs ming dang ni// yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du// rmongs pas sa dang nyon mongs dang // sngon du
47b5(rgyud 'bum): phyugs ni mnyam pa dang / / chu shing me tog pad+ma ni// 'di yi sgong skyes bstan nyid do// ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni// bdud rtsi brgyad kyis rnam par dbye// shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi//
47b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po yi ni snying po'i mchog/ lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang // nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o// sa ni mig la bya ba ste// tshangs par me ni de bzhin 'bar// rmongs pa yis ni mgrin par ro//
47b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'i snying la gnas pa dang // thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni// phyugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad la dgod pa yis// 'di yis lha nyid yang dag shes// yi ge brgyad
48a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ kyi sngags 'di ni// phyag rgya brgyad du rab tu grags// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// gnag cing 'bar ba'i las la ni// las rnam pa ni la lha mo so// mangs
48a2(rgyud 'bum): pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas/ / ye shes dbang phyug snying po nyid// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba dang // phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun// las dang las kyis rnam par dkris// thams cad
48a3(rgyud 'bum): chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ / mnyam par 'jig byed me dang yang // ji ltar rtag pa rlung dag dang // dang ba'i don dang sa dbang po// lhag ma sa bzhin brtsegs pa ni// bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o// 'gro
48a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don phyir yi ge brgyad/ / lha brgyad du ni yongs su grags// mnyam bzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis// sngon du reg cing
48a5(rgyud 'bum): reg pa nyid/ / 'jig rten 'dir ni bde ba dang // rtag tu mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni// gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas// bdag gi de nyid mnan pa yis//
48a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sngags 'di 'grub par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis// sbyor ba'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya// dri zhim rab grags me tog kun nas grags pa dang // nag po'i a ka ru dang
48a7(rgyud 'bum): gu gul kun nas mar me dang / / gnyis med gtor ma gcig gis yid ni yang dag ldan pa yis// lha mo ma mo rnam pa kun nas rab tu mchod// yi ge brgyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang
48b1(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / / de nas gsang ba'i yan lag gi/ thig le la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khams gsum skyes pa bza' byas nas// ye shes dngos po gnas pa bzhin// lha
48b2(rgyud 'bum): yi dngos po dbyer med pas/ / steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni// thams cad kun nas stong pa nyid// ri rab gling gzhan zad byas nas// mnyam nyid sbyor ba kun tu bsam// thams
48b3(rgyud 'bum): cad sdom pa dbye ba yis/ / de yi me tog thig le yi// thig le'i dbus su gsal ba'o// ye shes rdul ni rnam par thim// ye shes blo dang ldan pas shes// kha dog med cing mtshon kun
48b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos/ / gzugs med ye shes gzugs bzhin no// ring ba ma yin thung ba min// mi ldan pa dang ldan pa nyid// gzugs dang stong pa'i de bzhin dbus// lhan cig ye shes gzung bar bya//
48b5(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni// rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o// ye shes rdo rjes bcom byas nas// snang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// me yi
48b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/ / me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de dbus ji
48b7(rgyud 'bum): skad gsungs pa yi/ / ye shes dang ni rnam shes sems// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// ye shes kyi thig le'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/
49a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'o// sngon gsungs mtshan nyid dang ldan pas// sngon du ldan cig bsgoms pa yis// dkar pos lus ni bsdam par bya// ma
49a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas su 'bar ba yi/ / ji skad sngon du gsungs pa'i rlung // dbus su mchod rjen sbyang bar bya// rlung dang me yi bdun ngon la// snying rje'i sa bor bsgom byas la// skra dang thig
49a3(rgyud 'bum): les mnyam par brgyan/ / char gyi rgyun zhes bshad pa yin// rgyas pa lnga yi sgo nyid la// 'a dog dkar po bsgom par bya// sgo gnyis mngon par bstan pa ri// de bzhir chu dang chu mir
49a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / yi ge gnyis 'gyur zigs pa dang // rtsa ba ra sma ri sbyar bar bya// 'di yis lus ri bsdam bya zhing // pe ni sgo ru bsam brjer pa// ka ba gcig dang sgo gsum gyi// ya shes
49a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su thim pa nyid/ / bzlog par bya ba'i sa bon ni// sbyang bya'i yi ge phyed pang gnyis// brgyad kyi mtha' la gsum pas drangs// sa bon 'di ni drag po'i ye// rlung gi dkyil 'khor
49a6(rgyud 'bum): la rten la/ / sems 'di yis ri dmigs par bya// steng du tshangs pa'i sgo 'di ni// tshigs dgu yi ni mchog gi gdan// lus med sems kyi ngo bo yis// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par
49a7(rgyud 'bum): bya dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ / dus min lha rnams gsod pa nyid// sdig gis kun nas mi gos te// 'khor ba'i pha rol mchog tu sgrol// 'pho bar sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste
49b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / // sngon gsungs mtshan nyid ldan par ni// sngon du stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// de yi lus ni sbyang bar bya// sbyor bas bsgom pa'i lus can ni//
49b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med par sgom pa'i dngos// gang zhig dngos por rnam rtog pa'i// dngos por sgom pa'i sa bor gyis// stong pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya// dgod bya'i yi ge rnam bkod pa/
49b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ zhabs phyed phyag na rdo rje dang // lus ni dril bu 'jam pa'i dbyangs// de bzhin mgo ni byams pa dang / ma
49b4(rgyud 'bum): yi rnam pa steng 'bar ba/ / 'khor ba rnam par grol bar mdzad// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por// kun nas stong pa'i dbus su bsam// rnam shes ye shes sa bon gyis// dbus dang /
49b5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rnam par dkris// bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog brtson pas// rang gi steng du bsam par bya// dang por dkar po kun ras bsam// gnyis pa de ba'ir ser po'o// gsum par
49b6(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig dmar po dang / / bzhi pa la ni sngor po nyid// mnyam bzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming shes pa// gsang tshig gsang ba
49b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen po/ / bdag gi gdan zhes bya ba le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// tsha ba'i sa bor bye brag ni// lto ba'i thab khung 'di yi me// lto ba'i
50a1(rgyud 'bum): me du shes par bya/ / shar gyi la'i dkar po'o// rlung gi de bzhi mi ser po tshad// nub kyi phyogs su dmar ba ste/ lho lcags su ni rig por zag+sas/ da
50a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i kha dog nyid / / me lnga ru ni bsam par du// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i ming zhes pa// shar g+hi mar ni rab tu dzag/ drag mo mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba// byang gi phyogs su rnam pa
50a3(rgyud 'bum): ban/ / ro la mas zhes bshad pa'o// rab kyi phyogs su rab tu byor/ yal 'gro gtum mo zhes d+ha'i ming / phyogs kyi rnam mi ming // dadus su me sa 'di mi
50a4(rgyud 'bum): ma ra' 'gro zhes bya'i ming / pad+ma'i gang na la btsugs pa ni// m+b+ha'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing // lag mardo rje la T+wA~M dang / me 'bar ba dang ma'am pa'i 'od/ gzugs mtha
50a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa cwapa/ / khro bo'i gzugs su bsgom par bya// ma li las raM yi ge brgyad// 'byar ba po mi sgor mi thim// mkha sdebs phyis ni bdag nyid lngas// gnas lA ru ra~M sbyin sreg bya/
50a6(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis dbugs mi rab bsdams nas// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// gang TIg cung zad bza' btung rnams// sbyin sreg tu brtags bza' bar bya// dang po dgra yi yi ge dang /
50a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gnyis pa gnyis 'gyur gnyis// gsum pa glo ru re pha dang // bzhi pa'i steng du thig ler bcas// lnga pa steng du 'bar ba nyid// sa bon lnga la bzlas shing sreg/ de ltar bsgoms
50b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ / rgyas pa'i sbyor bar grags pa'o// le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o// // de nas dag pa rnam gsum bya// swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba dArmA sA b+hA ba shud+d+hoH
50b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho u0f85haM/ de ltar spyod pa'i sbyor bas ni// yid ni dag par byed pa'o// thams cad kun nas stong nyid kyis// der ni chu 'di bsam p
50b3(rgyud 'bum): ar bya/ / kun nas chu yi gzugs dang ni// de yi dbus su pad+ma na// rgya chen yid la 'dod bzhin du// gser gyi grong khyer 'byung ba ri// rin chen bdun gyis rnam par brgyar// seng ge'i gdan
50b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi gdan la ni/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// dbus su ye shes bsam pa ni// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i ming nyid de// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor sdod// rab tu bzhad pas 'jigs par
50b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / na bza' dmar po gtsigs pa'o// dbu skra sil bur rab tu grags// ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya'i ming // sems dpe'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// ji skad gsungs pa'i
50b6(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol tu/ / de yi gzugs kyi logs nyid du// ji ltar phyogs kyi mdog nyid ni// kun ras de yi phyag rgya rig/ lnga pa'i bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// rtag tu ma rong dang gtor ma dbul//
50b7(rgyud 'bum): chu la yi ni bdag nyid rnams// chu dang me rang de bzhin g.yo// ji ltar rlung du ngu ba bzung // ye shes rdo rjes dkris pa ni// lnga pa'i lha nying 'byung ba ni// lnga pa nyid du bsgom par bya// gi'u
51a1(rgyud 'bum): wang gnyis ni mA ma kI/ / de yi gcig ming dung rtsi'o// A li kA li rab sbyor bas// gnyis bya de nyid rab tu bya// A li zhes pa bung bar gsung // kA li
51a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs ma nyid/ / ji ltar sde tshar gsum pa yi// yi be bsum pa bzung byas te// rdo rje yi ni dbyug pa nyid// 'og pag sogs pas dkri bar bya// sa bon he na mchog bsam par/
51a3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis sdig pa gcod// pad+ma'iri dbang phyug sku ni gser mdog yid du 'ong // dri yi ngo bo shin tu snang mdzad dang // ro na rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje phyag/ lnga gsum dag gi tshe ga shes par bya
51a4(rgyud 'bum): ha zhes bya bas kha dog 'phrog/ ho zhes bya bas dri med cing // dpa' bo hri yis 'joms pa ni// rim pa 'di bzhin shes par bya// gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// /

51a6(rgyud 'bum): mas khyab par 'char bar ston pa dang / / ji ltar rlung gis dri ri mnyam par len pa ltar// rnam rtog ring du spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon gsungs mtshan nyid ldan par ni// nyi ma'i
51a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su chu dkyil 'khor/ / chu yi dbus su pad+ma ni// rang 'dod pad+ma bsam par bya// gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa'i dngos// rin chen bdun gyis rnam par brgyan// seng ge'i garan la
51b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'o// na bza' sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang // gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs// dgod bya'i yi ge rnam par bkod// nyi ma'i dkyil
51b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus su yang / / dbus su ye shes rnam shes ni// gzugs la yon tan dbang pos brgyar// dang po'i sgra yig dang po dang // de bzhin gshegs la nyis 'gyur nyid// gsum
51b3(rgyud 'bum): la logs su re pha dang / / bzhi pa'i sdang du thag ler bcas// phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu ni// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po// mtshams su yi dgas gdan la ni// ma ning yi/

51b7(rgyud 'bum): yid kyi mar me sbar bar bya/ / sngon du rdzas ni lnga pa la// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin gyis brlabs// sngon du gsungs pa'i bdud rtsi ni// dpa' bo'i lus la gzung bar bya// lcags kyus
52a1(rgyud 'bum): / lha rnams thams cad ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge tshim par bya// A li kA'i rab sbyor bas// dpa' bo'i dbus su byin gyis brlabs// A liri shes pa mA ma kI/

52a6(rgyud 'bum): bapar bya/ / mnyam nying lta ba'i ye shes kyis// mkhas pas gtor ma sbyin par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// mthe'u chung gnyis ni
52a7(rgyud 'bum): spel byas nas/ / sdigs mdzub gnyis ni bsgreng byas nas// 'di ltar gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste// mkha' 'gro lnga ni kun gyi'o// ba dan gsum pa'i snying khar sbyin// steng du khu chu
52b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bcas/ / 'di ni pho nya'i phyag rgya'o// brgyad mtha' dang po'i sa bon dang // dgu yi mtha' ni byang du shar// shar dang nub kyi sa bon dang // lho yi gsum par mngon par gzung /
52b2(rgyud 'bum): pho nya bzhi yi sa bon 'di// sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya// shar du bdud rtsi drag po yis// sa bon dbus su sbyar bar bya// ji ltar las la sogs sbyar ba// 'bum phrag gsum gyis
52b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'grub/ / tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// smyung bar gnas pa'ang med pa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// rtag tu 'bad pas mchog tu bsgrub// dam tshig la gnas
52b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo che/ / 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs gcod// dag pa'i chos la dmigs pa yis// dag pa'i dbyangs ni lam po che// chos chen po ni legs par 'ongs// ro ni mchog tu
52b5(rgyud 'bum): zhim pa'o/ / srid pa'i mgon po rgya che ba// sangs rgyas gar la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs bcad 'di yis dbul bar bya// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi bdag nyid lU la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'di nyid
52b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe la 'khor bar gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tshigs bcad 'di yis blang bya zhing // tshigs bcad 'di yis rab tu zad// pad+ma pad+mar bsgyur ba'i gdan la ni// steng du rdo rje bstan par bya//
52b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bdud rtsi ri rab kyis bsrubs nas// mtheb mdzub gnyis ni sa yi steng du 'thor 'thung dbul// rgyas pa'i mchod rten lnga la ro yi lan lnga ru/ bdud rtsi chu yis mchod rten dbus su
53a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / gzhan gyi gdan gyi bangag nyid dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o// / gzhan yang gtor ma'i las bshad pa// logs su
53a2(rgyud 'bum): gru gsum bya ba ni/ / khrag sogs kyis ni bya ba 'am// g.yon pa khu tshur bcings byas la// dbus ma khro bo brkyang bar bya// dbus ma yi ni gsum pa la// sdigs mdzub bkug la
53a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / du ba'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang bar bya'o// oM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+ShA ya/ ma hA pu dza b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// kun nas gtor//
53a4(rgyud 'bum): ma rdzogs byas la// lnga pa'i rdzas kyis sbyar bar bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri dang brag dang phug gis// yul gyi mdo dang lam dang zhing // khyad par du ni khyim stong nyid// shing
53a5(rgyud 'bum): chen shing gi bdag po dang / / khyad par du ni chu mig nyid// snod dang thang dang sa stong dang // khyad par gdol pa'i khyim gnas pa// nag mo drag po drag chen po// lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang /
53a6(rgyud 'bum): nag po gtsigs byed 'jigs byed pa// dga' las 'das pa bgegs rgyal po// rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang // 'jigs byed ma dang u mas bstod// rgyal mo rnam par rgyal mo dang // thub
53a7(rgyud 'bum): med gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ / nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo// nag mo nag mo rnal 'byor ma// dbang byed ma dang zla ba mo// drag mo sdang ba'i lam pa ki/ 'phrog byed ma dang me mar ma/
53b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jib byed yul gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thod car ma// thod 'phreng thod pa'i 'phreng can ma// kha T+wAM ga ma rdzu 'phrul che// ral gri
53b2(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta'i lag pa dang / / rdo rje de bzhin gzhu lag ma// mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i de nyid che// las kun rjes su sgrub pa yi// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen po'i// rdo rje dba' phyub de bzhin gtso// de bzhin
53b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i sku chen mo/ / gos med sbyor ba'i lha byed ma// rdo rje dbang phyug ma bka' yis// thams cad thams cad 'gug pa'o// oM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba de ba lo ki ni ra ka ka kaN
53b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ kha kha kha Da ni/ ba ba ban d+ha ri hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ sha dang wa yis sbyar ba yi// oM gyis spyan drang gtor ma sbyin// ji ltar las la sogs brtsam pa// bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang /
53b5(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rdul 'byor pas// nam ngan du ni gtor ma sbyin// ye shes can gyis dpal 'dod pas// lhag pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya// oM ha li bi li badz+ra/
53b6(rgyud 'bum): ma tha ma tha yo gi ni hUM phaT/ gzhan gyi gdan gyi le'u na bya ba ste bdun pa'o// / sngags kyi yi ge yi ge ni// yid kyi sprul pas bsgrub par bya// snying rje'i sems ni rnam spangs nas/
53b7(rgyud 'bum): zhabs pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par bsgom// sngags dang dur ngur ches brjod pa// e ma sems can nyon ri mongs// des ma yid la mngon 'dod pa'o// sngags kyi yi ge mchog nyid ni/
54a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba rmongs pas de nyid med sngags dang // log par smra ning gzugs brnyan sems dang bral// sngags kyi bdag nyid blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// las ba'i
54a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par yongs su grags pa nyid/ / skyes pa du ma'i gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa// nus mthu'i mtshan nyid kun nas thams cad ni// g.yo zhing 'thab pa phra zhing gos pa med// sngags dang
54a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi bdag nyid mchog gi yi ge'o/ / gzugs la sogs pa kur 'jig pas// thams cad nam mkha' sgom pa'o// khams drug dang ni dbang po drug/ dbus ma'i khams nyid 'jig pa dang /
54a4(rgyud 'bum): stong pa bco brgyad blo ldan gyis sgom pa// sems can sgom pa'i dngos po yis// stong pas thams cad 'jig pa'o// shar du kha dog dkar po dang // byang phyogs su ni ser po'o// rin chen
54a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i 'od 'bar ba/ / lho phyogs su ni sngon po nyid// dbus su mnyam pa'i gnas su yang // mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// A li kA li rab sbyor ba// de yi sa bon dbyung bar bya/
54a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbus ni mchog nyid du// gang zhig dbus su zla ba dang // zla ba'i dbus su sa bon ni// 'od zer 'bar ba bsgom par bya// tshon sna bdur ri sna tshogs pa// 'od zer 'bar ba
54a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i 'od/ / gong du bla ma'i yi ge dang // tha ma sreg pa'i yi ge dang // dbus su sa bon bzhag byas pa// mnyam gzhag bzlas su 'ong ba yis// 'bum phrag gsum du mkhas pas
54b1(rgyud 'bum): bzla/ / sbyor ba'i gangan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'o// / sngon gsungs mtshan zhing dang ldan pas// sngon bshang stong pa nyid kyi gni/
54b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes can gyis mnyam bzhag pas// gzugs la sogs pa gzhig par bya// kun nas stong pa'i dbus su ni// mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya// 'khor lo kA nyi ma 'dra ba// 'od
54b3(rgyud 'bum): zer kun nas yang dag gnas/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun tu// dpag tu med par bsam par bya// thig le thig le phra ba'i gnas// 'jig rten 'jig rten kun mkhyen bcas//
54b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// me yi dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zla ba'i
54b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ / de dbus ji skad gsungs pa yi// rnam shes ye shes sems dpa' 'o// spyi bor thams cad bsam pa'o// yi ge yi ge steng du bcas// smra ba'i
54b6(rgyud 'bum): sa bon thams cad ni/ / de ni rgyal po zhes su brjod// ye shes dang na rnam shes dbyibs// rlung gi dbus su btung bar bya// sa bon de yis sbyar bya ba// sgra ni steng dang steng
54b7(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / de ltar sa bon mchog bsam pa// ye shes rnam shes ming nyid do// 'od zer 'bar ba rnams dmar po// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya// bdud pa'i mtha' ni yang dag blang //
55a1(rgyud 'bum): gang gis bcud rtsis bon bzhin// gang zhig bzlas pas dkris pani// kha dog pa/ po bsam par bya// sgra mig dang por grang byas la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
55a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis dkris pa'o/ / dgu mtha'i sa bon yi ge ni// logs su me yis sbyar bar bya// gzhan du rlung gi sa bon dang // rlung gi ngos su mngon par bsam// thams cad kun nas sgom pa ni/
55a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes thig le bya ba'i ming // sdig byed blun po'i sems can rnams// sbyor ba 'di yis dag par bya// sa bon las ni snying rjer bskyed// de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshan nyid shes// dbus su
55a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad lus/ / rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' brgyan// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// ting 'dzin kun nas yang dag gnas// dbus su 'di ni bsam par bya// rin chen 'bar bas
55a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bigs pa yi/ / mgrin par re ba'i thig le dang // bsgrub bya'i mdun du bsgom bya ba// lan bdun pa yi 'byed pa ni// mda' yi rtse mor sa bon bsam// kha dog dkar po kang ba bzhin//
55a6(rgyud 'bum): mnga' 'dren pa yis dbyig pa yis// sngags pas sa bon bzlas par bya// phyag rgya'i rnam pa bcing ba dang // sa bon sems kyis bzla bar bya// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas rnal 'byor pas
55a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin myur du mngon par 'gugs/ / yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang // rtsa bar nga ro sbyar bar bya// de ni bdud rtsi yid 'ong ming // 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung
55b1(rgyud 'bum): po bzhin du dri za dang / / mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma bshad pa// gnod spyir yi dgas grul bum dang // rdo rje lha mo rnal 'byor ma// gal te 'dong ra phran tshegs min// sbyor bas myur du 'jug/
55b2(rgyud 'bum): par byed// dmar po cher pos kur tu rmongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir sbyor ba'i gdam te le'u gnyis pa'o// // gzugs kun zad par byas nas ni// gzugs ni mi gnas
55b3(rgyud 'bum): zad par 'gyur/ / skar ma'i rnam pa'i dbyibs su ni// dang por stong pa mngon bsam bya// mnyam nyid lta bar bskyed byas nas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang
55b4(rgyud 'bum): phyug mgon/ / gu gul phyag na rdo rje dang // yan lag 'jam dbyangs dril bu mchog/ byams pa zla ba'i rim nyid// ma zhes bya ba steng 'bar ba// rnam par 'khor bsgrol bar mdzad// sa bon
55b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi 'bras bu ni/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por// lha nyid lnga ni bsgom par bya// ri rab rtse ru gzhal yas khang // rin chen kun gyis rnam
55b6(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / gdan du me tog sngon po ni// bung ba'i zas su za ba nyid// me tog myur du za ba rnams// sbrang rtsi mnyam pa'i gnas nyid do// steng du 'phro ba'i yi ge ni// sangs rgyas kun
55b7(rgyud 'bum): tu 'thon pa'o/ / chu dang nam mkha' rlung gi ni// sa bon bzhi yis lha nyid do// dbyibs ni ban du ka ltar gyes// kha dog li kri'i sems kyis ni// lha mo mA ma kIr sbyor bas// ri rab rtse
56a1(rgyud 'bum): mor bsam par bya/ / dpa' bo rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// lha rnams kun gyi bdag nyid do// phyag rgya gnyis dang mngon ldan pa'i// rtse mo gsum gyis 'jig pa'o//
56a2(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas su gnon pa ni// rkang pa gnyis kyis rnam par mnan// tshoms kyis ma mchu ba tsir nas ni// gzugs dang gzugs la lta ba nyid// bru~M gi glu yi rnam pa dang // sgra yang der gyur par
56a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / bdud rtsi re ba thig le dang // lcags kyu yis ni gtse bar bya// lha mo sngags kyi kun nas zlos// rdo rje can dang pad+ma'i gdan// ji ltar sde pa gsum pa yi// yi ge gsum pa bzung
56a4(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / glo ru rdo rje dbyug pa dang // gnyis pAr 'og pag gos ming kri// sngags pa mchog gis bon 'di// kun nas ban+d+ha nIng sngon du gzung // lha rnams kun nas mnyes byas nas/
56a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi rdzus ni bza' bar bya// rgyal pos spro zhing bsten pa yis// dbang gi las ni mngon du brtsam// rab mon dman pa'i rigs lnga ni// sngon du las ni sbyar bar bya// mnyam pa'o//
56a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi me tog la// rgyas pa'i las ni bza' bar bya// bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs kyis// zhi ba'i las ni ngi las mchog/ las bzhi mngon par sbyor ba yis// rigs kyi bye zab
56a7(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya/ / bdud rtsi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bso// rjes gzhan dag ni bsgom par bya// dbang po'i lag pa shu dag phun dang // rmongs byed dang ni de bzhin gur gum dang // ku dza matsar
56b1(rgyud 'bum): zla bdud nyid kyis/ / 'di nyid kyis ni rab tu sbyar bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la// gnyis med gtor ma sbyin par bya// sdug 'phongs la ri rjes brtse bas// sems can don
56b2(rgyud 'bum): du las brtsam bya/ / 'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te// longs spyod phyir du brten pa min// khro med rmongs pa med pa yis// sems can don du sbyang bar bya// sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba stere
56b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / // lce la chu ni rnam par sbyar// nam mkha' rnga ba sna gnyis la// sa ni chu la yang dag gsungs// mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa dang ri// g.yo ba snying la
56b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'o/ / non mongs kun nas thong ka dang // phyugs ro lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad la dgod pa ni// lha nyid dang ni sbyar bar bya// ye shes mkha' 'gro bsam bya ba// rgyan
56b5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/ / las kyis sogs rab sbyar ba// kha dog gcig pa'i rnam par bya// mtheb mo sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad// rnam par shes pa'i nang du 'pho// phyi rol nyis 'gyuras
56b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag la/ / dbugs kyi las la sogs pa bya// lto bar me yi lha bsam pa// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i ming nyidang do// dbugs la bdud rtsi yang dag spyir// kun ras sngor gyi mtshar nyid kyis
56b7(rgyud 'bum): khwa rnams la ni sreg blugs dbul/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par brgyan// mchog gi dbus ras sa bon ni// A li kA li las byung ba// kha dog
57a1(rgyud 'bum): dam sa 'da'abar ga/ sa lha sogs pa'i d+hI ts+tsha u0f7f// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs kyis ni// sbyor ba gnyis pa'i phyi rol tu// ma 'on mapa' sa m
57a2(rgyud 'bum): o bsdum/ / 'dog nag po 'da'abar ba// smyon gyi sha ka'i sa thon ni// oM dang ri bu'i thog le can// mnga' la gams pas brdeg par bya// sa bon+da dbus su son sa nas/
57a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi dbugs ni 'jog par bya// bdud rtsi yi gi sbyar byas la// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// byin nas bdag gi las la ni// ma shes
57a4(rgyud 'bum): ma la 'gro sgyur ba btsun/ / oM A k+Sha rang d+ha nAn+t+ra/ rgud chen po mas 'on bzlas// 'jig rten gsum po 'bral du sgrub// sbyor ba'i gdan las 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i ts+tsha
57a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ste bani pa'o/ / mangs rdzogs gzugs ni 'od zeraru bcas// dpral bar zla ba bsim par bya// dbus sus zin hUM rang bzhin// khangs
57a6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po rab mdzes pa/ / rgyu pAcoM lnga bur rab tu 'jigs// khwa dog bdun pa rgya re po/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig na khams kun gyi// gzugs rnams thams cad bcom nas
57a7(rgyud 'bum): bdagazhi nam mkha'i nam mkha' nyid/ / dbyibs dang gzugs ni thams cad pa// sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun gyis so// chu yi dbus su pad+ma'o// gzhal yas khang pa bsam par
57b1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen bdun gyis mngon par mdzes/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM gi rnam pa med bzhin 'bar// spyi bo'i steng du rdzogs par bya// brang du dri med zla ba dang //
57b2(rgyud 'bum): dril bu snying po ngos nyid // lte bar dbyug pa gsang bar 'dzin// gya gya rkang pa'i gdan nyid du// pad+ma'i gdan la rab tu sprul// gzugs rdzogs pa las rdo rje ni// rdo rje sems
57b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bdag ces brjod/ / dar gyis bcings shing cod pan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// kha dog dkar po mchog tu 'bar// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan//
57b4(rgyud 'bum): na bza' sngon po rab tu mdzes// rdo rje dril bu phyag gnyis na// de ltar bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod// brgyad kyi mtha' la rtsa bar rlung //
57b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rtsa bar re pa sogs// gsum pa yis ni rnam par 'dren// steng du thig le'i sa bon gyis// 'di yis 'jig rten gsum po skrag/ rdo rje sa bon rnal 'byor pas// khams
57b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum thams cad 'dren pa dang / / rlung gi bdag nyid thams cad pa'o// sa bon dbus su gnod sbyin ming // de bzhin lha yi ming nyid do// sa bon dbus su ming rnams ni// thams cad
57b7(rgyud 'bum): me yi dbang phyug nyid/ / 'bum phrag gsum bzlas rnal 'byor pas// rgyas par yongs su grags pa nyid// mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis// 'grub par 'di la the tshom med// phyag 'tshal
58a1(rgyud 'bum): / mig pa par bdagag/ sngon du brten pa'i rnam pa bya// gsang paba'i gdun zhes bya ba rgyas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dang po'i/ sor
58a2(rgyud 'bum): bani pa ni nam mkha' 'o/ / gang zhig nam mkhar skar ma nyid// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od zer mes// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun dang // khams gsum skyes pa zad byas nas
58a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun nas 'bar ba me/ / me yi gzugs kyang de bzhin zad// de nyid lnga yi khyad par nyid// shar du rdo rje dkar po'o// ser po'i rdo rje byang du'o// nub tu rdo rje dmar po nyid/
58a4(rgyud 'bum): lho ru sngon po'i rdo rje can// kun nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od// dbus su mnyam pa'i kha dog nyid// thams cad kun nas sngon po yi// dbang po'i gzugs ni rdo rje 'jig/ sor bani pA yi nam
58a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhar ni/ / sgrol ma yi ni mtshan nyid ni// A li kA lir rab sbyor ba'i// de yi sa bon 'byung ba'o// dbus su sgrol ma gzhag bya ba// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod par bya// rmya shing me
58a6(rgyud 'bum): lte bar gnas/ / snying khar 'greng bar gnas pa nyid// rtag tu kha ni mar phyogs pa// mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya// rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad par 'gyur// gsungs pa'i gsar gyis
58a7(rgyud 'bum): ni brgyan/ / de dbus zla ba dkar po ni// 'o ma zla ba de yi dbus// 'di ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba'i gdan gyi ming nyid yin// gzugs la sogs pa'i mi gzung zhing // stong
58b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems kyang ma yin no/ / gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus// ye shes can gyis de bzhin gzung // mnyam nyid ye shes thams cad kyi// kun nas lta ba thams cad rig/ bla mas
58b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i lam gyis ni/ / rtag tu nges par blta bar bya// ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu gtam gyis rmongs nas su// gnyis ka 'thab pa phrad cing gtam ni smras pa dang // lam ni ji ltar bstan kyang
58b3(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar mi nus pa/ / de bzhin rnal 'byor pa ni gzhon nus bstan pa bzhin// rnal 'byor pa yis thos tsam gyis// nyon mongs ring du spong bar byed// gang zhig sbyor ba bsten pa yis// sangs
58b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas 'bras bu myur du 'thob/ / gang gis sna tshogs bsten pa yis// de yis las ni 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad rgyud du bshad pa ni// rnam shes lhan cig sbed par byed// ji ltar sems
58b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis kun nas ni/ / nan tan gyis ni ye shes sbyar// gsang ba'i gdan gyi le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o// // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sems
58b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mngon par sprul/ / de yi snying khar yi ge hUM// kha dog dkar po bsam par bya// bdud rtsi re pha thig le dang // de yi sa bon sbyar bar bya// zhi bar rgyal zhing mchog tu brtson// zhi ba'i
58b7(rgyud 'bum): dus la bab nas mi/ / bdag nyid sprin sreg rab tu bya// zhi ba'i 'o// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// kha dog zhi bar mtshungs pa'o// bdud rtsi kun nas rig pa yi// zla ba'i dkyil
59a1(rgyud 'bum): dasu ts+tsha/ 'a/ rgyas pa ma/ da s
59a2(rgyud 'bum): hA ba snams pasngos/ / da / kyil 'kho thams nga// rgya shrI kyi 'byor ma rnam pas// ngas surnams phy
59a3(rgyud 'bum): ug ra ga sa 'o/ sa / la
59a4(rgyud 'bum): 'kho ba / bus rnam // 'a 'i mas na/ nahrIHni ni// smra ma da sna /
59a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba lus sum// sgrub pa po sam byer bya// gang ngasams de'i spong par 'argyu// rlung ging kyil 'kho ngas su ni// mkha' 'gro rdzas bas ma byer bya// ldan ma
59a6(rgyud 'bum): sgyi kun rig pas/ gzugs nga dubs pani bskom par bya// 'brar ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od// mdun du zlob shing kun tu bsam// bsgrub bya yi ni lam+b+ha kyi khar// rlung gis
59a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis tshig tse/ / mthar ni 'jam pa'i yo ga dang // sngon bzhin me yi yi ge nyid// dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming 'dzin// 'bum zag gcig shu bzlas pa so// gang phyir sbyor ba bsnyen
59b1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / lus kun nas ni sdom pa'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsten par bya// kha dog sngon po 'jigs chen po// shin tu bshad pas 'jigs
59b2(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / lag na lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ rgyar kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// dgra yis kun nas gdan du ni// bdag nyid rkang pas mnan par bya// rdo rje'i sa bom re ba la// lcags
59b3(rgyud 'bum): kyu'i yi ges sbyar nas ni/ / mtha' ru 'joms pa'i yi ge ni// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i gdan gyi le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o// /
59b4(rgyud 'bum): / ji ltar lus las byung ba'i pad+ma la// bung ba gnyis kyis bdud rtsi za ba'i sems dang yang // yang dag sbyor bas byang chub yan lag ldan pa yi// mchog gi chos gsum pa/
59b5(rgyud 'bum): rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// srin po dang ni ro langs ma// mi meng dur khrod gnas su ni// yi dgas tshes dang skar ma la// bstan pa'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// ra nag po yi
59b6(rgyud 'bum): pags pa blang / / mtshon gyis ma bsdun sbyar bar bya// ras ni bkyang la thig gis gdab// rdzas lnga dang mi yang dag ldan// gnyis meng gtor ma byin gyis brngub// lcags kyu ldang /
59b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi// sngon du gsungs bzhin dbul bar bya// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas// de yi ra yi sha yis ni// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// bris sku gnas su bzung
60a1(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ / gtor mas sa spyod la zla bar bya// kha dog nag b+h+yo 'jigs can ga/ rol ba'i 'ben pas yang dag gnas// stan lag brgyad du kun gyis bar+b+has/
60a2(rgyud 'bum): sma na basmras pas rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum khro bo mche bcan// phyug bani yis ni rnam par smras/ kha T+wA~M ga dang rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhin gyi gugathod pa dang // snang po'i ba
60a3(rgyud 'bum): zas mdzin par bzhis/ / sdug gi bags pa'i sham thabs can// de ltar srin mo ra langs ma// rnal 'byor mchog tu brten pas bris// kun nas gtor ma yang dag ldan// de med dru bzod
60a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas su ni/ / nag po 'ir mi sha da no// no dang mar du mngon par sbyar// brgya rtsa brgyad du byams byas pas// pho nya ro langs ma rab 'grub// mgol du/ spyi ber haM/ mig la
