60a5(rgyud 'bum): sAl / rna ba ra haM/ lce la ho// snying khararA hUM/ yan lag drug tu dgod pa'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA ha nA han/ sar+b+ba sha trUM ma tha ma tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha dzAM/ a mu ka/ sa g+hA tA s+ya/ !
60a6(rgyud 'bum): lcid du hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ pu dz+ra/ 'di ni sgrub pa thams cad kyi sngags so// ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas ni// an lakra drug tu shing par bya// bA dun kasun pa'i
60a7(rgyud 'bum): smin/ / dpung pa kun nas brkyang byas la// saM gol gyi ni sgra dang ni/ bruM gi rnam pa ldan cig sbyar// g.yas brkyang ba yis yang dag gnas// 'di ni mchog gi phyag rgya'o//
60b1(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon la ni spong ba dang // dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba dang // dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa// sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bye ba brgya stong du// sangs rgyas ye
60b2(rgyud 'bum): shes kyis bskul zhing / / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yis// rnal 'byor gtsug lag phrad pa'o// sems can thams cad skyon med cing // sems can thams cad bde gyur
60b3(rgyud 'bum): cig/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir// rnal
60b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor bstan bcos 'di bgyis so/ / gang na bzhi pa las sbyor ba'i rab tu byed pa gangar bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rgyud ces bya
60b5(rgyud 'bum): ga/ sI ti dz+nyA na kirti sa gsar du bsgyur te bshad cing gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ShA ko tang sha/ bod skad du dbang ma
60b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba bzang pos gsol pa// stor pa dbang bskur rnam bdun dang // rnam gsum de bzhin bla na med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos
60b7(rgyud 'bum): grub phyir/ / mdor bsdus pa yis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zla bzang dbang bskur don// rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum mchog/ rtsa yi
61a1(rgyud 'bum): kun spyod rtsol ba ni/ / mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad// rgyud du mdor bstan rnam gsum dang // rgyas par bshad pa rnam gsum 'gyur// rab tu mdor bstan
61a2(rgyud 'bum): mdor bstan che/ / rab tu rgyas par bshad pa gzhan// mdor bstan rgyas par bshad pa nyid// rgyud yang dag par bsdus par brjod// rab tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad pa// bka'
61a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grel tshig ni 'byed pa'o/ / mdor bstan chen po rgyas bshad pa// 'grel ba bang thams cad don ston byed// de ni mngon shes thob rnams kyis// bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid//
61a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rnam pa zhi dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams dang // phung khams skye mched rigs drug rnams// dag pa 'jig rten khams la sos/
61a5(rgyud 'bum): le'u lngar ni 'dod rnams kyis// bden gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// dus kyi 'khor lo mngon rjod byed// dang por dbang bskur bdun po gang // byis pa rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir//
61a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis// dam pa'i don gyis bzhi pa'o// bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams kyi// rdo rje can dag gis bstar ba// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang //
61a7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i dor gyi bder pas so// chu dang cod pan dar dbyangs dang // rdo rje'i dril bu btul zhugs che// ming dang rjes gnang yang dag ldan// dbang bskur rnam bdur lo yi bdag/ lus ngag/
61b1(rgyud 'bum): sems ni legs dag pa// mngon par dbang bskur gnyis gnyis so// rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag/ gzhan pa khams sogs dag pa las// chu ni khams kyi dag pa ste// cod pan
61b2(rgyud 'bum): phung po rnam sbyong byed/ / dar dpyangs pha rol phyin pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas skad rgyun ma 'chad pa// nyi zla gcig tu dag par byed// yul dang dbang po legs dag pa/
61b3(rgyud 'bum): 'pho med rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur// ming ni byams sogs yang dag dag/ rjes gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag byed// dbang bskur bdun po 'di rnams ni// dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin par
61b4(rgyud 'bum): bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang / / shes rab ye shes mngon rjod pa// slar yang shes rab chen po nyid// de yi ye shes mngon rjod byed// 'gyur dang 'gyur dang de nas 'dzag/ de
61b5(rgyud 'bum): ras gzhan yang mi 'dzag pa'o/ / lus ngag sems ni legs dag pas// dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis// bzhi pa ye shes yang dag dag/ lus ngag sems ni dag par byed// byis
61b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dar ma de nas rgar/ / bzhi pa skye dgu'i bdag po'o// shes rab nu mar yan lag ni// reg pas byang chub sems 'pho'i bde// 'o ma 'dzin pas dbang bskur ba// gang las bde thob de
61b7(rgyud 'bum): byis pa'o/ / yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes// byang chub sems ni 'pho ba'i bde// gsang ba'i dbang bskur gsang ba ni// gang las bde thob de dar ma// yun ring gsang bar
62a1(rgyud 'bum): spros las skyes/ / rdo rje'i rtse mor g.yo ba'i bde// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba// gang las g.yo ba'i bgrod de rgar// phyag rgya chen po rjes chags
62a2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / skyes pa g.yo med bde ba ni// shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba// gang las g.yo med rtogs pa de// skye dgu'i bdag por rnam shes bya// skyob pa thams cad skyed mdzad
62a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang sems gnyis med mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur// rdo rje rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi// dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir bshad
62a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed// 'di nyid kyi ni bsgrub pa bya// rab gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// du sogs mtshan ma de rnams kyis// shes rab gzugs brnyan
62a5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' mnyam/ / yod dang med las rnam par 'das// rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don// rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams// kun nas yongs su dor ba yis// du ba sdig rgyu mkha'
62a6(rgyud 'bum): snang dang / / sgron ma 'bar ba zla nyi ma// mum can cha dang thig le che// sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba// bka' dang ma bkab mig dag gis// stong par 'di ni rjes bcas
62a7(rgyud 'bum): min/ / rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur// rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya// dngos med gzugs la sgom pa de// rnal 'byor pa yi sgom ma yin// ngoso bo dngos med sems kyi
62b1(rgyud 'bum): min/ / stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro// ji ltar pra bab me long la// gzhon nu mas mthong dngos med skyes// de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs chos// mkha' la de nyid rnal 'byor
62b2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / 'di la dngos po dngos med 'gyur// dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir// dngos po dngos med don yod pa// sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'khrul bzhin /
62b3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i chos can dag la chos// skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong // yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i// sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// pra phab pa yi gzhon nu mas// ma
62b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba yi rkur po mthong / / nyi tshe bo yi mig dag gis// song nas sgrub pa po yis mthong // gal te yod pa'i gzugs mthong na// rang gi gdod pa cis mi mthong // gal te med pa gzugs
62b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong na/ / ri bong rA ni ji ltar min// gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing // rang gi mig gis mthong min pa// skye ba med pa mthong ba ni// gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin// gzugs
62b6(rgyud 'bum): brnyan mthong na de nas ni/ / bar ma chad par srog rtsol bya// steng 'og rtsa gsum po rnams la// lus ngag sems ni 'gog pa las// zla nyid sgra gcan bshang gci dang // khu ba
62b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bab pa'i lam rnams su/ / chu me stong pa sa rlung dang // ye shes khams rnams skyes rnams la// gang zhig zla nyi mun car dang // bshang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnams// srog dang
63a1(rgyud 'bum): thur sel rim pa las/ / lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams so// zla ba thabs kyi sku yin te// nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung // shes rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa/
63a2(rgyud 'bum): gci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung // steng 'og zugs kyi rtsa gnyis dag/ mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o// thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can// khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi// steng 'og
63a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs drug 'di rnams ni/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor las// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// lus can kun la yang dag gnas// 'chi ltas lus ngag rtsa
63a4(rgyud 'bum): ngag la/ / steng 'og lhag pa'i drung rnams kyis// mun can khu ba 'bab ma la// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba gnas// skye dang 'amingang 'khrig pa yi// dus su khu ba 'bab pa'o//
63a5(rgyud 'bum): mun can ma yang steng du 'bab// nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa las// dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtshams su// dbu ma nas ni mnyam pa 'bab// rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug/ 'byung ba
63a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'o ma yi byangag/ / bduman+t+ra rtsa lnga lhag pa yi// drug brgya nyin dang mtshan la'o// drug brgya rnams kyis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig go// 'di yis dman pa
63a7(rgyud 'bum): de rnams/ / g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rtsar 'bab bo// phyogs gsum dang bcas lo gsum rnams// lo brgyarnams las dbu ma'o// steng du g.yon g.yas blasim// brgyang
63b1(rgyud 'bum): lug dang ser skya gzhan/ / chu dang me yi rlung bzhin can// pad+ma rin chen 'dzin 'dod pa// 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dgra/ sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can// dbu ma'i rtsa dang
63b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa yang / / 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin par 'dod// steng dang 'og tu dbu ma g.yas// sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa// stong pa ye shes rang bzhin can// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod
63b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i lam gyis bshang ba'i rtsa/ / nyi mas gci ba 'bab pa ste// skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la// sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab// lte ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma// gang de yid bzang
63b4(rgyud 'bum): mun pa 'bab/ / 'og tu khu ba 'bab gang de// mkha' 'gro gdong dang dung can ma// lte ba'i chu skyes snying mgrin dang // dpral ba gtsug tor 'dam skyes la// sa chu me rlung stong pa rnams//
63b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'bab pa sdud pa yis// 'byung 'gyur de ni 'jug pa dag/ bskyed pas 'jug ste sa la'o// lte ba nas ni lte ba'i dbus// a ba d+hA tIr 'gro dang 'ong // lce gsang nor bu'i chu
63b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes la/ / lus ngag sems rnams 'bab pa ni// 'byung dang de ni 'jug pa dag/ sdud dang skyed pa'i rang bzhin can// dung can skye bo thams cad kyi// thur sel rlung ni 'bab pa'o//
63b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams bud med bde ba las// khu ba khrag 'bab dus dag tu// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// steng du g.yas dang g.yon dag dang // 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa
64a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rdul dang khu ba 'bab pa dag/ rdul 'bab phyir de gtum mo ste// khu ba 'bad phyir mkha' 'gro gdong // steng du brjod dus bud med kyis// g.yung me
64a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu'i kun 'dar ma/ / rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga// rtag tu g.yon pa'i rtsa la'o// sa sogs g.yas pa'i rdul ste// dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o// tsA ba'i
64a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ / dkyil 'khor drug cu rnams rim bzhin// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus sbyor ni// lug sogs glang la sogs pa la// rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas//
64a4(rgyud 'bum): steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung // sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re zhing // dbyug gus sna bug dag la'o// rim pas chu tshed 'bab pa ni// drug cu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbug/
64a5(rgyud 'bum): brgya phrag bco brgyad dbugs de rnams// chu tshod lngar ni 'bab pa'o// chu tshod drug cu nyin mtshan du// lus la dkyil 'khor rnams zhes pa'o// 'dang ma'i dbus dang de nas
64a6(rgyud 'bum): sha ra/ / g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis// g.yon par rtag tu nam mkha' sogs// g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so// g.yon par rnam shes sogs 'byung
64a7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / g.yas par sa sogs sdud pa'o// nub dang shar du 'dzin ma rlung // phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// mthe bong ming med dag gis ni// gang phyir kha la dbang bslu
64b1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu// phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dag gis// gang phyir ral grir 'gyur ba'o// zla phyed rnam pa'i phyag rgya ni// mche
64b2(rgyud 'bum): ba gri gug mthe'u chung ste/ / stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu// phan tshun thabs dang shes rab bo// dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor// sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du// mgo bor lag
64b3(rgyud 'bum): mthil sbyar ba la/ / gri gug dang bcas rtse gcig go// dbu ma'i rtsa la mnyam pa de// skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po// phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum// gcig nyid dbu mar son pa na'o//
64b4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na// bshang ba gci ba'i rtsa 'gag go// sgra gcan rtswa ni 'gags pa na// 'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur// sbed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can// 'di rnams
64b5(rgyud 'bum): grol na grol bar 'gyur/ / srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyis// 'di ni rtsa yi kun spyod do// g.yon pa 'am ni g.yas pa la// mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin lngar// lhag pa'i
64b6(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni rab 'bab pa/ / de las lo gsum na 'chi'o// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la// lnga dang phyogs tshes nyi shu dang // de nyid gcig lhag gzhan rim pas// nyin zhag sum cu gsum
64b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu na/ / gsum gnyis gcig lo zla ba ni// drug gsum zung zla nyin zhag tshes// phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis// lus can rnams kyi tshe 'gro bo// rtsa ba nas gcig lag pa yis/
65a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon par dra ba'i rgyu bar 'gyur// nyi zla nyi ma nag zla ba drug/ nyin zhag gsum rnams thu ba gsum// nyin+da la 'chi ltas zla bar dge/ 'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la/
65a2(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba ni// lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa yis// mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams// skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// de rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la yang //
65a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams pa las// gzhan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// phyogs gnyis yang dag gnas pa na// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang // dkyil 'khor lnga rnams 'bab/
65a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir// 'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni// srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya// a ba d+hU tI'i zhabs brten nas// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya//
65a5(rgyud 'bum): zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa las// gzhan du kun 'dar yan lag la// srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med// 'og tu'ang dung can ma thur sel// de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o// 'chi
65a6(rgyud 'bum): ltas slu ba rnal 'byor pa'i/ / 'di ni dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur// mgo bo'i pad+mar gtsug tor las// khu ba 'ongs pa dga' ba ste// mgrin pa snying khar mchog dga' 'o// dga'
65a7(rgyud 'bum): bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur/ / sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar gang 'ongs pa'o// gsang nas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dga' mi 'pho ba// rab gnas/
65b1(rgyud 'bum): / mya ngan 'das pa min// chags chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag po// 'dod chags bral las 'pho med bde// de ni mya ngan 'das rab gnas// khu ba zla 'char gtsug tor du// rdzogs pa'i gsang
65b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mtsho skyes la/ / bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i// pad+mar rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas// de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur// nag po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa na// 'dod chags bral bas
65b3(rgyud 'bum): gnam stong la/ / nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'gro// de yi cha shas bcu drug la// gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o// zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod do// chags pa'i bde la chags bral phyir/
65b4(rgyud 'bum): lus can thams cad 'chi ba na// zla ba bdud rtsi'i 'og tu 'gro// steng du zhim rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la// de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni// steng du bgrod bya mi yi
65b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ 'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu yi// pad+mar zla ba bdud rtsi nya// nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar te// gtsug tor
65b6(rgyud 'bum): nor bur de dag go/ / zhes pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig/ lus can kun gyi phyin ci log/ rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min// khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur// nor bur thugs dang gsang bar
65b7(rgyud 'bum): gsung / / lte bar su ste bde cher las// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'di rnams dag pa'i sku las spro// thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang // shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur// 'dri
66a1(rgyud 'bum): yi dpral bar sku rdo rje/ / mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams// sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams s+ho// phung po khams sogs spro
66a2(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las// las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang // ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang // phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas// mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur//
66a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med// nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang med// nub pa de yi nub pa med// 'char ba yi na 'char ba med// rab tu gsal ba'i rab gsal med//
66a4(rgyud 'bum): bkab pa'i bkab pa yang med do// skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nying med// 'chi ba'i 'chi ba yang med do// grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi gnas pa yi mi gnas med// dngos
66a5(rgyud 'bum): po med pa'i dngos med med/ / dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang med// 'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi 'gyur ba'i yang mi 'gyur med// rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi// skye
66a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no/ / 'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur min te// rang bzhin nyid kyis skye mi 'gyur// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med// dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid gcig/ rang
66a7(rgyud 'bum): gi shes rab la 'khrud sems/ / rdo rje nor bu'i pad+mar son// der son zla ba g.yo ba dang // mi g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur sgom// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams su// sku gsung thugs rnams sgom
66b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdus pa// ye shes dung can mar sgom pa'o// shes rab chags pas zhu ba yi// thig le rim pas mgo bo las// rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs
66b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / / 'ching ba dam pa'i don gyis so// ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis// cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// grib ma nyams pa rdzogs pa ste// zla ba chang dang rdzogs
66b3(rgyud 'bum): pa min/ / de bzhin ye shes shar rim pas// sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs// ye shes chad dang rdzogs pa min// ji
66b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar ri bong mtshan mas dbus/ / rdzogs par ri bong can mi gnas// de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar sems// 'khor ba'i bag chags mtshan ma yis// bskyed dang rab tu nyams
66b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyogs/ / dkar po nag po rab tu gnas// de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang // de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa
66b6(rgyud 'bum): la ni g.yo mi 'gyur/ / gang tshe rdo rje nor bur sems// de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs// dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas// res 'ga' dkar min la mi 'gro// phyogs gnyis
66b7(rgyud 'bum): po yi dbus gnas pa/ / rdzogs pa la gnas gnyis su med// gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'i// rdo rje nor bur rdzogs par 'gyur// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// rdo rje nas nyams
67a1(rgyud 'bum): la rab rdzogs/ / swar+ya yang gtsug tor du shar ba// slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs// de chags bral las ma nyams pa// lus can ye shes nyams pa min//
67a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jo ma bde ba che rang bzhin// rdzogs pa'i sgra mas brjod par bya// dngos po bar ma gzhan thams cad// 'thung dang spyang ba'i rgyu yin no// sring las mya ngan 'das par 'gro/
67a3(rgyud 'bum): slar yang srid par 'ong // rang phyogs ngag las zla bzhin dang // brjod pa dag las snang byed bzhin// rdzogs par mi gA ya~M bA 'di ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid// n-i khri
67a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis brgya yi dazugs/ / 'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis// phyogs gnyis ying dag gnon pa ni// sa rnams kyis mi yongs su rdzogs// bder ngom rnam pa bcu gnyis pa/
67a5(rgyud 'bum): bya bcu drug 'gyur ba med// a pa bcu ga'is su rnams kyis// rdzogs pa gnyis su med pa mchogacha shAs rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems// rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba/
67a6(rgyud 'bum): don gcig gnyis su med pa chos// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems// kun nas rab tu rdzogs pa'o// chags bral dang po chags
67a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lus mer mi 'gyur che/ / yongs su rdzogs pa phyogs nyid kyi// bag chags rnams kyis ma 'khyud pa'o// ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa// de ni rgya mtsho'i chur mtshungs pa/
67b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dngos po'i tshogs 'di de// 'gyur ba med par 'gyur med mtshungs// ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'di// zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur// sa bon rang bzhin sa bon gyis//
67b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu'i dus su nga rgyal spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshigs pa yang / mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin 'dzin//
67b3(rgyud 'bum): mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni// dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na// rma la rig mir gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// de bzhir rnal 'byor dam pa'i bde//
67b4(rgyud 'bum): sems rdzogs char gyur na rdo rje// nor bur rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyi// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa ni//
67b5(rgyud 'bum): lcags la drag po'i mas gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med bde// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang // sems la 'dod pa'i mes gdus
67b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ / kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni// 'ga' zhig tu yang dri ma med// de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems// 'ga' zhig tu yang bag chags med//
67b7(rgyud 'bum): lcags ni gser nyid du gyur pa// me yis dri ma med par 'gyur// / de bzhin yang dang yang du sems// 'dod chags me yis dri ma med// ji ltar
68a1(rgyud 'bum): / nor bu che reg las// rdo na rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'gyur med pang+ge reg las// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 'dir ni mang po brjod pas
68a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yis/ / lcags rnams rab tu 'bugs byed pa// ro yi mthu ni brtag bya min// ci zhig slar yang don dam pas// glo bur dri mas g.yogs pa yis// sems
68a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu 'bugs byed pa/ / ye shes mthu ni brtag bya min// sems la glo bur dri ma med// sems las yun ring dus can min// sems med par ni skye ba med// sems la mi zad
68a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa min/ / gal te 'di nyid glo bur ba// de tshe sngon du sems dri med// gal te sems las dus ring can// de tshe de ni ci las skyes// gal te sems med par skye na// de tshem
68a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i me tog mtshungs/ / gal te sems la rtag tu gnas// de tshe kun tu thar pa min// ji ltar zangs kyi dri ma ni// ro yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// de yi yod nyid nyams pa
68a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// de bzhin sems kyi dri ma ni// sdong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur// de yi ye shes nyid nyams med// dri mang nyid kyis yang dag gnas//
68a7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar bcud kyis phug pa'i lcags// lcags nyid du ni rjes 'gro min// de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro min// chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med/
68b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba las gzhan bsod nams med// de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems// mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya// gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni// med par bde ba smra mi nus// lang tsho'i dga'
68b2(rgyud 'bum): ba thob pa na/ / bde ba chen po rang gis rig/ de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i// bang ba smra bar nus ma yin// 'gyur med ting 'dzin thob pa na// rnal 'byor pa yis rang rig
68b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'gyur med las skyes bde rig pa// thams cad mkhyen la'ang the tshom za// de lta na yang yid bang min// chags bral nyid du mi bya'o// 'phos pa las ni chags bral
68b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung // sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed// zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod// shi nas slar yang de rnams kyi// srid pa'o srid las
68b5(rgyud 'bum): slar 'chi 'pho/ / de ltar sems can gyi sring ba// chags bral las 'byung gzhan du min// de phyir 'bad ba thams cad kyis// 'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spang // gang gis
68b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa yis// 'dod ldar yang ni chags bral bar// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod// bdag gis brjod pa'i
68b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyung ngu slar/ / rnal 'byor bcis sdug bsngal 'dod// khu ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par bya// rten mi 'pho ba thob pa na// brten pa'i 'dobam
69a1(rgyud 'bum): bral ba nyid/ / rten dang brten pa legs rdzogs pa// ji srid 'gyur med nyid du 'gro// sems kyi 'gyur med nyid thob na// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med//
69a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur med las byung sku yi ni// mdzod spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang // A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// hUM yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag/ stong pa las byung gzugs brnyan rgyu// mi 'gyur/
69a3(rgyud 'bum): las skyes bde ba 'bras// rgyu ni 'bras bus rgyas btab pa// 'bras bu rgya yis btab pa'o// stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu// snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras// stong zhing
69a4(rgyud 'bum): snying rje dbyer med pa/ / byang chub sems de mi 'pho ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa bral ba'i gzugs// 'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba// de dag sbyor ba gnyis med mchog/ rtag dang cha
69a5(rgyud 'bum): las nges par grol/ / dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir// gzugs ni dngos po med pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir// 'gyur ba med pa dngos po min// dngos
69a6(rgyud 'bum): po dngos med yang dag sbyor/ / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog/ gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol// pra phab me long la bzhin ro// gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste//
69a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur med mya ngan 'das mi 'gro// phan tshun 'khyud pa zhi ba ste// ma ning gi ni go 'phang mchog/ shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing // shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras// shes rab rgyu la
69b1(rgyud 'bum): ma skyes phyir/ / shes rab la skyes rgyu skyes min// de phyir ye shes rgyu skyes min// shes rab ye shes bla na med// 'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med//
69b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang // de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung // phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs// skye min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min// shes rab kun nas mya ngan
69b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das/ / skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam ngas grol// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i// shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong
69b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin// phyi yi shes bya rnam 'byed phyir// de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la// 'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin// ral gri chen po bdag nyid la//
69b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid so yi gcod dam ci// mo gsham bu mo dang 'grogs pas// rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur ltar// nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni// bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no//
69b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min// 'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas// kun nas bde ba rdzogs pa las// sgrub pa thams cad spangs pa ste// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// yul
69b7(rgyud 'bum): dang dbang po spangs pa ni/ / kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas// gcad du med pa dbye ba spangs// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' 'di// don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// 'dod chags chen
70a1(rgyud 'bum): po sems dpa' che/ / sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che// nyon mongs zad pa dgra chen po// dam tshig sems dpa' ga
70a2(rgyud 'bum): mug che/ / gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor khro ba che// lha mi ni khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che// 'pho ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// rdo rje mi phyed
70a3(rgyud 'bum): ces par brjod/ / 'dir ni don chen bcom ldan 'das// sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid// mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs// sa rnams
70a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa yis/ / 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni// mi g.yod phyir byang chub sems//
70a5(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs// zhe sdang chen po dgra che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba 'pho med de za ba// dam tshig sems dpa' 'o rigs pa 'dis// gti mug
70a6(rgyud 'bum): blo ste gti mug sel/ / rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid// shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas// khro bo chen po dgra chen po// khro bo'i gzugs can bdud rnams kyis// 'gyur med
70a7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba che thabs las/ / nam yang sems can don mi 'dor// sems can grol nas chags chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// 'di rnams rnam pa drug tu brjod// maM
70b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ye shes tshor ba dang / / rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang // 'du shes de rnams phung po'i rigs// ye shes me dang nam mkha' sa// rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhir/
70b2(rgyud 'bum): yid mig rna ba lus dang sna// lce rnams kyi yang de bzhin nyid// sgra ro chos kyi dbyings dang dri// reg bya kha dog rnams kyi yang // khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// rigs drug
70b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi yongs dag pa/ / lus ngag gsang ba dbang po sems// rtag tu dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum/ shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur
70b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dbang gi sgrub thabs te/ / mchog tu mi 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs// rtsa dang rigs dang yang dag ldan// zla ba mdor bstar pa yis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi
70b5(rgyud 'bum): le'ur le'u lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so/ / / 'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gro dge slong
70b6(rgyud 'bum): shes grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ slar yang rin cher rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal nA ro pa'i 'grel bshad dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o// /
70b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A daM bud+d+ha ud d+hi ta shrI kA la tsakra nA ma tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba
71a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste
71a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan/ / sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btud la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yis// mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar
71a3(rgyud 'bum): pab yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni/ / rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka 'phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don du'o// stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le
71a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang / / phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs tshad
71a5(rgyud 'bum): dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang / / dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang
71a6(rgyud 'bum): po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang / / mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams ngag gis shes pa min pas so/
71a7(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni// lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis mi yi
71b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag po bzang po nyon/ / dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu
71b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang // stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes
71b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba skyed min ngag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dag las/
71b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mo yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol//
71b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'grol ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yas su dmar po'i mdog/ sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang // mjug
71b6(rgyud 'bum): rings dmar pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni rlung bdun po/ / 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o// rgyang
71b7(rgyud 'bum): tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhus ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so/ / srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi
72a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas/ / kun tu yeng shes dang mi stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam
72a2(rgyud 'bum): par grol/ / a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyani byed kyang // ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis
72a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod par byed/ / ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha min gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa// a sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams
72a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag/ dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan d+hA la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyis skye ba'i gnas// mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkhar rlung bsreg
72a5(rgyud 'bum): bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dngas dag go/ / a sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste// sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang
72a6(rgyud 'bum): gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o/ / rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// lhun po'i tshid
72a7(rgyud 'bum): ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga/ / mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g.yo mang dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga// de yi phyi/
72b1(rgyud 'bum): rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o// rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang rib rgya mtsho rnams// bani
72b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis/ / dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor
72b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba ste/ / cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes// 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum
72b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste/ / sa yi khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so// mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum
72b5(rgyud 'bum): phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa/ / de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo // phra rab brgyad rnams ngag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse modra
72b6(rgyud 'bum): mo ste/ / 'di rnams kyis ni sgre tshe shig dang nas tre ltos 'gro nas kyi sor te sor mo nyi ma ni// zung gi khru 'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur// rgyang
72b7(rgyud 'bum): grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no/ / dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang //
73a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go// gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba
73a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams te i la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs/ / ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o// srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir
73a3(rgyud 'bum): ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo/ / srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so// rin chen snang ras
73a4(rgyud 'bum): gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o/ / 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod 'dun pa dang // lan tshwa chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho
73a5(rgyud 'bum): dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni/ / 'od sngon man da ra ba ri ni Sha Ta nor bu'i 'od dang dro Na bsil ri rdo rje'o// gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci
73a6(rgyud 'bum): dang khrung khrung dang / / drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis// shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni rmu
73a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum mo/ / byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur// ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste/
73b1(rgyud 'bum): sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur// lhun po yi ni stang gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni//
73b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste// rA ni lnga po rnam dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun tu ni khor yug go// de yi phyi rol
73b3(rgyud 'bum): / gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs kun tu ni me dang rlung // chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste// gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud
73b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog rnams ngag kyang de lta'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ / 'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te// srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi na
73b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhir ro/ / tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshegs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhun po la ni tshig mnga'i tshogs
73b6(rgyud 'bum): dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o/ / dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun tra sa yi dkyil 'khor la sor gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'dun
73b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni ma dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar/ / shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu// rlung dang no
74a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyir drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang / / tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong
74a2(rgyud 'bum): bste/ / de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar
74a3(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba 'khor/ / gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod pa 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed// kla kro rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod par byas nas
74a4(rgyud 'bum): mdun du rnam par rgyu/ / rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te
74a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de/ / rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no// dus rnams dag gi lo yi
74a6(rgyud 'bum): tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste/ / re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mnga' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag lo brgya gang yin pa'o// pra dbugs d+hU dang chu tshod nyir
74a7(rgyud 'bum): zhag rU dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / / drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag
74b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi tshad nge sa gzhi ngag la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshang du 'jug/ dum du dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrong nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so// phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag
74b2(rgyud 'bum): ngang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis/ / rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te// 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus
74b3(rgyud 'bum): / skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i zhig re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no// lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis
74b4(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sha ma bA la zhes bya bar 'gyur/ / de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par ma ga'i yul du kla klo'i tshes dag rab tu 'jug/ de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni
74b5(rgyud 'bum): nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams ngag gis rig par bya/ / mtha' dag sa gzhi lnga ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur// me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la
74b6(rgyud 'bum): rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i lor ni rab tu grub/ / kla klo'i dbang po'i yon lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma ngag kyang sems bskur// nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres de 'og tu dus kyis
74b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye/ / rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la
75a1(rgyud 'bum): gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur/ / rtsa ba dag la drug gis chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya// steng 'og rag las mig dang sum cu'i
75a2(rgyud 'bum): nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug cu'i cha dag gis/ / rnyed pa stang du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur// gnas nyid nyi zla bsres pa
75a3(rgyud 'bum): dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni/ / de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te rang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs// gnas gsum dbus
75a4(rgyud 'bum): ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par/ / gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni//
75a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// gza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyid 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs
75a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag la yang gnyis/ / skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod drag po nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin// 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin
75a7(rgyud 'bum): par gsungs/ / tshes rnams sbyin dang dor dang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshed rkang pa rnams su ste// tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin ngor rkang
75b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don/ / stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs// bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ste bcu dang chu ga ter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o//
75b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// de la ni ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// 'byung dang 'byung
75b3(rgyud 'bum): bab mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang / / tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam tho ba la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor// rgyu zhing yod pas
75b4(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha tho ba dag kyang de bzhin no/ / de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis
75b5(rgyud 'bum): tshechos bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha ngag gis bsres pa'o/ / dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya// bya ba lhag ma mig
75b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste/ / longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas zla dang yon tan zla bas cha tho ba longs spyod dang bcas pa// bgrod pa 'gro ba'i
75b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang ngor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin/ / nyi ma la ni dus ro sbrul dang bcu dang 'phrog byed 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug/ me dang nam mkha' dag
76a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur/ / zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyin mor byed pas spyod/
76a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yis longs spyod bsres pa dag/ dman par gyur po ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o//
76a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lcug ma'o// dag pa'i lo la kru bsres mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur klu bsres rnams kyi sa
76a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyangs pa dag/ ri b+hU me yis rab tu phye ste nam mkha' ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu chod de// gnyis dang sum nu'i gzu' dang chu tshod nges paM 'dir ldan zla ba dag la las
76a5(rgyud 'bum): 'pho ba'o/ / lug sogs rnams kyi sngo dri byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste// zla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mnga' ste ri bo
76a6(rgyud 'bum): can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o/ / rig byed me 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la'o// drug dang zla ba mnga' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug zla ri dang 'jim
76a7(rgyud 'bum): rten dang / / drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste stong pa mig mnga' nyi ma'i go 'phangs yi khyim la'o// zla drug 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so//
76b1(rgyud 'bum): gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gi/ lho phyogs su ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin mo'o// zla ba dag
76b2(rgyud 'bum): la mig dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gis rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshig la gcig bsres te/ / mkha' dus chu yis rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar pa'o//
76b3(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yir de las chu tshod slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste// thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres
76b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / zla ba sum nus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas pa las nI r-i mkha' ras thob pa// gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros thob dman pa mi
76b5(rgyud 'bum): gsal nyin zhag go/ / ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yi// lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang nam mkha' ro yis/
76b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur las ri la sogs pas gos pa chu tshod do// mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu spyang gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang // phyed pas lhag par 'gyur na 'khor
76b7(rgyud 'bum): lo phyir ni dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min 'gyur/ / skar ma drug nus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo// gang thob dal ba'i las ngag la yang nor dang
77a1(rgyud 'bum): bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so/ / de nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste// longs spyod kyis ni chu tshor bsgyu
77a2(rgyud 'bum): las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa/ / snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur// zos pa tshogs gcig
77a3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshong la'o/ / de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o// zla skyes dkar po
77a4(rgyud 'bum): la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur/ / sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bskur// drug
77a5(rgyud 'bum): cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhir nyid/ / zos pa dag ni tshigs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag
77a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal mo nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya// de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba rig par bya'om
77a7(rgyud 'bum): yi dbang / / zla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur// stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me
77b1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma ri yis dman/ / ri nas bug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur// rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod
77b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag tu 'gyur/ / zla skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang dag spang // lhag ma'i bya ba nor dang bu lon ngal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta btsan
77b3(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / zla skyes rkang pa ngal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so// nyin zhag tshogs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman pa byas nas so me chu gter dag
77b4(rgyud 'bum): gis bgo/ / lhag ma skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las la'o// rgyu skar nyi ma sbyang ste 'phrog byed dgu dang rtse mo can ni ngal ba'i las la rkang pa'o//
77b5(rgyud 'bum): slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa rab gi sal ma nu'i gnas la phyogs rkang la sogs de dag go// nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis
77b6(rgyud 'bum): babago/ skar mas bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshod myur ba'i las la ba sangs kyi// rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang zla dus ri bong can ni ngal ba'i las la rkang pa ste/
77b7(rgyud 'bum): myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin// mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs ni drug ro ri
78a1(rgyud 'bum): dashA sas/ / bgang na mas bsgru la smras pa 'ang sun hU~Mt+na klung smra ts+tsha// da gnas rgyas dus da
78a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas la byung ban las ma rlom sngags/ / zur ngas rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pAl ste 'khyog pa nyid ni rim min gyis// phyed sgyu ma dang byeng phyi ma tsham ma
78a3(rgyud 'bum): tugs kApa' rnams kyis ni 'byu / / sbom cu rtsa bdun lag pas bstang ba'i zla ba rnaMm sngags mjug rangs dag nI sbyar dang 'khyig par 'gyu'o// yang dus
78a4(rgyud 'bum): spyo la rgya zhugs de dag kyang rjes par gyur/ ma pa sa 'ang bar 'gyu 'i lam+b+ha yang bzong pa 'tsho pa'i rjem pa dbyibs so// maser pa'i
78a5(rgyud 'bum): ga dang yin mo ma 'gro ba 'i bdu nas gson nas 'gro ba ste/ / gsas la gnas pa dag ni g.yas kyis slar yang gsal bar 'di ni byan tshun 'jab ste gra mon gyi
78a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi zhing la srung dag gnas rnams gal te de la ban+d+ha dag gyur na nges par 'thub pa'o/ / sar ma la skye gzhan la 'thab pa nim pa nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldam
78a7(rgyud 'bum): ma mi tshig yon du za pa rab bzugs gyu cing 'byung ba yang ni gamin pa yis/ byang gi na ni mtho bar 'gyur me la cig tu bzod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g.yas pa
78b1(rgyud 'bum): tshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o/ / g.yon du rgyu ba dag la g.yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g.yas
78b2(rgyud 'bum): la g.yas pa'i char/ / de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu yang // tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i
78b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su 'go la'i ri mo'o/ / rgyu skar g.yas dang g.yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas// gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la 'go la'i dbus
78b4(rgyud 'bum): nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / / byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri sA pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o// me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams
78b5(rgyud 'bum): su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mnga' ri'o/ / dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o// phyi nas g.yas dang
78b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas min ngag tu rgyu ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis/ / lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar// nyi ma ri bong
78b7(rgyud 'bum): can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so/ / gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o// de phyir gnyis
79a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dum bu dag la nges par grang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no/ / drug pa zhes bya ma grangs dag la lakhrig pa gzung gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la
79a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang // seng ge bum par rab zhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o// 'dir ni
79a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la/ / nyal dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro// 'byung ba
79a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang / / nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro// bu mos bug
79a5(rgyud 'bum): par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o/ / gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi sa la'o//
79a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis karka Ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o// steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar// de nas
79a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs/ / stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas 'go la'i ri mo ste// de las
79b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mnga' dang mnga' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo / / lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed// kai la/
79b2(rgyud 'bum): sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o// mda' rnams chos kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed// phyed
79b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dngas 'dzin stong phrag dag las so/ / khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed// dum
79b4(rgyud 'bum): bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so/ / tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o// lam phyed
79b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o/ / ri yi rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/ nyi ma 'char ba shar
79b6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub/ / dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang thun tshod nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun tu ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams// dus sbyor dbye bas
79b7(rgyud 'bum): phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor/ / chu tshong dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste// drug cu la ni
80a1(rgyud 'bum): me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor/ / nyin dang mtshan mor 'gro la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod de 'go la dag la g.yas dang ni/
80a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas min ngag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum// lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur
80a3(rgyud 'bum): zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mnga' ro'i chu tshong du 'gyur ku li'i ra dang seng ge la'o/ / bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad
80a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar dbye bas so// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa dag las so yi cha yis nges par byung gyur
80a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / lus la dbugs lhags gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams ngag gi grangs// stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshang du
80a6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu grags pa ste/ / sbyong du me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tshod du 'gyur drug cu'i cha yis nyin zhag kyang // zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gi
80a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'o/ / bla ma'i lo drug tu gyur pa sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o// tshes zhes bya ba'i lo mo nyi skyes kyis te de bzhin mun can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug
80b1(rgyud 'bum): rings dman/ / de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum// phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te/
80b2(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'dir// srog ni snying stobs la 'bab rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la yang lus ngag sems kyi dbye bas so// lha mi lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur
80b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang / / grangs na shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no mi yi dbang // ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag
80b4(rgyud 'bum): la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams/ / bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las ngag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod de// sa skyes la ni rig byed
80b5(rgyud 'bum): dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis/ / snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar// dang por
80b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu rab tu 'gyur/ / gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste bco brgyad tshes dang drag po me dang rtsa bar drag po dang /
80b7(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa brgyad brgya chung dgadang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o// de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon ngag dang nor yang rim pa min dang rim pas so// rig byed
81a1(rgyud 'bum): dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag mur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur/ / gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang mra nu myos byed drag po ri dang
81a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po mkha'/ / rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste// nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbye bas
81a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gnas/ / chu gter nam mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshogs su 'gyur// gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu nor dus drug lag
81a4(rgyud 'bum): pa zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni/ / me drug bug pa dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa rnams te rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so// myur ngal 'khyog po la yang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i
81a5(rgyud 'bum): dbye ba dag gis rgyu bar byed/ / drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshong dag ni pa sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur// gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang
81a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis/ / skyon dang tshes dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang nam mkha' yon tan dag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya// mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs te brtan pa
81a7(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i gnas la pa sangs rgyu ba rim pas so/ / nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshogs pa 'di dag tu 'gyur mi yi dbang // drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba rig
81b1(rgyud 'bum): byed chugater mig dang zung dang stong pa rtsa bar ni/ / phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas gzhag par bya// de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus
81b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur/ / sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa// gza' rnams ngag gi dal ba'i las la
81b3(rgyud 'bum): rkang par 'gyur te mig bug mig gi grangs kyi chu tshod ngo / / de nyid bco brgyad ri dag brtan pa sa yi bu yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i cha la ste// phyogs ri me ni gza' lhag gi 'o dbang phyug dgu me bla
81b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang / / dkar po'i mnga' dang chu gter zla ba spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur// zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag
81b5(rgyud 'bum): ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs/ / pa sangs kyi ste de bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa kha ro sreg za dag tu 'gyur// 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon nu
81b6(rgyud 'bum): tshed longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o/ / zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te// chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu
81b7(rgyud 'bum): tshong dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do/ / gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas// gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnam
82a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' drug gi yang longs spyod do/ / zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig ngal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyad/
82a2(rgyud 'bum): dere las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de// sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod zhim dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman/
82a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga// gang zhig ma spyad byed kyi chu tshod da ni dus kyi nyi ma nag dus la cha dmar zla ba ste// de ni nyi ma'i lhag par
82a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag de'o/ / sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las// thob
82a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshe dri nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcad zla ba'i longs spyod las/ / chu srang bdun dang phyed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag
82a6(rgyud 'bum): la sbyang bar bya/ / mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas so// rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin+da dang nyin la nyi mo'i longs
82a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod dag la rim pa ste/ / rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyu chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur// phyed bcas zla bar chu tsheng gnyis ni nyin zhag so sor 'char
82b1(rgyud 'bum): te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab tu'o/ / phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur// slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab
82b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur/ / de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur// lo yi nyin zhag
82b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mangs bsdun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman/ / bug pa bsres rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil
82b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ / sa skyes la ni ro klu drug gi nyin nAg tshegs su 'gyur te ri klu zla skyes la'o// lha yi bla ma dag la so me rig byed du 'gyur ba sangs la ri ri dang rgyal ba
82b5(rgyud 'bum): mig/ nyi ma'i bu la drug drug ri dang nam mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro// sa skyes la ni ri dus gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur te zla ba'i bu la
82b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyas bsnun pa/ / me dang nyi ma ri yis dman zhing pa sangs dag la nyin zhag bcus ba sgyur chu gter brgyad kyis dmar// stong mkha' dus mig dag dang mkha' la gdengs
82b7(rgyud 'bum): can dus rnams blon po nyi skyes ngag la bu lon 'gyur/ / sa skyes la ni byed bcas dgu ste lag 'phyed lhag ma bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma la'o// pa sangs la drug nyi skyes la skyon bu
83a1(rgyud 'bum): lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya/ / phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las// dma' ba rang
83a2(rgyud 'bum): gi yar lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so/ / zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis//
83a3(rgyud 'bum): cha thob dag kyang bu lor du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyis rjes su ma spyad chu tshod phyed// slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur// drug
83a4(rgyud 'bum): cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang / / zla skyes blon po myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug rings 'khyog po la//
83a5(rgyud 'bum): dman pa pa sangs ngal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med// myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyog/
83a6(rgyud 'bum): ngal la lho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba / yang byang du gdong // zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur kha mog zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste// khyim ni
83a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o/ / de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste// 'khor
83b1(rgyud 'bum): lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang / / tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang /
83b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzir te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o// phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste// gnag
83b3(rgyud 'bum): dang dkar ba'i chags mtshams ngag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin/ / mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar
83b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya// 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed
83b5(rgyud 'bum): la'o/ / slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur// stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus
83b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshad/ / gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags// stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lo
83b7(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag ste/ / stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur// lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba
84a1(rgyud 'bum): khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas/ / slar yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag pa'i zla ba la sogs dang // gza' dang sbyor ba tshes dang byed pa
84a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni/ / lha rnams ngag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug pa drag po sa gzhi'i gnas rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rgyu skar rnams kyis
84a3(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag gcig ni bsgyur bar 'gyur te chu tshod drug cu rnams kyis kyang / / gza' rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dag gis nges par cha ni rab tu thob par gyur pa longs spyod 'gyur// zla ba rdzogs
84a4(rgyud 'bum): na nges par 'gyur te slar yang gza' dang chu tshod dang ni rkang pa rnams su 'gyur/ / rgyu skar la ni nyi ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur nyin zhag tshogs las dag pa zla ba gcig gi'o// sde pa
84a5(rgyud 'bum): drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste/ / a sogs thung ngu nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur ri bong can cha phyed bcas zla ba zla ba la// chu tshod
84a6(rgyud 'bum): sasogs dbyangs bcas sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum/ / dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs sum 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus
84a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor gsum/ / 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo// phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'khor
84b1(rgyud 'bum): lor 'gyur/ / zla bar bsre ba gza' gcig drag ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshong tshogs la gnyis dang rkang pa mnga'// 'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par byed
84b2(rgyud 'bum): ngadag ni gzar 'gyur ro/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshogs la gnyis// sbyin ngor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang po lnga ste/
84b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni drug gis so// zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags// drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang
84b4(rgyud 'bum): por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu tshong ngo / / dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dbyer med par// bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum
84b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi gnas su nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni/ / shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba ste// chags bral dang ni thub mchog
84b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin/ / a sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis dga' ba la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur pa/
84b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de la sa skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o// sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing gal te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur pa/
85a1(rgyud 'bum): de la gal te g.yul dang nang du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o// bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza' 'di la ni gal te mchu nyid ldan na
85a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur/ / rgyal ba bla ma dgral gal te skrag tu gyur na gsum pa dag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin// stong pa'i tshes dang pa sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur
85a3(rgyud 'bum): na bzhi pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ / rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lhan cig tu ni za nyer gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi rmar yang
85a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te gzir ba rnams ni nyon mongs nyid/ / zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi nges par g.yul dang nang dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur// bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras
85a5(rgyud 'bum): bu mang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur/ / nad dang g.yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes par bya// de ltar rgyu skar gza' ste dbyangs
85a6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ches rnams dag ni de nyid lnga yi rab tu dbye ba yis/ / phyogs dang zla ba bgrod pa dag dang lo dang drug cu'i lo rnams la yang 'dir mi 'char por 'gyur// nag pa sogs la 'dzir
85a7(rgyud 'bum): ni yan lag bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur phyogs kyi dbye bas de nyid do/ / nyi ma zhag dbyangs rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis dag gis 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te zla ba'i dbye ba la'o//
85b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba drug gis bgrod pa'i yan lag dag ste rab byung la sogs bcu gnyis lo rnams ngag gi lo// de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams dag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni phyi nas nub pa'o// /
85b2(rgyud 'bum): dang po la ni dbyangs rnams byis pa rang tshes yon tan dbang gis dpal ldan gzhon nu gnyis pa la// dar bab rgan po rim pas me dang chu gter nyin zhag la ste lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur//
85b3(rgyud 'bum): a sogs dbyangs lnga gang dag nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur de dag rnams ni rnams gnyis sum cu nyid// ka sogs sde pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar
85b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ste/ / thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lA yi dbye bas so// ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la shin tu nges par 'gyur te spro dang bsdu
85b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sbyor bas so/ / nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la gsal bar mda' yi chu tshod nyi ma'i dus sbyor cha dgu pa// lug gi dus sbyor la sogs 'di dag rnams kyang 'dir ni rang bzhin gsum
85b6(rgyud 'bum): ste brtan g.yo shin tu mnyam/ / lug dang karka Ta srang chu srin 'dir ni g.yo ba dag ste de las gnyis pa brtan pa'o// lhag ma gzhan ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i
85b7(rgyud 'bum): dus su rtag pa nyid du 'char/ / de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho na ste// dang por sum cu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid
86a1(rgyud 'bum): de yud tsam yud tsam dag la'o/ / sde pa'i yi ge sum cu chu tshod rnams la rab tu 'gyur te thung dang ring por rab dbye bas// zla ba'i dbus su chos kyi cha la 'char bar
86a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod de de dag nub pa dag kyang de nyid la'o/ / stong pa rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag kyang a la sogs pa dbyangs ni lnga po rnams kyi rigs// sgra gcan me dang zla nyi zla skyes mig dmar ba sangs
86a3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma mjug rings spen pa 'dir lhag lha/ / sngar brjod dus sbyor re re de la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya// de yi dbus su dbyangs gang byung ba'i gza' zhes
86a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba stobs ldan de yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ / g.yon pa dag nas thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te g.yas pa nas kyang gzhan dag go// g.yon la stong pa la
86a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs de nyid dag dang gza' tshogs rgyu ba sgra gcan la sogs mtha' dag ste/ / g.yas la de nyid 'dzin ma sogs dang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid// phyi rol
86a6(rgyud 'bum): du yang dus kyi chu tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas dag ni bsgrub par bya/ / dris na g.yul gyi slad du 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus dag shar bar gyur pa na'o//
86a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung du nyi ma dag la 'pham zhing me las skyes shar ba dag la ma ru 'gyur ba yin// chu dang bla ma la ni 'dum par 'gyur te sa la spen pa shar la 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// 'chi dang nyon
86b1(rgyud 'bum): mongs rmar 'gyur bde ba dag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi'o/ / g.yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te sgra gcan stong pa dag la shar na yang // rlung dang
86b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dag la 'pham dang g.yul du rma yang zla skyes me la shar ba dag la'o/ / chu la pa sangs la ni don rnyeng sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la dgra yang dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin
86b3(rgyud 'bum): bgrod pa bag ma dag la g.yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyi ni dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur/ / pho nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag nges par bcu yis bsgyur te khyim gyi 'khor
86b4(rgyud 'bum): lo dag gis bsre/ / slar yang de dag 'byung bas bsnun te nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan bdun gyi cha yis lhag ma ni// zla me mda' dang ri bo mi mnyam gnas su gyur na mi rnams la
86b5(rgyud 'bum): ni rnyed pa yod ma yin/ / mig dang rig byed ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur// lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus ni dus sbyor
86b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste/ / dus sbyor gcig ni lnga yi dbye bas gza' tshog dang ldan dbyangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad do// de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cus mngon lhag
86b7(rgyud 'bum): yon tan brgya yi dus kyi chu tshod dag la gnas/ / chu tshod cha shas chu srang drug cu de yi cha shas zhes pa dbugs drug rnams so mi yi dbang // dbugs 'byung 'jug pa'i dbus su
87a1(rgyud 'bum): mi dge dge ba'i 'bras bu dag kyang rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed/ / lha shes rnams kyis nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs
87a2(rgyud 'bum): nas dus kyi chu chod do/ / da ltar byung ba shes pa min par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa// de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen
87a3(rgyud 'bum): seng ges gtams pa'i thibs por rab tu 'jug/ phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa la gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor sbyor ba sbyin pa ni// skye dang bdun par
87a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i khyim la dus me kI mA sa skyes nyin mor byed pa'i bu rnams kyis/ / de lu 'chi dang nad dang rma dang nges par mtha' dag nor ni rnam par nyams pa dag kyang byed// do phyir srang
87a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ste nges par bdag gi tshig gis dus sbyor gzhan ni rab tu sbyin par bya/ / skye dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la sgra gcan zla ba zla skyes bla ma pa sangs dang bcas pas/
87a6(rgyud 'bum): dag nyams rang nyid rgyas shing g.yul du rnam par rgyal te dga' ma dang bcas nor dag 'thob par 'gyur// yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te slar yang gal te rang lus
87a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyi rtsa las gyur pa na/ / nges par ngon mi thams cad 'grub ste mtha' dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o// rgya skar rnams ni dgu dang dgu nga dgu mis chas sum
87b1(rgyud 'bum): byas te skyes pa'i rgyu skar dang po las/ / gdug pa rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig mi mnyam gnas gyur nad pa rnams ni 'chi ba nyid// tha skar la sogs rnams kyis rtsa gsum
87b2(rgyud 'bum): sprul yang spras par gyur pa nam gru nyid kyi bar du ste/ / sdig zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la gyur na mi rnams ngag ni rnam par nyams// drug dang tshes dang brgyad dang ri zla bcu
87b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcu dgu nyi ma nyi shu gcig gi lo bzang rnams/ / nyi zla mig dmar gza' lhag nyi skyes bla ma lag 'gro dkar po rnams kyis de dag rim pas spyod// de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de
87b4(rgyud 'bum): las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag la ni/ / drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed cing mchog tu bde byed zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' gang dag/ rgyal gyi zla bar nyi ma chu srin la son ma
87b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa ste bum par nyi ma mchu la yang / / 'du byed du 'gyur mi yi bdag po nya ru nyi ma dbo dag la ni rnam par shes pa ste// lug tu nyi ma nag pa la ni ming dang gzugs so glang 'khrig
87b6(rgyud 'bum): la sonas ga snron dag la/ / mig sogs dang ni reg pa drag ste nyi ma karka Tar gnas chu zla la ni tsher bar 'gyur// seng ger nyi ma gro bzhin la yang sred pa bu mo dang ni srang du ston pa
87b7(rgyud 'bum): khrums dang mi/ / tha skar zla ba dag la len pa nyid dang srid par 'gyur te smin drug sdig pa'i nyi ma la// skye ba dang ni gzhu la nyi ma gnas pa mgo dag la yang de bzhin rga shi rim
88a1(rgyud 'bum): bskye/ / de ts+tsha shA Na'i dbye ba dag las gnyis sa bzong brji btugs rnal po spyan lag 'acug nas // rgyal dang mar+g+ha mi mtshamasas su chin
88a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyis gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa/ / de nas gnyis pa la na shi bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin skye sa gsum pa la'o// de bzhin srid pa la sogs thams ca
88a3(rgyud 'bum): san las bcug nas bar du rim pa dan gis seMngs su 'gyur/ / de nas me dang drug ter 'da' ste tshu srin bzong ba'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag zus pa'o//
88a4(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba rdzog pa mas grogs te sa rmya ba'i dubyu gas rab 'gar stan sdug pan drug gis// 'du byed sa ma mtshams dag tuste bum paranam ston pa de la 'du byed rlon sa
88a5(rgyud 'bum): sa mngon pa po shes pa m+WAr hU~M tsan nag gsum pa la ri mdu rang gzugs/ / de ltar ts+tsha pa gnyis la yan lag tu gyur ni ma'i dbang gis sgo dang bsngo ba'i
88a6(rgyud 'bum): nus so/ / de lus sa yan la sa rnam pa snang nug su s+yA ge ltar 'thar // seM 'an byed la sogs ma thum buM ga kyang rgyas byung byung ba rnang pa shes
88a7(rgyud 'bum): mas/ de banin phyogs kyi dbye ma dran mo ri bo can gyi bathong po'i rabang gas lam la ga brgya gces gang // dag dang dan po'i phyogs yang bang po'i ches grangs dbang sa
88b1(rgyud 'bum): spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba dag gis so/ / nyi ma mig dmar mjug rings spen pa g.yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dgra ni 'chi bar byed// g.yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin
88b2(rgyud 'bum): gza' tshogs mtha' dag g.yul gyi sar ni de bzhin kho na'o/ / rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g.yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste// g.yon dang mdun du 'chi
88b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rang bzhin mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pas gnyis ka'i dpung ni 'joms par 'gyur/ / tshangs ma drag mo gzhon nu ma dang mkha' 'gro'i bdag gis 'gro ma phag mo rdo rje lag ma
88b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / tsa mur+t+ta nyid dpal mo dag ni nor gyi tshe sa la 'gyur te dang po'i ches dang dgu pa la// brgya byin du ste gnod sbyin me zur lha min gshin rje chu lha rlung dang dbang ldan sa la'o// 'di
88b5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'char ba dag tu byed de slar yang tshes rnams la ni brgyad gnyis dbye bas tha dad do/ / biSh+Ti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs la brgya byin gshin rje chu dang gnod sbyin du yang 'dir 'char
88b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / slar yang nag po'i phyogs la rtse mo can dang lha min rlung dang dbang ldan zur du rim pas so// drag po shar nas gzhan phyed du 'gro nyin zhag dbang gis byang du yang ste byang gi nyi
88b7(rgyud 'bum): ma la'o/ / chu nas me ldan dag tu de ni nges par 'gro ste lho ru lho yi nyi ma dag la'o// shar nas thun phyed dag la rlung du rab tu 'jug ste de bzhin du ni lho ru 'gro bar byed// dbang ldan
89a1(rgyud 'bum): chu dang me dang gnod sbyin lha min grong khyer du 'gro rlung du nyi ma nub par 'gyur/ / dpal ldar rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang rnam par rgyal 'gyur mtshan ma'i
89a2(rgyud 'bum): 'thab mo dang / / 'khrug pa dag la rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyi ni dgra yi stobs 'joms de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod mir// dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul la lhag
