89a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gis 'joms par byed pa swA/ / dbugs la gnyis kye man gang skang la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'khug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i mang de rnam par rgyal
89a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming ni pham par 'gyur/ / 'du ba kha dog dbyangs la sogs pa mnyam dang mi mnyam 'gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras med ston pa nyid// dus ni 'thab mo'i sa la mi
89a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag rnams kyi g.yas dang gal te g.yas min dag la mun can gyur/ / g.yul du lha yi mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur//
89a6(rgyud 'bum): de phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan 'khyog po drag po lha ma ni rnams las srid gsum rnam rgyal ba// g.yul gyi dus su sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni
89a7(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa med/ / sa la rgyu skar byas nas thub pa dus kyis bsgyur ba dbang po gnod sbyin chu dang gshin rjer ni// de yi 'khor lo 'khor bar byed de nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis
89b1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag rnams ni rig par bya/ / rgyu skar gang la dus dang mun can du yang rab gyur lta ba lhung na gnyis po dag la yang // g.yul du dgra yi sde rnams dag ni 'phral la nges par ltung //
89b2(rgyud 'bum): ste lto yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur// sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams ni 'chi dang bcas par 'gyur zhing dpung rnams mnyam du lhung ba ni// lta ba'i cha la nges song rnams te brang
89b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur/ / lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams ngag rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te lto bar zhugs la gnyis po yang // de ltar dpal
89b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya/ / rnal 'byor ma dang baiSh+Ti drag po gza' tshogs dang bcas dbyangs ni 'char ba dag dang
89b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas gyur pa/ / de dag thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis srid gsum rnam rgyal gcig pu gzung bar bya ba ste// gang gis zla ba nyim za zhing skabs gsum pa
89b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag 'jigs byed drag po'i gzugs can mig sman mdog/ sa la gang zhig nyin dang mtshan mor shar dang nub dang lho dang byang du yang ni 'khor ba'o// g.yul du 'pham pa'i
89b7(rgyud 'bum): dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la rdzong gi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na/ / phyi rol tu ni 'khrul 'khor bya ste rgyun chad med par rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bab pa dang // ral gri la sogs
90a1(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag dang sa gzhi'i gnas la gur dang cog ni dbye ba yis/ / de yi rdzong ni phye mar byas te nyin nag cung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub/
90a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas granas brgyad du ni phug gyur pa// tha dad rnams nI ka dang bu chu gter dus dang dus rnams kyis te rgyab tu yang
90a3(rgyud 'bum): ni gcig gis so/ / rtsa bar 'khrul 'khor tshwad ni lag pa ban+du ru 'gyur te steng gi cha dag la na~M de yi phyed// sgyogs mda' khru gnyis ngag gis dman par 'gyur te o log bcu yi steng gi na
90a4(rgyud 'bum): ni lhag pa'o/ / zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis dag ste sor mo thub pa ma nur nges pa'i bug pa gcig tu ni// khru gang dor nas sgyogs mnga' rab tu gzhug ste o log bcu yi rgyab kyi cha
90a5(rgyud 'bum): la gzer gyis gdab/ / mgo bor a long dag la thag pa lnga bcu gdags par bya ste steng gi tshad ni zlum po phyed// sgyogs mnga'i mthar ni mdzub mo dang bcas rab tu 'jug ste
90a6(rgyud 'bum): gnya' non zlum po dag ni mtho gang ngo / / sgyogs mda'i mdzub mo la ni'ur mthil thag par bcas pa dag las nges par khru gsum dag tu 'gyur// de yi nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste
90a7(rgyud 'bum): stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis 'then par gyur pa dag/ btang ba myur du nam mkhar 'gro ste 'phral la nges par ltung zhing khang steng sogs dang lam srang du// mtha' dag phye mar
90b1(rgyud 'bum): / byas nas sa yi 'og tu 'gro ste rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin// de yi mdzub mo zla ba phyed pas sa gzhi'i gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo ngos gnyis dag tu ni// brgyad gnyis btang ba'i
90b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas rnams dag ste lag pa gnyis ka'i khu tshur bcings pa las ni gtang bar bya/ / gtong ba sa la reg pa nyid de mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa 'khrul 'khor nang du gnas pas ni//
90b3(rgyud 'bum): rang 'dod rdo ba ltung ste rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdzong gi rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o// gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen 'phral la nges par ltung ba de la srog chags phra mo dag ni ci//
90b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzong gi steng khang la gnas dgra dpung ma lus gang dag phyi rol gnas par ltung bar byed pa ste// sa stengs gnas su rdzong gi 'thab mo la ni gzhu 'dzin rnams kyis de dang lhan cig su zhig 'gran/
90b5(rgyud 'bum): gang du 'khrul 'khor rab bsdun rdzong der dgra bo su zhig zhugs pa dag ni gshin rje'i kha ru'o// ka ba dpung pa drug drug dag gis gnyis ka'i nang ni mnyam pa khru ni zung gi bar dag la/
90b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po re re'i nyi ma'i khru ru 'gyur te gnyis ka nang ni mnyam pa lhag bcas med pa nyid// so so'i re mig kun la spang leb dag dang pags pa spra tshil gos rnams kyis kyang g.yogs pa ste/
90b7(rgyud 'bum): snying po dus dang brgyad dang skyon dang sum 'gyur nyin byed kyis kyang 'khrul 'khor gcig ni rab tu bya// gnyis gnyis snying po'i bar du 'khrul pa dag kyang dpung pa rnams kyis brgya yis btab
91a1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am kun nas so/ / rgyab tu skye ba 'dzin pa drug ste mdun nas dpung ba gnyis ka mnyam pa 'khrul 'khor 'dren pa 'am// kra ba'i khung bur rab tu btsugs pa
91a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'i rlung gi dar rnams kyis ni rlung gis bskyod pa ste/ / de la zhon pa rang gi snga ni chu yi rdzong dag nyams pa'i don du chu yi gter la 'gro// chu gter zur ldan stegs bu gcig la g.yo
91a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rlung gi dar dang rgyal mtshan bcas pa ka bar gdags/ / rgyab kyi phyogs nas mi rnams dag gis drangs shing sa las thag pa dag gis steng du 'gro ba ni// rlung gis rab tu bskyod/
91a4(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa nges par brag gi rdzong gi steng du mkha' la 'gro ba ste// de nas me yi 'bru mar 'phangs pas dgra yi dpung dang rdzong ni thams cad kun nas sreg par byed// 'khor lo'i rtsa
91a5(rgyud 'bum): bar gnam gdan rtse gcig pa ni gzhug cing steng du yang ni 'khor lo dag la ni/ / sor mo gnyis gnyis bar du rtsibs su 'gyur te zlum po'i mtha' ma ma lus par ni dgod par bya//
91a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo khru ni phyed dang gsum par 'gyur zhing gnam gad steng du gzhan yang der ni srog shing ste// srog shing steng du ral gri rnon po myur bar 'khor te 'khrul 'khor gyi ni rtsa ba
91a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bas so/ / thag pa yis ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor nam mkha' dag la 'gro ste rang gi phyogs nas rim pas so// rdzong gi steng dang dgra yi khyim du so sor 'gro bar nges pa nyis
91b1(rgyud 'bum): du thag pa drangs byas nas/ / sa la tshad kyang de yis brjod par 'gyur te dgra rnams kyi ni rdzong gi rtse mo 'byed pa yas// rtse la bkod de dgra yaM khang pa'i gzhi dang 'dun sa drag la
91b2(rgyud 'bum): me ni rab tu sbyin par bya/ / 'khor lo rnams kyi steng gi cha la lcags dang shing rnams ngag gis khang pa chen po bkod pa ni// spang leb dang ni ma he'i pags pa rnams kyis kun
91b3(rgyud 'bum): nas g.yogs par gyur pa zum po'i rnam pa ste/ / mi rnams dag gis bskyod par gyur pa mnyam pa'i sa la 'obs ni ji srid nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur// 'obs de bkang nas mkhar
91b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi rtsig pa dang ni lam srung dag tu 'phral la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ / stegs bur phur pa gnyis la nges par rgyud dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni g.yo ba med par btags byas nas// rgyab
91b5(rgyud 'bum): tu lcags kyi phur pa gnyis la legs bkod 'khrul shing la ni sor mo lta bur phyed 'khyogs rnams/ / sor mo'i rtse mo dag la gzhu rgyud kyis ni mang zhing mnyam pa'i mnga' 'am lcags
91b6(rgyud 'bum): mda' rnon po rnams/ / g.yul gyi dus su 'phangs pas go cha dang bcas glang chen lus po phug nas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ka ba gnyis ni sa yi nang du brtan par btsugs pa tha
91b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis dkris par 'gyur pa ste/ / thag pa'i dbus su ral gri'i chang gzung tshud pa zlum po dang bcas bskor ba du mas bskor gyur pa// de yi dbus su ral gri'i chang
92a1(rgyud 'bum): gzung nges par g.yo ba med par gzer gyis btab par rab tu 'gyur/ / gzer dang thug par bcas pa g.yog par bya zhing ral gri'i so yi rtse mo'i cha yang mnan par/
92a2(rgyud 'bum): bya// de yi steng du bug pa'i ri khA can gyi spang leb las ni bskul bar 'gyur ba 'thon pa'o// ral gri'i steng du zla ba'i dbus kyi chal lcags lus byas pa'i chung ngu gcig kya
92a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / zla ba'i steng du gang gi rkang pa bzhag pa de ni 'phral la ral gri yis kyang gcod par byed// mkhar gyi sgo yi mtha' rnams dang ni mi yi bdag po'i khang par 'khrul
92a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kho na mtshon cha'o/ / srog shing steng du nyi ma'i lag pas rtsa ba'i gnas su 'gyur te 'khor lo'i tshad la dgu cha'o// zur du ka ba 'phreng gdang mnyam dang mi mnyam shing 6
92a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas las gnyis dang phyed kyi tshad kyis so/ / cha phyed dag la 'thab mo pa yaM si ste mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dren byed rta 'am glang po rnams// de nas 'khor lo'i phyed kyis la steng du me
92a6(rgyud 'bum): long do shwal rgyul mtshan la sogs bkod pa'o/ / gcig phyed cha gnyis dag ste zla ba lag pa rtse mo can rnams rtsa ba'i gnas dang gdan rnams kyi// zlum po phyed bcas gcig cha
92a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i shing rta'i sa ni dga' ba'i dbye ba dag la mnyam par 'gyur/ / rten dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i tshad ni rta dang glang po'i dbang gis phyed dang bcas pa rnam gnyis kyang //
92b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ni pad+ma'i rigs te lha yi bu yisra bkod pa dga' ba'i rigs ni mi rnams kyi// brgyad dang chu ga trer srog shing 'khor lo rnams kyis rnam gsum 'dir ni shing rnga chen po phyed/
92b2(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam// nyi ma'i shing rta mchog ni 'khor lo gcig pa mi mnyam rta yang lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms// g.yul du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba mi mnyam mnyam pa'i shing
92b3(rgyud 'bum): rta chen po rgyal rigs rnams kyi'o/ / steng dang mngon du phyogs pa 'joms te mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul du rgya ba ni 'joms pa mnyam par 'gyur// drug lnga chu gter maM ya
92b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag gis ka ba'i rtse mor bug pa mnyam par rab tu 'gyur/ / rtsa ba dag las steng du phyed kyi cha ni rtse ga ma'i dbang gis 'gyur te lha rnams gzhal med khang // de bzhin
92b5(rgyud 'bum): sa la mi bdag rnams kyi rnam gsum rtseg ma'i dbang gis yul gyi ltad mo dga' ston la/ / khru nas khru yi bar dag gis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'khor ba dang ldan chen por rab tu 'gyur//
92b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i steng du ka ba'i rtse mo dag la rnam gsum rtseg ma'i dbang gis khyogs rnams phyogs kun tu// brgyad gnyis brgyad dang de nas phyed de phyogs dang dus dang dus ngag las
92b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rten nyid sa gsum la/ / steng dang 'og tu 'khor bar byed pa lag pas bzung ba'i 'khrul shing la ni bu mo rnams kyi stan// nang dang phyi rol dag tu gnas pa 'og dang steng du son cing
93a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs brgyad du ni 'khyog pa rnams/ / steng dang 'og tu sbubs ni 'khyog por 'gyur te kun nas sbubs kyi rnam pa dag gis 'khrul 'khor ro// sbubs kyi rgyu
93a2(rgyud 'bum): mor bum pa'i gzugs la bug pa yang ni sbubs kyi bug pa dag gi tshad du 'gyur/ / chu ni 'dren par byed cing drangs pa'i chu ni btang bar gyur pa dag kyang bum pa'i bu ga nas// skyed mos
93a3(rgyud 'bum): tshal dang ldum ra dag gi mnyam pa'i sa la gang du drangs pa der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ / rab mchog sa gzhi dag la gdug pa can rnams sgrub pa'i don dang chos dang ldan pa rgyal don du//
93a4(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srid gsum bla mas zla ba bzang la thams cad sngon du gsungs pa gang // de yi nang nas cung zad tsam zhig 'dir ni de ring yul 'dir khyod la bdag gis gsal
93a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bstan/ / rang gnas srung ba'i don du 'di dag mtha' dag gyis shig zhe sdang chags pas min no nyi ma kye// chang dang lan tshwa'i chu gter dbus su thub pa sa yi dkyil 'khor la ni
93a6(rgyud 'bum): las sa yang dag gnas/ / dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum la nyi ma'i dum bu rnams su mi yi bdag po rim pas 'khor bar 'gyur// dum bu gcig la dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu
93a7(rgyud 'bum): lnga ste nor gyi 'dab ma dag dang bcas pa'o/ / de yi dbus na kai la sha ste mchog gi gangs ri yis ni phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba'o// sa la kaM la sha yi dum bu gangs kyi ri dang bcas
93b1(rgyud 'bum): ba de ni kun nas sum cha ste/ / phyi rol du ni 'dab ma re re dag kyang nyin byed yul dang gling gi yul rnams ngag gis brgyan// g.yas kyi phyed nA sham b+ha lar grags thub mchog gi
93b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas grong ni bye ba lhag par gnas pa ste/ / bye ba'i grong gis nges par bcings pa yul du 'gyur te rgyal khams grong na 'bum phrag rnams kyis so// gcig gnyis gsum dang
93b3(rgyud 'bum): chu gter dbye ba mda' ro thub pa lnga dang 'jig rten la sogs dbye ba yis/ / phye ba ma dbang 'khor lo can nas gzha dag la 'khor te rnam shes ldan pas btsal bar bya// 'khor lo can
93b4(rgyud 'bum): dang phyed can dum bu can ni yul gyi mi bdag phyag rgya'i lag na de las gzhan/ / phyi rol du ni dus kyi dbye ba nges par 'gyur te ji ltar 'jig rten mgon gyi de bzhin no// 'od zer bdun
93b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ri gza' thub rnams 'dir ni de bzhin snying stobs ldan pa lha yi skye gnas te/ / nya dang rus sbal phag pa mi yi seng ge dang bcas ma'u thung dang yA mad ag ni dang // rA ma nag po de ltar
93b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad ni lha min rigs la 'jigs ster rdul gyi 'byung po'i skye gnas so/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis gdan gyi mthar ni lha min dgra bo che le brgya pa phyag na 'khor lor 'gyur// A dra a
93b7(rgyud 'bum): no g+ha dang phag ldan lha min lag 'gro'i rigs la mun pa can ni gzhan yang lnga/ / byi ba dbang po gos dkar can dang sbrang rtsi'i blo gros 'joms byed brgyad pa gang de mun pa can// gas
94a1(rgyud 'bum): bar mkha'i yul gyi bA ga da sogs grong khyer du ni bdun pa yang dag skyes pa ste/ / gang du 'jig rten lha mir yan lag stobs dang ldan par gnas shing brtse ba
94a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa kla klo'i gzugs/ / rnga mo rta dang ba lang bsad nas khrag dang bcas pa'i sha ni cung zad btsos pa 'ba' zhig dang // ba lang sha dang dngul chu chu dang mar dang tsha ba mnyam pa 'bras drang
94a3(rgyud 'bum): lo ma bsres pa ni/ / gcig tu me la btsos pa nags kyi 'bras bu dag dang bcas pa gang du mi rnams dag gi zas// btung ba bya rnams ngag gi sgo ngar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po de ni lha min
94a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi gnas/ / thig le nus ma mig sman dag dang mkha' lding lha yi chu bo mi sbyin dang ni 'dod 'dze dang // rdzong dang glog dang rig pa bzang por 'gyur med mchog gi cha dang lha yi skad
94a5(rgyud 'bum): dang lus med de/ / yang dag rgyu ba'i gzugs 'di rnams kyis sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro rgyal ba yi ni ye shes sku// byung bar gyur dang byung dang 'byung 'gyur rig byed rtog ge la
94a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs bstan bcos mtha' dag rab tu smra/ / dpal ldan rgyal po nyi ma 'ga' zhig dag gis sham b+ha la zhes rab tu grags pa'i ka lA pa// phyogs bzhi dag ni r-i yis bskor zhing
94a7(rgyud 'bum): mnga' yis bsgyur ba brgya yi dpag tshad rnams kyi tshad du ni/ / lha yi dbang po rab mchog mi yi bdag por bzhag nas khyod ni rang gi gnas su 'gro bar gyis// dpal ldan shAkya'i rigs
94b1(rgyud 'bum): la rab gsal mi yi bdag po badz+ra te brgyad pa dpal ldan grags pa yang / / 'di ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha yi mchog gis btud pa rdo rje'i rigs kyis rig ldan te/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur byin
94b2(rgyud 'bum): nas mtha' dag thub pa'i rigs rnams dgra ni rigs gcig dag tu byed par 'gyur/ / yang dag theg par mngon 'dzegs lha min rigs la 'jigs ster dpal ldan grags pa phyag
94b3(rgyud 'bum): na mdung thung can/ / sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du sa la dus kyi 'khor lo rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur// de yi dbus su gdan ni nyi shu rtsa lA rim par yongs su
94b4(rgyud 'bum): bgrangs pa dag gi dus kyi mthar/ / rigs ldan rigs la lha yi dbang po lha yi mchog gis btud pa drag po'i rigs ldan 'byung bar 'gyur// dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs
94b5(rgyud 'bum): te ba de ster zhes pa de bzhin kla klo'i rigs la mthar byed nyid/ / rdo yi rta bcibs 'khor le can ni phyag na mdung thung mtha' dag dgra la snun byed nyi ma'i gzo// rigs ldan rigs
94b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbus su lag pas bsgyur ba'i dus kyi bu dang tsha bo dag ni 'das gyur pa/ / de yi dus su nges par ma ga'i yul du kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa dag tu 'gyur// ji snyed kla klor
94b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po gdug pa ji snyed lha yi mchog gis btud pa drag po'i rigs ldan yang / / de yi dus su gnyis po dag kyang sa yi steng gi gnas su 'khrug pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yul
95a1(rgyud 'bum): du kra kro dag la snun byed mtha' dgra sa yi steng du rang gi dpung ni yan lag bzhi/ / dus mthar kaM la sha yi ri bo lnga yis bkod pa'i grong nas 'khor lo sgyur ba 'byung
95a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / drag po phung po tshogs kyi dbang po 'phrog byed dag kyang rigs ldan la ni srog dag sbyin 'gyur te// rdo rta glang po'i dbang po gser gyi shing rta mi bdag phyag na mtshon ldan dpa
95a3(rgyud 'bum): bo rnams kyang ngo / / rdo yi rta ni rlung gi shugs can yon tan gyis bsgyur yon tan bye ba kha dog sna tshogs pa// chang gis dregs pa'i glang chen rig byed ces pa'i 'bum phrag grangs dang
95a4(rgyud 'bum): shing rta 'bum phrag 'byung ba dang / / ak+Shau hi ni drug dang mi yi dbang po cod pan bcings pa'i rigs ni ro dang dgu bcu ste// rigs ldan khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dag dang bcas pa
95a5(rgyud 'bum): sde 'di dag gis kla klo rlag par byed par 'gyur/ / mchog tu tsha ba'i dpa' bo rnams kyis kla klo'i tshogs la bsnun bya glang po'i dbang pos glang po la// rdo yi rta yis rta rnams la ste mnyam dang
95a6(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam g.yul du sa skyong rnams kyi sa skyong la/ / rta la gnas pa zla ba chen po'i bu naM ha nu mAn brnon po'i mtshon gyis snun par 'gyur// drag po kla klo'i dbang mgon mtha' dag lha min
95a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag po byas pa'i blo la drag po'i rigs ldan gyis/ / dpung ni thams cad dag gis g.yul du kla klo bcom nas khyab 'jug drag po dang bcas rigs ldan ni// kai la sha yi ri bo lha yis
95b1(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i grong khyer gang du 'khor lo can dag gnas par 'gro/ / de yi dus su 'dzin ma dag la mtha' dag skye bo'i rigs ni chos dang 'dod pa nor rnams rdzogs// 'bru rnams dgon par skye
95b2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni shing rnams 'bras bu brtan pos dud 'ang drug 'byung bar 'gyur/ / kla klo'i tshogs ni 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rab tu bcad nas mi yi lo ni brgya phyed na// rigs ldan grub par
95b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te lha yis bkod pa'i pho brang mtho ba kai la sha yi rgyab tu'o/ / lha dang mi yi bla ma'i sras ni tshangs pa lha yi dbang po zung gi chos la 'byung ba dag/ tshangs pa rgyab tu dum bu gcig la mi
95b4(rgyud 'bum): yi bdag por 'gyur te sa kun la ni lha yi dbang / / rdzogs ldan mtshams su kla klo'i chos rnams mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dag gis bcad byas te// bcad nas lo ni brgyad
95b5(rgyud 'bum): brgya rnams su tshangs pa bzhag pa mdzad nas bde ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ / slar yang de nyid dbus su mi yi bdag po sras rnams ngag gi rigs kyi dbye ba dag tu 'gyur// de rnams
95b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su lha man dbang po mi bdag thub pa rnams ni phal ba gzhan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ / kla klo rnams ni gzhom pa'i slad du lha yi bdag po dbang po bcu gnyis dag dang ldan par 'gro// dum bu
95b7(rgyud 'bum): dum bu dag tu ma gro'i chos ni bcom nas 'khor lo can yang bde ba'i gnas su 'gro/ / skabs gsum pa dang mo yi bla ma'i sras ni tshangs dang lha yi dbang po rgyab dang mdun du ste// rgyab tu tshangs /
96a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs rigs rnams rnam pa sna tshogs sa yi stang du dbye ba du mar 'gyur// tshangs pa sogs la mi rnams lo ni brgya phrag bco brgyad dang ldan 'di dag mi rnams ngag gi
96a2(rgyud 'bum): tshe/ / de yi byed ni 'od srungs kyi 'o rab mchog sa yi steng du dpal ldan mi yi seng ge'i phyed// drug nus dman pa de bzhin nyid du dus bzhi so so'i dus su mi thung sogs la 'phrog byed kyi// rigs
96a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan mthar ni ji srid brgya phrag gcig ni lo yi grangs kyi skye bo'i tshe ru rab tu 'gyur/ / de ltar dum+b+ha bu thams cad du yang dus bzhi'i dus su kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa ste// lo na brgyad
96a4(rgyud 'bum): dang brgya phrag gcig tu nges par gnas te de nas kla klo'i chos ni nyams pa'o/ / de nas lo na stong phrag nyi shu lag pa brgya dang bral ba sangs rgyas chos ni rab tu 'jug/ rdzogs ldan
96a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum ldan gnyis ldan rtsod pa'i dus na nus pa'i tshad kyis sa gzhi dag la nges par rgyu/ / 'jig rten khams ni skyed pa dag dang gza' yi rgyu ba mnyam pa 'khor lo can ni 'byung ba dang /
96a6(rgyud 'bum): kla klo rnams kyi chos ni nyams shing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas la rigs ldan gyis ni lam sbyon ba// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis khyod la don ni ji bzhin bshad do zla ba bzang po dus
96a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum las/ / slar yang khyod ni skye bo kun la phan pa'i don dang thar pa'i slad du bdag la ci zhig 'dri// dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ 'jig rten
96b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / / mi shes sna tshogs tshad ni gang dag rgyal ba skyed mdzad khyod kyis bstan pa bdag kyang bdag gis te// slar yang bdag
96b2(rgyud 'bum): ni mnyan par 'tshal lo srid pa gsum po mtha' dag lus kyi dbus su ji ltar lags/ / zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas legs zhes bya ba byin nas rab
96b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du mchog gi thugs rdza sna tshogs tshad rnams ngag kyang lus la'o// sa dang chu me rlung dang rdo rje lha yi gzhu dang rlung rnams dang mi khyim kyi
96b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dang / / zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan lhun po gdengs can ma dang lha yi gnas dpar khyog po skar mar bcas// 'pho ba zla ba dag dang phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo tshes rnams mtha' dag
96b5(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi dbus su ni/ / rang rang yi ges shes bya rnam gsum khyab bdag bgrod pa rnal 'byor pa yis stong pa'i dbye bas so// lus 'di la ni khams kyi tshogs su mtha' dag ro drug zos shing
96b6(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs pa dag las 'gyur ba ste/ / ro drug rnams kyang 'byung ba las te rab gsal nges par 'byung ba'i tshogs kyang nam mkha'i khams la'o// stong pa la ni ye shes rnam par bsres pa
96b7(rgyud 'bum): ro mnyam 'gyur med rtag par yang ni 'gyur ba ste/ / de ltar 'byung ba la gnas zhi ba rnam gsum srid pa la gnas rang gi lus la rig par bya// sa bon pad+mar gnas pa dag ni 'dzir mas
97a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin te de las chu yis sdud do phyi nas ni/ / me yis smin par byed cing ro dang ro ni za bar byed de 'di yi 'phel ba rlung gis so// nam mkha' dag kyang 'phel ba'i go
97a2(rgyud 'bum): skabs sbyin byed mi yi bdag po dus las de ltar grub pa ste/ / btsa' bar gyur pa'i dus dang byis pa la sogs dus rtag tu yang lha yi gnas skabs rnams byed do// sa bon dag gis ni
97a3(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid byed chu ni de bzhin gsher ba nyid/ / mes ni smin par byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi rlung rnams dag ni 'di yis 'phel ba'o// 'phel ba dag la
97a4(rgyud 'bum): slar yang nam mkha' nyid ni gau skabs byin byed dus las de ltar bskyed pa ste/ / sna tshogs dngos po du ma dag gis lus bcas sgra dang yid dang nus pa rnams ni spro bar byed// gsang ba'i
97a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+mar khrag gi nang du gang tshe lhung ba'i byang chub sa bon srog dang bcas po dag/ nya dang rus sbal phag par 'gyur te mi yi seng ge mi thung rA ma rA ma dag dang ni// nag po sangs rgyas mi dbang
97a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam bcur 'gyur te 'di dag rnams kyang gnas skabs rnam pa bcu yin no/ / mngal du gsum ste de bzhin btsa' ba'i dus su gcig dang byis pa'i dus dag tu yang rnam pa gnyis// gzhon
97a7(rgyud 'bum): nu lang tsho dag la gzhan du rab tu 'gyur te rgyas pa gcig dang yang dag de bzhin gcig/ rgan po nyid la zhi ba gcig ste mngal skyes rnams kyi srid pa 'chi ba nyid ni mtha' ma'o// zhal
97b1(rgyud 'bum): / yis rnam par 'gyur ba nyin zhag 'ga' ste rus sbal la ne rus sbal dngos po yang // phag pa la yang de ya skye mched nyi ma 'byung ste ma ya sang ge la na rab tu skye// mi thung la ni byis pa'i dngos
97b2(rgyud 'bum): po rA ma la yang mi bdag gnyis kyi so rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ / slar yang rAm la ni ltung bar 'gyur te de nyid nag po la ni gsal bar sgyu dag byed// sangs rgyas la yang zhi ba dang ni brtul
97b3(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nges pa byed de rigs ldan la ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ / khu ba las ni rkang dang rus pa rgyus par 'gyur te rdul las pags pa khrag dang sha nyid do// mngal gyi nang du zla ba gcig ni khrag
97b4(rgyud 'bum): dang sa bon bdud rtsi'i ror gyur rab tu skye ba ste/ / phyi nas sa bon myu gu rang gi snying khar rnam pa bcu yi rtsa ni shin tu phra ba'o// lte ba la yang brgyad pa brgyad ni gzhan te rkang lag gdong rnams
97b5(rgyud 'bum): la ni gyen du spyod par byed/ / zla ba gnyis par rdzogs par gyur pa dag la 'dir ni rkang lag gdong gis mtshor pa cung zad do// zla ba gsum pa rdzogs pa na ni lag pa rkang
97b6(rgyud 'bum): pa mgrin pa dag gi mgo bo mnyam par 'gyur/ / phra mo'i rtsi rnams zla ba bzhi pa la ni rkang lag gdong dang mgrin pa dag gi phyogs su ste// lnga pa la ni sha dang khrag dang rus pa mkha' ro sreg za dag
97b7(rgyud 'bum): ste tshigs rnams dag kyang ngo / / zla ba drug pa la yang sha dang khrag tu 'gyur te tshor ba bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal yang // smin ma skra dang spu dang bug pa rnams kyang thub mchog la ste rtsa ni lhag
98a1(rgyud 'bum): mar gyur pa rnams/ / zla ba'i mjug tu nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis stong pa stong pa mig gi grangs ni skye ba ste// gnas dang rus pa rkang du 'gyur te ro 'dzin dang nI gcib
98a2(rgyud 'bum): bshang ba brgyad pa dag la yang / / bug pa zhes la btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas kyi ni btsir ba dag gis sdug bsngal drag po'o// mngal du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal btsa' ba'i dus dang
98a3(rgyud 'bum): byis pa'i dngos po la yang sdug bsngal te/ / gzhon nu dang ni lang tshe dag la bud med nor dang 'byor nyams nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang // rgan po nyid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal
98a4(rgyud 'bum): slar yang 'gro ba drug tu 'jigs ster du 'bod la sogs te/ / sgyu mas rmongs par byas pa'i mtha' dag 'gro ba 'di ni sdug bsngal dag las sdug bsngal 'dzin par byed// 'khor bar
98a5(rgyud 'bum): mi nyid du ni 'gyur ba dag kyang 'ga' zhig tu ste chos kyi blo na ris 'ga' na/ / de bas sangs rgyas la ni rjes chags dge ba'i dbang gis 'gyur zhing dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug/ de
98a6(rgyud 'bum): bas dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa sgom pa lnga ni blo gros ma lus brgya lam dag la 'jug/ de las sangs rgyas nyid 'dod mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la 'jug pa e ma shin tu dka'// mngal
98a7(rgyud 'bum): du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste btsa' ba'i dus nas so ni skyes pa dag kyang chos kyi'o/ / so rnams rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba yi ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// de nas
98b1(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i sku ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par 'chi ba'i mtshams te mi rnams ngag gi'o/ / mngal dang phyi rol dag tu slar yang 'di ni ye shes rnam shes dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur// rnam
98b2(rgyud 'bum): shes zla ba nyi ma dag kyang pad+mar gnas pa de ni mngal du dag pa'i sku yin te/ / khams dang phung po rab tu 'byung ba rnam pa bcu po gang yin rgyal ba yi ni chos kyi sku// de nas yon tan dbang
98b3(rgyud 'bum): gis rna ba sgra sogs skyes pa dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ / de nas sgra la sogs pa skyes te rab tu btsa' ba'i dus kyang 'dir ni sprul pa dag gi sku// skyes pa na ni nges par
98b4(rgyud 'bum): dbugs dag gang zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de nyid dag pa'i sku/ / de nas so ni rab byung gang zhig tshig ni gsal min dag kyang de bzhin nyid du chos kyi sku// de nas gnyis skyes
98b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni lhung bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ / so rnams ngag las 'chi ba'i mtshams ni phyi ru rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur// mngal du
98b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni dang po dpal ldan sku yi rdo rjer 'gyur te gsung gi rang bzhin skyes pa'o/ / thugs ni so dag rab tu skyes pa nyid na'o slar yang lhung nas ye shes rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur// ye shes
98b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes bsres shing zhim ri bong can dang bcas pa ye shes rdo rje la sogs kun/ / mngal na gnas pa dag ni sku yi rdo rje la sogs rim pa yis kyang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// sa
99a1(rgyud 'bum): yi snying po dag ni sreg zar 'gyur te 'dzin ma dang ni rlung dag stong pa'i srung po'o/ / rlung dang sa yi snying po dag ni chu nyid du 'gyur rang bzhin med pa dang ni rang bzhin no//
99a2(rgyud 'bum): sa yi rten ni chu gter 'bar byed dag kyang chu yi rlung ni dag par byed pa dag gi'o// rlung gi stong par rab tu 'gyur te mi yi dbang po 'byung ba'i rten dang brten pa ji lta bzhin// phung po'i rten
99a3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byung ba rnams su 'gyur te lus mchog dag la 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rtsa rnams so/ / rtsa rnams kyi ni srog rlung rnam pa bcu por 'gyur te srog gi rlung rnams dag gi sems yin no//
99a4(rgyud 'bum): sems de gnyis kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur yon tan dbang gis rang bzhin can dang rang bzhin med pa'o// de dag gi yang rten ni gtso bo srid pa gsum gyis btud cing gzhom med kun tu 'gro/
99a5(rgyud 'bum): bapa yang // dri ni 'dzin ma dag las 'byung ste ro yang rtse mo can las gzugs kyi khams ni chu las so// rlung las reg par 'gyur te zhi ba las kyang sgra dang chos kyi khams ni nam
99a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dag las so/ / stong pa sgra ni 'dzin par byed de nges par rgyal ba skyed mdzad chos kyi khams dang rlung dag no// dri dang me yang gzugs te chu dag kyang ni ro 'o de bzhin 'dzin ma dag ni reg
99a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / grub pa gzugs ni 'dzin ma la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su chu la yang ni 'du shes grub// me la nges pa nyid du tshor bar 'gyur te rlung la yang ni phung po 'du byed kho na'o// rnam
99b1(rgyud 'bum): shes ye shes bsres pa nam mkha' dang bcas rdo rje dag la grub pa nyid de lus 'di la/ / khams dang phung po la sogs thams cad 'gyur ba dag kyang rdul dang byang chub sems sogs sbyor
99b2(rgyud 'bum): bas so/ / rna ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems ni nam mkha' dag gi rang bzhin no// sA ni sa yi rang bzhin dag ste de bzhin kho na lce ni me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur// mig
99b3(rgyud 'bum): ni chu yi rang bzhin dag ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyang rlung gi rang bzhin no/ / de ltar rna ba la sogs thams cad yon tan dbang gis 'gyur te ye shes rnam shes sbyor bas so//
99b4(rgyud 'bum): ser sna ye shes khams la 'gyur te lus mchog dag la nam mkha' la ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o// rlung la phrag dog rdo rje me la chags pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsal mdzad de bzhin nyid du ni// tshu la dpal
99b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan nga rgyal rdo rje sa la gti mug rdo rje rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so/ / ngag dang lag pa rkang pa bshang lam thams cad rlung me chu dang sa rnams ngag las 'byung bar 'gyur// thur sel ye shes
99b6(rgyud 'bum): khams la rnam gsum zhes par 'gyur te srog gi rlung yang stong pa dag la'o/ / rlung gi dbus su mnyam gnas rtse mo can la slar yang gyen chu chu la khyab par byed pa nyid// sa la klu ste de nas rus
99b7(rgyud 'bum): sbal rtsang ba dang ni lha sbyin nor las rgyal ba dag gi rlung / / bzhi po rlung dang mdag dang ni chu dang sa rnams dag la rim pa yis ni yang dag 'gyur// gtsug tor stong pa'i khams la 'gyur te/
100a1(rgyud 'bum): lA dang mi rnams kyi ni ye shes khams la gsang ba'o// snying gi pad+ma rlung gi khams la rab gsal rtse mo can la mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gsal bar ro// tshul
100a2(rgyud 'bum): smin ma'i nang gi pad+ma nor ni nor gyi 'dab ldan lte ba'i pad+ma sa la'o/ / rkang pa lag pa dag gi tshigs drug sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung rnams dag la gsum gyi grangs// sa sogs
100a3(rgyud 'bum): khams lnga dag la rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba rkang pa lag pa dag gi ni/ / mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mtha' dag
100a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / de dag seran mo'i mthar thug yang dag gzung bya slar yang so rnams de nyid rab tu dbye bas so// gzhan gang spu yi mthar ni lus mchog la 'gyur de dang de ni de bzhin du yang khams la
100a5(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / gsang ba gtsug tor lte ba la yang lhan gcig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ste rang bzhin med rang bzhin// snying kha'i chu skyes la ni chos skur 'gyur te mgrin pa'i chu skyes la yang longs spyod rdzogs
100a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku/ / thig le la yang sprul pa'i sku ni yon tan dbang gis lhag pa'i lha ru rim pa dag gis 'gyur// snying kha'i 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor lo spyi ba'i pad+ma chos dang longs spyod rdzog
100a7(rgyud 'bum): dang dag pa'o/ / lte ba mgrin pa dag dang gsang ba spyi bo dang ni snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor dbus su ni// yum dang gtso bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum po dag kyang
100b1(rgyud 'bum): rim pas 'gyur/ / 'khor lo rin chen mkha' yi pad+ma chu skyes ral gri mchog dang rdo rje dang ldan rigs drug go// de dag steng 'og rtsa gsum rnam gsum lam la gnas pa rnams te nyi zla
100b2(rgyud 'bum): me yi dbye bas so/ / lus la bsam pa rab tu zhugs pa nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam bsam pa'i dbus su lus dag kyang // rnal 'byor ldan pas shes bya rang bzhir yon tan
100b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis khams kyi kha dog la sogs dbye ba ste/ / ser po nag po dag dang kha dog dmar po zhes dang dkar po sa rlung ma dang tshu la'o// ye shes nam mkha' la yang sngon po ljang khur
100b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te lus dang bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas so/ / shes rab thabs ni rus pa sha dang chu dang bcas pa'i khrag dang me dag dang ni lci ba nyid// rlung dang bshang ba stong pa khu ba mchog
100b5(rgyud 'bum): gi lus la dpal ldan rdul dang semaso nyid dag tu 'gyur/ / rna ba sgra tshogs gzhan rnams rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis ngag gi rang bzhin la sogs kyang // de ltar lha mo sangs
100b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas dang bcas yul dang yul can rnams ni dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya// rtsa rnams stong phrag drug ni nyin mor byed pas bsgyur ba mngal gyi dbus dag tu yang 'phel ba ni//
100b7(rgyud 'bum): bas nas lo ni rdzogs pa na yang gtong ste ri bong 'dzin pa'o nyi ma dag kyang 'phol bar byed// lo ni bcu gnyis dag ni nyin ber khams ni 'phel ba gtong ste rang gi lus po dag la
101a1(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / rtsa ni med pa rab tu skyes nas nyin na gnyi sanag dag la rim pas rung g-i gras su 'gyur// dpal ldan 'byung ba dang ni dbang po rnam ngas bcu du rab 'phru
101a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang / / de tsam lnga ru brjod pa rnams dang yon tan bcas pa dag kyang yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin mchog/ 'di dag de nyid rnams te lus dang sred pa gsum gyi
101a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su 'di ni longs spyod gtso bo dag/ phung po lnga yi bdag nyid rnam gsum srid pa la gnas bdag gi las ni bsags pa dag gi'o// sa ni sra ba chu ni gsher ba ma yang tsha ba rlung
101a4(rgyud 'bum): ni yang ba nyid de bug pa ni/ / stong pa dag ste brtan pa'i rus pa'i'achi med ri bo mchog dang char pa 'dir ni bdud rtsir 'gyur// rdo rje sgra dang gzhu yang bshang ba dag ste chu tshod rnams ni dbug sad
101a5(rgyud 'bum): dbugs 'byung zung dag go/ / zung rnams dgu brgya nyis 'gyur dag gis 'pho ba gcig ste dkar rtsis pa rnams bug pa'i dbye ba'o// rgyu skar dag ni so yi 'phreng ba rjes su nyin zhag chu tshod rnams
101a6(rgyud 'bum): ni chags kyi dbye bar 'gyur/ / rtsa rnams chu bo rgyu ma sprin te ri bong can gyi cha gzhan khams rnams gnyis kyi rang bzhin no// spu dang shig dang khu ba sran bu'i rigs dang bcas pa
101a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ri 'byung po skye gnas rnam pa bzhi/ / dga' ba la sogs mthe bong tshogs rnams spyi bo'i pad+ma lte ba'i pad+ma dag kyang nus pa'o// tshangs pa'i yul sa mtho ris 'jig rten lag mchog rkang pa
101b1(rgyud 'bum): dgra ni mi yul sa 'og 'jig rten no/ / chu gter gling dang ri bo rnams ni gsher dang 'jam pa sra ba gsum gyi rang bzhin khams rnams so// lan tshwa'i chu gter gci ba 'di dag rnams
101b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi me rlung dkyil 'khor rgyal po khrag dang pags pa'o/ / skra rnams grub pa mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi gnas su du ma'i dbye ba dag gis grub pa'o// snying mgrin lte ba'i pad+mA
101b3(rgyud 'bum): ngadag la rdo rje nyi ma rtse mo can rnams rab 'phro rim pa yis/ / gzhu yi rnam pa zlum po dang ni nyan bzhin sreg byang chu gter zur gyi theb khung dag la yang // de dag gong na me gzhan dri
101b4(rgyud 'bum): med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes gzugs ni mun pa dag gi mthar/ / gang zhig nyi ma glog gis mi gdung ri bong 'dzin pa gza' dang skar ma la sogs med pa na'o// gza' ni snying kha'i pad+ma
101b5(rgyud 'bum): la ste rab tu gsal byas chu tshod drug cu lte ba'i pad+ma la/ / smin ma'i dbus su nyin zhag rkang pa ma nu slar yang mi bdag longs spyod 'khor lor skar ma'o// slar yang lte ba'i pad+mar rgyu
101b6(rgyud 'bum): skar rnams kyi chu tshod rnal 'byor ldan pa dag gis rlig par bya/ / chu tshod chu srang gsal bar mtha' dag lus la lag pa rkang pa la sogs dag gi tshigs la'o// lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma'i
101b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma dag la 'khor te mchog gi cha ni 'pho bar rim pas so/ / srog zung dgu brgya nyis 'gyur ngag gis 'pho bar 'gyur te dus sbyor karka Da nas mi yi dbang // dus sgor gang la nyi
102a1(rgyud 'bum): ma gnas pas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba de la de ni rig par bya/ / dus sbyor tshad dang nor dang bu lon mnyam pa dag kyang bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la shes par bya/
102a2(rgyud 'bum): dere pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag la rab tu 'bab ste nub tu 'dzin ma dang ni byang du chu// lho ru me dang shar du rlung ni rab tu 'bab ste 'dab ma'i dbus ngag tu yang stong pa'o// dbye ba lnga yis 'pho
102a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te mnyam pa rab tu 'bab pa dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu'o/ / de ltar 'jo ba'i dbye ba rnams ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su dus sbyor dbye ba dag gis 'gyur// stong pa la sogs
102a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid lnga ni nges par byang du rab 'bab sa la sogs pa g.yas su'o/ / sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma dag dang gza' lags skyes lha min blon po bla ma dang // mjug rings spen pa 'di
102a5(rgyud 'bum): bcu dag ni nam mkha' la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po zhang can no/ / zla ba drug la zla ba dbang phyug tu 'gyur byang dag tu ste mi dag lho ru nyi ma'o// de steng snying kha'i phyogs su
102a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rtsa yi 'khor lo yang dag gnas/ / srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshogs te zla ba nyi ma me rnams g.yon dang g.yas dang dbus su'o// g.yon du rtsa ni ri bong
102a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma 'bab ste nges par dkar po g.yas su dmar po nyi ma'o/ / dbus su dus me'i gzugs ni rab tu 'bab ste mnyam pa dag la dman pa'i dbugs ni drug cu'o// srog dang thur
102b1(rgyud 'bum): sel mnyam gnas pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma dag la rlung ni gyen du rgyu ba dang / / khyab byed klu dang rus sbal dag dang rtsangs pa'i rlung dang lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal zhes pa// rlung ni rnam pa
102b2(rgyud 'bum): bcu po 'di rnams lte ba'i 'khor lo la naM las kyi dbye bas yang dag gnas/ / dung can mtha' yang i Da la sogs rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag go// srog ni nyi ma
102b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i lam la gnas pa dag kyang srog byed bza' dang btung ba ma lus pa/ / de dag thur sel gyis ni 'og tu 'dren te mtha' dag ro mnyam lus la mnyam gnas dag gis 'thob//
102b4(rgyud 'bum): lus la gyen rgyus g.yo bar byed de kha dang lag pa rkang pa rnams kyis glu dang zlos gar byed// khyab byed kyis ni nad dag byed de rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus ni 'jig pa de
102b5(rgyud 'bum): lta nyid/ / klu yang sgrags pa nyid de gsal bar lag pa rkang pa bskum pa dag ni rus sbal rlung gis so// khro dang g.yeng ba mtha' dag de ni rtsangs pa'i rlung dag gis te glal ba dag kyang lha
102b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyis/ / lus ni lnga pa nyid gyur gtong bar mi byed mi yi bdag po rlung gcig nor las rgyal ba'o// de ltar srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis gnas na
102b7(rgyud 'bum): tan dag ni gtong mi byed/ / dmar ser phra mo dag kyang oM Da la sogs rnam gsum las bgrod snar ma dang ni lag ldan lce// drug pa rgyal dang ri yang rgyal ba nor dang dgu pa a laM pu
103a1(rgyud 'bum): dbul ldan gu hA'o/ / phyogs kyi grangs ni dung can ma ga mi yi bdag po byang chubs ston bde ba'i mthar zag byed// dpal ldan rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'di nam
103a2(rgyud 'bum): pa mang por 'gyur te tshigs kyi dbye ba dums so/ / dbang po med dadrug shrIn d+he lA min chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin dang ni drag po dag gi dbus// gnas mo 'di dag rnams su de yi ra
103a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rten zhing nus pa nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor bar byed/ / de yi steng gi mgrin pa'i phyogs su gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas// tshangs pa'i yul sa
103a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan dpral ba dag nas dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i thig le dkar po zag/ rtsa bar sa ste g.yon du chu dang g.yas su sreg za dag ni rab tu 'bab ste steng du rlung // gnyis kyi
103a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su nam mkha' dang ni mnyam par rab tu 'bab ste sna bug dag las rim pas so/ / 'di dag rnams ni 'bugs te nus pa mchog gi gnas dang bcu gnyis mtha' dang ma mi mtha' ru 'gro/
103a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing la sogs pa lag pa rkang pa lag par sbyar ba dag la mthe bo'i mthar thug mtha' dag go/ 'khor lo can ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can te lha mchog bdag rnams yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog/
103a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs ldan dag ni yang dag ye shes glang po rta dang shing rta mngag gzhug 'phags pa'i tshad med rnams// drag po rang rgyal ming can dag tu 'gyur te ha nu mAn ni nyan thos gdug
103b1(rgyud 'bum): pa kla klo'i dbang / / srog chags rnams kyi sdug pa dag ste gang zhig byed pa'i blo gros sdug bsngal sbyin byed mi dge'i lam// rta la gnas pa ma rig pa ste lha min dpung rnams mtha' dag
103b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi phyogs ni rnam pa bzhi/ / de yi yul la sdud pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste dpal ldan rgyal ba thar pa'i lam// kai la shar ni tshes dag sbyin pa sred pa'i 'jigs
103b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog yin te sa na rdzas kyis gang ba yang / / skabs gsum pa dang mi ya bla ma'i sras po tshangs dang lha dbang dag ni rgyab dang mdun du gang // 'jam dpal 'jig rten mgon po sred pa
103b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sems/ / rgyab tu sa gzhi dag la tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rigs rnams du ma'i sangs rgyas rnam dag pa'o// de
103b5(rgyud 'bum): kla klo'i dbang po'i 'khrug par 'gyur te nges par lus can rnams kyi lus kyi dbus su'o/ / sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang phyi rol du ni nges par ma ga'i yul du rma klo 'khrug ste 'khrug
103b6(rgyud 'bum): pa min/ / dus kyi lon mi grangs lo yi nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur te rigs drug bgrod pa'i yan lag gos// zla ba'i dbye bas sum cu drug ste ro yos bsgyur ba'i ri na rnal 'byor
103b7(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams dag gi rigs/ / gza' yis bcad pas thob pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par dus kyi 'khor lo dag gi lha rnams so// phyogs kyis bcad pa dag gi lha dang lha mo rnams kyis
104a1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brjod par 'gyur rom sa bdag/ zla 'phrul zab rnam pa gsum yang nyi ma nag san lag las 'gyur yang dag thug pa rig byed dang // slar sa
104a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba rgya mtsho mi dang drug ter gyis 'gyur dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi dbye ba ni/ / de nyid ces bya gzhan yang drug gis rnam dman de dag phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par bye ba ste// skar sa
104a3(rgyud 'bum): bsres pa drag ni dbye ba gnyis te bcu gsum bcu dgu dang ni bug pa de nyid bcas/ / zla ba'i cha shas su nges nyin zhag tshogs las gza' yi cha yis thob pa gang dag nyin zhag drug/ de dag
104a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug ste gzhan pa'i nyin zhag tshogs ni sku gsung thugs kyi rgya/ / shes rab sku la dus sbyor gsum rnams nges par gsal byas rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud la'o// dus ma khro ba
104a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams/ / gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste slar yang mi yi bdag po lha yi tshogs ni drug gnyis so// rnal
104a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum mo brgyad ces bya ste srid pa 'di dag thams cad nyis 'gyur ro/ / 'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang khams gsum ngag tu
104a7(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod 'byung ba gang zhig zla ba'i dbus su drug cu ste// de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dus sbyor bsres pa'o nyis
104b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur rnams/ / nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye nyis 'gyur dag kyang gang zhig 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs// mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa dag
104b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i nyin zhag sum cur 'gyur/ / nyi ma lo yi rab dbyer 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa la ni mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba'o// de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud la mkha' lag mi bdag
104b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams te lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni/ / shes rab thabs dang mtshan mo nyin mor 'gyur ba mnyam pa'i cha ste mtshan mo phyed dang nyin phyed la'o// gang gis rang gi lus la nyen mtshan dus dang
104b4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis shes gyur pa/ / de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba 'di nyid dag la'o// sum cu'i cha yis de las thob pa gsum
104b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis bsgyur ba nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dang / / phyi rol gyi ni phyag rgya drug ste slar yang de las 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid// gtsug tor la ni chu gter snying khar
104b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad de spyi bor mi bdag mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs/ / lte bar brgyad ni brgyad kyis bsgyur ba dag ste nyis 'gyur mi bdag gsang ba'i dbus su rab tu grags rtsa drug rnams ni 'khor lo
104b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gog cing bcu ni yul rnams 'phrog pa 'dus pa dag gi rang bzhin te/ / slar yang yang nas yang du nyis 'gyur bsgyur ba dag kyang bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dag gi cha// 'di dag nges par
105a1(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba ster byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dab gis ched pan med dag kya ster/ / 'kho la drug la dus kyi sems chi ba'i 'jigs 'gro rnal 'byor rnams kyi /
105a2(rgyud 'bum): la ngo mtshur med// gtsug tor lo ni chu gter dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams pa dkAn khams ni rab 'khrug pa'o// mgrin par so dang snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis
105a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur ba'i dus rnams mkhris pa'i khams rab 'khrug/ lte ba gsang ba dag la chu gter drug cu mi bdag dag kyang de bzhin rlung gi khams rab 'khrug/ gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs dgra
105a4(rgyud 'bum): drug kyang rab tu gsal byas nges par 'dus pa dag ste 'gog pa'o/ / drug gi rtsa ni 'khor lo 'gog pa zla nyi ma yi dbye bas rnam gsum lam la gnas pa gang // srog chags rnams la
105a5(rgyud 'bum): babaster ba de ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis lus la bsrung bar bya/ / drug la gal te srog ni rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni 'chi ba 'joms par nges// phra mo la ni ma zhugs pa na
105a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed/ / srog ni gal te rtsa gcig nyid la nyin dang mtshan mor 'bab na 'tsho ba dag ni dus kyi lo// gal te phyogs gcig rnam
105a7(rgyud 'bum): pabapar ma chang 'bab na mi rnams kyi ni 'tsho ba phyed dang bcas pa'i lo/ / zla ba gcig tu rnam par ma chang 'bab na mi yi bdag po 'tsho ba dag kyang zla ba gsum// de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni
105b1(rgyud 'bum): rang lus dag las zla bgrod 'chi ba'i dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya/ / lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nyin zhag bgrod pa skye ba lnga ni 'phel ba dag gis skye ba ste// de nas re re lhag pas bcu
105b2(rgyud 'bum): ni gsum gyis bsgyu ra ba dag kyang gsum ni lhag pa ji srid nyid/ / dus ni rdzogs na'o lo rnams gsum mig zla ba de dag rnams dang drug gsum zung dang zla ba gang // zla ba de dag rnams
105b3(rgyud 'bum): dang nyin zhag tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan gnyis zla 'tsho ba'i lhag ma'o/ / rang gi gnas nas mchog gi cha yis khyim gyi 'khor lo 'dor te nyams dang lhag ma mtshungs pa yi// lo
105b4(rgyud 'bum): dang zla ba zhag gis kyang ste gsum mig ri bong can dang drug gsum zung dang zla bas kyang / / rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan rnams dang lte bar rab
105b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa'i/ / sum cu rtsa drug gis te nyin zhag mthar ni nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// sngon du nyi ma'i lo gsum dag gi nyin zhag tshegs ni mda' dang ma dang
105b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'dor bar byed/ / de nas rgyu ba dang bcas mda' dus rtse mo can dang mkha' ri zla ba drag ni gsum pa la'o// mig sbrul ri bo mda' dang nor dang lag pa gzhan te bdun pa la ni
105b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya ba dag kyang ngo / / de nas tshes la sogs pa'i nyin zhag tshogs pa thams cad dag kyang gang zhig lte ba ji srid nyid// dus kyi lo yi bar du nges par nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis
106a1(rgyud 'bum): 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste/ / zla ba zhes dang nyi ma'i lam la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i ljin zhag re re 'phel bas rim pas so// slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye bas mi
106a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyis bcu gnyis rtsibs la byed pa ste/ / phyeng dang bcus pa'i zla ba ji srid gzhan ni sumya cu dag dang 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum// dbugs dang
106a3(rgyud 'bum): chu srang dang ni chu tshod nyin mtshan dus rnams de ni rim pa dag gis rgyu ba ste/ / bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo na drug nus kyang /
106a4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gsum las sum cu'i lo yis nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi lo dang phyogs kyis kyang // dus kyi 'khor lo dag la phyed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i nyin
106a5(rgyud 'bum): zhag tshogs kyis rgyu bar 'gyur/ / phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la gcod par byed// las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes pa'i tshigs las
106a6(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag rtse mo can gyi rtsa ni re re 'dor/ / mgrin pa dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste// thig ler gnas pa zla ba'i rkang pa phyogs kyi nang du 'dor
106a7(rgyud 'bum): tegaza' yi rtsa dang gsang bar gnas/ / sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams las nyin mor byed pa khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste// phyi nas re re lhag pas nyin dang nyin la ldog par
106b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te dus kyi lo na ji srid nyid/ / lo ni chad na phyogs kyi nang du dbyangs kyi nyin zhag dbang gis rgyu ba dang ni zad pa yang // nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa nyams pa//
106b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gcig/ lte ba mgrin pa dpral ba rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma dag la rtsa ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'o// nyi ma ro dang me dag gnas te rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar phyed bcas rtsa ni de
106b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid/ / lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams nyin zhag drug ni ji srid nyid du ste// mthar ni kun tu phra mo rab tu 'bab ste nyin zhag snying gi chu skyes yang dag
106b4(rgyud 'bum): stong par byed/ / sum cu drug gi stong phrag d+hu brgya'i nyin zhag tshogs rnams ngag gi dus kyi rtsa ni rgyu ba ste// nyin mtshan dus la nyi mu zla bas rang rang rgyu ba dag gis gang gang rdzogs par
106b5(rgyud 'bum): mi nus pa/ / nyi ma'i nyin zhag nyi ma rgyu ba la yang bu lon du 'gyur de phyed zla ba'i rgyu ba la'o// rgyu skar nyin zhag rab tu dbye bas 'chi ba'i nyi zla rgyu ba stong pa'i zla ba dag pa'o// srog ni lus
106b6(rgyud 'bum): la lhag pa gang zhig rab gsal mtshams su rig byed rkang chad kyis dman drug cu ste/ / 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag gis thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa ni zung dag nges par 'joms//
106b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang du lo yi dbus su nyi zla rgyu ba dag las stong pa mig dang ra yi grangs// de ltar rang rang tshad kyi lo brgya dag gis lha mi rnams kyi rang gi tshil dus bgreng ngo // zos dang nang dang
107a1(rgyud 'bum): bsdud pa gal te nges 'ga' mi rnams la ni dus kyi rtsa la gyur bar/ / gni de yis mi 'phrul la myur bar rdzu ba'i 'khor lo dag la dus mi rab tu 'jug par 'gyur
107a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tsha lo dag gi rtsa 'di 'gog s+hon pa ri bong can gyi brjod pa bcang ras rim pA yis/ / dbu sar zla po la min+d+ra pa ga zhig 'brog pa mi bdag sreg chags rnams kyi 'tshe ba'o// rnying
107a3(rgyud 'bum): kha'i badz+ra dpal lngar dpral bar 'byung ba phyogs dang nyin zhag ces bya zla ba'i rkang brgya/ / longs spyod lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la dgu ldan bcu dang drug po rung dang rgyal ba zhes byA dang /
107a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid ces bya zhag bdun dag nas sIr yang ri bong mtshan ma gang 'dir rim pa min pasna 'dor// dzAM ga~M lde dag la rdzogs par byas ras snying khar rab 'jug dkar po'i phyogs la nor gyi cha
107a5(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / slar yang nAs pa dag la de bzhin 'gro sde rkang pa'i dbang gig lte ba'i bad+ma dag gi bar// sbyi khade bzhir mgo bor rtsi bris brgyad rtsibs bcu drug la gnag dang dkar ba dag gi
107a6(rgyud 'bum): skyes ming / / mthir bu lte ba dag la sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs dang nyis 'gyur gzhar de dmar dang ser po'o// brgyad pa gnyis ni lte ba mgrin pa 'i sde bgo dang sIt+pa la la yang dkakur na/
107a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'o// a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang sa yar wa lar ldan thig le dpal ldan rnam par bcad pa yis// phye ba drug cur 'gyur te de dag dus dang ma bidag nor dang so rnams
107b1(rgyud 'bum): ge sar rtse mo la'o/ / thig le'i rnam pa dang ni rnam par bcad pas pad 'dab mchog la ka sogs sde rnams rnam phye ba// nyi shu dang ni brgya phrag gcig kyang thun gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis nyi
107b2(rgyud 'bum): margyu zhing nyams par byed/ / phyogs la zla ba rang gi rgyu bas nyin zhag ces bya'i rkang pa dag kyang bu lon dag tu byed// slar yang zla ba gnyis kyis gzhan pa dag kyang nyin zhag lo yi sbyor ba dag
107b3(rgyud 'bum): las 'phel ba ni/ / rdzogs pa'i lo la nyin zhag drug tu 'gyur te gzhan yang de bzhin 'chi ba dag gis mtshams su 'phel// rgyal po de ltar nyi ma'i bu lon nyis 'gyur 'di ni lo yi
107b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba dag gis 'phel bar byed/ / dbugs drug gis ni chu srang gcig tu rab tu 'gyur te chu srang drug cu yis kyang chu tshod do// chu tshod drug cu nyir zhag tu 'gyur gsum gyis bsgyur ba
107b5(rgyud 'bum): bcu yi nyin zhag dag gis zla ba gcig/ zla ba drug gis kyang ni bgrod par 'gyur te gnyis kyis bsgyur ba bgrod pa lo gcig tu rab grags// skyes bu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya las buM lon
107b6(rgyud 'bum): bgrod par son par dus kyi rtsa yi dbang gis so/ / 'jig rten gsum na lha min lha mi rnams las gang zhig rang gi lus lnga zla bA nyi ma dag/ rdzogs par nus pa'i rnal 'byor ldan pa med
107b7(rgyud 'bum): de zla bas rang gi rgyu bas nyin mtshan rgyu ba dang / / srid par lo yi nang du rim par nyi mas kyang ni rgyu skar thams cad rgyu ba min pa nyid// lo dang lor ni bu lon dag gis de ni srid pa za ste dus
108a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig/ chad pa gal te rtsa gcig yin na mi yi bdag po gci ba dag ni sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur// de tsam rnams ni nyin zhag lnga nas mchog gi
108a2(rgyud 'bum): cha yis 'dor te gong bu 'chad pa'i dus su'o/ / sgra ni rna ba las te ro yang nges par kha las 'dor zhing mig 'bras mig gi dbus nas so// dri ni sna las mi rnams dag gi lag pa
108a3(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i lus las dro ba'i dngos po rim pa yis/ / sA yi rtse mo 'phyang ba dang ni spyi bor lag pa bzhag pa de yi rang bzhin drug tu mthong // lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil la rgya skyes
108a4(rgyud 'bum): chen gyis rab tu byugs kyang dmar po nyid du byed ma yin/ / nyi ma kha dog nag po dang ni yongs su gyur pa'i ra bong 'dzin pa kha dog ser por mthong // gcin dang lus kyang bsil bar
108a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur na mi yi bdag po de yi nyin zhag la ni 'chi ba nyid/ / lce 'og nag po'i thig tu rab tu 'gyur te mig la tshangs pa'i ri mo shin tu phra mo dang // dbugs ni zla ba nyi ma'i lam du
108a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phro ste mi yi bdag po mkhur tshos gnyis po de bzhin nyid/ / nu mA'i steng ni mtshan khung du zhugs gza' yi tshogs rnams mtha' dag ma stag ngag dang bcas par mthong //
108a7(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa rengs shing 'khor ba yang ni lus la 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dag tu 'dod// skye ba dang ni btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa gzhon nu dag gi gzugs ni byed pa
108b1(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa/ / de nyid 'jig rten dag tu slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo can te nyi ma min// zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo'i cha la bcom
108b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan de yis zos/ / slar yang nyin mo'i dus su mtha' yas rnams kyang gtong bar byed de bskyed pa'i rgyu ni rim pas so// sgra la sogs pa drug po rnams ni las su 'gyur te dbang po
108b3(rgyud 'bum): drug po dag kyang byed pa'o/ / lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo tshes dang zla ba nyi ma dag kyang byed pa po// de dag sdud pa'i byed po gzhan du 'dir 'gyur skyed pa'i byed pa po ni byed
108b4(rgyud 'bum): pa po ma yin/ / mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can te yul dang rnam bral yon tan med la rang bzhin med pa'o// dr-i dang kha dog dang ni ro dang reg pa zhes dang 'dzin ma dang ni chu dang mi
108b5(rgyud 'bum): dung rlung / / nges par gzugs can brgyad po rnams nAM mtha' ngag yul gyi tshogs pa dag ste gcig ni gtso bor 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag 'di ni spro ba dag dang sdud par 'gyur//
108b6(rgyud 'bum): tedus kyi mthu las so// sgra dang stong pa dang na chos kyi dbyings dang yid kyang mi yi bdag po gzugs med du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid 'ching ste rang bzhin la gnas yon tan rnam rtog rnams
108b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis ngar gyi srin bu ji bzhin nyid/ / bdag nyid bdag gis nges par slar yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid dag las ni gtong bar byed// de phyir rgyal po rang las rang bzhin yon tan la gnas
109a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la bskyed pa'o/ / rang bzhin rnam par thas pasa'i da pa canas byung sa shes 'jin rten rmongs par byed// sadang rganang me dang rna
109a2(rgyud 'bum): na med dang chen dug gis sa/ / rags dang thagro gnan yang na su gsum men tan la gnas yi grithig le la sogs dbye ba zhis// rags pa dmas pa'i dab
109a3(rgyud 'bum): po rnams la rang bzhi gyis kyang gnas te rna mo'i sems la phra mo yang / / ye shes la yang ye shes sku ste rang bzhin rnam 'gyur med pa'i 'tsho ba 'byung ba byung ba min// ma sogs stong pa ldani rang
109a4(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam par 'gyung man dngas ldang ba dang thig le nAng dang / / dus dang sems pa n+de m+b+hi nga bzhin dag sa de de bzhin gcan pa'i dbyangs ni rlung la sogs pa'o// rags pa sde pa'i li gi rnams rnag
109a5(rgyud 'bum): gyikyigyis bsgyur ba'i bcu ste bcu drug gzhan ni rnam 'gyur ro/ / de dag dbus su rdo rje can ni rang bzhin min cing rnam 'gyur min te khyab byed rang bzhin med// 'khor bar bde dang sdug bsngal
109a6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin yon tan la gnas las la skyed 'di ni za ba ste/ / mi rnams kyi ni las 'di dag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te rags dang bla mo zhi ba'o// bdag ni byed pa po yang khyad par las
109a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan pa phyugs bdag kyang yod byed po zhes pa las/ / byed po bdag gam gzhan pa min te rang bzhin rnam par bral bar shes pa de ni las ma yin// de phyir byed po 'ga' yang srog chags
109b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal dag ni mi sbyin mi 'phrog ste/ / 'khor ba dag tu rnam pa gsum po gang byas sngon gyi las ni 'bras bu rab tu sbyin par 'gyur// skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po
109b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ster zhing de ni 'phrog pa rmongs pa rnams kyi blo glos te/ / lus la dpag med dge ba 'phrog par byed pa'i bug pa rang gi dbang po dag gis mthong ma yin// 'dod pa'i nus dang bya ba dag ni
109b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa ye shes nus pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la ste/ / dngos po gsal ba dang ni 'jug pa dag dang ro mnyam rgyur ni don la nye bar dmigs par byed// slar yang gtong ba dag ni bzhi pa srid
109b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis btung gnyis med kyis kyang nges par rim pas so/ / de dag nang nas rdo rje can ni mi yi bdag po cung zad mi za gtong ba min pa nyid// bdag ni byed po sdug bsngal bde ba rab tu
109b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin por mi yi bdag po der ni 'gyur ba min/ / 'ga' yang bcings dang grol bar 'gyur min mi yi bdag po sems kyi nus pa rnam par spangs nas so// nam mkha' bum pa'i dbus nas rba/
109b6(rgyud 'bum): ni len par byed pa na yang 'gro ba min pA ji lta ba// mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can ni yul dang rnam bral lus kyi dbus dag tu yang de bzhin no// de ltar las ni yod par smra ba por
109b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bcom ldan ston pa gcig tu ni bying po min/ / kun ma byin dang po'i sangs rgyas sring gsum gyis btud dus kyi 'khor lo can te 'khor lo can ma yin// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dras
110a1(rgyud 'bum): / po drug kyang gang gi skabs kyi su skyes drung du lhag par sgrubs 'gro ba// rus kyi 'khor mo rgyal pa mchog bskyed sen tan med cing rdum rnam med pa de la paga'ang/
110a2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ zhi ba'i bsam pa la ni lha nyid du 'gyur mi yi bdag po mun pa la ni dmyal ba nyid// rdul dag la yang dud 'gro nying de rab mchog sa yi steng du mi zhing dag ni 'dres pa la// 'byung po nyid ni
110a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gsum ste rdul dang mun pa dang ni snying stobs phan tshun 'dres pa la'o/ / 'chi ba'i dus su yid kyi bsam pa gang zhig dran par gyur pa de ni skye bo yang dag ste// lha nyid brgyad kyi dbye ba dag gis
110a4(rgyud 'bum): lha yi mchog gi gnas su mi nyid gcig ni ji lta ba/ / dud 'gro dag kyang chu gter rnam pa nges par dmyal ba'i 'gro bar dmyal ba nyid ni de bzhin gcig/ gnas 'di rnams su ro yi 'gro bar skye
110a5(rgyud 'bum): pobopo 'khor te las kyi zhags pas nges par bcings pa dag/ skye ba 'bum phrag du mas thar pa mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang du ni 'gro zhing grol ba min// phung po khams dang dbang po dang ni rnam
110a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum srid pa 'jigs pa las kyi dbang po lnga dag dang / / de tsam dang ni las kyi skyon dang yon tan dang bcas yang dang blo dang ngar 'dzin la sogs te// 'di dag gis bcings 'tsho ba dag ni ro//
110a7(rgyud 'bum): yi 'gro bar 'khor te phra mo'i dngos po dag gis slar// dngos po btang na mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab tu 'gro ste gang dusbya sa skye ldan min// yan lag dang bcas rig byed dran pa'i
110b1(rgyud 'bum): / gzhung dang bcas dang rtog ge grub pa'i mthar ldan 'jig rten du// snyan dngags mkhan po rgyas pa me la sogs pa rnams kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos gzhan yang rig pa min// rig pa
110b2(rgyud 'bum): sa pa nang rig 'gyur med kyang ste 'jig rten 'dir ni thub pa rnams kyis rab gsungs nyid/ / gang du 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag tu 'gyur me yi bdag po slar yang gang du thim pa'o//
110b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor dbang po rnal 'byor ma tho ba rab tu g.yo ba'i yid kyis gal te shi bar gyur pa na// dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du ni rab mchog thub pa'i rigs su rnal 'byor ldan pa skye bar 'gyur//
110b4(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi goms pa de yis slar yang ye shes rnal 'byor yangs pa dag ni kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur// ye shes thob nas mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab 'gro gang du slar yang skye ba ldan pa min//
110b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes skye ste rgyal ba rnams kyi nyi ma nyin mo'i dus su mtshan mo phyed dang mtshan mo'i mthar// lha min rnams ni zla ba mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma phyed dang nyin mo dag gi mjug tu 'i// yang dag sa
110b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rnams nyams dag la tshigs ni legs sbyar tha mal drag tu rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ / zhi dang drag po las te srid pa gsum gyi gnas su skyes bu nyid dang tha mal dag kyang ngo // nyi ma gung
110b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan mo phyed nas nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su de dag gi ni za ba'i dus/ / bza' ba zan dang ba lang sha ste btung ba rnam mang bcud ster dag dang sgo nga'i khu ba'o// gos ni dmar dang dkar po
111a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa bzhir du mtho ris sa 'og gnas/ / chos ni 'tshe med 'tshe ba yang ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis rdo rje'i lha min gdar yang ngo // 'byung po rnam
111a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi las na 'dres mar rab tu 'gyur te tshig kyang 'dres pa sha za dag gi'o/ / chos ni 'tshe med 'tshe ldan nges par bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis srog gcod la sogs skyon dag la// mchod sbyin la
111a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs don du rab tu 'jug 'gyur mi yi bdag po res 'ga' dag ni ldog pa 'am/ / bza' ba btung ba dag kyang 'dres pa nyi zla'i bgrod pa dag las lam ni 'dres ma gzhan du'o// 'od zer lam
111a4(rgyud 'bum): ni nyi ma'i snang ba dkar po nyin mo bgrod pa byang dang lho ya phyed dag kyang / / zla ba'i snang ba mtshan mo dag dang dkar min bgrod pa 'di ni lho ste du ba dag gi lam// 'od zer lha rnams mtho ris su ste
111a5(rgyud 'bum): dkar min dag kyang de bzhin lha min klu yi 'jig rten du/ / kun tu 'dres pa mi bdag mi yi 'jig rten du ni yi dgas dud 'gro mi rnams dag gir 'gyur// gang zhig gang gi dbus su rab zhugs
111a6(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' las kyi zhags pas nges bcings pa/ / de yi dbus su rang rang bsam pas mi bdag de yi rigs su de yi 'dzin pa dag gis 'gyur// ji srid sems kyi rang bzhin
111a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis tshor ba bde dang sdug bsngal ba/ / de srid 'jigs rung 'khor ba 'dir 'khyam mi yi bdag po mtho ris mi yul dag dang 'og tu yang // ka sogs sde rnams
111b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang bcas pa dag kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur gang yang phyogs gsum dag gi dbyangs/ / nges par sum cu'i gsal byed de dag rnams la rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas rtsu ba
111b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / gza' lnga'i rkang pa nyi ma ri bong can gyi rkang pa dag dang sgra gcan mjug rings rkang pa dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis lo dang phyogs kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur zla ba nyi ma me yis bye ba'o//
111b3(rgyud 'bum): lo gsum gyi ni phyogs rnams dag dang ri bong can gyi yon tan dus kyi me ya phyogs gnyis dag/ lo brgya las ni dman gyur lhag ma'i phyogs ni nyi zla dag gi mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa la//
111b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mig dang me mig grangs te nyin mtshan dus rnams gtso bo dag gis dman pa mtha' dag ste// gsal byed la sogs sde pa dbyangs rnams dag ni nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis
111b5(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bas zos/ / phyed bcas 'khor lo'i chu tshod ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang bral gza' yi chu tshod rnams dman pa// de dag rnams kyang shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis nyin mtshan dus
111b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'chi bas zos/ / de ltar sde pa dbyangs bcus dbyangs kyi tshogs dang bcas pa gsal byed rnams nyid dag dang rkang pa ni// dman dang bar ma dus 'chi zla ba nyi ma'i 'chi dang ni gsal
111b7(rgyud 'bum): byed lhag pa'i lha la'o/ / sum cu gnyis dang nyi ma nag gcig kyang ri bong can bcas nyi ma'i bgrod la rtsa ni gcod pa 'di// slar yang sum cu mtshan mo gsum gyi rdo rje dang bcas
112a1(rgyud 'bum): lung ba lanas du byung sogs 'dru/ / chub kyis n+ya ga sa ng+yas nas ni tshig nga sa chen gcig rapa 'ju// yadu du skyeg pa n
112a2(rgyud 'bum): am mkha'i khams ni rnam par chad pa ji srid nyid du'o/ / dang por mtha' dag rgyal ba'i lus ni dngos grub r+ya sngags pa dag gis yang dag bsrung bar bya// khrus meng nan dngos grubam
112a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM skye ba 'di la mchog go bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'ang med/ / de phyir lus kyi don gyi rgyur me nyin nags sa'i dus su rtsa yi sbyor ba bsgom par bya// lus ni grub na gzhan pa'i dngos grub
112a4(rgyud 'bum): sri pa gsum gyi gnas su mngag gtsug nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ / stong pa la ni du ba sogs lam bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis gzugs po rnyan mtshams su bsgom par bya// de nas
112a5(rgyud 'bum): rakhor lo rnams su srog dang thur sel drung ni brtan pa dag kyang brid pa ste/ / phyi nas zla ba nges par 'gog pa gza' bzhin byed de byang chub sems ni rnal 'byor pa yis so// denas
112a6(rgyud 'bum): gang ni gcung zad 'dod pa dag ni nyin zhag 'ga' las phye ba'adil thob par 'gyur/ / nyi ma zla ba 'gog pa mnyam rang mI mnyam 'grod pa lnga ste dbu ma me la rab tu zhugs// srog dang thur
112a7(rgyud 'bum): sel gnyis po dag kyang nyin zhag dang po song na dus min 'chi ba slu ba ste/ / lag pa dang bcas rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshigs dang sen mo'i mthar ni srog gis kun tu gang byas nas/
112b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo drug la sangs rgyas lha mo 'jigs med lag pa'i pad+ma rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// thur sel bskum na 'dod par 'gyur te lus mchog dag la rlung gi nang ni ma lus
112b2(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'o/ / srog rtsol dag ni bad kan la 'gyur sngar yang de dag gtong ba mkhris pa dag gi skyon la'o// steng dang 'ogro ri yang dag 'gog pa bde ba byed par 'gyur te 'dus pa
112b3(rgyud 'bum): dug dang rims la'o/ / lte ba'i steng du srog gi rlung ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog lte ba'i rtsa bar gzhan pa dag kyang ngo // bskum ste thur sel rlung ni rnam pa gsum gyi lam du bgrod pa dag dang srog nyid
112b4(rgyud 'bum): steng nas kyang / / ji srid yang dag phrad de me ni stobs dang ldan zhing lus kun la ni khyab par rab 'gyur ba// dmu chu sman dang gzhang 'brum nad rnams dag kyang lto bar sron pa zla ba'i sbyor bas 'joms
112b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / dbugs lung dang ni glo dang rnam pa gsum gyi dug dang mig gi nad la sogs pa dag kyang ngo // mchan khung g.yas dang g.yas min las ni nu ma dag kyang stobs ldan mnan te srog
112b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bkag pa las/ / g.yas nas g.yon pa'i rtsar ni 'phral la rab tu 'bab ste g.yon pa'i mchan khung las kyang g.yas su'o// zla ba phyed kyis kyang ni 'chi ster 'chi ltas 'phrog ste
112b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis so/ / rdo rje skyil krung du gnas rkang pa bzung ba lag pa'i pad+mo dag ni rgyab kyi zug rngu 'joms// steng du rkang pa ngag dang 'og tu mgo bo lus la ba kan
113a1(rgyud 'bum): nAd rnams mtha' dag 'phrog par byed/ / srog 'gog pa las nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gis ni rab 'khrug gci ba'i nang dag nges par 'joms par byed// tho rangs ming med
113a2(rgyud 'bum): dag gis chu dang bral ba'i khar ni so yi 'phreng ba dag la rab 'dar ba/ / mig rnams ngag gi mig slar du 'gyur slar yang nad ni 'phrog pa chu yis gtor ba dag kyang ngo // gan kyal nyal nas lte ba
113a3(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i pad+mas bzung ba dag ni ma zhu ba yi zug rngu 'joms/ / 'bras rnams 'byung ba las ni nges par mar dang bcas pa'i tsha yis bdugs na 'phel ba 'joms par byed// de nas arka'i 'om
113a4(rgyud 'bum): byugs pas kyang ngo 'ga' zhig tshe na so srin zug rdzu bcas gyur na/ / stag ldan gyi ni sa bon du basbubs la sogs pa dag gis 'dir bzung srin bu la sogs 'joms// lo phyed kyis ni sdigs
113a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi mchog gi lus la dkar ba'i mdze 'phrog de las gzhan lta ci/ / shes rab 'dus la rab sems lhung ba dag kyang rtag tu srog gi rlung gis 'gog pa dag las te// bdun cu'i lo yi
113a6(rgyud 'bum): rga ba skra dkar bcas pa dag kyang le gnyis rab tu rdzogs na nges par 'phrog/ nyi ma 'ga' yas lam dang sems ni rab tu 'grogs pa dag las de snang phrag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// srog rtsol
113a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bya ste snying kha de bzhin mgo bo dag ni ji srid me yis gdung 'gyur ba/ / de las steng dag tu ni bzang po'i pad+mar rgyal bar 'gyur te ma bsdams pa 'am stobs ngag gis// gtsug tor phug
113b1(rgyud 'bum): cing phung po dag dang khams rnams rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba nyid su 'gro 'gyur te/ / phyag rgya 'grogs par rab nyams skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la ni bde 'bras ster ba med// phyag
113b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya sgom pa'i don du gsungs te nyin mtshan dus su chags pa zad pa'i don no mon pa nyid/ / gsung gi rdo rje mchod pa'i don te nges par sngags pa rnams la myos byed gsungs pa nyid ma yin/
113b3(rgyud 'bum): kha zas thams cad bde ba'i don te nyin zhag so so'i dus su ma zhu'i rgyur yang ma gsungs so// dpal ldan spyod pa dngos grub rgyur te mtshan mo dur khrod la khyam pa dag kyang rtsed mo'i don ma yin/
113b4(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod pa ni cung zad dro bas kha na zhi bar byed de so yi zug rngu nyid kyi yang // mtho rangs mi bskyod brngubs pa dag ni mgo yi nangad 'phrog de bzhin nyid du chu ni brngubs pas so// rna ba dag
113b5(rgyud 'bum): da mig tu gcan ni dro dang grangs mo rab thugs gnyis ka dag gi nang 'phrog go/ / 'byung pos gzir la tsha ba gsum bcas mi bskyod brngubs na bde ba ster te zos pa nyid la yang // bshang
113b6(rgyud 'bum): gcin dang khru ba khrag ni mi yi sha dang bcas pa zos pas tshe ni ste bar 'gyur/ / bsam gtan bcas par me tog brngubs na skra dkar dang bcas rga ba dang ni lus skyes rnams kyang 'phrog/ sgron ma lnga
113b7(rgyud 'bum): bo sbrang bu'i skags pa dag dang bsres pa zos pas mtha' dag nang ni 'phrog pa ste/ / bud med me tog khu ba dag dang bsres pa lo gcig zos na rga ba nges par sel bar byed// rlung 'joms
114a1(rgyud 'bum): lan na sgur bdag tu rab tu 'asngar te mang drang bsla ba dag nI mkhris pa'i dgra/ / bdakan 'joms pa kha bkun dang de bzhin chab dag kya bstan rnams sas mi du ba 'am/
114a2(rgyud 'bum): bdakan 'joms pa ra yi 'o ma tsha ba gsum bcas dag ti ma he'i 'o ma mkhris pa'i dgra// rlung 'joms dag kyang rnga mo'i 'o ma rnam gsum nad 'brog pa yi 'i ma dang de bzhin mar// dzA
114a3(rgyud 'bum): bskol ba'i chu ni dro bas kha nad ni bar byed de so yi zug rngu nyid kyang ngo / / til mar dngos po'i chub sgrol tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa dag gis rna ba yini na dngag 'joms// mar dang 'o ma bskol
114a4(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pa klu dang dmar po dag gis rtag tu sna yi nad dag 'joms/ / karko TI dang lAM ga li dang in+d+ra bong bu'i chur bcas byugs pas 'bras kyi 'phreng ba 'phrog/ lag pa dag ni rab
114a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung rkang pa'i pad+ma mnyam pa dag dang srog gi rlung ni 'gog bya ste/ / ji srid lus ni sa la rab tu lhung bar ma gyur pa dang tsha ba dang ni grol bar yang // yang dang yang du ting nge 'dzin la'o 'chi
114a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i tsher ma can ni nges 'joms te/ / snying kha'i pad+mar zla ba'i gzugs can dri med ri bong can mtshungs sna tshogs yum ni bsgoms pas so// sran chung ba
114a7(rgyud 'bum): nas 'thungs pas tsha bas rnam par bsnun pa'i mi rnams kyi ri tsher ma 'joms par byed/ / tsha ba'i mthar ni thod pa 'ardar ba mi bskyod bsres pa yis kyang 'jigs par byed pa 'phrog pa
114b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / sngags kyang chu me rlung rnams dag gi sngon du oM yig dang ni badz+ra snga ma drag gri ming // de nyid kyis ni bsrung bar bya ste mgo mgrin snying kha lte ba gsang ba la sogs rnams su'o// mnyam pa d+hA tri
114b2(rgyud 'bum): d+hAr+g+ha dang ni gzhan yang de bzhin tin ti ri yi 'dab ma'i phye ma dag/ nyi zla reg pa'i chu ni nges par dri ma bral ba dag la rkang pa'i lhag mar bskol bar bya// de yi khu ba ka ra dang bsres gzhan
114b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nyin zhag dag nas zhag gsum 'thungs pa 'di yis ni/ / so ka nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis bsregs pas 'chi ster 'phrog ste khams bdun song ba dag kyang ngo // gser la nyi ma khab len
114b4(rgyud 'bum): lcags dang pa Ta las skyes lcags ni mA k+Shi ka yis gdab par bya/ / sa bon phyed kyis kyang ni dri ma dag dang bral ba'i dngul chu bsgongs pa srung ni drug tu bya// ba yi dar ba drag po'i rtse mo can
114b5(rgyud 'bum): / gyis bsad nus 'dir ni dngas ma gzung bar bya ba nyid// dpal ldan gong bu kham len snod du slar yang bskol ba dag kyang ji srid phyed kyi tshad du'o// rab tu blangs te dag pa'i ka ra srang brgyad
114b6(rgyud 'bum): yang nA dgu ni dri la bsre ba nyid du bya/ / de ni thams cad dus su bza' bar bya ste kha zas rnams spangs bgrod pa ji srid nyid du'o// zla ba drug gis lha yi lus te skra dkar gnyer ma dang 'bral
114b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis 'chi med nyid du 'gyur/ / de phyir de nyid nyi ma so so'i dus su bza' bar ba ste 'on kyang gong bus rnam par dman// sngar brjod sa bon rgyal po mnyam pa dag ste gzhan yang
115a1(rgyud 'bum): dngul chu la ni blugs pa byed tsam mo/ / lan tshwa skyur po dag gis mnyes nas rnam pa mang ba'o sman gyi ji srid gcig nyid du 'gyur ba// mkhris pa skyur pos su mi
115a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs dang da ra da dang shi la dag kyang dngul chu mtshungs par mnye/ / de yis dngul gyi 'dab ma byugs pa gser nyid du 'gyur smin ma dag kyang byed dang ldan pas so// rnon po nam mkha' las
115a3(rgyud 'bum): skyes a la lan tshwa ya bak+Sha ra dang ni sa rdza rim pa yis/ / 'phel ba dag kyang nyi ma nyis 'gyur ro mnyam byed pas nyi ma'i lhag ma dag ni bsreg par bya// slar yang lan tshwas dag pa dang ni de
115a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pa las byung ba la sogs kyis bran 'jam par 'gyur/ / dngul la sum cha byin zhing bkang ste bsnun pa dag kyang dag pa yi ni me tog nyid du 'gyur// a la ga pur 'a phreng ba dang ni g.yo
115a5(rgyud 'bum): ba g+ha na 'bras bu can dang bya rog ri skyes dang / / karko la dang sing ha mU tra ut+pal 'bras bu ri dgas skyes dmar dai t+ya pU ti dang // klu dang bsil ba ra Na 'dab ma pa la chu dang 'khri shing
115a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' 'khyog po 'di dag ni/ / rdzas lnga dag gis dri mdzod ri dgas ri bong can sogs bdug pa me tog chang la sogs pas so// mig zla me dang rgya mtsho mda' dang yon tan chu gter
115a7(rgyud 'bum): ro dang lag pa zla ba mnga' dang mig/ zla ma rgya mtsho zla ba dus dang dus mda' mig dang chu gter mda' mig zla ba 'jig rten rnams// e la la sogs cha shas grangs rnams rim pas yongs su
115b1(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa re mig lnga lnga dag la ste/ / rdzas ni le tshe sbyar ba'i grong khyer la gnas dag pa'i cha shas nyi ma zhag ces byas drir 'gyur ro// dzA ti la sogs e la 'khri shing 'drab ma ke lA sha yi grong
115b2(rgyud 'bum): du rim pas dgod bya ba/ / rgya skyegs sar rdza 'o ma pu ra saM ta dag ste bdug pa'i bya ba rnams la bdug par bya// ga pur ka ra me tog ro dang ldan pa dgang sen mo dag ni me yi cha shas kyis// de dag
115b3(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang bral dri yi chu yis sbyar ba dag kyang spos kyi rang bur rab tu bya/ / lte ba dang po sing ha mU tra ri bong can dang nam mkha'i grong du khrus sbyor la dgod bya// gran thi stag dang ha re N+ya dang ha
115b4(rgyud 'bum): ta gzhan yang de bzhin dung ltar shun pa dag gi cha/ / d+hAn+na murbI brgya yis mtshan dang dam ma d+hu ri ni de bzhin dril phyis dag la yang // sngar brjod ma bzlog pa la chu skyes bzhir du lus dang grar thi
115b5(rgyud 'bum): par+Na dag kyang til mar la'o/ / pha ma dag kyang gran thi de bzhin 'gyur te lus dang ha ta btung ba bsgo dang kha la yang // shun pa po la gran thi dung ni 'bras bu 'dab ma sbar ba'i smin dang dang ba
115b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs la yang / / de ltar rab 'bye sum cu dag gis legs spras rnam mang dri dang spos la sogs pa'i sbyor bar bya// rdzas ni rnam par dag cing 'bras bu sbyar bas smin dang bgos pa dag ni
115b7(rgyud 'bum): phug pa dag gis kyang / / dang por brgyad cha 'dab ma'i dbang gis ska bar 'gyur te de yi nyis 'gyur dag ni drag po'i spos// phyi nas rdzas kyis tshad kyi bu ram dag kyang bsreg par bya ste so ka'i spyod
116a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dag las 'brel/ / rkang pa'i cha shas rlung gi bdug pa sbrang rtsi dkar po dag kyang rdzas dang mnyam pa nges par sreg/ gong bu dung gi tshad de ma la ya dang yang dang g.yo ba za
116a2(rgyud 'bum): bldan pa de bzhin no/ / smin pa'i dri ni me tog bzang po rnams kyis nyin zhag 'ga' zhig ji srid 'dod pa bsgo bar bya// phyi nas 'bugs pa brgya yi cha shas 'bras bu gsum dang zla ba ma
116a3(rgyud 'bum): da chang dang bcas pas bya/ / shi gru'i chu dang tshwa ga mA tra me tog bcud mnyam me tog las skyes mthar na bskol bar bya// zla ba gcig na so bo'i smin par 'gyur te rari dgas dang mnyam chang dang lte
116a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'abigs pa'o/ / gsang ba dri la s+phu ti ra sa sen mo g.yo ba spos kyi sbyor ba rnams la gsang ba ste// de bzhin bsil ba rab tu ku ru ka gu ru ri bong can yang bsgo ba'i bya bar me tog
116a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bugs pa la ni ga pur lte ba 'bras bu gsum dang ma da'i chang ste yang dag khrus sbyor la/ / gsang ba shun pa gran thi bar+Na nags su rgyu ba dang bcas gran thi dril phyis ngag la yang // chu skyes dag pa
116a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyis dman zhing mngar ba dag dang rnam par bral ba dri yi chu yis btags/ / spos kyis smin pa ska ba drag po sbrang rtsi dang bcas lag skyes dag gis khams bu rim pas 'phel// kham
116a7(rgyud 'bum): bu gnyis ni ka ra bsres pa dag ste ma la ya dang g.yo ba lcags dang ga pur yang / / kham bu'i thog ma tha mar sbrang rtsi dag dang dkar po nges par sreg ste dang po spos las so// nyin zhag 'ga' zhig ma
116b1(rgyud 'bum): tog bzang po rnams kyis bsgo ba byas nas dri yi chu yis bsres pa dag/ 'jim pa'i thod pa 'dzag pa min pa spra tshal dang ni gos kyis bcings te brtan par kha bcad la// shin tu che ba'i snod
116b2(rgyud 'bum): dam yang na sa 'og tu ste bye ma dag gis gang bar byas nas ni/ / zla ba drug gi sbyor bas smin par 'gyur te chu la gnas pa de ni lte ba'i gtso bo'i dri// til rnams 'dab ma bskol ba'i chu dag dang ni
116b3(rgyud 'bum): spos dang byug pa la sogs rnams kyis dag byas nas/ / phyi nas dzA ti la sogs me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag 'ga' zhig ji srid 'dod par bsgo bar bya// 'khrul 'khor dag las til
116b4(rgyud 'bum): mar blangs nas mi yi bdag po mkhas pas mching bu'i snod du gzhag par bya/ / khrus sam yan lag byug pa dag las myos byed me tog til mar nyid ni smin pa min par 'gyur// sa 'dzin
116b5(rgyud 'bum): nyim zla ba ma nu mig dang 'dod pa nor dang drag po rgyal po me dag dang / / phyogs dang 'byung ba bug pa drug dang tshes dang chu gter dag ni mtha' yi re mig la gzhag bya// grangs ni re mig bzhi yi
116b6(rgyud 'bum): chu yi gter dang rtse mo tsan+da te dpal ldan 'khor lo mtha' dag ni/ / tshad kyi rgyab tu bris nas rab tu bca' bar 'gyur ba'i dus su sbrum ma rnams la bstan par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams gang
116b7(rgyud 'bum): dag rab gsal sa gzhi dag la brgyad pa brgyad kyi ma mor rab tu grags/ / mngal zhes bya dang nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur dgu dang bcu ste bcu gcig gzhan ni lnga pa gsum// zla ba zhes dang
117a1(rgyud 'bum): lo zhes bya ste mtha' dag sa yi steng du de dag byis pa rab tu 'dzin/ / mngal du zug rngu dang ni rab tu btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas la yang zug gzer byed pa nyid// skyes/
117a2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams la byis pa'i rgyud du 'gyur te nyin zhag dbang dang zla ba lo yo rab 'bye las// ma rungs gzhon nu lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tshigs mtshams dag la yang dag gnas
117a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / thams cad rang gi tshes la 'jigs 'gyur byis pa 'dzin par byed de rgyal po nges par gtong mi byed// de dag zhi ba'i don du 'dir ni rnam mang dkyil 'khor khrus dang sbyin sreg dag tu rab tu
