117a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ru rta u sI ra dang ka sa ru ste ta ka ra dwang ut+pal 'dam skyes ge sar ni// bsil ba'i chu yis btags shing rdo rje yis nau bsngags pa dag kyang mngal gyi zug rdul rab sbyin//
117a5(rgyud 'bum): mngal ni rengs na na ku la dang gtsug pu da can gyi spu brgyad btags nas rab tu sbyin par bya// 'o ma mar dang thug pa zan ni zho dang bu ram bcas pa nyin zhag ma rnams dag la sbyin// smin pa'i
117a6(rgyud 'bum): zas lnga tha dang zho dang bu ram dang bcas po li ka dang mo da ka dag dang / / dri dang me tog mur me bkru ba dag kyang 'dab ma rnams kyis mtshan mo lnga ni rab tu bya// ba lang so dang lug gi rA dang ri dgas
117a7(rgyud 'bum): sen mo sgra dang sbrul gyi shun pa dag gi spos/ / byis pa zla skyes rnams ni rgyas pa'i don du mtha' dag brjod pa rnams kyang gtor ma dag la'o// bza' ba lnga dang bca' ba lnga dang chu la rgyu ba
117b1(rgyud 'bum): sha dang dri dang me tog mar me dang / / chang dang sngar brjod spos dang bkru ba dag dang de bzhin phyogs kyi gtor ma dag ni phyogs kyi char// byis pa lor ni skyes pa rnams dag rab tu gsal bar
117b2(rgyud 'bum): sa la rgyas pa'i slad du mi yi dbang / / mngal nas lo na lnga pa gsum du nges par rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu mchod pa dag tu 'gyur// yan lag rkyong zhing mig dag na ste kha dang lag pa rkang
117b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ser po nyid du yang dag 'gyur/ / gcin ni kha dog ser po dag dang tsha ba zhes pa dang ni skyug dang skam dang brgyal bar 'gyur// mtshan ma rnams ni shes par gyur nas de rnams kyi yang mi bdag
117b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyur ni dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bya/ / ma byin na ni gtong bar mi 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba las skyes ma mos kyang // gang gi yan lag thams cad dkar por 'gyur dang mi
117b5(rgyud 'bum): yi bdag po 'brum pa shin tu phra mo dang / / mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa 'khyog cing kha dang gsang ba bshang lam dag las khrag ni zag gyur pa// de la mchod pa bya ba min te sngags pa rmongs
117b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams ni chung ngu nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ / de ni 'chi bar 'gyur te nges par lha dang mi dang lag 'gro rnams kyis srung bar nus pa min// klu dang gnod sbyin gang yang gza' dang lha min rigs skyes
117b7(rgyud 'bum): srin po dag dang sha za rnams dang ni/ / sA kin n+ya dang bdug pa'i lA ma mi khrag la dga' mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma dag dang // grul bum dag dang zhing skyong rnams dang tshogs kyi bdag
118a1(rgyud 'bum): po yi dgas ro langs dag dang grub pa dang / / brjed byed dang bcas mkha' 'gro'i dbang rnams dkyil 'khor dag la mchod pa byas na mchog bde byed par 'gyur//
118a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs pa rnams mchod pa'i don du dkyil 'khor du 'gyur mi yi bdag po grong gi phyi rol du// shing gi gnas dang dur khrod dang ni lha mchog khang pa dag gam chu bo 'dus pa rnams su ste// khrugs
118a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gam gnyis dang bzhi ni dgu dang bcu gsum mi bdag lha rnams ngag gi tshad kyis so/ / dbus su rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag las phyed kyi cha shas
118a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad char 'gyur te nges par de yi phyed kyis kha khyer dag dang do shal lo// ra ba dag ni kha khyer phyed de rta babs dag kyang sgo yi tshad las sum 'gyur dag tu 'gyur// zlum
118a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i thab ni cha gsum pad+ma dkar po'i rang bzhin dkar ba'i tshon rnams dag gis bkang ba ste/ / dpal ldan tshon lnga dag gis lha rnams kyi ni rang phyogs rigs kyi dbang gis rang gi mtshan ma bya//
118a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbus dang ral gri dbang por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lhor ni rin chen dmar po'o// g.yon du 'dab ma brgya dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dkar po dag dang nub tu 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang // mer ni
118a7(rgyud 'bum): gr-i gug nges par pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas lha min zur du lcags kyu dag tu 'gyur/ / rlung du rdo rje zhags par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po drag po'i 'dab mngag la rtse gsum mo// shar gyi sgor ni ral gri
118b1(rgyud 'bum): nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pa dag sde lhor ni rdo rje'i dbyug pa'o/ / mu ru dpal ldan be con dag tu rab tu 'gyur te nges par byung du tho ba dag kyang ngo // sems kyi rjes 'brang shes nas shin tu
118b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa mang po dus kyi 'khor lo dag ni ji srid par/ / mo gsham rnams kyi bu yi don dang gdon gyis bcom pa'i ming rnams ni rgyas don du 'di dag mdzod// bum pa brgyad ni rin chen dang bcas
118b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma pad+ma'i kha dang so ma btang ba'i kham phor ni/ / bdun gyi chu dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas bkrus te slar yang nyungs kar sogs kyis nges par brab// dri dang bdug pa mar me rnam
118b4(rgyud 'bum): mnga'abras bu ro dang me tog dkar po dag dang gos rnams kyis/ / rnam par bkra ba'i mchod pa byas te slar yang de nas zhi ba'i bsreg bya dag ni sbyin sreg bya// 'o ma so ba til la sogs
118b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'o ma'i rkang 'thung lnga rnams dag gi yam shing mda' brgya dang / / mchod yon dag dang spyan drang zhal bsil dang ni de bzhin nyid du rjed dang mchod pa 'di dag ni// rab mtshogs ya steng du
118b6(rgyud 'bum): ma mo rnams kyis gzir ba rnam rtog zhi ba'i don du bya ba ste/ / sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams mi yi bdag po dus kun tu ni mchod pa nyid du 'gyur// bdag med las kyi rnam smin srid pa
118b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang dus kyi 'gro ba yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel las/ / yang dag byung dang rig byed bden pa gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i dgu ni ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams te// phung po lnga dang
119a1(rgyud 'bum): sku gsum ldan skyes shes dang de bzhin nyid du thun pa ma yin stong pa nyid/ / 'di dag gang du brjod pa de ni nges par rdo rje can gyi bstan pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// gang du/
119a2(rgyud 'bum): byed rang byung kha dang lag pa rkang pa la sogs dag kyang skye bo'i skye gnas te// a shwa me d+ha dag las gzhan pa mchog gi chos med ces pa de ni tshangs pa'i bstan par 'gyur// byed po bdag dang las
119a3(rgyud 'bum): dong dus dang rang bzhin dang ni yon tan stong pa nyid mi nyams pa'o/ chos// byed po 'bras bu'i rgyu ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bstan pa de 'dir khyab 'jug dag gi'o// lam drug rnams dang
119a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid lnga dang mchog gi go 'bang ma lus pa yang gzhan ni sngags kyi lus/ / rig bdag dam pa'i zhi ba nyid dang rnam gsum gnas na gnas pa dag gi sbyor dang gtong ba'i dngos// thig le'i dbye ba
119a5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba nyid dang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bcu gnyis mdud pa'i dbye ba ste/ / 'di dag thams cad gang du rab tu gyur pa de ni nges par zhib pa yi bstan pa'o// dbang phyug med cing las kyi rnam so
119a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag kyang yon tan yul rnams 'byung ba'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa/ / de med pa na 'bras bu med pa gsal bar lha yi bla ma dag gis bstan par rig par bya// byed pos rgyu dang mi rgyu las skyes
119a7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag bskyed cing stag gzig rnams kyis thar pa dag gi rgya/ / de mnyes pa las nges par mi rnams mtho ris su 'gyur de ni ra s+sa Na mi bstan pa'o// dus gsum nyid dang rdzas ni /
119b1(rgyud 'bum): ste tshig dgus bsgrubs dang srog ni drug gi lus la cha shas so// gzhan ni yod pa'i lus lnga brtul zhugs sdom pa 'gro dang ye shes spyod pa dag gi dbye ba rnams// srog ni lus kyi tshad de dpag
119b2(rgyud 'bum): tu med pa'i srid pa dag gis brtag pa'i srog gis thar pa'o/ / gang du thar pa'i tshad ni steng du nges par brjod pa de ni rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa'o// rig byed 'di ni rang byung min te srid pa
119b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi gnas su rig byed sgra ni don rjod byed/ / tshangs pa'i gdong bzhi dag gis sngon ni rig byed sgra dag gis kyang don ni rab tu gsal bar byas// ci ste sgra dang don ni tha dad min na me sgra brjod
119b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gis kha ni cis mi bsreg/ de phyir nges par ston pa po yod rig pa'i yul dang ma 'ongs don dang 'das pa dag la yang // rig byed nam mkha' mtshungs min 'dir ni gnas kyi dbye
119b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dag las kha yis rab brjod byas pa'o/ / rigs pas gnyis skyes kha yis bklags pa nyi tshe ba ste kun tu 'gro ba gzhan rnams klog pa'o// gang phyir dmangs la sogs pa'i
119b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni kun tu gro min pa'i rig byed 'di dag klog dang 'dri ba min/ / de phyir shes ldan mkhas par gyur pa'i mi rnams dag la rig byed dag ni tshad mar mi 'gyur ro// gal te
119b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed po dbang phyug yod na de yang 'gro ba'i las longs spyod po gzhan ma yin/ / gal te dbang phyug las kyi byed po ma mi de yang kun nas thams cad byed por mi 'gyur ro//
120a1(rgyud 'bum): / 'di ga byed po gan dag rgyal 'di byeng blo ga kyi sarlog tu gnan dpa da// de pyir da dang mi sa mi thas ster byed po bang phyug med du srog cug sAlas mi
120a2(rgyud 'bum): nas so/ / sa dang rdu me rlung gi rdul rnan 'dir rigal te mkha' la byed pa'i dang por yod pa min// rdza sangag med pa la ni yul dang rnam par bral ba'i thams cad byed po ste tshogs mi byed do//
120a3(rgyud 'bum): yul dang rnam par bral ba byeng po 'di mi tshad ma mngon sum dang ni lkog tu gyur pa med// yang dag sbyor ba nyid las thams cad du 'gyur mi yi badrag po 'dod pas ma yin las kyi gzugs//
120a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sbyor ba las ni chu shIl las kyang chu chur gyur tem yong dag las dngos po'i gzugs// sgyur ba'i rgyu las lce 'dzag rang gi sgra las TIg shos dag pa'i gzon las ni myu gu pa gyu
120a5(rgyud 'bum): khab chen las kyang lcags kyi thu ma dag ni gam par 'gyur te 'dod pas 'di la ci yang min/ / dngos po rnams kyi nus pa 'di'i srid bu gsum kyi gnas su su zhig gis kyang sprul pa min/
120a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te ba bdi hU~M 'gron ginan dang bral ba'i sdug pa la mi stan rnams su myong bar 'gyur// gal te 'dzin rtog par bya na 'dod pa'o sada' mis pa sbyin ci gnas rmims nyid
120a7(rgyud 'bum): rab 'gyur/ / gas bya ma dang bcas chung ma gnyid la gdus su 'di ni rmongs pa nyid du ltar 'gro// de ltar nges par bdag 'di sus 'gro khyab bdag ji'ini ldan kyi bya ba dnga'i bcas pa mam
120b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag med 'byung ba yod ci dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yod de byed pa po yis rnam par dman/ / 'gro ba po med ma lus thar pa'i slad du 'gro ba yod cing 'ching ba yod de bcings pa med// dngos po//
120b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med dag kyang yod de skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin med pa dag gi srid pa yod// 'di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang gdengs can rnams kyi don bcas tshig gis 'joms mi 'gyur
120b3(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig de nyid gang zag ces bya lus la gnas par smra ba de ni rang bzhin dag gis nyams/ / kun rdzob dag gi don ni smra ba po yang don dam ma rig med pa dag tu 'dod pa'o// srid gsum
120b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag rnam par shes pa nyid du smra ba po yang rnam par shes pa 'dod par byed/ / gang zhig snying rje stong nyid gnyis su med pa smra bo phyogs nyams de ni ma nyams par 'gyur ro// skye bo sngon
120b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi las rnams nyams su myong 'gyur 'od la byas pa rnams ni skye ba gzhan la'o/ / gal te de lta yin na las ni 'jig par mi 'gyur mi rnams skye dang skye ba gzhan dag gis// dpag med srid pa dag
120b6(rgyud 'bum): gis 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur dang thar bar 'jug pa med pa nyid/ / 'di dag stag gzig rnams kyang nges par 'dod par 'gyur te gzhan pa'i rigs kyis rab tu dman pa'o// gal te 'byung ba
120b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'gyur bas chang gi nus pa bzhin du dbang bcas sems su rab 'gyur na/ / shing rnams dag la ci phyir mi 'gyur sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor phyir ro// 'di dag rnams la
121a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bo'i nus pa med na 'byung ba yang dag sbyor ba'i nus pa mchog tu brdzun/ / tshu rol mdzes pa'i tshig 'di dag ni mi rnams dag la bde ba'i 'bras bu ster min lam nyams
121a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / srog ni lus kyi tshad dag yin na gal te lag pa rkang pa bcad pas nyams par 'gyur ram ci// rtag pa dag ni lus kyi mthu las phra mor 'gyur zhing sbom por yang ni rab tu 'gyur ram ci// 'khor
121a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las las grol ba gang zhig 'jig rten steng na gnas pa bde ba dag gi gnas su 'gro/ / 'jig rten gsum yang phra rab dag gis gang zhig bkod pa de ni dus kyis rtag tu rtag pa min// zhes
121a4(rgyud 'bum): pab la sogs ye shes slad du dus kyi 'khor los sa la bstan pa rab tu gasngal mdzad pa/ / 'jam dang sra dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu rnams kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste// sem
121a5(rgyud 'bum): ni nges par dngos po'i tshon gyis nye bar gzhag pa dag las shel bzhin tshon ldan nyid 'gyur ba/ / gang yin de phyir bzhin rigs su gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang rnal 'byor pa yis sun mi
121a6(rgyud 'bum): byung / / chos ni sems can phan pa yul dang rnam par bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gnod pa'o// 'tshe ba rig byed tshad ma can ni bde ba'i 'bras bu mi ster dus kun tu ni sdug bsngal ster//
121a7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i byams ldan rmongs pa'i tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can bde la rjes su chags// de phyir sems can don ni gcig pu dag dang mi bdag yid kyi rang bzhin med pa sgom par
121b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / lha mi bla ma nga ni mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu dbang pos steng du ni 'khor lo sgyur// sa 'og dag tu klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis btud dang kun tu 'gro dang mchog nga ste/
121b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur med mchog dang khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang // rig byed oM gyi yi ge gtsang ma dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la
121b3(rgyud 'bum): skyabs su song / / khyod ni ma dang khyod ni pha ste khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang yang // khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po phan dang sdig 'phrog khyod ni go 'phang phun sum tshogs pa yang/
121b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni 'ba' zhig gnas dang khyod ni yon tan mchog gi gnas te skyon rnams bcom pa khyod nyid do// khyod ni dmun pa rnams kyi mgon dang yid bzhin nor bu rgyal ba'i dbang po khyod la bdag skyabs mchi//
121b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo chen po las// nang nges pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // lus la sna tshogs tshad dang nyin dang
121b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'i dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dang ni/ / rtsa rnams kyi ni phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin dag las skyes bu mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod pa dang // rig byed dang ni byed po la sogs dbye
121b7(rgyud 'bum): ba bdag gis thos pas dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan du gsol/ / zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gas nas bde bar gshegs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsungs// dang por yang
122a1(rgyud 'bum): dag bsten bya bla ma dag kyang dam tshig ldan zhing rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas/ / de nyid bsgoms shing ma chags dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing bzod pa'i ngang tshul la
122a2(rgyud 'bum): la zhugs/ / slob ma rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog cing de nyid las ni tshangs spyod ldan// bdud rnams la ni rdo rje dbyug pa de yang 'dzin ma'i gzhi la rdo rje sems
122a3(rgyud 'bum): dpar rab grags pa'o/ / nga rgyal dang ldan khro bas zil mnan dam tshig rnam bral rdzas la brkam zhing thos pa dag kyang med// slob ma rnams ni slu ba don du gnyer zhing mchog gi bde ba'i
122a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas las sems nyams dbang ma bskur/ / longs spyod dag la kun chags bag med rtsub mo'i tshig dang bcas shing dbang po'i don du 'dod ldan pa// de nyid dmyal ba bzhin du slob ma
122a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni spang bar bya/ / zab cing rgya che la sems bla ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan yon tan shes// thar pa don gnyer rgyud la
122a6(rgyud 'bum): gus shing g.yo ba min pa'i sems ldan de nyid thob pa shin tu sbed/ / gdug pa rnams kyi grogs nyams slob ma de nyid bla ma shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis bsdu bya ba// shes rab dang
122a7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i rgyur te gzhan zhes bya ba slar yang 'bring po bsod nams dag gi rgyur/ / nag pa'i mthar ni dkar po'i tshigs la gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs byas
122b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams ni bsod nams don du bu rnams dag la sbyin par bya// yang na mtha' dag yon tan gter ni bstan pa'i slad du rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la
122b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bya/ / mchod pa med na lo gcig tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po dag las bla mas bstan par mi bya'o// dbang gi don du sa ni yongs brtag nags dang grong khyer grong rdal grong gi phyogs kyi cha dag
122b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / thab khung rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang ni bum pa dang bcas rdul tshon sbyin sreg phur bu la sogs dang // slob ma rnams ni bsdu ba dag dang gang yang rgyal ba'i bdag po mchog gi dkyil 'khor
122b4(rgyud 'bum): bri ba dag/ shes nas slob dpon gyis ni dge dang ma dge'i 'bras slad zhi ba la sogs mtha' dag rab tu bya// sa yi rigs ni yon tan dbang gis rnam bzhir 'gyur ba dmangs rigs rje'u
122b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs rgyal po bram ze ste/ / gnag dang ser dang dmar ba dang nai ri bong 'dzin pa dkar ba'i kha dog rnams kyis rig par bya// rul ba chu skyes pad+ma'e dri dang mchog gi dri rnams rim pas nor gyi
122b6(rgyud 'bum): blo gros dag tu 'gyur/ / sgyur dang lan tshwa dmangs rigs mngar dang tsha ba rje'u rigs mi bdag gzhan pa dag ni gnyis skyes so// dkar po dag ni zhi dang rgyas pa la ste sprin nag dang mtshungs gsad
122b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bskrad bdag la yang / / dmar po dbang dang dgug pa la ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa rengs dang rmongs pa la yang 'gyur// las kyi cha ni thams cad dag la ljang khur gyur te lnga pa dang ni mtha'
123a1(rgyud 'bum): mngag gi rigs/ / ro dang dri rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// dbang ldan dang ni byang gis gzhi dag la zhi ba dang /
123a2(rgyud 'bum): nirgyas pa dag tu 'gyur ba ste// me yi mtshams dang shar gyi char ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par gsad pa dag dang bskrad pa'o// bden bral dang ni lho phyogs su yang gsal bar rtag bu dbang dud+d+ha
123a3(rgyud 'bum): drug bdag kyang / / rlung gi sernams dang mu kyi thugs su nges pad+mam chog gi mi bdag rengs pang ba ni mongs pa'o// rab khub grong mi phyogs po rgya dgA tu ngesna par rab tu 'gyur te rnam
123a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni chu ga ter zur/ zhwa kham zur lnga pa dang rang bzhini yon tan dbang gis zung bdun pa dang zur ni gsum pa dang // zur drug pa dang bur bskyod par 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis de dag rnams
123a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i mtshan ma ni/ / badz+ra 'khor lo gri gug ral gri mda' zhes bya dang rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgrog dag dang sprul// gcig gnyis phyed dang gcig ni khru ste mkha' dus mkha' mig
123a6(rgyud 'bum): ma' se mkhyur dus dag ni sor du 'gyur/ / byed kyi yan lag drug gom shes kyil ki ma'i cha shes drug gis thabs dpal khyer dang // mchu dang mtshan po'i'i phreng por 'gyur ste la
123a7(rgyud 'bum): dag nisang du rigs kyi sa gas kyi po/ / kha khyer phyir ril du yang chu skyes 'dab ma rnams mdzod mi bdag ni rgyas la ste gnan la min// mngan las ni thams cad la yangs
123b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te sa la phur pa dag gi dbye ba brgyad/ / n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad thA ka rus lcags seng ldeng las skyes rtswa ta bil ba arga skyes// de bzhin shel gyi bum pa dang ni dngul mchog rang bzhin
123b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal lngar thod pa dag dang lcags kyi dang / / zangs zhes bya dang gser gyi bum pa rab gsal nges par shing lus skyes dang sa yi rang bzhin no// zlum po brgyad gnyis sor du brjod de gnyis kyis
123b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur ba'i bcu yis dpangs dang sor gnyis dag gi mchu/ / drug gi mgrin pa sor brgyad kha ste ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zhi rgyas dag la'o gzhan la min// snga dro nas ni thun brgyad po rnams
123b4(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhi dang rgyas pa sogs la 'gyur/ / de bzhin de yi thun phyed dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su las brgyad dag ni rab tu bya// nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed dag ni nyin dang
123b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'i dus su zhi ba dag la spang bar bya/ / dus sbyor gdug pa'i gza' rnams gnas pa dag ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed de bzhin nyid du rab tu grags// 'o ma dang bcas yam shing mda'
123b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya zhi dang rgyas pa dag la gsad pa la ni mi rus so/ / dbye ba la ni bya rog mjug ma seng ldeng las skyes keng shu ka ni dgug dang dbang la'o// bil ba smyo byed dag ni khru phyed mda' brgya'i grangs
123b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa dag la ste/ / 'o ma mar dang khrag dang zhag dang rdul dang rdo rje'i chu dang mchil ma chang rnams bsreg bya ste// dur ba 'bru dang sha dang dug dang bcas pa dag dang de
124a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin skye tshe me tog dmar po dang / / bil ba bsnyings pa'i 'phreng ba dang ni gu ser bzang me tog rnams nyid zhi ba la sogs rnams la'o// gshin rje bden bral zur dang
124a2(rgyud 'bum): / chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyid drag po dbang po dag dang me ru ni// slob dpon dag gi gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag la'o// tshon ni las gnyis dag la
124a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te gtso bo'i pad+ma la yang dkar nag nyi ma ser po'o/ / phyi rol du na sangs rgyas dbye bas lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyis// thab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor la ni
124a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnams su yang tshon ni gdab par 'gyur/ / dgod pa la sogs bsang gtor la sogs rang gi snying kha'i rdo rje dag las lha rnams spro ba'o// shel la sogs
124a5(rgyud 'bum): paba'i mchod yon snod la pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma mthe bong dag ni bcu gnyis kyang / / yu ba'i rtse mor snyim pa'i snod de khyor ba dag kyang sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya ba dag la'o// zhi dang drag po
124a6(rgyud 'bum): chags dang bcas par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha ni rengs pa dag gi sku/ / de bzhin las gnyis dga' rab tu gsal zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro// rnam
124a7(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang po gang phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas phung po khams sogs kyi/ / dbye ba yis te de las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul chen rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/
124b1(rgyud 'bum): thig skud khru ni brgyad par 'gyur te sum sgril slob dpon gyi ni lag pa'i mthe bong nas gcig gis// sboms su 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi lam na gnas pa thig skud gcig ste gzhan pa ma yin no//
124b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba li sogs dag la rim pa yongs su bkod pa skyil krung rdo rje lha min tsog pu dang // skyil krung phyed par dbye ba gnyis dang bA shang lam rkang par gnas pa dag kyang las kyi dbye bas gdan// shel
124b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mu tig dang ni mi dang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de tse dang ni/ / pad+ma zhes bya dbang mig lung tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis sngags bzlas pa la 'phreng bar 'gyur// dri zhim
124b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog dkar po dang ni tsha ba dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser pos mchod/ / bsil dang bshang ba sha yi spos ni sbrang rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang bska ba'o// 'khrul 'khor n+ya
124b5(rgyud 'bum): gro d+ha 'dab dur khrod ro yi ras dang gro ga'i 'dab dang arka'i 'dab ma la/ / shi rI khar+d+ha sA li btags pa dag dang dur khrod sar gnas sol ba khrag dang dug dang ni// kha che tsan dan dmar dang 'bras
124b6(rgyud 'bum): bu gsum gyi khu ba yung ba ba blas bri bar 'gyur ba ste/ / dU ra ba bsil rus mjug sgo gser drang seng ldeng las skyes bil ba skyes dang arka'i sbu gu'o// kham por dpal ldan thod par mngar
124b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum khrag dang spra tshil gong bu so phag dag gi dbus su ni/ / rlan dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gtsang ba dag dang ro langs gni me yis gdung dngos dag la// 'khrul 'khor gzhag par bya bar
125a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis sngags pa yis ni rig par bya/ / zla ba glang chen yi dgas rnga mo ri rigs rta dang phyugs dang rus sbal lus la rim pas so// dpal ldan
125a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnams kyis phyogs kun tu gnas mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg bya ste/ / phyi nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dag la phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tsho gas ni bsgom par bya//
125a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i dbus su gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang dus kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs// de nas bla ma'i nges pa dang ldan gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya//
125a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum gyis sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas ra ba gsum ni ring du mthong ba'i mtha' ru ste// tho rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' ru sa gzhi'i gnas las nam mkha' dag la rdo rje brtsegs pa'o//
125a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su chu skyes nyi ma'i khru ste lte ba gdan dang bcas pa dag dang dus gyi khru 'gyur ro// de yi steng du bdag nyid nyes pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// sa yi
125a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams su 'dir dang po rdo rje gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin bya ste/ / phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg par bya//
125a7(rgyud 'bum): sa yi lha mo spyan drangs chu dang bcas pa'i me tog dag gis 'di la mchod yon rab tu sbyin// de la gsol ba btab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod// rgyal
125b1(rgyud 'bum): bas lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag la lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/ / de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya zhing lha mchog gis btud bzhes shig bzhes shig bdag gi mchod yon no//
125b2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa// de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu bya//
125b3(rgyud 'bum): gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa// de dag rnams kyi mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du
125b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag la bskyang du gsol/ / de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab// phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi cha
125b5(rgyud 'bum): ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya/ / zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rA ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na// gnas de dag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'a
125b6(rgyud 'bum): tede yi phyir na sbyang bar bya/ / sa la rin chen dung dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste// khang bzang don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir//
125b7(rgyud 'bum): ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du'o// rdzogs pa dag la sa ni sbrang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu// bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag
126a1(rgyud 'bum): dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid/ / dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te 'dud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang // de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rig
126a2(rgyud 'bum): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min/ / dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// srog dang pa
126a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ / slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni// bya
126a4(rgyud 'bum): ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu byin par 'gyur/ / slob ma'i mgo bo snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i pad+mar ni//
126a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba la sogs gnyis ka'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrung byas shing // de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni ra ba gsal nges pa'i
126a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te/ / sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid// dag pa'i gnas ni legs par
126a7(rgyud 'bum): gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag/ khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni// thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang
126b1(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag/ bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs
126b2(rgyud 'bum): 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams drag kyang ngo / / gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jig pa yang // mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong
126b3(rgyud 'bum): nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ / slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya// shes rab thabs kyi
126b4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag dbus su yongs 'jims su 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya/ / sa la g.yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin// gsu
126b5(rgyud 'bum): du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi dag tu mtshan mo'i 'thab mo la ni bsnun pa'o/ / de phyir g.yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par
126b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / a sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar zla nyi ma steng du// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g.yas brkyang zhabs ni
126b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms byas shing / / shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i pad+ma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing
127a1(rgyud 'bum): @thig skud la yang bsgom par bya/ / thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya// sor byed brjod pa nor dang dus kyi
127a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ / snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo yi mtshams// ra ba rta babs la
127a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs rtsa mo can de g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya/ / gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni// nyi ma'i
127a4(rgyud 'bum): re mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur/ / bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs pad+mar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyi phyi rol rdo rje 'phreng bar yang // lha mo sangs
127a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur/ / gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re khA'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te// phyogs zur
127a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dri la sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi pad+ma nyid/ / phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re khA gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang sgo khyud dang // de bzhin
127a7(rgyud 'bum): lelogs dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed/ / de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur// sgo yi rtsa
127b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur/ / thig phyed steng du dor nas do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar ni bA ku lIr yang rab tu 'gyur// re mig drug gi rta
127b2(rgyud 'bum): babs 'og tu nor gyi pad+ma dang lA na rnal 'byor ma rnams snam bu'o/ / de nas ro yas bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal lAn tshon gyi sa ste re khA pA yi bar du'o// phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i pad+ma nyis
127b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan nyi ma'i re mige dag gis bya/ / snying po'i sgo na nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang // ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du
127b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya/ / de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i 'phreng ba yang // de phyed re mig dag gis
127b5(rgyud 'bum): / bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni// nyi ma dag gis
127b6(rgyud 'bum): sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang / / rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta b+hu ru mu tig la sogs dang // dbye ba lnga yi 'bru'am rnam mang
127b7(rgyud 'bum): nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis/ / phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur// ser dang dkar dang dmar ba
128a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rung dag la rim pas so/ / shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa dag ste rub tu yang // gser
128a2(rgyud 'bum): mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so/ / dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gis// pad+mam
128a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum/ / dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ljang khu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje 'phreng bar 'gyur// dbang ldan lha
128a4(rgyud 'bum): mi ni me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yis/ / dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya dri bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du// zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng d+ma
128a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed pad+ma dkar po'i steng du yang / / chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba lA ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gi gdan du 'gyur// chu skyes dkar po'i lte ba dag la lha rnams kyi
128a6(rgyud 'bum): yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su'o/ / phyi rol du ni gtso bo'i pad+ma'i dbang gis rdo rje 'phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar// ka bA ser po bA ku lI mil ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur
128a7(rgyud 'bum): babs kha dog sna tshogs so/ / dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi pad+ma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu'o// phyogs kyi char ni pad+ma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang
128b1(rgyud 'bum): gis pad+ma dkar po zur du yang / / zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan no// mkha' sogs re khA lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon
128b2(rgyud 'bum): tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas/ / ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur// dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur du sa yi dkyil
128b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la ga nas zla nyi ga go mi yi dbang / / phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dgas dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur// g.yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas
128b4(rgyud 'bum): chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing / / dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang // do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gri
128b5(rgyud 'bum): shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o/ / 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol du// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje 'phreng ba
128b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dag tu 'ang 'gyur/ / sdom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang re khA ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed// chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de ba ni//
128b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid du spyod// mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chang na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med// rnam par 'dres pas rigs brgyud 'chad de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon
129a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya/ / gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur// dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi byad/
129a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal bskyed mdzad rigs la ni// de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o// do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi
129a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gzhi la pad+ma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya/ / nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang // ra ba rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin
129a4(rgyud 'bum): mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re khA nyis 'gyur ro/ / snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste// do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni nas gcig sa chu
129a5(rgyud 'bum): srag za rlung dang rdo rje 'phreng ba rnams la'o/ / dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar 'gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la// sgo nas tsartsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdengs
129a6(rgyud 'bum): can re mig dag gis lan tshwa'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur/ / de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur// de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas
129a7(rgyud 'bum): sa chu sreg za rlung rnams blta bar bya/ / gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya// de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs
129b1(rgyud 'bum): can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste/ / re mig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid// de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gi
129b2(rgyud 'bum): lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya/ / gnyis dang chu gter gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis dus phyed dus phyed dang // dus dang dus ni rab phye dag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha
129b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams rim pa yis/ / snying por lte ba rtsibs sam pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang // pad+ma rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs dang // ka ba
129b4(rgyud 'bum): rab kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa dag dang / / me longs yi snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis// phyi rol du ni sgo sogs
129b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro/ / phyi rol du ni pad+ma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyin byed dag gis so// oM yAMg ye shes las skyes
129b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gdan steng du/ / a sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa dag dang srid gsum skyed par byed pa'i yum ni gzhag par bya// stong pa a yig rnam par bcad pa
129b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang bral ba mchog la sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ / yang dag 'byung ba sngags kyi skye gnas mchog gi bde byed ye shes rdo rje dag ni bzhi pa'o// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma sna tshogs mdog la
130a1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du hUM yig ste/ / phyogs 'dab rnams la a sogs stong pa phyogs bral 'dab ma la yang ha sogs stong pa rnam pa bzhi// dbang ldan bden bral zur dang rtse
130a2(rgyud 'bum): mo can dang rlung du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang chags pa ste/ / hI yig la sogs bum pa rnams kyi bcu ru 'gyur te haM haHzhes pa dag gi mtha' 'diri ro// shar gyi chu skyes steng du i yig rtse mo can
130a3(rgyud 'bum): dupad+ma la gnas I yig ring po nyid/ / gshin rje lha min du ri ri yig dag ste nor sprin 'phrog byed du gnas thung ring u yig dag/ chu dang rlung gi zur dag tu yang pad+ma la gnas thung ngu ring po dag gi li
130a4(rgyud 'bum): yig ste/ / nag po dmar po dag dang dkar po gser mchog dang mtshungs zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgod par bya// shar gyi sgo yi lho dang me ya pad+ma la gnas thung dang ring ba dag ni de bzhin nyid/
130a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin ar yig zung ni gshin rje lA min dag tu gnas te nub tu al yig zung dag go/ o oM gnod sbyin drag po ru ste lha chug shin rje gnod sbyin dang bcas sgo yi byang du ni// aM aHsogs te rim
130a6(rgyud 'bum): bapa yis ni slar yang ya ra wa la lha sogs sgo yi pad+ma la'o/ / shar dang byang gi sgor ni ri bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dag gi gdan du 'gyur ba ste// lho dang nub tu pad+mar nyi ma dag ni gnyis pa dag gi
130a7(rgyud 'bum): gdan du nges par rab tu 'gyur/ / shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis pad+mar zla ba nyi ma dag kyang gdan du 'gyur// g.yas dang rgyab tu nyi mar 'gyur te lha yi bdag po nor sbyin du yang za
130b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gdan du 'gyur/ / thig le'i rnam pa dag gis rnam phye nges par pad+ma la gnas ka sogs sde yi yi ge yang // rtsa ba sdong bu 'dab ma dang ni ge sar lte ba dag la rim pas yongs su bkod pa ste/
130b2(rgyud 'bum): sa sogs nam mkha'i mtha' ni ka kha ga g+hA nga zhes thung ngu ring po rang gi sa la'o// thig le zla ba rnam par bcad pa nyin byed du 'gyur gdan yang lte ba dag gi steng du'o// sde drug thung dang ring
130b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis kha khyer dag la ka ba'i ngos su ni/ / dri la sogs rnams rim pas rang rigs sa la gnas te shar gyi cha nas rang gi phyogs rnams su'o// phyi rol du ni
130b4(rgyud 'bum): thig le sogs kyis phye ba sum 'gyur nyi mas kha khyer dag la de bzhin nyid/ / 'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyogs su gnas te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog dbye bas so// thung dang ring
130b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ha yig dag ni lga dang nor sbyin rub dang lho ru tsa rtsi ka sogs kyi/ / khyab 'jug ma sogs dag gi k+Sha yig a sogs kyis phye me dang 'phrog byed rlung dang lha min du// hi la sogs dang kI la somra
130b6(rgyud 'bum): pa grangs brgyad pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas mdun rgyab rang phyogs su/ / ya sogs thung dang ring ba drug rnams lha yi pang 'dab me yi pad+ma dag la rim pa yis// de bzhin gshin rje lha min pad+ma'i 'dab
130b7(rgyud 'bum): mar thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye bas ra sogs te/ / gnod sbyin drag por wa la sogs dang chu gter dang bcas rlung gi pad 'dab rnams la la la sogs// shar gyi sgo yi lho dag tu yang
131a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas dbyangs kyis phye ba tsa mi sde/ / thung ngu lha min gyi ste ring po rnams kyang me yi zur na gnas pa rlung gi yin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshin rjer
131a2(rgyud 'bum): me dang ro yi gdong ba dag ki Ti sde thung dang ring po'i rab dbye yis/ / g.yon dang dbang ldan du yang ba sder 'gyur te chu gter dang ni ring po'i dbye bas tshogs kyi'o// brgya byin dang ni tshangs pa
131a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gi chur bcas rlung du thung ngu ring po ta yi sde pa'o/ / shar gyi sgro yi byang du pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha min dgra yi ka sde thung ngur 'gyur ba ste// lho ru gshin rje dag gi ring por 'gyur te mi yi
131a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag po byang dag dang no nub tu yang / / phyugs kyi bdag po dza b+ha la yi thung dang ring ba sa sder 'gyur ba nyid ngo rgyal po ste// lha min la sogs rnams kyi rang gi sa bon du 'gyur 'dab ma la mi rang
131a5(rgyud 'bum): sde mtha' dbus/ / 'dab ma nyi shu brgyad la yang ni nyin zhag dbang gis rang rang sde pa dag gi yi ge rnams// yA rA wA lA hUM hAHdrug kyang nges par shing rta dag la steng dang rtsa ba la sogs
131a6(rgyud 'bum): su/ / sgo las g.yas dang g.yon du gdengs can rnams kyi ya sogs la gnas he yig dag tu rab tu 'gyur// sde drug brtsegs pa'i gzugs dang slar yang haM ya ra wa la dang k+Sha sos
131a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i ya sogs ni/ / phyogs kyi 'khor lo ra ka sogs sde rnams g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ca sogs gzhan la lugs mthun te// shar dang gshin rje byang dang chu dang medang
131b1(rgyud 'bum): lha min dang ni dbang ldan rlung gi zur du'o/ / aM aHzla ba zhi pa dag gi dur khrod sa gni la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams so// hUM gi yi ge chos kyi 'khor lo dang ni de bzhin aHyig bum
131b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa bon dag tu 'gyur/ / oM yig rnga bo che yir 'gyur te chu ru ho yang byang chub shing dag gir ni rab tu 'gyur// zhes pa de ltar dbyangs ldan rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor
131b3(rgyud 'bum): dag la sngags kyi dbye bar 'gyur/ / phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha dog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis 'gyur// thab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug
131b4(rgyud 'bum): ngogs pa rnams spyan drang bdag dang / / dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod yon cho ga de bzhin bdud ni gzhom pa dag kyang ngo // sgo rnams srung ba'i don du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag pa'i
131b5(rgyud 'bum): slob ma rnams ni rab dgod bya/ / dpal ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur du rim pas so// slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las
131b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas/ / slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang bya// zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang rgyas
131b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dag gi thab tu 'gyur/ / byang ngam drag po'i zur dang gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtsa ba'i pad+ma dag ni nyis 'gyur ro// zabs ni pad+ma'i tshang du 'gyur te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i pad+ma mtshan mar
132a1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'o/ / ban skye la pang+gA byi chu zum pa dang bcas ral tshwa 'in chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur// de mi byed kyis kyang nim chu ste de las nyis 'gyur ras kyapa ga khyer dag kyi
132a2(rgyud 'bum): se/ / steng du rdo rje 'phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi phyed kyis dbangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol 'og tu pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams dang gu shi'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya// de yi
132a3(rgyud 'bum): ni nu phyogs dag tu ngas par re zhwa ga sum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur/ / slob dpon dag go gdan no nges par mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i bdung ga los gis 'gyur ro// gson du mtshad ma
132a4(rgyud 'bum): gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po spyir sreg sngo dag gi yang g.yas su 'gyur/ / kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdug po'i yang na mkha' yi pad+ma yum gyi'o// nal dang gsang bdas
132a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang thab khung rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi dang lus la'o/ / thub kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas bsrung ba byas nas ni// dpal ldan rdo rje dag
132a6(rgyud 'bum): gis bsang ba sogs dang rgyur bcas me tog rnams kyis me la mchod mon nyid/ / des rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par byas te rang snying bad+mar zla ba'i stong du bsgoms nas so// rnal gcig
132a7(rgyud 'bum): dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi bad+ma g.yon na ril ba chu skyes ngag dang ni/ / g.yas na dbyug pa bgrang 'phreng ral po shin tu ser skya dam ri ser mig ldan gos dang bcas pa ste// me yi snying khar zla ba'i
132b1(rgyud 'bum): steng du dri med 'phrog byed dzaHlas lcags kyu nges par bsgom par bya/ / de yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod// de ltar thab la yang ni
132b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin me ni spyan drang ngo / / mchog sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bong gis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin sreg dag ni rab tu bya// gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mnga'
132b3(rgyud 'bum): brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang dUr ba mar dang 'o ma yis/ / skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g.yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku// slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar
132b4(rgyud 'bum): yang ma la sreg blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya/ / rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag kyang de bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang // dri la sogs dang spros dag phul nas
132b5(rgyud 'bum): rang snying pad+mar ye shes me ni gshegs su gsol bar bya/ / phyi nas slob ma la nI dbang bskur dpal ldan bla ma mtha' dag yon tan gter gyis nges par sbyin// dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba
132b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i slang du'o/ / rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing rdul tshon btab ste sngags kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na// zur du shel gyi bum pa dkar po
132b7(rgyud 'bum): srung ba lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag gzhag par bya/ / slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje pad+ma las skyes rab bgrong khro bo'i rgyal po rnam dag gis// spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo
133a1(rgyud 'bum): rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o/ / lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad bdag gi ming gi sngon du oM zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ste// sbyin sreg la ni swA hA'i mtha' sngas/
133a2(rgyud 'bum): snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod pa dag la na maH'i mtha'// dzaHhUM baM hoHlcags kyu la sogs rim par yongs su bkod rnams spyan drang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin
133a3(rgyud 'bum): la yang i daM grih+Na gr-ih+Na ar+g+haM kaM me zhes par 'gyur/ / rgyas pa la ni sA hA'i mtha' yi sngags su 'gyur te ma bdag zhi ba la 'di na maH'i mtha'// dgugs pa la ni bau ShaT mtha' ru 'gyur ta ba
133a4(rgyud 'bum): Sha Ta mtha' yang dbang la'o de bzhin nyid du ni/ / hUM yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis phaT mtha' phur bus gdab sogs la'o// dkar dang dmar dang
133a5(rgyud 'bum): nag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs padag ste bab kyi dbye ba dag gis sngags/ / shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje dag ni sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang // lho ru gsung gi rdo rje
133a6(rgyud 'bum): nub tu yang ni rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste/ / dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis sa yi cha la khyab par byed par 'gyur// rlung me chu dang sa yaM lnga rnam
133a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mi bdag i ra u laM'o/ / oM AHhUM ni phyag rgya gsum ste swA hA'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang lnga// hUM AHoM ho rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang
133b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur/ / a sogs dang bcas hraM yig drug ste ro rkang na maHsogs kyis dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyur// phreM gyi yi ge sna tshogs yum gyir 'gyur te
133b2(rgyud 'bum): / rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o// hUM yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang bcas pa ste// hUM yig la sogs yan lag drug po
133b3(rgyud 'bum): sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo / / lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis// rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor
133b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so/ / rin chen gser zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang // dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang
133b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu ba ngan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis/ / rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsung ba bzhin// slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar
133b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad du dbul bar bya/ / dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag nyid bu dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma// de ring nyid nas mi
133b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang 'khor bas 'jigs pa bdag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabs su lhag par mchi/ / khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lus ngag sems ni dag
134a1(rgyud 'bum): pas so/ / zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gis maN+Dal byas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla mngag
134a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang spyi bos gzung bar bgyi/ / rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// ral gri la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rig
134a3(rgyud 'bum): la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi/ / sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// slob ma khrus byas dri yis rjes byugs brtul
134a4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sar ni bzhag byas te/ / dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gis mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin bya// lce la'ang bdud rtsi nges par rgyal
134a5(rgyud 'bum): bapa mchog gi dam tshig dag gis spros ni dbab pa'i don du'o/ / sngags ni hUM gi yi ge gcig ste a ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o// khro bo'i rgyal po phebs na mtshon chas
134a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i lag pa dag gis bdud kyi tshogs la bsdigs byed cing / / g.yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing ba dag gis rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de// bzhad dang
134a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM gi yi ge 'dres pa dgra la 'jigs pa ster ba dang ni rdo rje'i glu yang byed/ / ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha gzhan dag kyang zhi ba'o// sku phebs pas ni rnal
134b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ldan pa rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste/ / gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur// thugs phebs pas ni
134b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad shes par 'gyur/ / ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur// sa phebs
134b3(rgyud 'bum): pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab tu 'gyur/ / me phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// stong
134b4(rgyud 'bum): pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa stang du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ / de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya//
134b5(rgyud 'bum): dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te me yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom pa'i stobs dang ni// bsnyen pa'i dpe ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyis bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga'
134b6(rgyud 'bum): zhig dag gi tshe/ / sangs rgyas ro myang byed pas bdud rtsi'i dbang las dkyil 'khor 'ga' zhig tu ni mchog gi bu la'o// rang byin brlab pas dman pa rnam mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa
134b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams la dngos grub yod pa min/ / phebs par btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying kha spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgrin pa dang // gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje
135a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis bsrung bar bya/ / lus la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'drir ni gzhug par bya// kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rab mchog
135a2(rgyud 'bum): bgrod pa dag la bgrod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin par bya/ / 'tshe dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spang bya gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid// 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa dag ste rang gi dge
135a3(rgyud 'bum): ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po de dag go/ / gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab sbyin bya// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa
135a4(rgyud 'bum): ngag ste khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar bya/ / tshe lo kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos// ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lA mi'i bla ma gsod
135a5(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga ni mi bya'o/ / grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang // dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar srid pa'i bdag po dag gi brtul
135a6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nyi shu lnga/ / dpal ldan sdug kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar bar me tog gcig ni rab sbyin bya// dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar ba dag las dkyil
135a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du ni me tog dor/ / gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi rigs su nges// phyi nas dbang ni bdun po dag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin bla med yang
135b1(rgyud 'bum): ngag rab sbyin bya/ / klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis lha mo rnams kyi khrus
135b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sprin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyi dar dpyangs nyid// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla las te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis
135b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / khro bo rnams kyis byams sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcas rab tu sbyin// rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i
135b4(rgyud 'bum): chos ni bstan par bya/ / nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni srog gcod bya ste ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig/ rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya mchog gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid la yang
135b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi bud med dbrog/ chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni bsten par bya// gdol pa mo sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni
135b6(rgyud 'bum): gri gug la yang mkha' yi pad+mar smad mi bya/ / sems can don gyi slad du nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya// rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur
135b7(rgyud 'bum): ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs/ / chu ni sgron ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs nus ma rnams// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag
136a1(rgyud 'bum): dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul te ming ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o/ / rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig
136a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sbyin bya// dbang bdun dag gis mngon par dbang bskur dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun gyi ni
136a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ / bum pa gsang bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs su nges par rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ye shes dag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid
136a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur/ / gal te g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngal lo// rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dag
136a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te yon tan ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o/ / bum pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la ni dag pa med// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba gang
136a6(rgyud 'bum): zhig dag pa'i slad du slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya ste/ / rjes su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan bla ma'i
136a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur/ / de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o//
136b1(rgyud 'bum): byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mda' ru 'gyur// drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa'o ri bo dag kyang ma smin mi la gsang ba byin
136b2(rgyud 'bum): las so/ / phung po nyon mongs pa las klu mur gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dang gang // sgra yi byams pa dang ni ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o// dag pa
136b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma'i dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan/ / bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rnams la'o// klu dang
136b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas/ / sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus byas te// klu dag gis
136b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dpal ldan cod pan bcings te nor 'dab pad+mar bzhi yis ngar dpyangs bcing bar bya/ / phyag rgya la ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni pad+ma dang bral re khA lnga po spangs// dang por chu dag la ni
136b6(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen nyid du 'gyur te bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur/ / gsang ba'i dbang la dge slong dang ni gong me'i byed pa la yang gnas brtan zhes par 'gyur ba ste// phyag rgya dar dpyangs cod par
136b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang rdo rje mchod phyir thogs ni bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya/ / de dag slob dpor slad du rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par dag pa nyid// steng du bla re bkod cing sa yi
137a1(rgyud 'bum): mthil gyi gnas dag tu yang ri mo gsum ni kun nas so/ / de rnams zur du nor bu gser gyi bum par chur bcas skud pa dang ldan pad+ma'i kha rnams so// dung sogs gse
137a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi snod dang yang na dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri yi chu ni bsgrub par bya/ / snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkod de de la khrus ni brtsam par bya// me tog sogs dang dri
137a3(rgyud 'bum): yi til mar nyi ma me yis smin pa dag gis lha la byug par bya/ / phye ma rnams kyis dril phyis byas nas sbrang rtsi mar dang nod 'o ma chu yis bkru bar bya// don grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rnam mang
137a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu mchog gis 'di la nges par bya bas nas ni/ / de yi gnas nas bskyod par bya ste sku yang dmar po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag g.yogs pa'o// dpal ldan dkyil 'khor mtha' ni
137a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i sa yi gnas la rgyal ba'i cha yis re khA lnga byas te/ / dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa'o// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya ba
137a6(rgyud 'bum): nal gyi pad+ma rab tu phyogs pa'i lha dang lha mo 'am/ / mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gamathang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs sngags pa'o// rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung
137a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin dag tu byas nas ni/ / phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi rdo rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rig pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas A li
137b1(rgyud 'bum): kA li'i rigs skyes rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams/ / snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba mgo dang gtsug tor 'khor lo dag la rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya// de ltar nges pa nyid du
137b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya ste sngar yang mtha' dag lha rnams ngag gi lus la yang / / khro bo'i rgyal po dag gis srid med srid mnyam ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste gzhug pa dag dang ni// bcing dang
137b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag kyang lha rnams kyi ni rang gi lus la bya/ / de nas slob dpon nyid kyis zhal ni rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i lha la phyag dag 'tshal bar bya// a sogs
137b4(rgyud 'bum): ka sogs dag las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs yor dar la gnas sa bon gang / / rang gi sa bon de ni snying gi dbus su bla nyi kha sbyor la gnas sku gsung thugs ldan par// mtha'
137b5(rgyud 'bum): ngag lus la gnas pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi yan lag dpe byad mkha' dang brgyad kyis te/ / yi ge rnams kyis phye ba de nyid rab gsal 'dab ma 'dab mar glegs bam rnams la
137b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / mchod rten snying por dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu pad+ma dag dang byang du ral gri nyid// bgrang 'phreng la ni hUM gi yi ge ror bu yongs su bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan dang dpa
137b7(rgyud 'bum): byad rnams/ / dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ri gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu rnams ngag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la// de dag kho na mchod phyir thogs la bcu yis bsgyur ba nor
138a1(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad rnams ni stod g.yogs la/ / ka sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa mkha' ro yon tan rnams ni pus 'khyud dag la bsgom par bya// haM haHdpal ldan rna cha la ste
138a2(rgyud 'bum): aHzhes pa zung ni mgul rgyan ska rags dag la'o/ / de bzhin du yang a yig zung ni gdu bu dag la 'gyur te rkang gdub dag la ha hA yang // mtha' dag lus la gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po
138a3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni thal ba dag la bsgom par bya/ / rang lus ye shes rnam par dag las rdo rje gsum dang bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun// lha rnams kyi ni rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rang rang sa bon
138a4(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis rim pas dgod par bya/ / sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs sogs la'o// nye bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis
138a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus la sa bon gzhug par bya/ / 'di dang po ru yang ri mor bris pa'i thang sku rnams kyi me long la ni khrus su 'gyur// phyi nas dri dang spos dang shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams
138a6(rgyud 'bum): dang glu dang rol mo dag dang ni/ / gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga ya ba dang ni gdugs rnams dag gis lha la mchod par bya// de ltar rab gnas byas nas rnam mang mchog gi re
138a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod ston rab tu sbyin/ / khron pa rdzing dang mtshe'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po nor rnams dgod par bya// chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon
138b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya/ / sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na zhags pa bsgom par bya// skyed mos tshal du shing gcig dpag
138b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam ljon pa mtha' dag shing la gnas par dbang ni bskur nas so/ / cod pan dar dbyangs dag dang ngo shal gdu bu dang ni de bzhin rna cha skar go sa la sogs pa// slob dpon la ni rab tu
138b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin byar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus pas so/ / sbyin bdag gos ni bsod nams slad du mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don ngon du gnyer bya ste// bsod nan
138b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog/ ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang na rig par bya//
138b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya// lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha// dbang gi
138b6(rgyud 'bum): don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ / dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang por reg pa gang yin bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do// gsang ba dag las ri
138b7(rgyud 'bum): bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur/ / shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyis spang ba byas nas ni// rgyal ba dag
139a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'dir ni bla mas dbang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ / rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon
139a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i bu mo ni/ / khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid dag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas// sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang ba
139a3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o// skrag dang rnam par 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g.yo sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nang dang ldan dang
139a4(rgyud 'bum): bu skyes ma/ / khro khengs nor la sred dang mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gau yan lag dman dang rnam dag min// shes rab 'di dag dbang la shim tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o ma
139a5(rgyud 'bum): yi dbang / / sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya// 'dod pa skyod par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid
139a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nas thig le bzang po 'dzag/ o T+Tas bkug pa mchog gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni
139a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi mthar/ / blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag gis so// 'dod pa dga' bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis
139b1(rgyud 'bum): blta ba dag la 'a/ / phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la ste slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do rang lus la// 'bar ba thig le 'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rje pad+ma la/
139b2(rgyud 'bum): on+d+ra thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed// 'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba de gcig ste// gang
139b3(rgyud 'bum): bapa dang ni nus dang skye ba dag dang mchog gi dga' ba nyid ni gnyis par nges par 'gyur/ / 'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal pa dag dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa'o// o T+Ta dang ni nA
139b4(rgyud 'bum): de dag dang gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur/ / sems kyi bsam pa yis ni ma ru 'gyur te reg pa dang ni blta ba dag gis sring mo'o// rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor byed pa
139b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas shin tu dga' bas tsha mo dag ni de bzhin nyid/ / thig le lhung na chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni 'dod chags nyams las so// 'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya
139b6(rgyud 'bum): drug ste sa chu sreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams so/ / chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le me rlung gsum pa'o// 'di dag rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu
139b7(rgyud 'bum): gsal zhing nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ / chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya rnams
140a1(rgyud 'bum): las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o/ / shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum bskyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni
140a2(rgyud 'bum): sring mo'o/ / rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams te phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsartsi kA sogs yang tsha mo// 'khor lo la gnas dus kun tu ni rang rigs sA la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis
140a3(rgyud 'bum): bsten par bya/ / zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams
140a4(rgyud 'bum): cad ming po'o/ / sman la sogs pa mang po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang yang tsha rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so// 'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma
140a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag gis bstan par bya/ / zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal mig can mchog gi dri yas rjes su
140a6(rgyud 'bum): byugs pa gang su dag/ bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'bul byed na// sa gzhi sprin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod
140a7(rgyud 'bum): nams gang / / bsod nams de dag thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su'o// sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal
140b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs ma/ / sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsum mA ma kI ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba 'khar ba mkhan mo nges par ro ya rdo rje chang 'tshong gzugs kyi
140b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ma/ / yang dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni// 'phreng ba mkhan du rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thags mkhan
140b3(rgyud 'bum): mardo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags/ / tsA mur+N+Na ni sha 'tshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza
140b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhan ma/ / phag mo 'khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad 'tshong ma ste dbang mo tshem bu ma// tshangs ma nye ba mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur//
140b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad pa chos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skyes gnas so// rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin bal mkhan mo'o//
140b6(rgyud 'bum): khengs ma zhes bya tIl mar 'tshir ma rab phye shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o// 'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid//
140b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan tsun+da 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi sring pa la gnas lcags sgrog ma ni smig ma mkhan// drag spyan ma ni khron pa byed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o// khro bo'i cha
141a1(rgyud 'bum): shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu po rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ / dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo//
141a2(rgyud 'bum): ce spyang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yi gnas la stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma// bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thabs ma ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma// mkha' lding gdong
141a3(rgyud 'bum): ma dpal ldan b+hil+lIr 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma/ / sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams ngag gi rigs rnams te// zhing
141a4(rgyud 'bum): dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni/ / rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag la dngos grub
141a5(rgyud 'bum): ster/ / bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig pu gcig ni rim pas so// bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye
141a6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams/ / khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dbyes stengs gnas su yi dwags dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad// lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal
141a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ / gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed do// sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad de mi yi 'jig rten
141b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas/ / yi dgas zhes bya yi dgas 'jig rten tu ste lha mchogs gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug/ tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal ldan bzhi ste rab
141b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma/ / rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid// bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams
141b3(rgyud 'bum): dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo/ / rje'u mo dmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam mig dang lag pa dang bral rna ba mchu sna chad ma rnams// mtha' dag byang chub rgyu
141b4(rgyud 'bum): ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod par bya ste rgyal po slob dpon snying rje dang / / bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su zhon pas so// dang por bud
141b5(rgyud 'bum): med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dpal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya/ / rtsed mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam dag gis chos phyag rgya//
141b6(rgyud 'bum): pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang pad+ma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste// rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni pad+ma gcin dang sha dang rul ba'i dri rnams so// dpal ldan bzang
141b7(rgyud 'bum): mo pad+ma can du nges 'gyur chu la rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma/ / dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis mA ma kI dang spyan ma yang // rnal 'byor pa ni seng ge'i
142a1(rgyud 'bum): ri dgas rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las/ / mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na pad+ma 'khor lo can// yan lag phra ldan swa
142a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam pa mnyes gshin dpal ni shin tu bzang mo'o/ / cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la sgra ni 'khyog pa pad+ma can// ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la
142a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma/ / rang zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra na ring ba sna tshogs ma// sbom zhing thung la yan lag brtan ldan
142a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sra ba'i yul dang sgra ni sbom pa glang chen ma/ / pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun tu ni 'dris pa'i rigs// sang ge dag kyang 'brog na gnas
142a5(rgyud 'bum): shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ / ri dgas mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o// rta ni nges
142a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gnyer ba'o/ / khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur// glang chen
142a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul ba'i dri dang shin tu rmongs pa'o/ / sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi stang gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin no// mchod pa'i don du 'ded
142b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ / shin tu dga' ba byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis mtshim dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur//
142b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur// mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma// sha za mo ni dri yidza
142b3(rgyud 'bum): rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje mi yi dbang / / gdug pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje glu mo reg bya rdo rje ma// mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma btul zhugs nges pa la
142b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang tshul can/ / lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo// mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la
142b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma ste/ / klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon
142b6(rgyud 'bum): tan dbang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ / sa yi stang gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba'o// chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas
142b7(rgyud 'bum): bu ram las skyes 'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te/ / phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig
143a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par bya/ / phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya// rgyal po ra bong
143a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshar ma gcig pu thams cad dus su bsnyen pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na/ / shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos//
143a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa// nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag/
143a4(rgyud 'bum): khyi rta ba lang glang mo lug dang ra dang ri dwags bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs// kuM b+hI ra dang 'gron bu ku lI ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang sbal pa rus sbal dung // ba sa ru stag dang dem dang ne'u le
143a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas 'bri dang ce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang / / 'brog dgon khyi dang seng ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo skyes// go d+ha byi ba shA li dzA daspre'u dang ni ri bong gzugs
143a6(rgyud 'bum): mo i shu rtsangs pa brgyad/ / khengs ldan 'dab chags dang na ne tso khu byug dag dang ri skegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi gter// lA ba phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes bya tsa Ta ka dang ngur pa dang ni ngang pa dang // dpal
143a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig dang ra dza ka dang b+ha ga ba ti ti ti ri dang bzhad/ / chu la 'jug pa dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa yis ni rig par bya// bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dgas
143b1(rgyud 'bum): dgra dang gtsug phud can dang bya gag b+he dra g+hA ra dang / / hor pa ljon shing dgra ni gzhan he bcu po khro bo las skyes khro bo ya na rags su 'gyur// ma ga sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang a ni la dang gu da mu
143b2(rgyud 'bum): kha bug gi rkang steng nyal/ / b+hai ruN+DA dang i ba ri kra brgyad pa mchog gi 'dab chags su 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye// sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha'
143b3(rgyud 'bum): la spyod rnams kyis/ / rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya// rmongs pas gti mug ngag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po
143b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ / so dang skra dang pags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang bcas rus pa snying dang pad+ma dang // shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glob rgyun
143b5(rgyud 'bum): chu so dang / / bad kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rdul dang tshal bu dang // mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bsha
143b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi tshes
143b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / / sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma phyag rgya dang // sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir ni
144a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ / chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang // lha bshos dag dang 'dir mi ma bzar 'gyur te bcu rtsa
144a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang / / khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshang ba dag dang sha dang mchin pa dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni// rgyu ma pags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te
144a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang / / rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste// rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po me tog 'phreng ba dag pa
144a4(rgyud 'bum): gos/ / drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o// de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos mi ser po dang // khya
144a5(rgyud 'bum): bam yang na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum skye/ / dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad brdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o// thugs byed la sogs rnams kyi
144a6(rgyud 'bum): dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang / / chu gri dang ni mthil lham dag dang s+phu grI zhes bya de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni// tog tse dang na 'od ma'i dbyug pa khro skyes rnam
