144a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur/ / ba lang ra dang kham por rgyud ldan 'bang dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste// rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mnga' dang gtsug bud can
144b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur/ / sum cu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// slar yang dmangs rigs la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te/
144b2(rgyud 'bum): yon tan dbang gis ut+pa la 'am mthong gshol lo// rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po sbu gu rin chen 'phreng ba ni// rje'u rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu
144b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i/ / yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi sde Da ma ru dang rnga chen cod pan nyid dang bgrang 'phreng ngo // bshang ba gci ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams
144b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi por 'gyur pa ste/ / rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang ni b+ha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rnag dang bad+ma kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba spu skra dang brgyad po yang // rgyu
144b5(rgyud 'bum): ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang / / rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang // rna ba dang ni snga dang mig dang
144b6(rgyud 'bum): kha dang bshang lam dbus dang b+ha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs/ / lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur// sen mo dang bcas so dang yan lag
144b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur/ / bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi// rna ba sA dang mig dang lce dang
145a1(rgyud 'bum): bshang lam dag dang b+ha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug/ rnag la sogs pa smra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshan do ha yi dbye ba brgyad// rgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs
145a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams/ / rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams// dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par
145a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi/ / sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhang gi dbye ba la yang drug/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes me skyes rlung las skyes
145a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dag/ brgyad ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang // reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams// sa dang chu dang me
145a5(rgyud 'bum): dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyab tu ste/ / kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams// gnas ri sgrol ma la sogs
145a6(rgyud 'bum): khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod/ / tshan do ha ni tsartsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs// dur khrod khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog
145a7(rgyud 'bum): gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni/ / yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma// gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad+mar rab 'gyur
145b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas/ / zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go// gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin
145b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas/ / de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur
145b3(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ / shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug/ chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul
145b4(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur/ / khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do// yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las
145b5(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur/ / sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te// de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor
145b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis rig par bya/ / de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba 'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas
145b7(rgyud 'bum): bram ze 'am/ / thod pa can dang skra 'bab dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang // smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni gra pa nyid 'gyur
146a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter te de nyid thob pa'o mi yi dbang // mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ri gung mo dang ri ming mer dang
146a2(rgyud 'bum): de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor pa yas rig par bya/ / phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so// bcing
146a3(rgyud 'bum): ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no/ / khu tshur brla yi stang du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// skyil krung la ni lag pa g.yon
146a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la sor gyur pa/ / sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya'o slar yang lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyi// g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan
146a5(rgyud 'bum): kyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dag gir 'gyur/ / g.yon pa skyil krung steng du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jig pa med pa phyag na rAl gri yi// g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas mi ra la ste nges par slar
146a6(rgyud 'bum): yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la/ / gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur pa
146a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni gung mo la sogs brkyang ba'o/ / lag pa g.yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri meng ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste/ nyi ba zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtse mo lnga par/
146b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg byacon par dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha' nyid du'o// 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldar mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o//
146b2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang // bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg
146b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya// sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsdur par bya//
146b4(rgyud 'bum): lag pa dag gis rdo rjes bcings po yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam
146b5(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba yi/ / mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can
146b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur/ / mthe bong dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'o ga tu bskum pa rang
146b7(rgyud 'bum): gi lag mthil son gyur pa/ / phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o// rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du mthe bong la sogs
147a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag rnams/ / lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bur bcas// khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mnga' dang mtshungs pa dag
147a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur/ / mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yi ni rtse gsum la// dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe'u chung zla ba phyed
147a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur/ / rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o// khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog por 'gyur ro mi bdag
147a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o/ / rtsa bar mdzub mo ming med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdung la ste// thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la 'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe
147a5(rgyud 'bum): bong brkyang bdagra sta la/ / steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen lpags pa dag la'o// mche ba la ni lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba
147a6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o/ / khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur// kha T+wAM ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba'o// sor
147a7(rgyud 'bum): mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la/ / gzhul lag pa gan kyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o// gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog
147b1(rgyud 'bum): po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la/ / rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dag rnam par phye ba pad+ma la// chu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og
147b2(rgyud 'bum): tu khu tshur ro/ / me long la na shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur// mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lcags
147b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrog la'o/ / mgo bo la ni mthe bong la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o// cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbar ba nyid du 'gyur/
147b4(rgyud 'bum): lag mthil ngag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la// lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul pa'i rgyan la ste// lag pa gnyis
147b5(rgyud 'bum): ka'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha' bskum pa dag ni ska rags la'o/ / khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdub la// de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan
147b6(rgyud 'bum): zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur/ / mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gi mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyi// dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams
147b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi gung mo ming meng dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o/ / 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcings
148a1(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog gi rigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi'o/ / lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi// khu tshur bcings las
148a2(rgyud 'bum): badz+rab mo gnyis po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa rwa can rnams kyi'o/ / mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe'u chung phran tshun bcings shing gsheg pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste// sor mo lnga po
148a3(rgyud 'bum): mo 'khyog pa gdengs can rnam kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ / nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa 'og tu sbyar byas pa// 'bar ba dag la
148a4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o/ / mdzub mo bstan na legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang // gnyis kyis
148a5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur/ / sor mo'i se gol rdeb pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces nges par brjod par 'gyur ba ste/
148a6(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim par byed pa'o// ser mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang bas skul bzang legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la
148a7(rgyud 'bum): yang / / g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed// skyes gnas dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sen mo 'debs
148b1(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang / / sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo drang ni mthe bong brkyang bsA dam tshig rjod par byed pa yin// mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin tu rmongs pa
148b2(rgyud 'bum): rjo par byed/ / mche ba'i dbus su mthe'u chung dang ni snying kha kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang pa sa la rdib na nga yis bza' bar
148b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / ldeg la reg na zos pa dang ni lho dang so la bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do// lag pa'i rgyab kyis song zhig nges par rab tu rjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug cig go// byin pa
148b4(rgyud 'bum): brla la nyid na skal bzang khyod ni de ring kho na ngal songes par rjod par byed/ / rkang pa rab tu rkyong bas gnyid dang pus mo zung dag rkyong bas bdag la shin tu dga' ba gyis// yan lag kun la reg
148b5(rgyud 'bum): pabar byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o/ / phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed// mthe bong ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam
148b6(rgyud 'bum): mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya/ / rkang pa la ni 'phrug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang // mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni
148b7(rgyud 'bum): de ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o/ / skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs khyod 'dir ni lhung bar bya ba rjod par byed// so ni phan tshun 'dar bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis de ring bza' bar bya//
149a1(rgyud 'bum): lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o nges par rjod par byed// mchul so mi ridebs par byed na khyod kyi rgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gi bza' bar hA/
149a2(rgyud 'bum): sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i sbyor bas pa nad pa'o// gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o// glu yi sbyor ba yis ri klu ste mchog
149a3(rgyud 'bum): gi yon tan rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri/ / 'phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ri 'phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos// mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa
149a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur/ / zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste// gzhar pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa
149a5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ / gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams// pho nya mo ni 'phreng la blta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skul
149a6(rgyud 'bum): ba bzang la rjod par byed/ / mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur// steng du blta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi stang du gnas pas khyod ni
149a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dug la ngal so zhig/ yon por lta bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' ba rjod par byed// zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grogs po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu
149b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar byed/ / skra la lta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so// mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas yon tan rab tu
149b2(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar byed/ / mchu la lta bas skal ba bzang ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod// snying khar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag pa zung la lta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor
149b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / phrag par lta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la lta na srin mo'o// rgyab tu lta na lag 'gro ma ste lte bar lta bas me yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can// gsang bar lta bas
149b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni dag pa brla la lta bas bdag ni shir tu dga' la gdul bar dka'/ / pus mor lta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo// rkang pa'i mthe bong nges par lta
149b5(rgyud 'bum): na bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpal mo gcig pu dang / / sor mo kun gyi rtse mor lta bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum// pho nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gan
149b6(rgyud 'bum): su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ / drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang sbyin pa ste// las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang
149b7(rgyud 'bum): bcas yid dag kyang / / khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi rdo rje tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan// mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i
150a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas su 'gro/ / sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis// bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying
150a2(rgyud 'bum): / rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi// bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa// dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su
150a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya/ / rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya// de bzhin du ba la sogs lam dang mtha'
150a4(rgyud 'bum): dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste/ / bstan pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol// gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po
150a5(rgyud 'bum): yum gyi mchod pa rnams dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya/ / dbang ga mithar ni dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde ster stod kor gos zung dag/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sprin
150a6(rgyud 'bum): bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag/ sgon gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan// mthar na sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying
150a7(rgyud 'bum): kha'i pad+mar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste/ / 'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya// traM bu la dang dri spos me tog 'bras bur bcas
150b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la/ / byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchod byas te// slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog chon
150b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ / dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang // chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i
150b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang / / dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje lhung dang don nyams pa// gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin
150b4(rgyud 'bum): zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba'i dpal chen po dus kyi 'khor lo las// mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
150b5(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal ba skyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang // shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms
150b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa thob/ / slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o// zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i
150b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs/ / zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog/ phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung pa rgyal ba'i phyag
151a1(rgyud 'bum): gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang ma yi tshigs/ / zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma sreg za'i dkyil 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa// rol pas mnan pa'i srid med sring pa/
151a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu da ni bsgrub par bya// skyed mos tshal lam ri bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang // grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i
151a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa/ / gang du sems na rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya'o mi yi bdag po kye// nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas
151a4(rgyud 'bum): sngar brjod bsrung ba byas nas ni/ / dang por snying khar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya// kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha'
151a5(rgyud 'bum): dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni/ / mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te// sgrub pa po yi lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum
151a6(rgyud 'bum): la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa// de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam bral byang chub
151a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod la rjes su gnas pas rjes yi rang / / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces/
151b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do// stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman// de las sangs rgyas byang chub med cing
151b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste/ / mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor la ni byang
151b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ / chu yis me ni rnam par nyam pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya// phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi
151b4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rab tu zhugs/ / rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' la na snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis
151b5(rgyud 'bum): la gzhag par bya/ / stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go// de yi dbus
151b6(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste/ / oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan// phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyi
151b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor nor gyi pad+ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman/ / phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i pad+ma sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams// nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang
152a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang / / snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi// zla ba nyi ma la yang a sos
152a2(rgyud 'bum): ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis/ / 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i zer 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus
152a3(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi zhal/ / mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsags pa'o// dpal ldan oM yi gri las skyes rgyal
152a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni/ / drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang sta ba sa// g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs
152a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'og tu bdud sde dkar po g.yon par yang ni drag po'o/ / dbus dang g.yas dang g.yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog/ phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong
152a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa ltar dkar g.yas pa dang de g.yon du yang / / g.yas dang g.yas min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te// de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dang ni
152a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim pas so/ / phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i
152b1(rgyud 'bum): rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa yang / / rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mda'// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges par
152b2(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid/ / mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje car gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+ma g.yas la'o// dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis
152b3(rgyud 'bum): gang ba'i thod pa dang / / gnu dang zhags pa rin chen pad+ma chun rgyu ba dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang // tshangs pa'i mgo bo pad+mas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag
152b4(rgyud 'bum): na'o/ / bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed// gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gi pad+mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te/
152b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang bgrang 'phreng rim pas so// g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma'i mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid// g.yon//
152b6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o// 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan// de dag rnams
152b7(rgyud 'bum): las bzhi ni sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so/ / dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dang gaN+DI dang // de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur
153a1(rgyud 'bum): te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur/ / nag mo yi ni bo'i phrag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na bsil ba'i sdod// dmar po sbyar
153a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhin/ / g.yon na dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog 'phreng ba rim pas so// dmar mo'i g.yas na mar me do shal dag
153a3(rgyud 'bum): dang cod pan dang bcas gdu bu rnams te phyag g.yon na/ / gos dang ska rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub bo// sor mo'i g.yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang
153a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas Da ma ru ni rim pas te/ / g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrogs pa'i 'khar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo // 'o ma chu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar
153a5(rgyud 'bum): mo yi/ / phyogs kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu me yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag/ zur du sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa
153a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad/ / lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang ser pa dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste// nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nya ma'i snying // mkha'
153a7(rgyud 'bum): snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs/ / shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi na g.yas dang g.yas min pad+ma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid//
153b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje nges par sgra yi rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so// rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni shar du'o// shes rab phang bar
153b2(rgyud 'bum): thabs ni rI bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma le ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o/ / gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phan tshun 'khyud// mtshan ma gang zhig gang gis g.yas
153b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman/ / shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs// nan po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na ral gr-i gri
153b4(rgyud 'bum): gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste/ / g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha T+wAM ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur// mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru ni g.yas
153b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag na rim pa yis gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yon na de bzhin nyid/ / ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje
153b6(rgyud 'bum): rim pas te/ / g.yon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g.yas na dpal ldan tho ba mdung dang rtse
153b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum ste/ / g.yon na pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me long dang ni bgrang 'phreng ngo // ljang khu rnams kyi g.yas su rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste/
154a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do// lha mo sngon mo rnams ngag gi ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig
154a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gnag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma dag la
154a3(rgyud 'bum): res 'ga' ni/ / dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur// rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal 'byor pa rnams
154a4(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis bsgom par bya/ / dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur// phyi rol du ni brgyad pa brgyad kyis par 'dab brgyad po rnams
154a5(rgyud 'bum): la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni/ / tsartsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma// shar gyi pad+mar tsartsi ka ste mar ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos
154a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma/ / gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o// drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi
154a7(rgyud 'bum): sku la 'khyud pa'o/ / brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so// shar la sogs par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo pa
154b1(rgyud 'bum): con dang / / dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi pad+ma zung la'o// rdo rje mnga' dang pad+ma dang ni dri med grog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang // sA
154b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgrang 'phreng ste/ / g.yon na thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang pad+ma mdung dang lcags sgrog dag dang phu ba dang ni// nges par rin po che dang
154b3(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrog pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang / / spyi blugs snod dang kha T+wAM ga dang sbrul dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de// pad+ma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma
154b4(rgyud 'bum): yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no/ / 'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mche ba me'i bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum ma// drag spun ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsartsi ka yi pad+ma nor 'dab la ni
154b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams su/ / g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma// brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab pad+ma la ni khyab 'jug ma yi phyogs kyi
154b6(rgyud 'bum): char/ / keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gtsags ma dang // nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor 'dab pad+ma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o//
154b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri dgas bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen 'brang ba mig bzang ma// rul ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab la rgyal po kye// rdo rje 'od dang
155a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan ur bsti dang bkra ba'i ri mo dang / / raM b+ha zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+ma nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o// sA bi tri dang
155a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma/ / gA ya tI dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang pad+ma rig byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la// gau rA ging+gA dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu myur
155a3(rgyud 'bum): ma to ta la dang mtshon byed ma/ / dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma ngang pa'i
155a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog dang 'dzin ma dang / / pad+ma'i dbang po skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas// de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la ni lha min g.yo dang gshin rje ma dang gdong drug dang //
155a5(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go// ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri shag ti dang /
155a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyug pa shag ti dag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni be con rdo rje nyid dang ma yi mnga'// khab dang bgrang 'phreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags pa dang // rin chen
155a7(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g.yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur/ / g.yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni ut+pal dang lcags sgrog dang // zhags pa chu
155b1(rgyud 'bum): skyes spyi thugs dag ni nges par g.yon gyi phyag tu rim pas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/ rin chen me long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcus chu skyes rdo rje dril bu ga nu dang ni// pad+ma dang ni spyi blugs
155b2(rgyud 'bum): sprul dang gzhu dang de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang / / zhags pa rin po che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gir 'gyur// pad+ma'i 'dab mA dag la nag po sogs kyi nor lag
155b3(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis/ / mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya// sgor na lha mo shang rta la gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang
155b4(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu dang bcas mnga' yi phyag/ dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phyag/ dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra
155b5(rgyud 'bum): stesta phyag na rtse gsum g.yas na ste/ / g.yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gzhu yi phyag/ dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma rA bong 'dzin pa me long phyag
155b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin no/ / dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha T+wAM ga yi phyag/ 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya/
155b7(rgyud 'bum): ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang pad+ma nor bu dag gi phyag/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma karko Ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams// khyi gdong phag gdong ma pa ce spyang gdong ma
156a1(rgyud 'bum): nges par g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams su/ / stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrodang sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag/ bya rog gdong dang bya chod
156a2(rgyud 'bum): gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdong dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o/ / rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngor mo sa 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas g.yo ba'i mtha'// yi dgas dmar dang
156a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro'i dbang po ma he rma bya glang po ngang pa glang dang gdong lnga pa/ / rim pas tsA mur+N+Na la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su'o// lha min lha sogs rnams
156a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi de bzhin nor bdag rtse mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni/ / glang po'i dbang po dang ni lug dang chu srin zhes dang ri dgas dang ni byi ba rim pas so// b+he ruN+Da dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdongan
156a5(rgyud 'bum): rog gdong la sogs pa'i zur du ste/ / bse dang dom dang seng ge g.yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje mig gi rkang pa brgyad pas 'og shing rda la gnas mkha'
156a6(rgyud 'bum): la sngon mo'i shing rta yi/ / mkha' bgrod khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa a ni laM zhes pa// 'od zer can dang tsun+d+ra lugs sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la
156a7(rgyud 'bum): phag dang ni/ / rta dang glang po seng ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o// shar du dri dang 'phreng ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang // band pa 'o gar ma rol mo
156b1(rgyud 'bum): ma ni nor sbyin sa gzhi la ste mkha' la glu ma 'dod ma'o/ / snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar// gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs
156b2(rgyud 'bum): can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams kha khyer la/ / dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas dang rangs 'dod ma// lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag pa yis te srid
156b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dod ma/ / rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod mar 'gyur ma yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid// dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig
156b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dod ma dag ni drug pa'o/ / lus la 'khrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang // gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rgyal dang bsnyes
156b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod ma dang / / tsA mur+N+Na sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod pa yang // kun tu gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod
156b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod ma/ / reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'dabs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag
156b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod ma dang / / sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang // g.yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min/
157a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs la 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de ni phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems
157a2(rgyud 'bum): can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir/ / zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs// phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang
157a3(rgyud 'bum): sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas/ / de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin// 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi
157a4(rgyud 'bum): yi bdag po mig 'phrul ji bzhin nyid du'o/ / rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i don slad du// sgrub thabs dgra ni brjod par bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga'
157a5(rgyud 'bum): yang 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med/ / gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang // de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil
157a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbang po rab tu bya/ / dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor gru yi rdo rje'o// lha rnams 'khor lo A li kA li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng
157a7(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni a yig 'dab ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yig go/ dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go// ho yis/
157b1(rgyud 'bum): thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas na// lha mo rnams kyi
157b2(rgyud 'bum): glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po/ / bdag cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod// rdo rje can des glu dag gsan
157b3(rgyud 'bum): nas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni/ / gzigs nas bskyed pa mdzad nga dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas// rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing
157b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pa na shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang / / shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo // 'od zar sngon po 'jig
157b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ska sta rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed na gtsags pa dang / / sgra drag sgrog byed nyi ma' sman dang gnyis lcug rgyal ba'i phrag sA re ga byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa// bshas rab wAms
157b6(rgyud 'bum): las rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas/ / rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya// dri mar 'ong
157b7(rgyud 'bum): zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing / / phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gis de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te/
158a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'dir ni slar yang 'gro ba ste// gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag
158a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed/ / rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i pad+mar me yi steng du 'gyur// shar du dpal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog
158a3(rgyud 'bum): gi pad 'dab la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar me ste/ / byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mur 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o// mAr ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig rgyu mang
158a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan phyogs su mkha' snang ma/ / rlung du dpal ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang mi shing dang chos kyi gaN+DI dgra dang dung // me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin par gyi zung
158a5(rgyud 'bum): tshalalo/ / shar du 'du byed dang ni sa 'drag nges par pad+ma la gnas lho ru tshor ba chu dag go// byang du 'du shes dang nai me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ri rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do// pa yi phyogs su
158a6(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis pa'o/ / dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor ba dag ste rlung ngu 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o// lha mo sangs rgyas par
158a7(rgyud 'bum): / rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams// slar yang 'phar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs ngag go// byang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de
158b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur/ / sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lho yi sgo yi g.yon du'o// nam mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te
158b2(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o/ / dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur// phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po
158b3(rgyud 'bum): rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la'o/ / shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shan tu stobs te dwe yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o// g.yas su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur ror sbyin du yang kheng
158b4(rgyud 'bum): byed dang ni rmugs byed ma/ / chu ru rengs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgo yi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can
158b5(rgyud 'bum): ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma/ / 'dod pa tsun+d+ra shing rta la gnas lha dang nor sbyin gzhan dang lho mi sgo yi dbus su ste// gnod mdzes drag spun ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la
158b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor dang ni shin tu sngon mo nyid/ / shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang // gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs
158b7(rgyud 'bum): su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur/ / shar du tsA mur+thA dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong // gshin rjer phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag
159a1(rgyud 'bum): por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po'o/ / nub tu dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdong ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid// gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin
159a2(rgyud 'bum): rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa/ / phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g.yas su lha min dag dang da yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur// mer ne rlung dang rab gtum ma sta ma dang
159a3(rgyud 'bum): chu lha mo yang lho ya sgo yi g.yas su'o/ / lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo// rlung ngu tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho
159a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni phag mo'o/ / dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma te nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g.yon gyi char// drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du'o//
159a5(rgyud 'bum): / de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags raM sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur// phyi rol du nA lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste/
159a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la garas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni// ma la gnas pa dag ste chu ya steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur/
159a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur// de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs
159b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / de rnams thabs ni pad+ma la sogs gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur// shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas//
159b2(rgyud 'bum): khyi gdong ma// gshin rje dag tu nges par ro na sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rus pa dang bcas par// stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du ce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur// me dang /
159b3(rgyud 'bum): lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni maM bzang g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas// rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi ba ra ri// 'khor lo la
159b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya/ / g.yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o// bcu dang nor gyi
159b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dag gi ni g.yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum po'o/ / g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste// sa ga la mi sa gnyid
159b6(rgyud 'bum): ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o/ / dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste// rang rigs phyogs gnas lA ma
159b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni rang rang pad+ma zla ba'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas/ / gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi bzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas// lha rnams 'dab ma ra lha
160a1(rgyud 'bum): mo rnams ri rol pa'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid/ / g.yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba dag/ phyed
160a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa sna mi yi bdag po nga ni g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur/ / g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs//
160a3(rgyud 'bum): yon tan dbang gis pus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang na zlum por 'gyur// cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol par 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid// slar yang
160a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yi sa b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o/ / cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rje yi ni rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams re 'ga' na// gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa stegasapa
160a5(rgyud 'bum): bar pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur/ / rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod panA la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag/ drug gi cod pan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur
160a6(rgyud 'bum): te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan/ / sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o// rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur
160a7(rgyud 'bum): te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go/ / gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas 'phreng ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang // drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung
160b1(rgyud 'bum): dang nam mkha' zhi ba dag las so/ / phu ba dang mdung dang mda' dang dag sta dang nai Da ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du// dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin tho ba dang ni
160b2(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur/ / gzhu dang ut+pa la dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu dang // de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa sA ga lpags dang ni glang po'i phag
160b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa// de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gang
160b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig li la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa/ / thung ngu ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim pas yongs bkod nges par pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang // nyi ma'i
160b5(rgyud 'bum): gdan la gnas pa de dag mtha' dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags/ / gang zhig kho nar mtshan mar drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du myed par 'gyur//
160b6(rgyud 'bum): na da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur te ma ya bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a ya ga go/ i ya ga thung ngu ral gra ldan par 'gyur te slar yang ra yag dag na phyeg na rin chen no// u yag thung ngu stsang
160b7(rgyud 'bum): ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni la yig rnam par snang mdzad do/ / bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so// dpal ldan yum ni
161a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin a yig las skyes nam mkha'i khams/ / rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni I ra A l-I thams cad rim pas gnas par
161a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste// mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi pad+ma ral gau dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa
161a3(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / rin chen dbang po mA ma kI dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste// de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs kyis so//
161a4(rgyud 'bum): aM yigra kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gi a yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o// e yig thung ngu nam mkha'i snying po ar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur// oM yig
161a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon po al yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o/ / A yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin AHyig las skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma// aM yig
161a6(rgyud 'bum): / reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro'i rdo rje ma// oM yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin al yig las skyes dri yI rdo rje ma// dpal ldan bzang po chos kyi dbying
161a7(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung / / nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag zung // sa yi snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag ni
161b1(rgyud 'bum): zung du 'gyur/ / de ltar rigs ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya// haM yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni haHyig
161b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sngon mo'o/ / ha yig thung ngu gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o// aM lAHrim pa sra rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis

161b5(rgyud 'bum): sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma/ / 'dod pa tsun+d+ra zung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o// a yig
161b6(rgyud 'bum): dag dang aM dang rnam par bcad pa haM dang haHdang ha hA las skyes nus ma brgyad/ / bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yige rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur// oM huM ho AHdung dang dri/
161b7(rgyud 'bum): med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi ga 'o// ha yig tsA mur+b+bA ste haM dang haHzhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o// hA dang k+Sha k+Sha k+ShaM k+ShaHdbang mo mkha' 'gro ba bdag pos 'gro
162a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshangs ma dpal mo gzhon num/ / hrI hU~M hUM hU~M rgyab tu pad+ma mchog gi 'dab ma lta ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o// b+h+r-i d+h+r-ik+Sh+ma b+h+rU~M de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal
162a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no/ / shwar dang g.yas dang g.yas min chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi pad+ma la// 'dab me drug la yi sogs dbyangs drug gis phye
162a3(rgyud 'bum): / thung ngu ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa// hi k+Shi la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la// rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsa
162a4(rgyud 'bum): mur+dz+dza la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so/ / taM naHbrgya byin chu gter gdong ste paM maHzhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang // TaM naHme dang gzhon nu dag ste tsA
162a5(rgyud 'bum): dang nyaHzhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung / / kaM daHkhyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang saM dang 'dir ni Sh+TaHnyi// rtsa sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha yi
162a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyis 'gyur/ / nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi chos rnams dus kyis nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs// de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams
162a7(rgyud 'bum): dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi/ / sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas k+Sha ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pas rigs kyi
162b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur/ / dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur// don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying
162b2(rgyud 'bum): / po dra med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag go/ phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon// dpal ldan yum dang tshes
162b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ / dpal ldan sgrol ma rag bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma// mA ma kI dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur
162b4(rgyud 'bum): te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma dri yi rdo rje ma/ / khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid do// gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu
162b5(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu grags/ / rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med// rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du
162b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so/ / mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o// rnam par sel dang shin tu brtso
162b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba/ / yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid// stong
163a1(rgyud 'bum): par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chung dngus la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang / / rmugs byed ma dang khengs mya rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab zhugs
163a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing nges par rab tu grags/ / drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje ma 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang
163a3(rgyud 'bum): tsun+dur rab grags pa/ / rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yi rdo rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya// 'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang
163a4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs dgrar rab tu glags/ / rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni pad+ma'i dgra// rlung ma chu sa tsA mr-ir+N+Na dang phag myo bang phyug ma dang de bzhin
163a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang mo bzhi pa ste/ / dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrogs byed lha min mer ni gnas pa yang // tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya
163a6(rgyud 'bum): mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med/ / me dang dpal ldar phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yod grub pa dag ni de bzhin nyid// mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni
163a7(rgyud 'bum): bde byed rab tu grags/ / rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid// sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying nga nu
163b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag por rab tu grags pa yin/ / dpal ldan phyagar rdo rje dus gsum 'gyur te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o// rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams
163b2(rgyud 'bum): rang rang phyag rgya ste/ / phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o// de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag tshes te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams
163b3(rgyud 'bum): / zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang // klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad+ma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal ldan du ba bya rog
163b4(rgyud 'bum): gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma/ / mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags// nag mo 'bar ma
163b5(rgyud 'bum): khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma/ / dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma ce spyang ma// de bzhin sgeg mo
163b6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs thams cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o/ / lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i// khro bo'i dbang po byang chub
163b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' nges par ro la rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rtal gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa// klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab
164a1(rgyud 'bum): gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku/ / de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur tu phyi rol dag dang nang na yang // mngal
164a2(rgyud 'bum): nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur/ / ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal po'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o// sangs rgyas la
164a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ / khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas// phyi rol du ni tsA muH
164a4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku/ / lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dgra gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// gtum mo rnams
164a5(rgyud 'bum): ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o/ / sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogasra pa'i slad du'o// gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi
164a6(rgyud 'bum): sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o/ / thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa po// ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag
164a7(rgyud 'bum): zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid/ / shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla a sogs ka sogs dang // rnam gsum srid pa la
164b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ / rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang ba spyi bor te// 'di dag gis ni byin brlabs
164b2(rgyud 'bum): yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya/ / stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa la// skyabs su 'gro ba gsum
164b3(rgyud 'bum): nas sgrub pa po yis ta swa b+ha ba at+ma kohaM brjod par bya/ / bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying khar chos kyi 'khor lo rwa rab tu 'gyur// rig ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid
164b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags/ / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur//
164b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyis lci bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// lag pa rkang pa'i tshogs la lha rnams kyi ni los kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis
164b6(rgyud 'bum): bsnun pa ste/ / klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur// dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs
164b7(rgyud 'bum): dbye bas so/ / thugs kyi rnam pa nyi sa pa yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag/ rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams/
165a1(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud// dung dang ga ma Ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la
165a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs kyis/ / bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis// 'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba
165a3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas te/ / gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o// lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sem
165a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyag rgyar bcas/ / khro bo lA ni stobs rnams kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis// tsA muN+Da sogs thun brgyad kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams
165a5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis/ / lha min la sogs nyi ma'i zla bas pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs kyis so// gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams
165a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag/ skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur
165a7(rgyud 'bum): khrong sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshigs/ / de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyis phyi yi phyag rgya'o// rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs
165b1(rgyud 'bum): kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o/ / dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshog sA yum ni rnams gsum srid gnas 'gyur medA ye shes dbye ba las// dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur/
165b2(rgyud 'bum): te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o// longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu
165b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste/ / de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yang ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas// sprul par yid ni longs
165b4(rgyud 'bum): spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so/ / longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo // dag pa la ni bde bar
165b5(rgyud 'bum): rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar/ / de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o// g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar
165b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa/ / de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las// sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang
165b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan/ / nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga// gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun
166a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lag 'gro tsartsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan/ / ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa// lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la
166a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams/ / thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can// shes rab chos 'byung
166a3(rgyud 'bum): ngadag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis/ / sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba// 'dod pa dang ni gzugs
166a4(rgyud 'bum): dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te/ / phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya// zla ba nyi ma a sogs
166a5(rgyud 'bum): ka sogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa/ / so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te// dga' ba la sogs
166a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum/ / shes rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhani skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs
166a7(rgyud 'bum): dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste/ / so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis
166b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa bsgom pa bsgrub par 'gyur/ / shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur// dang por stong nyid byang
166b2(rgyud 'bum): chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin/ / de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams ngag gis yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te// 'di ni spyi yi
166b3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang / / 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid// so sor sdud pa
166b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do/ / srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag na rin chen no// gdol pa mo la rjes
166b5(rgyud 'bum): su dran pa pad+ma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ / re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o// so sor sdud pa lus
166b6(rgyud 'bum): la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o/ / bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g.yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o// srog gi rtsol
166b7(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog mi zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur/ / thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i 'grod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o// gtu
167a1(rgyud 'bum): mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur/ / shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis
167a2(rgyud 'bum): shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin/ / 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam
167a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gi sa las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so/ / so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mngon par shes pa
167a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dgra pa'o/ / srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod// bdud dang nyon
167a5(rgyud 'bum): / mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so// rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ya shes gzugs las so//
167a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na//
167a7(rgyud 'bum): nA da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya// bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta bas so//
167b1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug/ shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la// bde
167b2(rgyud 'bum): ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'di ni sgrub pa chen po la/ / srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste// de las steng du 'dzed
167b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu/ / gtsug tor sgron phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya// phung po med kyang rnal 'byor
167b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min/ / dbus su sreg ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste// pad+mar zhugs pa'i
167b5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa'o/ / bde bas bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di// phyag rgya'i dngos
167b6(rgyud 'bum): grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o/ / gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo drug ni nyis 'gyur gyi// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lo
167b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dag ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan/ / de yi yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro// de yi snying
168a1(rgyud 'bum): por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i khongs su gnas pa'o/ / rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor sgrog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams pa
168a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ / sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis rku bar
168a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o// srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o//
168a4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bo'i tshogs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so// gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o//
168a5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa rnams spyad pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba'o// bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang
168a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dar dang smyo dang rab tu mongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag/ rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du// rab tu
168a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid srubs gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su/ / nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma kI ste chang ma yin// go gu la sogs
168b1(rgyud 'bum): mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min/ / rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste// stong par
168b2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin/ / nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te// bzod pa smra
168b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyis ka'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid/ / bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad// de
168b4(rgyud 'bum): las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so/ / gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa// bsgom
168b5(rgyud 'bum): na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur/ / rengs pa dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed// 'byung ba rnams kyi
168b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ / dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang // ser pos reng
168b7(rgyud 'bum): dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprini dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o/ / sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor
169a1(rgyud 'bum): la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag lus kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya/ / phyogs ni lhag pa las byung srung ba da ni gser dang mtshungs pa g.yas dang cig shos dag gis nI/
169a2(rgyud 'bum): phung po'i bdud la glang chen lpags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin// lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag
169a3(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bskyal ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyis don du bsgom par bya/ / de la yum ni zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi pad+ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste/
169a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so// de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid// shes
169a5(rgyud 'bum): rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so/ / gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar// shes
169a6(rgyud 'bum): rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtse ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las/ / sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu ste// thog
169a7(rgyud 'bum): ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ / khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang nabs gnyis
169b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin
169b2(rgyud 'bum): du mtshon cha'i phyag/ spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams drag gis 'phreng ba nges par bcings// dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil
169b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni/ / zhabs gnyis drag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas// 'byung po rnams dang lha man
169b4(rgyud 'bum): gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa/ / bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// klu rnams
169b5(rgyud 'bum): skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas/ / zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi// rtse
169b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa/ / de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// zhes pa la sogs
169b7(rgyud 'bum): mi yi bdag po lnga rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru/ / dkyil 'khor 'di ni rang gi rgyal ba'i dbang gi sa las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur// rengs dang zhi ba dag dang
170a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang gsang ba dang na bslad pa dag la yang / / sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon
170a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs// drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs/
170a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs// rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams
170a4(rgyud 'bum): rengs pa'i gzugs/ / zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo
170a5(rgyud 'bum): las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ / dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha man rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis// yum dag gis ni las rnams
170a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gnyis ka'i rdo rje'i rigs la gsad pa dang ni gso ba yang / / dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyes ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// de nas sa gzhi'i
170a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya/ / pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun tu ni 'jig rten grags// de phyir bdemaH
170b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min/ / gtso bo'i thugs kar pad+ma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi stang du rdo rje ni// hUM yig ye shes las skyes

176a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' rimakha' me dag gi chu tshod rnams/ / nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur// mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa
176a2(rgyud 'bum): bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar/ / pad+ma chen po dang ri de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje'u rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dmangs rig

176b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin rjod par byed/ / de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya// reg byed dang ni 'dab brgyad
176b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la/ / snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por aM a zung sA ai la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la// e ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka
176b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu dang hak+Sha gnyis skyes la/ / thun mtshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams// A sogs dbyangs
176b5(rgyud 'bum): / ni re re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las ring po thung ngu dag kyang lnga// phyi rol 'dab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi snying po badz+ra tiSh+Tha la sogs yi ge rnams// de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang ni sog
176b6(rgyud 'bum): las la wa ya ra la dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do/ / snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g.yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la// zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du
