176b7(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya/ / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang // rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'jo
177a1(rgyud 'bum): lo 'di ni byed de 'dir/ / sngar brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis dang por badz+ra tik+Sh+Na la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya// rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du
177a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsi bas la bar du yang / / bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma rA dzA sa do me ru Na las yo// de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni ra ya
177a3(rgyud 'bum): k+She ts+tsha de nas mthar na ni ru 'gyur/ / de ya phyi rol oM hrI dz+dzi dang bi kri tA na na las rnam gnyis hUM dang phaT du 'gyur// ri mig nas ni re mig bar la 'gyur te mi ya bdag po bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags
177a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di'o/ / dbye dang gsang dang dbang la ya ma rA ni rab tu 'gyur te k+She da me do sa tsa sogs// rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zha ba dang ni bskrad pa la// der ni snying po da gnas
177a5(rgyud 'bum): ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin/ / yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyis 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur// yi ge rnams kyis snga
177a6(rgyud 'bum): / mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gi sA lA pA haM dang saM du gsungs// thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge u ru 'gyur// maM muHhaM hraH
177a7(rgyud 'bum): su many+dzuH nyid ni pad+ma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la/ / phyi rol du shrI badz+ra g+ho ShaHsa dang ldan pa'i man+ta b+ha dre hUM dang phaT du 'gyur// bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig
177b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul/ / de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnam dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bla bar bya bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka'
177b2(rgyud 'bum): yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ / sgra ni gang zhig snying kha'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bu gas thos gyur pa// de la mi yi sems ni gcig tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro/
177b3(rgyud 'bum): ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ste// 'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa de dang den de bzhin thos// khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'bor pa yis
177b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / skyil krung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yas// phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa
177b5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog/ dpral bar thig la dkar por dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa
177b6(rgyud 'bum): yis kyang ngo / / khwa yang bkang ste sna yi bug pa gnyis ka dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa// srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sal rlung dang sbyar
177b7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ / dus kyi goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur// lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster/
178a1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyi 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta// phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog
178a2(rgyud 'bum): / mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong // yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i 'phreng ba
178a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pas so/ / rus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus ras gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba// de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i
178a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can langs pa yang / / 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod// ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol
178a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin rag/ de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya// zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi
178a6(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ / de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnam
178a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi sna tshogs yum/ / phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te// 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du
178b1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'phro bar byed/ / phyi dang lus dang dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi// sems dang sems byung ba ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyis de ni gcig pu'o//
178b2(rgyud 'bum): snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya gtang bya ste// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med// rnam par
178b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur pa med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas/ / ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom
178b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa'o de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de// sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa
178b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams ston par 'gyur/ / gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa// de na gtso bos gang zhig 'bo med ldan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi
178b6(rgyud 'bum): theg par bstan/ / ba lang bas rnga glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni// bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gog pa
178b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / bslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang lpags par so ma bal+la'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang // de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs
179a1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed dag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum/ / oM yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi sreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan
179a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum mo/ / rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung nA da'i gzugs can te// de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing yon tan med
179a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'gyur med do/ / rig byed mtha' yas gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de// dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir ni srog chags
179a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan/ / mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur// sol ba 'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni rdza
179a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin/ / sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang // de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi bskyod don du nyin mtshan dus su
179a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bud med bsrung byas nas/ / bu yis byin po dag kyang yi dgas kyi ni 'jig rten du song ba yis sbyin par 'gyur ro lo// des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram
179a7(rgyud 'bum): ze rnams kyis sbas/ / gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du gyur pa na// dpal yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma
179b1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / gang gis chags pan+dan rnams nyin wAg so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag ni srung bar byed// shrI bar gyur na khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su skyes kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings// ba lang
179b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin par de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod sbyar/ / sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni sgom pa dag kyang 'phrog/ 'dod pa'i sbyin
179b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ / yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya// smad 'tshong dam pa las kyi
179b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste/ / rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o// smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon mchog
179b5(rgyud 'bum): gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyis bud med bcu drug lo/ / rang rang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur// sngon tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dzin ma dang ni glang chen na
179b6(rgyud 'bum): dang shing rta du ma gser gyi khur/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin// 'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas 'dod
179b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyin pa rab tu sbyin/ / gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyed byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs// zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing mching bu dum bus lha yi cod
180a1(rgyud 'bum): pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs/ / smad 'tshong dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo lpags pa dum bu gla rtsi ste// bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang
180a2(rgyud 'bum): chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na/ / chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin// byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs
180a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mthu las te/ / ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir// snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar
180a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams kyis/ / rab tu byin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster// gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rig byed dag ni/
180a5(rgyud 'bum): tshad mar 'gyur// gang la rig byed tshad mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste// gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'tshe ba tshad mar
180a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o// gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab gnas bzhed
180a7(rgyud 'bum): bapar gsungs/ / de la sman dang kha zas sbyin pa nad ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin no zer// sbyin pa med na gtsug lag khang 'di sa yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro rnams kyi gnas sa ste// gang du dge 'dun gcig ni
180b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par gyur pa de ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang / / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i slad du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba ste// 'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na
180b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris pa'i glegs bam chos nyid dang / / dge 'dun ngur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba min// slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas
180b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid de rab mchogs yi gzhi la chos ni de yis bstan pa'o/ / dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste// de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa
180b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o/ / dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma// rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor
180b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen ma dang dge bsnyen yang / / bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // nyan thos rnams
180b6(rgyud 'bum): la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la mchog gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang / / sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun tu ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa// de dag bsod
180b7(rgyud 'bum): nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur/ / slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smon byed pa// de dag bgegs
181a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi mgon pos bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro/ / gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i 'dag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis
181a2(rgyud 'bum): brlab pa mdzad/ / mi rnams dag las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs// mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa
181a3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / thos dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa lam nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang // 'dir ni rtag tu rang gzhan bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang // rigs
181a4(rgyud 'bum): dang rigs ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min ngag tu zhen pas dka' ba byed pa'o/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste// 'di dag
181a5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de/ / zhing dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang smyung gnas ri las mchong ba dang // g.yul
181a6(rgyud 'bum): dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchod pas so/ / bdud rnams ngag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste// 'jug
181a7(rgyud 'bum): ngogs spung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni/ / grol ba'i don dang khyis dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so// de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi
181b1(rgyud 'bum): lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin/ / gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang // slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid
181b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te/ / gang na khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed// de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya
181b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod par brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs
181b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi/ / sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste// gang zhig rmongs pa'i ma de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal
181b5(rgyud 'bum): bar nye bar 'gro/ / sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag/ bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu
181b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa na/ / glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa// de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji ltar de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o//
181b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya// rang byin rlabs pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis
182a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so// ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam
182a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di'o/ / me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med// ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra bo rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid// de bzhin dung
182a3(rgyud 'bum): med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur/ / bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min// skyed mos tshal lam
182a4(rgyud 'bum): ri bo dag ni skye bo ri dgas bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ / drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang // dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi
182a5(rgyud 'bum): sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la/ / gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gi kyang 'grub ma 'gyur// khyim dang grong du bgrang 'phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus
182a6(rgyud 'bum): su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni/ / ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa rjod par byed// gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang
182a7(rgyud 'bum): dag par mi shes pa min pa nyid/ / rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nang la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin// bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen
182b1(rgyud 'bum): po rnams dang gdan rnams dang / / sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba med par yang // bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag
182b2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ / de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yi thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya// rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag
182b3(rgyud 'bum): po rang bzhin med par 'gyur/ / sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin// dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams
182b4(rgyud 'bum): dag la bde mnyam ster ba min/ / gang zhig mkha' ye shes rab la 'khyud ldan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang bzhin de ni thar par ster// oM AHhUM hoHrim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag
182b5(rgyud 'bum): tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya/ / rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni// snod de nas ni thig le ngag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse
182b6(rgyud 'bum): mosas dgal/ / phyi rol du ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o// de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas
182b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms byas nas/ / mthe bong dang ni ming med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya// yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming
183a1(rgyud 'bum): gis te/ / 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o// po nya mo rnams drag la zas kyi bud mis steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis
183a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin/ / 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go// mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod/
183a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la// lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste/
183a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang // de ni
183a5(rgyud 'bum): ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don/ / gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya// nam
183a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa/ / lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par gyur kyi bar// de nas phyag
183a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag la gsungs// byis pa rnams
183b1(rgyud 'bum): ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas/ / de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slang
183b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
183b3(rgyud 'bum): / gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes// slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
183b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams ngag gi rigs drug A li kA li dag la gnas pa nyid// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs
183b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / ka ba rnams dang rdo rje 'phreng bas yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod// sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste/
183b6(rgyud 'bum): mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyi chu skyes rnams// ra ba lnga yi re khA sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so// dus kyi rtsa yis gtso
183b7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis/ / nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa sau yi 'phreng bas de bzhin nyid// dur khrod brgyang
184a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis/ / ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la
184a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs// gsung gi rdo rje a sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis
184a3(rgyud 'bum): stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid/ / de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no// sde pa ka la sogs pa
184a4(rgyud 'bum): drug po rim par yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis/ / rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste// slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal
184a5(rgyud 'bum): ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye/ / so sor yi ge'i dbye ba sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so// dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya Na ma na dang na dang dang po'i
184a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs/ / rlung gi dbye ba i yig g+hA dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yau dbye ba r-i la sogs// chu yi dbye ba u yi wa kha tsha Sha pha tha wa sta sa yi dbye ba la la sogs// de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni
184a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga yis ka la sogs pa'i snga rnams rnam par phye/ / gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o// a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la
184b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams/ / 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur
184b2(rgyud 'bum): ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so/ / ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan tha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro
184b3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur/ / sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang
184b4(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid/ / dbyangs kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de// ya la sogs pa rnams kyi
184b5(rgyud 'bum): / sgo skyong mtha' dgra tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so// khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis//
184b6(rgyud 'bum): so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// de bzhin yi ge so sor ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po 'byung ba dbang
184b7(rgyud 'bum): po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya/ / stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste// gtsug
185a1(rgyud 'bum): tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o/ / rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs
185a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbye ba yis/ / de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can// /
185a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams ngag gi'o// sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// phung po rnams
185a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang / / bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bsgor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang // de bzhin
185a5(rgyud 'bum): so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams ngag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can/ / dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu lus ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshad ma 'od dpag med// nga rgyal 'jig rten
185a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ / drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas// 'di dag dpal
185a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o/ / chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma dang // mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje
185b1(rgyud 'bum): ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsartsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma/ / bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyig dong ma dang bya rog bcas// de dag nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsu/
185b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo// sa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo
185b3(rgyud 'bum): gdong drug me ye lha/ / gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod bcas// 'di dag dpal ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas ma rog gi dga' ba yis ni sA
185b4(rgyud 'bum): tshetshogs gtso bos spros pa'o/ / lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang // spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ma rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs
185b5(rgyud 'bum): byed dri yi rdo rje ma/ 'od zer can dang rab bro brgya byin dus kyi gdong ba dang bcas d+he'u rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtso ba yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan
185b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams spros pa'o/ / gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tar dbang gis phyag na
185b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje la sogs gzhan/ / gsang ba dag pa las ni mtha' dag pa mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang // steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu
186a1(rgyud 'bum): ru spros pa'o/ / phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste// nyi ma'i steng du g.yon brkyang u ma dang bcas dbang phyug/
186a2(rgyud 'bum): mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs// thod pa rnams kyis 'phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka/ phyag rgya sbrul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzang glang po'i bar
186a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i pags pa bshus brlon pa 'dzin/ / gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyis phyi rol du ni 'khor lo gsum// rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyug gnyis zla zhal rnams
186a4(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis/ / sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag mgri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro// dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rje
186a5(rgyud 'bum): kha T+wAM ga/ dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te// zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa maM me dang rlung gi dbus su yang // de bzhin
186a6(rgyud 'bum): yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba dang / / shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por 'khor lo na
186a7(rgyud 'bum): dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi pad+ma la/ / rdo rje ka ba'i 'phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po// phyi rol du ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul
186b1(rgyud 'bum): can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas/ / sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so// 'di la sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa/
186b2(rgyud 'bum): drug tu gsungs pa ste// zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul tsan dzaM b+ha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams// ngag dang rkang lag bshang lam b+ha ga'o nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi
186b3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin te/ / shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor
186b4(rgyud 'bum): las ni sum gyi rgyu/ / phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha zhing slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sla yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad// phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyim la
186b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te/ / der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams// sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro
186b6(rgyud 'bum): yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las/ / rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g.yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis
186b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ / 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g.yo ba'i dkyil
187a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas/ / snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab ma phyed kyi lte bar ldan pa yang // gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes
187a2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i 'phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis/ / nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa// gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re khA rtse
187a3(rgyud 'bum): mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o/ / nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du tababs so// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu tsho ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil
187a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o/ / dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan// 'khor lo dang ni 'phreng ba sngon po sa ni ljang khu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo
187a5(rgyud 'bum): ser/ / sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po 'phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang khu'i mdog tu 'gyur//
187a6(rgyud 'bum): cha drug gis ni mtshon gyi sa ste skye byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no// phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad// 'dab ma la ni
187a7(rgyud 'bum): thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams/ / phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad// de yi phyi rol du ni sa rba
187b1(rgyud 'bum): me dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i 'phreng ba'o/ / ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa Ta tsa ka sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams// rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i/
187b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis ring po sa sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams// steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o// sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha k+ShaHdang ldan nam
187b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams/ / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gri gug thod pa can// g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni
187b4(rgyud 'bum): lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste/ / rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g.yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgyan// mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi
187b5(rgyud 'bum): kha dog lnga yis 'phreng ba'o/ / mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dril bu// mgrin par dpal ldan mgo 'phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dpyangs dang
187b6(rgyud 'bum): ni nor bu'o/ / dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdu ba phyag la phyag gdu ba dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te// rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyis 'phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang
187b7(rgyud 'bum): thal ba'i rgya/ / gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis 'phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi 'phreng ba'o// zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i
188a1(rgyud 'bum): pags pa'o/ / zla nyi sreg za'i dkyil 'khor la mi nabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste// phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro
188a2(rgyud 'bum): ma la'o dag byed/ / phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid de// bshang gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang
188a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag na'o/ / de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyis ka bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o// ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang khu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang
188a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su/ / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs// phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste/
188a5(rgyud 'bum): kun nas so// sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo
188a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par byang bar bya/ / lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyis phyog dang phyog bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams
188a7(rgyud 'bum): su ste/ / 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang // nus dang gtso bo'i nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las// rgyab tu lha mo dbang
188b1(rgyud 'bum): byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te/ / rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang // gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang
188b2(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la/ / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis par// gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun
188b3(rgyud 'bum): dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la garas pa/ / kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te dus ni thams cad do// zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru ni
188b4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de/ / bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go// shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag
188b5(rgyud 'bum): gis gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming / / rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste// srog gis byin
188b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyis ka'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa'o/ / ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dbugs
188b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mdar gyur pa/ / de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams// rkang
189a1(rgyud 'bum): pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can/ / bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o//
189a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga gsum ma lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las// gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams// nag po dkar po'i
189a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa nyi ma nyen mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams te/ / 'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang me mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so// zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ri
189a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma sgo ba ni zur gyi ro rnams te/ / slar yang rkang pa nyes 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid// rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam
189a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdar rnams te/ / nyi ma 'am ni grang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la// rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis
189a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o/ / rtse mo can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o// chu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdab
189a7(rgyud 'bum): zhal ni bzhi pa'o/ / sa la dri la sogs pa reg byi'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o// nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lA ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o// de bzhin
189b1(rgyud 'bum): du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so/ / gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga// shes rab thabs ni
189b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bani/ / thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum// dus sbyor phyed pa
189b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni/ / thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi las te zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'i cha shas la// shes rab sbyor dang snyoms
189b4(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o/ / shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje can gyi
189b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o/ / mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur// drag po
189b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid/ / shes rab kyis phya rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur//
189b7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de// g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dang zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang // nag po ser
190a1(rgyud 'bum): po dag ste sngon po ljang khu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dngas 'og yang dag gnas/ / dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid// ser
190a2(rgyud 'bum): po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o/ / sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang khu rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs/
190a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rig phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rigs par bya// shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so// g.yas
190a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas bya ba la sogs so/ / shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go// mdo
190a5(rgyud 'bum): sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'o zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o/ / nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs// g.yas
190a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal nas so/ / shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud//
190a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos// rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste/
190b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas nas rig pa drag po'i mir dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi bdag/ stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros// rdzogs ldan
190b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba las/ / de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang // /
190b3(rgyud 'bum): kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste// mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrid pa nyid de mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rma lam dag dang gnyid//
190b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyab nas rje'u rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos
190b5(rgyud 'bum): bkur ba'o/ / rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so// mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par
190b6(rgyud 'bum): spros/ / g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams// mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying kha'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal lte ba'i
190b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo nas/ / g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas// 'khor lo rnams kyi zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid
191a1(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go// dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i
191a2(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba/ / de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la brten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste// chu ni sa bon khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur pa/
191a3(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni// sems can rnams kyi dga' ba'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so// srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin
191a4(rgyud 'bum): nor bu la yang bsam pa med/ / sems la gnas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste// yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras/
191a5(rgyud 'bum): bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod// sems de dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// gang gis myu gu 'di skyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas/
191a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par nyams par 'gyur// nyams pa de yis skyes par rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon brgyad po dag gi skyed byed do// snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos
191a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa min/ / gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcur 'gro bar 'gyur// bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes
191b1(rgyud 'bum): su chags pa min/ / phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste// dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o// /
191b2(rgyud 'bum): dadag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug/ dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing
191b3(rgyud 'bum): yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes blta bya rnams/ / 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings// rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas
191b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o/ / slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas// phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul
191b5(rgyud 'bum): can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa/ / phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis// rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon
191b6(rgyud 'bum): tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas/ / de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na
191b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang / / longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis// stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum
192a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par te/ / me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis// 'dzin ma'i cha shas
192a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun/ / kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed// de ltar
192a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ / de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di//
192a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o// de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min// 'dir thab
192a5(rgyud 'bum): 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o/ / mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs khams
192a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / gnas dang skye dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun// sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun
192a7(rgyud 'bum): mor bcas rnams te/ / 'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no// spu dang pags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin
192b1(rgyud 'bum): rus pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa/ / de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o// zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par
192b2(rgyud 'bum): shes pa ste/ / de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do// spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur
192b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa rnams/ / sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster// de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar
192b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i slad du btsal bar bya/ / lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po
192b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin/ / de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod par byed de rnam par mi rtog pa las so// rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba du
192b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ / de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o// sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag
192b7(rgyud 'bum): po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur/ / mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sems su 'gyur// dus kun tu ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro/
193a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// thar bar 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems// srid pa gsum gyi gnas
193a2(rgyud 'bum): su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi bar byed/ / bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan// bdud rnams kyi ni
193a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug/ de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' dag mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams kyis
193a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin/ / sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gi khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de// las kyi sar ni srog
193a5(rgyud 'bum): chags rnams la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed/ / gal te tshad 'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang
193a6(rgyud 'bum): po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung / / skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa// sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas
193a7(rgyud 'bum): ni bden mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa/ / de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring // nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug
193b1(rgyud 'bum): las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang / / stong pa las ni myang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams// mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams
193b2(rgyud 'bum): mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las men/ / rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min// sems can
193b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ / bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
193b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ / gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud da nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa// de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis
193b5(rgyud 'bum): mi bgegs rnams byed/ / rgyal ba'i ldan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya// de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan
193b6(rgyud 'bum): lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste/ / glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes mthun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs// rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas
193b7(rgyud 'bum): lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur/ / 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang // mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha
194a1(rgyud 'bum): yi khang pa thams cad du ni dus kun tu/ / shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing // lus stobs bde ster
194a2(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba btung ba la srogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ / rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyi glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bor byed// thig le gang gang zhu ba
194a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di las mgrin pa snying kha la son lto ba gsang ba dag la 'gog/ thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'god pa gang // de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig
194a4(rgyud 'bum): gal te thig le'i 'phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde na'o/ / de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed de// srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa
194a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ / rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te// gal te lam du rab zhugs 'chi bar
194a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhar la'o/ / gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis// de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tar gter
194a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag kyang gsung gi ring bzhin rnam pa gnyis/ / gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te// brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar
194b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo/ / rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog bskyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya// rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha'
194b2(rgyud 'bum): dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas/ / sangs rgyas byin rlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste// gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu
194b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya/ / de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba skyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshe na bu mor
194b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur/ / de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis pad+ma dkar 'dzin dzaM bya la dang phyag na rdo rje ste// me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyog dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul
194b5(rgyud 'bum): che ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ / zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste// lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen
194b6(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ / de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed bar du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur// slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o// de nas
194b7(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o de nyams pa las dbang ma yin/ / 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya// de dag
195a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya/ / byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por
195a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste// skyugs pa snying kha gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min// bshang
195a3(rgyud 'bum): ba gci ba khrag dang ka ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste/ / 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan// shes rab
195a4(rgyud 'bum): chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ / de yis sems can gang dag su zhig 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid// de phyir de/
195a5(rgyud 'bum): ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug/ shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar don du 'jug par byed// mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje
195a6(rgyud 'bum): ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya/ / gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i
195a7(rgyud 'bum): snying khar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste/ / 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyis gnyis ka'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed// gal te 'di ni grub par ma 'gyur rdo rje nor
195b1(rgyud 'bum): bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya/ / shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rig ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste
195b2(rgyud 'bum): slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku/ / gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed// srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi
195b3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang / / de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed pad srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no// gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi
195b4(rgyud 'bum): byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa/ / de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon
195b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yi gsol ba gdab mi bya/ / sems can rnams ni srung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste// de phyir de rnams nyin
195b6(rgyud 'bum): zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed/ / bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no// skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas
195b7(rgyud 'bum): mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes chags/ / rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o// zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam
196a1(rgyud 'bum): chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug/ rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye mngon pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ shes
196a2(rgyud 'bum): rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/ / shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las// 'di ni longs spyod
196a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po/ / sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'
196a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung bar gyur/ / gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don// rin chen dbang po sdug
196a5(rgyud 'bum): bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang pad 'dzin chags caran rnams kyi chags pa'i slad/ / bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur// zhe sdang las
196a6(rgyud 'bum): ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur/ / gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so// chags las de ni gos dkar
196a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las/ / sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur// phung po lnga yi rang
196b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis/ / nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste// gtsang ba'i
196b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o/ / gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o// sems
196b3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu/ / nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol sna
196b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o/ / khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// sgra la sogs la gang
196b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan ni de bzhin kho na'o/ / gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o// gcig pu rdo rje can ni dpe ba gsum
196b6(rgyud 'bum): ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o/ / dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o// rgyud rnams dag las 'di
196b7(rgyud 'bum): skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste/ / rdo rje can ni zla bzhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying kha'i chu skyes lte gsang dang // bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de na
197a1(rgyud 'bum): thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa/ / de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya// skye ba snga
197a2(rgyud 'bum): mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni/ / bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so//
197a3(rgyud 'bum): don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyi srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug/ gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru
197a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / dud 'gro yi rigs lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la// byung dang 'gyur 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung
197a5(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa// 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin/
197a6(rgyud 'bum): no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtog bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o//
197a7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa// 'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o// rgyal
197b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyis bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa/ / gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o// rdo rje can gyi
197b2(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas/ / dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam
197b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs/ / de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams// bdud dang nyon mongs
197b4(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rje rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams/ / phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o// 'khor lo srad
197b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa'o bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni/ / pad+ma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o// mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi
197b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa/ / phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya// gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs
197b7(rgyud 'bum): ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs/ / gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste// gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid
198a1(rgyud 'bum): du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o/ / gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o// gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams
198a2(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs/ / gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid// 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba
198a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams/ / gzhan ni khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams// gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin//
198a4(rgyud 'bum): te de ni 'dzin ma'o// gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa mA ma kI ste de ni chu nyid do// gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni ma yin no// gang du phrag
198a5(rgyud 'bum): dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo / / gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'// gang du ser sna thams cad nyams
198a6(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do/ / mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig/ ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos
198a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o/ / mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri na thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po// rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni
198b1(rgyud 'bum): lce/ / rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de mi rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste// thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos// dbye ba drug gis
198b2(rgyud 'bum): phyebye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams/ / sna tshogs gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni//
198b3(rgyud 'bum): dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste// khams gsum ngag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min//
198b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dgug pa byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis// rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang // ye shes
198b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste/ / de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su
198b6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste/ / bcing ba khro bo mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab// 'dod pas de yi brtson
198b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so/ / gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams// yi dgas
199a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsaT+wA~M ka la sogs pa smos par gyur pa skye/ / skye bo rnams ni srung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs pa phyog pra bu klu rnams
199a2(rgyud 'bum): smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros/ / lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros// gzhan gang cu
199a3(rgyud 'bum): zad spros pa yod pa ngag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar/ / sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya// de bzhin rgyud dang /
199a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste// 'dir ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// gang
199a5(rgyud 'bum): zhig shes rab kyi ni nus la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dnga' khyud pa gang yin dang / / shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang // de dag thams cad nges
199a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya phyogs la rjes su sbyor ba'o// sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi
199a7(rgyud 'bum): yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid/ / gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bstan bya ste// ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa
199b1(rgyud 'bum): de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing / / lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed// shes rab ye shes dag ni
199b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur/ / dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa// de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho
199b3(rgyud 'bum): med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste/ / sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang khwa la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o// nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum
199b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis/ / stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong
199b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrang ba'i mig gis blta
199b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ste/ / re khA nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o// de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te// rnam pa kun ldan rang sems
199b7(rgyud 'bum): yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid/ / gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog par ba bya ste// 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yong
200a1(rgyud 'bum): su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o/ / zla ba drug gis sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dmar pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur// chags dang chags bral
200a2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ / oM 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus// gnyid dang gnyid
200a3(rgyud 'bum): yur mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang / / de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med// nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom
200a4(rgyud 'bum): nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o/ / sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir// me yi rnam pa me min g.yo ba rlung gi
200a5(rgyud 'bum): lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pa rlung ma yin/ / stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min// rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma
200a6(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so/ / nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa// srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes
200a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa nyid/ / rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste// du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin ma dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams
200b1(rgyud 'bum): cad gsang bar bya/ / dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la bcing // phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang
200b2(rgyud 'bum): dag bslang ba yang / / pad+mar rdo rje'i sgra 'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste// sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'din dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal/
200b3(rgyud 'bum): sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni// rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur
200b4(rgyud 'bum): te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sgra/ / ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o// 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te/
200b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do// 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni oM D+hA nyid// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par
200b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni/ / gsung dang thugs su lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur// 'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btung ba chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de
200b7(rgyud 'bum): yi gsung du 'gyur/ / gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o// yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i ma dang thig le nA da rim pa
201a1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o// sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang
201a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ni/ / lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g.yo med sems la zhen pa ste// ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig
201a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur// de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su
201a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya// thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skyes pa'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar
201a5(rgyud 'bum): pa gang / / de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya// gang phyir a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan
201a6(rgyud 'bum): min zhing / / hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de// 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang
201a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ni/ / rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o// l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par
201b1(rgyud 'bum): dman pa rnams/ / phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste// dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas
201b2(rgyud 'bum): phye ba rnams/ / slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu pa'i dbugs rnams 'bab// de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bong ro rnams dbu ma
201b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs/ / ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal ba dgu brgyad nyid// dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mnga' rnams dus
201b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ / de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus
201b5(rgyud 'bum): su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ / de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug
201b6(rgyud 'bum): pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab/ / snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya// phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur/
201b7(rgyud 'bum): sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas// de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste// snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha'
202a1(rgyud 'bum): dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o/ / de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug/ zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog
202a2(rgyud 'bum): gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste/ / thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis// sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan
202a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams tshas ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la/ / gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o// rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyer
202a4(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs/ / zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur// gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye
202a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'/ / lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o// spen par bug pa mun can
202a6(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs/ / phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes// sa skyes stong bskul
202a7(rgyud 'bum): zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig/ mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung // gang zhig
202b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung / / mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sbrul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid// mkha' 'gro dus
202b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma/ / de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya// ji
202b3(rgyud 'bum): srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las/ / de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur
202b4(rgyud 'bum): ram ci/ / pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la// sgrib bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis
202b5(rgyud 'bum): ma yin no/ / nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyis ka'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis srid pas bsnun pa rnams// yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la
202b6(rgyud 'bum): yang mjug rings za/ / thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams// dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur
202b7(rgyud 'bum): dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab pa yan lag gsungs/ / yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par// de phyir dus la sogs
203a1(rgyud 'bum): pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so/ / de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur// gang du zla ba'i
203a2(rgyud 'bum): cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o/ / zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyis// drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod/
203a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs// reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yi
203a4(rgyud 'bum): de dag grub pa ster/ / sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyid skyes spen// sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu// zhi
