203a5(rgyud 'bum): la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang / / dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o// zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang
203a6(rgyud 'bum): bor rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa la/ / rengs la ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la// dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la ni
203a7(rgyud 'bum): ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o/ / gsad la nag po'i zhil te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar// sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod
203b1(rgyud 'bum): byed po min/ / 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed// sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don
203b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyer byed/ / gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no// dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur//
203b3(rgyud 'bum): de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams sngar yang sum 'gyur na// 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams// chu tshod phyed/
203b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so// gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste// de nas
203b5(rgyud 'bum): sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum/ / kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las// ji srid rig byed sprul dang
203b6(rgyud 'bum): ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur/ / 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis// gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu
203b7(rgyud 'bum): ster bdu ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so/ / de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs// lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra
204a1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyi ma phyag 'os pa'o/ / gtso bo ya ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang // de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems
204a2(rgyud 'bum): las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ / gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis
204a3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so/ / gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni// snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcas
204a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste/ / de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di// brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas
204a5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'khor lo'i tshul/ / dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis
204a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas/ / de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku// gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus
204a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo'o/ / dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te// thig le bkag par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas
204b1(rgyud 'bum): dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ / 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma
204b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dgyes pa ma yin no/ / gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te// dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chug ter song
204b3(rgyud 'bum): ma thams cad stong par skul bar byed/ / lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la// rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbug kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas
204b4(rgyud 'bum): ba shes par bya/ / stong pa la ni sman pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te// stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams
204b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis nam gru'o/ / rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gi der ni sgra gcan 'jug/ rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha'
204b6(rgyud 'bum): dus dus kyi lha yi blon po 'jug/ nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste// mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter
204b7(rgyud 'bum): grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug/ mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug ste// de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag
205a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ / de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di na rab tu 'gyur// gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mnga' dang
205a2(rgyud 'bum): ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa/ / bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtswar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsi ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o// de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i
205a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i rtsi rnams dag tu 'gyur/ / gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgo bo ra bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtse ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu
205a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams/ / zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad// brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa
205a5(rgyud 'bum): ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams/ / gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams// brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi
205a6(rgyud 'bum): dang drag po'i gza' rnams te/ / de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing // gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi bskyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha'
205a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma yis longs spyod do/ / dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur// khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang
205b1(rgyud 'bum): po rnams la mnyam pa ste/ / sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa// rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa
205b2(rgyud 'bum): yis btsal bar bya/ / gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur// de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes
205b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / shos rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul
205b4(rgyud 'bum): du rab 'gyur/ / shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur// lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum
205b5(rgyud 'bum): yang mthong bar 'gyur/ / lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur// de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams
205b6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'gyur/ / rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams// srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang // srog dang
206a1(rgyud 'bum): zur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur/ / rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed/
206a2(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur// de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin// zla ba nyi ma'i
206a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang man pa nyid/ / thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o// phyogs zad zla
206a4(rgyud 'bum): ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar/ / srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go/ zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu
206a5(rgyud 'bum): ba nyams shing lam ni gnyis ka yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gags/ / chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs// dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam
206a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa/ / de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro// khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas
206a7(rgyud 'bum): nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs/ / rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur// de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can
206b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur/ / rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur// lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang
206b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur/ / sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang // skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing
206b3(rgyud 'bum): du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste/ / sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhing ma g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o// sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi
206b4(rgyud 'bum): rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed/ / chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste// rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi
206b5(rgyud 'bum): rlung yang stong pa la/ / rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan nams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed
206b6(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzad pas rnam par gzigs nas ni/ / gnyis ka ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste// so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis
206b7(rgyud 'bum): ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor/ / sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams// de dag rnams dang
207a1(rgyud 'bum): thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs/ / yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang sreg pa rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin
207a2(rgyud 'bum): rdul phran 'dzin/ / srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste// slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i
207a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos rnams so/ / dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed// 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug
207a4(rgyud 'bum): ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so/ / de yi dbus su las kyis ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur// lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen
207a5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams/ / mtha' dag r-i yaM bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la lho ni pad+ma rA ga ste// nub ni kar ke ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo//
207a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus ni ljang khu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no// de nas
207a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mnga' la bcu yis bsgyur bar gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag go/ / de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no//
207b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro// brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas
207b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur// de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying kha dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin
207b3(rgyud 'bum): no/ / zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te// brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis
207b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ri 'jig rten tshad// rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gtar chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed kyis//
207b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor mgo bo'i 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni// shangs kyi 'og tu ko sgo'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus// de nas snying
207b6(rgyud 'bum): kha lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur/ / gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yi ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid// mdzod spu gsang ba'i
207b7(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang / / dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o// phyed bcas nyi ma'i
208a1(rgyud 'bum): shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste/ / thugs kyi byed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying kha la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o//
208a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o// 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag
208a3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ / lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur// de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no// de yi steng
208a4(rgyud 'bum): du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur/ / de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje 'phreng ba'o// phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i
208a5(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus/ / gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas stang du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams// sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan
208a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams/ / phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje'i 'phreng ba'o// steng dang 'og tu sangs
208a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ / kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis// rtsibs
208b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur/ / sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod
208b2(rgyud 'bum): brtag par bya/ / steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// pad+ma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas
208b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug/ sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes
208b4(rgyud 'bum): rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no/ / lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste// shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu
208b5(rgyud 'bum): ril bu mig sman ro tsa na/ / lho ru dpal lAn rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o// dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lA dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs
208b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do/ / nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying kha'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni// gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams
208b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis rim pas so/ / dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyis pa zhi dang drag po la'o// dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs pa lang kha dang
209a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gzugs/ / khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las// ra ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du steng rwa yi zlum po
209a2(rgyud 'bum): dag ni bzhi cha'o/ / phyi rol rA yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da rI yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o// dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid// gsang ba'i
209a3(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad/ / de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams// phyed dang gnyis
209a4(rgyud 'bum): mkhar phyir byung chu skyes snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o/ / pad+ma'i mtha' las chas dman gzhi dang mnyam pa bral te de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o// gdan gyi
209a5(rgyud 'bum): phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ / gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te//
209a6(rgyud 'bum): gdan nas pad+ma'i sngon mtshams snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o// de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum
209a7(rgyud 'bum): bu gsum/ / gdan las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te// phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong ba'i tshang dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi 'phreng bar
209b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro ma yi dbang / / mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di// de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku sa
209b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no/ / gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no// lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i
209b3(rgyud 'bum): khams kyi rang bzhin no/ / rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te// nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang khu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung
209b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / lan tshwa sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba ma dang kha ba rlung yin te// skyur dang bska ba'i ro na'i dris pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa
209b5(rgyud 'bum): drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams/ / sa la sna tshogs regs pa rnams dang mtha' dag nang ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go// sa yis gzugs
209b6(rgyud 'bum): gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de ma yas ni/ / 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed// ya
209b7(rgyud 'bum): shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang / / chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams ngag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab
210a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin tsam ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing / / slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis
210a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ / rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir// mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi
210a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag de yi snying po dkyil 'khor ro/ / phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so// longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can
210a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams/ / rA la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha ma ni chu gter rlung // gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang
210a5(rgyud 'bum): chu gter gdong / / 'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung // nya dang lug dang glang dang 'a khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni//
210a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med drag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so// 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa ta swa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha// lug dang 'khrig
210a7(rgyud 'bum): bkarka Tar ni zla ba dkar po nyim seng ge bu mo srang rnams su/ / sa skyes sngags pasgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro// de ltar sa la sogs pa'i
210b1(rgyud 'bum): khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ / 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang // gang dgas la dpag bsam shing
210b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan/ / mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste// gang zhig phal pa'i rtswa dang shing
210b3(rgyud 'bum): dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ / yi dgas rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so// 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad
210b4(rgyud 'bum): du sra sa dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sa ra ni rab zhugs te/ / mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni// nyon mongs dang ni
210b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng ga gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ / sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o// de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku
210b6(rgyud 'bum): ni skyes shing ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste/ / bcom ldan de yi thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no// de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag
210b7(rgyud 'bum): ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye/ / sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no// gang dag chos la mngon
211a1(rgyud 'bum): 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags/ / shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te// mchod sbyin
211a2(rgyud 'bum): la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na ma ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug/ 'jug ngogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar bster ba'i chos ma yin// de nyid lam ni
211a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang / / mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi snga ni gang // bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di
211a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba/ / de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug pa mdzod// gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas
211a5(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can/ / dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi// 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang
211a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro bo'i me yis so/ / de phyir khro bo'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsad par gyur// chags las snang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi
211a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so/ / de ni rtsa nas dbyung skad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin// de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde maH
211b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni/ / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du 'gyur cing thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog/ chags pa gang gis
211b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste/ / sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyo ba rnams ster bar byed// sems
211b3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad/ / des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha man rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar 'gyur//
211b4(rgyud 'bum): sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni// gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te// phyugs dang /
211b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang // mi bdag dang bcas mi ye bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin// bsregs
211b6(rgyud 'bum): bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tut+ma ka ni me nyid do/ / rlung dang nam mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang // kA k+Shi kA shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang
211b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' rlung ma dang chu ni ldong ros pa bla ste/ / btsag ni sa 'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tshe rgya mtsho skyes dang rgya mtsha nag po thabs kyi tshwa// 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni na ba sA ra ya ba k+Sha ra sa
212a1(rgyud 'bum): ji dang / dz+wal gtsal sa skyes de rnamam pa dpu me chu dngas rnams drag gi rang bzhin no// rdo yi chu ris ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me// rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dgra
212a2(rgyud 'bum): gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ / gla sgang ser pos yi khams te shag tu ka dang ra can nag po chu dang me dang rung // nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni
212a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga po rig par bya/ / rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dung la sogs pa'i gzugs// de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang 'a
212a4(rgyud 'bum): len rnam pa bzhi/ / ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min// grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bug
212a5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'o/ / gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang // lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nang 'phrog rul ba'i lcags
212a6(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam par spangs nas so/ / dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste me la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis// sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur//
212a7(rgyud 'bum): sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste// 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sbyar byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar
212b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'o/ / mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyi stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu pa'o// su zhig de rnams med nas yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed//
212b2(rgyud 'bum): bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur// ye shes med nas bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// de dag
212b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'god par 'gyur/ / gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin// gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i
212b4(rgyud 'bum): slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings/ / de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad// gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs
212b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te/ / mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyis sa la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di
212b6(rgyud 'bum): yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus par dang ni/ / bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig 'bugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro// sman rnams thams cad shin/
212b7(rgyud 'bum): tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams da// bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsa ba mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste// dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab
213a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o/ / gnyis sbyor tshal mching bu rtsi brta snyan drug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid// glang po mi yi chu ri lan bdun thugs pa dag gis/
213a2(rgyud 'bum): chu shing tsi tra la sogs thal ba dang // 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro mi sbyangs pa de rnams slu bar bya// yang nas yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar smra bar bya zhing
213a3(rgyud 'bum): bskam par bya/ / de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang // lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni dngul chu dag gi brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur/
213a4(rgyud 'bum): khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying khar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid// drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur// lcags
213a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed/ / khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye bsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste// de ltar gang
213a6(rgyud 'bum): zhig dngul chu'i las mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na/ / dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol// de yis mchog
213a7(rgyud 'bum): gi lus la nang dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed/ / khru phyed gser gyi pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste// lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag
213b1(rgyud 'bum): tu dag pa'i in+da nI la pad+ma rA ga chu shel lo/ / nub tu rin chen kar ke ta ste me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul// rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag la skyes pa'i
213b2(rgyud 'bum): gdan ni lte ba la/ / snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i dzaM b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa// 'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad
213b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad de chu skyes mchog sprin phyag/ cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sprin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid// ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma
213b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas so/ / dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas// oM dzA sA hA'i mtha' ste dbus su b+ha la dang bcas
213b5(rgyud 'bum): dza len+d+rA ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis/ / rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi srung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya// de ltar srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon
213b6(rgyud 'bum): pos ro na 'phrog pa mi 'gyur ro/ / so phag 'gyur byed sgyur ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro na minye zhing bdug par bya// de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams
213b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dus su'o/ / slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro na'i tshe ste de yang de la bzhu bar bya// dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za// zha nye rnon po ra gan
214a1(rgyud 'bum): @zangs dang lgang tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa/ / mnyam pa gcig tu bsregs pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni ljang tsher dkar po las skyes bsha' tshe mnyam// dang por
214a2(rgyud 'bum): drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya/ / rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa rab tu sbyin mi bya// phyogs gcig gis ni nyis
214a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag/ de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu ba 'di ni bika mchog rnams kyis// mazhun ni rol ji srid
214a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur/ / reg pa mchog gi sman rnams ngag gis me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur// lhang tsher dag las lcags
214a5(rgyud 'bum): ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro/ / de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro// de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang
214a6(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar/ / me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur// reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams
214a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur/ / 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gsar ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// slar yang gzhan ni gnyis dang sum 'gyur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la
214b1(rgyud 'bum): blugs pas so/ / rdzas kyi don du zha nya brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad na sa blugs par bya// gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sbrul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang /
214b2(rgyud 'bum): bsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas// mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshwa nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni// mkhris pa sbyar
214b3(rgyud 'bum): po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te/ / sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pas thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa// dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha
214b4(rgyud 'bum): yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar/ / zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste//
214b5(rgyud 'bum): dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs/
214b6(rgyud 'bum): de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya// de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tshel 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni/
214b7(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis 'gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya// nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni//
215a1(rgyud 'bum): sman gyis bsad pa'i lugs kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang // ba yi 'o ma gsarab rnying pa sA li zan ni lo ma sgyur pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang // rnam
215a2(rgyud 'bum): bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o/ / stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas// nyin
215a3(rgyud 'bum): nag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste nyungs kar cha las mtha' ma ske tsha cha shas so/ / khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur// 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug
215a4(rgyud 'bum): gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed/ / karko Ti dang de ba dA lI tsha gsum bri ha ti dang nim pa kA rA ta tik+ti// bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du spyang bar
215a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa rab tu bya/ / de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+hil+lA ta yi chu// ngan pa'i dri dngas dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so// gang
215a6(rgyud 'bum): zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dgra sman yon te/ / phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid// gsal ba
215a7(rgyud 'bum): mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin/ / de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur// dartod
215b1(rgyud 'bum): pa la sA li par+t+ti chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus 'dab ma'i khu ba yis/ / ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyi nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas// gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin
215b2(rgyud 'bum): zhag so so'i dus su TaM ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa/ / de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs// bok+kA Na dang bar snang shak+Shu ki ri'i mchu
215b3(rgyud 'bum): yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya/ / sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar reng lgang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag/ gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma
215b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste/ / sngar brjod kha ba len snod du chur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni sla dkar 'phrog/ zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang
215b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag 'dun zhag gsum dang / / zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur// thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jig pa dag dang rnam par bral ba
215b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste/ / mchog dman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skyes pa gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las min// gung na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos
215b7(rgyud 'bum): dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod/ / ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed// der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag
216a1(rgyud 'bum): po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ / ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur kyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi dngos grub bo// dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis
216a2(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ / gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu mo rnams ni bsgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i
216a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ / mkha' 'gro ma rnams bsgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas
216a4(rgyud 'bum): rab mchog lha dang me rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ / du ba la sogs bsgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya// srog la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas
216a5(rgyud 'bum): ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ / dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes brgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams la 'chi star gang de grub pa'i sngags
216a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o// ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje bad+ma
216a7(rgyud 'bum): bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid/ / de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig/ sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod des chu sreg za rlung dang stong pa
216b1(rgyud 'bum): gang / / lnga po dag go gza' yi tshogs pa cig shos dag ni drug po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su// gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga bor phyi rol dag tu gsungs// snying sto/
216b2(rgyud 'bum): la yogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid// pad+ma rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni// gang zhig rus pa la sogs
216b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste/ / lag pa rkang padag na bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga pa'o// de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa
216b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya/ / sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang // dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug la
216b5(rgyud 'bum): drug dang zla ba'i grangs/ / de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang // gza' rnams dag gi rgyu ba gang de slar yang cig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma
216b6(rgyud 'bum): yi rgyu bar brjod/ / ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang // nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul
216b7(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa zag pa rnams ngag dang / / mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par// bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal
217a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ / mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang // de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa
217a2(rgyud 'bum): drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni/ / bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang // bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu
217a3(rgyud 'bum): ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stob dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag/ skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag gong
217a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yis sangs rgyas chos/ / rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste// khyab bdag mchog gi go
217a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin/ / zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis// 'jig rten dus dang yon
217a6(rgyud 'bum): tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod/ / mnga' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug/ gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs
217a7(rgyud 'bum): te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no/ / rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go// nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu
217b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis nas ni re re 'phel/ / nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur// /
217b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste// dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus par yang mngon sum gsungs// de phyir 'jig
217b3(rgyud 'bum): rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste/ / dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa'o zla ba bzang // gang la thog/
217b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med// sa bon dang ni bsal ba'i
217b5(rgyud 'bum): dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med/ / mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs
217b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med/ / brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs// 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon
217b7(rgyud 'bum): po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa/ / rigs pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal// spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo
218a1(rgyud 'bum): glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can/ / ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar po 'jig
218a2(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas/ / bdud rtsis 'chi ba sel zhing spring ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo//
218a3(rgyud 'bum): sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te// dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams las mi bzad pa//
218a4(rgyud 'bum): gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa// 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyeng mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo//
218a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab// steng 'og kun na sa dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang //
218a6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min// gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo michog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud// gang zhig mi
218a7(rgyud 'bum): yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste/ / de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med// de mnyes pa yis bdag ni
218b1(rgyud 'bum): mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o/ / de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa ba de mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so// sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla/
218b2(rgyud 'bum): ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed// mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa'o// myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang zhing bde mnyam
218b3(rgyud 'bum): ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa po/ / shes rab ye shes 'thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba'o// nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni
218b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas dus su gsod pa'o/ / dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lA ma la srog dang thur se la rlung ni gsod byed pa'o// sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung
218b5(rgyud 'bum): ma la sogs thams cad ster/ / ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g.yo sgyu can// dpal ldan dpal ni chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btung
218b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa/ / de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa na// sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas
218b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa gang / / de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams A li kA li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis 'phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings
219a1(rgyud 'bum): pas brjod/ / pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod// ji ltar nim dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa'ang
219a2(rgyud 'bum): las byung gyur pa/ / rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog/ nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor
219a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig las ni/ / tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni// dpal ldan sgrol ma'o pang dkar can ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon
219a4(rgyud 'bum): po chu skyes mtshan ma can/ / ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos// ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji ltar bzhin mthong
219a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni// rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis//
219a6(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod// khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog par dang po'i sangs
219a7(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas khyod// bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra// khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud
219b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdud/ / khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug/ tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung /
219b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas// rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA par/
219b3(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi// sa ga'i zla ba'i nyal mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la// thub
219b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob/ / sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin//
219b5(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig/ sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rjes dag gis rgyud kyi don ni
219b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan mdzad nas/ / sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba stsal ba nges par ni// dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glegs bam dag la
219b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa dang / / de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen// gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu
220a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byeng byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ mi yi 'jig rten dgar phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro ba'i tshul po btsun mor bcas pa rnams// gang dgas 'o gdas
220a2(rgyud 'bum): gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge thams cad dus su 'ching byed pa/ / de dag thams cad nyon zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig/ rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi
220a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha/ / thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gi de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i
220a4(rgyud 'bum): slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang / / bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig/ dang po'i sangs
220a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus
220a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / kha che'i baN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ dus
220a7(rgyud 'bum): phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang
220b1(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi 'khor lo'i mus khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi chal legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong
220b2(rgyud 'bum): ston gyis/ dpalas skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis// 'di la
220b3(rgyud 'bum): bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang / / bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang tho ba des// kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog// / rgya gar
220b4(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ shrI ka la tsakra ut+ta ra tan+t+ra rA dza tan+t+ra hri da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo//
220b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ces gang thob pa// rgyal mchog
220b6(rgyud 'bum): pho brang sham b+ha lar grags ka lA pa rungag gi dbang phyugs seng ge yi/ / gdan la bzhugs nas rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan// byung gyur ces sogs
220b7(rgyud 'bum): bden te lnga mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug l-I yi dbang po dang / / zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me lha sa steng lha yul nam mkhar bsod nams sdig las 'byung // mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dag
221a1(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can/ / rig byed pa dang thod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni brdzun pa ste// gang du gcan chen bdun la sogs pa dge dang mi dge'i
221a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der/ / skyed la sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pas nges par 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni// thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed
221a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur/ / sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa stang 'dir ltung de ni bden pa ste// bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rigs byed zhi chos khyab 'jug
221a4(rgyud 'bum): ches bla ma/ / sha yi kha zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub
221a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung mi bya// srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'dir nyams
221a6(rgyud 'bum): / yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min// srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing /
221a7(rgyud 'bum): skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur// seng ge sbrul dang ni le stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan lag lnga yi srog gcod 'gyur//
221b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang ni skye dgu rnams ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur// dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro myong rol rjes su tshol byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs
221b2(rgyud 'bum): skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro/ / dge slong nad pa la ni sman pas sha bstan na yang bya khra rnams kyis bsad pa dang // pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thogs
221b3(rgyud 'bum): dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams/ / sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams// dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas
221b4(rgyud 'bum): nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi ba slur min/ / sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su sdug bsngal 'gyur// srog chags yi dgas la sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyim
221b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du/ / gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen bdun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams// shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen bdun
221b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ni gang / / 'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta// mtho yor shes pa yod la rang gzhan rnam par bral ba nyid las rdo ba'i mtho yor phung por 'gyur//
221b7(rgyud 'bum): sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rigs pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnam par bral bar legs par sad las shes// sham b+ha
222a1(rgyud 'bum): yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams/ / 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te// longs spyod
222a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam te rang gzhan bral te rtogs med de rnams kyis/ / longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad 'gyur ba// zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus
222a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ma dang mun pa gcig pu snang bar byed pa yang / / sa sogs dri sogs mig la sogs dang gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung sogs drug pa gnyis// de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug
222a4(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis/ / de rnams longs spyod byed po srog chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis brlang ba// phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhin pa las rab byung // sprul
222a5(rgyud 'bum): sku longs sku dang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams bzhi po las ni rab tu byung / / khong stong min zhing gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur// de bzhin gsum la sogs pa
222a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur/ / phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog/ rnam par shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar
222a7(rgyud 'bum): gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos/ / dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la gnas// gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs
222b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas skyabs gsum la sogs pa/ / yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa dang ni sred pa yang // las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal
222b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang yin// gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing
222b3(rgyud 'bum): las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las las/ / de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung // chos
222b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid pas de yi phyir/ / srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min// sbyin pa la
222b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa gtong zhing byang chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid/ / gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris// de las phung po rnams
222b6(rgyud 'bum): las de las slar yang srid gzhan 'pho min phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni/ / mar me kha ton rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon sgyur// gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs las
222b7(rgyud 'bum): byung ngo zhes pa bden/ / chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te// phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos su mim ning de yi phyir// gang
223a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir mi sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa/ / gang zhig gcig min du ma min la rang dang bdag gzhan la phan tshun tshogs chen po'i rten gyur pa/
223a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med dngos po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad dka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab la spros pa med// dpe med so sor
223a3(rgyud 'bum): gis reg bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal/ / gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs smad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs// blo ldan chen por gyur pa
223a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsungs mdzad cing / / 'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi
223a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ / gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang // slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor
223a6(rgyud 'bum): lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba/ / rnam pa du mar 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms// phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku
223a7(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba/
223b1(rgyud 'bum): rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid// mi mnyam bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing khams
223b2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su/ / zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa steng nam mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar// bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings
223b3(rgyud 'bum): su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun tu ni rnam par bzhugs/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus// khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i b+ha ga'i pad+ma
223b4(rgyud 'bum): chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung / / de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan// yul gyi yon tan las byung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yi khams la
223b5(rgyud 'bum): rab brten pa/ / skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi// zhal brgya rigs
223b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dbang po zla bas sogs yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyangs/ / zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs rnams la// de la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa
223b7(rgyud 'bum): nub par 'gyur ba sgyu bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ / gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis
224a1(rgyud 'bum): khams rnams rgyas btab des/ / gcig gi du ma'i khams las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa sor mo'i tshogs rnams gang zhig tu// thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs
224a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dag/ rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig rten rdul gyi phung po ste// srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin kyang ni 'jig pa med
224a3(rgyud 'bum): ba srog gi khams/ / khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni las yin rdul ni srog chags phung po yi// de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bu sa gzhan du// rang gi yas
224a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po lngar longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sogs par byed/ / de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi phung po zad pa min// gcer bu la ni las kyi phung
224a5(rgyud 'bum): po rnam par 'jig 'gyur sreg byed me ni 'ba' zhig gis/ / dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems can lus ngag las// pad+ma khyab byed snying po'i ze'u 'bru'i
224a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed/ / de dbus lus po sbas pa rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can// lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di
224a7(rgyud 'bum): ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa/ / bsam gtan 'di ni sreg blags za bas ma lus las kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong // gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang
224b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur/ / gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang
224b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel/ / gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du
224b3(rgyud 'bum): de yi sdig pa nyams/ / gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de mi
224b4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa nyams/ / gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar
224b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel// de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang // 'dod
224b6(rgyud 'bum): chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro bo nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur/ / gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin
224b7(rgyud 'bum): ba las ldog gyur pa nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang smon
225a1(rgyud 'bum): lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams/ / dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' med nabyed/
225a2(rgyud 'bum): bopo gnas min 'dir mi gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ sems can rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lnga
225a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams longs ma spyod par 'jig pa min/ / so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid bsgom par gsungs// mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam
225a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'bar ba la sogs pas/ / so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong // bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas
225a5(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong / / srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le'i
225a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par byed/ / rjes su dran pas rang gis gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mnga' phrog par byed// ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bor dri med bde bas rang gang
225a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nam mkhar bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas// nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag
225b1(rgyud 'bum): bkag pas so/ / yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis// sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsung las so//
225b2(rgyud 'bum): srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// gsang ba lte ba snying kha mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin sa zung re// khu ba gyen du
225b3(rgyud 'bum): song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma gsum dang bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid// khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang
225b4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan/ / rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
225b5(rgyud 'bum): dri ma bral ba rnam dag bzhin pa shes rab spun du 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan// rgyu mthun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin
225b6(rgyud 'bum): pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin/ / lus kyi sa bon khu ba phab ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang // mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying kha sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor ba
225b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig/ gang gis mgrin par de rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i
226a1(rgyud 'bum): bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba/ / gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// de ni dpag
226a2(rgyud 'bum): med gang gis rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems/ / snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu
226a3(rgyud 'bum): dang nyi ma mgrin par yang / / sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug rings te// gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stod pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams
226a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang / / gzugs ni phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi// dag pa'i dbang
226a5(rgyud 'bum): po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa/ / de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnams so// gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla
226a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa/ / nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad+ma mthar byed do// sgra gcan dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pas gang zhig khro bo bgegs
226a7(rgyud 'bum): mthar byed pa ste/ / 'jug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do// srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems/
226b1(rgyud 'bum): srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms la byang chub sems// dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phrag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur//
226b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pas tshangs pa bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems// lte bar srog rlung bkag pas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar
226b3(rgyud 'bum): bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid/ / mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// dpral ba rlung gi dbang po
226b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras/ / lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan ro la ro/
226b5(rgyud 'bum): yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum// lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshig dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen
226b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la/ / gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lor brgyad// mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte/
226b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'khor lo ru// gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar po'i cha// 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lhas/
227a1(rgyud 'bum): dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku// rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de yang dang por
227a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gsungs/ / zla ba'i cha shas sum cu nam mkha' nam mkha' gdengs can zla ba'i rtsa ni zla bzang ngo po// rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te// rdo rje chu dang
227a3(rgyud 'bum): bshang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis bldag par 'gyur/ / byams pa'i tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la// mngon shes lnga yi zhal
227a4(rgyud 'bum): chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng ge ste/ / bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa// dpal ldan 'dus par
227a5(rgyud 'bum): sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung / / der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi ris la gsal bar mdzad// rtsa dang sha dang rus pa
227a6(rgyud 'bum): khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas/ / srog chags so so'i sangs rgyas lha yul bar snangs steng rang rang gnas su gtso bo'i gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas 'gyur
227a7(rgyud 'bum): la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin/ / rang byin rlabs pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhin pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga pa zung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal/
227b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan gsang ba 'dus par yang // bdud rnams yang dag bzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yis bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin dang
227b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims sogs las skyes/ / skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo // bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin
227b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul sa steng bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman// stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag
227b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa de/ / bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dz+wal bu ral gri zhags pas bsgrub pa min// bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa
227b5(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba yi/ / bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad/
227b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de ni shin tu dri zhim me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni lha ba shos dang // gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas// sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul
227b7(rgyud 'bum): sa steng bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster/ / zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni// zla ba gcig la nam mkha' nam mkha' stong
228a1(rgyud 'bum): bzang 'gro dus ro mur bar dbyer med bzlas/ / seng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lam gsum bral nas srog rlung gad bas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas// grub par 'gyur te ri bong /
228a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa lta bur nam mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa de// bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong // ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po
228a3(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mi g.yo dri bral blo byed cing / / tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par
228a4(rgyud 'bum): bral nas rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ / shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas longs mi spyod// yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig
228a5(rgyud 'bum): len pas longs spyod min/ / sha dag sems kyis byin yang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min// de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi
228a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chang 'tshong khyim du 'gro// nyin phyed dus su mchog gi thugs rjes ha yi don dun pa rnams kyi tshong dus su/ dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir
228a7(rgyud 'bum): dududaga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro/ / chang nya bud med rnams kyi dri ma gsum bral a ba d+hA tI dman rigs cis ma yin// gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni gcig pu nyid dung ma 'cha' la// gang gis
228b1(rgyud 'bum): / bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba// gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min// gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang /
228b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bca' nam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du// sgra rnams mi rtag dam bca' bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu rtsol
228b3(rgyud 'bum): bas byung ba'i phyir/ / nam mkha' las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub// gzugs dang reg bya dri dang ro yi yul rnams bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin//
228b4(rgyud 'bum): de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni// rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin lo// gang gis thog mar don rtogs
228b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas sa steng bar snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis/ / rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa gsal bu gcig pu yon tan ma
228b6(rgyud 'bum): lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas/ / mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs nas slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi
228b7(rgyud 'bum): ku cor 'gyur min nam/ / rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min// dngos po'i byed po'i rgyur ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni//
229a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pa ste// byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// chos mi mthun
229a2(rgyud 'bum): par de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod par 'gyur la cig shos de med do/ / gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin// mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis
229a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par gsal byas de yi 'bras bu cis ma yin/ / sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur na de tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur// spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur te nam mkha' tsam dang
229a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nyid/ / stong pa sgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgra med 'gyur// gang gis na mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba des na med pa nyid// gal
229a5(rgyud 'bum): te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub gyur na/ / de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur// nam mkha' sa steng dag tu gza' dang
229a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang / / lha dang srin po da ni rang gi rig kyi dmachog can gyi yi dgas lha mi na klu// sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi// don gcig
229a7(rgyud 'bum): du ma'i sgra yis kha cig tu yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis/ / dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams las ni grub pas na// dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang
229b1(rgyud 'bum): shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub/ / mo ga sham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa// bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i sa bon
229b2(rgyud 'bum): las/ sa dang chu dang ma rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min// gal te lha gcig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de cha tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa dang chu dang ma rnams lha yi
229b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min/ / srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig
