229b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus/ / lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grags// srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan pasam
229b5(rgyud 'bum): pas 'dzin par 'gyur/ / gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'dzin 'gyur// srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi 'phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs
229b6(rgyud 'bum): can te/ / sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams sumakyog pa'i shugs kyis 'gro// srog chags srog dang lhan cig bem po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa/
229b7(rgyud 'bum): srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro// gcig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni// nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal
230a1(rgyud 'bum): min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min/ / sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min cing srog rlung med na sems med la// srog chags sems dang
230a2(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bems po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang // phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams
230a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung bas na/ / ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin// thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yang na gang zhig rtag
230a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med/ / ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag gis ni srid sgru ba la bshad de// phan tshun ltos phyir rigs pa dang ni rigs bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun
230a5(rgyud 'bum): ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/ / phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag kyang bya ba yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang ma
230a6(rgyud 'bum): dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/ / gzugs dang reg bya sgra dang dri dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min// rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rab byung ba las min zhing me dang 'dren mas min/
230a7(rgyud 'bum): sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin la sogs par 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min// rkang dang rus pa chu ba sha dang khu khrag tshal bu pags pa rdul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang
230b1(rgyud 'bum): srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro/ / der ni lus len slar yang srid pa gzhan du de yang rnam ga tsam pa de nyid de// 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams// ga la
230b2(rgyud 'bum): te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig tsam du/ / de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir// gang zhig 'di yi ma rig glo bur ba ste ldan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig min// sngon du rnam rig rnam par dag pa lhan skyes/
230b3(rgyud 'bum): bems po yang ni rig pa rnam dag 'gyur// bems po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub// de yi rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la
230b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs 'gyur/ / bye brag par gyur yang na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs// gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te brgya la rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin// thog mar phra rab
230b5(rgyud 'bum): rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la/ / phra rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i srid pa rdul phran phung po min// rdul phran bral te nam mkha' gnas pa las gzhan
230b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min/ / gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur na de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur// 'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran pa
230b7(rgyud 'bum): rdul kyang / / sdud dang skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas// phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug/ de yi cha shas
231a1(rgyud 'bum): phra rab ma yis nam mkha'i khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub/ / dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran bcas che med tshad ma dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa min// cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs mimadze
231a2(rgyud 'bum): yang min la rdul phran phung po che med min/ / dngul chu zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la// rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gi nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam
231a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur min/ / phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min// rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grag/
231a4(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir dmus long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yin gyi bag chags min// gang zhig sgra rnams
231a5(rgyud 'bum): ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa min/ / sA nang bcas pa gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin// lce yi nang can ro mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce
231a6(rgyud 'bum): yis myong bar byed/ / rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yis// drag
231a7(rgyud 'bum): po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng gis kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas/ / rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur// skye ba med cing 'a#
231b1(rgyud 'bum): pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung / / 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu dang bdag
231b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga bu yi rgyal sras rnams/ / gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba
231b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang lAn rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid// rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong nam mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa'am rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin// gang
231b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin/ / gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas te// gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs
231b5(rgyud 'bum): la ma dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub chos sogs chos rnams dang / / byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs phung po gang zhig
231b6(rgyud 'bum): yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa/ / de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min// gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang
231b7(rgyud 'bum): ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro/ / phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug/ stong pa snang dang mun pa sa gsum gnas su rnam pa
232a1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa/ / snang bas rab tus dpa rab ring rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags min// 'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la
232a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po/ / klu grub rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing // nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub
232a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung // ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag gdub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chad 'thung zhing // kha T+wAM ga dang rus pa'i
232a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan cha chang snod cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no/ / slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun tu rgyug pa ster ba na bza' sngon po can// sha yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba
232a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rdo rje'o/ / gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsnun 'gyur// ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar
232a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi po nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed// sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur// mchog gi thuH
232a7(rgyud 'bum): rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'doms pa/ / gang gi mingags rnam rtog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min// de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshog
232b1(rgyud 'bum): sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni/ / log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur// skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs
232b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/ / de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// khro bo'i dbang po'i srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis
232b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur/ / gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba rnam bral de ni bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par
232b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bgos pa'i mgo bo yis// nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa la ster bar 'gro bar
232b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur// bdud kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhing // sems
232b6(rgyud 'bum): can ba slu phyir kha cig tu ni 'jigs pa min par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed/ / lha rnams sha yis dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed// sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha
232b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu yang bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jig byed ston par byed/ / long ba glag phyir 'jigs par dus kye ma lha'i 'jig byed dus ni me lha rab tu byung // bde byed kyis bsang lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis
233a1(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs par 'gyur/ / nya dang rus sbal phag rgod mi yi seng ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes// nya dang de bzhin ri dgas la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon par
233a2(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug gis mi bza'/ / sa gsum bla mas yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos ra ma na yi chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs
233a3(rgyud 'bum): su byas/ / 'jigs sde med pas skyabs sed bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings// kir mi ri yi sha yi ched du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing //
233a4(rgyud 'bum): lha dang klu yi dbang po rnams kyis dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos// lha bshos 'bras chan 'khur bzho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa'o thug sha khar rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams
233a5(rgyud 'bum): la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang / / sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la// khrus bcas sbrang rtsi mar gsar za zhing tsan dan
233a6(rgyud 'bum): me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod/ / gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min// srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal
233a7(rgyud 'bum): / bo zla ba seng ges spyad// mdung can ma dang dro pa ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min te khyo mo lnga// gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod nang gi chu yi gtsang sbra an+d+ra la sogs yul// sin d+hA'i yul na
233b1(rgyud 'bum): ba glang sha za kha ba chen skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams chad 'thung zhing / / glu re sogs na ma se d+hu sha mkha bar bar mi se ren rta glang sha/ de jing stag dang mi sha zal po kar yul na bong bu rnga mo khyi yi sha// bram
233b2(rgyud 'bum): ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po kar+N+Na ra yi yul/ / nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chang 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung // bu med rnams kyi
233b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jig par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i/ / khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i pa ri'i yul la sogs pa rnams// pa dag shi na ma dag bu yi chung
233b4(rgyud 'bum): mar bag ma len pa nges par go kha'i yul/ / rug mar spun zla'i tsha mo len la ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus// so ra me dang tsam pa la ka sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang ni tsha mo'ang yin// spun zla'i
233b5(rgyud 'bum): bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor chen po kar+N+Na ta la sogs par ro/ / ma yi tsha mo chung mar len la ma la yang ste khol mo len pa ra ra'i yul// bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la pa ru ku lan ta re go stan
233b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs ngan yul/ / skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed// gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rigs byed ngag dag bden pa min//
233b7(rgyud 'bum): sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i yul can phrug gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi dka' thub car gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis// mtho ris don du mi dang ba glang gas/
234a1(rgyud 'bum): cing b+ha gar dkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung // zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkhas pa rnams// ba glang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba b+ha ga mchog
234a2(rgyud 'bum): dkrugs rta yi pho rtags bcad pa la/ / khu ba khrag gis rnam par bgos pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis lhag par byed// de lha'i sha za'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed ngag gis gnyis skyes rnams
234a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi grub/ / nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i ngaN+Di mtho ris rnam par nyams// pha la sogs pa'i don du 'tshe ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod// dka' thub rnams ni 'tshe ba
234a4(rgyud 'bum): spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gong ma goms sogs yod/ / daN+DI dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur te de yang gang gi phyir// shes pas grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs
234a5(rgyud 'bum): dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro/ / lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te sha zos pa las nyes pa mi skyed na// bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshe sa dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu// khyad
234a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'/ / pa la gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams// 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig
234a7(rgyud 'bum): pabar gyur na sngon gyi rigs brgyud rnam par spangs/ / bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ras ngan song ngag tu rab tu skyed la lus bsregs nas// gnas dang gnas su rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing chang bu dag
234b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang ster byed su zhig ni/ / ma yin su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan zhugs pa// bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yi pha ma mchod par rig byed las grub na// blam
234b2(rgyud 'bum): ze la sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur/ / gang gi pha dag dag dang mi dge'i dbang gis yi dgas skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong // nges pa'i bu yis rab tu byin pa'i chang bu len
234b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed/ / tshangs pa la sogs gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'// sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi ba'i 'jigs skyed lha rnams ci yis zhi bar
234b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bos sems can dang bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni// sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag
234b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba/ / gang zhig yi dgas sa yi khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min// sa la sogs pa lha
234b6(rgyud 'bum): yi de nyid nye bar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min/ / tshangs gzugs sna tshogs nam mkha' tsam yang ser ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid de// yi dgas la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin
234b7(rgyud 'bum): yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman/ / sa dang chu dang me yi lus can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan// rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis gzung bya'i kha
235a1(rgyud 'bum): dog gzugs/ / dri ni sna yis gzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so// rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis//
235a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa min// mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang // gzhan dag
235a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rlung rnams ro yi dbang po gnyis/ / bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mo mar me med na yang // byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtshams su
235a4(rgyud 'bum): son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur/ / srin po dang ni yi dgas la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang // bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar
235a5(rgyud 'bum): na skar ma ma lus kyang / / bya rog srin bya ce spyang khyi rnam ma lus 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston// de bzhin lhag ma'i chang bus sgrub pa'i theb brang dag gis skyes bu rnams la yang // byol song rnams
235a6(rgyud 'bum): nigang du rang gi sems la bab pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha' la/ / de dag shes pa bram ze rnams la srid pa gang las mig gis gzung bya'i rgyu gzhan min// lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung
235a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed/ / bram ze shi nas yi dgas gyur pas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed// sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen
235b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / blo dang ldan pa'i spyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dgas spyod pa ltos// mun pa bsal ba sbyin par gyur la mun las khA ta de yi bshang ba las byung ba/ mya ngan med
235b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed skyed byed des na mes po khA ta mchod par 'os/ / ba glang rgyab dang ra yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud mad b+ha gar phyag byed cing // khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar
235b3(rgyud 'bum): dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa bldag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams/ / sgra med yi ge med las nam mkhar 'gyur te nam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las// rlung las me la me las chu yin chu las sa ste sa las
235b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams/ / zas dang chu dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag/ bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog
235b5(rgyud 'bum): chags phung po rab tu 'byung / / mo ga sham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra// nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa
235b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i rtags/ / rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po de rnams so// gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha' sa steng dag tu zhi ba'i grub mthar ldan// gang zhig
235b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi nus pa bA ga zhes bya rnam gsum lam ldan sgur mo 'jigs byed ma/ / de ni nam mkha' las 'das nam mkha'i dab phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings 'khyil ba can// nam mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i 'phreng ba
236a1(rgyud 'bum): mgo nas bshang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma/ / mchu 'phyang skar ma'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyed byed pa byed rnams kyi za byed ma// gsal dang mi gsal gcig ma rig
236a2(rgyud 'bum): las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma/ / rig ma'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang gis 'bigs// mi gsal bya rog rA yi gzhung la 'dir/
236a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rang gi yon tan rus sbal spu yis byas// nam mkha'i me tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhus gang dga'abigs pa de ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur// gal te skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen po byed dam
236a4(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka myur na/ / sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min// 'di ni thug pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med// sems
236a5(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur/ / gang zhig srin po yi dgas mkha' 'gro bdud kyi ris kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyis bsgrubs// /
236a6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan rnams kyis ni de rnams nges par 'bebs par byed pa ste// stag la sogs pa 'gyes la chu la me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon cha sogs kyis min// sngags
236a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis theb brang la sogs rnams kyis sa yi khor yug rtog par rje bo'i bya ba byed/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas bsgrubs nas// gang gis
236b1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i ngag gisang rnams sa yi stang du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster/ / skal ba ngan dang nad kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed// seng ge la
236b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur/ / byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs// dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig/
236b3(rgyud 'bum): pu b+ha gar dkrugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min// sha yang ma tshig
236b4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi grub pa yi dgas sa gzhir shing gcig las ni gzhan du min/ / bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis byang chub lha las gshegs ras chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la 'jug/ sha yi dam tshig can
236b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas lhas 'jug pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston// grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pa
236b6(rgyud 'bum): sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la ston byed/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ril min// grub pa rnams kyis ri dgas rigs bskyed ston
236b7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin/ / dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan// gang zhig drug po dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye
237a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ po stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston// rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khangs stengs las 'byung ba de rjes yA yi rgyal srid do// gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo lags par bzhag par gyur pas
237a2(rgyud 'bum): thar pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ / rgyal po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan
237a3(rgyud 'bum): du grub pa'i tshig ma yin/ / sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid pa gzhan du lha min rigs su skyes// sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rigs su 'di skye'o//
237a4(rgyud 'bum): mgo zlum dang ni lugs mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro// mgo zlum dang ni yug za mngon spyod byed pas slar yang sring gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro// sems can phan pa byas
237a5(rgyud 'bum): pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ / sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par nam mkha' tsam pos ston// sangs rgyas
237a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang 'jig byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams kyis bstan pa lha rten gang / / g.yul du zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jig par byed// de rnams
237a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs gzhig gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden par smra dang gtsang sbra rab tu 'jug/ gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten// khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i
237b1(rgyud 'bum): sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyir gung phyed yol dang / / srong dang thun gsum dag dang nyi ma ri la sha ra bar gyur nas lan lngar phyag byed cing // sa steng lha yul dag tu stag gzig mu stegs dag
237b2(rgyud 'bum): la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob/ / drag po'i g.yul ngor pha ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po ni// rgyal po 'thab mo yin pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed
237b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs mchod nas su/ / sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung brgyud 'chad par 'gyur// grub pa bya Di dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu
237b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya thod pa can/ / dge slong klu grub ces bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// slob dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang
237b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa rnams/ / gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye ma de lta dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod// dge bcu lam gyis grub par gyur pas 'phags pa'i lha dngal ba'i na bza' rta dpya
237b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pad+ma'i myu gu zhes// phang go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po in+d+ra b+ho d+hi dang // de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang
237b7(rgyud 'bum): mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrog byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs/ / sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yang yan lag drug/ de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan
238a1(rgyud 'bum): la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min/ / nyi ma gang du tshangs pa'i sa bo mnye bar 'jig par 'gyur ba des 'dus phyi mar// sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor kla klo dang ni mu stegs
238a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig par 'gyur/ / thung dang ring ba lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// a sogs ma ning dbyangs yi ge stobs bcu mnga' bas gsungs te nyi ma 'thab mo zad
238a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir ro/ / reng dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ka ni ring po phyugs dag tshig las 'gyur// de phyir ma ning yod la i ko ya na tsa ma byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod// thog ma'i lo nas nam mkha'
238a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dang gzhan yang zla btsin tsa na ya dbang phyug 'byung / / de yi bka' yis yi dgas dab bsgyur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan sgur mor byin brlabs pa// phyi nas sa steng son pa'i gnas dang zhang gi lha gang
238a5(rgyud 'bum): drug cu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi/ / mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jig par byed// der ni bco brgyad lo la brgya yis brgyal bsgyur bas ma kha la sogs 'phags pa'i yul// kla klo rnams kyi
238a6(rgyud 'bum): lha khang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de nga yis brlag par bya/ / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum tshogs skye dgu rnams ni der bzhag nas// bde la bkod de ka lA pa nas lha gnas dga'
238a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan mchog tu nyim 'gro bar bya/ / nam mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus su son pa'i lo yi tshang // srar yang skye bo rnams ni kle klor 'jug ste ji srid bco brgyad lo la bsgyur ba'i bar// yang nas yang
238b1(rgyud 'bum): dung yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid/ / ji srid sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams// phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lha nam mkha'as
238b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhir yi dgas bram ze ba glang sogs/ / sa 'og klu dang lha maMr rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mo dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams//
238b3(rgyud 'bum): sa dang chu dang ma dang rlung dang stong pa nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod// slob dpor mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod// sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro gso
238b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyospyo blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon/ / klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur// slar yang de la bsrung ba bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya//
238b5(rgyud 'bum): zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan la sogs mi gang mar gza' la me tog bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lag la// 'bras chen ser po bu
238b6(rgyud 'bum): ram sogs kyi gtor ma lA yi bla ma 'o thug sha khar gyis/ / pa wa sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de bskyon la// nyi mar slar yang phyogs su glang po rnams kyi gtor ma bya zhing 'khur ba
238b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras chan gyis/ / glang po na mchog rnams kyis ni dang rgyas pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzar// 'bru dang mar gsar 'o ma dUr ba mda' yi yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yon btung // sbyin sreg rjes la dung por gang ba'i zha ba'i
239a1(rgyud 'bum): chu lis d+ha da dgrang po khrus bya'o/ / yaM dgas la sogs gtor ma sran chan sha dang chang rnams ni namatshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur// srin po la sogs yungs kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams rtogs par
239a2(rgyud 'bum): phur bus gdab/ / slob dpon gyis ni srung ba lnga yi tshogs rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya// gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye dgu nyin dang mtshan bu'i dang rgyas 'gyur ba// thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i
239a3(rgyud 'bum): ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad+ma lnga yis bskor/ / gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa ngag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol du// gang zhig zur rnams dar dpyangs bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
239a4(rgyud 'bum): de las rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur/ / rgyal chen phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs mtshams rnams// de nang zlum po'i snam bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i 'phreng du
239a5(rgyud 'bum): / 'gyur// pad+ma'i gsar chal 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do// chu skyes 'dab mar srung 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa gsum par de// de ltar pad+ma gnyis la gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes
239a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma rnam gnyis der/ klu rnams zung gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar de bzhin lha dang lha min dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams// srung 'kho
239a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ni thams cad bsrung ba 'gyur te khrag dang gi'u wang la sogs rnams kyis bris/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyis srung ba lnga sogs ma lus srung 'khor gsungs// bud med bu 'dod pa
239b1(rgyud 'bum): las bu dang rgyal po dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/ / nang pa nang las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyeng 'gyur// skyes pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba sdom
239b2(rgyud 'bum): kyigyi bsod nams mthu yis so/ / bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bcu'i lam gyi mchod las nam mkha' sogs la min// bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung gyur dang gcer bu pa 'am ral pa can nam 'byug
239b3(rgyud 'bum): gu can/ / dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams// sum cu'i dam tshig can gyi mi yi dbang pos de rnams yul nas bskrad par bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang
239b4(rgyud 'bum): mi dge'i las byas drug cu'i cha shas rgyal po yin/ / yugs mo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pa spyad nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras ster mngal rtsod byed// gang du yul na bdud ris de yod mi bdag dpung bcas der ni rnam
239b5(rgyud 'bum): yang grub ma yin/ / rgyal po sa yi stang du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nams kyis// skal ba bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lnga yul sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin// sa steng ma lus mi
239b6(rgyud 'bum): yi rgyal po spyan las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po/ / bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur// skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang
239b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel/ / shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stobs nyid ye shes rdo 'o// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gal te
240a1(rgyud 'bum): @'khor bar byon pa ma yin na/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sus dang yul can lhan cig nam mkha'i khams rnams su// de ni brdzun gyi tshig las de bzhin bcom ldan
240a2(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i b+ha gar bzhugs zhes pa/ / 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems las gzhan du min// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams sa stang dmyal ba'i dmyal bas 'dir ni
240a3(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs kyi/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su gsal bar byas// tshangs pa la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa steng dag nas ltung bar 'gyur//
240a4(rgyud 'bum): srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin// byis pa rnams la rang rang mA yis brdzun tshig 'jam pos bdag nyid drung du 'khrid par byed// chang pa stong pa ston cing
240a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa long zhig bu zhes brjod/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag nyid drung du 'khrid// nam mkha' tsam zhig ston zhing bdag gi rigs kyi mya/
240a6(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'das pa long zhig bu zhes gsungs// sems can rnams kyis bsams pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzad// de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid ni thub pa'i bka' yi gas pa/
240a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags theg pa bden pa yin// gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub
240b1(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan to/ / mo gsham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams// srog ni nam mkha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas glog cing dgod// srog chags
240b2(rgyud 'bum): bya rog rwa min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor/ / srog chags gang zhig rdul phran phung po'i lus nis steng 'chi ba'i tshe na mi lhung med// rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang
240b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas sangs rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pas/ / rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas pa dang lha klu dri za lha min dang // khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig rnam
240b4(rgyud 'bum): dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams/ / de kun sha ma b+ha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas der ni nyi ma bdag gis bstan// dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig
240b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud rnams btul mdzad pa/ / de kun sham b+ha la yi dpal ldan ka lA pa yi skyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi// don chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rdzas dris// dpal
240b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs/ / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes
240b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba rdzogs so/ / // lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong gnyan chung dar ma grags kyis ba sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
241a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bub+hAs ma yo ga DA ki nI dza la saM ba ra nA ma suSh+ka ra ShAn+d+ha/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sbram bde ba'i mchog ces
241a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid ma/
241a3(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba
241a4(rgyud 'bum): min/ / dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid//
241a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// /
241a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to// DA ki nam mkhar 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du brtags pa ste/
241a7(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pa// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma/
241b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par btags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o// shaM zhes bya ba bde bar bshad//
241b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs
241b3(rgyud 'bum): brtan g.yo kun/ / kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje
241b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin nyid dang / / de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo 'chang // nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang // de dag gi yang rigs yin no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsu
241b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
241b6(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ / nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams
241b7(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog go/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de ni bdag
242a1(rgyud 'bum): gis brtag par bya/ / sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems// lha la dmiH/
242a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor
242a3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson no// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro//
242a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad
242a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad
242a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro
242a7(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya brtag pa ste dang po'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'
242b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam/
242b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// de bas bde ba nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po// 'di la khrus dang sdom mi
242b3(rgyud 'bum): dgos/ / dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub// de bas ci ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun za de bzhin thams cad sbyor// sprad pa ji ltar 'dod par
242b4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dag ni 'dug pa 'am// 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung // dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung // gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa 'am//
242b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad sgrub par byed pa na// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis//
242b6(rgyud 'bum): nyes padag tu yong mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de// phyag rgya'i cho ga dag gis ni// bsgrubs na kun tu 'thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di
242b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor ba// cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thams cad snga rogs phyag rgya'i
243a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// shin tu byin gyis brlabs na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'du
243a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun
243a3(rgyud 'bum): tu mchod byed na/ / de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang // bden pa
243a4(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ / mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// rnal 'byor
243a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ / bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par
243a6(rgyud 'bum): de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ / 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad// thams cad bdag
243a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid sbyor mchod dpal/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas// dpal ni bzhir #
243b1(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de mi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis// ltar ba ba/
243b2(rgyud 'bum): sterte byed cing // rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun tu myang byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par
243b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ras yan bde ba 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang tshe nang med bde mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/
243b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las
243b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje sems dpar kun tu sbyor ba brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o/ / / 'di na rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/
243b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpar sbyor
243b7(rgyud 'bum): ba yi/ / mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// so so rjes su rang grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun/
244a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun// so so rjes su rang grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad
244a2(rgyud 'bum): du/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam
244a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig spyod pas rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar// thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya
244a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bde ba che/ / rtag pa dam pa lha mo yis// rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang // thams cad lA mo 'dus pas ni// ma lus skal ba bzang po kun// bde
244a5(rgyud 'bum): ba so so rjes su 'grub/ / phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo bde ba chen mo kun// thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig sa
244a6(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyis ngo mthon du/ / phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun nas byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyi// thams cad
244a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mchod par byed/ / rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha mo gur gyi longs spyod la/
244b1(rgyud 'bum): ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis// rjes su sbyor ba mchod byed cing // rtag tu myang bar byed par/
244b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba des// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang tshe nad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen
244b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dka
244b4(rgyud 'bum): / phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyod na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// chos dbyings mnyam dang
244b5(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam pa/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pas// de las rgyal chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde cher nges/
244b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyis bde mos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa'i// dbang phyug kun gyi bde mos pa/
244b7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
245a1(rgyud 'bum): dpas de skad gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog las/ lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba mchog bzang po dpal
245a2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje ma tshig gi brnag pa ste gsum pa'o/ / / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
245a3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba// 'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang /
245a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par de spyod do// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa// gzungs dpas rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// sprul
245a5(rgyud 'bum): bzang bud med ci zhig smos/ / lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// skal ba bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin
245a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ / skal ba bzang po longs spyod kun// rang gis spyad par de spyod do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa// phrog nas nye bar
245a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod par byed/ / khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsol gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phrogs mas e bar spyod par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa
245b1(rgyud 'bum): dag/ kun nas phrogs nas de spyod na// longs spyod gzhan lA ci zhig spos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan// phrogs las grub dang dran las dga'// ngo mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de na
245b2(rgyud 'bum): dang la sbyin par byed/ / ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dang la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jugs la dbang
245b3(rgyud 'bum): chen gyi/ / mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yis mi sbyin ci yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang
245b4(rgyud 'bum): ni byed pa'ang yin/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na// las mchog dag ni rab 'byams dang // dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi
245b5(rgyud 'bum): za/ sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub chen po// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab grub pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas
245b6(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che/ / rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lar spyod pa mthun par 'gro// la lar dga' ldan lha ngag las// dam pa shin tu 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba
245b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag/ la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar ba
246a1(rgyud 'bum): ros su stegs rnams/ / chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod do// yu lar 'jig rten gsus rgyas bu// grub bdun gyi dbang phyug rjid// sa la rtogs pa thams cad 'arjod/
246a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang phyug bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag pa de mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pa dgyes shing rol// dngos chub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brdan
246a3(rgyud 'bum): padabang phyug chen po'i bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog
246a4(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs// lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams// brten par sems can dag la smin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/
246a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi don byed cing // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
246a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal ba bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste dpal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste bzhi pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das
246a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtogs pa'i cho ga thams cad pa//
246b1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni//
246b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas// sems can kun don rnam sprul na// myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re'am yang na zla re 'am// yang na de bzhin lo ra ni// ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // sangs
246b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ / khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang // de bzhin srog dang rtsa las 'byung // rang gi lha yi cha lugs su// bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dag gang bsten pa// sna tshogs
246b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ / slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der// mchod pa byas nas de bsgrub po// de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par mi
246b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i/ / gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhug sa//
246b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste// rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs
246b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ / 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di
247a1(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i
247a2(rgyud 'bum): dus su sngon byung ba/ / bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu ston pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid laskyo
247a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed// stong pa ma yin
247a4(rgyud 'bum): stong min/ / dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyi snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la//
247a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtogs pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yis// yang dag yon
247a6(rgyud 'bum): tan rgyas pa'i glus/ / dus gsum pa yis dam tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal
247a7(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzad/ / yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri meng mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsnun
247b1(rgyud 'bum): du yod pa'ang min/ / dngos grub mtha' yas mtha' med dab dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam
247b2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ / 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yis//
247b3(rgyud 'bum): bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'bang dam pa brnyas gyur kyang // khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos
247b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog dang ldan/ / mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam
247b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad grub par 'grub/
247b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sku ni blta bas mi ngoms pa// thams cad bdag
247b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid bstan nas kyang / / legs so zhes nas dngos grub ni// mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa
248a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog kun dang / / rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nas de yis sgrub pa dang // shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub dag/ gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad//
248a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sa gol gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar ba yi// thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab// dbang po gang dag gang lam gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// shin tu
248a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing // ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang // Sha k+Sha ba la sogs pa yis// ci nas yongs su ma skyo bar// rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya//
248a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa// rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad
248a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba// bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan cig glur blangs pas// kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal
248a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba// de bzhin
248a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun grub ste/ / de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par bkrol// dpal rnam par
248b1(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o/ / // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems
248b2(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad ni/ / shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur// shin tu gdug par khro ba yis// 'o dod 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas sems can de// bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas//
248b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur// blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad// phra men ma dang gnod byed gdon// bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid// shin tu gdug pa chen
248b4(rgyud 'bum): por gyur/ / gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing // sgrub pa po rnams la yang za// lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed// bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa'i
248b5(rgyud 'bum): drung du nye bar dong / / tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la yang skyabs su dong // tshangs dang 'jug sol lha rnams kyang // lha chan drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen yang //
248b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can la skyabs su song // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sa gol phyag rgyas na// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//
248b7(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings// rdo rjes gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings pa// sangs rgyas thams cad
249a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs gyur na/ / gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til
249a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bru bzhin du rgyas/ / shin tu gdug par gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten
249a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dag sreg byed na/ / sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// de nas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sA yi dbugs ring dro ba las//
249a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas thal bas rab tu 'jog/ sems dpa' sngon por 'bar
249a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dang / / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jigs pa
249a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // smin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas//
249a7(rgyud 'bum): gu lang dbang chen nya dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje mtshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/ rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sma ni gsil ba yis// thams cad
249b1(rgyud 'bum): phab nas slar yang ni/ / thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa// bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs// dug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus// rgyal po de ni
249b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag dang / / lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas
249b3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su/ / sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni
249b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sbyangs/ / dpal he ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba//
249b5(rgyud 'bum): de tsha sems can thams cad ni// log par lha la gnas par 'gyur// shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis// 'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam spang phyir//
249b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chos su gnas par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pas// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag/ 'di ni kun tu gzigs
249b7(rgyud 'bum): bas na/ / rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na// mchog sprin dam pa bcom ldan 'das//
250a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// sna tshogs pa mi 'dul bar spro// kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal// pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// pad+mo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro
250a2(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma bde mchog des/ / pad+mo gar dbang la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis
250a3(rgyud 'bum): dbugs phyung ba'o/ / // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad
250a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ shin tu gdug cing bskam par gyur// shin tu 'jungs par 'gyur ba yis// yi dgas rnams dang dmyal bar ltung // de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni// shin tu dbul por skyes par 'gyur// bkres dang /
250a5(rgyud 'bum): skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod par byed// shin tu gdug pa spungs pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur// nam mkha'i snying pos
250a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad phyogs/ / kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes
250a7(rgyud 'bum): rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni/ / rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du// rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi// nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed// 'jig rten gsum
250b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal la sogs kyi/ / rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rab tu bkrol// dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i
250b2(rgyud 'bum): dus na sngon byung ba/ / bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar 'gyur// shin tu brtson
250b3(rgyud 'bum): 'grus chung ba yis/ / mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur//
250b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'i// sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten
250b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu 'jig/ byi ba rkun po chom po yis// thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed// brid pa dang ni sgra dag dang // ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du// dag cha lnga yis brgal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten
250b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum las rgyal/ / skye 'gro gnas pa 'gro ba rnams// mtha' dag brtul nas 'grub par 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal sring rtag tu skyong // g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par
250b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / khro bo rnams la khro ba'i mchog/ zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag pos gnon// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug ngam pa rab mnan nas// lha mo b+hi mo phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod ra
251a1(rgyud 'bum): gir spyod/ / sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du// mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas// rug mi ni yang phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye
251a2(rgyud 'bum): dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas/ / lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas// dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas de
251a3(rgyud 'bum): tshe nye bar spyod/ / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rdo rje las mchog rnams gnod pa// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems
251a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rab tu gnas/ / thabs dang rtsal gyis grub pa yis// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par// rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' mtha'
251a5(rgyud 'bum): yas mchog/ drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel// lha yi/
251a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/ rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing // 'chi
251a7(rgyud 'bum): med byang chub dka' ba dag/ sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin// rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// sems can kun gyi don yang byed//
251b1(rgyud 'bum): / de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs// dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o//
251b2(rgyud 'bum): / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal//
251b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// gta
251b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde
251b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog bshad/ / dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rjes
251b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' snang ba bde/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras// dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres pa na// rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sel
251b7(rgyud 'bum): snyan rnam par 'phrul/ / me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub// yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam// skyed mos
252a1(rgyud 'bum): tshal la sogs par sgrub/ / der ni dang por gdun bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams
252a2(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de ni rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// stan de dag na thams cad la// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod// gru bzhi
252a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la sgo bzhi pa/ / rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs// sgo srungs dang ni ldan par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// bskul bzang rang gi phyag rgyas
252a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan/ / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// rdo rje'i
252a5(rgyud 'bum): chudang rdo rjer bcas/ / mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste// pad+mo'i snod kyi nang du gzhag/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
252a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad//
252a7(rgyud 'bum): / dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// ra sa ya na kun slong ba// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses// zhi ba'i
252b1(rgyud 'bum): btung ba bzhin myangs na/ / rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas
252b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun//
252b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// 'dis ni bsrung ba byas pas dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro bde mchog gis//
252b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos bzang bgos dang ni// me tog 'phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi skal
252b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang pos/ / slong bas dal gyi dal gyis su// gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun
252b6(rgyud 'bum): las grol 'gyur zhing / / bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan// brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde
252b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag
253a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag nyid kyi glur blangs na/ / shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i// shi ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na// yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa// rnam par
253a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das pas mdzes par byas/ / sna tshogs 'brang ba rab tu 'grub// 'jig rten gsum ni rab sgrub pa// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// 'jig rten gsum la
253a3(rgyud 'bum): / sgyid sbyin pa// 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// a ra li ni kun 'grub 'gyur//
253a4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun dang bde mos pa// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
253a5(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog 'byung / / lan cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// brten zhing grub pa slong byed pa// sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du// gan+d+har ba dang sha dang bil// glu
253a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs sna tshogs glus sgrub bo/ / de nas de nyid dam pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid la// glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga'
253a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i pad+mo rnam dag pa'i/ / mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas nas// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde
253b1(rgyud 'bum): pa shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa/ / rang gi dam tshig skyon med dag la rol cig rol cig ho// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog
253b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams so/ / 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
253b3(rgyud 'bum): ho/ kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrub la ston// dzaHhUM baM hoHe ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs// rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la hoHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
253b4(rgyud 'bum): kyimakha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis/ / slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol// glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas// kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par
253b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / glu 'di dag ni len pa na// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// ma lus lus pa med par snang // rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sem
253b6(rgyud 'bum): can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// te na te te hUM/ rnam mang rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis
253b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUMHhUM hUM/ rnam pa mang po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sem
254a1(rgyud 'bum): can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa mang po
254a2(rgyud 'bum): srog gi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM shi Sh+ya b+hi Sha hUM/ de la sogs te
254a3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi glu yi rgyu// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa'
254a4(rgyud 'bum): la ni gnas/ / grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi/
254a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa/ rab 'byams tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// kun gyi bdag nyid ma rod par byed//
254a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// stong pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med
254a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag kyang bsgrubs nas ni/ / rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang // 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas// sngon
254b1(rgyud 'bum): me rol me'i sil snyan gar/ / rnam par 'phrul pas 'grub par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa'i bde mos pas// bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing /
254b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// rnam pa kun tu skal bzang po'i// bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed// sangs
254b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba rnams// dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'o mnyam sbyor
254b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdo rje sems
254b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i bdag nyid du/ / de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// dngos grub
254b6(rgyud 'bum): ma lus lus med 'grub/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar// rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas yang
254b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag rab gsang bas/ / bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gor gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
255a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam par grub par mdzod/ / oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams
255a2(rgyud 'bum): cad grub par mdzod/ / glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i// rab 'byams las la'ang sbyar du rung // gang dag grub par ma gyur dang / mchod pa dag
255a3(rgyud 'bum): nimi 'byor pa/ / phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni// me tog la sogs mchor byas nas// slob ma thams
255a4(rgyud 'bum): cad gzung bar bya/ / dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par// snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyod nas// de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi// ras kyis g.yogs te gzud par bya// dngos grub ji ltar 'thob 'dod par/
255a5(rgyud 'bum): slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la lhung ba ni// lha de de la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon gyi mchog ni blang bar bya// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas//
255a6(rgyud 'bum): lta bar ni dbang bskur ro// dmar chen po dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba'i rnams// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la// g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan//
255a7(rgyud 'bum): srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses// zhi ba btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang // rgyas kyi
255b1(rgyud 'bum): thebs shing mi rmongs te/ / de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mna' ni bsgag byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'thun pa yis// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par
255b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang // de bzhin
255b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor grub pa po/ / de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying las khrag chen 'thungs pa bzhin// sems can khams ni ma lus don// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag
255b4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du bsgrub par bya/ / bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// de ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/
