255b5(rgyud 'bum): cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dga' ba'o// grub pa gcig pu gcig la sdod// lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub
255b6(rgyud 'bum): bla med yin/ / yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu rten// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to//
255b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas// ji ltar tshul bzhin gar byed par// slob ma rnams la bde bar sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyin cad// phyag rgya'i ye shes
256a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes bzung nas/ / rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid grub// de nas ro dang zas dang gnas// klu dang sil snyan la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnam
256a2(rgyud 'bum): la dbul/ / rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus mchod// 'dod don 'bras bu phun tshogs 'grub// de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ji lta'i tshul
256a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'jug pa yis/ / bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing // rtog pa kun rab sbyor ba yi// ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs
256a4(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sbyor ba dang / / 'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
256a5(rgyud 'bum): / thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// grol ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs sgrubs pa'i rgyas// phyag rgya ji bzhin rjes mthun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya//
256a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pa// ma lus pad+mo
256a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam sbyang phyir/ / skal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba// pad+mo sgyu ma 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// nor gyi mchog gis rnam sbyang phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po che// rdo rje nyi ma
256b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'byung 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// drag shul sbyor ba sbyang ba'i phyir// rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa// rta mchog rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin brlabs
256b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i phyir/ / gzugs brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltar rnam par spyod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro
256b3(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma bde mchog 'grub/ / kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur/
256b4(rgyud 'bum): rokun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par 'phrul pa ston// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas
256b5(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa grub par byed/ / sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pas// khams gsum dag ni ma lus
256b6(rgyud 'bum): par/ / dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// pad+mo sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed// khams gsum pa
256b7(rgyud 'bum): yi rgyal srid che/ / 'jal dum g.yul 'gying grub pa dag/ rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul bas// bya ba thams cad ston par byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// bdag rtul phod pas mnan nas
257a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms par// nga yi gar gyis ston par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha'
257a2(rgyud 'bum): klas pa'i/ / sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa// sna tshogs kyis ni rnam par rol//
257a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis// 'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can khams ni rab tu sgrub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings
257a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i
257a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas/ / thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro
257a6(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor brtag pa ste drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshar bya ba// rdo rje sems
257a7(rgyud 'bum): dpe' dpal gyi lha/ / rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rjes su sgrub// dben pa yi ni gnas ngag sam/
257b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi skye mos tshul sogs par// kun tusna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa'i rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// chen dang dgon pa gtsug
257b2(rgyud 'bum): lag khang / / ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dgos pa bsgrub par bya// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
257b3(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa dag/ rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur// pad+mo'i skyed mos tshal dga' dang // chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i
257b4(rgyud 'bum): pho brang dga' ba dang / / rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis// rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya// mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/
257b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal khams gzhan las grub par ru// rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab
257b6(rgyud 'bum): tu sgrub/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+mo dmar// phyag ni rdo rje sna tshogs la// 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar// rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser// kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa/ bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams/
257b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu sgrub pa dpal// rnga mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis
258a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams brtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thig btab
258a2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab can/ / phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub cing // shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// dkyil 'khor yang dag ci 'dra bar// rab tu brtag par su zhig rus// rang gi lha yi
258a3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis/ / dkyil 'khor rtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang // nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur//
258a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun tu sna tshogs 'grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin//
258a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo'i dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs// rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs// ji ltar 'dod pa ci'i 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas par dpal// rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'i'o// dkyil
258a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing / / dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo// srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang //
258a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni mi gtang ste// slob dpon skal bzang yong mi gtang // kun su sna tshogs skal bzang por// bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang // bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa// dam tshig la sdang skal
258b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ngan/ / srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na// shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das// rtog pa thams cad bsgrubs pa'i phyir// skal bzang
258b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje dpal/ / stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas// rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // log par lha dang ldan pas na// skal
258b3(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'jig rten mu stegs na/ / dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir// skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun// rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pa//
258b4(rgyud 'bum): rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang // bdag med yongs su 'dzin med pas// thug pa thams cad skal ba ngan// bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon skal ba bzang // lha ngan dam tshig la sdang
258b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ slob ma thams cad skal ba ngan// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi slob
258b6(rgyud 'bum): dpon la gnas pas/ / 'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyid du gsang brjod pas// kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri//
258b7(rgyud 'bum): skal ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes// 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na// ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes te// g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par
259a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas// de bzhin shin tu yon 'bul te// gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog 'grub bo// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yon
259a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog dag ni dbul bar nges/ / gang la yongs su gtang dka' gang // de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin tu khyad par can// de dang de ni bla ma la// de nyid mi zad 'dod
259a3(rgyud 'bum): pas dbul/ / yang na de ni 'dod 'gyur ba'am// 'on te sems la dgos pa dag/ de sbyin yang na dgos pa bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// de la gal te mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na// /
259a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na// de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis slu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon//
259a5(rgyud 'bum): mchen dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis smra ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi// 'on te mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang // shin tu dkar po'i ras zung dang // de
259a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad+mo can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyun gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no//
259a7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu brgyan pa'i rta ngag dang // glang po shin tu brgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen gang ba dag/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te/
259b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam
259b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni// kun gyi slob dpon
259b3(rgyud 'bum): kun la bya/ / rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyun gyis smras// sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbang bskur bas
259b4(rgyud 'bum): slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro/ / sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo
259b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la// rang gi dbang bskur bsdus po'o// blugs pa dang ni byas pa 'am// brdungs pa'am yang na bris pa'ang rung // sna tshogs rab
259b6(rgyud 'bum): tu legs pa yi/ / mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog
259b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du/ / skal ldan de bzhin skal ba bzang // thod pa dang ne kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+mo rgya gram dpag mod tshe'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// lha mo tshogs/
260a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mnga' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor le'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shU la phyag rgya'i mchog/ dpag
260a2(rgyud 'bum): bsam shing dang lcug ma dang / / pad+mo rta mgrin 'phang mthong ba// rta mgrin ljang khu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// rin chen sna tshogs snod tshon du// sangs rgyas gzugs
260a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ra sa ya/ / thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// gling bu dang ni pi wang kun// ku mu da dang mu ra dza// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri
260a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams de bzhin no/ / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// nam mkha'i
260a5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi skabs na dpal/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni 'khar
260a6(rgyud 'bum): gsil dang / / dam pa'i chos ni glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang / cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dani rin chen sdong // mtshan ma'i phyag
260a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ / de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang // rdo rje ser ba'i sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'bar ba kha T+wAM ga/ thod pa kham
260b1(rgyud 'bum): por de bzhin no/ / dmar chen dang ni snying rje dang // sha chen dang ni de bzhin te// rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chang dang chu dang de bzhin te// lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin me
260b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa thams cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o// pad+mo sna tshogs dmar po dang // ljang khu de bzhin
260b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po dang / / mthing kha ser po le brgan dag/ pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun// pad+mo spyang po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // gsal shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad+mo mtshan ma'i
260b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs gzhar no/ / gzhu dang mnga' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur ba tir dang rgyal mtshan dag/ mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang // rdo rje rgya gram
260b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brtan g.yo ma lus kun// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam
260b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o/ / de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las//
260b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan dag bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa
261a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ / lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u rlung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum
261a2(rgyud 'bum): du bya/ sri zhur bcas pa'i steg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'jim
261a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas/ / skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal
261a4(rgyud 'bum): / nas/ las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//
261a5(rgyud 'bum): smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas bgang na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur// thal mo pad+mo kha bus bzhin// rang gi sbyor ldan snying khar
261a6(rgyud 'bum): bcing / / mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin// rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus pa'i yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bskal te phyag bya ba// snying kha kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o//
261a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas nas// khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na// mthu bsnyems gzhan lta ci zhig smos// phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// gar gyi rgyun rnams
261b1(rgyud 'bum): ji snyed dang / / de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// rang gi don rnams grub par byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ji ltar tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i gar rnam
261b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyis/ / mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcang // g.yas pa ba dan gsum par
261b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi// dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa//
261b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yis// sbyor ba de nyid bteg nas su// 'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya//
261b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar byas de nas phab nas su// skal bzang hUM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba la so skal
261b6(rgyud 'bum): ba bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// de bzhin g.yon du bsgyur bar bya// de ni
261b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas bteg nas su/ / spyi bo'o mtshams su gzhag par bya// skal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba// sangs rgyas kyi ni mchod pa'o//
262a1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod cha lugs gar byed pas//
262a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing // skal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo ste mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon
262a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dag gis/ / mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon
262a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dag gis/ / mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i
262a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang // me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba'ang 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yis
262a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang / dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang
262a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur/ / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing // spel bar yang
262b1(rgyud 'bum): ni ma gyur pa'i/ / rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug de chen dang // dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mchod
262b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rab 'byams grub pa rnams/ / ma lus lus med 'grub chen dpal// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las//
262b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal ba bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// kun tu sna
262b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mchog rnams kyi/ / phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag
262b5(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhugs/ / bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po
262b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che//
262b7(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa// lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid ngag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug
263a1(rgyud 'bum): gi nor bu can/ / kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mjed la sogs re 'grub bo// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang
263a2(rgyud 'bum): po mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs pas bslangs nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni//
263a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog
263a4(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo //
263a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // pad+mo'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar// phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde
263a6(rgyud 'bum): bar reg pa'i dbang phyug pas/ / dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+mo sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par rab tu gnas//
263a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas pad+mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang dgos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin// khyab dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par
263b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / bdag la 'khrung pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod ba kun la dbang // rdo rje sems dpa'
263b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'grub/ / mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mnga' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas//
263b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'
263b4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'grub/ / mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ra la kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga bzung ste/
263b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// pad bcas rdo rje rgya gram mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/
263b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por 'grub// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems
263b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ / dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan tshe dang gzhon 'grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog
264a1(rgyud 'bum): tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba sal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
264a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams
264a3(rgyud 'bum): ca bdag nyid 'bab 'grub 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun pa'i// dpal rdzogs
264a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen gar dag gis/ / mnga' bzhi yongs su 'phangs na ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// tshangs pa chen po mgo dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa 'deg cing phab pa dang // gshibs
264a5(rgyud 'bum): te mchongs pa'i stabs dag gis/ / 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod nas ni// khams gsum ngag las mchongs par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / phrogs
264a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gi khyad par du/ / sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas// bdag la 'khyud
264a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya yis/ / bud med thams cad rtse nga nas ni// dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// myang ba btungs pa ltar byas pas// drag po dbang po nye dbang
264b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum dag skams par byed// dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje
264b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs bcas pa'i/ / khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen par lta ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i//
264b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje can nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// thal bar
264b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ / dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// tshangs dang nye dbang drag por
264b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed ces bya'i phyag rgya'o// pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// las rnams grub par rab 'byams
264b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// rims dang
264b7(rgyud 'bum): gdon dang dug zhen pa'i/ / sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs
265a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gar byed pa/ / gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje rdza rdzas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa
265a2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ mchod pa thams cad byas na ni// rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byang // 'phra mon gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'i
265a3(rgyud 'bum): gar rnams sna tshogs kyis/ / skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi rdza gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/ skang cig tsam gyis 'tsho
265a4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams// nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs na dpal/
265a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// rab tu grub
265a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i glu rnams kyis/ / bla med pa yi dngos grub pathob// de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi gru// las rnams thams cad rab grub cing // srid pa shin tu sgrub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen
265a7(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang dpal khyod la yang bdag la bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ / kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna
265b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ / a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHkye bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul/
265b2(rgyud 'bum): / hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol/ a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas
265b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'
265b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs/ / thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir//
265b5(rgyud 'bum): dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung
265b6(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis/ / g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi// sor mo kun la reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin// byang chub sems chen
265b7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dang / / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub
266a1(rgyud 'bum): sems chen bskyed pa dang / / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun tu mchod
266a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog/ mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas
266a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis/ / g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas na// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur
266a4(rgyud 'bum): bcangs nas su/ / lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni// sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgapa// dpa' be blod pa'i
266a5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rnams/ / ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// pad+mo'i bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen
266a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang / / lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/
266a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par
266b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad 'gug par rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal grub can gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon
266b2(rgyud 'bum): pas bkab na ni/ / snang ba thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun blod pa// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i 'o// bzhi
266b3(rgyud 'bum): pa mi zad snod yin no/ / sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzang gzugs ma yin// sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no// gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag
266b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs
266b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa dag/ sha rdza'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba ta yi glu blang ngo // 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yis// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa/
266b6(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul mdzod ho// dpal
266b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba a la la la ho/ / di ring nyid du grub par mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba
267a1(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za/ / de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang // rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes
267a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phar
267a3(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur te/ / shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po
267a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba can/ / 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang // gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste// 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos
267a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang glugs pa chen/ / sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gdug gtum po yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir//
267a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyu la srid thams cad rab sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rdo rje ga
267a7(rgyud 'bum): rje rdo rjer bcas/ / dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs bcas
267b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzos nas/ / thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten byas// lag pa
267b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon na thod pa thogs/ / g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas// nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' las
267b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byin/ / phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te// bdag gi spyod par de spyod do// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi bzang tshog
267b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas/ / lus pa med par de za'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i
267b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / bde bar 'bar ba'i gar byed pas// skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brla bsdams na// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas
267b6(rgyud 'bum): bslang nas su/ / gar dag byed cing de za'o// de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas// legs par bsdams te phyir btags nas// rab tu bkram ste btung bar byas// sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni//
267b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas brla phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyis// bud med kun la de spyod do// bde ba reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
268a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa
268a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas// shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i
268a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me gdong grub pa yis// khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba
268a4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba byin// mngon par gtor zhing se gol rdog// dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du lta zhing lag pas drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa
268a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las 'gal// de bzhin gzhan las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gi
268a6(rgyud 'bum): gar byed dang / / de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs par sred pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin tu rmod
268a7(rgyud 'bum): byed ma'o/ / de bzhin bzhi pa 'degs byed ma'o// lnga pa gar byed pa yi rgya// drug pa gsod ma'i yin par bshad// bdun pa za ba mo yi rgya// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi//
268b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong // gar dag byed cing byes na ni// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal
268b2(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ / de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyal thob
268b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ rnam pa sna tshogs po byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol ba// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas bta ba rmongs byas mnabs su
268b4(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / bde mchog ngo mtshar bde ba zhugs// hUM a la la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa
268b5(rgyud 'bum): ngag bsnams su gsol/ / nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par
268b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas/
268b7(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas tshe ni rin chen sbas// gos dang sna tshegs
269a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas// pad+mo'i
269a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas/ / phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// pad+mo sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad//
269a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o// skal ba bzang po dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// skyil mo krung ni phye mar gnas// rgyal po'i skyil ro/
269a4(rgyud 'bum): krung bcas na// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dmar po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dre/
269a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshul// pad+ma 'dab mkha 'byed pa'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo sngon po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya// bsnyems pa'i lag
269a6(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon pa yis/ / pad+mo dkar po ci bder bzung // 'khor le'o phyag rgya bcings nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsgor// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo mthing kha ci bder bzung // g.yas
269a7(rgyud 'bum): pas rab tu gar byed pa/ / dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo ser po ci bder bzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// bsnyems
269b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ / pad+mo le brgan mchog bzung ste// rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i bcing bar bya// rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin
269b2(rgyud 'bum): no/ / rgya chen ma yis 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan// pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad+mo'i rgyal ba'i rig pa'i lha mo rnams so// de
269b3(rgyud 'bum): nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ / pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin//
269b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// kye sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la la ho/ kye gar dbang thar dga' dga'
269b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags oM la la la ho// pad+mo sgyu ma sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa//
269b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad da dung rnam par sbyong // pad+mo 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/
269b7(rgyud 'bum): glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs pad+mo mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// rnal
270a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// ror mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// dpal ldan nyim phyag rgyar gnas// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad
270a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs/ / re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha' las 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab
270a3(rgyud 'bum): thabs kyi nyi ma ni/ / dam pa'i don du drag por 'gyur// drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos
270a4(rgyud 'bum): ston/ / rdo rje gzhu dang mnga' mchog dang // shin tu legs par 'gengs pa ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan// g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'degs// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas//
270a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcing
270a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan mchog
270a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan mchod pa che/ / ji lta'i tshul dag ston pa dag/ rang gi don rnams 'grub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad
270b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi nor ldan pa// 'jal du ma g.yul 'gyed rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs 'jal du ma rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan
270b2(rgyud 'bum): can/ / rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston// a la la la ho/ mi za da gter gyi dbang
270b3(rgyud 'bum): bskur khyad par bdag la sprul du gsol/ / khyad par rin chen 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir// rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin chen gcig pu mchog/ bud med rin chen dag pa dam pa'i ngo /
270b4(rgyud 'bum): du thams cad 'gro// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal
270b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo
270b6(rgyud 'bum): 'thodzin du/ / rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yon par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston// zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur// drag
270b7(rgyud 'bum): shul can la drag shul sbyor/ / zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis//
271a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan pad+mo sna tshogs 'dzin/ rdo rje bcas shing spong ba sgrub/ g.yas pa bdun gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shin tu lhung bar gyur pa yang // de ma thag tu kun bskur nas/
271a2(rgyud 'bum): ldang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// brkyang bskum pa yi tshul byas nas// khro bo'i
271a3(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung bcas te/ / 'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig/ dpal rdo rje khro bo gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i// rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni
271a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / myos byed stong pas lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston//
271a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas gnon// hi he he he he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab
271a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'o stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug non/ / sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu cher non// mnyam sbyor ru Ta ma Ta
271a7(rgyud 'bum): snying las dpa' mo drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa nom// sbyor chen tshangs las grol madrongs shig s+pha ra na// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnor pa'i stobs kyis
271b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thon dga' dbang non/ / mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' drongs a la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bskul ba'i phyir// sgrub zhugs a la la la ho/ oM suM b+ha ri suM b+hA hUM phaT phaT
271b2(rgyud 'bum): mdza' bo mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs rtog de dag med kyang bla/ / de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer// rgol ba la yang bya 'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa da kyang ba// de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin/
271b3(rgyud 'bum): pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya
271b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa'o/ / mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni// rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan// dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar ras// rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag
271b5(rgyud 'bum): tu/ khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya// dpal grub rdo rje'i spyan yin no// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/
271b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/
271b7(rgyud 'bum): mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o// spyi bo'i mtshams su rab bzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa// lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//
272a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// 'gru
272a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bdud la sogs pa za/ / de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub// gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed//
272a3(rgyud 'bum): ngal bso po ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs nas ni// mngag gzhug mar ni byed pa dang // gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba sprod// gnod sprin dag gi sde dpon du// 'dis ni myur du 'grub par
272a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub// mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi// pad+mo dri med rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni sdig rnams
272a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ / sdig pa byang nas rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan dpal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ mdzub
272a6(rgyud 'bum): mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste/ / mthe bong rdo rje g.yog pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// nam mkha'i thams cad rab 'grub ste// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha'
272a7(rgyud 'bum): las dngos rnams thams cad spyod/ / rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // mdzub mo rtse mnyam bkug pa ni// dpal mchog Na zhes grags pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis
272b1(rgyud 'bum): btab na ni/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha yis skal bzang smos ci dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i
272b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ / thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis nyi sangs rgyas thams cad dpal// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di
272b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad ma'am sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu
272b4(rgyud 'bum): ma bde mchog 'dis/ / mi 'grub 'byor par mi 'gyur ba'i// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// dam mig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs
272b5(rgyud 'bum): su ldan/ / bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa'i
272b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'grub/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skul ba bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma chags med// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med//
272b7(rgyud 'bum): bud med kun gyi sgra sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub//
273a1(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha me'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o// thams
273a2(rgyud 'bum): cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ / nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa'ang
273a3(rgyud 'bum): ma yin te/ / de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// dngos po med par
273a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag sbyor bas/ / nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pa
273a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du/ / gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos// shin tu gdug cing drag po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag par mos pa
273a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang // byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sem
273a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ / dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs
273b1(rgyud 'bum): skal ba bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // khyad par du ni 'phrog pa dang // yan lag kun tu byed pa yis// de ni nor rnams kun kyang phrogs// 'o byed 'khyung la sogs pa yis/
273b2(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so// thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba'ang mod la sos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// gnas gsum po ni ma lus par// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang
273b3(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / gar byas nas ni za bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/ thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya
273b4(rgyud 'bum): shes pa'o/ / lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing // bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/
273b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sgyur ba// rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa//
273b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas blangs nas ni// zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum//
273b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub// gsang bar lta la gnas na ni// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi bla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa kun tu kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed//
274a1(rgyud 'bum): steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing // rim gror bcas shing sdig pa'i mchog/ sdig pa'i lta bas gar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs
274a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khro la 'gyur//
274a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar lta zhing legs par gnas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/
274a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags myos pas g.yem spro ba// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jig
274a5(rgyud 'bum): lha/ / g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum ngag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang
274a6(rgyud 'bum): thar par byed/ / spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba// rta gdong ljang ser kha dog gsal// so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan na// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i
274a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan te// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyo ba// steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag
274b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya mchog 'di ni/ / khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen
274b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni re myong bzhi/ / ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya
274b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'di ni/ / thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tshe bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// zang zing lta ba rnam bsgyur bas// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi// khams gsum
274b4(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang 'tshe bar byed/ / bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par lta ba'i gar byas pas// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam
274b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba/ / lta ba rabazhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas// lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog
274b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni/ / khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum// lta ba gsal la bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// steng la sogs
274b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ro dang ldan/ / steg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// na mas+tha sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaHzhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na/
275a1(rgyud 'bum): las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par thams cad 'grug// rang byung rnams kyi mchod ba kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa/ lan/
275a2(rgyud 'bum): cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par ma gyur cing // spel ba dag tu ma gyur pa'i// dam pa rgya chen de dag med// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba a/
275a3(rgyud 'bum): sa d+ha ni swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/ su b+ha gA s+t+waM ma hA na de bi he re/ mi ri/ ri ti/
275a4(rgyud 'bum): niri shri yai swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs na// bud medas na lha ci zhig
275a5(rgyud 'bum): smos/ / trAM b+ha bi nA D+ha/ re ba/ tra Ta tra Ta/ re ba thams cad kun rdzogs pa// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// shrI badz+ra pad+ma ba Da ba mu kha yo gI shwa ra hi hiM hi hi he/ chos kyi phyag
275a6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa 'di/ / 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// skad kyi gsang ni mtho dman dang // gre sgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang // dus su rab zhi mchog rnams kyi// hUM la sogs pa'i glu
275a7(rgyud 'bum): blang zhing / / tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par// ji ltar spo bar gru kun gyis// hUM gi gru yi phyag rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o// lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog/ cha lugs bzhin du zhing // ka99
275b1(rgyud 'bum): shang ba la sogs/ / glu rnams thams cad rjes su blang // oM gyi klu yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar blangs// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sems can thams cad thar par byed// rdo rje drag po gang
275b2(rgyud 'bum): mo che/ mkhur ba'i dbugs kyis rlung 'byin cing // 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// ru lu ru lu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thar par byed cing gsod
275b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / shi ba mod la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drag tu bzhad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// Te zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// thams cad dag par rab bsgrubs pa'o// hi zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal

275b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud mangs rgyud stug dang / / sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas so// ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mchog tu
275b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ brdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang // bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ru r+tha maT+Ta/ sma rA ra
275b7(rgyud 'bum): Ta/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+ha/ tsak+ki hU~M dzaHkr-i ni d+hu ni hUM hUM/ tsakr-i d+hu dzaHhu lu tu lu/ a la la la ho/ shud+ha sid+d+ha/ da rI Sha ya sarba naT g+haM g+haM g+he/ Ta Ta g+he g+he k+te/ Ta g+he Ta ke ge ge ge/ Ta~M ta ke/ Ta ge/ bai To Na/ Tak+ki d+haM dzaH
276a1(rgyud 'bum): ta ga dz+nyAn/ krAd+b+har+N+Na/ a la la la to// rbad+ha mad+ha/ thul mo bdab pa brgyag s+ho// Thab+he/ Tashwe Sh+Ta/ DA kAnar+tha/ m+b+hab+h+yAM/ TAm+b+ham+b+ha T+Tab+h+yAM/ D+yan g+h+ri b+h+yo'o// A m+b+ha nA/ trA hAt+tha/ rAd+yA
276a2(rgyud 'bum): dz+ha d+haM d+haM/ dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o// de k+Sho k+ShA g+ho g+ho/ d+he badz+ra badz+ra rgyang / ke sa ka ka/ hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo ts+tshi d+d+ho hU~M b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hU~M d+d+ho/ d+ho/ g+h+ra~M hU~M k+Sho b+h+yo// Sh+T+r-iH no/ b+h+yo ga~M ko/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rje'i bya rdzu

276b1(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan gar byed pas/ / steg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang // rgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang // mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yi// nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sgrub// steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// sna tshogs phyag

276b5(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog/ re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis// rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar

276b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis// rgol ba dag dang gar byas te// de nas rgol bar ci rigs par// sangs rgyas thams
277a1(rgyud 'bum): cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ / de nas slar ni rgol ba yang // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur// rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du// pad+mo gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur// de nas slar du rgol ba yang //
