279b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// sor mi rtse mo kun sprad nas// mthe bong rdo rje mnan
280a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / snang dang mig phugs lta bu ste// pad+mo rin chen phyag rgya 'di// bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang /
280a2(rgyud 'bum): ni nga bral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun te// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar// dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni// 'gying ba'i mtha' nas dgrol
280a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs pa ltar/ byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// khams gsum dag ni rgyal srid che// 'khor les
280a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba rab tu 'grub/ / dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+mo nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor
280a5(rgyud 'bum): bu rin chen du/ / ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhi// yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su// dpral bar legs par bzhag nas ni// khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar
280a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi// mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdud par bcing // gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya
280a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas kyang / / khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na// rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rdo rje las kyi dpal
280b1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra/ / rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ma mo dang ni byang ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dngos grub thams cad dang // las rnams
280b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed par 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag mo rdo rje thal mo'i 'od//
280b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang
280b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo snyam ste phyi
280b5(rgyud 'bum): ral dgug/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// da pral bar myur du bzhag pa ni// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyal srid thams cad rab bsgrub pa// ma lus
280b6(rgyud 'bum): lus pa med par 'grub/ / dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ rta mchog rab tu 'grub par
280b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mo yin par bshad// sor mo thams cad bsdams pa ni// rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad/
281a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu// g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma 'di// rtse mo bcu la bsdam par bya// dga' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya thams
281a2(rgyud 'bum): cad rang byung ba/ / rab 'byams las rnams dngos grub ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can//
281a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po'i
281a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / de las gung mo lcags kyu ni// bdag gi snying khar sbyar bar bya// 'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum
281a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du
281a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang // sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na// dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byam
281a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje 'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing ba las// sbyor ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// de ma thag tu 'bebs
281b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// gung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni// rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod do// gung mo nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod
281b2(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / / dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te// mthe bo'i rtse mo de bzhin mnyam/
281b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// dag pa kun la rab tu gnas// byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab tu
281b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gru ba/ / dpal rdo rje'i rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i pad+mor byas pa las// gung mo bcings pa'i dbus na gnas// mthe'u rung mnyam pa'i rtse mo mde'u// rdo rje mda' ni yongs su 'phang /
281b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// tshangs pa nye dbang dga' byed bcas// mthu yis myur du brgyal byas nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs
281b6(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas/ / gung mo bcings pa'i phyi rol bzhag/ rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgya// ldang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya thams cad shes pa'o// A li ka li mnyam byas nas// mkha'
281b7(rgyud 'bum): yi thang kar bsdu bar bya/ / de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams// yi ge thams cad dgod par bya// gug skyed dag gi lcug mar bya// yi ge ra ni myu gur bya// klad kor zla ba khams pa dang // cho ga gnyis zla ba gnyis su
282a1(rgyud 'bum): byang/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad// yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i//
282a2(rgyud 'bum): bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor zhes// rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na//
282a3(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// chags chen grol ba dpal zhes pa'i// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// 'gro ba kun
282a4(rgyud 'bum): la rab tu gnas/ / snying rje dri med khro dpal zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'grub// pad+mo chags pa dpal dag ces
282a5(rgyud 'bum): chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ / sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// dag pa thams cad rnam par dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dpal mdangs zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las
282a6(rgyud 'bum): thar par 'gyur/ / longs spyod kun la rab tu gnas// rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub//
282a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams dag/ ma lus par ni myur du 'grub// lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas// de dang de yi mtshan dag ni// dpal gyi/
282b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig dang ldan par brjod// slob ma dkyil 'khor btsud nas kyang // yon gyi mchog dag blangs nas ri// rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis/
282b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas// de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa// phyag 'tshal bar ni ston pa
282b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / dpral bar reg par byed pa ni// phyag lan yin par shes par bya// smin ma bskul ba gang yin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda// g.yas pas nam mkhar 'gro ba 'grub// g.yon pa rnam
282b4(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba yi/ / rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yi// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o// rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda// g.yas g.yon gnyis ka
282b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / g.yon pa legs par blangs pa'i gru// g.yas pa legs par spras pa'o// sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong // g.yo
282b6(rgyud 'bum): pa bdag la dri slong ba'o/ / lce ni ldag pa ltar byed pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin// mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yi// bar du ma
282b7(rgyud 'bum): mchu mnan pa ni/ / g.yon pa bud med reg na bde// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin te// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// rtog pa thams cad
283a1(rgyud 'bum): sba ba'i mchog/ snying khar gyen du 'dren pa ni// rang byung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste// 'khor ba shin tu rjung pa'o// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// brda yi phyag
283a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyar gnas pa ste/ / dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yis// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil// rang gi dbang po sgreng ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis// sangs rgyas
283a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad thob par 'gyur/ / phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa slad du gtong ba'o// dpung pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yin/
283a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshur bcings dang dgrol ba dag/ g.yas
283a5(rgyud 'bum): ba rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin/ / g.yon pa mi rnams thong zhig pa'o// brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dod pa rab tu brtson// g.yas pa ros la
283a6(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa'o/ / pus mo lha nga'i brda dag kyang // g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa rab tu phyag 'tshal ba'o// pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/
283a7(rgyud 'bum): brda yi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// g.yas pa bcing ba'i phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dgrol// rkang pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa thams cad
283b1(rgyud 'bum): gnon par byed/ / g.yon pa thams cad rab tu 'joms// dngos grub las dang bde ba dang // 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// rang don las rnams rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//
283b2(rgyud 'bum): brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i brda// 'di ni phyag 'tshal ba zhes pa'o// pra ti oM d+hi b+hu zhes pa// phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o// sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo
283b3(rgyud 'bum): rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad// e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan// rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa// sdig pa kun las thar par
283b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// bde mchog e ma'o bde ba dang // sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag/ rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang // zab mo dang tshe 'phel ma// sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor
283b5(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / de bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal// 'dod pa'i lcug ma thams cad kyang // phyag rgya brda yi phyag rgya'o// rta dang rdo rje'i zhal dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje snang ba dang // thal bar rlog pa'i ro langs ma/
283b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi rnga yin me// gling bu dang ni rgyud rnams dang // de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang // stug po dang ni rdza rnga dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i mchod// de bzhin mar me'i
283b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / / spos kyi mchod pa kra rtsi dag/ longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i//
284a1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo kun gyi brda yin no// smin ma bskyod pa mnga' bzhi yin// b+ha ga ling ga e ma'o bde// thod pa pad+mo yin par bshad// kha T+wAM ga yang rgyal bar ra re// sangs rgyas phyag rgya pad+mor gnas/
284a2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// shi shi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad// dkyil 'khor la ri 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// lha rnams thams cad rogs pas na//
284a3(rgyud 'bum): skye bo dam pa kun tshogs pa// tshogs kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// de bzhin mdza' ba 'dus par gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/
284a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad// lha mo thams cad kur 'dus pas// thams cad sna tshogs skal ba bzang // rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun tu bdag sbyor bas// rnam pa kur mkhyen shes pa'i
284a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// lha mo thams cad 'dus pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog dag gis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba'o// de yi slob ma grub pa ni//
284a6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i rjes su grub pas na// sangs rgyas brda yi gsang ba yis// rgyal mtshan yin par rnam par bshad// de las gzhan pa'i slob pa kun// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ba'i rnams// sangs rgyas kur gyi brda dag gis//
284a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid mchog/ yin par rang byung rnams kyis gsungs// thod pa'i
284b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / / sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi// dpal gyi pad+me'i tshul du bshad// sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub gcig dang // de bzhin pad+mo'i rang bzhin gcig/ thams
284b2(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang bskur dbang bskur che/ / yin par don kun grub pas gsungs// yon gyi dam pa grub pa ni// nor gyi dbyig tu bshad pa ste// snying yang nor gyi mchog yin par// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar
284b3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / ga pur tsan dar dmar po dang // sbyar ba khrag chen yin par bshad// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa dpal// thams cad ldang ba'i ra sa yin// bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs// tsan dan
284b4(rgyud 'bum): dmar pos bskus pa dang / / bag phye'i zan las byas pa'i sha// rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o// de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgrags pa// dam tshig ces par gnas pa'o// bde mchog bde mchog
284b5(rgyud 'bum): ces gsungs pa/ / sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyis// phyag rgya'i bde ba mchog tu gsungs// de bzhin a ma'o bde ba dang // snang ba shes pa'ang rab tu gnas// shi shi srid pa'ang srid
284b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'da' bar bya ba'ang ma yin pas// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad// phyag rgya'ang sbyor ba yin par bshad// sbyor
284b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang phyag rgya yin par bshad/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad// nga ni sna tshogs dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag
285a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yis/ / sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad// de yi nye ba'i longs spyod ni// khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o// de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa bde mos
285a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs// sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad do// dri ni rab tu tshim par gsungs// ro ni ra sa ya na yin// reg pa bde ba yin par bshad// rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i bde// sangs//
285a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// chos ni sbyor ba yin par bshad// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// ji ltar bde bar sten byed cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyar ba// rang gi mdod pa'i dam tshig
285a4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rjes su sbyor bas pa ro na ni// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi// bde ba chen po yin par bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
285a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas
285a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dus pa'o/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o// dga' bar spyod pa grub par bshad// rjes su sbyor ba rjes su sgrub// skyes pa ltar byed dag
285a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa/ / slar yang rjes su sgrub par mdzad// lha mo kun la bde sdug pa// sbyor ba kun la mos pa ni// kun tu sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ ra sa ya na bde bar bshad// thams cad ldang ba kun 'gro ba// dngos
285b1(rgyud 'bum): grub dam par rab tu bshad/ / dngos grub chen po ldang ba cher// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po bla na med// sangs rgyas dam pa kun gyi mchog/
285b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen no// khrag ni me
285b3(rgyud 'bum): tog yin par bshad/ / mdangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad// sha chen dag ni mar me ste// thal mo dag ni spos su bshad// chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad// rab tu myos pa sbrang rtsi'o// bu ram rang
285b4(rgyud 'bum): ni myos byed gsungs/ / rgur chang dag ni bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi lam gyi yan lag brgyad// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// rgun dang sbrang rtsi mchog tu dpal// tshwa ni 'dod chags sra ba yin// skyur po'i
285b5(rgyud 'bum): khu ba g.yon can yin/ / kaM b+hi la ni bran mor bshad// tshur ba zla ba nya ba yin// sha ni sman gyi mchog yin te// dbang phyug dam pa kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad// dngos grub chen
285b6(rgyud 'bum): po kun gyi mchog/ chang ni ra sa ya nar bshad// zas ni tshe zhes bya bar bshad// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni// sha dang chang du ldan pa dag/ dga' ba'i longs spyod skal bzang po// tshe yi dam pa yin par
285b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / a 'bra rkun 'brum pa nas// na li ke ra a ru ka/ 'bras bu chen po'i khyad par dag/ bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yin par bshad// a mra smin par grol bar bshad// de bzhin bde bar nyal ba dang //
286a1(rgyud 'bum): bde bas rab tu rmongs pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// 'bras bu chen po pa nas// rgur 'bru'i khu ba khu ba'i mchog/ na le ge ra'i dngos grub che// dam chos 'bras bu
286a2(rgyud 'bum): a ru ka/ glu yi tshig tu brjod par bshad// dar drir dag ni sil snyan yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// gar ni rnam par rol par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// glu dang
286a3(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan gar byed pa/ / brda yi dam par bshad pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam sprul pa'o// rab tu zhi ba'i sil snyar glu// dur khrod glu dang sil snyan dang // gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// chags
286a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas glu dang sil snyan dang / / gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// mi yi dbang po'i sil snyan gru// gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i sil snyan glu// rang gi rtsal gyis gar byas pa// rta mcho
286a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sprul pa ni/ / brda yi dam par rab tu bshad// TI zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro yi// khams gsum 'dir ri rnam par brtags// nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag/ mkha' 'gro zhes ni rab tu grag+sa/
286a6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// thams cad nam mkhar 'gro ba ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni// a ra li zhes ming du btag/
286a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yang a ra li// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sgyu ma kun gyi gar byed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam
286b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rdo rje a ral zhes bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med/
286b2(rgyud 'bum): pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// de ni skal ba bzang por bshad// gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan// skal ba bzang po zhes brjod na// shin tu srid
286b3(rgyud 'bum): pa kun 'grub cing / / de ni dbang phyug chen po 'grub// Tak+ki 'dod pa yin par bshad// dga' ba ke le ki la yin// byams pa nu srin yin par bshad// 'dod pa'i dbang po dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje dril
286b4(rgyud 'bum): bu'i phyag rgya dag/ dam tshig gsum gyi dam pa yin// oM dang b+hu khaM kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// drangs te bcug nas bcings pa dang // zhugs nas dbang du gyur pa ni// dzaHhUM baM
286b5(rgyud 'bum): hoHbshad pa ste/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// e hi ye hi zhes bshad pa// tshur spyodan phan bzhud ces bsgrags pa'o// ti sA ha zhes gsungs pa ni// longs la drongs shig drongs shig pa'o//
286b6(rgyud 'bum): kha kha khA hi zo zhig pa'o// a pi zhes pa 'thung zhig pa'o// da ra dar byin zhes pa'o// ru ta ma ta rol cig pa'o// hu lu hu lu zhugs shig pa'o// a ra ra rar bskul cig pa'o// e ma'o bde mchog
286b7(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar ni/ / a la la la ho zhes bshad pa'o// bde mchog rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// e ma'o bde ba rmongs byed ma'o// snang ba zhes pa zab mo'o// hUM shi shi ni tshe 'phel ma'o// shin tu brtan dang rab tu
287a1(rgyud 'bum): brtan/ / kun tu brtan dang cher brtan pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // 'jig rten dbang dang mkha' las skyes// shes gyur dag bgyur grub par 'gyur// zhugs la dbang du 'gyur ba
287a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / aM aM a a kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa dang // de bzhin bde bar mkhyen pa ni// oM sarba bid ces bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya
287a3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA// 'khor ba'i dngos grub mkhyen pa dang // don dam nye bar zhi ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rang byung bcom ldan 'das// rnam snang mdzad chen ba
287a4(rgyud 'bum): bo ni/ / sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yid// skal ba bzang po zhes bshad pa'o// ko Ta la gag+na go Ta ba/ ko Ta ba/ ko Ta bash+tsa/ ka Ti ra ka/ ko la ga k+Sha/ ko la ba/ ko la ba shU/ ka la b+hasta thA/ phyag na rdo rje
287a5(rgyud 'bum): rang don gyi/ / mtshan 'di rnams ni gang brjod pa// de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// brar bzhin dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rgyal srid dang ni longs spyod dang // gter gyi rnams kyang lhag par ster// dgos pa thams
287a6(rgyud 'bum): cad byed par 'gyur/ / de bzhin dgra yang med par byed// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang // lce dang lus kyang de bzhin te// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag dang // ro dang reg yang bdag gi don// rdo rje mtshon ra be di dang //
287a7(rgyud 'bum): dgra bo dag tu rab grags pa// de yis phyag ra rdo rje 'gyur// lag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya// nyon mongs thams cad gang zad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni gang zad pa// phyag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i phyir// de ni yak+Sha yin par
287b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / he ru dpal ni rdo rje che// thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog yin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che// brda yis rab tu bshad pa yin// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'jigs// kha T+wAM ga ni rgyal mtshan che// thod pa kham
287b2(rgyud 'bum): phor pad+ma'i snod/ / khrag chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che// dkar mo rku byed rab rmongs dang // ro langs dang ni spos byed dang // gtum mo dang ni sme ma dang // lha mo bdun ni brda yin no// srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpa'/
287b3(rgyud 'bum): thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs// haM haM hri hUM kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin du// rol tu chu gcig gsod du chug/ ma ra Ta phaT phaT ces bshad pa// sarba
287b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyi brda yin te/ / rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang phyug dam pa'i rig pa ni// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// skal ba bzang po yin par bshad// rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten dbang
287b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug ces bshad de/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bde dag gis// de yang skal ba bzang zhes bshad// ngag dang grub dang de bzhin blo// rdzu 'phrul 'phel dang 'byor pa dang // rnam par lta dang sgrol ma dang // rgyal chen ma
287b6(rgyud 'bum): dang khro gnyer ma/ / pad+mor gnas zhes bya ba dang // rdo rje pad+mo'i dbang phyug pa// pad+mo lha mo rigs chen te// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyas bshad// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs
287b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / skal ba bzang zhes rnam par grags// rdo rje nyi mnor po che// traM/ ba ba/ Ta Ta/ traT traT kun tu grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te// dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan rtse mo
288a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod chen po/ / sku rtogs pad+mo thams cad can// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa// byang chub kun gyi sems chen po// sna tshogs rdo rje blan med// thams cad dag par mos pa yin/ 'ji
288a2(rgyud 'bum): rten thams cad rab 'jigs pa/ / rta mchog pad+mo dpal dang ldan// skal ba bzang zhes brda yis bstan// brda yi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor sbyor bas nges pa ni// grogs po mkhas par bcas
288a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rjes su chags par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed cing // dngos grub kun la rjes chags pa// mi 'gyur
288a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ / kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams ngag/ ma lus par ni myur du grub// rjes su chud par bya'o zhes// na lugs
288a5(rgyud 'bum): shes pa bzhin byed pas/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed// rjes su chud par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhir byed pas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/
288a6(rgyud 'bum): lus lus pa med par 'grub// rjes su sbyang bar bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// sgrib sbyang thams cad dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rjes su yi rang bya'o zhes//
288a7(rgyud 'bum): cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mchod pa'i las kun myur du 'grub// rjes su gzhom par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// rtul phod las
288b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad ni/ / ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dbyibs dang gzugs ni ci 'drar ldan// thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor
288b2(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// pra se na yi dngos grub mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad
288b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// yang dag bden pa tshul bzhin du// mthong ba dang ni thos par byed// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // khams rnams kun ni thams cad las// thams
288b4(rgyud 'bum): cad mthong zhing thos par byed/ / rnam par shes pa kun 'grub cing // kun tu thams cad kun gyi bdag/ 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // rnam par shes pa'i las kun la// thams cad mthong zhing shes par
288b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / pad+mor chags par rjes chags shing // sna tshogs pad+mor kha 'byed pas// pra se na ni sna tshogs pa// mthong ba dang ni thos par byed// me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ spos dang mchod pa thams cad la/
288b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par shes pa kun grub pa// thams cad gtong zhing thos par byed// reg dang ma reg rdo rje che// ral gri me long mda' gzhu dang // shing dang chu dang 'bab chu brag/ gzugs brnyan byung ba'i khyim dag las/
288b7(rgyud 'bum): bya dang de bzhin mi bya dang // stor ba dang ni ma stor dang // phrogs pa dang ni ma phrogs dang // de bzhin rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // gson pa dang ni shi ba dang // de bzhin rgyal dang pham pa dang // don yod dang ni don med dang /
289a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin grub dang mi grub dang // bde dang mi bde cho ga bzhin// lha yul dag gi don rnams dang // sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams kyang // kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bsams pa/
289a2(rgyud 'bum): mthong zhing thos par byed// rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas// dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang // ma mo gnas kyi
289a3(rgyud 'bum): thal ba mchog/ tham cad dpral ba'i srung ba ni// thig le sor ris gsum du bya// phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na// srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i srung ba'o// rdo rje
289a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ / ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i gzugs chu'i 'gram// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang // khrus bya ba dang 'bogs pa yis//
289a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings ra// srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas/
289a6(rgyud 'bum): mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni// nyungs kar bskyed nas blang bar bya// lo mnyungs mar zas su bza'// mgo bskus de bzhin 'bras bu yis// phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na// srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o//
289a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal don yod grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ma mchu so yis legs mnan nas// dpal ldan g.yon du 'gying dang bcas// gsal bar phyogs su 'khor lo'i tshul// bla 'og tu ni
289b1(rgyud 'bum): byir brlabs na/ / gnas gsum dag ni rgyas 'debs so// gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor 'grub// thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug byin gyis brlabs pa dpal skal ba
289b2(rgyud 'bum): bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// bde bar rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'dis btab ma thag tu ni// sangs

289b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas/ / phyogs su legs par 'khor lo'i tshul// bla dang 'og tu byin brlabs nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// khams gsum dag ni ma lus par// gzhug dka' bdag nyid nad pa
289b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// he ru dpal gyis rnam sprul pas// thams cad
289b7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu kun gyi bdag/ thams cad srung ba mi 'gyur che// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang // bdud dang ngan khrid thams cad ni// mod la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dpal
290a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje he ru ka dbab pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lnga'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan zhing // sna tshogs pad+mo kha 'byed pas// sgrib pa med
290a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'grub par 'gyur/ / sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// dag pa thams cad thob par 'gyur// dag pa thams cad rnam dag ra// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes
290a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i srung ba'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// 'bar ba lta ba'i tshul zhugs na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i me// rab tu 'jigs pa mi bzod 'gyur// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// bskal pa yi
290a4(rgyud 'bum): ni me ltar 'bar/ / 'di yis par 'gro rnam gsum dang // khams gsum dag kyang thal bar rlog/ rdo rje chen po'i me rab tu 'jigs pa 'bar ba mi bzod pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
290a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lta'i tshul bzhir byed pa yis// rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// gor bgo ba'i thabs su bya// spyi bo dang ni dpral bar gnyis// glo gnyis dang ni rgyab tu gnyis//
290a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'phreng ba bcing ba dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ dar bcings thabs su bcings nas ni// 'gying dang bcas par mtha' nas dgrol// dar sbyar ba yi thabs byas nas// thal mo brdabs pas/

290b1(rgyud 'bum): gdon rnams dang / / yan lags rungs byed pa kun// 'di yis bsrungs pa yongs mi tshugs// dpal rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// srung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// chos sems dpa' yi
290b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul ston cing / / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang // zhi ba'i lta bas bltas na ni// rims dang dug rnams thams cad sel// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur bcing // mdzub mo/
290b3(rgyud 'bum): bsnams pa'i rtse mos mnan// nad rnams thams cad zlog par byed// yongs su bsgyur te bte gnas ni// da pral bar bde bar gzhag par bya// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sdug bsngal thams cad
290b4(rgyud 'bum): sel bar byed/ / dpal rdo rje smin mtshams lus kyi nad gso ba'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas pa las// mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zug rngu kun las grol bar 'gyur//
290b5(rgyud 'bum): bu nad ldog rgal sman dag dang // dmu rdzings la sogs kun las thar// 'di nyid grub par gyur nas ni// nad rnams kun gyi gnod pa med// zug rngu thams cad med par byed pa'o// grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings
290b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'di yis mig gnyis phyis na ni// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis// long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bdag nyid sbyor bas ldan byas la// rdo rje khu tshur dam po yis// drang ba'i tshul du klad pa nas//
290b7(rgyud 'bum): kha phyogs drang zhing btung bar bya// rims dang dug dang gdon rnams kun// rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyis bzung // bdag gi lhar ni sbyor ldan pas// 'thungs na thams cad med par 'gyur// klad pa'i sman no//
291a1(rgyud 'bum): ta thA sa ta gar+b+ha swA si ho// 'di ni rnam par bzlas pa'i mchog/ zug rngu med cing myur du zar// drug rngu thams cad 'byin pa po// g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// sems dpa'i gtsug/
291a2(rgyud 'bum): tor bcings na ni// byis pa nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur// thams cad srungs shig bde ba 'thob// gzhon nu gso ba'o// g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// klu yi gdengs ka lta bur bya// 'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs
291a3(rgyud 'bum): bcas na/ / dug gi las rnams bsgrub par bya// 'bar dang 'dul dang bcings pa dang // ba ba'i dug rnams med par byed// gdug pas zin dang lu ta dang // shi ba sos par byed pa'i mchog/ gdungs pa'i
291a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi// gung mo la ni reg byas na// gdon rnams kun las thar par 'gyur// dug gso ba dang gdon gyi cho ga'o// ba dan
291a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum po gnyis bcings nA/ / gung mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing // mdzub mo mthe'u rung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings la// yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su// smin ma'i mtshams su
291a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa ni/ / mkha' 'gro'i las rnams ma lus par// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// gnas gsum po ni ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang /
291a7(rgyud 'bum): thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khro gnyer zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste ma mo shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// rta rnams thams cad zhon na ni// rta rnams nad med
291b1(rgyud 'bum): sos pa dang / / nyam sde thar zhing mgyogs par 'gyur// dpal na mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// glang po kun la zhon na ni// glang po thams cad nad med sos// nyam skyes
291b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan myos par 'gyur/ / shrI badz+ra satwa shA ma si ho// 'di ni ra bar bzlas pa'i mchog/ bya rnams nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur// mi yi skad du smra bar 'gyur// bya gso ba yi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa'adang
291b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas/ / 'byor pa kun la rjes chags na// shing rnams nad med mi bskams shing // rtag tu me tog 'bras bur ldan// shing rnams bskyed pa'i gtsug lag las// sbyor ba'i cho ga gang bshad pa//
291b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad ni// yid la bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// shing bskyed pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs dang // de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang //
291b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phangs nas slar du bzung ba dang // stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te// rang byung rnams kyi dgra na'i dpyad// phyag rgya lnga la rab tu gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis bshad// dam pa de dag bshad par
291b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang // kun tu sbyor dang 'dren mar myur// 'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba'o// rkang pa gshibs pas sa mnan cing // rkang pa 'gyed pas sa gnon to// dkyil
291b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dag kyang mnan par bya/ / brkyang bskum gyis kyang gnas gsum mnan// dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o// mi lhod pa dang sran gzugs dang // gnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang // rgya cher 'gengs/
292a1(rgyud 'bum): shing rnam par dag/ lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ 'di yis lus la gnod pa dang // rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams kyis// nams
292a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang tshugs par long mi 'gyur/ / rgya cher 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul du// bde thag can gyis gzhu bzung nas// g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing // mnga' 'phangs na ni 'grub par
292a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o// lag pa g.yon pa legs bsrang la// skyon med pa yi g.yas pa dgug/ gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/
292a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// rna drung bar du zlum por ni// ji ltar rig par legs bkang la// yi ge oM tsam rang gi khar// gzung na 'gro ba 'dzin par 'gyur// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o// ji ltar
292a5(rgyud 'bum): rigs pas drangs nas ni/ / cho ga bzhin du bzung nas kyang // der ni cung zad dbye bar bya// 'gengs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// chang pas 'bem ni bsgrib par bya/
292a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// lta ba chang pa la gtad nas// myur du 'phangs na dam pa 'grub// mda' gzus rgyal bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// gru bzhi pa la rno ba dang // de bzhin kun nas bskor
292a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / g.yas phyogs nas ni mnga' bskor nas// smad de de bzhin bstong pa dang // rkang pas mnan cing rmig pas mnan// 'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis// khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dag
292b1(rgyud 'bum): bde bar thub nas che bar spyod/ / dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o// rab tu 'phangs dang mnyam par 'a phangs// de bzhin glog ltar ba phangs pa dang // grog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin te// phyag rgya thabs rnam
292b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'o/ / thabs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// nyam nga lag dang bde phyogs dang // thang ka de bzhin gyen du 'debs// 'di dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum ngag ri bzlog par bya// nges par bzlog
292b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'debs// kun 'debs gyen du 'debs pa'i gar// 'di dag 'phrog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum dag kyang 'phrog par byed// 'phrog pa
292b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / kun tu kun nas thams cad kyi// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun// mda' gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag rgya'i mchog/ mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// dgra cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes
292b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni// mthe bong legs par gzhag par bya// de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub mo legs par dgug par ni// rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyi rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la
292b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// ma lus par ni myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la// bdag gi mthe bo'i nang du gzhug/ zhi ba'i las rnam/
292b7(rgyud 'bum): rab grub pas// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ro// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la// mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab brkyang nas// mkha' bgro'i las
293a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad ni/ / ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru k+Sha'i khu nur gyi phyag rgya'o// brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe bong dag la gung mo gzhag/ dpal ba 3/
293a2(rgyud 'bum): tshuru grub pa ste// thams cad dag pa'i las la sgyur// dpal pad+mo'i khu tshur ro// khu tshur rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rang don las rnams grub pa ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/
293a3(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcangs la// sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung // rtul phong las rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// las thams cad kyi phyag rgya
293a4(rgyud 'bum): shes pa'o/ / rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang // bskum nas bteg pa'i skabs ngag dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// gzugs rnams thams cad mnan par bya// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rnam par
293a5(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad dpal mar nanas/ / kun tu byang chub yongs bkug ste// bdag gi smad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thor du// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal mnan nas// kun tu grub pa yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par
293a6(rgyud 'bum): de spyod do/ / sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// spyan ras gzigs dbang dpal mdadangs// kun tu dpal mo yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo bzer du// rdo rje nyi ma dpa
293a7(rgyud 'bum): mnan nas/ / kun tu longs spyod yongs bkug ste// bdag gi smad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rta mchog dam pa dpal mnan nas// thams cad dbang phyug yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par
293b1(rgyud 'bum): de spyod do/ / byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang // grub dang gdugs dngas rnams dang // rig dang phyag rgya rnams mnan nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa mnan nas ni//
293b2(rgyud 'bum): mig gsum pa las gsum grub bkug/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo bathon du// mthu bo che yang mnan nas ni// snying las dpal mo yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig
293b3(rgyud 'bum): med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ / skye dgu'i bdag po mnan nas ni// mos las grol ba yongs bkug nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thor du// rab dga' dbang phyug mnan nas ni//
293b4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bdag las dga' ba bkug/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// 'jigs la sogs pa'i lha mo dang // ma mo byang ma'i ma mo dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnan nas ni// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// de bzhin ku me
293b5(rgyud 'bum): ral sogs/ / rig pa 'grub pa spyod pa dang // mi yi rgyal po la sogs kyang // mnan nas bdag gi spyad pa spyod// 'gro ba dang ni mi'i 'gro ba'i// dngos po thams cad ma lus pa'ang // rnal 'byor bdag nyid des mnan/
293b6(rgyud 'bum): nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// dpal rdo rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// khu tshur snying khar bcangs pa ni// bud med phyag rgyar de bshad do// bud med sbyor ba ma lus pa// lus pa med pa'ang thams cad 'grub/
293b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul byas nas// lag g.yas bdag gi snying khar ni// gyen du drang ba'i tshul byas na// bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'o// dpal ldan sna tshogs pad+mo 'dzin// g.yon pa rdeg pa'i
294a1(rgyud 'bum): @la tshur dang / / g.yas par ldang bar gyur pa dang // sangs rgyas dbang phyug ting 'dzir bya// sangs rgyas thams cad du 'bar ba'o// g.yon pa dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing // g.yas pa
294a2(rgyud 'bum): ni lag pa yis/ / rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor// sgyu ma thams cad 'byung bar bya// dpal rdo rje sgyu ma'i dbang phyug ma'o// g.yon pa g.yon pa'i brla la gzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis/
294a3(rgyud 'bum): mos pad+mo dam pa 'dzin// g.yas pa'i brla la lag par gzhag/ mi dge ba thams cad sel ba'i phyag rgya'o// bdag gi snying khar 'dren tshul du// g.yon pa nor bu rin chen 'dzin// g.yas pa re ba kur rdzogs pa'i
294a4(rgyud 'bum): bud med la sogs rin chen 'dzin/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bdag gi snying khar 'drer tshul du// pad+ma sna tshogs dam pa 'dzin// g.yas pa rdo rje 'gying ba yis// dbang phyug
294a5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa thob par 'gyur/ / dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// kun tu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o// / de nas kun tu sna tshogs 'di//
294a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya shes pa'ang grub pa ni// kun tu sna tshogs sbyor ba yis// kun tu sna tshogs bshad par bya// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// kha dang lus dang rkang lag gis// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas// phyag rgya
294a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su dgrol/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa ni// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// rab tu bde bar 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/
294b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// legs par byin gyis brlabs na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//
294b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// so so dag nas 'gru
294b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / blta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so legs so zhes grub pa'i// dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs
294b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba// ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod du// thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol// dang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab
294b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byams tshogs rnams kyis/ / thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa mdzad// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bcas// dpal ldan lag pa g.yas pa yi// pad+mo khu tshur dpral bar gzhag/ bdag gi
294b6(rgyud 'bum): mig ni gyen du lta/ / 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gyen du 'phar ba'i dngos grub dang // rab 'byams las rnams myur du 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/
294b7(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa dag ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/
295a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje pad+mo gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan zhes pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/
295a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dpag med tshe dang ldan// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// bden pa'i tshig ni rab tu smra// mtha' yas pa dang mu med pa'i// rtog pa kun dang 'di yi ni// mthu dang yon tan bsngags pa
295a3(rgyud 'bum): mtha'/ / brjod pa dag tu yongs mi nus// mthu dang rang bzhin dag gis grub// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu grub// so so rjes grub bde ba ster// 'di ni gsang mchog mchog gi mchog/ sems can don phyir las
295a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams sbyong ba dang / / rnam par dag par rgyal ba yong mi mdzad// 'di la bgegs med bdud kyang yod ma yin// rtog pas mi 'grub thar par yong mi nus// mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur// brtan
295a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i phyir yang nga mi 'doms/ / gang zhig rang gi bde bas nga sgrub na// dngos grub mchog gis nga ni brtan par byed// kun tu tshogs pa yis ni de skad gsungs// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
295a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rtag tu dgyes/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis legs gsungs la// mngon par bstod cing rab tu dgyes par gyur// le'u bcu pa'o// // rnam mang rjes chags
295a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag mchod pa dang / / rta mchog rnal 'byor de bas gsal bar rjes su mchod na ni// rab tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzang dga' ba'i mchog/ rab mchog bde ba'i
295b1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dam tshig bde bas rjes su grub par 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i
295b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog ces bya ba'i rtog pa/ / rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bskor ba chen po bde ba chen po rdzogs so// // / rgya gar skad du/ sarba kalpa sa muts+tsha
295b3(rgyud 'bum): yanA ma sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra ut+ta ro ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i
295b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ rnam rtog med pa'i sems la ni/
295b5(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid nges par gnas// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa//
295b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags chen po bde chen po// bde chen rdo rje chen po pas// rdo rje 'dzin dang lhan cig pa'i// bde gshegs mgon mchog rnams kyis bzhugs// thams cad mchog 'gyur 'dod chen gyis//
295b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rtog pa 'dus pas bka' stsal 'tshal// rnam par mi rtog chos bdag las// rtog pa'i don 'di gang la
296a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / ci yi slad du'ang chud phyim// dang po'i sa mchog ji ltar lags// gdong ma tha ma med nyid yang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin te// yig 'bru ji ltar gsungs pa/
296a2(rgyud 'bum): lags// sngags phyung ba yang ci 'dra ste// shin tu dga' dang bzang nyid de// rdo rje snying po gtso bo gtso// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin yang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin nyid rer
296a3(rgyud 'bum): po yang / / byang chub spyod pa rnams ji ltar// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yang // sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar lags// rdo rje gtum mothar byed dang // phyag na rdo rje yang ji ltar// dang po'i rigs bskyed
296a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar lags/ / 'dod pa'i thar pa rnam pa ci// mgon po rnam gsum ji ltar 'tshal// thams cad yang nyid ji ltar lags// ji ltar dang po snying po 'byung // nye ba'i snying po de ji ltar// bde ba chen po
296a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje che/ / don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor ji ltar gsungs par gyur// de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ste// thig gdab de bzhin rtog pa yi// dngos grub ji ltar bshad pa lags// gsang ba lnga dang de nyid
296a6(rgyud 'bum): chetshe/ gang lags ci 'dra de bzhin te// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnams dang ni// rigs rnams kyang ni ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang // de nyid tshogs kyi phyag mtshan yang // thams cad dgug
296a7(rgyud 'bum): dang mchod chen dang / rang gi byin rlabs sogs grub pa// de rnams de nyid gsang chen dang // dam pa dang ni don dam pa// dam pa'i yi ge grub don du// thams cad mi gsung 'ong ma lags// sangs rgyas tha/
296b1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// de kho na nyid thams cad nges tshig gi rtog pa ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi gtsu
296b2(rgyud 'bum): chen pos/ / the tsom kun gyi tshogs gnas nas// don dam 'dzin pa yang bka' stsal// de la ji ltar rtog pa'i don rgyud yin zhe na// rnam par mi rtog chos dag las// sems can don du yongs su rtog/ de phyir
296b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog par yang dag bshad/ / rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// de la ji ltar rgyud phyi ma yin zhe na// rgyud ni rab tu 'brel bar bshad// phyi ma gong du phyung ba yin// de nyid gsang ba gsang chen rnams// de yang
296b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud ni phyi mar 'dod/ / de la ji ltar dang po sa nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun tu rab gnas pa// rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog/ bde chen dgyes pa chen po ste// dam pa'i yi ge gzhal yas
296b5(rgyud 'bum): khang / / zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar gdong ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe na/ yi ge ka sogs d+ha yig mtha'// nganya spangs nas 'jug
296b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / yi ge d+ha sogs Sha yi mtha'// 'phreng ba gnyis pa yang dag bri// dbus gnas par ni a yig 'phreng // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de// thig le zla tshes dang ldan par// tsheg drag zla ba
296b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis yin te/ / a yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// dbus su rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas// de dbus rtag tu sgom pa ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas
297a1(rgyud 'bum): ri mo grags pa yin/ / de las 'gro ba g.yo mi g.yo// thams cad yang dag 'byung bas ni// nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma'i phyir// gdod ma tha ma med mchog yin// rdo rje chen
297a2(rgyud 'bum): po dngos sems ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes 'dong ngo // de la bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po rig pa lha// rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin//
297a3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa yi ge shin tu dga'// de la ji ltar yi ge rtog pa yin zhe na/ yi ge a sogs k+Sha mtha' ni// yi ger yang dag bshad pa ste// mi zad dga' ba'i rdo rje can// de nyid kun don mtshan nyid phyir/
297a4(rgyud 'bum): de la ji ltar sngags 'byung ba yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems sogs 'khor lo la// gang rnams sngags su cher bshad pa// de rnams phyung ba'i don du ni// rdo rje can gyis yang bka' stsal// gur kum la sos/
297a5(rgyud 'bum): byug pa la// bris sku la sogs rnams brgyan nas// bla re la sogs bres nas su// rtag tu re'u mig bzhi brtsams nas// gru bzhi gzhal yas khang byas te// re'u mig phyogs bzhir 'bar bar
297a6(rgyud 'bum): byas/ / re'u mig sum cu zam pa la// bcung gu dang ni ldan par bya// brgya phyed stan la gnas pa la// sde pa lnga mtha' thig le yis// spyi bo gtsug la brdab pa yi// ka dang sha zhes bya ba ni// dbus kyi
297a7(rgyud 'bum): re'u mig la bri'o/ / de yi phyi rol gnas brgyad dag/ mtshams dang phyogs kyi re'u mig la// dbang ldan la sogs rim pa ru// ya dag sha yi sde bkod de// me mtshams la sogs re'u mig la// ma yi
297b1(rgyud 'bum): yig 'bru bzhi po dang / / a yig sa bon la brten nas// sa bon bcu gnyis bkod par bya// dbang ldan la sogs re'u mig la// ka yig la sogs rim par dgod// de ltar bzhi la rim par ni/
297b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par gnas byas te// ka sogs re'u mig bzung nas su// yig 'bru dam pa phyung bar bya// shin tu dga' chen rgyal po ni// sbyor ba thams cad dbang phyug gtso// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa
297b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi la/ / gnas pa zla phyed gtsug pud zhal// de 'og sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// dga' ba rdo rje can gyis phyung // re'u mig bcu bzhi zhes pa la// gnas pa tsheg drag dang ldan pa// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi
297b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sum cu rtsa bzhi bla dang ldan// re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la// gnas pa nga ro thig le ldan// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba bya// sum cu rtsa brgyad sbyor ba yis
297b5(rgyud 'bum): deni bzhi par rnam par bshad/ / bde ba chen po rgyal chen po// lha mo dam pa rtag pa'o// re'u mig bcu gcig la gnas pa// thig le nga ror yang dag ldan// re'u mig brgyad pa la gnas pa// bcu dgu dang na
297b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ste/ / de 'og sum cu rtsa bzhi dang // thig le ba ros brgyan pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba'o// re'u mig gnyis pa la bkod pa'i// thig le nga ro ldan pa'o//
297b7(rgyud 'bum): gling bu ma la sogs btus pa'i// sngags phyung ba ni mchog yin te// re'u mig sum cu rtsa brgyad la// gnas pa'i thig le nga ro ldan// dbus nanyi shu rtsa gcig la// dbus nas bco lnga zla ba can/
298a1(rgyud 'bum): re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas// dbus nas bco lnga thu ba can// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas// cu gcig zla ba dang ldan te// lha mo gling bu ma sogs kyi// sngags phyung
298a2(rgyud 'bum): mad du byung ba'o/ / re'u mig bcu pa la gnas dang // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin te// re'u mig sum cu rtsa gsum gnas// bcu drug pa yang de bzhin te// me tog la sogs bdug pa yi//
298a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sngags phyung mchog yin no// rta mgrin 'phangs mtho lcags kyu sogs// dang po 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// sgo la nan tan gyis sbyor ro// zhes dpal
298a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// re'u mig gnyis pa can kho na// bla chos gtsug dang ldan pa'i zhal// rnam par
298a5(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad rgyal chen po/ / kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug yin// re'u mig bco lnga gnas pa la// thig le nga ro ldan pa'o// re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa// thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// re'u mig nyi
298a6(rgyud 'bum): shu rtsa lngar ldan/ / thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// dbus nas nyi shu pa nyid la// thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// chos gos mtshogs bzhin dag gis// sa bon 'byung ba mchog 'di yin// re'u mig nyi
298a7(rgyud 'bum): shu rtsa bzhi gnas/ / thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// re mig bdun pa de bzhin yang // dbus nas bco lnga pa dang ldan// thig le nga ro ldan pa ni// byang du sil snyan cha lang ngo // dbus nas nyi shu rtsa
298b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig la/ / gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa// thig le nga ro ldan pa ni// rdo rje rin chen cher brjod do// dbus nas bco brgyad pa dag nyid// thig le nga ros brgyan pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil
298b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la/ / chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya che// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// nyi shu rtsa bzhi re'u mig la//
298b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa nyi shu pa ldan ni// khrag 'thung zhes pa'i rgyal po che// tsheg drag lhag chad gyur pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa 'og na bcu dgur ldan// re'u mig nyi shu gnas pa dang //
298b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba tsheg drag ldan pa'o// tsheg drag dang ni rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa dbus na sa bcu gcig ldan// re'u mig bcu gnyis pa sbyor ba'i// tsheg drag ldan par 'dod pa'o// re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas
298b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'og gi 'dren pa nyi shu gcig/ bcu gnyis pa dang tsheg drag can// gsum pa can de bshad pa'o// re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa la// tsheg drag dang ni mnyam sbyor ba// /
298b6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo snod chen ma yi 'dod// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa dbus nas gnyis pa can// de bzhin thig le nga ror ldan// thig le 'byung gnas gsum pa ste// dbus nas bcu pa gang yin pa//
298b7(rgyud 'bum): cag tu tsheg drag ldan pa ni// dmar chen sogs pa'i lha mo yi// bzhi pa dag ni phyung ba'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// gnas pa'i thig le bcas pa'o// dbus las drug pa gang yin pa/
299a1(rgyud 'bum): thig le nga ro ldan pa'o// re'u mig de bzhin bcu bdun pa// thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa// thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// lha mo mda' rnon 'dzin sos
299a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / sa bon byung ba de ngo mtshar// lha mo me tog ma sogs kyi// sa bon byung ba sngon bstan yin// gang dag sgo srungs bstan pa yang // gzugs mi mthun pa kho na'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
299a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa bcu dgu'i gdan la gnas// nyi shu tsheg
299a4(rgyud 'bum): drag sbyor ba ni/ / pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug yin// re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa'i// tsheg gnyis lci ba de bzhin no// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas nas dbus nas dgu pa ldan// rtag par thig le dang
299a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan ni/ / gnyis pa yi ni yongs grags pa// re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la// gnas pa nga ro thig les brgyan// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa dbus nas bcu gsum ldan// tsheg drag can ni
299a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa yi/ / khro gnyer ma yi rgyud las grags// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir ldan// dbus nas dgu pa'i thig ler bcas// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas bco lnga dang ldan no// re'u big bcu
299a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig la gnas pa/ / tsheg drag gis ni sbyor ba'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// sum cu rtsa brgyad pa dang ldan// tsheg drag mnyam por sbyor ba ni// pad+ma gar dbang mchog yin no// lha mo gling bum
299b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs nyid/ / de bzhin lha mo me tog sogs// lha mo lcags kyu ma sogs kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor la ni bskyed pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
299b2(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs te/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// dbus nas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// bcu gcig pa dang ldan pa ste// bcu dgu zla ba gtsug lnga ni/
299b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyi ma 'byung ba yin// dbus nas bcu gsum gang yin pa// bla chos thig le gtsug gi zhal// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa// re'u mig nyi shu gnas dang sbyor// chog drag
299b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas gnyis pa'o/ / re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan// tsheg drag ldan cing can de ni// gsum pa yi ni grags pa yin// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// bcu
299b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig dang ni thig le ldan/ / re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// tsheg drag ldan pa 'dod pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas dgu dang rdza ba'o// re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas// thig leng
299b6(rgyud 'bum): ros brgyan pa'o/ / re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan// tsheg drag mnyam par ldan pa ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i lha dag yin// lha mo gling bu ma sogs kun// rtsa ba'i dkyil
299b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sbyor skyes yin/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/
300a1(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa bdun sbyor ba ste// zla tshes thig le btsug can ni// yul 'khor thams cad 'du ba'o// re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// bcu dgu pa dang ldan pa ste// nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba
300a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / sna tshogs pa yi brjod pa yin// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// gnas pa tsheg drag ldan pa 'dod// rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor lo// rdo rje rgya gram zhes grags so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpa
300a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rta mchog gi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las
300a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / / ri mo gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris// de yi nang du rnal 'byor pas// a yig tshogs kyang
300a5(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / shar phyogs 'dab mar ka yi sde// lho phyogs 'dab mar tsa yi sde// nub phyogs 'dab mar Ta yi sde// ta yi sde ni de bzhin byang // sde pa lnga yi dbus su ni// yi ge k+Sha dang lhan cig 'dod//
300a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan 'dab ma nas brtsams te// ya ra la ba rnam par gzhag/ dbang ldan 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ge Sha ni 'jug par bya// me mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ge sha ni 'jug par bya// bden
300a7(rgyud 'bum): bral 'dab ma'i phyi rol du/ / yi ge sa ni 'jug par bya// rlung mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ge ha ni 'jug par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
300b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus kyi mtha' ru gang yin pa// thig le dang ldan yi ge oM// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa gang // sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// 'og tu sgra yig u sbyor ro// shar gyi 'dab ma
300b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa ni/ / dbus las dbu ma de bzhin no// lho nas de bzhin dbu ma la// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan no// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa gang // de nas byang gi dang pa'o// dbus nas dbu ma'i sbyin nas su//
300b3(rgyud 'bum): de tshe 'od kyi gong bur 'gyur// oM yig tsheg drag dang ldan pa// de yi mtha' ru de tsher 'gyur// lho nas dbus ma gang yin pa// tsheg drag dang ni ldan pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa// u yig thig
300b4(rgyud 'bum): le sbyor bar bya/ / dbus kyi dbu ma gang yin pa// thig les mgo nas mnan pa dang // rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa// oM yig tsheg drag sbyor bar bya// bden bral mtshams kyi phyi rol du// sgra
300b5(rgyud 'bum): yig u ni sbyor ba ste/ / me mtshams 'dab mar gang yin pa// byang gi dang por de bzhin yang // bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// byang gi dang po pa yang yin// dbus nas dbus ma bzung nas su// 'od kyi
300b6(rgyud 'bum): gong du mtha' ru 'gyur/ / de nas thig le sbyin byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// lho nas dbu ma gang yin pa/
300b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig drag dang ni ldan par bya// dbus nas dbus ma de bzhin du// lho nas dbu ma yang yin no// ma mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa// rtag tu brjod par 'gyur ma yin// byang nas dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtsham/
301a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni shin tu sbyor// sgra yig a dang sbyar nas su// rtag par zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// me mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su// nub kyi dang po ldan par bya// sgra yig i dang sbyar nas su//
301a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyi gong du lnga pa yin// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig a dang ldan par bya// de bzhin dbang ldan 'dab ma dang // sgra yig i ni sbyor ba'o// shar gyi dang po pa dang ni// de nas dbu pa'i tha ma ni// nub kyi dang po pa
301a3(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas/ / a med rtag tu 'gyur bar bya// de dag bzlas pa byas pa yis// mda' ru rab tu grub pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// skra
301a4(rgyud 'bum): yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ / thig le nga ro gdon nas su// de nas dbus nas dbus ma'o// lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams pa dang sbyor bar bya// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra lig e dang ldan par bya//
301a5(rgyud 'bum): bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa gang // sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// shar gyi dang por bzung nas su// sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa
301a6(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas/ / sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya// thig le nga ros mnyam sbyor nas// skal bzang skal bzang 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma//
301a7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang mo gsum pa ste// bzhi pa zad med sngon ma'o// dpal mo sangs rgyas sku ldan ma// de bzhin gzungs ma zhal mdzes ma// sprin chen ma ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan ma'o// gling bu la
301b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs bsdus pa dang / / sgo srungs ma sogs yang bsdus te// me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni// dang po'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa
301b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa// yi ge e yis ldan pa yi// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang // me
301b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid/ / sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// shar nas dang po de bzhin du// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// bden bral
301b4(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol pa bzung nas/ / dbus las tha ma yang bzung nas// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// tsheg drag gis ni mnyam par ldan// de ni bcu
301b5(rgyud 'bum): par yongs grags te/ / bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur nas su// byang las dbu ma de bzhin te// sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa de
301b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / nub las dang po pa dang ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa la yang // dbu ma'i tha ma yang yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// yi ge u dang mnyam ldan pa'i// dbus las tha ma pa 'gyur nas// me
301b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa/ / byang las dbus ma 'gyur byas te// 'dren pa a yig dang lhan cig/ dbus las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//
302a1(rgyud 'bum): thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// lho las dbu ma de bzhin du// shar las dang po pa yang yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig ldan par bya// dbus las gnyis
302a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gang yin pa/ / nub kyi dang po a med par// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su// thig le u yig dang ldan te// dbus las dbu ma re
302a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur te// shar las gsungs pa gang yin pa// sgra yi u dang ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig e yis
302a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa ste/ / dbang ldan 'dab ma'i gdan can ni// lnga par yongs su grags pa ste// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig i
302a5(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyor bar bya/ / dbus las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma can dang 'dra// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig o ni sbyar bar bya// shar las
302a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa gang yin pa/ / sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa dang // dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya//
302a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa ni// me mtshams gdan dang ldan pa ste// tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa// dang po yongs su grags pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// thig le yi ge
302b1(rgyud 'bum): su sbyor te/ / mkhas pas la gnyis brjod par bya// dbus las dbus pa yang bzungs// sgo las dbus pa de bzhin la// me mtshams bdab ma can dang ldan// lho las dang po bzung nas su/
302b2(rgyud 'bum): le dang ni mnyam por ldan// nub nas dbu ma bzung nas su// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan bya// dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/
302b3(rgyud 'bum): yig i ni sbyor bar bya// shar las gnyis pa gang yin pa// rub las dang po bzung nas su// dbus nas dbus ma ldan pa ste// thig le a yig ldan par bya// bcu par yongs su grags pa ste// sha
302b4(rgyud 'bum): nas gsum pa gang yin pa/ / sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha mar bzung nas su// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang // yi ge a dang ldan par bya// dbus las dbus pa bzung nas su// lho
302b5(rgyud 'bum): las gsum pa 'gyur byas te/ / me mtshams gdan ni sbyor byas nas// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// yi ge a yig ldan pa yi// dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la//
302b6(rgyud 'bum): sgra yig e dang sbyor ba yis// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig u yis sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste//
302b7(rgyud 'bum): bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u yis brgyan byas te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa yang // sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u yis
303a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa ste/ / bden bral ba dab mar gnas pa ste// gnyis brtsegs yi ge u dang ldan// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// byang las tha ma ldan byas te// chog drag mnyam
303a2(rgyud 'bum): por ldan pa la/ / sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung
303a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yis// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya// byang las tha ma bzung nas su// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig a
303a4(rgyud 'bum): yis brgyan par bya/ / dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi// nub kyi tha mar 'gyur bar bya// lho yi dbu mar de bzhin du// lho las bzhi pa gang yin 'byor// tsheg drag
303a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge i ldan pa/ / 'dus pa gsungs pa yin pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang // me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yis//
303a6(rgyud 'bum): lho yi dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang por bzung nas su// sgra yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi// byang gi dang po yang yin te// shar nas dang po bzung ba la// sgra yig e ri sbyor bar bya// lho las dbu ma de
303a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / chog drag yi ger ldan pa'o// zhes rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor byas te// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang // me mtshams stan dang
303b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi/ / lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba la// me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// de 'og ma mtshams pa yin te// nub kyi tha ma de bzhin
303b2(rgyud 'bum): du/ / sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// nub las dang po bzung nas su// a yig med par gyur pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u li sbyor bar bya//
303b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// ma mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu mar 'gyur bar bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// thig le yis ni brgyan par bya// de bzhin dbus nas dbu ma yang /
303b4(rgyud 'bum): lho nas dbu ma de bzhin te// me yi mtshams pa mnyam par ldan// yi ge a yi gdu bur bya// nub nas tha ma bzung nas su// sgra yig oM ni sbyor bar bya// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbu ma'i tha ma dang
303b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan par/ / me mtshams lan gnyis brjod nas su// nub nas dang por ldan 'gyur bya// rtag tu a med brgyad pa ni// rdo rje kha T+wAM 'dzin ma yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
303b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// chog drag o ni sbyar bar bya// dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pas ni ldan pa yin// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur ba'o// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// skra
303b7(rgyud 'bum): mig mini sbyor bar bya/ / dbus nas tha mar bzung nas su// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma bzung bar bya// ma mtshams 'dab ma la gnas pa// sgra yig
304a1(rgyud 'bum): i ni sbyor bar bya/ / byang nas dang po bzung nas su// yi ge a dang ldan par bya// me mtshams 'dab ma sbyor nas su// thig leng ros bsdu bar bya// sna tshogs pad+ma lha mo che// rje
304a2(rgyud 'bum): rje sems sogs lha yi yin/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje mtshon cha dang / rdo rje rol ma dang / rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snying po ma dag rdo rje sems dpa'
304a3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yin no/ / oM yig thig le dang ldan par// a yig thig le yang dag ldan// dbus la tha mar bzung ba dang // yi ge u dang ldan par bya// byang nas de bzhin bzhi pa'o// dbus nas
304a4(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma bzung nas su/ / lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyar nas// sgra yig i dang a bsdu bya'o// shar nas bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le u dang ldan bya ste// nan tan du ni lan
304a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bzla/ / rtag tu dang po'i 'gyur ba yin// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa// dbu ma las ni dbu ma yang // me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya'o// dbus nas tha ma bzung byas
304a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ sgra yi e dang sbyor bar bya// shar las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba'o// bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste// nan tan lan gnyis bzlas pa'o// dbus las
304a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa gang yin pa/ / u yig me mtshams pa dang ldan// thig le nga ro gnyis pa'o// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan// dbang ldan phyi rol la
304b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / / me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin// byang nas gsum pa gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ru gyur pa bya// lho nas dbu ma pa la yang // me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan// sgra yig i dang ldan sbyor ba//
304b2(rgyud 'bum): i yig thig le dang ldan pa// lan gnyis gsum ni brjod byas te// lha mo gsum po'i kho na'o// sngags 'byung bar ni grags pa yin// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// shar nas gnyis pa gang yin pa// zla tshes
304b3(rgyud 'bum): thig le gtsug gi zhal/ / dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du// lho nas dbu ma pa la yang // me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor dang // dus rnams thams cad sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa de bzhin// sgra yig a
304b4(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyor bar bya/ / de nyid phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i dang ldan byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yi// sgra yig i yis brgyan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig
304b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor byas te/ / lan gnyis gsum du brjod bya'o// de nas dpag bsam shing sogs lha// rdo rje snying po ma dang / rdo rje sred med kyi bu mo dang / rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang // 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams zhes pa lha mo bzhi
304b6(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / o yig thig le dang ldan pa// yi ge e yi sbyor bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin// yi ge e yi mnyam ldan pa'i// byang nas dang por 'gyur byas te//
304b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor ba'o// lho yi dbu ma pa yang de// yi ge a yis mnyam ldan bya// dbus las dbu ma ldan 'gyur dang // bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa//
305a1(rgyud 'bum): sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te// bden bral phyi rol la gnas pa// sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te// byang nas tha ma gang yin pa// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po gang yin pa/
305a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// nub nas dang po gang yin pa// rtag par a med 'gyur bar bya// gdod ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ lha mo rdo rje pi wang ma'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig
305a3(rgyud 'bum): e ni sbyor bar bya/ / me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid// sgra yig i dang ldan byas te// byang nas dang po 'gyur bar bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// lho nas dbu ma gzung bar bya// me mtshams
305a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma dang sbyor nas/ / bsdu bar bya ba yang yin te// shar nas gsum pa gang yin pa// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig e ni sbyor byas te// nga ro bzhi pa dang ldan
305a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / rtag par lan gsum brjod bya'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma pa la yang // sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po 'gyur bar bya//
305a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan cig/ lho nas dbu ma gyur bya ste// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// de bzhin bden bral phyi pa la//
305a7(rgyud 'bum): sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'i phyir// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa nyid ni// lan gnyis ched du brjod par bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// thig le e yig sbyor bar bya// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog la// rnga
305b1(rgyud 'bum): chen lha mor grags pa yin/ / rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yang // byang nas dang po pa bzung ste// sgra yig i ni ldan par bya// dbus las dang
305b2(rgyud 'bum): ma de bzhin du/ / me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyor ba'i// lho nas dbu ma pa dang yang // byang nas mtha' ma bzung byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma ldan byas nas// skra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po bzung
305b3(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / dbang ldan 'dab ma can sbyor nas// de tshe de ni yang brjod de// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang // sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po de bzhin du// de ni lan gnyis brjod par bya//
305b4(rgyud 'bum): lho nas bzhi pa bzung nas su// nga ro a yig ldan par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdza rnga ma zhes grags pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//

305b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams 'dab ma can ldan par/ / lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po de bzhin du// sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dang po yang yin te// /
305b7(rgyud 'bum): e yig dang ni mnyam por ldan// dbus nas me tog ma phyung ngo // a yig dang por byas nas su// dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho nas dbu ma yang yin te/

306a3(rgyud 'bum): dang po de bzhin du// e yig ldan par gsungs pa'o// a yig dang po byang nas su// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang // me mtshams 'dab pa dang ldan par// lho las dbu la 'gyur byas te/

309a7(rgyud 'bum): grwa'i srin mo la sogs bzhi rnams kyi'o// me tog ma sogs 'dus pa dang // sgo srungs ma sogs 'dus pa ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs

310a1(rgyud 'bum): yang / / dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te// yi ge i dang gcig par 'dod// lho las dbu ma bzung nas su// tsheg drag lci ba kho na'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas/
310a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung ba nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma pa bzung ba// me mtshams pa stan ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las
