310a4(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol pa bzung nas/ / sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang nas dbu ma pa la yang // dbus las tha ma pa sbyor ba// sgra yig i dang ldan par bya// de ni lan gnyis
310a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te/ / dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba la// thig le nga ro ldan byas la// de ni drug por yongs grags so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi
310a6(rgyud 'bum): rol pa bzung nas/ / tsheg drag oM yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// byang las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i// dbus kyi tha ma bzung bar dang // nub las tha ma bzung ba la// sgra yig
310a7(rgyud 'bum): e ni sbyor bar bya/ / me yi 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya// lho las dbu ma bzung nas su// thig le nga ro ldan par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems
310b1(rgyud 'bum): dpas rnam par gzigs ma dang sgrol pa dang / sa 'dzin ma dang / khro gnyer ma zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i gtso mo'i lha mo bzhi gsungs pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya//
310b2(rgyud 'bum): dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang nas dbu ma gang yin pa// dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te// de ni rtag par lci bar 'gyur// lho las dang po bzung nas su// thig le dang ni mnyam por ldan// nub
310b3(rgyud 'bum): nas dbus ma pa nyid la/ / i yig dang ni ldan par bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// sgra yig u yis rnam par brgyan//
310b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang // yi ge u dang mnyam ldan la// thig le nga ro yang dag ldan// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// a med nub kyi dang po'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
310b5(rgyud 'bum): pas gsungs so/ / rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang // sgra yig e dang ldan pa yis// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te//
310b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa la yang // dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang nas dbu ma pa la yang // dbus
310b7(rgyud 'bum): las tha ma dang sbyor te/ / de ni rtag lci la gyur pa// de bzhin dbus las tha ma yang // sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// bden bral
311a1(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol pa bzung la/ / sgra yig min stor bar bya// byung las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can gyi stan// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/
311a2(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma'i gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub kyi dang po 'gyur bar bya// de la a yig med ces pa// bdag gis thams cad du ni bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams
311a3(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol pa bzung nas/ / me mtshams pa yi stan dang ldan// tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni// dang po ni yongs su grags// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang nas dbu ma yang yin la// dbus las tha ma
311a4(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyor te/ / sgra yig i dang sbyor ba yi// mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang // thig le u yig gis brgyan te// tha mar yi ge a la yang // thig le dang ni ldan par bya//
311a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag oM yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang // byang las dbu ma pa la yang /
311a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te// sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus
311a7(rgyud 'bum): las dbus ma dang sbyar te/ / sgra yig a dang ldan pa ni// rtag par lci bar gyur pa yin// shar las dang po bzung nas ni// me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// dbus las tha ma bzung ba la// sgra yig
311b1(rgyud 'bum): a dang sbyor bar bya/ / shar las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// dbus las tha ma pa yang yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// lho las dbu ma de
311b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / tsheg drag ljib can ldan no// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas pad+ma'i na bza' dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma dang / pad+ma kar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / sna tshogs pad+mo'i zhes bya ba pad+mo
311b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi lha mo bzhi yis gsungs so/ / gling bu mtshogs 'dus pa dang // sgo srungs ma tshogs 'dus pa ste// me tog ma tshogs 'dus pa yang // pad+mas mtshan ma 'dzin par bzang // dang po'i dkyil
311b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor tshul gyis ni/ / ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs te/ dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la sngags byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes
311b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / oM yig thig le dang ldan par// sgra yig i dang ldan pa'o// bden bral phyi rol pa la ya byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//
311b6(rgyud 'bum): tsheg drag u yig sbyor bar bya// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i yis brgyan pa ste// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig
311b7(rgyud 'bum): u dang sbyor bar bya/ / de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la// chog drag dang ni mnyam por ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan
312a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma can dang ldan/ / bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi// dbus las tha ma dang ldan// de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor
312a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur bya// de bzhin dbus
312a3(rgyud 'bum): las dbu ma yang / / me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin du// byang las dang po sbyor ba yi// byang las tha mar 'gyur bar bya// dbus
312a4(rgyud 'bum): las dbu ma de bzhin du/ / lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya// de bzhin nub kyi dang po yang // lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan par// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// thig le
312a5(rgyud 'bum): a yig ldan pa yi/ / nor chen rdo rje nyi ma yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma'i stan ldan pa'i// lho las
312a6(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ / bden bral phyi rol gnas pa dang // dbus las dbu ma sbyor ba dang // tsheg drag mnyam por sbyor ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin//
312a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): byang las dang po sbyor ba yi// byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la// thig le u yig sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus
312b2(rgyud 'bum): las dbu ma bzung ba dang / / me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// byung las bzhi pa gang yin pa// me mtshams 'og tu ldan pa yi// dbus las tha ma 'byung bar bya//
312b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus las tha ma de bzhin du// thig le dang ni mnyam ldan no// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pa yi gdan sbyor ba'i//
312b4(rgyud 'bum): lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// shar las dang po bzung ba dang // me mtshams pa yi mgor sbyor ba'i// dbus las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag e yig sbyor
312b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ma dang / mdzod gter ma dang / rgyal mtshan mchog ma dang / mchod chen mo zhes bya ba lha mo bzhis gsungs so// oM yig thig le
312b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ / i yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i// dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// byang las dang po yang yin te// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin dang // e yig me
312b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshams can ldan pa'i/ / lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// nub nas tha ma bzung nas su// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma bzung nas su// nub kyi dang po de bzhin te// rtag par a med 'gyur ba'o//
313a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma
313a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar bya/ / e yig me mtshams pa ldan pa'i// dbus las dang por 'gyur bar bya// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// byang las dang po yang yin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// rlung
313a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ / tsheg drag yi ge i dang sbyar// de ni 'gyur bar the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan dang // thig le
313a4(rgyud 'bum): e yig ldan pa yis/ / lho las dang po 'byung bar bya// yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i// de nas byang gi dang po ste// dbus las tha ma de bzhin du// e yig dang ni sbyor ba yi// nub kyi tha ma 'gyur
313a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / tsheg drag oM yig dang ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol par gyur pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa// dbus las
313a6(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma yang yin te/ / me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las tha ma de bzhin du// yi ge e dang mnam sbyor ba'i// me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te//
313a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dbus nas tha ma dang // yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol 'gyur bar bya// thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i// me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan//
313b1(rgyud 'bum): 'badas dpal rdo rje sems dpas mda' gzhu 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma mo dang / rdo rje bsreg bya zab mo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo bzhis gsungs so// gling bu ma sogs bdus
313b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / sgo srungs ma sogs 'du ba ste// me tog ma sogs 'dus nas kyang // rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas
313b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa// de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las

313b6(rgyud 'bum): dran las dga'/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar byas// dbang
313b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan phyi rol de bzhin te/ / dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbus ma yang yin te// byang las bzhi pa gang yin
314a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / me mtshams pa yi nyam gnon pa'i// dbus las tha ma 'gyur ldan bya// lho la se dbu ma yang yin te// tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni// sna tshogs pad+ma zhes su thagA/
314a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa'i// i yig dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/

314a5(rgyud 'bum): rta mchog 'di ni gzhag bya na// de nyid de yi dkyil 'khor yin// yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs med shin tu dga' ba dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rta mchog gi
314a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o//
314a7(rgyud 'bum): / de la ji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na/ skyon med rtag pa gtan du ni// 'dod chags thams cad rjes tshogs phyir// de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che//
314b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhe na/ gtan du dga' ba kun gyi mchog/ gdod na snga grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ byang chub sems mchog
314b2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'o/ / de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bo yin zhe na/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis// rdo rje dbang chen thugs kar bsgyur//
314b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// dam pa'i dang po skyes bu'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe na/ bsams med rgya chen zab pa ni// dngos grub thams cad zad med
314b4(rgyud 'bum): bde/ kun gyi dri ma med pa ni// byang chub sems bdag brtan pa yin// de nas de'i yongs su las kyi khyad par ni/ sems brtan nyid kyi sems dpa' ste// ting 'dzin sems dpa' sgom
314b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rnam par shes pa sems dpa' ste// rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni// nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs ni// zla ba 'dra bar yang dag blo/
314b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes su rnam par bshad// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin zhe na/ ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis// gang gi bskyed pa yong bsgoms na// bsgoms na thams
314b7(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag nyid du/ / tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang / rang byin rlab 'di grub mchog ste// de nyid nyin re grub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob
315a1(rgyud 'bum): bo/ / de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun su bzang po'i spyod pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pa yang // ci phyir sems can don du 'gyur// de phyir kun tu/
315a2(rgyud 'bum): bzang po yi// ci bzhir byang sems spyod ces 'gro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yin zhe na/ sems de kho na bdud yin te// sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs// rang sems
315a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba'i don du ni/ / bdag ni bdud nyid nye bar 'gro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor 'bigs pa ni// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid//
315a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid de las de sangs rgyas// rang byir rlabs mchog bsgoms phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed dang phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ dbyer med so sor 'bigs pa ni// sdang ba
315a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nges par gnon/ / sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni// byang chub sems rnams bstan pa yin// bstan pa thams cad 'grub don du// rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gis// phyag la phyag
315a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan de byin te/ / des ni phyag na rdo rje yin// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba yin zhe na/ ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// 'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni// skye
315a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bdag ni rigs yin no/ / de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/ dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// kun grub zad med bde
315b1(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / bde ba chen po zhes 'dod do// gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste// phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir// mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po// dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir// dgyes pa dam pa nyid
315b2(rgyud 'bum): ma ste/ / sbyin pa la sogs mchog sgrub phyir// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// rdo rje rta mchog las nyid phyir// sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste// rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam
315b3(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po// ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum nyid yin zhe na/ 'jig rten gsum dag mtha' yas phyir// 'dul
315b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir srid gsum mchog gsum bdag/ thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum// 'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ sems can
315b5(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams cher 'phags phyir/ / mi g.yo thams cad kho na bdag/ sems 'du bral phyir g.yo ba ste// kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir// mkha' 'gro ma bdag lha mor gsungs// thams cad mdzad/
315b6(rgyud 'bum): pas skal ba bzang // rnam par rtog pa skal ngan par// brda yi mtshan mar gsungs pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud yin zhe na/ gtan du srid pa yang
315b7(rgyud 'bum): dag 'grub/ / dbang phyug chen po 'grub don du// dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du// bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs// 'dod chags chen po'i phyir bcom ldan// dam pa zad med shin tu dga'/
316a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang nyid phyir ni snying po'i dbyangs// hUM yig dam pa zad med pa'o// de la ji ltar nye ba'i snying po de nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa dang // dam tshig dag ni
316a2(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa dang / / de nyid gsang ba mi shes pas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min// 'dod pa bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// de kho na ni 'dod chags yang // rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ni// chags bral de dang
316a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa min/ / ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla mi steng du gzugs byas nas// ling ga mchod rten byin brlabs te// rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'gyur// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// bcu yi steng du
316a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs nas su/ / ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te// khrag 'thung zhes bdag sngon skye'o// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// badz+ra yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga pad+mar byin brlabs ste// dag pa'i chos bdag
316a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon skye'o/ / ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga rin chen byin brlabs te// rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskrad// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs
316a6(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / ling ga sna tshogs byin brlabs te// rta mchog dag ni sngon skye'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas te// der ni khaM yig bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'od// sku gnyis ldan
316a7(rgyud 'bum): pa spro bar bya/ / b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni// de la hUM yig bsgom par bya// shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan pa'i spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la hrIHyig bsgom
316b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la b+ha yig bsgom par bya// pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan par/
316b2(rgyud 'bum): spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcu gnas su// de la traM yig bsgom par bya// nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la hUM yig bsgom par bya// hUM
316b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni/ / sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang // snying po yongs su grags pa yin// snying pos
316b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'grub pa ni/ / nye ba'i snying por yongs grags so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ gsang ba sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//
316b5(rgyud 'bum): / de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang / rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na/ kun 'grub zad med bde ba ri// de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste// don yod dam tshig 'da' dka' yin//
316b6(rgyud 'bum): de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor lo// de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin// 'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor bskyed mchog
316b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yin// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// ci 'dra rtag pa'i bsod nams su// phyi ni de bzhin bri
317a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de la ji ltar thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bya na/ mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya// shar dang nub dang byang phyogs
317a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs/ / thig skud bzhi pa re'u mig brgyad// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhi// pad+ma pad+ma'i tshul yin te// rin chen tshul ni rin chen gyi// sna tshogs kyi ni zlum por gsungs// ji ltar/
317a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa ci bde bas// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa// re'u mig brgyad pa 'dod pa'o// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni 'dod// re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas/
317a4(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin// zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag/ gang gis rtogs par
317a5(rgyud 'bum): nus pa ni/ / gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor bas// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin// bris sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin// lhag chad cho gar gyur na yang // bsgrubs te skyon
317a6(rgyud 'bum): du mi 'gyur ro/ / de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na/ sems dpa' gdod ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// gdod ma tha ma/
317a7(rgyud 'bum): med phyir yang // dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do// 'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni// dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags ci 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'dod pa chen po kun
317b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mchog/ yid bde bas na 'dzum pa che// rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des// dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin// de nas de'i zla ba'i mdog ni/ dam pa yig 'bru grub nyid phyir// chos rnams thams cad
317b2(rgyud 'bum): dag phyir dang / / gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir// rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog/ de nas de'i sna tshogs dmar ba'i 'od 'bar ba ni/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che// 'dod chags kun la rjes mags
317b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang // sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od// de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na/ thod 'phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni// khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan
317b4(rgyud 'bum): med/ / thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed// khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces//
317b5(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin// de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhen/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnon pas// g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su// de yi sems dpa'i skyil
317b6(rgyud 'bum): krung bcas/ / rdo rje snyin po gtso bo'i gtso// de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/ kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na// dngos grub thams
317b7(rgyud 'bum): cad bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas// thams cad dbang phyug che ru 'phags// 'grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs// dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs
318a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin// de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/ me long khrag 'thung zhes bya rnams/
318a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid la gang dbang mchog/ so sor rtog la nyi ma ste// bya ba la ni rta mchog dang // chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni// 'dod
318a3(rgyud 'bum): chags chen po bde ba che/ / gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg dang de bzhin yang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni// de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen// chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis// rgya
318a4(rgyud 'bum): / cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/ 'phrog byed ma dang 'dzin byed ma/
318a5(rgyud 'bum): gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma// nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags// gang gis sgra ni bstan gyur na// de la dpral ba bstan par bya// mig la ston pa gang yin pa// de la
318a6(rgyud 'bum): lte ba bstan par bya/ / gang gis lte ba bstan pa ni// de la mthu ni rab tu bstan// gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na// de la so ni rab tu bstan// gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na// de la gsus pa bstan
318a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / gang gis b+ha ga bstan gyur na// de la ling ga bstan par bya// gang gis rje ngar bstan na ni// de la brla ni bstan par bya// gang gis bar ni bstan gyur na// de la rkang mthil bstan par
318b1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gang gis rkang mthil bstan na ni// de la sen mo bstan par bya// gang gis mchan khung bstan gyur na// de la smin ma bstan par bya// gang gis sgra sgrogs byed gyur na// de la tshe ngo bya ba'o// gang
318b2(rgyud 'bum): gis kha yang bstan na ni/ / de la zhags pa bstan par bya// gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na// de la mdung thung bstan par bya// gang gis sen mo bstan na ni// de la nu ma rab tu bstan// gang gis
318b3(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur bstan na ni/ / de la mtshams su bstan par bya// gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na// de la bshang gci bstan par bya// gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na// de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o//
318b4(rgyud 'bum): gang gis he skad byed gyur na// de la lag pa bstan par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na/ nad pa'i
318b5(rgyud 'bum): mig gi 'bras 'dra ba/ / dpral bar tri shu la ste mdung thung // phyin log mig dang khro gnyer can// nu ma dag ni mi sdug pa// sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// gtsug gis bskor ba shes byas te// ri mo gsum
318b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis yongs su bskor/ / de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni// tri shul chung nge me long dang // ral gri tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang // rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan// 'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'gro ma// 'di 'dra'i/
318b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma bstan par bya// glo bur mi dga' bya ba dang // don med par yang 'jug pa'o// rkang pa la yang ral gri 'gyur// tri shU la dang 'dra ba'i tshul// skad dang bya rog 'dra ba yis// de ni rtag par 'gyur
319a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa// dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i
319a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug nas de nas bya ba ni// dril bu rjes su dkrol ba'o// de la ji ltar mchod pa chen po thams cad kyi rog
319a3(rgyud 'bum): yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi// gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni// rjes su mchod pa dang gzhan yang // dbyangs dang sil snyan gar gyi yin// de la ji ltar rang gi rig pa'i lha thams cad
319a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa chen po'i rgyu yin ne na/ rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya kun// g.yo dang mi g.yo 'gyur ba ste// rang gi yi dam lhar sbyor nas// thams cad de ni 'grub par bya// de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub
319a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin 'gyur nas// bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya// rtog pa thams cad rjes grub pas// mchog gi dang po 'grub pa'o// de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa thams
319a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ oM yig thig le dang ldan pa'i// nub las dang po yang yin te// shar las dang po bzung nas su// lci bar i yig ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor
319a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / lho las dbu ma bzung ba la// tsheg drag yang dag ldan par bya// the tshom med par de las 'dis// rjes su sbyor bar ldan par 'grub// lho las dang po bzung nas su// gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya// nan
319b1(rgyud 'bum): tan gyis ni i yig sbyor/ / skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro// de nyid thig le dang ldan pas// byang las dbu ma yang yin te// de nyid lan gnyis brjod par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang // thig le u
319b2(rgyud 'bum): yig ldan par ni/ / drug par yongs su grags pa yin// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub las dang po yang yin te// de ni a med shes bya ste// skad cig pas ni bdud rtsi 'grub// o yig thig
319b3(rgyud 'bum): le dang ldan par/ / yi ge u yig mnyam ldan pa'i// dbang ldan phyi rol pa yang bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa// shar gyi dang po ldan par bya// tsheg drag u yig
319b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi/ / dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya// thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa// khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o// ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub bya 'grub// de nas phyin ci 'dod par// ci 'dod 'dod pa bya ba yis// kun
319b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang kun byed de bzhin te/ / langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am// 'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba 'am// bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la// gang dang de ru ci de bzhin// gang gang dbang po'i las nyid pas// gang gang de de'i rang
319b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / rang gi mnyam gzhag med sbyor bas// rang gi rig pa'i lha 'dren no// de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni// thams cad khor 'grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong na rab tu 'grub// sa
319b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / khas pa gang zhig dad pas klog/ de ni nyes pa rnam grol te// dngos grub thams cad dbang phyug 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde/
320a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog las// rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o// dga' ba pad+ma rnam
320a2(rgyud 'bum): dag che ba yis/ / gsal bar rjes su gtsang ba dam pa rtag par sbyin pa yis// dam pa bde ba'i dngos pos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjes su sgrub// dam pa'i dga' ba shin tu sbyor ba skal bzang dam
320a3(rgyud 'bum): pa shin tu dga'/ / rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin dag pa rtag tu rjes su grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos// dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub
320a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dag pa rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin kho nas so so rjes su grub pa bde ba las/ dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs so// // bdag gi
320a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog/ bde ba chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po// kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir// kun mchog sa yi dbang po nyid ni sbyor ba // mtha'
320a6(rgyud 'bum): yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i phyir/ / tshul chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi// mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel ba sbyin// gdod ma tha ma med gang gis// rdzogs byed med
320a7(rgyud 'bum): pa nus ma yin/ / sems can le le can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang // mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang ma dag pa// rtag tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba dang // de rnams phan pa'i
320b1(rgyud 'bum): don rdzogs pa'i dor 'di yin no/ / gang gi khyim du bzung bar gang gis gyur pa dang // bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed pa'am// mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste// dngas grub ma rog
320b2(rgyud 'bum): gis rgyas pa'i las dag mi 'grub pa'o/ / gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang // gzugs sogs thams cad 'di la ji ltar mos pa bzhin// yi ge hUM yang ji ltar rab tu 'dod par bris
320b3(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / des ni rang 'dod dngos grub cho ga bzhin du 'thob// sems can don du las dag byed pa ma yin pas// rgyal ba dag gis rnam par dga' de la// bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med pa ste//
320b4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis rlobs// gang gis rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa la// bdud nyid du ni mi 'gro mi brtan nyid kyang min// brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston
320b5(rgyud 'bum): par mi byed de/ / myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir bstan par 'gyur byed do// gang gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni// mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde chen dang /
320b6(rgyud 'bum): chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang // yig chen yang ni rtag par bdag gis 'grub par bye// de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas su// 'dzum pa chen po thams cad khyab
320b7(rgyud 'bum): par rnam par 'byed/ / kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phran mchog chen gzugs dag gis// kun nas de la legs pa'i sgra ni dbul bar byed// bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su me mcho ba gzugs kyis su//
321a1(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas kun gyis legs so legs// mchog gi rdo rje las byung legs so legs// dam pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs// dam pa'i
321a2(rgyud 'bum): las can mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so legs/ / rtogs pa'i byin rlabs mdzod cig mnyam par byin rlabs kyis// don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen po yi// grub pas phyin mi 'du ba yi dus
321a3(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder 'gyur phyir// de ltar ngag chen zhus nas su// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis// gsungs pa la ni mngon par
321a4(rgyud 'bum): bstod/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las// rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgya bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//
321a5(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po smi ti dz+nyA na kirti ta nyid kyis bsgyur/ yon bdag bod kyi mkhan po gzhon nu grags pas zhus nas bshad nas gtan la phab pa//
321a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shri tsaN+De ma hA ro Sha Na tan+d+ha rA dzA nA pa/ bod skad du/ dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gtum po khro bo chen po
321a7(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje dbyings
321b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang phyug ma'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ / dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams kyang ngo // 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba dkar po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / mi g.yo ba ser
321b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / mi g.yo ba dmar po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / mi g.yo ba ljang khu'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / gti mug rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / phra ma rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang
321b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / phrag dog rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / de lta bu la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma bye ba khri brgya stong rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
321b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' mi g.yo ba nag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di nye bar gsungs so/ / dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba'i// dga' ba bzhi yi de gcig mchog/ rnam par rtog pa kun spangs
321b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin pa// rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes// lus dang ngag rnams kun la gnas// nga ni de rnams phan don phyir// rnam pa lnga yis yang dag gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das
321b6(rgyud 'bum): ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di nye bar gsungs so/ / stong dang snying rje dbyer med par// lha yi 'dod pas bde bar gnas// bdag ni kun rtog
321b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bral/ / spros pa med cing g.yo ba med// bud med gang gis nga mi shes// bud med kun gyi lus la gnas// bdag ni de rnams phan don phyir// rnam pa lnga yis yang dag gnas// de nas
322a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba nag po la/ bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sda rdo rnams dam du 'khrud nas rnam pa mdzad de gsol ba btab pa dang / lnga mo lha mo dga' chen mo// gsang
322a2(rgyud 'bum): pab shin tu'ang rnyed dka' ba/ / snying po las snying mchog gi gtso// sangs rgyas kun gyis legs gsungs pa// rgyud kyi rgyal po dbang phyug mchog/ dga' ma rgyud chen mnyan par gyis// dpa'
322a3(rgyud 'bum): bo gcig pu zhes bya bas/ / sems can dngos grub myur du 'grub// dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la// rgyud 'di rab tu bstan mi bya// dkyil 'khor gzhan du zhugs pa la'ang //
322a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud ni bstan par mi bya'o// gang zhig gtum po khro bo yi// dkyil 'khor rab zhugs mnyam gzhag cing // dad dang brtson 'grus mchog ldan la// gtum po'i rgyud 'di bstan par bya/
322a5(rgyud 'bum): bla ma la gus snying rje can// sngags kyi theg par mchog tu gzhol// gtum po'i dbang phyug la rtag gus// de la rgyud 'di bstan par bya// rnal 'byor pa gang la la zhig/ 'dod brkam sangs rgyas
322a6(rgyud 'bum): slu byed pas/ / gtum po'i dkyil 'khor ston byed cing // bla med rgyud ni ston byed na// de ni nad chen gyis gzir nas// bshang gci'i dri mas gos par byed// zla ba drug gi nang du ni// de ni 'chi ba'i
322a7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal 'gyur/ / de phyir gshin rje'i pho nyas bzung // dus kyi zhags pa'i dbang dur gyur// gang tshe sdig can dmyal bar 'khrid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang srung mi nus// lo ni 'bum du de sdug bsngal/
322b1(rgyud 'bum): gal te myong gyur las zad kyang // gal te mi ru skyes na yang // rdo rje'i gnam lcags kyis de 'jig/ sngags rig btul zhugs can gyis ni// de phyir dkyil 'khor legs bris nas// de nyid sngon du yot+pa
322b2(rgyud 'bum): brtags pa'i/ / slob ma bzang po rab gzhug bya// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// rgyud ni de phyir bstan par bya// gang yang ma thos rgyud 'chad pa// de yang 'og tu 'gro 'gyur zhing // gal te sangs rgyas
322b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshungs kyang / / de yi gdong du rnam smin 'gyur// slob ma dad pa dman pa dang // the tsom zos pas nyan byed na// mgo bor rdo rje'i thog ltung ba// char 'bab dus su the tsom med// mchog gi zhal mnga' lha
322b4(rgyud 'bum): mo la/ / bdag gis 'di ni bden par bshad// dpa' bo gcig nyid rgyud 'di ni// gtum po khro bo shin tu gsang // zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/ rgyud
322b5(rgyud 'bum): la 'jug pa'i rim par phye ba zhes bya ba ste dang po'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas/ gtum po chen po khro bo la dam du 'khyud nas gsol pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni
322b6(rgyud 'bum): byab la/ / gang gi tshad kyis bri bar bya// de bzhin de dbus bri bya ba// gang yin gtso bos bdag la gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor tshad du gang gyur pa/
322b7(rgyud 'bum): zu gang dang ni khru do dang // khru gsum dang ni khru bzhi pa// khru lnga'i tshad las lhag mi bya// gang du de mi rdul chen nyid// kha dog sna tshogs kyis byas pa/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs ba
323a1(rgyud 'bum): yis rnam par brgyan/ / sgron brgyang ma nyid du ni// de yi tshang du rab tu brtag/ sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyung dang // de yi phyed kyis 'gram dang ni// log dang de bzhin stegs bu dang /
323a2(rgyud 'bum): dra badra phyed snam bu rnams// rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol tu// de yi phyed kyis rdul tshonas// rdo rje'i 'phreng ba nyid dang ni// ka ba brgyad ldan brtag par bya// sgo yi sum 'gyur nyid kyis ni// sgo yi rta babs
323a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu bya/ / mchog tu sna tshogs rdo rje bri// rdo rje'i ra ba khor yug ldan// dpag bsam shing sogs dang ldan pa/ khro bo gtum po'i dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnam pa la//
323a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phar ma gcig pa nyid du bya// de yi shar sogs phyogs brgyad la// sna tshogs pad+ma yang dag bri// dbus ma dang dgu de dbus su// ral gri sngon po rdo rjes mtshan// rdo rje gri gug thod bcas 'og/ shar du
323a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los mtshan pa yi/ / ral gri kha dog dkar po bri// lho ru kha dog ser po yi// rin chen dang bcas yang dag bri// nub tu kha dog dmar po yi// pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa dang // byang du ral gri
323a6(rgyud 'bum): rkyang pa yi/ / kha dog ljang khu yang dag bri// 'khor lo dkar pos mtshan pa yi// gri gug me yi mtshams su bri// rin chen ser pos rab mtshan pa// bden bral du ni bri bar bya// pad+ma dmar pos
323a7(rgyud 'bum): rab mtshan pa/ / rlung du de bzhin bri bar bya// dbang ldan kha dog ljang khu yi// ut+pal sngon pos mtshan pa bri// zla ba nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i// mtshan ma thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdul tshon dkyil 'khor
323b1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub thabs 'di/ / bdag gis 'jig rten don phyir bshad// yang na dkyil 'khor bri bya ba// ras ris tshul du bri bar bya// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor bris byas nas// dbus su mi g.yo mthing nag bri// zhe
323b2(rgyud 'bum): sdang rdo rje mas 'khyud pa/ / shar du mi g.yo dkar po bri// mi g.yo ser po de bzhin lhor// nub tu mi g.yo dmar po bri// byang du mi g.yo ljang wa bri// me mtshams gti mug rdo rje dkar// bden bral phra
323b3(rgyud 'bum): ma rdo rje ser/ / rlung du 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lha mo dmar mo yang dag bri// dbang ldan phrag dog rdo rje ma// ljang bri ras bris dkyil 'khor la// de nas dkyil 'khor la sngags kyis lhag par gnas
323b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba ni/ i shrI tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa pa ri wA ra sa hi ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha dzaHhUM baM ho/ a Ta maN+Da laM/ a d+hiSh+Tha naM ku ru hUM phaT swA hA/ 'dis kun nas dgug pa dang / rab tu gzhug pa
323b5(rgyud 'bum): / dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te mchod par bya'o// de nas sngags kyi mchod par gyur pa ni/ oM kriSh+Na tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM shwe tA tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pI tA/
323b6(rgyud 'bum): tsa la puSh+paM pra tIrbA hUM phaT swAhA/ oM rak+ta tsa la puSh+paM pra tId+yA hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+ya mA tsa la puSh+paM pra tAd+b+ha hU~M phaT sAH/ oM dr-iSha bidz+rI puSh+paM pra tIn+tiM hUM phaT/ oM mau ha badz+rI puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hUM
323b7(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM pi shu ni badz+rI puSh+paM pra tI d+da hUM phaT/ oM rA ga badz+re puSh+paM pra tIts+tshe hUM phaT/ oM Ir+ya kha badz+rI puSh+paM pra tits+tsha hUM phaT/ de bzhin du/ dI paM dang / d+hu paM/ gan+d+ha/ nai bi d+ye/ del+le d+Yu
324a1(rgyud 'bum): nye bar spyad pa lngas dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o/ / gang tshe dbus su mi g.yo dkar// gti mug rdo rje ma dang bcas// de yi dkyil 'khor nyid du shes// de bzhin mi g.yo sar
324a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / rnal 'byor lnga yis rab dbye bas// dkyil 'khor lnga ru brtag par bya// sems nyid rtse gcig gyur pa yis// sngon du bsnyen pa brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor rab zhugs rnal 'byor ma// rnal
324a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dang ni yang dag ldan/ / phan tshun du ni phyag byas nas// bza' ba sha dang chang yang bya// zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro ba gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi
324a4(rgyud 'bum): rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ slob ma ji lta bu nyid la// rgyud 'di rab tu sbyar bar bya// the tshom med par bya ba nyid// khyab bdag chen po
324a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po skyabs su 'gro ba gsum sbyin par bya'o// bslab pa lnga dang gso sbyong dag kyang ngo // de nas dbang lnga dang / gsang ba dang /
324a6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo // de nas skal ldan slob ma la// rgyud kyi de nyid bstan par bya// gzhan dag ring du spang bar bya// gzhan du gus bcas gyur kyang spang // de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshogs
324a7(rgyud 'bum): su bcad pa 'di'o/ / ji srid snying po byang chub par// sangs rgyas la ni bdag skyabs mchi// dam pa'i chos la bdag skyabs mchi// dge 'dun la yang mi phyed dang // de la bslab pa lnga'i tshigs su bcad pa
324b1(rgyud 'bum): ni srog gcod ma byin len pa dang / / gzhan gyi bud med brdzun smra rnams// spang bya kun la 'phags bzhin bya// lnga pa chang gi btung ba nyid// de la 'dir gso sbyong gi tshigs su bcad pa ni// bdag gis
324b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can gsang mi bya/ / pha rol nor ni 'phrog mi bya// bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa spyod// brdzun gyi tshig kyang spang bar bgyi// myos byed chang gi btung ba ni// bdag gis gang du'ang btung mi bya// gar dang /
324b3(rgyud 'bum): gru dang rgyan rnams dang // rgod pag rnams ni spang bar bya// khri stan mtho dang khri stan che// dus min kha zas spang bar bya// de ltar gso sbyong yan lag brgyad// dgra bcom rjes su bdag gis bslab//
324b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ltar// rnam dag bdag gis bzung bar bgyi// de yi g.yon can bdud las rgyal// bla med sangs rgyas mchog thob bya// 'dir ni srid pa ni gyur nas// lus can kun gyi
324b5(rgyud 'bum): skyabs gyur te/ / 'khor ba ji srid de srid par// skyes bu bde bar gshegs pa skye// skye bo bzang po dang 'grogs 'dir// blo ldan 'jig rten la phan dga'// de la 'dir chu'i dbang ni/ slob ma dri ma dang bral zhing
324b6(rgyud 'bum): shel dag pa bzhin du bsams nas/ / rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs te/ lo ma dang bcas pa'i lag pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ zhes pa 'dis dbang bskur bar
324b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de la 'dir dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba ni gos la sogs pa la byas pa'i dbu rgyan rin po che kun nas grub par bsams nas/ slob ma'ang 'khor los sgyur ba lngar bsams nas mgo bor dbu rgyani sbyin
325a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na A bi sha A bi sha a s+ya hr-i da ye hUM phaT/ de la ral gri'i dbang bskur ba ni lcags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las ral gri
325a2(rgyud 'bum): de'i lag pa g.yas su byin nas/ sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM ha na ha na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba sha twaM dz+nyA na baDA ga hUM phaT/ de la 'dir zhags pa'i dbang bsrub pa ri zangs pa la sogs pa la byas pa'i
325a3(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa de'i sdig mdzub dang bcas pa'i lag pa g.yon par byin nas/ sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ A kaD+D+h+ya kaD+D+h+ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM pA she bi d+ha baM d+ha/ ma hA sat+ya te d+har+m+ma te swA hA/ de la
325a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ming gi dbang ni slob ma khro bo gtum po chen po'i phyag rgya runye bar bkod nas/ de'i rnam par sems kyis dmigs te/ oM he shrI b+ha gaM wA na kr-iSh+Na tsa la saM d+hi s+t+waM hUM phaT/ de nas sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar
325a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de bzhin du sgrub pa pos nag po la sogs pa'i dbyibs/ mi g.yo ba rnam pa lnga'i ming gis dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dbang lnga'o// bud med rnams kyi dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba
325a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas/ saun d+hu ra'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// rgyal srid kyi lha mo chen mo'i tshul du slob ma dmigs te/ oM b+ha ga wa ti A bi sha A bi sha Ar+ya hr-i da ye hUM phaT/ lcags la sogs pa'i gri
325a7(rgyud 'bum): gug de'i lag pa g.yas su sbyin par bya'o/ / oM ka ri ke sar+b+ba ma ra Na maM saM kArta ya kArta ya hUM phaT/ lag pa g.yon par mi'i thod pa 'am rdza las byas pa sbyin par bya'o// oM badz+ra ka pA la sarba sha tA rmA
325b1(rgyud 'bum): rakaM/ d+ha ra ya hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya ru rnam par bkod nas/ de'i rnam par dmigs te/ oM he shrI dwe Sha badz+rA sid+d+hi s+t+waM hUM phaT/ de bzhin du bud med ni nag mo la sogs pa'i kha
325b2(rgyud 'bum): dog gi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma lnga po rnams kyi ming gis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / 'dir shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su thabs kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes so// de nas gsang ba'i dbang
325b3(rgyud 'bum): bskur bar gyur pa ni bla ma la slob mas/ gos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ de la rang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang lang chos brgyan pa'i shes rab ma dbul bar bya'o// khyod la 'di ni 'bul
325b4(rgyud 'bum): lags kyis/ / 'dod kun bde bar rab tu stsol// bdag ni 'dod pa'i bde don phyir// mgon po khyod kyis brtse bas zung // de nas bla ma la phyag 'tshal nas slob ma phyir byung ste/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA re
325b5(rgyud 'bum): Sha Na hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bzlas shing gnas par bya'o// yang bla mas chang dang sha la sogs pa rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod nas/ shes rab kyang tshim par byas te/ yang dag par sbyor ba
325b6(rgyud 'bum): las nye bar byung ba'i dkar dmar lo ma'i skyong bu la sogs par bzhag nas slob ma bos te/ de'i lce la mthe bong dang ming med kyis rdzas bzung nas/ hUM phaT kyi yi ge bri bar bya'o// de nas a ho su khaM
325b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod par bya'o/ / de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/ de ring bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ gang gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
326a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur gyis/ 'on kyang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du 'di smra bar mi bya'o// de nas
326a2(rgyud 'bum): / slob ma'i snying khar ral gri bzhag nas/ 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ gal te smra na de yi tshe// shin tu rno ba'i ral gri 'di// khro bo gtum po'i phyag na gnas// gang gis dam tshig 'jig byed pa/
326a3(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di yis mchog tu gcod// skye ba bye ba stong rnams su// mi rnams ral gri lag 'phyar bas// yan lag kun gcod mgo bo ni// 'di yis mchog tu gcod par byed// gal te dam
326a4(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di nyid kyis/ / khyod kyis 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas slob mas brjod par bya ste/ de ltar nges zhes so// de nas gdong g.yogs bcings nas dkyil 'khor du me tog dbul
326a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de nas gdong g.yogs bsal nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan par bya'o// gang dang gang gi mtshan ma de nas bstan par bya'o// de nas slob ma la shes rab ma de sbyin par bya'o// gzungs
326a6(rgyud 'bum): ma yid 'ong 'di khyod kyis/ / bsnyen byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// de nas dga' ba bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba thams rna
326a7(rgyud 'bum): bar smra bar bya'o/ / de nas tha ma phyi rol tu byung nas/ shes rab gcer bur tsog pus gsang gnas mdzub mos bstan nas/ ci ste bu khyod 'di spro'am// nga las mi gtsang ba dang ni// bshang
326b1(rgyud 'bum): rak+ta za ba dang / / b+ha ga'i gnas la 'o byed dam// sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste// khyod las mi gtsang bza' ba ni// tsi yi phyir na bdag mi spro// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag gis mi mo kur gus
326b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ des kyang / a ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan// gang zhig cho gas sten byed ni// bdag ni dngos grub stsol mdzad ma// blo ldan brtan pa rab sbyor bas// pad+mar/
326b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ji bzhin gyis// rang nyid khro bo gtum po chen por gnas pas bde ba chen po ste/ de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid khro bo gtum po chen po'i rnam par bsams la// shes rab kyang zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i tshul
326b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis yang dag par sbyor bas dga' ba bzhi mtshon par bya'o/ / de nas yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bla ma la sogs pa la chang dang sha la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o zhes pa
326b5(rgyud 'bum): ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo / / zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// /
326b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgom pa po yaM phyir// khro chen gtum po bsgom par bya// sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar bya// dbang phyug dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom
326b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yid dang 'thun pa'i sa phyogs ni// bar du gcod pa kun bral bar// ji ltar rnyed pa'i stan nyid la// de la mnyam bzhag brtag par bya// dang po byams pa bsgom
327a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gnyis par snying rje bsgom par bya// gsum pa la ni dga' ba bsgom// kun gyi mtha' la btang snyoms so// de nas rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las pad+ma dang / zla ba dang /
327a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'od zer rnams kyi bdun du bsam gtan gyi khro bo gtum po bsams nas yid kyis mchod pa bya ste/ mkhas pas me tog la sogs pas// yid kyis de rnams mchod par bya// de mdun sdig
327a3(rgyud 'bum): pa bshags par bgyi/ / bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang // gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya// bskul zhing gsol ba rab tu 'debs// bdag nyid yongs su 'bul ba dang // bsod nams yongs su
327a4(rgyud 'bum): bsngo bar bya/ / de nas smon lam btab nas ni// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// de nas phyag ni btsal byas la// 'od zer rnams kyis slar yang bsdu// mkhas pas stong par bsams pa ni// sngags
327a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid ni brjod par bya/ / oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kohaM/ rab tu 'bad pas hU~M yig ni// 'od zer de yis bsregs par bsams// ga pur bsregs pa ji bzhin bsams// 'od zer la yang
327a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam mi rtog/ thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin du// skad cig gis ni rnam par sgom// dri med dag pa'i shel bzhin du// rang lus rnam par bsgom par bya// sngon du bsgom bya phyi nas ni// yaM raM baM laM bzhi rnams
327a7(rgyud 'bum): las/ / yongs gyur bsgom bya rlung dang ni// me dang chu dang sa rnams so// b+h+rUM yig de las bsgom bya ba// gzhal yas khang du rab tu sgom// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes//
327b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su bsam bya ba// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad ldan// paM yig sa bon las byung ba// de la oM yig las byung zla// raM yig las byung nyi ma ste// de steng hUM yig las kyang slar// des bskyed pa
327b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pa ru bsam/ / mA ma kIr bcas yang dag sbyor// de la rim bzhin rnal 'byor dbang // de yi spyi bo la thim nas// skar mnga' ji bzhir sbyor ba yis// mA ma kI yi b+ha gar bsapa// de las khu ba ro
327b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam gyur/ / lhung gyur de yi b+ha ga'i nang // gtum po'i gzugs su gyur nas ni// b+ha ga'i mtha' las nges byung nas// mi bskyod pa la rol gri yis// bsnun nas phyi nas rab tu bza'// mA ma kI sa
327b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang de las de'i/ / sha za ba ni rab tu bsam// de phyir mA ma kIs bzung nas// ma dang yang dag rab 'dod bya// des kyang 'khyud par bsam bya ba// zhe sdang rdo rje ma yi gzugs// phyag g.yas na ni ral gri
327b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phyar/ / g.yon pa zhags pa dang bcas pa'i// sdigs mdzub kyis ni bsdigs par byed// so yis ma mchu yang dag bsdams// rkang g.yas rdeb pa'i stabs kyis ni// bdud pa'i rnam par nyed par
327b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / pus mo g.yon pa sa la btsugs// 'jigs byed 'khyog por gzigs pa can// nor 'dzin la ni sdigs mdzub bstan// pus mo g.yon pa'i rtse mos gnas// mi bskyod sngon pos dbu
327b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan mdzad/ / rin po che yi cod pan can// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur pa'i// gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan// brgyad gnyis lo yi rnam pa can// spyan gnyis dmar po gtso bo yis// sems
328a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid brtan pas bsgom par bya/ / bdag nyid khro bo gtum grub nas// de nas bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// shar du mi g.yo dkar po spro// me mtshams gti mug rdo rje ma// ston
328a2(rgyud 'bum): ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs spro/ / lho ru mi g.yo ser po spro// phra ma rdo rje bden bral ser// mi g.yo dmar po nub tu spro// rlung ngu 'dod chags rdo rje ma// mi g.yo ljang khu byang phyogs su// dbang ldan
328a3(rgyud 'bum): phrag dog rdo rje ma/ / phyi nas shes rab dang bcas des// rang gi mgrin pa las byung ba'i// lha mo rnams kyis glu yis bskul// ba h+ma mai tri tu bi badz+ra a he hi mA shun+d+ha sa ha ba to// b+hA ba'i oM e phiT mI sa
328a4(rgyud 'bum): pA dza/ ga hi ba b+ha ba/ ga ti mug rdo rje mas so// mA ka ru Na tsi ya phiT hi pa hu mA ho hi tu shun+na mA mo dzu de ha/ su du k+Shi a ha i dzI ba ba huMn+na/ phra ma rdo rje ma yis so// kwi pi tu ha ri pa/ bi ti hi
328a5(rgyud 'bum): a shun+da hi ka ri pi pa be sha/ hodz+dza ni man+t+ra na ka ri DA/ mi Ni ats+tsha i lo A she Sha/ 'dod chags rdo rje ma yi'o// yau ban bin+na mu pe khe a niSh+pe la shun+d+ha e din+na/ shun+d+ha sa hA ba bi go i a ka ra hi tu me
328a6(rgyud 'bum): e sa ma g+hiD+D+h+ya/ phrag dog rdo rje ma yi'o// khyab bdag byams pa rnams spangs nas// spyong pa'i rang bzhin du ma mdzad// khyod dang rnam bral ba dag 'gum pas// 'gro kun stong par ma mdzad
328a7(rgyud 'bum): cig/ gti mug rdo rje mas so// snying rje'i sems bral bdag 'gum pas// khyab bdag stong par ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi lus ni sdug bsngal bas// 'tshe ba dang bral ma mdzad cig/ phra
328b1(rgyud 'bum): ma rdo rje ma sri so/ / ci ste mkhas pa khyod nyid ni// dga' ba spangs nas stong par 'jug/ 'jig rten ma lus pa rnams dang // bdag gi yid ni khyod la sdod// 'dod chags rdo rje ma yis so//
328b2(rgyud 'bum): lang tshe dang ldan btang snyoms pa'i// mig ni stong pa 'bras med can// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// bdag la mnyam nyid sbyor bar mdzod// phrag dog rdo rje ma sri so// 'di ni rmi lam lhar
328b3(rgyud 'bum): thos nas/ / khu ba las 'khrungs skad cig gis// sngon ma'i gzugs bzhin bsam par bya// bdag nyid yang dag sbyor de las// mi g.yo dkar po la bsnun nas// gti mug rdo rje rab 'dod
328b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / mi g.yo dkar po'i gzugs su bya// mi g.yo ser po slar bsad nas// 'dod bya phra ma rdo rje mar// bdag nyid mi g.yo ser por bya// de bzhin mi g.yo dmar po bsad// 'dod chags rdo rje mar
328b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod bya/ / mi g.yo dmar pos bdag nyid bya// mi g.yo ljang khu bsad nas kyang // phrag dog rdo rje mar 'dod bya// mi g.yo ljang khus bdag nyid bya// lha mo bzhi la rjes rags pas// dkyil
328b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdu/ / bdag nyid gcig tu yang dag sbyor// 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya// de las nga rgyal byas pa yis// bdag la dngos grub the tsom med// kha dog nag
328b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir rnal 'byor pa/ / gang sgom de ni mi g.yo na ga/ kha dog dkar phyir rnal 'byor pa// gang sgom de ni mi g.yo dkar// kha dog ser phyir rnal 'byor pa// gang sgom de ni mi g.yo ser//
329a1(rgyud 'bum): dog dmar phyir rnal 'byor pa// gang sgom de ni mi g.yo dmar// kha dog ljang phyir rnal 'byor pa// gang sgom de ni mi g.yo ljang // kha dog nag mo'i bud med des// zhe sdang rdo rje
329a2(rgyud 'bum): ma bsgom bya/ / kha dog dkar mo'i bud des// gti mug rdo rje ma bsgom bya// kha dog ser mo'i bud med nges// phra ma rdo rje ma bsgom bya// kha dog dmar mo'i bud med des// 'dod chags rdo rje ma bsgom
329a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / kha dog ljang khu'i bud med des// phrag dog rdo rje ma bsgom bya// skyes kun rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa// bud med rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma// nag sogs kha dog dbye ba yis// 'di rnams kun la rab tu
329a4(rgyud 'bum): brtags/ / yang na las kyi dbye ba yis// dbye ba lnga ru rab tu brtag/ gnag phyir gsad dang zhe sdang la// zhi la dkar po dag tu 'dod// rengs dang rgyas la ser po ste// dbang dang dgug la dmar
329a5(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / skrod pa la ni ljang kur bshad// yang na rigs kyi rab dbye bas// bram zer dkar po dmangs rigs nag/ gtum po ser po dag la 'dod// dmar po gar ma dag la 'dod// ljang khu chos
329a6(rgyud 'bum): ma zhes bya'o/ / bu mo sngo bsangs mig yangs ma// nag mo bsgoms pa pos 'dod bya// bu mo dkar mo dkar po yis// bu mo ser mo ser po yis// bu mo dmar mo dmar po yis// bu mo ljang khu
329a7(rgyud 'bum): ljang khu yis/ / yang na gang gis de 'dzin pa// de dang de yi sgom pa mchog/ ji lta ba yang mi shes pas// sems nyid brtan pas 'dod par bya// phyogs tsam rab tu sbyor ba las// bu mo de yis
329b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ster/ / rdo rje'i shu klur gyur pa la// lce yis kun nas 'jib par bya// ji srid 'dod pa'i bshang gci yang // de yi kha dang b+ha gar sbyin// gud pad+ma rab 'jib pas// boSh+NI ci 'dod
329b2(rgyud 'bum): rab bza' bya/ / ngo tsha skyug bro byed gyur na// rnam pa kun tu dngos grub nyams// 'di ni rang gi bza' ba mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bzas// zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pur
329b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/ lha nyid kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas sngags rnams kun las btus// bdag gis rab tu bshad
329b4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags kun las btus pa 'di gsungs so// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha
329b5(rgyud 'bum): Na hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM a tsa la hUM hrIHrtsa ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o// oM hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags gsum pa'o// hUM snying po'i sngags so// haM snying po'i sngags gnyis pa'o//
329b6(rgyud 'bum): ho snying po'i sngags gsum pa'o// oM hI hI hAM tsaN+Da rU pe tsa Ta tsa Ta/ pra tsa Ta pra tsa Ta/ ka ha ka haM/ prA phu ra pra phu ra/ pra s+phA ra ya pra s+phA ra ya/ ha na ha na/ gra sa gra sa/ ba d+ha ba d+ha/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya
329b7(rgyud 'bum): stam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sar+b+ba shai tU N+DaM/ mu kha baM d+hA nAM/ ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba DA ki ni nA~M/ gra ha gra ha/ b+hu ta pi shAM tsa byA d+hi yak+Sha NAM/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ma
330a1(rgyud 'bum): rA ra tsaN+Da ru ka rak+Sha rak+Sha/ wA sbyin la/ tsaN+Da ma hA se na/ sar+b+ba mAdz+nyA pa ya ti/ oM tsaN+Da mahA ro laNahU~M pha/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba shA pa ri pU ra keb+h+ya
330a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba tha a tsa la kA Ni nan+da nan+ta/ main+d+ra moT+Ta/ sar+b+ba sar+b+ba/ taT+TatuH/ tauSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A be sha/ oMHmahA mahA ba la ka d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Na ti Na/ khA pa khA ngaM/ bag+h+na mA ra
330a3(rgyud 'bum): ya/ mA ra ya/ duSh+TAM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ra/ mahA ba Sha badz+ra phaT/ hUM hUM hUM tri ba li ta rA gA narta kan+d+ha hUM hU~M a tsa le tse Ta/ swai Ta s+pho Ta ya hU~M/ sa man ti ka Ta ma hA ba la satwa ya
330a4(rgyud 'bum): sam nA ya/ traM ma hI/ shu dz+yA tu lo ka tuSh+TA tu badzin mo s+thA a pra ti ha te ba le b+h+yo dz+wa la tA Ta hU~M saM na maHsAhA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o// na maHsar+b+ba sha pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
330a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba d+haT+Ta/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ma s+pho Ta ya hUM/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ hUM tr-i Ta mo haM/ 'phreng ba'i sngags gsum pa'o// zhes pa ni mi g.yo ba lnga po rnams kyi spyi'i sngags so// oM kr-iSh+Na
330a6(rgyud 'bum): tsa la hUM phaT/ oM shwe tA tsa la hUM phaT/ oM pI tA tsa la hUM phaT/ oM rak+Sha tsa la hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma tsa la hUM phaT/ lha mo rnams kyi thun mong ba'i sngags ni/ oM badz+ra yo gi ni hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so//
330a7(rgyud 'bum): / oM pradz+nyA pa ra mi te hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o// oM bau he re hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags gsum pa'o// oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+Na ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+ha bar+d+ha ri/ d+hi ro d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swAhA/
330b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i sngags so// bye brag pa'i sngags ni/ oM dwe Sha badz+ri hUM phaT/ oM mo ha badz+ri hUM phaT/ oM pi shu badz+ri hUM phaT/ oM ra ga badz+ri hUM phaT/ oM IraSh+Ta badz+ri hUM phaT/ gsor ma'i spyi sngags ni/
330b2(rgyud 'bum): oM na mo b+ha ga ba he shrI tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ya de bA su ra/ ma nu Sh+Ta tras ya nA ya/ sa ka la mA ra d+har+m+ma/ bi nA sha na yai/ rat+na mu ku Ta kr-i ta sa ri sa i maM/ ba li grih+Na gr-i h+Na ma ma sar+b+ba big+h+nAM/ ha ra ha ra/
330b3(rgyud 'bum): tsat+ta ramA rI ni bA ra ni bA ra/ trA satwA se/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ n+da snin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+d+ha/ nA sha nA shaM/ tA pa tA pa/ shoShi shai She/ ts+tshad ts+tshed/ b+hed b+h+red/ duSh+Ta sa twan/ ma ya bi rung d+hA tsi
330b4(rgyud 'bum): b+hU wI ku ru ku ru/ hU hrI hUM phaT phaT/ phaT phaT/ swAhU~M/ zhes pa ni dnga' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal ze bi gtim po chen po'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi rim par bye bste
330b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la bcom ldan 'das kyis dam du 'khyud nas/ pad+ma dang rdo rje rab tu sbyor bas gsungs pa/ rdzogs
330b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yi/ / bsgom par bya ba ci 'dra zhig/ rnal 'byor rnams la nges phan phyir// dri ba mtha' dgra bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzog
330b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa'i sbyor gnas pa'i/ / gcig sbyor bde mchog rnal 'byor pa// nyin mtshan bdag gi tshul gyis ni// sems rtse gcig pas bsgom par bya// re zhig rang gi bud med kyang // khyod kyi
331a1(rgyud 'bum): @gzugs su nges par brtag/ de nyid shin tu mngon sbyor bas// ji lta ba bzhin gsal por bgrod// ma dang bu mo de nas ni// srin mo dang nin mo dang // gzhan yang che
331a2(rgyud 'bum): kun dang ni/ / de bzhin Do bI bram ze mo// gtum mo dang ni gar ma dang // chos ma dang ni gzugs kyis 'tsho// brtul zhugs can ma rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thod pa can ma yang // gzhan/
331a3(rgyud 'bum): yang ji ltar rnyed pa yi// bud med gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// cho ga mkhas pas bsten par bya// ji ltar 'jigs par mi 'gyur bas// zhig na khro bo gtum po ni// khros pas
331a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po 'joms byed/ / ral gri zhags pas 'jigs byed can// mnar med par yang ltung bar byed// 'jig rten 'dir yang dngos grub med// 'jig rten pha rol kyang de bzhin//
331a5(rgyud 'bum): dedo phyir shin tu gsang ba yin// gnyis kyi spyod yul min par bya// khro bo gtum po'i sgrub thabs ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags bzhi sba// shin tu 'dod ldan don gyi phyir// sangs
331a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bdag nyid kyis gsungs pa/ / bar du gcod pa kun spangs pa'i// yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su// rang sems 'dod ldan ma dga' ma// rab tu sbas pas brtsam par bya//
331a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab pha rol phyin dga' mas// bdag ni sangs rgyas mi g.yor 'grub// rang gzugs shin tu 'bad pa yis// mkhas pas sems kyis bsgom par bya// skye bos dben
331b1(rgyud 'bum): byas gnas su ni/ / ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos kyis ni// gnyis gnyis phan tshun sbyor ba yis// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// mi mo mngon sum byas nas ni// mngon du phyogs pas nye
331b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dug ste/ / phan tshun gnyis po chags pa yis// rab dga' phan tshun blta bar bya// de las mthong ba de yi bsam gtan ni// yid ni rtse gcig gnas par bya// de yis de la de
331b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid brjod/ / bde ba'i gzi mdangs byed pa smra// de la bu khyod bdag gi bdag/ khyod ni ming po mes po dang // bdag ni khyod kyi chung ma ma// sring mo dang ni tsha mo yin// skye bo bdun rgyud
331b4(rgyud 'bum): zhabs 'bring ba/ / khyod ni bdag gi g.yog yin te// bdag ni khyod kyis rin gyis nyos// bdag gi khyod kyi rje dpon ma// rkang pa dag gi drung btud nas// shin tu thal mo rab sbyar
331b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / de la 'di bzhin brjod par bya// bde ba'i gzi mdangs mchog ces brjod// khyod ni bdag gi pha dang ma// bdag gi chung ma tsha mo yin// srin mo'i bu yi chung ma dang // khyod ni bdag
331b6(rgyud 'bum): gi rje bo yin/ / khyod kyis bdag ni rnam kun tu// shin tu gus pa'i dpung gnyen g.yog/ badrag la yum gyis brtse bas gzigs// yid 'ong lta bas nges bltas nas// de nas yang
331b7(rgyud 'bum): dang yang du ni/ / skyes bu yis ni tsum pa bya// yi ge gsum ni kye sogs sbyin// kha las kha yis bdud rtsi dang // langs nas pad+ma bstan par bya// mig 'phrul kha yis 'jib byas nas/
332a1(rgyud 'bum): ku tsa sting khar btsir bar bya// mngon phyogs de yi gdong bltas nas// tsu ta'i gnas la smra bar bya// de la blta ba'i tshig la ni// bdag gi rnam par snang mdzad
332a2(rgyud 'bum): bza'/ / khyod ni mi bskyod nu 'thungs na// bu dang pha dang bran po'o// khyod kyi rje dpon ma nyid nga // rgyal rigs ma yi yum nyid kyang // bu khyod rab tu 'bad pa yis// bdag gi zhabs la
332a3(rgyud 'bum): skyabs su song / / gang phyir bdag ni 'phel byed ma// khyod la rin chen nye bar 'ongs// bu khyod byas gzor gyis shig kye// rdo rjes bde skyed bdag la byin// dbus su ze'u 'brus brgya
332a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / chu skyes 'dab ma gsum par gzigs// a ho bde ba can gyi zhing // sangs rgyas sku mdog dmar pos mdzes// chags can zhi bde ster mdzad ma// rtog pa thams cad rnam par
332a5(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / bdag ni gan kyal yang dag sbyar// chags pas yid ni rnam par myos// phrag par rkang pa zung byin nas// bdag gi steng dang 'og tu ltos// de nas rdo rje rab sad pas// pad dbus
332a6(rgyud 'bum): ran tra rab tu gzhug/ brgya stong 'bum dong bye ba phrag/ de nas bskyod pa nyid du gyis// bdag pad 'dab ma gsum ldan pa// sha yis rab tu gang ldan la// rang gi rdo rje de gzhug pas// sems
332a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid bde bas rab tu mchod/ / rlung dang rlung gis bdag pa la// snying po las ni snying po mchog/ rdo rje'i rtse mor rab tu rig/ ban d+hu dmar po dang mtshungs pa// 'dzag pa'i bsam gtan de lani/
332b1(rgyud 'bum): slar yang sems nyid tshim par bya// shin tu mi g.yo'i sems nyid kyis// bde ba bde skyes bsgom par bya// de la lan ni rab tu sbyin// dga' ma khyod ni skad cig sdod// ji srid ma lus b+ha ga'i
332b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / skad cig tsam zhig bsam par bya// de la yum gyur cig nyid nges par 'gro ba gsum rnams zhing dang bde ba'i ma mdo// sdig pa'i las la gnas nyid mu cor smra ba zhe sdang ba las 'di
332b3(rgyud 'bum): ni smod par byed/ / de dang de rnams gting mtha' med pa'i dmyal bar de nyid mi bzad rtag tu sdug bsngal nyid// lus ni lan mang me yis sreg cing ngu 'bod du ni bskal pa gsum du gnas par byed//
332b4(rgyud 'bum): mi mo'i yon tan gang brjod na// sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin// ji snyed brtse dang srung ba dang // mi mo'i sems nyid la rab gnas// rang gzhan skye ba de nyid kyang // kun kyang de la yang
332b5(rgyud 'bum): yang rgyas/ / dpal gyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// gal te de gzugs las gzhan min// de yi lha dang reg pa dang // nyed pa kun nas ring zhog gi/ gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis kyang // skad cig de la bde ba
332b6(rgyud 'bum): thob/ / yul lnga rnams la mi mo yi// gzugs 'di nyid ni mchog tu gnas// de la bde ba 'bab mdzad pa// skyes bu rnams kyi sa rol bar gyis// de phyir nyes las nges grol ba// yon tan dam pa/
332b7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis brgyan// bsod nams bsod nams bsod nams che// sam gyis bdag la bka' drin mdzod// de nas de la shin tu bltas// mchu ni so yis bsdam par bya// nu ma 'gram dang si log dang //
333a1(rgyud 'bum): de yis gos bral rnal 'byor pas// byed cing gis ni bde 'byung bya// de la la zhon bcing ba dang // pus mo bzung la de nyid bcing // bcing ba brda nyed pa yang yin// rkang pas btsu
333a2(rgyud 'bum): byed bcing ba yang / / bcing ba sa la mnan par bya// mkhas pas mnyam bcing de nyid ni// bcing ba ri mo can zhes bya// bung ba'i drab bcing ba dang // 'khrul 'khor der zhon rkang pa can// de bzhin nyid/
333a3(rgyud 'bum): du rus sngal bcing // kun nas bzang po de bzhin nyid// de la skyil krung dbus su ni// mi mo tsog pu stan la 'dug/ dpung pa zung gis phrag pa la// de la dam du sbyar bar bya// rang gi lag pa zung dag
333a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i/ / rked pa'i dbus su nyer son te// pad+mar rdo rje rab bcug nas// bde ba 'byung ba'i bcing bar grags// gnyis ka'i lag bzung rab bcug nas// phan tshun sbyor bas bcing bar bya// gnyis
333a5(rgyud 'bum): kas cung zad bskyed par bya/ / de la'i bskyod pa zhes grags so// de yi pus gnyis rang gi ni// snying kha nyid du yang dag sbyar// do li bskyed pa'i byed pa dgod// 'di ni pus mo bzung nas bcing /
333a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi rkang mthil rang nyid kyi// brla yi khar yang sbyar bar bya// bde ba 'byung byed bkod pa yis// 'di ni brla rnyed bcing ba'o// de yi nu ma rkang pa dang // lte ba snying kha logs gnyis bkab// ngo
333a7(rgyud 'bum): li g.yo ba'i byed pa dgod/ / bcing ba 'di ni rkang pas spyod// de yi 'phangs gnyis sa la gzhag/ pha rol la mi 'khyud pa pos// bde ba 'byung byed bkod nas ni// bcing ba 'di ni sa la mnan//
333b1(rgyud 'bum): cog pus yang dag gnas de la// rkang pa gnyis po rab brkyang bya// bcing ba mnyam du shes byas la// re re zhing yang brkyang bar bya// de yi rkang zung 'khor lor byas// g.yon par rab tu gyur par
333b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ kun nas mngon par phyogs pas kyang // rgyab nas 'phongs la reg par bya// lag pas dang por mnye bar bya// bcing 'di tsi tra can zhes bya// slar yang bde ba 'byung byas nas// de la
333b3(rgyud 'bum): gan kyal bsgyel bar bya/ / lag pa g.yas pas de nyid du// pad+mar rdo rje nges bzhug bya// de yi pus mo'i 'og bzung nas// gri khugs steng du sbyar bar bya// phan tshun lag pa gnyis kyis ni//
333b4(rgyud 'bum): bung ba'i dra ba zhes su shes// de yi rkang pa zung dag ni// phrag pa'i steng du nges par byin// bcing ba 'di ni 'khrul 'khor zhon// 'bebs shing 'bebs pas rab tu sbyor// de yi rkang g.yon phrag pa
333b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ / g.yas g.yon brla yi rtsa ba las// de yi rkang g.yas g.yon pa las// g.yas pa yi ni rtsa ba ru// 'dir ni rkang pa stengs bcing bas// yang dag bde bas sdug bsngal 'joms// de yi rkang
333b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mthil la ni/ / brang gi dbus su mnyam du sbyar// lag pa gnyis kyis btsir bar bya// pus mo rus sbal bcing bar gsungs// de yi rkang pa'i mthil la ni// mig dang rna ba mgo bo sbyar//
333b7(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba 'din kun tu bzang // 'dod kun bde ba rab tu ster// tsi tra'i srid skyil krung byas// kun nas sna tshogs pa yi ni// khro bo gtum pa sbyor ba yis// kun nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa// ji srid
334a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas yang nas yang / / de yi kha la'o bya'o// mig ni bim bus gdong du blta// ji ltar 'dod tshig smra ba yi// gdong la lce yis 'jib par bya// de yi kha nas byung bar/
334a2(rgyud 'bum): btung // so yi dri ma'ang za zhing 'jig/ bde bar rnam par bsgom par bya// chog shes pas cung zad du// so yis lce dang mchu ni bsdam// lce yis sna yi bu ga dang // mig gi zur kyang sbyang
334a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / so dang mchan khung las byung ba'i// dri ma kun kyang bza' bar bya// mgo dang mig dang mgrin pa rna// logs dag rked pa nu ma lag/ 'os 'jib sen mo sbyin par bya// mig gnyis
334a4(rgyud 'bum): spangs la bud med la/ / lag pas nu ma mnye bya zhing // so yang gdab cing 'jib par bya// rang gis gan kyal byas nas 'ji ba// lto ba mdzes la 'jib par bya// bdag gis mngon nas
334a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid ni/ / yang dang yang ni dran par bya// pad+mar lag pas reg par bya// rlung gis mdzes pa zhes smra ba// de la 'o dang sen mo sbyin// blta zhing lag pas bsal bar bya// mi mo'i dri ma
334a6(rgyud 'bum): mnam bya zhing / / bu ga'ang ro 'dzin gyis sbyang bya// ji lta bar ni bdag zhugs nas// 'di yis kyang ni dpag med bskyed// de la lto zhing tshig 'di brjod// lam 'di nyid ni drang po ste// de nyid
334a7(rgyud 'bum): mi shes sbyor ba yis/ / lam 'dis 'gro ba drug tu 'jug/ sbyor ba rab tu shes pa yis// khro bo gtum po'i dngos grub 'gyur// de phyir pad byung dkar dmar ni// kha yis dgug par byas nas ni//
334b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang ni blta byas nas// de ni kha yis bza' bar bya// sen mo legs byas badz+ra dang ni// bran bzhin rkang pa mnye bar bya// mgo bor yi ge gsum sbyin bya// snying dbus khu tshur chung ngus
334b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin/ rnal 'byor pa ni mnyam bzhag pas// de phyir gzhan don ldan par bya// yid ni rtse gcig bde ba yis// 'dod pa'i bya ba de la sbyin// ji ltar 'dod pa rab 'dzag pas// 'pho med yid na
334b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsi gcig bde/ / 'phos 'gyur pad+ma las 'jig ste// pus btsugs rab tu sbyor ba yis// pad+mar khu ba rdul gyur pa// lce yis blangs nas bza' bar bya// sna yis na li rab sbyor bas/
334b4(rgyud 'bum): stobs ni 'phel phyir btung bar bya// kha la 'o ni byas nas kyang // shes rab pad+ma lce yis myangs// 'khyud byas de yi phyi nas ni// sha dang nya ni bza' bya zhing // 'o ma chang ni yang yang btung //
334b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas rab tu 'phel 'gyur phyir// ngal dang brnyings gyur de las ni// phyi nas 'dod 'gyur bde sogs kyis// slar yang sngon ma'i rim pa yis// gnyis gnyis phan tshun rab tu brtsam//
334b6(rgyud 'bum): goms pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya// skye bar 'di nyid sbyor rig na// khro bo gtum po'i go 'phang 'dzin// chags can dngos grub don gyi phyir// bdag gis sbyor ba rab//
334b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya// g.yon pa'i byin pa steng bzhag nas// g.yas pa'i byin pa rol bar bya// 'di ni sems dpa'i skyil krung grags// 'dod kun bder rab tu ster// byin pa g.yas pa steng bzhag nas//
335a1(rgyud 'bum): byin pa g.yon pa rol par bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i skyil krung grags// 'dod kun bde ba rab tu ster// pad+ma'i spyir krung bcings nas ni// byin pa g.yon pa steng du dgod/
335a2(rgyud 'bum): byin pa g.yas pha rol pa ste// rdo rje'i skyil krung zhes byar shes// rkang pa sa la bzhag nas ni// mtshungs par ring du gdong phyogs pa// 'dod kun rab tu sbyin shes bya// 'dir ni cog pu'i gdan
335a3(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ rkang pa sa la dgod byas la// skyog por 'phred la ring du bya// zla ba phyed pas shes par bya// 'dis ni bde ba rab tu ster// pus bzung 'phreng la sa la gzhag/ long bu'i dbus su 'phongs
335a4(rgyud 'bum): chos gzhag/ 'dir ni gzhu yi gdan byas pas// 'dod pa mchog gi dga' ba ster// sems dpa'i skyil krung de bzhin du// rdo rje'i skyil krung zhes byar brtag/ tsog pu zla ba phyed pa dang // gzhu
335a5(rgyud 'bum): yi gdan yang 'dir 'dod do/ / zla ba phyed pa'i gdan gnas la// rtag tu mi mo byas nas ni// lhung na pad+mar lce yis blangs// gsang gnas yi ge gsum mtshon bya// slar yang gzhu yi gdan byas
335a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rang gi me yi bshang nang du// khro bo gtum po sbyor ba yis// des bskyed bde ba bsgom par bya// rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas// de yi rnal 'byor ldan par bya// chags bral sems ni
335a7(rgyud 'bum): spangs byas la/ / ma la rab tu 'dod par bya// rjes su chags las bsod nams 'thob// chags bral las ni sdig pa 'thob// chags bral las ni sdig gzhan med// de las bsod nams
335b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan na med/ / de phyir sems nyid mnyam gzhag nas// 'dod pa'i bde ba bskyed par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rab tu dgyes nas mngon par dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la

335b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid thos nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams gau rI dang / dpal mo dang / dbang mo dang / dga' ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams blangs nas sgom par rtsom mo// de nas de'i skad cig

341b2(rgyud 'bum): gang du'ang bud med mi spong ba// 'din sangs rgyas gsung du thos// gang du khyod kyis gzhan byas na// de yi sdig pas dmyal bar 'gyur// bud med dang bral ci byas kyang // gzhan
341b3(rgyud 'bum): du'achi 'gyur dngos grub min/ / khro bo gtum po'i sgrub thabs ni// dka' thub kyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur// yid ni dri med ma byas par// 'bras med gti mug dra bas bcings//
341b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod ldan 'dod pa spong byed pa// brdzun gyis 'tsho ba skye 'gyur te// brdzun gyis gang 'tsho sdig pa ste// sdig pas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus ni thob pa na// brdzun
341b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'tshe bar the tsom mod/ / de phyir bsgrub bya bsgrub par bya// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid 'dod pas so// 'dod yon lnga po de spangs nas// bdag nyid dka' thub gdung mi bya// gzugs
341b6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed pa ni blta bya zhing / / sgra yang de bzhin mnyan par bya// dri ni bsnam par bya ba ste// ro yi mchog ni bza' bar bya// reg bya reg par bya ba ste// 'dod pa lnga po bsnyen par bya// khro bo gtum
341b7(rgyud 'bum): po de mchog ni/ / myur du sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro// gzhan la slu ba med gyur cing // gti mug mchog tu med par bya// mi yi lang tsho thob pa la// mi mo'i bde ba mi spyod na// chen
342a1(rgyud 'bum): po mchog tu zad byas nas/ / lta ba'ang 'bras bu med par byas// 'dod can ma rtag bsten byas na// 'dod pa tsam gyi dpung gnyen gyis// btsun mo'i skye gnas yang dag
342a2(rgyud 'bum): bsten/ / khro bo gtum po'i go 'phang mthong // gnyid ni ji ltar spang bar bya// bza' ba dang ni rgod pa nyid// 'jig rten ma dad spang ba'i phyir// lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma sras mkhas// pho brang
342a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi btsun mo ni/ / stong phrag brgyad khri spangs nas slar// nai rany+dza na'i 'gram gshegs nas// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab gsungs dang // gang du bdud ni 'dul mdzad pa//
342a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gzhan don kho na yin// gang phyir btsun mo'i nang sangs rgyas// go pA dang bcas bde ldan grub// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// gang phyir bde ba las thob bo// bde ba las thob sangs
342a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ni/ / bde ba bud med dang bral min// gang du sbyor bral bya ba ni// 'jig rten nyams pa spang phyir ro// 'jig rten gang gis 'dul ba na// de dang de yi sangs rgyas 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sgyu
342a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i gar nyid kyis/ / de dang de nyid tshul gyis so// mdo sde chos mngon thams cad nas// bud med rnams ni smod mdzad pa// sna tshogs slob ma'i snod phyir bshad// de kho na nyid sbas nas//
342a7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs// phung po lnga dang rnam bral ba'i// mya ngan 'das pa blta bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi/
342b1(rgyud 'bum): sbas gang lags/ go pA yang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras nyid kyang // khro bo gtum po bdag nyid yin// sa 'tsho khyod nyid bcom ldan 'das/
342b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab par phyin bdag nyid ma// ji snyed pa yi bud med kun// khyod kyi tshul nyid 'dir 'dod do// skyes bu bdag gi gzugs de nyid// de bzhin kun tu yongs su grags// 'di ni rang bzhin gnyis
342b3(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / 'gro ba thabs shes bdag nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nyan thos la sogs pa rnams bud med sun 'byin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das
342b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams gnas pa'i// nyan thos la sogs grags kun gyis// bud med la ltos kun ster ba'i// thar pa'i lam ni mi shes so// gang na nye bar gnas gyur
342b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / gur kum la sogs rnyed smra na// de la rin ni thob mi 'gyur// gang du ring nas rin chen nyid// thog med mi shes sbyor ba yis// dad pa dman pa'i skye bo 'di// de nyid la ni sems mi 'jug
342b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi'ang 'di ni rab tu sbas/ / rtsod pa'i dus la de nyid 'di// sems can re rer bgrangs pa yi// bye ba'i nang na 'ga' zhig kyang // dad dang brtson pa'i dpung gnyen can// kun nas de phyir gsu

343a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bdag ni kun te kun la'ang khyab// kun byed kun gyi 'jig pa'o// kun gyi gzugs 'dzin sangs rgyas te// byed po 'joms po khyab bdag bde// gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni//

346b1(rgyud 'bum): na thod le kor gyis kham por so ma btang ba gnyis la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du sngags bris nas kha sbyar te/ nyar rgyas dkris nas sgro la bcang bar bya'o// byis pa rnams kyi srung bar

347b1(rgyud 'bum): tsher mas bris te pho ba ris lnga dang bcas pa'i go la zos na rims thams cad 'joms par byed do/ / sarba dzA raM nA shA ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o// zla ba gzas bzung ba'am nyi ma gzas
347b2(rgyud 'bum): bzung ba la/ 'o ma'i zan nam zho'i zan gyis lhung bzed bkang nas/ ka ra dang mar dang bcas pa a shwad tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas/ lo ma mdun gyis steng nas g.yogs te
