347b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / char rengs par 'gyur ro// sarba pA ta praSh+Ti stam+b+ha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o// zhes pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i yi ge bcu'i sngags so// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags dag
348a1(rgyud 'bum): gi cho ga dang / snying po'i sngags kyi yang cho ga 'di nyid do// dang por 'phreng ba'i sngags ke ta ki'i lo ma la tsher mas bris nas/ gos sngon po dang skud pa dag gis dkris
348a2(rgyud 'bum): nas mgo bo'am/ dpung pa 'am/ mgul pa'i rgyab bam/ g.yon par bcing bar bya'o// kro d+hats+tsha da sa che ge mo dzA ra nA sha ya/ zhes pa 'di byas pas rims thams cad 'joms par byed
348a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / 'ching ba'i dus su nad pa gdong shar du phyogs par byas nas/ nya bsregs pa dang / zan dang / chang la sogs pas gang ba'i kham phor gyis sbyangs nas/ 'di zo la rims la
348a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa thams cad myur du phyir dengs shig/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo gtum po chen po'i bka' 'di nyid kyis song zhig/ gal te na yang gzhan du mi 'gro na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
348a5(rgyud 'bum): gtum po khros pa'i ral gris til gyi tshad tsam du gtub par bya'o zhes brjod nas bden bral gyi mtshams su gtang bar bya'o/ / de nas bde bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nad dang / mkha' 'gro
348a6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad la bklags pa tsam gyis srung bar byed do// gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas thams cad
348a7(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / 'phreng ba'i sngags gnyis pa la'ang cho ga 'di tshad do// 'phreng ba'i sngags gsum pas lhag ma'i chang bul mngon par bsngags nas sbyin par bya'o// mchog ster bar 'gyur ro//
348b1(rgyud 'bum): zan gyi phung po la mngon par bsngags nas phyi dro'i dus su dben pa'i phyogs su sbyin par bya'o// bya ba gang gi phyogs la des thams cad 'grub bo// cho ga lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no//
348b2(rgyud 'bum): ga sngon ma bzhin du dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid nya gong ba'i bar sngon bzhin du bya'o// 'phreng ba'i sngags rnams kyis stong phrag bcus sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o// lha
348b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bye brag gi sngags rnams rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin no// de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi'o// khyad par du 'phreng ba'i
348b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags bzlas pas snyan dngags mkhan dang paN+Di ta nyid du myur du 'gyur ro/ / rtsa ba'i sngags gsum pa'i cho ga'o// mal gyi steng du lag pa g.yon pas ling ga bzung nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
348b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / gang gi ming gang yin pa de 'ong bar byed de 'dod par bya'o// sngags ni/ oM bau hi ri che ge mo a yA tu hUM hUM phaT/ btsag gis b+ha ga la kun nas byugs nas/ sa la lag pa
348b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas brten nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / gang gi ming yin pa de 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nyungs kar la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas skyes bu la bsnun par bya'o// nad
348b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis brtag par bya'o// chu la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro// gos la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na skye bo thams cad dga' bar
349a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lan tshul yongs su bzlas nas gang gi rkang pa'i sen mo la byin na de dbang du byed do// ba lang gi spu'i zag pa sngags kyis mngon par bsngags nas gang gi
349a2(rgyud 'bum): mgul du bcings pa de ba lang du 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma la mngon par phyogs nas gang gi ming nas mngon par bzlas pa de 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zhum bu'i spu'i thag pa gang gi mgul bar bcings pa de
349a3(rgyud 'bum): zhum bur 'gyur ro/ / bya rog gi rgyus pa'i srad bus bya rog tu 'gyur ro// skyes bu'i sgra'i srad bus skyes bur 'gyur ro// bud med kyi sgra'i srad bus bud med du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
349a4(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang gi spu la sogs pa'i srad bus byas pas de dang de'i gzugs nyid du 'gyur ro/ / gang gi maung gis bzlas na de'i khrag 'gugs so// mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'di bzlas
349a5(rgyud 'bum): pas de dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni lha mo'i sngags kyi cho ga'o/ / gtor ma'i sngags kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// nad dang bgegs la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro//
349a6(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma phul nas bya ba gang la zhugs na de 'grub par 'gyur ro// me tog dkar po'i kham phor dang / 'o ma'i kham phor dang / dri bzangs kyi chu'i kham phor dang / zho zan gyi kham phor te/

349b1(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas dben pa'i phyogs su bsgrubs pas de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'grub bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ tsha ba'i mar
349b2(rgyud 'bum): nag gis sbrum ma'i b+ha ga'i nang du mnye bar bya'o/ / 'thungs na'ang rab tu bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'dis rma la byugs na'ang bde bar 'gyur ro// zos pas kyang thams cad
349b3(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / dang por 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis gro ga la chu skyes 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dbus su bri bar bya'o// srad bu sngon pos dkris nas lu sa la bcangs na thams cad du srung bar
349b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gi'u wa nga ngam rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bya'o// 'di ni gnyis pa'o// de bzhin du rgyu de gzhan du gsungs pa'i tsho gas yang 'di nyid kyi sbyor bas sbyar bar bya'o// rnal 'byor

349b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub legs par 'thob/ / bya ba khyab bdag gsung bar mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas bstan pa sun 'byin pa'i// nges par gdug can gsang
350a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de rnams nyid kyi nor blangs nas// sems can rnams la phan phyir spyad// lugs sa mo kun nges par bsten// gzhan yang ma dang bu mo dang //
350a2(rgyud 'bum): dang nya sha bza' bar bya// mnyam bzhag nas ni chang ni btung // rang gzhan dag gi brdzun dang ni// nyos pa de bcab bsam gtan mchog/ bdag nyid rnam par mi rtog bslab// sbas
350a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rab sbyor nyid las 'grub/ / gang gang sdig pa de nyid kyis// sems can rnams ni 'og tu 'gro// de dang de yi thabs kyis ni// rnal 'byor myur du dngos grub mchog/ de nas bcom
350a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di nyid gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ji ltar sdom pa phyin ci log tu gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

350a6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin med bsgoms nas/ / bdag gi dngos grub ces bsgom pa// shin tu sbas pa kun nas spyad// sus kyang ji ltar mi shes bya// sdig pa thams cad zad byas nas// phyin
350a7(rgyud 'bum): ci log gis 'di nyid 'grub/ / rnal 'byor de nyid gcig sbyor mchog/ gang zhig sbed par mi byed na// sdom pa phyin ci log 'di yi// de yi dngos grub yod ma yin// sdig pa med
350b1(rgyud 'bum): cing bsod nams med/ / rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin las// 'jig rten 'phya ba bsal ba'i phyir// bdag gis gsal por ma byas so// da ni bden par gsung mdzad pa// gtum/
350b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i tshul gyis dga' ma kye// rnal 'byor 'jig rten gzhug pa'i phyir// sems can kun gyi don rgyud rnams// rab gsal sdom pa bshad pa yis// da ni dga' ma khyod nyon cig
350b3(rgyud 'bum): srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / / pha rol nor ni 'phrog mi bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra mi bya// blo ldan chadang ni btung mi bya// 'jig rten smod pa spang bar bya// rab gsal
350b4(rgyud 'bum): bslab pa'i gnas 'di ni/ / gus pa dang bcas spyad par bya// de ni sdom pa'i tshul gsungs pa// 'di yi spyod pa bshad par bya// mgo bo la ni dbu rgyan bya// rna ba dag la rna rgyun no//
350b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rang lus nyid la ni// sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan par bya// rkang pa dag la rkang gdub bo// de bzhin rked par rked rgyan no// de bzhin lag g.yas ral gri dang / g.yon du zhag/
350b6(rgyud 'bum): pa gzung bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga ni rab sbyor bas// mgo bo dbu rgyan phyag rgya bya// zur phud lnga yis brgyan byas nas// sgra dang kha spu breg par bya// lo ni bcu gnyis gsang spyod bya/
350b7(rgyud 'bum): tshe phyed kun nas yang dag spyod// sngon gsungs rigs kyi dbye ba yis// gzhon nu ma rnams rab tu brtag/ bu mo la 'os rgyan gyis ni// rtag tu yang ni brgyan par bya// g.yas par gri gug
351a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin bya zhing / / gson pa ru sa ka pA la/ rigs byu dbye bas nges par bya// kha dog dbye bas lus la'o// rang rigs shes rab bdud byas nas// yang nag
351a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs mnyam banaganas/ / rang 'dod yang dag bzung nas ni// spyod pa 'di ni yang dag bcum// rin chen la sogs med myur na// rdzas la sogs pa sprul pas so// gal te rab 'jug
351a3(rgyud 'bum): rnyen/ yang na sems kyis bsgrub par bya// rigs lnga'i rab tung dbye ba las// dam tshig lnga la spyad par bya// de ni sngon gsungs sbyor ba yis// yin tshun gnyis gnyis brtsam par bya/
351a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni bya ba gzhan mi brtsam/ rnam kun rnal 'byor dngos grub thob// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// yig gsum sen mo sbyin par bya// 'o dang 'khyud pa nyid dang ni/
351a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi nor mo khu ba nyid// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs par// de nyid the tsom med par 'gyur// lus ngag yid ni de mchog tu// bde bas yang dag par sdom ni// tshul khrims pha rol phyin
351a6(rgyud 'bum): shes bya/ / sen mo ga ba pa bzos pa yis// yi ge gsum gyis btsir ba nyid// 'don bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// gus pa dang bcas dus ring du// shin tu bde bsna mnyam gnas
351a7(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus pa'om byid shes bya/ / sems nyid bde ba'ide sbyor las// dngos po kun gyi gzugs kyis no// bas mo gtan pajim phyin par 'ding // bud mong drul gyis rnam pa'i
351b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab pha rol phyin mar grags/ / shin tu dga' gcig sbyor tsam gyis// pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs 'gyur// pha rol phyin lnga bsod nams dang // shes rab ye shes zhes byar gsungs//
351b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dga' sbyor mtshungs ldan pa// rnal 'byor pa yi tshogs gsum 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes dang ldan na// skad cig tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// dper na 'khri shing las
351b3(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i/ / me tog 'bras bu dang ldan ltar// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs byang chub// tshogs gnyis las ni yang dag byung // sa ni bcu gsum dbang phyug tu// de ni the tsom med
351b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / sa ni rab dga' zhes bya dang // dri med de bzhin 'od byed dang // 'od 'phro ba dang sbyang dka' dang // mngon gyur ring gyur mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin//

352a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// bde bamig yo'i gzugs nyid ni// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// de lang chags bral gyis mig
352a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid phyir na mi g.yor grags/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhi ba ste// sdig pa dang bral dri med yid// ral gri zhags pa'i phyag dag ni// shes rab mar 'khyud
352a3(rgyud 'bum): de mchog go/ / sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa// pad+ma zla ba nyi gnas la// kun nas 'khor bar gnas pa yin// lha yi bde bas shin tu gnas// de phyir 'di ni mi g.yor gsungs//
352a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa ste// mi g.yo ba yi mthu nyid kyis// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis ni// sems can dor ni mdzad pa'i phyir// sgrub byed nye bar mtshon pa'o// de nas kun tu bzang
352a5(rgyud 'bum): pos gsol pa/ a yig gis ni ci zhig bstan// tsa yig gis ni ci zhig brjod// la yig kyang ni ci la brjod// ji ltar ming ni yang dag bsdus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ a
352a6(rgyud 'bum): yig lhan cig skyes pa'i tshug/ / dngos med ngo bo tshad du gsungs// tsa ga dga' dang mchog dga' dang // khyad par dga' ba nyid dang ni// lhan cig skyes dga' zhes bya ba'i// dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin
352a7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / la yil lan ru rol// shin tu bde bar gsungs pa'o// a yig gis ni shes rab brjod// tsa yig gis ni thabs su bshad// thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor bas// la yig brda/
352b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lak+ShaH// de nyid dpa' bo gcig pa nyid// gcig phyir gcig pa nyid du gsungs// chags bral 'joms phyir dpa' bo ste// dpa' bo gcig pa zhes gsungs so// gtum po 'di ni shin tu no//

352b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pas shes rab la 'khyud bya// chags bral kun nas gzhom byas na// dngos grub sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen
352b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyud las/ a tsa la'i don gyi rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas gsol pa/ dpa' bo gcig pa ji ltar 'grub//
352b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug mchog gis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ a yig las sbyor skad cig gis// mi g.yo nag por bsgos
352b7(rgyud 'bum): parabya/ / de nyid bstan pa'i spobs nyid las// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas the tsom med// mi g.yo dkar po bsgom pa dang // yang na ser po'am dmar po 'al// yang na ljang khub sgom byas nas/
353a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam sogs ldan// dbus su mig so lnga rnams kyis// gzugs nas gcig tu rnam par bsgom// shes rab mi rigs can ma// yang na gcan yang bsgom pa
353a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor pas/ myur du dngos grub zo tsom med// yang na shes rab dang bral ba'i// shin tu nyam bzhag bsgom par bya// mi g.yo bsgom pa yongs rdzogs na/

353a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / gtso bo bdag la rnam dag gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas kun gyi sbyong byed pa'i// rnam dag bdag gis rab bshad bya// de la gru bzhi pa ni
353a5(rgyud 'bum): tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi'o/ / sgo bzhi ni bden pa bzhi'o// rta babs pa'i ni bsam gtan bzhi'o// ka ba brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do// 'phar ma gcig pa ni sems rtse gcig
353a6(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid do/ / pad+ma ni skye gnas so// kha dog sna tshogs pa ni sprul pa sna tshogs pa'o// lha dgu ni gsung rab yan lag dgu'o// phyogs dmar po ni 'dod chags chen po'o// mtshams su dkar po
353a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / ser po dang / ljang khu dang / nag po rnams ni bram ze dang / rje rigs dang / rgyal rigs dang / dmangs rigs rnams nyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma ni khu ba dang rdul lo// dbus kyi
353b1(rgyud 'bum): grini mi g.yo ba nag po'i mtshan ma'o/ / gri gug ni zhe sdang rdo rje ma'o// shwar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams ni mi g.yo ba dkar po la sogs pa rnams so// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/
353b2(rgyud 'bum): gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'o// zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa'o// sgom pa'i rnam par dag pa brjod par bya ste/ dang po mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs khyad par 'phag
353b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las so/ / stong pa nyid ni ye shes kyi tshogs 'chi ba khyad par 'phags pa dri ma med pa'i lus te dri za'i lus so// gzhal yas khang gi mthar thug pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// pad+ma ni skye gnas so//
353b4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyi ma ni dkar dmar ro// hUM yig ni ma dang pha'i dbus su dri za'i sems so// mi bskyod pa ni pa'o// mA ma kI ni ma'o// phan tshun du rjes su chags pa mthong nas phal rnam par zhe sdang zhing
353b5(rgyud 'bum): ma la rjes su chags nas gti mug pas sems can bzhin du 'jug go/ / pad+ma zhugs pa'i bu yis pa bsad nas de'i go 'phang 'thob bo// ma bzung nas skye ba mtha' med pa'i bag chags
353b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bde ba khyad par 'phags pas de'ang bur skye bar byed do/ / bu mo na yang mi g.yo ba dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang / gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa'ang ngo // bu rnams kyang pha bsad
353b7(rgyud 'bum): nas gzhan la bgrod par byed de/ 'di nyid dgra bo zhes de gsod par byed do// bu mo rnams kyang skye ba mtha' med pa'i bag chags kyi bde ba khyad par 'phags pas 'dod par byed do// ral gri shes
354a1(rgyud 'bum): rab la zhags pa ni thabs so/ / yang na zhugs pa shes rab la ral gri thabs so// gnyis pa ro gcig tu gyur pa ni sdigs mdzub bo// g.yon pa 'og tu bltas pa ni sa
354a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og bdun skyong bar byed pa'o/ / g.yas pa steng du bltas pa ni tshangs pa'i sgo nga bdun skyong bar byed pa'o// pus mo g.yon pa sa la btsugs pa ni sa skyong bar byed pa'o// g.yas pa rkang pas
354a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bsnun pa ni bdud thams cad skrag par mdzad pa'o/ / phung po'i bdud tshangs po/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dbang phyug/ 'chi bdag gi bdud khyab 'jug/ lha'i bu'i bdud lha'i
354a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'o/ / sa ni sa sted mtha' dag gi gzhon nu ma la longs spyod pa'o// gzhon nu ma la yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir pad+ma'i gdan no// skye gnas la skyes pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan no//
354a5(rgyud 'bum): khub dang rdul las skyes pa ni skyes bu'i dngos po'o// bud med ni dngos po med pa'o// nag po ni rnam par shes pa'o// dkar po ni gzugs so// ser po ni tshor ba'o// dmar po ni
354a6(rgyud 'bum): 'du shes so/ / ljang khun don yod grub pa'o// yang na mthon ka ni nam mkha' 'o// dkar po ni chu'o// ser po ni sa'o// dmar po ni ma'o// ljang khu ni rlung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dz+dza
354a7(rgyud 'bum): lta ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'o/ / yang na mthing kha ni chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so// dkar po ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so// ser po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so//
354b1(rgyud 'bum): dmar nga nas sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// ljang ldan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// ston pa rgyal ba gcig du nyid// rtswa yi tshul gyis yang dag gnas// shes rab rol phyin nyid kyang /
354b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam lnga'i tshul gyis yang dag gnas// zhes pa ni dpa' ba gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro ba chen po'i rgyud las/ rnam par dag pa'i rim par bye ba ste bco lnga pa'o//
354b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ 'jig rten ji ltar skye ba dang // slar yang skye ba ji ltar mdzad// dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur ba yang // dbang phyug mchog
354b4(rgyud 'bum): gis bshad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed do// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i

373b3(rgyud 'bum): bu'i sangs rgyas gyur/ / gang+gA'i bye ma dang mtshungs pa'i// chen po rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// da ltar gyi yang rnam sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas ye shes dang ldan nyid// de phyir rtag tu rnal 'byor
373b4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / khyab bdag mi g.yo bsam par bya// gang zhig mi g.yo mi shes par// de yi skye ba 'bras med yin// de nyid med la dngos grub ni// phra mo tsam yang thob pa med// ces pa ni dpa
373b5(rgyud 'bum): bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/ rlung gi rnal 'byor gyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

373b7(rgyud 'bum): sA yi zug rngus zla gsum na// bshang ba 'dzag pa'i dus su ni// sbrid pa mnyam byung zla ba na// lte ba dang lte ba'i zug rngus lo ldana'o// mdzod spu'i zug rngus nyi ma gcig na'o// lha'i rtse ma mtshang naH
374a1(rgyud 'bum): ba phyed na'o/ / sna'i rtse mo'i zug rngus zla ba bzhina'o// 'khrig pa'i dus kyi sbrid pas zla ba na'o// mthe'u rung thams cad mnyam du zug rngur gyur na zla ba na'o// mnyam du
374a2(rgyud 'bum): snying kha dang mgrin par zug rngur gyur na zla ba phyed pa gsum na'o/ / mnyam du tA lu ka gsum zug rngur gyur na nyi ma gsum na'o// su ra b+ha'i rna ba'i dril bu'i sgras zla ba gsum na'o// rna ba'i rtsa ba

374a4(rgyud 'bum): nazhag bdun na'o/ / 'gram pa'i sha'i mtshams byen zla ba lnga na'o// mig 'dzag pa ma mthong na zla ba lnga na'o// sna'i 'khor lo las zhag bdun na'o// snying kha zhim na zla ba phyed na'o// rtswa'i
374a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil du ri mo nag po byung na zhag gnyis na'o/ / sen mo la khrag ma mthong ra zla ba drug ra'o// so skams na zla ba drug na'o// a ru Na ma mthong na zla ba drug na'o// grang mo la sogs pa'i dus

374b2(rgyud 'bum): sor mos mnan pas 'od ma mthong na nyi ma brgyad na'o/ / rna ba'i d+ha ni thos na lo gcig ra'o// pha rol gyi rig la gzugs brnyan ma mthong ra zla ba phyed na'o// de nyid shes phyir 'chi bslu dang /

380a2(rgyud 'bum): lha min bdud tshogs rnams/ / shin tu skrag par mdzad pa'i phyir// g.yas kyis ral gri mkha' la phyir// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhabs pa 'dzin// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la ni//
380a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi bdag po'i stang gnas pa// g.yon brkyang gar bzhugs stug sham can// phuHsgrog klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan// dmar ser gyer skra spun rtsa dmar// spyan zlum khro tshul mchu ba
380a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs/ / tshangs pa lnga dbang khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug che sogs lha rnams dang // lha ma yin rnams skrag par byed// bskal pa'i mi 'od 'bar dbus no// khro bo du ma'i tshogs
380a5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas/ / brtan g.yo khams gsum ma lus rnams// rang gi sprul par shes byas nas// de ltar gus bcas yun rings su// rgyun mi 'chad par gang bsgoms pas// las dang nyon
380a6(rgyud 'bum): mongs kyis bslad pa'i/ / tha mal pa yi rnam rtog ldog/ bdag 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor la// shin tu yid brtan byed 'gyur na// ral gri la sogs grub brgyad kyi// snod du rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur//
380a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos mi bzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // nam mkha'
380b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ / haM gi yi ge las skyes par// drag chen khro bo'i rgyal po ni// sngon ga zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom// ral gri chu gri sta re ni// g.yas kyi phyag na rim bzhir 'dzin/
380b2(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub 'khor lo kha T+wAM ni// g.yon gyi phyag na rim bzhin 'dzin// spyan gsum khro gnyer gyen du bskyod// dbu sgra sma ra gyen 'greng ser// rol pa'i klu yi rgyan gyis brgyan// thod pa'i
380b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba stag sham can/ / glang chen lpags pas stod g.yogs byas// rus pa'i rgyan gyis rab brgyan cing // pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan dbus na// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum tshul du 'gying // haM phaM
380b4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i phyogs sgrog pa/ / bskal pa'i me lhar gzi brjid che// 'di ltar skad cig dran pa 'am// ming shes tsam gyis 'dod pa sgrub// de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po 'jig rten
380b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang // thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
380b6(rgyud 'bum): maM las skyes pa'i mi g.yo ba// 'jigs byed chen po bsam par bya// yi dgas drod kyi steng na 'gying // zhal bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs kyang bzhi// g.yas pa ral gri rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa
380b7(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub thong khrag go/ / zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi'i steng na 'gying // sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan ldan zhing // stag gi sham thabs rnam par brgyan// stod du na ra'i pags pas brgyan// dmar
381a1(rgyud 'bum): ser gyen sgra 'jigs tshul che/ / ha ha ra bzhad cing rta skad 'tsher// khro bo du ma'i sprin spro zhing // zhal rnams gdangs pas mche ba gtsigs// spyan bcu gnyis po rab tu
381a2(rgyud 'bum): bgrad/ / 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// char sprin mdog 'dra me chen gzi// thabs chen 'dod pa'ang 'dis rdzogs byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po mi 'gyur rdo rje zhes
381a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// yi ge hUM las byung ba yi// mi
381a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yo mgon po gtum po che/ / bdud rnams skrag byed bsgom par bya// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i sku// pad dkar nyi ma'i steng dkyil na// pus mos la btsugs nas bzhugs//
381a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yas ral gri 'dzin pa ste// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin// spyan gnyis dmar la zlum po ste// gzhon nu khros pa'i cha byad can// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/
381a6(rgyud 'bum): sbrul dkar po yis do shal byas// stag gi pags pa'i shams thabs can// sna tshogs khro bo rnam par 'phro// bskal pa'i me yi dbus na gnas// gang gis nyi ma zla ba yi// mdun
381a7(rgyud 'bum): du rnam par dran byed na/ / bdud rnams ma lus zad nas ni// bde ba chen po'i lus rnyed 'gyur// a ta sa yi me tog gi/ 'od ldan bcom ldan lha yis mchod// bdag gi snying ngam snying
381b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil bsgom/ / myur du 'dod pa rdzogs par byed// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis du ba'i mdog/ yang na sngon po bai DUr gzi// bdud rnams brtag par
381b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa'o/ / g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum bzhugs pa 'am// yang na g.yon pa sa la btsugs// thabs tshul rin chen rgyun gyis brgyan// sdig pa thams cad zad byed pa// blo
381b3(rgyud 'bum): gros phung po rgyas par byed/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa dpal gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
381b4(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu yi// ye shes sems dpa' snying khar bsgom// 'od ni cher 'bar drag po'i gzi// shes bya'i sgrib las rnam par
381b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal/ / de yi thugs kar mtshan ma ste// sa bon rtag par dmigs pa ni// las kyi sgrib pa rnam dag rgyu// las kyi las rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros// s
381b6(rgyud 'bum): hes sems dpa' bkug nas gzhug/ des ni mi shes bag chags rnams// blo ldan blo la 'jog mi byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun dmigs nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur
381b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / spyi bor rang gi rigs bsams nas// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan 'gyur// de ltar de la brtson chen bya// 'dis ni rgyal rnams mnyes gyur nas// myur du rgyal ba nyid thos/

382a2(rgyud 'bum): ras ris bkra shis kyis/ / sdig pa'i dri ma rnams bsal nas// sgrub po rnams la mchog ster byed// gtsang byed bram ze las rnyed dam// rgyal po 'am bu mo bzang gi ras// 'jam zhing
382a3(rgyud 'bum): 'thas par brdungs byas te/ / 'dod pa bzhin du bri bar bya// rams sam mig sman khu ba dang // sman gsum me tog gnyis ldan pa'i// khub shing sbyin gsum sbyar nas// gzhan yang
382a4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs tshon gyis bris/ / de las khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste// g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang 'brel ba/ klus brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang /

382a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ zhal re re spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa'o// skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag g.yas gsum na ral gri dang / chu gri dang / sta re bsnams pa/ g.yon
382a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum na sdigs mdzub dang / 'khor lo dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ klus brgyan cing thod pa'i do shal can/ stag gi sham thabs dang / glang po che'i stod g.yogs dang / thod pa lnga'i
382b1(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan can/ rus pas brgyan cing pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng na g.yon brkyang zhing g.yas bskum pa'i tshul gyis bgying ba/ bskal pa'i me'i gzi mdangs kyi nang nas khro bo bcu 'phro ba bri'o//

382b4(rgyud 'bum): mnan cing / sgra ser po gyen du brdzes pa bri'o// bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i mi g.yo ba ni gtum po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ral gri dang zhags pas brel ba/ sgra nag po 'am ser po gyen du

382b6(rgyud 'bum): nang na khro bo du ma 'khrug cing pad+ma dang nyi ma la pus mo g.yas pa 'thab stangs kyi tshul du bzhugs pa 'am/ yang na g.yon pa gshed po'i tshul du btsugs shing lhag pa nam mkha' la 'greng zhing

383a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas/ ye shes kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'ang de nyid la bstim par bya'o// gang yang dngos grub 'dod pas spos dang / me tog dang / sgron ma dang / zhal zas dang / gos la sos
383a3(rgyud 'bum): pas rgyun du mchod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'grub pa la gdon mi za'o/ / 'dir skye bo 'ga' ni dman pa ste/ skur pa 'debs na shin tu'ang lhung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sku dben pa'i

383b1(rgyud 'bum): drug mtha' 'brel/ / sum cu gsum dang dbyangs drug 'brel// nyi shu rtsa lnga pas brgyan no// nyi shu gnyis dang bcu gcig 'brel// de la ni rdzas rnam brgyan pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal ba/

383b4(rgyud 'bum): sarba d+harmAHsaM b+hA wa shud+d+hohaM/ gzung ba dag pa ye shes kyi sngags so// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kohaM/ 'dzin pa'i sems dag pa ye shes kyi sngags so// oM badz+ra

385a1(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dka' po dro nus zam// 'do na las rnams can pa'i b+hi// dus su srung zhing bskyed byaste// dus su mchod dang gtor mabyas// bar chad kun las rnam/

385a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags bcug la khal tsher ma btsugs na bsgrub bya'i kha la tsher ma btsugs par 'gyur ro/ / rkang pa la btsugs na rengs so// snying la btsugs na dran pa stor bar byed do// mi'i rje dar gyi

385b1(rgyud 'bum): du zhugs nas ral gril bsngags te bzung na rgyal lo/ / gang la'ang gtor ma'i bye brag gis 'grub nges so// dur khrod du phyin te stong thod pa la pad sAl dkar po'i sdong bu dang tshil chen gyi mar me
385b2(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la sbar ba'i du ba mig la blugs na gzhan gyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma 'am zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe/ mi g.yo mgon po'i sku kham pa

385b4(rgyud 'bum): par khrag sna tshogs blugs te/ maN+Dal nag po'i thog tu bzhag nas kha me long gis bcad de/ de'i steng du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g.yo ba bzhag ste/ rang nyid gcer bu'i lus ma he'i

385b6(rgyud 'bum): gcer bu lus thams cad thal bas byugs te mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum gsal bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te gter kha dbye bar 'dod pas mi g.yo mgon po'i sku kham pa las byas

386a2(rgyud 'bum): smon du yo pa m+b+ha sAn+na tshul 'khor rdzas te/ dz+nyArnaMs lam bag pan sa dga' pa la sogs pa'i gdags byas / 'dog pa par byas nas mnamakhyen
386a3(rgyud 'bum): ti mtshig pa bskyed nas/ dbus su mi g.yo mgon po dang bcas pa la ye shes kyi lha bcug nas/ kar dang / bu ma dang / klung dang / 'o ma la sogs pas mchod cing rtsu ba'i sngags pa

386a5(rgyud 'bum): tshor shing rta'i pang la tsam nage 'dun du 'bebs pa la the tshom med do/ / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ka phra mo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
386a6(rgyud 'bum): nas ya drug bshad rnag// bsam gtan cacan las byung ba ni// bakhrul med nyid du gnod rnams sel// khams gsapa rtul pa cir tshon cig/ spyi bcu'i rim pa goms gyur las/
386a7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'dod kyi dum par du// rang sems gnas nas brtan par 'gyur// dngos med darjes sogs ma lus pa'i// dam rtog rab rig kun bsal nas// nyon mongs nad rnams ma lus pa/
386b1(rgyud 'bum): bag chags dang bcas gtan bcom nas// 'phral du yang ni brod ka skye// spro yang mi dmigs bsdu mi dmigs// skye med 'gag med ting nge 'dzin// 'byung med 'gro mod bsam gtan la// gnas//
386b2(rgyud 'bum): na ye shes myur du thob// bla med ye shes yon tan dang // mthu rnams che bar 'gyur ba ni// bla ma mnyes las rnyed 'gyur ba'i// de nyid bdud rtsi bcud kyis len// gus pas rtag par nyin
386b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshar du/ / rgyun med med par goms byas na// myur du phyag rgya chen po yi// dngos grub snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'bad rtsol byang chub yan lag ste// le lo gnyid dang g.yeng ba spang //
386b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags la dmigs pa brtan gyur cing // bsam gtan then nas 'khrul 'khor brtsam// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin bar la// gro ga 'am yang na shing shun la// gur gum gi'u wa da tsan dan gyis// rdo rje
386b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gram mu khyud bcas/ / dbus su ming dang sngags spel bri// mu khyud la ni rtsa sngags bri// rwa kun la ni hUM dang ming // spel te g.yas nas bskor la bri// dkyil 'khor dkar po'i dbus su ni/
386b6(rgyud 'bum): me tog dkar po steng bzhag nas// lha yi skur ni bskyed byas te// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas// gang zhig 'dod pa'i dpung pa 'am// lus la bcangs na srung bar byed// khal phor
386b7(rgyud 'bum): gsar pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris te/ sgor bcangs na gsar du btsas pa'i byis pa srung ngo // dur khrod kyi ras la sngags ming dang bcas pa bris te/ spra tshil gyis gtums nas dur khrod kyi bum
387a1(rgyud 'bum): par bcug nas/ kha rdo rje rgyu grum gyis bcad de sbas na mngal skyem par byed do// phyung nas 'o mas bkrus na sos so// gal te gsad par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru
387a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum nag por byas pa'i steng du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g.yo mgon po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje/ sdigs mdzub dang thod khrag g.yon na 'chang ba byas pa/
387a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs so// de nas dri ma drug dang bag zan las bsgrub bya'i gzugs sor brgyad byas nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo bsad pa'i sham bu dang bcas pa snying khar
387a4(rgyud 'bum): bcug te de'i sku'i zhabs su bzhag nas/ rang nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas zur bzhir mi rus sam/ seng ldeng ngam/ lcags las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa bzhag pa la/ thun
387a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshams thams cad du btab pas shes pa brgyal bar bsam mo/ / de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi phur pa mi g.yo bar bsgoms pa'i thugs bskul nas/ de las khro bo lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs pa
387a6(rgyud 'bum): grangs med pa spros pas/ bsgrub bya rlung gi 'khor lo la bzhag nas 'ongs pas skad cig tsam gyis phung po gtor nas shes pa ling ga la bstim par bya'o// de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu
387a7(rgyud 'bum): byas pas hom khung du bsreg pa 'am/ mnan pa byas na dbang phyug chen po'ang gsod par nges na gzhan lta smos kyang mi dgos/ yang na du ra dang / khyi khrag dang / nya'i khrag gis 'khor lo
387b1(rgyud 'bum): ral gri'i rtse mo ltar rno bar byas nas/ lte ba'i dbus su gru gsum me'i nang du bsgrub bya'i ming dang chud du bcas pa bris la/ de zhags pas bskor bar bya'o// rtsibs rnams su sngags kyi rkang
387b2(rgyud 'bum): pa brgyad pa dri'o/ / mu khyud la ming dang bcas pa'i snying po bri'o// de'i rgyab kyi mu khyud la las thams cad pa bri'o// mu khyud gsum pa la rdo rje dang ral gri spel nas bri bar bya'o// de nas
387b3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug nas zhing skas bcings te/ bsgrub bya dag za ba'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas khro bo shin tu khros pa sA khrag 'dren pa'i lta bas bltas na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
387b4(rgyud 'bum): gang la byas pa de khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi'o/ / dur khrod du sbas na mtshor gyi bskal pa babs nas 'chi'o// shing gcig gi rtsar sbas na rengs so// chu mdor sbas ra 'byer ro// lam
387b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu gram du smras na skye'o/ / lha rten zhabs su sbas na zha bor 'gyur ro// klu yod pa'i sar sbas na mdzes zin pa la the tsom med do// rang nyid kyi nyal ba'i zhabs su smras na 'dod pa'i bu
387b6(rgyud 'bum): mo khugs so/ / ste rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na dmag kyang rengs so// de dag thams cad la khro bo 'bar bdud pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa phyag bzhi zhabs bzhi/ spyan gsum
387b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par blta'o/ / dur khrod kyi ras la dmag dpon gyi ming dang spel ba'i sngags rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte bar bris la mtha' yi ge laM brgyad kyis mnan te/ de'i phyi rol tu dbang chen gyi
388a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rgya gram bris la/ de spa tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying khar btsugs nas gang 'thab pa'i mtshams su bzhag na dmag rengs so//
388a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gza' skar la bltas te 'phyar ro// bskrad par 'dod na gro ga'am ra sa la bya rog dang bug pa'i khrag gis gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ uts+tsha Ta ya spel bar bya'o//
388a3(rgyud 'bum): char che ba 'am ser ba gcad par 'dod na gro ga la gur kum mam gi'u wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa byas la mu khyud gsum pa byas te/ rtsibs bzhi la snying po'i sngags yi ge hUM la bskor ba bris
388a4(rgyud 'bum): ladabus kyi lte bar yi ge k+Sh+mI bris te/ de la rtsa ba'i sngags g.yon bskor du bris nas/ mu khyud dang po la las thams cad pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis pa la ral gri'i 'phreng ba/ gsum
388a5(rgyud 'bum): pa la kun tu me ri'o/ / de ltar dmigs te mchod nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na char ches pa dang ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ro// yang gsad par 'dod pas kham pa'i par bu la mi g.yo ba'i snying
388a6(rgyud 'bum): po mtshal gyis g.yon bskor du bris nas/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi nang du gong du bstan pa'i ling ga'i snying khar ming dang bcas pa bcug nas gan kyal du steng du kha gzar te/ las thams cad
388a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags bzlas shing zhag bcu drug tu las bya'o/ / de nas dur khrod kyi sa la byas pa'i mchod rten khru gang ba nag po'i bum pa'i nang du rang gis srung ba nyid bcug nas/ mchod rten bang rim
388b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum man chad stong pa'i nang du tsha tsha lnga bzhag pas/ / gru gsum kha bkab cing lce phyogs su gzhag go/ des zla ba gnyis na 'chi nges so// gal te gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad par 'dod na dbang chen
388b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbus su tshegs kyi bdag po bris te/ zur thams cad rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan par byas nas/ grwa thams cad laM gyis mtshan pa ste/ rdo rje phur pas bsgrub bya'i ling ga'i steng du mnan na zhag
388b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyis rig sngags 'chad do/ / yang na hUM bzhi mgo sprad pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro// da ni tsu tsun d+ha ra'i pags pa la 'khrul 'khor rengs pa'i sbyor ba dang bcas pa'am/ spul sdong bu byas
388b4(rgyud 'bum): shing tshil la mar ma byas nas/ du ba de bzhir nas mig la bskus na dgras mi mthong ngo // yang dpral bar thig le bya ste/ lag pa la bskus nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur nges so//
388b5(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa la bskus na dpag tshad brgyar 'gro nus so// sA lu'i phye ma la gzugs byas te phye ma des bskus na dgra rengs par byed do// dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bcas pas dgra bo'i sgo 'am
388b6(rgyud 'bum): dpung la gter na nad kyis thebs so/ / tsu tsun d+ha ra'i pags pa la 'khrul 'khor bris nas dbugs kyis brgyangs te sngags stong bzlas na dgra de spos nas 'chi'o// de la sngags ni
388b7(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ na mastu te/ ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ga ga na a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ga na pa ti pra dzA pa ta ye swA hA/ na mastu ti ma hA ga Na pa te ye swA hA/ oM ka ra ka ra Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/
389a1(rgyud 'bum): dA ra dA ra/ bi dA ra bi dA ra/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ dAd+hA ba da d+ha ba/ ga gA ra/ b+hA dzad+hadza/ mo ha mo ha/ d+he hiHh+ni/ d+hU pa ya d+hU pa ya/ d+ha yar+yA d+hA yan+ta
389a2(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+him+ma pra yAts+tsha/ sam+b+ha sa ma mA ra ya ma nu smar la ma pu tra pA tsa nA ya swAt+ma/ oM su ru ku ru swAhA/ oM d+ha rAtu ru swAhA/ oM su ru su ru s+yAH/ oM mu ru mu ru s+yAtAM/ oM shUn+tiM pASh+TaM kuru
389a3(rgyud 'bum): sA hA/ au ga ta bri d+hu kr-i bi ta tsit+ta/ ma hA bi d+ha rA gaM gas ts+tshin+ti/ ma hA b+ha ya/ pa ra kra ma/ ma hA ha sti/ ma hA d+ha kr-i NaM ya/ pra tsit+ta yA mi sA/ oM ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru

389b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs las grub 'di bshad bya/ / rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'i// dbang chen gnyis brtsegs dbus su ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rtse gsum dang // b+hin ti pa la bgrang 'phreng
389b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / a shaM ka ni bzung byas te// byi ba'i steng na sems dpa' yi// skyil krung gis bzhugs khros nas ni// sngon po rin tshan rgyan gyis brgyan// bsams la la dul phug dang //
389b4(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma zho dang sbrang dkar dang // mar dang chan dang sran ma sha// bcos pa'i sha dang shing thog rnams// dus dang dus su mchod byas na// gter rnams 'di yis ster bar byed// yang na ba
389b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid mi g.yo ba/ / zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa'i sku// ral gri mda' dang rdo rje g.yas// zhag pa gzhu dang mdung thung g.yon// khams gsum gang ba'i hUM las bskyed// sna tshogs
389b6(rgyud 'bum): mdog can khro bo ni/ / du ma mtshon cha rnams bzung ba// rang las sngo zhing spu byed pa'i// mdun du tshogs kyi bdag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma la// bzhengs te mda' dang gzhu
389b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ / bskyed nas btsos pa'i shas mchod nas// bsnyen pa stong byas las rnams 'grub// yul gyi tsha dang sa gsum la// tshogs bdag de yi gzugs byas nas// gnod pa'i
390a1(rgyud 'bum): ming ldan par bcug na/ / mnyes mi ngas phyugs ngas sogs// gang gi mtshan nas bzung bde// gnod pa kun las srung bar byed// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i/
390a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las rnams grub pa'i yan lag tu// gces par gyur pa'i sbyin sreg go//
390a3(rgyud 'bum): tshal ni gnyis te rtsub ngos dang // yid 'ong rang gi khyim du sgrub// sa ni las kyi dbye bas shes// skyon dang bral bas thab brtsig bya// rgyar sor tshad ni nyi shu bzhi// de yi ngos la sor bcu gnyis//
390a4(rgyud 'bum): dpangs ni de yi rgyu las ni// sor bzhi chung bar bskor bar bya// pad+ma'i dbyibs can rgyan bltas nas// ral gri 'bar ba dgod par bya// zur bzhir rdo rje phyed pa bzhi// thab khung kha la rdo rje yi//
390a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba gsal por bskor bar bya// 'di ni 'phrin las kun gyi'o// yang ni khru gang nang khru gsum// rim gsum sum gnyis sor tshad do// nang du rdo rje rgya gram bri// gsang pa la ni bsngags pa'o//
390a6(rgyud 'bum): til dang 'bras dang 'o ma dang // zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang // pa la sha dang be shing sogs// me tog dkar po yod pa ste// dkar gsum mngar gyis bsres pa rnams// zhi ba'i las la
390a7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu shis/ / sA lu na sa dang gro dang ni// rgya rtsi che dang na gu la// sardza gu gul gur kum bcas// tsam pa zho dang nye'u shing // me tog gser mdog la sogs rnams// rgyas pa'i las
390b1(rgyud 'bum): la shin tu shis/ / tsan dan dmar dang gur kum dang // bra bo til dang rgya sran dang // khre dang cung rtse spel ba dang // ba ser mo yi bdud rtsi lnga// nag khro dang tsan dan dmar// me tog dmar po dbang
390b2(rgyud 'bum): la shis/ / gsad la khrag dang dug yungs kar// tsha gsum ling gar bcas pa'o// gos dkar rgyan yang dkar po ste// yo byad kun yang dkar byas dang // bsam pa bzang pos shar
390b3(rgyud 'bum): bltas pa/ / 'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub// rgyan gos yo byad kun ser zhing // rgyas pa'i yid byas byang du bltas// dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor byas na// 'dis ni rgyas
