391a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes khri tsho gsum sreg go/ / smyo bar 'dod na khyi sha dang / chang dang / dug sna tshogs pa la ut+pan+da zhes stong rtsa brgyad sreg go/ dgra bo'i mig long bar 'dod pas skyer ba'i shing dang bong bu'i rtug
391a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la aM d+ha ka ra zhes stong rtsa brgyad du sreg go/ / sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang rnga mo'i rus pa la mo ha ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsregs na rmongs par byed do// lung ba dang tsan dan la dz+wa ra da pa na la zhes brgya rtsa
391b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bsregs na yams pand do/ / sbal pa dzi ra dang khyi nag po'i sha la tsi ti dz+wA la ma pa na la stong bsregs na mdze 'chad do// khu ba dang / khrag dang / da ru ra la su tri tshin da zhes stong rtsa brgyad
391b2(rgyud 'bum): bsregs na mngal bskams so/ / gtum po drag po'i nga rgyal gyis// dur ba'am gi'u wang ngam lan tshwa 'am// rgya skyegs bsregs na yams nad dang // 'khrug dang 'jigs dang 'byung ba ldog
391b3(rgyud 'bum): zho dang ku mu da dang sbrang / / bya rgod klad pa khA yi tshil// 'di rnams bsregs na smyo nad dang // rkang dang bu mi thon pa sel// kye gzhan yang sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis// sna tshogs las rnams 'grub 'gyur
391b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing / brtan pa chen po'i ye shes ni// 'ga' las myur du thob byed cing // g.yo 'dod sred la bla ma slu// tshig la sems shing don mi tshol// bag med g.yengs dang ser sna dang // bskam chen snying
391b5(rgyud 'bum): med pas ni/ / bskal pa brgya dang stong phrag tu// bsgrubs kyang nam yang mi 'grub ste// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo// ngal ba las ni gzhan du min// bza' btung zhim po sna tshogs rnams//
391b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag par nyin re dus gsum du// grogs po kun la byin pas kyang // lan cig bla ma'i mchod pa yis// brgya yi char yang mi bod do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs
391b7(rgyud 'bum): pa lha'i bu drug khris khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ kye ho rtsa ba'i sems mnga' 'on kyang 'khrugs 'dra zhing // dga' zhing shin tu dag kyang ra ra sna tshogs spras// lha rnams kun la ral gri byar
392a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshe/ / lha min tshogs kun brgyal zhing rab tu skrag par snang // srid pa'i nyon mongs kun la bsdigs pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis// bdud rnams brgyal zhing skrag sha 'don
392a2(rgyud 'bum): skad phyung nas thag ring 'bros/ / yi ge phyed pa e he'i ro la sgra yi ku cos log pa'i phyogs skrag byed// che ba yi ni shin tu cher gyur sku lnga khyod kyi sku// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
392a3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu bsngags shing bstod/ / klu rnams kun 'dus pas ni rma shas lus kyi phyogs par brgyan// lha dbang bu mo rnams kyis rin chen sna tshogs rgyan rab gsol// spyan bgrang ldag 'dril stug
392a4(rgyud 'bum): lpags 'dzin pa khyod la bstod/ / bstod pa chen po des bstod nas tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa lha tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga' bo// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i
392a5(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum pa las/ dngos grub thams cad yongs su
392a6(rgyud 'bum): rabyung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ / / paN+Di ta a tu la nga sa badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa ban d+hi chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o//
392a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha rA dza sarba man+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon
392b1(rgyud 'bum): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas yang dag bshad b+hu ba// khams gsum zhe sdang can gzigs nas// zhe sdang thams cad zang bya'i phyir// bcom ldan thugs rje'i rang bzhin car// zhe sdang /
392b2(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo mgon por mdzad// ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag/ sngags lha phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang // rnam dag bsam gtan 'phrin las rnams// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// dur khrod
392b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i sar/ / 'dzin pas btud de nges zhus la// kye kye yang dag khro chen gtso// ma lus rnam dag la gnas phyir// mgon po mi g.yo'i gsung rgyud las// sems dpa'
392b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i ting 'dzin gang / / ngo mtshar thar pa nges par gsol// de nas yang dag ye gsungs pa// dpa' bo dur khrod gnas pas legs// rus pa'i rgyan nges phyag rgya drug/ gnas
392b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid de/ / rgyu bzhi tshad med bzhi ru gnas// ye shes rtog pa'i rtog pa'o// rgyun ma chad pa'i dam pa yis// nyi zla shes rab thabs kyi gdan// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo
392b6(rgyud 'bum): bor gnas/ / gyur pa'i mtshan ldan ye shes lnga// phyag rgya drug mdzes byin brlabs nas// dur khrod ma ni 'khyud pa'o// phung po la sogs thug par gnas// pad+ma rdo rje byin gyis brlabs/
392b7(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'i sbyor ba med pa dang // mtshan ma bral dang 'dus ma byas// byed pa rnam med tog pas byas// sku ni dug 'joms gnag pa'i tshul// rdo rje zhags pa bsdigs gnas pa//
393a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon brkyang gnas pa spyan rgyu dmar// pad+ma gri gug shes rab tshul// g.yon 'khyud tshim byed rgyan bral ba'i// thabs dang shes rab ma chags dang // tha ma byin
393a2(rgyud 'bum): mnan te gnas/ / 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na'o// hUM la rgya gram rdo rje gnas// a las chos 'byung grub pa mo// mtshon cha rab drabs so// rten pa phyag rgya lha lnga gnas// mos pa
393a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grub pa yin/ / mos pa rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gnyis med 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ni// 'khor lo mi bskyod la
393a4(rgyud 'bum): shes che/ / mgrin pa 'phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung // rna cha gzugs kyi 'od dpag med// rus pa'i rna rgyan don yod grub// thal ba snang mdzad rnam dag go// mig la 'dod chags rdo rje
393a5(rgyud 'bum): maHrna bar zhe sdang ma zhes grags/ / sna ni ser sna'i rnam par bor// lce la phrag dog rdo rje ma// lus la rdo rje gti mug go// yid la chos kyi dbang phyug ste// dkyil 'khor lus nyid
393a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag pa/ / rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin to// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// bdud rtsi rnam lnga tshon sna lnga// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo nyid de// so sen pa s+phu tA ra Na// snying gi dbus
393a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi lte ba nyid/ / phung po lnga yi gtso mo ste// khams dang skye mched lha mor grags// 'byung ba sgo ba bzhi nyid de// 'dom gang gru bzhi lham pa ste// mi g.yo mgon po rnam par nges// lus
393b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / / oM Ar+yA a tsa la mar+yA ra ya kro d+ha hUM phaT/ snying po'o// oM Aru a tsa la kro d+ha bi ba tA sa hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o//
393b2(rgyud 'bum): oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// oM ha na ma hi swA hA hU bau ShaT he hUM hU~M hU~M phaT ha~M/ rgyan byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM pad+ma bo larga mi yaM/ Tahe maM bya/ badz+ra pra ta ka ko la
393b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'o// ka sa mA ra kha na hi mA ra khaM ni sa mA ra ya phaT/ gsad pa'i 'o// sarba a marga me a hUM/ thun mong grub pa'o// a gad phaT
393b4(rgyud 'bum): bskrad pa'i'o/ / swA hA rat+na/ rgyas pa'i 'o// d+harma gu tahUM/ dbang ga'o// ka ra ma pu ta shAn+ti kA ru hUM/ zhi ba'i 'o// sngags kyi rnam par dag pa'i rtog pa'i dum bu las/ khro bo'i rgyal
393b5(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad kyi sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ya yu
393b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med sbyor ba las/ / rdza nga'i tshogs rnams spros nas ni// gtso mo thabs kyi yan lag rkang // lag pa g.yas pa ga shin rjeg shed// g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rta mchin
393b7(rgyud 'bum): labs ma pa d+hi/ rdo rje la ning dung rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par mi g.yod// g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o// pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni// dbyig pa sngon po cher babar ga/ phu
394a1(rgyud 'bum): mo g.yon par stobs po che/ / spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur// gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni// rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya// yang na yab yum sbyor ba las//
394a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems sprin 'du 'phro las// hUM tshogs khre mor spros nas ni// gtso mo shes rab yan lag dgang // lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon na gzhan gyi sa mi thub mo// de yi khar ni khro
394a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyer ma/ / gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o// gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas gnas par// de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma// g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi// phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya//
394a4(rgyud 'bum): pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang // sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las// spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma// rkang pa gnyis las sa yi ni// sa 'dzin lnga
394a5(rgyud 'bum): mo gzhag par bya/ / thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems sprin 'phro 'du las// gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rigs// phyung nas lus la dkyil 'khor bkod// de
394a6(rgyud 'bum): dag phan tshur sbyor ba las/ / rjes chags rin po'i sgra yis ni// bde gshegs rogs rnams bskur bya ste// de dag la ni yang yang gzhug/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma
394a7(rgyud 'bum): kohaM/ ru las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gsal ba lha yi rang bzhin ni// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste// brjid pa'i khro bo gar dang bcas// yang na zhal gcig phyeg gnyis
394b1(rgyud 'bum): par/ / rnal 'byor can gyis brtan par bsgom// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan bskyed par bya// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor
394b2(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor du// rigs kyi khro ba spro ba ni// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// rnam par 'phrul par bshad
394b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// gti mug mi g.yo mgon po ni// zhal ni gnag dang dkar dang dmar// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// dbyig pa 'khor lo rdo rje rnams//
394b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yas na ni bsnams par mdzad// thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa na// dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang // mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad//
394b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs gyur pa// rnam snang dbu rgyan ldan pa'o// rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// ser sna'i mi g.yo mgon po ni// rin chen 'byung
394b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan dbu rgyun can/ / gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum gsus che nor bus brgyan// ser dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par rgyu/
394b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// snying khar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa ma/
395a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// mi bzad bgegs ni smyug mdzad pa// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// lho lo phyogs na bzhugs par gyur// rang sngags yi
395a2(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i/ / 'dod chags mgor po mi g.yo ba// spyan gsum pad+ma rA gA'i mdog/ zhal ni dmar dang garag dang dkar// zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang // 'od dpag med
395a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cod pan can/ / dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas// 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrug/ pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad//
395a4(rgyud 'bum): snyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang // dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su/
395a5(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur// rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// phrag dog mi g.yo mgon po ni// don yod rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// sngo ljang ut+pal 'dab ma'i mdog/ zhal ni
395a6(rgyud 'bum): sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ / zhal gdangs la ni rnam par 'gyur// gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa// 'bar ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gtun
395a7(rgyud 'bum): shing rnams ni g.yas pa na/ / sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa bsnabs// dril bu dgra swa g.yon na bsnams// g.yor brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma mnan ras ri// phyogs
395b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ / bgegs chen 'jigs pa bsal mdzad nas// byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur// de ltar phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs// mthar byed rab tu zad
395b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad nas/ / sems can yongs su btul byas te// zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bkang // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa
395b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA gu h+ya tan+ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gsang rgyud chen po/ 'phags pa 'jam
395b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'og min gyi gnas na rab tu dges shing bdud 'joms
395b5(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rdo rje chos dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / sems bskyed ma
395b6(rgyud 'bum): thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur la sogs te rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
395b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje khro bos phyogs mtshams gtams so// srung ba'i don du rab brtson zhing // bgegs kyi sbyor ba rlag par mdzad/ hUM phaT/ de nas bcom
396a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis tsaM zhes gsungs te/ rang gi thugs ka nas khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba phyung ste/ g.yas na ral gri g.yon sdigs mdzub// mar smin lta bur shim
396a2(rgyud 'bum): gnag/ sbrul dang thod pas yang dag brgyan// mi bskyod pas ni byin brlabs shing // bde gshegs 'od zer dpag med 'phros// dngos grub bde ba kun stsol mdzad// oM badz+ra
396a3(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// A li kA li rab sbyor zhing // zla ba rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// yang dag rdzogs te mdor sangs rgyas// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su ni// brkyang bskum
396a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul du yang dag gnas/ / dga' byed ma ni mdun du ste// rin chen 'phreng ma g.yas su dgod// glu mkhan mo ni g.yon du ste// brtson 'grus gar byed rgyab tu gnas// 'gugs byed ma ni shar
396a5(rgyud 'bum): du ste/ / rnam par 'ching ma lho ru dgod// gnyis med ma ni nub tu ste// rnam par 'phel ma byang du dgod// 'di dag ri bcom ldan 'das su yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig go/ 'phags pa
396a6(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ skye mchog gi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
396a7(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'od mer spros te/ lha thams cad kyi dbul 'od zer thim par gyur to// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par gyur to// de nas yang
396b1(rgyud 'bum): dag bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ru// mchod pa'i tshogs ni rnam par bstim// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya'i lha mo dpag med de// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag
396b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod/ kye kye mtha' gnyis rnam par ma g.yogs shing // sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'gro don dpag med mdzad// 'jigs byed chen po 'gro ba kun sgrol zhing // srid pa gsum na dgyes par gar
396b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / srid pa'i ru bo skams shing mi mthun bdud rnams 'joms// srid pa'i rlung gi sa ma g.yos thugs rje mi g.yo mgon// rab brjid mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan
396b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi bstod pa chen po'i dam tshig go/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyal po rtag ldan thod pa ru// lcags kyu lnga sogs gzhag par bya// rlung dang ma yi dkyil 'khor gzhag/ thod pa
396b5(rgyud 'bum): ru ni yang dag gnas/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud rtsi chen po'i dam tshig go/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// tshangs pa brgya byin gshin rje dang // chu bdag gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sogs// me dang
396b6(rgyud 'bum): srin po rlung gi lha/ / 'byung po sa yi lha mo dang // lha ma yin sogs 'khor bcas dgug/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha prA NAM A t+ya nu t+pan+na tAt+t+wa swA hA/ oM khA hi khA hi po pheM swAhA/ bdud rtsi sha dang
396b7(rgyud 'bum): khrag la sogs/ / gtor ma thams cad sbyin par bya// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang
397a1(rgyud 'bum): dag bshad bya ba/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du bya// gsar pa las ni bkal nas kyang // dkyil 'khor nyis 'khor ring thung la/
397a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// 'khor lo lta bur byas nas kyang // rdo rje 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldam/
397a3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ral gri chen por dgod// shar du rdo rje yang dag dgod// lho ru rin chen 'phreng ba ste// nub tu chos kyi pi wang ste// byang du rdo rje rtse gsum mo// sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang /
397a4(rgyud 'bum): lcags sgrog dril bu mkhas pas gzhag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dam tshig go// de nas char pa mi 'bab na// stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du yang // dngul
397a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzhod pa bzhag nas kyang / / bag zan las ni byas pa'i gzugs// pad+ma gsum brtsegs dag tu bya// steng du klu yi gzugs bzhag la// gur kum gyis ni byugs byas la// mtsham
397a6(rgyud 'bum): su oM dang baM bkod de/ / tsan dan dkar pos sbyin sreg bya// kha dog mang po sbyor ldan pas// klu yi gzugs ni nges par dgug/ des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ kham pa'i gab tshe dkar po ru/
397a7(rgyud 'bum): pri yang ku yi khu ba yis// ral gri brgyad po'i 'khor lo bri// rgya mtsho'i ngos las sa blangs la// klu yi gzugs ni mngon byas te// nam mkha' lding gi khu bas byugs// til mar
397b1(rgyud 'bum): la ni sbyin sreg bya/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// kham phor ser po'i nang du ni// bsgrub bya'i gzugs gzhug ldong ros kyis// ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa bri// des ni yang dag mnan
397b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / shin tu rno ba'i lcags dag la// khru do tshad kyi ral gri bya// maN+Dal dkar po'i steng du gzhag/ zla ba drug ni rig pa bzlas// til mar gyis ni bskus byas nas// zla ba
397b3(rgyud 'bum): gzas zin tshen bsgrub/ / thogs pas mkha' la lding bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha sna lnga// grib ma dag la bskams byas te// lcags gsum dag gis dkris byas te// shar
397b4(rgyud 'bum): bltas zas ni smyung bar gnas/ / gzas zin tshe na b+ha gar gzhug/ mnyam par bzhag ste nyi shu bzlas// khar bcu ga gzhan gyis mngon mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dngos grub chen po'i
397b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig go/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sa bzhi dkar la zlum pa la// tsan dan dkar po'i ma sbar te// ser skya'i mar gyis sbyin sreg bya// dngos grub chen po thob par
397b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sbyangs kar gyis ri sbyin sreg bya// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'thob// ti la nag pos ni sbyin sreg bya// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// dur ba'i thu gus sbyin skras bya/
397b7(rgyud 'bum): tshe lo rog 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// seng lding dag la phur bur bya// gsang sngags nyid shu gcig bzlas nas// 'dod pa'i gzugs la dbab par bya// dgyes pa si dngos grub rgya
398a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ dngos grub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su dkyi/
398a2(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa rnams la rnam par gzigs nas/ oM AHhUM/ zhes bya ba'i sgra gsungs te mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs kyis rang gi bdag
398a3(rgyud 'bum): po mthong bar ma gyur te/ phyogs bzhi nas mngon du phyogs nas 'di yis gsol ba btab bo// e ma bcom ldan ngo mtshar che// stong pa'i ngang las ci ste bzhugs// bdag ni tshangs
398a4(rgyud 'bum): spyod byams pa s+ho/ / mya ngan 'das pa kun nas spong // e ma'o bde ba chen po'i sku// tshig kun gyis ni ma spros pa// bdag ni rjes chags snying rjer// 'gro ba yang dge sgrol bar mdzad// e man
398a5(rgyud 'bum): dri med dag pa'i sku/ / stong pa'i ngangal ma bzhugs par// rab tu dag pas bdag la rol// 'gro ba'i don la rjes chags mdzod// e ma'o don kun grub mdzad pa// dag pa'i ye shes dri med/
398a6(rgyud 'bum): gru/ bdag gis 'gro kun gzung ba'i phyir// gtso ga khyod ni yang dag bzhengs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dgyes te sku yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag
398a7(rgyud 'bum): gsus so/ / lo sa rgya ma tsal hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI ma ya/ sarba hU~M baN+Dal hU~M laT/ gsang sngags dang pur bu'i sngags so// yon maHsarba badz+rar+Na/ badz+ra na N+Dam ma
398b1(rgyud 'bum): Ta ya hUM hUM hUM tA Ta hUM/ maM ngaM haM maM traT hUM ma ma hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ shin tu rno ba'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o// de nas 'khor rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi dor khong du chud par gyur to// 'phas
398b2(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// /
398b3(rgyud 'bum): @rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra a mr-i ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
398b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje bdud rtsi gsang ba'i pad+ma la bzhugs so// gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i khang pa na// mA ma
398b5(rgyud 'bum): kI dang thabs cig tu/ / bcom ldan rdo rje car rol te// de nas lha mos de zhus pa// gsang chen zhes bya cher gnas pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ sngon du lha khyod kyis gsungs pa/
398b6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi yi ri sgrub pa'i thabs// bde ba chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes bshad// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bsam med zas med phra mo ste// don yod dbang po
398b7(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa/ / dam pa ni ba rnam dag pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// mA ma kI chags dang ldan nas// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang
399a1(rgyud 'bum): chen mngon sum du ni mdzad/ / rgyud rnams kun la gsang ba yi// ye shes rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// brtan por 'khyud dang 'o byed dang //
399a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i rol pas mnyam sbyor dang // dbyangs dang sil snyan gar rnams kyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ de ltar myur du 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs te// 'gro ba gsum
399a3(rgyud 'bum): rini des bskyed do/ / khyod la dga' ma zhal bzang ma// de yi sgrub pa bdag gis bshad// nyon cig de yi sems kyi chog/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sems can don du phar dor du//
399a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ rnal 'byor gang gis shes gyur na// 'khor ba'i bcings las myur bar grol// bstan du med cing ye shes che// dngos grub 'jig rten gsum bsgrub bo//
399a5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du// sgrub pa pos ni bde ba spyod// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung bar bya// b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bta ba ste// rdo rje pad zer mA ma kI si//
399a6(rgyud 'bum): 'obatab rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab pas// de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo des// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// nyams dga' gsang
399a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus/ / cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni// mchod pa dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// 'dir ni mchod pa ji ltar te// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// dga' ba chen po
399b1(rgyud 'bum): thob dka' ba/ / rab tu dgyes nas bka' stsal 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// 'o btab pas ni dgar 'gyur te// bzhad nas 'di skad bka' rtsal/
399b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bsgral ba'i phyir// dga' ba chen po sbyor ba yis// mA ma kI sa ni 'dir dris pa// zur gsum dkyil 'khor bris nas su//
399b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i pad+ma mA ma kI// nang du snying po dang ldan pa'i// pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa ni bya// de dbus gsang chen rig ma dang // gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste//
399b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa la ni dkar po 'dod// g.yon du dmar por rab gsungs te// lha yi rgyan gyi sa brgyan byas pa// lha yi na bza' me tog 'phreng // lha yi dri yis byug byed pa// lha yi dngos grub byed zhig
399b5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ phyi rol du ni dkyil 'khor yang // sgo bzhi pa ni rab tu brtags// shar du khro gnyer ma bzhag ste// lho na 'jigs par 'jigs byed ma// rub na rta yi gzugs
399b6(rgyud 'bum): can ma/ / byang du tshogs kyi 'dren ma mo// mkhas pas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// rig ma brgyad ni mnyam par bri// mdzes pa mo dang zhi ba'i zhal// zla mo dang ni dung can mo// ri bong 'dzin dang
399b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mo/ / ri bor 'dzin ri mo yid dga'// yid la bde bar byed ma dag/ rig ma brgyad dang dge ma brgyad// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni yang
400a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ma/ / phyogs rnams dang ni mtshams dag la// rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya// mchod pa pi wang rnga de bzhin// de bzhin spros dang me tog sogs// dbyangs dang gar dang
400a2(rgyud 'bum): mdor pa ni/ / dga' pha rol pa sbyor ba yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// ma dang bran mo bu mo dang // sring mo gnyen mo de bzhin te// rdo rje bdud rtsi de dag
400a3(rgyud 'bum): las/ / blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// ma las bdud rtsi blangs pas ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur// sring mo nad med na so gzhon// bu mo yi ni 'dod kur sbyin// bran zer
400a4(rgyud 'bum): mo'i ni don yod grub/ / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dod byas// lce ni dril bar byas nas su// kha yis pad+mar blang bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de nas myur bar dngos grub bo// bung
400a5(rgyud 'bum): brtse ba'i tshul gyis ni/ / bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyod// 'dus dang grub mo dang brkyang ba// yar bteg zer ni shin tu brkyang // byed pa'i bcing ba sbyor ba yis// sa gsum dag ni bsgrub
400a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sha chen dang mi zag chen gyis// de bzhin bshang gci khu ba dag/ de dag rdo rje bdud rtsi lnga// nyin dang nyin du bsgrub par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gal te dngos grub bdag
400a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'adod na/ / de yis don rnams thams cad ni// sgrub pa pos ni mchog tu bsgrub// dbang dgug pa dang 'thab pa dang // gsong dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/
400b1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba thams cad kun tu bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bdes
400b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i mngon tshul bstan pa'i le'u dang po'o// / de nas mgu ba'i lha mo de// pad+ma rgyas pa'i
400b3(rgyud 'bum): mA ma kI/ / brtan po 'khyud pa byas nas su// dbang po thams cad la 'o btab// ma mchu sos bzung 'o btab ste// sid sgra sngags ni brjod par bya// rdo rje bcings pas sku yang 'dzin//
400b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyis gsang byas te// pad+mar rdo rje bcug nas su// chags na dga' ste 'dod par byas// sing sgra snyan po sgra rnams dang // ko ki la dang gling bu sogs// lha mo mA ma kI dang rtse// rdo
400b5(rgyud 'bum): rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos/ / nu ma zung la gzir byas te// sen mo re mos gdab par bya// de yang gos ni phud byas te// stang 'og la yang blta bar bya// rgyas pa'i pad+mar 'o btab nas// dga'
400b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya/ / rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI// lha mo chen mo legs so legs// gtan du 'dod la chags pa yis// bdag gis khyod la dga' bar bya// gang zhig 'dod pa khyod kyis
400b7(rgyud 'bum): chus/ / khyod la bdag gis mchog tu sbyin// de nas lha mo mA ma kI// tshig 'di dag ni ched du gsol// bcom ldan nyid kyis de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyis rnam sprul pa// phra bas
401a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu phra ba yis/ / zad med ye shes ji ltar rol// de 'dra lha yis dpyod pa ni// dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas// de dag the tsom 'byung bas na// bdag
401a2(rgyud 'bum): ni ngo mtshar dam par gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen bshad// nyon cig de nyid mA ma kI// ye shes sbyor ba 'bigs byed pa// shin tu phra ba gsang chen po/
401a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes shes bya ngo bo nyid// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// mi 'jigs zad med rtag pa ni// gdod ma med cing dbang po spongs// yod nyid dang ni med nyid kyang //
401a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po dang bcas dbang po med// 'byung ba kun tu ma mthong ba// sbyor ba lam gyis mthong ba'o// sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// phyi dang nang du bcas pa'o// phyi ni gzugs kyi phung po sogs/
401a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba rnam pa kun rdzogs te// sna tshogs g.yo dang mi g.yo ba// khams gsum dang ni ma lus par// de gcig pus ni khyab pa ste// thams cad rnam shes kho na'o// ci phyir sems can bdag
401a6(rgyud 'bum): med rnams/ / rnam shes phung po rten pa yin// thun sems snyigs ma'i mi rnams kyis// 'ga' yang shes pa ma yin no// sems las ma byung sems kyi ngos// ye shes shes bya'i ngo bo nyid/
401a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam shes gcig nyid do// gang tshe lus la rkyen nyid 'gyur// chos rnams dang ni chos gcig 'gyur// dngos po bdag ni de tshe 'gyur// ci l-i phyir na chos rnams kyi// mang po nyid du chos
401b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / / mu rgyun bzhin du rgya mtsho la// thar pa ni gcig kho na ste// mang po nyid du mi rnyed de// ji ltar nang du mer gnas pa// bla ma'i zhal kho na las thob// b+ha ga'i pad+mar nam mkha' gang /
401b2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste// snying dang snying po rnam ldan zhing // 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par klubs// de dbus rdo rje can bzhugs te// byang sems bdud rtsi dang ldan pa// cha shas chas min rnam
401b3(rgyud 'bum): grol bar/ / thig le de yis rnam par spangs// de nas rtag tu zag pa ni// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi gzugs// khams rnams kun gyi gzhi yin pa// steng 'og tu yang rnam par khyab// des ni
401b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba thos pa yang / / mnams pa dang ni myang ba yang // reg dang bde ba'i longs spyod ni// zas dang me tog 'phreng ba dang // rgyan dang gos kyis brgyan pa ste// ngag gis sna tshogs grags pa yang //
401b5(rgyud 'bum): blangs pa dang ni bzung ba rnams// rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang // sad pa dang ni log pa dang // thams cad rmi lam mthong ba ste// bzhad dang de bzhin cho nge dang //
401b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu yid 'phrog gar dang ni// rnga rnams dag kyang brdung ba ste// sna tshogs pa dag 'dir brjod pas// smyon pa dang ni myos pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dod chags de de nyid// gzugs med mang
401b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i gzugs can de/ / pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams// du ma'i gzugs can kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin// khyab pa'i dngos kyis khyab nas su// de nyid dam pa cher gnas
402a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ de bzhin nyid de mA ma kI// bzlas med 'dzin pa yang med de// bgrang 'phreng bya ba 'ga' yang med// zas spangs pa yang mi bya'o// b+ha ga'i pad+ma mchod byas te/
402a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de yis de nyid 'grub pa'o// gang de bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// b+ha ga'i dbus su pad+ma ste// rtsa gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis la// de
402a3(rgyud 'bum): giyi dbus su de gtso ste/ / de dag las gzhan shin su mchog/ rtsa dag dgu ni rnam par gnas// sgo dgu la gnas rigs pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lha mo//
402a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu rdo rje can mnyam blta// de bas de dag rab byed na// chags bral zhes gsungs kun rig pas// de dag gsang chen mchog rab ni// zhal bzang ma kye sbyor bar bshad// sna tshogs
402a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam snang mdzad sogs pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes te// gtan du dga' ba'i yid bde ba// sbyor bas dam pa rab bstan to// gsang ba'i pad+ma mthong nas dang // shin tu
402a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i mA ma kI/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de nyid bdag gis bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde
402a7(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin nyid sbyor ba ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas mgu ba'i lha mo des// hA ra nu pur
402b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan te/ / 'di dag dbyangs ni blangs nas su// sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed// phyung mdzad bde chen rdo rje las// bdag gis mchog gi yig 'bru 'tshal bar gyi// b+ha ga'i
402b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mar bde ba chen po ste/ / rdo rje'i don de bde ba chen po lags// sa 'dzin pa dang skad phran dang // drug ldan la sogs mtha' 'khob tshul// sna tshogs thun mong rnam dag gi/ snyan pa'i sgra
402b3(rgyud 'bum): yis blang bar bya/ / de rnams dbyangs dag blangs nas su// dga' yid bde ba rnam sprul gyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba me// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bka'
402b4(rgyud 'bum): stsal pas/ / de bzhin nyid kyis the tsom bcad// rdo rje can khyod bka' drin gyis// rtag par ye shes bya ba bgyi// bcom ldan chags pa dang bral ba'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba 'di// rdo rje/
402b5(rgyud 'bum): theg pa 'byung ba yi// sbyor ba bdag gis bstan par bgyis// da dung bdag la the tshom mchis// phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam sprul pa// ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung // de dag gi sngags rje
402b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar lags/ / sngags rnams gang las skye ba lags// khyad par du ni lha rnams kyang // lA ni dri dag the tsom na// mdor bsdus nas ni bdag la gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos//
402b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs// phyog rgya thugs dpa 'byung bani// bag dang rten tshigs pa 'i// rgyag byams pa gsum shesas te// mu dang gsung dang thugs pas 'byung/
403a1(rgyud 'bum): byas rgya mchog 'gyur te// gsudun phyag tu rtags kyi las// thugs kyi mtshan ma d+hAg d+hA nA~M// bya la gtan ma gnyis med gnas// rdorje bdu
403a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i byugs sa bya/ / mtshan ma'i phyag sna ma ze'o// phyag tu mngon sam gzugs yin te// lhan d+ha mdzan med do// dang ba thams cad bde bcu// rna ga'i pad+ma mchod pa
403a3(rgyud 'bum): bang+gA pam b+h+yo shing / / las banas cang ni 'grub par bya/ m+b+ha gru pas ma shing na hU~M// rdul ga rgya drag stong can dang // sa dang gdung ba'i//
403a4(rgyud 'bum): su gyur ba badzin// de sngar bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// sngags dang drug rgyu'i yum yin te// sngags 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni// thu ga'i dbus su gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo/
403a5(rgyud 'bum): can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen poso// rdo rje bcug nas mA ma kI// nyon cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni// dang po rnam snang mdzad sbyor te// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA sa khwa/ sa byon
403a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dang mnyam ldan la/ / swA hA yi ge yang sbyor ro// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul te// yi ge gnyis dang bzhi pa ste// ngan po yos ni mnyam ldan pa// mA ma kI ya~M snying po'i mchog
403a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad la kho na'o dbus ma gang / / brgyad la rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'dab brgyad la ni sbyar byas te// lha mo sngags kyis sngags phyung ngo // sgo srungs dag gi sngags rnams ni/
403b1(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig skal bzang mA ma kI// sde yi tha ma sngags phyung ste// sa bon brgyad ni sngags rig pas// stong pa'i lU yis gnon byas te// rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan la// swA hA yi ge/
403b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam por ldan// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin rnams// bzhi ni sgo srungs kyi yin te// bzhi ni spos dang dung+ge sogs// ma ning yi ge ga bzhi la// swA hA rnam par snang mdzad kyang //
403b3(rgyud 'bum): mo gsang ba'i mA ma kI// rnga sogs kun gyis mchod par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
403b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ sngags phyung ba'i rim pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas sbyin sreg
403b5(rgyud 'bum): las dag gi/ cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga yis// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub pa yin// ni ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang // 'thab dang /
403b6(rgyud 'bum): bskrad kyang de bzhin du// sngags dang phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa rnams// de kun bdag gis bshad par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying byed pa// dgur brten bcas
403b7(rgyud 'bum): pas gnyis gnapa gargyan thams cad kyis brgyan byas te/ / slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas// rkang gnyis g.yas brkyang bya ba dang /
404a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon brkyang bya ba yang byas te// rkang mnyam dang ni sa ga yis// sa ni skyong bar byed ma thag/ sa la reg na 'jam skye'o// de nas bgegs rnams bskrad nas su/
404a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhal yas sprul pa la sogs pa// gong du bla mar phyag 'tshal lo// phyi nas sa yi lha mo dgug/ oM e h+ye hi lha mo che// sa yi brtan ma 'jig rten yum// rin chen thams cad rab
404a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'o/ / lha yi rgyan gyis rgyan byed ma// ha ru Na pur sgra 'byin ma// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu mchod// yon 'di dag ni bzhes nas su// sbyin sreg las ni 'grub par mdzod// hri hri hrih+na
404a4(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ bshang gci khrag dang khu ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa la gtor bar bya// byin brlabs bya ba'i phyir spros ni// sha chen gyis ni dbul bar bya// de nas rig ma 'jug byas te// gdol
404a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ma dang sme sha ma/ / gar mkhan ma dang bram ze mo// de kho na bzhin rgyal mo dang // dmangs rigs mo dang rgyal rigs mo// dri dang spos kyis mchod byas te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// yan
404a6(rgyud 'bum): lag lnga la yi ge hrIH/ / b+ha ga'i dbus su yi ge bruM// spyan ma sgrol ma gos dkar ma// yid dga' ma bdag bsgom par bya// b+ha ga'i dbus su slob dpon gyis// me tog gtor ba kho nar bya/
404a7(rgyud 'bum): denas sngags pas ho khung ni// tshad mar kun tu bri bya ste// zhi la zlum por bya ba ste// khru gang tsam du thig gdab bo// khru phyed sa la brkos nas su// dkar rtsi tshon gyis byug par bri// ku
404b1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'khor lo tshul ltar yang / / glo ru mnyam por bri ba'o// rgyas pa la ni khru do ste// de la khru gang brko bar bya// gru bzhi pa ni mtha' mnyam du// mugs dang btsag gis bri ba'o// mngon spyod la
404b2(rgyud 'bum): ni zur gsum ste/ / sor nyi shu ni yangs pa'i tshad// nyi shu phyed ni brko byas na// dbus su rdo rje rgyu gram yang // 'bar ba 'phreng gis 'khrugs pa bri// de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la// zla gam yang
404b3(rgyud 'bum): dag bri ba'o/ / ho khung yang dag ston nas su// phyogs kyi cha yang bstan par bya// byang du mngon du kha bsgyur te// sngags pas zhi ba brtsam par bya// rgyas pa la ni shar du yang // mngon spyod
404b4(rgyud 'bum): la ni lho na ste/ / dbang ni nub tu kho na bshad// dgug dang bskrad kyang de bzhin no// mngon spyod rtag par nag po ste// tshen lnga yis ni dbang sogs bya// 'bras dang til dang 'o ma dang // mar
404b5(rgyud 'bum): dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig par/ / bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// zhi ba rgyas pa sbyin sreg bya// sreg shing rnams kyang thams cad la// dri zhim 'o ma can shing ngo // sna tshogs zas sam gto
404b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yang / / 'byung po thams cad sbyin par bya// gtor ma gang yang sgrub pa pos// khrag 'thung phyag rgya chen pos sbyin// gang zhig yid kyis 'dod pa ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/
404b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyar gyi dus ni zhi ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin dgun gyi dus// dpyid ka mngon spyod las rnams ni// sgrub pa pos ni thams cad bya// shar dus zhi ba rab tu gsungs// rgyas pa de bzhin srod la
405a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ nyin phyed la 'am nam phyed la// rtag par mngon spyod bya ba'o// ho khung dbus su yi dam lha// yi ge hUM gis bskyed nas su// zhal ni gdangs pa bsam byas te/
405a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg de la dbul bar bya// sbyir sreg 'bum phrag 'bul 'gyur na// mdun du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur// dang po me ni dgug bya ba// lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i gnas// 'od zer
405a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng 'khrugs drag po'i lha/ / sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'o// oM e h+ye hi/ 'dir gshegs gdon mi za bar khyod// me lha mngon sum dngos grub sbyin// drag po khams gsum gyi
405a4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa/ / khyab 'jug tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba// 'di dag yon yang bzhes nas su// zhabs g.yon brjes kyang rdo rje can// oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ dang po la ni lon 'bul
405a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ / phyi nas lha bshos me tog 'bul// oM/ lha yi me tog shin tu dmar// dri zhi ma shin tu mdzes pa ni// me tog de ring bzhes nas su// 'di la byin gyis brlab par gsol// hUM ma
405a6(rgyud 'bum): tog gi sngags so/ / oM/ mar me 'od zer 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa// lha yi mig byed bkra shis pas// mar ma khyod kyis bzhes su gsol// hUM mar me'i sngags
405a7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM tsan dan ga pur dang bcas pa'i// dri zhim spos me dge ba ni// mthu dang bcas par bya ba 'di// bzhes nas byin gyis brlab tu gsol// hUM spos kyi sngags so// oM/ sna tshogs
405b1(rgyud 'bum): lha yi dri zhim pa/ / sna tshogs ga pur rnam brgyan pas// sna tshogs yi ge hUM las byung // dri 'di 'bul te bzhes su gsol// hUM dri'i sngags so// dang por mchod pa'i cho ga ni// the tsom med/
405b2(rgyud 'bum): par me la bya// phyi nas rang gi yi dam lha'i// bzlas sngags rig par brjod par bya// dbyangs dang gar dang zas rnams kyis// rnam pa du mar rol byas te// rig ma dang ni sgrub pa pos// tshogs
405b3(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pas mnyes par bya/ / gal te dngos grub dag 'dod na// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub pa'o// bla ma me lha rdo rje 'dzin// mchod par byas nas rdzogs par bya// oM me lha las ni grub par
405b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / sems can thams cad bde ba 'dren// sku gsung thugs dngos grub don du// lha rnams las ni rjes su skyobs// me lha zhi bar gshegs nas su// sa gzhi zhi bar mdzad mdzod

412a2(rgyud 'bum): khar mnan pa'i sngags/ / b+h+yo yig de la bzla bya ste// lha yi dkyil 'khor mchod nas su// khrag chen gyis ni gtor bar bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags chen ni// sgrub pa pos ni bzlas ma thag/
412a3(rgyud 'bum): khro dang ldan pa'i ag btsar bya// ro langs kyis ni gang sgrogs byed// de tshe sngags pas mi 'jigs te// khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya// langs pa'i ro langs de yis kyang // sgrub pa po la
412a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad smras/ / dpa' chen po kye las gang yang // bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang // mkha' la rgyu bar 'dod pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod pa// las de
412a5(rgyud 'bum): dag ri grub par bgyi/ / de nas sgrub pa po la ni// yid la gang dang gang 'dod bslang // de ltar thams cad bsgrub bya ba// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI// ro langs sgrub pa'i mchog gyur pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi
412a6(rgyud 'bum): las byung yin/ / sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du// sgrub pa po yi bde yang 'dren// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
412a7(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ ro langs sgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje
412b1(rgyud 'bum): can/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te// cang mi gsung bar cher bzhugs so// dbugs dgag phyir nas mi g.yo nas// mi 'jigs pa dang mi gsung bar// ting 'dzin mchog la
412b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa la/ / mA ma kIs ni yang zhus te// bcom ldan rdo rje phra mo ni// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// ji ltar rnam pa gang gis ni// de bzhin nyid de thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan
412b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bzhad pa mdzad nas gsung 'di ni// spyan yang phye nas bka' stsal pa// de nyid sngon bzhin bshad pa ste// bdud rtsi gzugs ni khu ba yin// bdud rtsi lnga
412b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan byas te/ / rtag par rgyun du myang bar bya// rdzas ni re re'i mthu dag ni// bshad pa nyon cig mA ma kI// ye shes shes bya sgrub byed pa'i// khu ba dngas par bza' bar bya// sku gsung thug
412b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi bsgrub don du/ / khrag chen rab tu bsgrub bya ste// gang zhe bud med rnams kyi 'am// bu mo yi ni rtag tu blang // khrag chen de ni mA ma kI// don ni thams cad byed pa po// drag shul shi pa rnyed na ni//
412b6(rgyud 'bum): sha chen po yang bza' bya ste// gsal shing btsugs dang 'gegs pa 'am// g.yul du bsad pa gang de ni// zab cing brtan pas za byed na// tshe dang nad med 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod/
412b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bde ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'tsho// 'dod kun 'bras bu des sbyin no// rdo rje chu dang bshang gci ni// rang gis bza' bar rig par bya//
413a1(rgyud 'bum): phye ma zhib mor byas pa la// khrag chen gyis ni bsre bar bya// snga dro de bzhin nyin phyed dang // phyi dro la ni bza' bar bya// dus gsum zos nas rnal 'byor pas// de
413a2(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje chu ni btung / / nyin dang nyin du mA ma kI// sgrub pa po gang sgrub byed pa// lus la nad ni med 'gyur zhing // rgas pa'i nad kyang med par byed// skal bzang rgyas pa'i mdangs ldan pa//
413a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i sgor yang rgyal bar 'dren// des na 'dod pa kun sbyin pas// mchog rab de nyid thob pa yin// rnal 'byor de yang kun shes te// rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// 'dod chags zhe sdang
413a4(rgyud 'bum): las grol nas/ / brkam pa phrag dog rnam spangs nas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// de yis sgrub pa 'grub pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni// don mang gsang ba'i rim pa can// ma lus rdo rje
413a5(rgyud 'bum): theg pa 'di/ / 'di las byung gyur lha mo kye// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kIs// 'dod chags kyi ni bde 'gyur bas// khyod la dam pa'i dngos bstan na// bdag gis gang la yang mi ston// 'di ni gsang
413a6(rgyud 'bum): chen dam pa yin/ / yid dag kun gyi bdag la gnas// byang chub sems dpa' ma shes te// gzugs med stong par mi 'gyur bas// de na de nyid rig chen po// rdo rje spyi gtsug nor bu 'dod//
413a7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gsang nas gzungs lha mo// pha dang bu la'ang bstan mi bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdan du gsang ba bstan pa dang // bla ma la chags brtul zhugs bstan// de la sbyin nas de
413b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid bstan/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni// bde 'grub shin tu thob dka' ba// yang dag rdzogs pas skal bzang zhing // snying po ye shes 'dus pa yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las/ sgrub pa po
413b2(rgyud 'bum): gang dbang bskur ba/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// de la kun gyis phyag byed de// phyag ni lan gsum byas nas su// rdo rje slob dpon skal bzang mchog/ de nyid sems can thams
413b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / 'khor ba las 'dren gtso zhes gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po// ston pas dga' ma la bstan nas// phra mo'i gzugs
413b4(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje can/ / de nas b+ha ga cher bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ bdud rtsi
413b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud lo tsab gyi co d+hU ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o//
413b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ kU la lo kanA thA pany+tsa da sha ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa zhe bya ba/ dpal ldan rigs
413b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas 'di ni mchog tu gsang // 'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa'i mchog/ rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas// gnyis med sngags ni rab bshad bya//
414a1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig spyod pa nges par grol// bya ba dus tshod rnam par spangs// de nyid gsum ldan yang dag lha// 'jig rten mgon po 'gro ba'i bdag/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa'i
414a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga/ / mthong dang ma mthong 'bras rab ster// de 'dir sngags ni mtshungs med pa// bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas// drag chen 'jigs byed lus la ni// lnga pa'i thig le dang bcas shing // /
414a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam gcod dang po yang dag ldan// chen po lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas// lus gsum gyis ni sngags mchog la// yi ge rnams kyi bsdu ba las//
414a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid cho ga bzhin du bzlas// 'di yi rjes dran sngags pa yis// gtsang ngam yang na mi gtsang rung // lha bzhin mthong ba lha rnams kyis// de yi lha mo 'dod lha bzhin// 'di bzhin
414a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi 'dod lha yi/ / bya ba med cing sgrub pa'ang med// mchod med me la sbyin sreg med// rnal 'byor ldan dang yang dag ldan// dus tshod rnams las rnam nges grol// rtse gcig sems
414a6(rgyud 'bum): ni g.yo mi byed/ / sgrib pa dang bral mtshungs pa yi// mchog gi bsam gtan yang dag spyad// rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las/ sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi le'u
414a7(rgyud 'bum): ste dang po'o/ / // snying kha'i 'khor lo'i nang song ba'i// de nyid gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro// dbye ba gnyis 'gyur de las ni// ye shes nyid ni kun 'gro bya// mi 'gyur dga' ba'i
414b1(rgyud 'bum): yul rig pa/ / sems kyis rjes su rtog pa can// bya ba de yi bde 'dod phyir// rtog pa kun nas 'jug par 'gyur// de yi ngo bo rtags nyid 'jug/ de sems dga' ba'i spyod yul la//
414b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang ni las rnams kun// tshig dang bcas pas the tsom med// bsam gtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan// brtan par dgod bya blo ldan gyis// 'gro kun dgra yi rang bzhin gyi// sa steng
414b3(rgyud 'bum): sa 'og mtho ris sgrub/ / lte ba'i pad+mar pad+ma che// rnam gsum nam mkha'i nang song ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// nam mkha' phyag rgya'i bdag nyid bzhin// srog 'bab pa yi tshad kyis
414b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ gnas gnyis po yis goms par bya// de bzhin rab tu dgod byas nas// 'jig rteni mgon po'i sku ru 'gyur// gang gis gzhan du bzlas byas dang // las rnams kyang ni bsgrub
414b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / de ni mkha' la khu tshur bsdun// rmongs pas spun stong 'joms par byed// bsam gtan sbyor bas cho ga bzhin// las gang rtag tu bya ba ste// de las myur du sgrub byed do// de yi las ni yid
414b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'dod/ / rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las/ bdag gi de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // rang bzhin bsam gtan dang bcas shing //
414b7(rgyud 'bum): dzA ti mtshal gyi 'od zer bzhin// se 'dzul brgan me tog bzhin// li khri dmar po dang mtshungs gtso// sngags kyi sku yi lha yi lha// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// mkha' pad zla ba'i gdan
415a1(rgyud 'bum): la bzhugs/ / khyab bdag zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams// mchog sbyin phyag gis yang dag rol// mu ti ga nor bus rnam par brgyan// pad+ma'i phyag dang spyan gsum po/
415a2(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs sku// dpa' bo dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon// rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dgyes pa// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// sngags rnams kun la bsam gtan bya// gang
415a3(rgyud 'bum): dang gang gis bsgoms pa yis/ / rnal 'byor goms par gyur pa'i phyir// de yis de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// yid bzhin nor mchog ji bzhin no// lha ni dkar pos zhi rab ster// de bzhin ngag ni rab
415a4(rgyud 'bum): sad byed/ / dbang dang dgug pa'i de nyid la// sku mdog dmar po rnam par bsam// du ba dmar po'i 'od mdog can// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pas// dgra bo rnams ni nyer skrod pa// /
415a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni the tsom med par byed// du ba skya bo dmar ba yis// rnam par zhe sdang nges sbyor bas// gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag/ rengs pa la ni ser por shes// lug gi steng du gnas pa la// rkan gyi
415a6(rgyud 'bum): bar du rnam phug na/ / srid pa gsum du gang gang gnas// thams cad rab tu rmongs par byed// gzhan dag rmongs pas ci zhig bya// don mang tshig ni rab 'dus pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi
415a7(rgyud 'bum): las rnams ni/ / yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yi// rgyud gzhan rnams la nyer spyod pa// gsungs dang ma gsung gyur pa ni// rang bzhin bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// bya ba 'di la the tsom med//
415b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig lha ni mkha' dang mtshungs// kha dog dbye bas so so ste// 'jig rten gsum na gang spyod pa'i// las rnams thams cad bya ba'o// skal bzang byed pa'i sngags rnams ni// snang kha'i
415b2(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes dbus song ba/ / snying kha'i chu skyes sbyor ba yis// dbang la sogs pa yang dag sgrub// yi ge gsum dang bcas pa'i lha// steng du 'gro ba gsum ldan pas// mi rnams las ni chag
415b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams zhal la gnas// rnam pa gsum ni 'gugs par byed// pad+ma gzugs ldan gyur pas mdzes// rtag sbyor rgyun du rnal 'byor pas// mar me g.yo med gnas
415b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin/ / sngon gsungs lha yi lha dbang phyug/ skya rengs dmar po dang mtshungs 'od// mtshan mo phyed kyi dus gnas la// rnal 'byor nyid ni yang dag spyod// de yi gzugs 'dzin lus la
415b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sngon du bkod pa yis/ / zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lha// bsgrub bya'i lus la yang dag blang // thams cad bla ma'i zhal la gnas// rigs pa lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis
415b6(rgyud 'bum): de las lcags kyu bsnun nas ni/ / zhags pa yis ni 'gugs par byed// rnam par myos shing lus ni dmar// yang dang yang du brgyal gyur te// bu ga sgo dgu nas bsnun nas// khrag ni rab tu
415b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bab par byed/ / sgrib pa med pa dang mtshungs par// rang lus rnam par blta bar bya// de yi dbus las bzhengs pa'i sngags// yi ge'i dbang po dang por bsam// 'bar zhing 'bar ba lta bu yi//
416a1(rgyud 'bum): kha li sgro ru sngon 'dod rol// pad+ma'i gzugs 'dzin de yang ni// kha yi nang nas nges par 'byung // bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim gyur te// ji srid de snying nu skyes la// gang zhig
416a2(rgyud 'bum): de yi snying gnas pa/ / 'dir ni de'i snying kun nas phrogs// mar mer por ni blangs pa yis// grol ma'i gzugs bzhin yid 'phrog pa// de ni gsum pas cho ga bzhin// rlung gis lo ma g.yo ba
416a3(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ / rang gi khyim du thim par bsgom// gcig gi ngo bor gyur pa mchog/ lha dang lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs// mtshan mo mdun du bsgrub par bya// bran gyi ngo bos 'jug 'gyur zhing // 'tsho ba dang
416a4(rgyud 'bum): ni nor gyis kyang / / sa steng 'jig rten slar ci smos// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sngags kyi dbang po sgrub pa pos// rang dbang med rnams sgyur mi bya// sngags kyi rgyal dbang bzlas byas
416a5(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / rgyal srid sgrub pa de mchog go// gzhan du gang gis rang bsgrubs na// bud med 'dod pas long bzhin myos// gang de lha yi bu mo yang // de yi skad cig nyid la 'chi// rigs kyi 'jig/
416a6(rgyud 'bum): rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa las/ lha'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // 'jig rten dbang phyug snying po mchog/ sba zhing srog bzhin yang dag srung // dam tshig
416a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa dman pas kyang / / 'dren pa'i bdag nyid sngags bzlas bya// gcig pu grogs dang bral byas te// blo dang ldan pas 'bum du bzlas// de yi mngon sum 'ong 'gyur te// 'khor lo gsum
416b1(rgyud 'bum): du legs 'gro mchog/ 'jig rten thams cad 'byin pa dang // sdud pa dang ni yang dang yang // nam mkha'i go 'phang der 'gro ste// dran pas 'di la the tsom med// sems dang sems med sbyor ba na//
416b2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni sems med la nges mthong // sems ni sems ma la thim nas// rab 'jug lus skyes ma rnams la// nad bcas nad med pa dang ni// nad med de bzhin nad bcas byed// zhags pa
416b3(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i dbang pos so// gzhan du byis pa rmongs pa yis// zla ba 'dzin par 'dod pa bzhin// gang zhig rang bzhin sbyor bral bas// las rnams
416b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa de mchog min/ / gang gis gsum gsum gnas skabs gsum// 'jig rten mgon po nyid rig nas// chu 'dzin bral ba'i nam mkha' bzhin// 'jig rten mgon po'i go 'phang 'gro//
416b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa ni dpal pad+ma 'bar ba'i rgyud chen po las phyung ba rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon pa'i lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga ras/ byang chub
416b6(rgyud 'bum): rin chen gyis bskul nas/ shud ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// // / rgya gar skad du/
416b7(rgyud 'bum): An+ya tA ra ku ru ku wi kar+tha/ bong mdas/ 'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru gu la'o rtog pa/ b.lags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ba phags ma lha mo sgrol la la phyag 'tshal
417a1(rgyud 'bum): lo/ sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor rgya mtsho'i rgyud// gzhung dang rtog pa nyams shing nub par gyur nas kyang // sgrol ma 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin zhes bya rgyud kyi gtso// de
417a2(rgyud 'bum): yang nub par gyur nas rtog pa 'di yang 'byung / / sems can mang po'i don du rnal 'byor pa// rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud las bsdus byas nas// rtog pa 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs//
417a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyan par gyis// 'jig rten skyabs med gyur la rnam bltas nas// 'gro kun don byed pa yi tshul 'di ni// sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas//
417a4(rgyud 'bum): gus pa chen pos khyed kyis blang bar bya'o// 'jig rten rnam rtog zhi bar bya phyir rtog pa 'di// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni rab tu gsungs// dpal ldan gru 'dzin ri la 'jam dpal dang //
417a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma bsnams dang rgyal bar byed pa dang // sgrib pa rnam sel blo gros rgya mtsho dang // byams pa la sogs tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// gang yang chos kyi tshig 'di thos gyur nas// rjes
417a6(rgyud 'bum): su yi rang spyi bos gus phyag byas/ / rgyal ba'i sras kyis mnga' byas bstod pa 'am// yang na glu dang dbyangs dag byas pa yis// sna tshogs gar gyis 'di ni mchod pa byas// gnod sbyin srin po
417a7(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas 'jig rten dang / / sna tshogs bu mo dang ni rgyu skar dang // sa yoM dbang dang lag na rdo rje dang // rlabs rnams sna tshogs can gang gnas pa yi// klu yi bu mo zur gyis lta bas blta ba dang // sa 'og skyong dang
417b1(rgyud 'bum): lha dbang grub pa'i bu mos mchod/ / dri za'i rgyal mo nu ma shin tu rgyas pa dang // rig pa 'dzin dang mi 'am ci yi chung ma dang // gnod sbyin chung ma ri yi bu mo'i bu dag ni// gang yin bdag cag skyabs med/
417b2(rgyud 'bum): ces ni 'di skad smra// gang phyir skyabs med skyabs gyur sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dir// mgon med mgon gyur 'jig rten mgon po khyed// bde ba bskyed cing ngo mtshar cher gyur gang // mgon po
417b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi tshig dbang 'di thos nas/ / nyid kyis dbang du byed pa'i gsang sngags gsungs// sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kun thos pas// mthar thug sangs rgyas bde ba du ma 'byung // rdo rje
417b4(rgyud 'bum): reg pas khams kyang 'dzag par 'gyur/ / zur gyis lta bar byed pas lta byed cing // rkang pa dag kyang sa la gya tsom 'dor// 'dod chags shin tu bde bas khu 'bab tshe// 'di ltar mthong nas lha
417b5(rgyud 'bum): yi bu mo la/ / 'gro ba dbang byed ku ru kul+le'i sngags// ras ris bris dang gsang sngags sgrub pa'i phyir// dus la bab pa'i tshig 'di mgo na smos zhes// de ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon pos
417b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / de tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug las rnams rab tu gsungs// ku ru kul+le'i ri mo'i lugs// gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub pa po yis 'bras thob pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
417b7(rgyud 'bum): ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis// chos grangs gang dang dus gang la// sgrol ma 'byung las bshad pa'i bzhin// de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis// gang gi mig ni dmar
418a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / lag pa de bzhin rkang pa dmar// bya yi mig can e n+ya'i rkang // des ni sgrol ma bri bar bya// dpyid kyi zla ba dang po yi// mya ngan med pa'i tshes brgyad nyin// zun ni
418a2(rgyud 'bum): phyed dang gnyis pa la/ / sgrol ma'i mig ni bri bar bya// mngar gsum bza' zhing nya la sogs// sha dang chang yang spang bar bya// dmar po'i gos kyang rtag tu bgo/ dmar po dri yis rtag tu byug/ byams
418a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems ni bskyed byas la/ / tho rangs khrus byas bsangs nas su// lan gsum gos ni brjes nas su// dbang du byed ma yang dag bri// zhal gcig mig ni yangs pa dang // phyag bzhi
418a4(rgyud 'bum): ma la gur kum mdog/ bcu drug lo lon sgeg bcas 'dra// bud meng sgyu ma rgyags pa bri// gzhon nu ma dmar ser mos byas pa'i skud pa las ras byas la/ de dang thags mkhan gnyis ka
418a5(rgyud 'bum): zan dang 'o ma bza' bar bya zhing / de nas pad+ma'i gdan la stod g.yogs dmar po'i gos dang bcas par rin po che'i rna cha dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
418a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas mda' rna rtser 'gengs pa/ g.yon pas gzhu 'dzin pa dang / ut+pa la dmar po gnyis pa na bsnams pa dang / 'od dpag med cod pan na bzhugs pa ri'i phug na gnas pa'i
418a7(rgyud 'bum): ku ru kul+le'o/ / ku ru kul+le'i 'og tu ni sgra gcan 'dzin no// de'i steng du 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa'o// 'dod pa'i lha'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de la pad+ma dmar po'i
418b1(rgyud 'bum): gdan no/ / de la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can gyi bcom ldan 'das ma bris la/ ras ris rab tu gnas pa bya'o// de'i mdun du mchod pa rnam pa bco brgyad byas la yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad//
418b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// sgrol ma'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM ku ru kul+le hrIHhUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags so// de nas sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum tsam byas la/ yang ston zla tha chung nga/
418b3(rgyud 'bum): dpyid zla 'bring po 'am/ dbyar zla 'bring po'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i dus tshogs kyi nyin par tho rangs kyi khrus byas la gso sbyong bzung nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ nyan thos kyi
418b4(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol/ de nas theg pa chen po gsang sngags pa'i tshogs la mchod ston byas nas yon phul la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhungs la btsugs nas/ bla gos phrag pa
418b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu gzar nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang na bzhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la dga' ba'i tshogs rnams la phyag byas nas bzod par
418b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris bkram pa'i phyogs der nye bar song na/ dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i don du rig pa 'dzin pas bsam gtan dang ldan par gnas la yi ge
418b7(rgyud 'bum): grangs kyi 'bum bzlas pa bya'o/ / cha gcig gis ni shes rab 'phel// cha gnyis kyis ni dbang du byed// gang zhig cha ni gsum pa yis// mis ni dug kyang 'gugs par 'gyur//
419a1(rgyud 'bum): myos shing 'gyings pa'i bud med rnams dang ni// 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// sbyor ba goms pas lha mo mdzes rnams la// sngags 'chang des
419a2(rgyud 'bum): ni ji ltar 'dod par spyod/ / de min tsam gyis mtshungs med dug can 'bros// gdengs ka'i gtso bo'i 'od kyis dpal ldan dag kyang nya bzhin 'gyur// bzlas brjod ldan pas ngag gi dbang phyug
419a3(rgyud 'bum): byed 'gyur bas/ / rig pas 'gyings pa'i stobs can mkhas pa'ang lan med byed// rig pa 'dzin pa glang po rta yi rgyab tu zhon pa dang // rig ma mdzes pas legs par 'khyud cing mgul
419a4(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jus pa las/ / sngags rig pa yi gtso bo'i stobs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur// mthar gyur pa yi rgyal srid longs spyod dag la yid kyis spyod// 'dod pa'i lha las dga' ba'i bu la sogs
419a5(rgyud 'bum): pas ri khrod ma/ / de bzhin sred med bu las dpa' mo mi phyed pa las bde sogs dang // tshogs bdag las ni dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dkar mo dang // sa 'dzin lha las phun sum tshogs ma'
419a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis rnam rgyal byed/ / gsang sngags ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma gang zhig sgom byed pa// des ni sna tshogs gter dang gser dang dngul dang rna cha dang // gos la sogs pa'i nor rnams
419a7(rgyud 'bum): kun la ched du gang bsam pa/ / sems kyis thams cad ma lus kun nas longs spyod byed// rgyal po las ni rgyal srid dbang po'i yul 'das pa yi shing las 'bras bu dang // klu dang klu nung rgya mtsho rnam
419b1(rgyud 'bum): las chu rnams 'gugs/ / sngags dang ldan pas 'thung zhing zas la sngags kyis dag par byed// skye bo sngags med par ni longs spyod grub pa med// nags skyes glang po rta mchog ri dgas
419b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ / dug bcas gdengs ka can gyi sbrul mchog dang // chu srin chu glang stag dang bse dag dang // rang gi sngags kyi stobs kyis bkug nas ni// zhon yang ngo mtshar med par byas pa'i
419b3(rgyud 'bum): mig dag gis/ / blta bar gal te gsang sngags grub pa de yis mthong bar 'gyur// gal te snying rje'i lta bas 'jig rten 'di ltar sdug bsngal bas// rgud par gyur pa'i mi mnyam pa la sngags pa
419b4(rgyud 'bum): des/ / yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'jig rten la phan sgrol ma yin// 'jig rten ma lus sgrol mar byed cing zhi bar byed// bdud rnams bcom nas nor gyi char rgyun 'bebs par byed// dpag bsam
419b5(rgyud 'bum): shing du gyur nas 'gro rnams ci 'dod sbyin par byed/ / nor gyi dbang phyug ma lus pa yis nor rnams kun bkug nas// sems can ma lus kun la phan phyir sbyin par byed// de bzhin 'phongs pa'i 'jig
419b6(rgyud 'bum): rten rnams phyir gos ni gang dag dang / / stan dang khyim dang bla re dag tu sgrol ma dang // rgya mtsho'i gling du tshong pa'i gru zhig 'phongs pa la// gzings dang gru la sogs par sgrol ma 'gyur// sgrol ma de
419b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms rnal 'byor pa/ / dang po sdug bsngal gyur pa de// de spangs nas ni cung zhig na// mis ni ston mo rnyed par 'gyur// gnyis par gos ni rnyed par 'gyur// de bzhin btsun mo dang yang 'phrad// de
420a1(rgyud 'bum): nas so rtsi longs spyod 'gyur/ / mthangs par yang ci 'dod spyod// gal te tshangs spyod yin na yang // lha mchog bskyed pa'i bu mo spyod// sems can gsod la dga' ba yis/
420a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa 'di la 'grub mi 'gyur// dge ba bcul dga' 'gyur zhing // theg pa che la sems gcig pas// rdo rje chos kyi bka' bzhin du// dngos grub mchog ni des spyod 'gyur// 'di ni ras ris
420a3(rgyud 'bum): la 'jug pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o/ / // chos mchod pa yi sbyor ba yis// gang gis chos nyid brnyes gyur na// chos kyi dbyings su rang gyur pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
420a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i rjes la dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brag gi yi ge las byung ba// dpag bsam shing ni rnam par bsgom// ut+pal yongs su gyur pa las// shing ni g.yon du bsgom par bya/
420a5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs nor gyi char pa dag/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab pa yis// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byed pa// de ltar bsgoms na nor bdag 'gyur// gling bzhi pa yi sems can rnams// sems kyi 'od
420a6(rgyud 'bum): zer gyis bkug nas/ / rtag tu rin chen bdun rang bzhin// de dag la ni rab sbyin bya// yongs kyi gtso bo rin chen dang // de bzhin rin chen rgya mtsho skyes// bud med rin chen rta rin chen// de
420a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ral gri rin chen dang / / glang po rin chen sogs rin chen// sangs rgyas rnams la yid kyis dbul// bud med rgyan gyis brgyan byas la// sna tshogs gzugs can 'gying ba rnams//
420b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod rnams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu dbul// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// rin po che ni yongs rgyas pa'i//
420b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs kyi gtso bo nar dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya// de bzhin rin chen gzhan dag kyang // gus dang bcas pas yongs btang na// rdo rje
420b3(rgyud 'bum): chos su gyur nas ni/ / sems can kun gyi don byed 'gyur// 'di ni dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sems nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do// sems nyid kyis ni rnam par grol//
420b4(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis 'ching ba rnams las thar// sems kyis grol ba dang ldan 'gyur// sems ma gtogs pa dngos don rnams// gzhan dag gzhan par ma mthong ste// sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos
420b5(rgyud 'bum): grub kun/ / gang phyir phun tshogs gzhan ma mthong // gang yang snod dang sems can rnams// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa dag/ zag med lhag par mthong ba yis// sems tsam yin zhes
420b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bsgrags/ / de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sems kyi me long phyis byas na// rang bzhin glo bur ba yi skyon// rim gyis rab tu zad par 'gyur// dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba//
420b7(rgyud 'bum): ji med rdzogs pa'i zla ba ste// sems nyid zla bar bsgoms byas nas// de yi steng du sa bon dgod// dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ni// me yi mdog gi steng na gnas// yi ge i dang yang dag ldan//
421a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi sna tshogs 'od rnams kyis// 'gro ba dri ma med byas nas// stong gsum 'di sogs mkha' dbyings te// ku ru
421a2(rgyud 'bum): kul+le'i rigs zhugs pas/ / de yis sgrol ma bskul nas ni// bkug nas mdun du gnas par byed// de nas mkhas pas sa bon la// mchod pa chen po'i sprin rnams spro// me tog
421a3(rgyud 'bum): spos dang mar me dang / / de bzhin dri dang lha bshos sogs// phyag rgya 'phreng ba de bzhin du// gar dang glu yi mchod sogs mchod// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sdig pa
421a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad so sor bshags/ / 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung // sngags 'di lan gsum brjod nas ni// de nas gshegs su gsol bar bgyi//
421a5(rgyud 'bum): sems ni byams pas gnas byas la// slar yang der ni gzhag par bya// snying rje'i sems ni bskyed byas nas// rab dga'i sems kyang bskyed par bya// phyi nas thams cad btang snyoms la//
421a6(rgyud 'bum): sems tsam la ni mnyam par gzhag/ tha mal rnam par spang ba'i phyir// sems kyang slar yang stong par bya// yang srid len pa'i phung po lnga// stong pa nyid kyi me yis bsreg/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA
421a7(rgyud 'bum): na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ yud tsam stong pa'i rnal 'byor nyid// byas nas sems ni ngal sos bya// sngon gyi dam bcas dran byas nas// sa bon tsam zhig yang dran bya// gcig pu mya ngan 'das pa
421b1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / sems can bsdus par 'gyur ba'i phyir// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las// bdag gis de dag ji ltar bsgral// 'di ltar bsams nas brtse ldan des// sems med pa yi stong pa
421b2(rgyud 'bum): yang / / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sems// sems nyid kyis ni bskyed par bya// sangs rgyas byin rlabs las sa bon// de la ut+pal zhes byar 'gyur// ut+pal dkyil du zla ba'i gzugs//
421b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge a las byung ba'o// slar yar zla ba der sa bon// de las 'od zer 'phros gyur pa// de yis ma lus 'jig rten khams// rnam par sbyangs par bsgom par bya// de yis sbyangs shing gsal/
421b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas// 'od zer kun gyis sangs rgyas tshogs// ut+pal la zhugs bsgom par bya// de las sgrol ma 'byung bar 'gyur// bstan 'dra'i lha mo btsod mdog can// rgyan rnams kun gyis
421b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam brgyan pa'i/ / dam tshig gzugs ni mnyam bskyed nas// ye shes 'khor lo yang dag bkug/ yud tsam gyis ni nges rdzogs pa'o// ye shes 'khor lo mdun gnas pa// dam tshig phyag
421b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ / kha yi lam nas gzhug par bya// lag pa thal mo sbyar byas nas// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgom par bya// gung mo gnyis ni rtse mor sbyar// rtse mo'i nang du ming med gzhug
421b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis ni dbu mar sbyar/ / mthe bong gnyis ni 'og tu bkug/ dam tshig phyag rgya 'di bcings nas// 'khor lo bkug nas gzhug par bya// sangs rgyas rnams la tshigs bcang
422a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis/ / dbang bskur bar ni gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa// bdag kyang bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir// nam mkha' rdo
422a2(rgyud 'bum): rje deng bdag stsol/ / rgyal ba'i dbang bskur zhes bya bas// spyan la sogs pa lnga pa'o// rgyal po'i me tog dbang bskur zhing // chen por gyur pa de gsol mdzod// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba//
422a3(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas sgrol ma dbang bskur bas// chos ni gtsug gi nor bur ra gyur//
422a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba gsum po snang bar byed// dbang bskur rin chen thob 'gyur na// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// ji ltar slar bstan no ga yis// lo phyed brtan par
422a5(rgyud 'bum): brtsams nas ni/ / gtor ma dus su gtang bar bya// sngags 'di yis ni khar ba 'am// khu ba la sogs cho ga yis// rmi lam mtshan ma thob par 'gyur// ral gri sa 'og dngos grub dang // mi snang
422a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bcud len dang / / mi mthong ba dang mkha' spyod nyid// de bzhin rkang byug mig sman dang // rmi lam mtshan ma ston 'gyur zhing // dngos grub rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te de la dga'
422a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na/ / grub pa phra mo sgrol mas grub// 'khor lo sgyur nas rgyal srid dang // dbang po'i long spyod thams cad byed// sgom dang bzlas par ldan pa la// rmi lam du yang rab grub byed// zla drug tham
422b1(rgyud 'bum): zla gcig go/ / mtshan gcig rangs par bzlas byas te// ut+pal phyag rgya bcings nas ni// bzlas nas phyag rgya yud kyis 'bar// phyag rgya 'di yi mthu yis ni// btsun mo dang bcas tshangs pa dang //
422b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po dang ni nye dbang sogs// bkug nas dbang du 'gyur bar byed// de nas brtsams nas dngos grub kun// bdag 'khor 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// nu dang 'dam gyi skyon dag gis//

422b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ni dbang phyug 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas rigs su byung nas ni// 'khor lo bskor ba yang dag 'gyur// bltam dang rab tu 'byung mdzad pa// dka' ba spyod pa'i spyod mdzad cing // byang chub spyod/
422b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang spyod mdzad pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang dran par mdzad// lha las babs dang sprul pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa chen po dang // dur khrod gshegs pa
422b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / 'jig rten gsum du lus spangs nas// rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs sku yis// gnas gtsang mar ni slar gshegs nas// sprul par byung ba'i sku yang ngo // glegs bam ras ris
423a1(rgyud 'bum): rim pa yis/ / chos kyi sku yang 'jug par mdzad// gang gis de yi grub pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes/
423a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis de nyid kyis nyid kyi thugs la rnam par brtags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ji ltar na sangs rgyas bcom

423a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi sku spangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyi skyes bu gang zhig gis dgos pa'i don sgrub pa'i/
423b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir sgyu ma sprul nas dgos pa sgrub par byed do// de bzhin du/ gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// 'khor lo sgyur ba 'angs gyur nas// skye ba yongs
423b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par mdzad/ / gang tshe sangs rgyas 'das pa na// de tshe 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung // de gnyis med par 'jig rten 'dir// nam yang 'byung ba ma yin no// 'dul bya'i 'jig rten la brten nas//

423b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi bde ba chen po la/ / kun tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs// byed po rtag pa gcig pus bzhugs// yin snyam drang srong rnams sems te// de lta'i ngo bo de min zhes// de ni skad cig bsdoms

423b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa/ / nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba de nyid min// sangs rgyas 'gag pa'ang de bzhin te// thams cad ro gcig gyur pa yi// 'byung dang
424a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig pa'i rang bzhin no/ / de ni chos dbyings gzugs gcig tu// sgrib pa lnga po spangs pa'o// zab cing rgya ni che ba'i gzugs// de nyid ngo bor de nyid bzhugs// gnyis ka/
424a2(rgyud 'bum): yod pa ma yin phyir// gdod nas yod pa ma yin no// de ni gdod nas ma skyes pas// skye ba ma yin 'gag ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas bcom
424a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das khams gsum la rjes su ston pa mdzad pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ji snyam du sems/ gang sangs rgyas ji snyed pa
424a4(rgyud 'bum): de gang zhig yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa zhig yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams ni yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin no// lag na rdo rjes smras pa
424a5(rgyud 'bum): ma skyes pa ni skye ba yin/ / skyes pa phyir yang skye mi 'gyur// don dam nyid du dpyad na ni// de phyir gdod nas ma skyes pa// de bzhin 'chi ba 'chi mi 'gyur// 'chi ba med pa 'chi ba min// mi gnas pa la gan+da/
424a6(rgyud 'bum): pa med// gnas pa de la gnas mi dgos// gal te ma skyes nyams 'gyur zhing // ma skyes pa nyid skyes 'gyur na// ri bong gi ni rwa nyid kyang // skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur// gang tshe yod pa skye

424b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'gro ba rnams/ / snang ba tsam du rnam par shes// re zhig rigs pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mya ngan 'das pa shes par bya'o// byang chub

424b3(rgyud 'bum): rjes smras pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni// dngos po rnams ni 'byung ba ltar// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs brten nas// dngos grub rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnams ni/

424b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis shes rab 'phel bar byed/ / las gsum la ni sbyar bar bya// skye gnas kyi rnam par dag pa a shAt+tha'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i thab khung byas la/ mya ngan med pa'i shing la me sbar nas/
424b7(rgyud 'bum): ga bzhin du ut+pal dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/ gar mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la mngar gsum gyis bsgos nas rtsa ba'i sngags dang bya ba yin no// byis nas 'khrul 'khor bya ba yin te/
