431b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bu gzhon nu snar ma zhes bya ba 'di shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lo bcu gnyis kyis bstan bcos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa dang / bzo'i gnas kyi thabs thams cad la mngon par shes pa
431b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir shes rab chen po 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags dang rtog pa 'di la bslab par bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub
431b5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ ro yi skyon dang bral ba yi// dngul chu legs par blangs nas su// rdo rje rten gshong du byas nas// 'jig rten mgon dang btags par bya// slar yang chos sku dang btags la//
431b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'dza' ba ti ki ti ka dang // byi na'i lo ma'i khu ba dang // nyi ma gsum du mnye bar bya// band ka ko la'i 'o ma dang // ha ka badz+ra'i 'o ma dang // rnam phug pa'i khu ba dang // ru ma'i 'o ma dang
431b7(rgyud 'bum): mcheg/ / dngul chu dang ni tsab mo yis// lan mdun par du bkru zhing man// lcags kyi snod du legs bcug nas// 'bri ha ra ka'i phan bcug btso// kan ka li me tog gong bu dang // 'og
432a1(rgyud 'bum): dang steng du nges par bskor/ / rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas na// dngul nu de ni g.yas nas 'khor// mu zi nyi mas bsgos pa la// gsang sngags des ni bzlas
432a2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / lcags snod me la bzhag pa la// phye ma'i sbyor ba cung zhig blugs// mu zi cung zad zhu gyur nas// nam mkha'i 'dab ma bcug nas bcu// phyi nas phyi ni sa le sbram//
432a3(rgyud 'bum): de la ma ki ki yang gzhag/ dngul dang zangs kyang de nas gzhug/ de bzhin lcags kyang lnga 'gyur ro// gzhan kun drug 'gyur ba zhu byas nas// nyi ma'i 'od dang mnyam par 'gyur//
432a4(rgyud 'bum): de yi ri this gzhan phung chen// mkhas par sgyur bar byed pa yin// man bcas phra zhing bsgyur nus na// dngul nu grub par shes par bya/ ma he rang dang bcas pa yi// spyi yi 'o mas rdo rje gsapa
432a5(rgyud 'bum): byi ba mchu rings khra dang ni/ / grub pa'i dngul chu nang du gzhug/ 'di dang dngul chu 'dres gyur na// mar ka ta la sogs pa'ang 'a ju// ku ru kul+le'i rnal 'byor pas// mig gi phyir ni mu tig bzhu//
432a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gzigs ma rtsa zos ma// bud med brgya la 'dod pa spyod// mtshan bdun tsam zhig sbyor bas ni// brtul zhugs can ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// dngul chu mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i rgyud do// zha nyi'i
432a7(rgyud 'bum): ril bu byas nas ni/ / 'bang hu'i sa bon snod du ni// khrag 'dzag kan tsu'i snod bcug nas// sa snod dmar por bcug nas ni// dngul chu dang bcas zha nye de// 'chi bar 'gyur bar the tsom med//
432b1(rgyud 'bum): dedang dngul nu srang re bsres// phyi nas srang gcig drug cur bsre// rang dang mnyam par bsgrub byas nas// dngul gyi ril bu byed pa yin// sgrol mas dngul chu grub gyur nas// sems cad ngor
432b2(rgyud 'bum): byed nus par 'gyur/ / sems can don la bsod nams tshogs// tshogs las byang chub mchog tu 'gyur// dngul chu sgrub pa'i rgyud do// bstan pa'i kun te'o me tog sngo// ci tra ga ma zhes
432b3(rgyud 'bum): bya dang / / rnal 'byor pa yis zla gcig tu// 'o ma dar 'thungs lo stong 'tsho// sngags kyi bka' las nag po blang // 'od ma'i snod du bcug nas ni// tshes brgyad la sgrub rnal 'byor pas/
432b4(rgyud 'bum): Sha'am gnas yang 'tsho// lung dpung dang 'dra rnyed nas// 'o ma dang mnyes 'thungs nas ni// tshangs pa mdun na 'don mnyam pa'i// tshe dang ldan 'gyur the tsom med// de bzhin shing chen 'bras sul/
432b5(rgyud 'bum): chu shing 'bras bu 'dra rnyed nas// gang dang gang na gnas pa der// gal te gso sbyong la gnas pa// 'o ma dang mnyes 'thungs nas ni// skra dkar gnyer ma rengs par 'gyur// bcud kyi ler sgrub pa'i rgyud
432b6(rgyud 'bum): do/ / bu 'dod pas ni b+ha ga'i shing me tog/ brtul zhugs gnas pa'i 'o ma dang 'thungs nas// de yi chung ma gso sbyong ldan byas te// 'thungs nas skal bzang bu dang ldan par 'gyur// sngags 'i
432b7(rgyud 'bum): dag gi ni 'bras bu dag/ btags nas 'o ma dang ni bsre byas nas// gal te btsun mo dang yang gso sbyong ldan byas te// 'thungs na rgyal ba'i mtshan ldan bu thob 'gyur// lag sman zhes bya'i rtsa
433a1(rgyud 'bum): gang gi 'o ma dang / / khrus byas 'thungs na bu btsas 'gyur// don grub pa yi sku 'dra yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzugs// mtshon gyis mngon rnams kyis ni 'jigs pa med pa'i
433a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / 'dza' la she la rtsa ba nas bton nam// rtsa ba blangs nas lan bdun mngon bsngags te// ngo bo la ni nges par bcings byas nas// lo gcig rims ni med par byed pa yin// rnal 'byor
433a3(rgyud 'bum): pas ni gser shing rtsa ba dag/ blangs nas gang gi mgo la bcings byas na// de yi nyin bzhi pa yi gnod pa dag/ rims kyis zin pa rims med 'gyur// so phag dub chang dang rtsa ba mo
433a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / ra gnyis pa mi rgyal ba'i khu ba bcas// zangs ma'i snod du bud med 'o ma dang mnyes nas// mig la bskus na mig gi nad rnams sel// shing thog u tsa ta yi rtsa ba blangs nas ni//
433a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di brgya phyed par du bzlas nas su// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang 'thungs na// dam pa'i mi dbang de'i mtshan la rung nas// na ga sa la zhes byar rab grags pa// de yi 'o ma dag
433a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan byas pa/ / de ni mtshan ma stobs bskyed bu 'phel bu tsha bskyed// sngags 'di brgya phyed bar du bzlas su'o// gi'u wa nga dang ni so ma skyes pa'i lce// mi yi dbang po'i rtsa ba rgyu skar
433a7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po la/ / de yi dpral bar thig le byas nas ni// thig le de mthong 'jig rten gsum dbang byed// shi ba'i ro yi mig dang snying dang lce dag dang // dpral ba dang ni de bzhin sna dag dang //
433b1(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas skar ma rgyal la ni// til mar la bcos skye bo dbang du byed// sbrul gyi dbang po'i mgo bo'i mig sman dang // mig ngan gcod dang me tog ces bya'i khrag/ mig sman de yis
433b2(rgyud 'bum): mig la bskus byas na/ / rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed par 'gyur// sngags 'di brgya phyed rkang pa sar bzhag nas// sa yi nang na yod pa'i nor stsal na// rkang pa gang du bzhag pa g.yo 'gyur
433b3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / de na gter dag yod par shes par bya// rkang pa'i bo la 'gul na ni nye bar 'gyur// rkang mthil 'gul na ring na gnas pa yin// gang na gter yod zer ba thos pa mngon byas nas// rig pa
433b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas nyin bzhin 'og tu blta/ / byis pa mchu rings phyi ma ni// gu gul bcas pa byugs tsam gyis// glang chen myos pas gsal zhing bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// shin tu gnag pa'i khyi mo
433b5(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / 'o ma bsrubs nas mar gsar gyis// bskus nas rnga lpags lham gon nas// chu yi steng nas 'gro bar 'gyur// sa bkod tsha nya'i tsher ma dag/ bsdus nas tshang tshing khyim sbas nas// chang rnams
433b6(rgyud 'bum): brlag ste phyung nas su/ / bzang po nyid du 'gyur ba yin// rdza mkhan rdza ma bsregs pa'i me// thog gis bcag pa'i shing btsugs nas// de me 'bar bar mi 'gyur te// chang blugs na slar 'bar bar
433b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zong la gong bstan sngags bzlas nas// sngon sngags tshong pa rnams bstan na// rnal 'byor pa yi tshong 'grub cing // tshong pa rnams la khe cher rnyed// chang gi sa bon byed pa la// spre'u yi mig gtsa
434a1(rgyud 'bum): ma bcug nas/ / chang snod bcas pa rlag par 'gyur// ba gu las 'grus spyad du rung // ba gu la yi chus bkrus na// byis pa mams blangs nas ni// 'byung po
434a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra yis bdug byas nas/ / ngur smrig bskon pas sos par 'gyur// byis pa nu zho 'thungs skyugs na// rma byi'i sgro bsregs thal ba yis// mgul ba bcing ba byas nas ni// sbyor ba mchog gis
434a3(rgyud 'bum): slar sos 'gyur/ / pa dka ba ka ni tshig dang // ldan pa'i gte byang du bsgo byas nas// kha yi nang du bcug nas 'dug na ni// 'ching dang mtshon cha mi byams pa las thar// k+Sha ma ra ya yi ge rnams dang ldan/
434a4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge kun kyang e yis brgyan pa la// yang dag ka ba ka li mtha' ma ni// skong ba ni dang tshang gsum gnyis gnyis sbyin// dan ti la ut+pa la sa ra pu ka dang // ni tshul dang 'gi ri kar ni chus// lan ban+d+ha/
434a5(rgyud 'bum): thar du bkrus pa'i zha tsa'o// byang gul ni blo dang ldan pas bri// shing sgrog sngags sgrog khri dang g.yul ngo ru// mtshan cha'i char 'bab pa dang gzhan dag ni// ni snang ba dag nges par 'joms byed par/
434a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu rkyen dis ni 'grub par 'gyur bzhin// gdagis sngags kyi rgyal po thos nas ni// rig pa byas nas dpung ba la btags na/ de yi dbang drug nor sbyin pa dang mnyam par bgyur/ gzhan gyi
434a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi ga / / seM tham sa/ chung za ma nas gsanasas// sul gyi mug byung / khri ma thas ni med kyims chog/ sung ma ldang
434b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khrigs pa yis/ / khu ba'o ma dang bkrus bud med kyis 'thungs na// rang gi las kyis mngal blugs pa dag kyang // des ni nges par gnas par byed pa yin// ma ga d+ha li 'bras bu lnga tsam zhig/
434b2(rgyud 'bum): btags nas bud med gang gi sa 'o ma 'thungs// gsang sngags 'di yi mthu rab che ba yi// de ni bde ba dang ldan btsa' bar 'gyur// nim pas ba du 'o ma ni btags nas// rdo rje ru dang bsregs byas
434b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / skyes pa'i tshe na mngal ni bsku byas na// bud med de ni bde bar bu btsar 'gyur// glang po ma ga na yi shu dag bcas// rta li dri dang ma he'i mar gsar bcas// ba la dang ldan sbyor ba byas nas ni//
434b4(rgyud 'bum): rum dag ni sgrub byed 'phel bar byed// bza' ba thams cad zos nas ni// sna nas chu ni 'thungs nas ni// mgo bo'i dus min skra dkar dag/ sngags kyi sbyor bas de med 'gyur// a ba shi yi rtsa ba
434b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ka ma tsa ka gser shing 'bras// ldan pa rag pur chus btags nas// lus mchog bskus bsrubs mdzub mo 'jigs// 'khrig pa'i tshe na mi 'dzag na// bdag po mi gus 'gro bar
434b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / 'ching ba yi ni sbyin par 'dod// de 'dzag bya phyir de yis bsku// mkhris pa sbyor tshe phag zhag las// mar me sbar bar byas nas ni// mi 'dod pa yang myur du 'byung // de yang mngal du yun
434b7(rgyud 'bum): rings gnas/ / rdo rje mi yis khyim tshig na// mi gang sngags kyi chang gis 'thor// me ni 'chi bar gyur to zhes// sbyor ba 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs// sems can gang dag 'khor gnas dang //
435a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon pos de skad bsgrags// ri yi rgyal po po ta lar// bcom ldan gzhan sdug pas sdug pa// sangs rgyas ma gyur ci yang med// sems can don
435a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams sgrub pa'i phyir/ / sngar spyad ma yin ci yang med// nyams pa slar yang gso bar bsam// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
435a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
435a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
435a5(rgyud 'bum): phab pa/ / // rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo// spyan ni skad cig glog dang
435a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ma/ / 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi// ge sar phye ba las ni byung ma// phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun tu// gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma// skar ma stong phrag tshogs
435a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis/ / rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma// phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyi// pad+mas phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma// sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba// bzod pa bsam gtan
435b1(rgyud 'bum): / spyod yul nyid ma// phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor// mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bar spyod ma// ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu bsten ma// phyag 'tshal//
435b2(rgyud 'bum): tut+tA ra hUM yi ge/ 'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma// 'jig rten bdun po zhabs kyis mnan te// lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma// phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa// rlung lha sna
435b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma/ / 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang // gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma// phyag 'tshal trad ces bya dang phaT kyis// pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma//
435b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te// me 'bar 'khrugs pa shin tu 'bar ma// phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen mo// bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma// chu skyes zhal
435b5(rgyud 'bum): nikhro gnyer ldan mdzad/ / dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma// phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya'i// sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma// ma lus phyogs kyis 'khor lde
435b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa'i/ / rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrug ma// phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' ba brjid pa'i// dbu rgyan 'od kyi 'phreng ba spel ma// bzhad pa rab bzhad tut+tA ra yis// bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du
435b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad ma/ / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams// thams cad 'gugs par nus ma nyid ma// khro gnyer g.yo ba'i yi ge chu gis// 'phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma// phyag 'tshal gyi/
436a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan// brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma// ral pa'i khur na 'od dpag med las// rtag par shin tu 'od ni mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal bskal pa
436a2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ma'i me ltar/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma// g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum kun nas bskor dgas// dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma// phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la
436a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag gis/ / mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis rdung ma// khro gnyer can mdzad yi ge hUM gis// rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma// phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhim// mya ngan 'das zhi spyo/
436a4(rgyud 'bum): yul nyid ma// swAhA oM dang yang dag ldan pas// sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma// phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor rab dga' bas// dgra yi lus ni rab tu 'gems ma// yi ge bcu po'i ngag ni
436a5(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i/ / rig pa hUM las sgrol ma nyid ma// phyag 'tshal tu re'i zhabs ni brdabs pas// hUM gi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma// ri rab man da ra dang 'bigs byed// 'jig rten gsum rnams/
436a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba nyid ma// phyag 'tshal lha yis mtsho yi rnam pa'i// ri dgas rtags can phyag na bsnams ma// tA re gnyis brjod phaT kyi yi ges// dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma// phyag 'tshal lha/
436a7(rgyud 'bum): yi tshogs rnams rgyal po// lha dang mi 'am ci yis bsten ma// kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis// rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma// phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa'i// spyan gnyis po la
436b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od rab gsal ma/ / ha ra gnyis brjod tut+tA ra yis// shin su drag po'i rims ni sel ma// phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas// zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma// gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin
436b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnams/ / 'joms pa tu re rab mchog nyid ma// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bstod pa 'di dang // phyag 'tshal ba ni nyi shu rtsa gcig/ lha mo la gus yang dag ldan pa'i// blo ldan gang gis rab dang brjod pa//
436b3(rgyud 'bum): srod dang tho rangs langs par byas nas// dran pas mi 'jigs thams cad rab ster// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba// ngan 'gro thams cad 'joms pa nyid do// rgyal ba bye ba phrag bdun rnams kyis//
436b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur la// 'di las che ba nyid ni thob cing // sangs rgyas go 'phang mthar thug der 'gro// de yi dug ni drag po chen po// brtan gnas pa 'am gzhan yang 'gro ba// zos pa dang ni
436b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs pa nyid kyang / / dran pas rab tu sel ba nyid thob// gdon dang rims dang dug gis gzir ba'i// sdug bsngal tshogs ni rnam par spong ste// sems can gzhan pa rnams la yang ngo // gnyis gsu
436b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun du mngon par brjod na/ / bu 'dod pas ni bu thob 'gyur zhing // nor 'dod pas ni nor rnams nyid thob// 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur te// bgegs rnams med cing so sor 'joms 'gyur/
436b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bstod pa sgrol ma las sna tshogs bstan pa'i rgyud
437a1(rgyud 'bum): las phyung ba rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya mU la tAN+Da laH/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur ba rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dun+ta tra
437a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rdo rje khro bos zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po cher 'bar ba// nam mkha'i dkyil du thig le shar// srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang // snying gi dkyil du
437a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing mnan pa nyid yin te// phur pa'i rdo rje de nyid de// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ dIp+ta tsakra
437a4(rgyud 'bum): han han hUM phaT/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// khro bo rdo rjer sgrub par mdzod// khro bo rdo rje phur pa'i lha/ ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// rdo rje'i de nyid
437a5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin las/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'bar ba'i khro bo mo bzad pa// skra yi gter du bdag skyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas sems can don// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs
437a6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ gar+b+ha gar+b+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha dI pa ya ti hUM/ oM badz+ra u la ka mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra u shi/
437a7(rgyud 'bum): ka mu kha hUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje lha mo sgra 'byin dang / sprul pa'i lha mo 'phro men ma phag gi mgo can dang / rtsangs pa'i mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M sarba han hUM phaT/
437b1(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra kro d+hi la s+yA ki ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra bya g+hu mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra gr-i d+hu mu li hUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha mo sgeg mo dang / sprul pa'i 'phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo
437b2(rgyud 'bum): can no/ / oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI tI tA ruhUM/ oM badz+ra tsa mA ra mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra two NA ka mu khi hUM/ 'di ni khro bo dbyug sngon 'chang ba dang / lha mo rdo rje sder mo dang / sprul
437b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'phra men ma g.yag mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya man+ta ka hUM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sma shAn ba ti hUM/ oM badz+ra ha ri Na mu khi hUM/ oM badz+ra u lU ka mu khi
437b4(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ 'di ni khro bo gshin rje mthar byed dang / lha myo dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo 'phru men ma ri dgas kyi mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a~M tsa la r+b+ha
437b5(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi mu hA la hUM/ oM badz+ra ar+ya mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra pre ti mu khi hUM/ 'di ni khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje lha mo gad+hAn khung ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo 'phra men maM/
437b6(rgyud 'bum): gzig gi mgo can dang / khA ta'i mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+hA ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi dza ya tI hUM/ oM badz+ra bi rA la mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra pak+Shi ta mu khi hU~M/ 'di ni khro bo rta mgrin

443b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM ma hA ni de shwa ra hUM phaT/ me'i kha dog kha la bsgoms na 'chi'o// oM k+Shau shAM hai k+ShaHde ba da ta taM mAM mAM mA rA ya phaT/ gsad pa'i sngags so// oM k+ShI hai tsi Di shwa rI n+du shrI swA hA/ gtum
443b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sngags so/ / oM lA kaM ku le ke shwa rI he pheM swA hA/ rigs kyi dbang phyug ma'i sngags so// oM mAM ma he shwa rI hUM shrI tsi pheM/ dbang phyug ma chen mo'i sngags so// oM ki li bi
443b6(rgyud 'bum): ka rA la shrIHkA k+ShaM hUM phaT swAhA/ dus can ma'i sngags so// oM tsa tsartsa ya tsartsa ya hUM hrI/ tsartsi ka'i sngags so// oM tsa muN+De/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ i daM ba liM grih+Na gr-ih+Na
443b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM 'o ha~M phaT swAhA/ lha mo dum bu can gyi gtor ma'i sngags so// oM hA hAHhUM shrI phaT swAhA/ lha mo u ma'i sngags so// oM AHhUM lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags
444a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM hrIHkI shrI ma~M g+ha de ba daH haM mAmU rA ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ thams cad gsad pa'i sngags so// ma hAHhU~M/ che ge mo uts+tsha Ta ya hU~M phaT+Ta/ bskrad pa'i sngags

444a3(rgyud 'bum): +thAstam+b+ha naM/ zhes pas ba lang gi sha la bsngags te brgyapa narta rengs par 'gyur ro// oM muHhUM sar+b+ba pa shun stam+b+ha ya mo ha ra hUM phaT/ stag gi pags pa la lan bdun bsngags nas brgyab na ma ha dang /

445a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas la slob ma la dbang bskur t+ne/ thog mar bum pa'i dbang bskur ba thub pa dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas tshul sogs pa dbang lnga rnams kyi bye brag gis/

446a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba de bdag the tsom mchis na/ gru dang gar gyis mchod don ji ltar du 'gyur ba lags/ lha la dbang bskur ba nye bar spyod pa ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/

446a3(rgyud 'bum): lags/ gzugs can gyi sa bon gyi mthu gang lags/ kye bcom ldan 'das dam tshig can rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko yi g+ha Na piT Ta ya rih+na/

448b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dang ldan pa phyag bzhi pa bzhengs pa bshad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos grub thams cad kyi don dang / bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog nag

449a1(rgyud 'bum): phyug ma dang / ka li ka dang / rigs kyi dbang phyug ma dang / tsartsi ka bzhi rnams kyis bskor ba ni kha sbyor gyi rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa/ lha mo bzhir gnas pa thams

449b4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'gyur/ de nas dang po mchod pa nye bar bya ste/ ji sna tshogs pa la sogs pa spos me tog 'phreng ba la sogs pa'o// snying khar hUM yig bltas la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas mdun du blta bar

449b6(rgyud 'bum): su byin gyis brlab pa ni/ oM tha mu AHhUM/ mig tuk+Shi/ rna ba g.yon pA la a/ rna ba g.yas pa la A/ sna la tra/ lce la hrI/ rkang pa gnyis la baM bA/ rdo rje la hUM/ phyi nas lus pa
449b7(rgyud 'bum): yid byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / ma ts+yai hU~M/ snying lar hU~M/ mgrin par oM/ spyi gtsug tu haM/ gnal yas khang rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa/ grub ni pa/ seng ge'i gdan yongs su bsgom pa
450a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma kohUM/ ji ltar gyur pa de nas blta bar bya ste/ pi wang dang / rnga bran dang / gling bu dang /
450a2(rgyud 'bum): ting ting shags dang / gar dang / gru dang / rnga sgra dang / sred med kyi bu la sogs pas hUM gi yi ge bsam par bya'o// rdo rje gur bcings pa la sogs pa ma lus pa sngar bzhin bya'o//
450a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das bzhengs la sems can gyi don mdzod cig/ ci'i phyir stong pa nyid du sems/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin lam zhen par gang sems can 'dzam bu'i

450b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la 'khyud pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ bdud bzhi yang dag par mnan pa/ g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ gsum pa na tho ba/ bzhi pa na rngam dkar po/
450b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa na gshin rje dbyug pa/ drug pa na rdo rje/ bdun pa na log 'dren gyi mche ba/ brgyad pa na glang po che'i pags pa/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ gsum pa na rtse
450b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa/ bzhi pa na rnge'u rlung lnga pa na rdo rje/ drug pa na dril bu/ bdun pa na ma he'i mgo/ brgyad pa na glang po che'i pags pa/ lto 'phyang ba/ stag gi pags pas rked pa dkris pa/
450b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs can gyis dpung pa brgyan pa/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i do shal 'byung ba/ rked pa dang mgrin pa la sogs pa rnams dga' bo dang nor rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su brgyan pa'o// klu
450b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams kyis zhabs la 'jus nas phyag byed pa/ phaT kyi sgra chen po yongs su sgrog pa/
450b6(rgyud 'bum): ki li ki la'i sgra dang ldan pa/ 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa/ ha hA hi hI he he ho hau/ sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ shar gyi 'phar ma la gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma tsa kyi sa bon las bskyed pa/ phyag gnyis kyis
450b7(rgyud 'bum): gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i da shal rba na~M/ kha dog dkar mo mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa/ lha'-i'i 'phar ma la tsa rtsi ka kha dog nag mo ka~M gi sa bon
451a1(rgyud 'bum): las bskyed pa/ phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lhag ma sngar bzhin/ nub kyi 'phar ma la kI li kA la gyi sa bon las bskyed pa/ g.yas g.yon na rtse gsum
451a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang thod pa/ lhag ma rnams sngar bzhin no// byang du rigs kyi dbang phyug ma raM gyi sa bon las bskyed pa/ kha dog ser mo// g.yas pa gyen du bsgrengs pa/ g.yon pa na thod pa thogs pa/ lhag
451a3(rgyud 'bum): ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ / lha mo thams cad spyan gsum pa/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba/ klu brgyad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ ro'i steng na zhabs g.yon brkyang bas mnan pa/ de bzhin du

451a6(rgyud 'bum): du dga' ba'i dbang phyug ma naM gyi yi ge las yongs su rdzogs pa/ kha dog ser mo/ lhag ma sngar bzhin no// lha mo u mas gtso bo la 'khyud pa/ kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi pa/ dga' ba chen pos
451a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ de bzhin du mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ lhag ma sngar bzhin no// phyag rgya shin tu dga' bas gnas pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngags gsal bar bshad par bya ste/ dngos
451b1(rgyud 'bum): grub sna tshogs mchog tu ster ba'i phyir/ dpal sems can rnams la chags pas sems can rnams la phan pa dang mi phan pa'i rnam pa mi spyad pas dga' ba chen por gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos brgyad dam/

493b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pas thams cad rab tu phye ya/ rnga bo che dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / pa Ta ha chen po dang / rdza dza dang / rdza rnga chen po dang / tam bu ra dang / gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra brdungs lugs sna tshogs pa dang / dri za rjes
493b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi gru la sogs pa'i sgra dang gar thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing dam tshig can dang stabs gcig tu gnas la/ phyi nas thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ni/ oM a shru Ni pra hUM/ zhes pa
493b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di brjod na nges par nag po chen po'i byin gyi rlabs the tsom med par 'byung ngo / / slad kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rol mo'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
493b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcu pa'o/ / // gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dus shes pas shes bya thams cad rkang par mnan par bsams pas brlag par 'gyur ba ni shes pas bde ba/
493b7(rgyud 'bum): thob par ji ltar bya na/ bsgom bya sgom byed sgom pa spangs la/ brtan par gnas pa'i sbyor ba bsam du med par mthar gtugs kyi bar du nges par bya'o// 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rab tu
494a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i le'u kye bzhi bcu gcig pa'o/ / gzhan yang rtsom song bskrad par bya ba'i sngags bshad par bya ste/ mdzadzaHzhes pa dran par byas namang po ma thob
494a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / haM u0f7fzhes pa dran par byas na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro// praHpraHzhes pa dran par byas na rta 'bros par 'gyur ro// TahUM/ zhes pa dran par byas na seng ge 'bros par 'gyur ro// e hi Ta sarba h
494a3(rgyud 'bum): aHzhes pa dran par byas na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / muHzhes pa dran par byas na spre'u 'bros par 'gyur ro// gau wa ga/ zhes pa dran par byas na glang 'bros par 'gyur ro// saHku lu ku lu/ zhes pa
494a4(rgyud 'bum): dran par byas na rgyal pos cung zad kyang gnod par bya bar nus par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ byol song bskrad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//
494a5(rgyud 'bum): / gzhan yang mnyam par sbyor bas rje btsun rtogs te/ mchog tu bab pa la mnyam par sbyar na rang bzhin bde ba mchog tu 'gyur ba skye bas so// bde ba thob par byed pa ni sems ma yin zhing sems las byung
494a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang ma yin no/ / dngos po dang dngos po med pa'ang rtogs pa dang mi ldan pa thun po bcol chung mchog tu zab pa gang gis mi shes pa'i mi de gnyis su med pa'i ye shes tshig tsam du'ang dran par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni
494a7(rgyud 'bum): nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// / gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ steng 'og yang dag par mnan te/ lte ba'i
494b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su zla ba bsgoms na/ zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// sna'i bug pa bkang ste thig le bsgoms na/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro// lce stengs su bkug na
494b2(rgyud 'bum): rgas pa dang shi ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / dgang ba dang / dbyung ba dang / bum pa can rim pa ji lta bar dran par byas na/ zla ba phyed kyis mkha' spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro// rlung gis yid bsad la zla ba'i

494b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma thams cad bzang po yin te/ 'on kyang dus tshod la ltos par rigs pa de'i phyir dus tshod brjod par bya'o// nyi ma ni lnga pa la'o// zla ba ni gnyis pa la'o// gza' rnams kyi gtso bo na
495a1(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa la'o/ / rdzogs pa ni bzhi pa la'o// gza' lhag ni gsum pa la'o// mig dmar ni drug pa'o// ldan pa ni gcig pa la ste/ rang rang gi dus chod nges par 'grub par/

495a3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi rmongs pa dang bral ba'i dus tshod dang ldan pa'i dus chod dang rab tu ldan par bya ba'i phyir gza' dang / skar ma dang / tshes grangs kyi go rims bshad par bya ste/ nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi 'am/ brgyad dam/

495a7(rgyud 'bum): snang ba'o/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang 'gro ba rnams kyis shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa bsam du med pa'i zhing bzang por skye bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor 'dis 'o a 'thungs na lbu ba ltar dri ma med par

495b4(rgyud 'bum): / rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ lam gyi cho ga'i rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o// / gzhan yang a thar pa sha ba ra'i sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// oM sarba man+ta ni dA nAMk+Sha maM raM/

495b7(rgyud 'bum): te chen po sa ma nu shrI dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa bar dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ yA thA la b+ha kha sa ma hA
496a1(rgyud 'bum): nam/ bod skad du/ ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas lnga li cod pan can/
496a2(rgyud 'bum): sa gsum kun gyi snying po dang ldan pa// dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad// de ni mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o// gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag pa// byis pa 'di ni don dam bsgom pa yin//

496a6(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur zhing / / rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal bas// chos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'thob par 'gyur// sems can thams cad yongs su bsgom par yang // bya ba 'di ni thar pa'i rang bzhin no//

496b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis ni dang po 'byung ba ste/ / rnal 'byor gnas ni lha mo skur byed la// der ni chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// der ni sngags rnams rdo rje gcig dngos bsgom// chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dngos dmigs bsams//

496b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin te/ / gnyis su med pa'i sku yi rang bzhin can// rdo rje sems dpar dmigs par bya'o// 'di ni sems nyid yongs su grub pa ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa yis ni gsungs pa yin// gang zhig bsgom pa 'di

496b6(rgyud 'bum): thar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bsgom/ / rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong ba// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor gnas dang rol pa ste// thams cad mnyam pa'i btsun mor bcas// bkod pa dag dang
496b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan par gnas/ / mkhas bcas dgos la byung nga la// rdo rje sems dpa' gang mthong bar// gzung ba sangs rgyas spro bsdu'o// bzhi yi ngo bo lha mo bzhi// dbus su nges par gnas pa ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang

497a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par gyur pa'o/ / gang zhig chos rnams snang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// der ni rdo rje mdzad pa gzugs can lta bu ste// rdo rje theg pa der ni gzugs sogs 'dod yon gyi// bde ba mi zad sna tshogs
497b1(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam stsol mdzad pa'o/ / rnal 'byor gnas ni du ma'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni// du ma'i gzugs 'dzin der ni rdo rje dang mnyam zhing // nyid dang mnyam pa'i sems dpa' rnams ni spro mdzad pa'i//

498a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du// chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o// gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa/

498a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste/ / yan lag phyed pa'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin// gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe// lha yi g.yon gyi
498b1(rgyud 'bum): phyed dang gcig 'gyur par lta/ / lung nyid tshad mar byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' de bsgom bya// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// glang po dang ni rta dang mi dang b+hi/
498b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni// ba glang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams// dam tshig de nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te// mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyi rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i// dam tshig 'di ni lha mo
498b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pos gsungs pa'o/ / rnal 'byor pa la sgom pa'i sems dang ldan 'gyur zhing // sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te// dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur//
498b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying po ste// 'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing // de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dpyad par bya// lha 'di rnam snang lha mo lnga rnams de'i
498b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid/ / rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te// skul byed mas ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro// gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te sur mthong ba// rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di
498b6(rgyud 'bum): skad gsungs/ / bde ba bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs// 'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas sgom pa rdo rje'i gsang sngags te// de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgoms pa// rab tu 'bar ba'i
498b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do/ / rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin sgom// ngas ni rdo rje theg par 'di skad du// chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan// sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi
499a1(rgyud 'bum): le'u rtse bzhi pa'o/ / / dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos bcas lus sgom min// lha mos skul ba byed pa'i dngos po ste// de ltar chos las nges par
499a2(rgyud 'bum): brtags byas pas/ / sems ni nam mapar sna bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya// dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa rtse// sems ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa
499a3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin can/ / s+thA mA ji bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya// ji ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste// dngos po 'di ni theg par 'grub par mi 'gyur te// sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyi
499a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtogs par// sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste// rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya ba'o// ji ltar dang zhing rnyog
499a5(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i chu/ / 'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor bsgrub// de ltar bstan du med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi rang bzhin gyi// bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste/
499a6(rgyud 'bum): de la rdo rje'i chun yi dam lnga li rang bzhin can// thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya// chos dang dge 'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te// nag dang khrag sogs mchog
499a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya/ / bza' ba dang bcas pa dang mal stan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin// gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig
499b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rang bzhin no/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum char rdo rje ngo bo mdzad// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje can gyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs// de yi rang bzhin mkha'
499b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur/ / sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis// rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste// sems can rang bzhin la ni theg par med// sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o//
499b3(rgyud 'bum): de lta'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi// sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste// thugs dang spro dang slar yang bsdus bya ba// gsum char yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no// sems ni ri rab hUM dang
499b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam byas te/ / dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed// sems du 'gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag/ der ni sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya// bsdus pa'i ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya//
499b5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa' der ni sku g.yos mdzad// slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te// de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no// de la rdo rje sems dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir// de'i phyir spro
499b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs/ / sngags pas brtan par gyur na spro// brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa// lus nyon mongs kyis 'bras mi byin// nges par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos// thams cad bden
499b7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di rnams bstan/ / de lha'i chos ni sgom pa yin// dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya// gang yang dri ma cis kyang gos pa min// kye rnal 'byor pa/ bcom
500a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ ldan 'das sum skul byung ma na dang pa'i rang bzhin d+ha/ rdod+hA bskyed par bsgom pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad pang/ lha mo rnams ni lha dang gcig pa'i rang
500a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor ba bskyed mdzad pa'o// rjes su 'dzin pas sgom pa'i sems dang ni// yi ge hUM gis kyang ni de 'grub 'gyur// brgya dang rkang pa dang
500a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog pa'i/ / rmongs pa yid la bya ba ma yin no// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid ni// rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis ni yang dag bcings// sngags pas nam mkha'i khams
500a4(rgyud 'bum): su khro bo lha/ / bye ba stong phrag dag ni spro bya ste// gcig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni// slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba ni// byang chub theg pa sems kyi rang bzhin te/
500a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no// gnyis ka rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste// sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rgyud gzhan dang thun mong ba'i le'u ste lnga
500a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po k+Sha ka ga Na dang / lo tsa ba mang
